PVVṬ_1,1	yaḥ vidhvasta samasta bandhana gati ssamyak vaśi tve sthitaḥ sarvu ajñeya visāri nirmmalatama jñāna prabandha udayaḥ sattva artha udyata mānasaḥ ca su ciram śrī mañjunāthaḥ vibhuḥ tat natvā bahu śodya vārttika gatam kiñcid vivakṣāmi aham ṭīkā kṛtaḥ sakalaḥ eva guṇaḥ saḥ eṣa brūtetra vastu gahanepi yat asmad ādiḥ dignāga danta muśalaiḥ viṣame apanīte labdheṣu vartmasu sukham kalabhāḥ prayānti yaḥ mām avajñāyati kopi guṇa abhimānī jānāti asau kim api tam prati na eṣa yatnaḥ kaścid bhaviṣyati kadācid anena ca arthī nānā ādhiyān jagati janmavatām hi na antaḥ 
PVVṬ_1,2	 yadi api hi śāstra ārambhe namaskāra śloka upanyāsam antareṇa kāya vāṅa manobhiriṣṭa devatā namaskāra karaṇena puṇya upacayāt avighnena śāstrasya parisamāptiḥ bhavati tathā api vyākhyātṛ śrotṝṇām stuti purassarayā pravṛttyā puṇya atiśaya utpādāt pārārthyam sat ācāra anupālanam ca ālocya viśiṣṭa devatā pūjā ślokam upanyastavān ācāryaḥ vidhūta kalpanā ityādi 
PVVṬ_1,3	 yadā samantabhadra śabdaḥ rūḍhyā bodhisattva vṛttaḥ na gṛhyate tadā iyam buddhasya bhagavataḥ pūjā sā ca dvidhā stotrataḥ praṇāmataḥ ca namaḥ śabdena praṇāmataḥ pariśiṣṭaiḥ stotrataḥ stotram api sva artha sampattitaḥ para artha sampattitaḥ para artha saṃpad upāyataḥ ca tridhā sva artha sampannaḥ ca para arthaṃprati samarthaḥ bhavatī viprathamam pūrvva arddhena sva artha sampad uktā sva artha sampad ca kāya traya lakṣaṇā tribhiḥ vviśeṣaiḥ vviśiṣṭa udbhāvitāḥ āvaraṇa prahāṇa viśeṣeṇa gāmbhīrya viśeṣeṇa audārya viśeṣeṇa ca 
PVVṬ_2,1^1	 tatra ātma ātmīya ādi a ākāra pravṛttāḥ grāhya grāhaka ākāra pravṛttāḥ ca traidhātukāḥ citta caittāḥ kalpanā sā eva jālambandhana ātmaka tvāt tad vidhūtam vidhvastam sa vāsanam punar anutpatti dharma tvam āpāditam yāsām mūrttīna antāḥ tathā uktāḥ etena āvaraṇa prahāṇa viśeṣaḥ uktaḥ gāmbhīrya audārya viśeṣau tu gambhīra udāra pada abhyām uktau vidhūta kalpanā jālāḥ gambhīrāḥ śrāvaka pratyekabuddha ādi aviṣaya tvāt udāra assakala jñeya sakala satva artha vyāpanāt mūrttayaḥ trayaḥ kāyāḥ svābhāvika sāmbhogika nairmāṇikāḥ yasya bhagavataḥ asau vidhūta kalpanā jāla gambhīra udāra mūrttiḥ bhadram kalyāṇam abhyudaya niḥśreyasa lakṣaṇam tat samantāt niravaśeṣan tad arthinām yathā bhavyambhavati yasmāt sakāśāt asau samantabhadraḥ etena para artha sampad uktāḥ asyāḥ ca para artha sampadaḥ samanta sphuraṇa tviṣaḥ iti anena siddhi upāyaḥ uktaḥ 
PVVṬ_2,1^2	 tviṣaḥ raśmayaḥ iha tu yathā avasthita vastu grahaṇa evam sādharmyeṇa dharma deśanā abhyudaya niḥśreyasa sādhana viṣayāḥ tviṣaḥ iva tviṣaḥ ucyante samantaḥ niravaśeṣaḥ para artha sādhana upāyaḥ spharyate vyāpyate vinayebhyaḥ sākalyena kathanāt yābhiḥ tāḥ samanta spharaṇyaḥ tatra tathā bhūtāḥ tviṣaḥ dharma deśanā yasya sa samanta spharaṇa tviś namaḥ śabda yogāt ca sarvu atra caturthī bdaḥ mahāyāne bodhisatva viśeṣe rūḍhaḥ iti bodhisatvasya iyam pūjā padārthaḥ tu pūrvva vat yojyaḥ ayantu viśeṣaḥ vidhūta kalpanā jāla tvam bodhisatva bhūmi āvaraṇa prahāṇataḥ draṣṭavyam gāmbhīryam śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pṛthagjana aviṣaya tvataḥ audāryantu bodhisatvamaāḥ hātmyataḥ kāya trayam api anurūpam bodhisatvānām vidyate eva prakarṣa gamanāt tu buddhānām vyavasthāpyate iti 
PVVṬ_2,2–3,1	 santi eva hi santosya vā rtti kā khyasya śāstrasya grahītāraḥ tathā api śrotṛ doṣa bāhalyena santam api upakāram asantam iva kṛtvā sūkta abhyāsa bhāvita cit tattvam eva śāstra ārambhe kāraṇandarśayan ayam ca mahā artha bhraṅśe hetu doṣaḥ tyaktum yuktaḥ iti etat ca vakra uktyā kathayitum dvitīyam ślokam āha prāyas prākṛta ityādi atra caturvvidhaḥ śrotṛ doṣaḥ udbhāvitaḥ kuprajña tvam ajña tvam anarthi tvam amādhyasthyañcaḥ prāyas śabdaḥ okāra antaḥ bāhulya vacanaḥ prāyas janaḥ bhūyān janaḥ prākṛta saktiḥ prākṛtāni bahis śāstrāṇi tatra saktiḥ yasya iti gamaka tvāt vyadhikaraṇaḥ bahu brīhiḥ prākṛtā vā saktiḥ yasya iti samāna adhikaraṇaḥ eva prākṛta viṣaya tvāt ca saktiḥ prākṛtāḥ anena kuprajña tvam śrotṛ doṣaḥ uktaḥ 
PVVṬ_3,2	 apratibalā śāstra grahaṇam prati asaktā prajñā yasya sa upratibala prajñaḥ prāyas jana eti sambandhaḥ anena ajña tvam uktam su bhāṣitaiḥ na anarthyeva kintu su bhāṣita abhidhāyinam vidveṣṭi api īrṣya amalaiḥ parigataḥ san anarthī ca vidveṣṭi ca iti arthaḥ etena yathākramam anarthi tvam amādhyasthyam ca uktam atra api prāyas janaḥ iti sambandhanīyam 
PVVṬ_3,3	 anye tu prāyas śabda sakāra antopyasti nipātaḥ sa ca bāhulyena iti asmin= tṛtīya arthe svabhāvāt varttate iti vyācakṣate īrṣyā para sampattau cetasaḥ vyāroṣaḥ sā eva malaḥ citta malinīkaraṇāt vyakti bhedāt bahuvacanam yatas evantena kāraṇena ayam āripsitaḥ vā rti kā khyaḥ granthaḥ para upakāraḥ pareṣām upakāraḥ upakriyatenena iti karaṇe ghan parān vā upakaroti iti para upakāraḥ karmaṇi aṇpāṇiniḥ para upakāraḥ iti naḥ asmākam cintā api na asti kathantarhi śāstra racanāyām pravṛttiḥ iti āha cetaḥ ciram ityādi ciran dīrgha kālam sūkta abhyāsena vivarddhitam vyasanam saktiḥ tatpara tā sūkta abhyāsa vivarddhitam vyasanam yasya cetasaḥ te ttathā uktam iti hetoḥ atra vā rtti kaḥ racanāyām anubaddha spṛham jāta abhilāṣam cetaḥ iti evam eke vyācakṣate 
PVVṬ_3,4^1	 anye tu anyathā kasmāt ayam ācārya dha rmma kī rtti rvārtika nyāyena pramāṇa samuccaya vyākhyām karoti na punar svatantram eva śāstram iti asmin praśna avasare prāha prāyaitya ādi asya ślokasya ayam samāsa arthaḥ cintayā karuṇayā ca me pra mā ṇa sa mud ca yaḥ vyākhyāyām cetaḥ jāta abhilāṣam iti cintā karuṇā ca ācārya di gnāḥ gara cita śāstrasya alpa upakāri tvena alpa upakāri tvañca śrātṛ jana aparādhena padārthaḥ tu ucyate prāyas iti bāhulyena prākṛta saktiḥ janaḥ iti sambandhaḥ prākṛtaḥ ucyateloke nīcaḥ yasya duṣṭa unvayaḥ evantī rthi kaḥ śāstrāṇi para praṇītāni ca ācāryanīti śāstra dūṣaṇāni 
PVVṬ_3,4^2	 viparyasta jñāna prabhava tvāt duṣṭa anvayāt yatas prākṛtāni teṣu saktiḥ anurāgaḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ kasmāt punar prākṛta saktiḥ iti āha apratibala prajñaḥ iti atosau durbhāṣitam api subhāṣitam iti gṛhītvā prākṛte sajyate apratibala prajña tvāt eva ca ācārya su bhāṣitāni svayam yathāvat avaboddhum akṣamaḥ doṣavat tvena gṛhītvā taiḥ ācārya su bhāṣitaiḥ anarthī ācārye ca vidveṣavān bhavati iti āha kevalam ityādi na kevalam anarthī su bhāṣitaiḥ ācāryīyaiḥ api tu vidveṣṭi apīrṣya amalaiḥ parigataḥ san= a ācārya di gnāḥ gam kim bhūtam sūkta abhyāsa vivarddhita vyasanam vyavahitena api sambandhaḥ bhavati eva 
PVVṬ_4,1–4,2^1	 yena yasya abhisambandhaḥ dūra sthasya api tena saḥ iti nyāyāt śobhanam uktam sūktam bhagavat pravacanantatra abhyāsaḥ tatra vivarddhitam vyasanantatra eva atyartham āsakta tvam yasya ācārya diś nāgasya sa tathā uktaḥ anena ācārya diś nāgasya upacita puṇya jñāna tvam āha upacita puṇya jñānāḥ eva hi sūkta abhyāsa vivarddhita vyasanāḥ bhavanti yenā apratibala prajña ācārya su bhāṣitaiḥ anarthī prākṛta saktiḥ ca tena kāraṇena ayam pra mā ṇa sa mud ca yaḥ na para upakāraḥ upakaraṇam upakāraḥ bhāve ghan pāṇiniḥ paraḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ upakāraḥ na asmāt bhavati iti kṛtvā na para upakāraḥ alpaḥ tu upakāra usti eva sa ca prāya śabdena sūcitaḥ eva iti śabdaḥ hetau asmāt hetoḥ asmākam cintā 
PVVṬ_4,2^2	 mahārtham api idam śāstram na bahūnām upakārakam jātantat katham asya atyartham sāphalyam kuryām iti evam ākārāḥ ācārye ca bodhisatva kalpe vidveṣaḥ svalpa upyanartha hetuḥ atoham ācārya nīteḥ aviparīta prakāśanena ācārye bahu mānam utpādya tatas nartha hetoḥ janat nivarttayiṣyāmi iti evam duḥkha viyoga icchā ākārā karuṇā api api śabdāt iti atra anubaddha spṛham iti dvitīyena iti śabdena cintā karuṇayoḥ hetu tvam āha iti ābhyām cintā karuṇābhyām cetaḥ ciram dīrghra kālam atra pra mā ṇa sa mu cca ya vyākhyābhūta pra mā ṇa vā rtti kaḥ racanāyām anubaddha spṛham santānena pravṛtta iccham iti 
PVVṬ_4,3–5,1	 yadi pra mā ṇa sa mu cca yaḥ vyākhyām cikīrṣuḥ ācārya dharma kīrttiḥ kasmāt svātantryeṇa anumānam vyavasthāpayati iti āśaṅkām apanayan= āha artha anartha ityādi arthaḥ hitam ahitam anarthaḥ tayoḥ vivecanantasya anumāna āśraya tvāt anumānam āśrayaḥ yasya iti vigrahaḥ anumānena hi artha anarthau niścitya anumāna pṛṣṭha bhāvinā prabandha pravṛttena jñānena artha anarthau yathākramam prāpti parihāra artham vibhāgena vyavasthāpayati tasmāt anumāna āśrayam artha anartha vivecanam tad vipratipatteḥ iti tasmin= anumāne vipratipatteḥ tad vyavasthāpanāya hiti evam eke vyācakṣate atra tu idam cintyam 
PVVṬ_5,2	 yadi tāvat evam avadhāryaterthā anartha vivecanasya eva anumāna āśraya tvāt iti tat na artha anarthābhyām anyasya api upekṣaṇīyasya tṛtīyasya viṣayasya yat vivecanantasya api anumāna āśraya tvāt artha anartha vivecanasya ca aniyata tvāt pratyakṣa āśraya tvam anivāritam iti kotiśayonumānasya khyāpitaḥ yena tad ādau vyutpādyate atha api evam avadhāryate artha anartha vivecanasya anumāna āśraya tvāt eva iti tathā api ayuktam avadhāraṇam artha anartha vivecanasya pratyakṣa āśraya tvāt api tathā hi artha anarthau vibhakta rūpau= eva pratyakṣe pratibhāsete tat ca pratyakṣam abhyāsa atiśaya samāsādita pāṭava tayā apasārita bhrānti nimittam pāścātyam artha anartha vivecana vikalpam janayati etat eva hi pratyakṣasya artha anartha vive cana āśraya tvam yad artha anarthau vibhāgena anubhūya yathā anubhavan tatra niścaya jananam 
PVVṬ_5,3–5,4	 na ca śakyam vaktum pāścātyena eva artha anarthau vibhaktau= iti vikalpena vastu svarūpasya agrahaṇāt grahaṇe vā vikalpaka tva hāneḥ vikalpa anubaddhasya pramātuḥ spaṣṭa artha pratibhāsi tva virodhāt yatra tu kvacid viṣaye pāṭava abhāvāt bhrānti nimitta apanayana asamartham pratyakṣam tatra anumānāt niścayaḥ prārthyate na sarvatra tasmāt pratyakṣe svatas paratas ca prāmāṇya niścayaḥ niścāyayiṣyate ca ayam arthaḥ dvitīya paricchedaḥ iti na iha pratanyate 
PVVṬ_5,5–5,6	 avaśyam ca pratyakṣasya abhyāsa balāt apasārita bhrānti nimittasya yathā anubhavat niścaya jananāt svatortha anartha vivecana āśraya tvam eṣṭavyam anyathā anumānasya api vyavasthā na syāt dhūma ādeḥ liṅgasya aniścayāt dhūma ādeḥ api anumānāt pratipattau= anavasthā syāt tatra api liṅga antarasya anumāna antareṇa niścayāt iti yadi ca pratyakṣam artha anartha vivecanasya anāśrayaḥ tadā śāstra kāreṇa prakaraṇa antare yat uktam hita ahita prāpti parihārayoḥ niyamena samyak jñāna pūrvaka tvāt ityādi tat bādhyeta tathā na hi asyām arthamparicchidya ityādi punar ca uktaṃdṛṣṭeṣu samvid sāmarthya bhāvinam smaraṇa ādi tyādi 
PVVṬ_6,1	 tasmāt anyathā vyākhyāyate iti apare ācārya di gnāḥ ga praṇītam pramāṇa lakṣaṇa ādikam arthaḥ yukta tvāt tī rthi kaḥ praṇītam na yukta tvāt anarthaḥ tayoḥ vivecanam yukta ayukta tvena vyavasthāpanantasya anumāna āśraya tvāt anumānam eva hi āśritya lakṣaṇa vākyānām yukta ayukta tvam vyavasthā api annam pratyakṣantasya avicāraka tvāt iti 
PVVṬ_6,2–6,6	 tat api ayuktam yatas lakṣaṇa vākyānām na sva rūpeṇa yukta ayukta tvam api tu artha dvāreṇa sa ca arthaḥ yathā anumānena yuktaḥ pratīyate tathā pratyakṣeṇa api tathā ca vakṣyati pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣeṇa eva sidhyati pra vātathā pakṣa dharma tva niścayaḥ pratyakṣate ityādi yopi manyate satyam artha anartha vivecanam pratyakṣa anumānābhyām kriyate eva kevalam yad artha anartha vivecanasya anumāna āśraya tvam ucyate tad pratyakṣa viṣayepi vivāda sambhave sati na anumānāt anyat nirṇṇaya nibandhanamasti atonumānasya prādhānyāt tat vivecana āśraya tvam uktam iti etat api ayuktam yatas pratyakṣasya saḥ eva viṣayaḥ vyavasthāpyate yaḥ niścitaḥ na ca niścite vivādaḥ sambhavati iti ayuktam etat 
PVVṬ_6,7	 anyaḥ tu āha artha anartha vivecanam anumānāt eva bhavati na pratyakṣāt yatas yertha anarthāḥ anubhūta phalāḥ anubhūyamāna phalā vā na te pravṛtti viṣayā niṣpanna tvāt phalasya tasmāt anāgata artha kriyā arthantad samartheṣu artha anartheṣu pravṛttiḥ na ca tad sāmarthī anteṣu pratya kṣeṇa pratīyate yena pravṛtti viṣaya tvam syāt pravṛtti sādhya artha kriyāyāḥ bhāvi tvena tad sāmarthya kurvat rūpa tā asya api bhāvi tvāt tasmāt pūrva anubhūta artha kriyā sādhana vastu sādharmyāt pratyakṣeṣu api vastuṣu anāgata phala yogya tā niścayaḥ na pratyakṣataḥ tena anumānāt eva artha anartha vivecanam iti 
PVVṬ_6,8–6,9	 tat api ayuktam yatas yadi sā yogyatā kurvat rūpa tā rtheṣu varttamāna kāla bhāvinī tadā abhyāsa atiśayavatā api pratyakṣeṇa niścīyeta liṅga vat atha anāga tā eva sā tadā anumānena api na niścīyeta anāgateḥ thenu māna abhāvāt iti vakṣyati etena yat ucyate pravṛtti viṣaya vastu prāpaṇam pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ aviśiṣṭami ti tat api nirastam draṣṭavyam anāgata artha kriyā samarthaḥ hi pravṛtti viṣayaḥ na ca tad sāmarthyam pratyakṣa anumānābhyām niścīyate iti uktam paricchinnaḥ ca pravṛtti viṣayaḥ iṣyate na ca santānaḥ pratyakṣa ādi kṣaṇena paricchinnaḥ tat katham pravṛtti viṣayaḥ 
PVVṬ_7,1^1	 atha ekasmin kṣaṇe pratyakṣam pravṛttam api niścaya vaśāt kṣaṇa sāmānya viṣaya tvena eka santati viṣayanta da yuktam pratibhā samānena eva hi viṣayeṇa niścaya vaśāt pratyakṣam sāmānya viṣayam vyavasthāpyate na paramārthataḥ sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt yathā liṃga viṣayam pratyakṣam tathā hi pratibhāsamānam idam dhūma sva lakṣaṇanta arṇṇam vā pārṇṇam va anyat vā sambhavati tatra ca viśeṣān avadhāraṇena kṣaṇa mātra niścayena ca sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam api sāmānya viṣayam pratyakṣam vyavasthāpyate pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvinaḥ niścayasya pratyakṣa viṣaya anusāri tvāt 
PVVṬ_7,1^2	 na punar eka kṣaṇa viṣayam pratyakṣam evam vyavasthāpayitum śakyate yatas yaḥ pratyakṣe pratibhāsate kṣaṇaḥ na asau niścitaḥ na api pūrva kṣaṇa rūpaḥ para kṣaṇa rūpaḥ vā sambhavati bhinna kāla tvāt tat kathantatra viśeṣān avadhāraṇena kṣaṇa mātra niścayena ca kṣaṇa sāmānya viṣayam pratyakṣam vyavasthāpyeta pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvinaḥ saḥ eva ayam iti niścayasya sāmānya viṣaya tvepi na santāna viṣaya tvam pratipanna pratīyamānayoḥ viṣayīkaraṇena anāga takṣaṇā niścayāt vijātīya vyāvṛtta rūpa viṣaya tvāt cāta eva kṣaṇasya pratibhāsepī ayam ghaṭaḥ iti jñāpana niścayaḥ 
PVVṬ_7,2^1	 nanu yadi artha kriyā samarthaḥ vastu santānaḥ pratyakṣa anumānābhyām paricchidyate kathantarhi tayoḥ pravarttaka tvam vastu sva rūpa mātra paricchedāt iti brūmaḥ tathā hi agni ādikamvastu ekatra prabandha vṛttyā dāha ādi artha kriyā samartham pratyakṣeṇa niścinvan= anyatra api deśa ādau= etat upalabhyamānam prabandha vṛttyā eva īdṛgvidha artha kārī iti niścāyayati saḥ eva punar kāla antare phala arthī tad svarūpamparyeṣamāṇa ugnyādikam pratyakṣa anumānābhyām dṛṣṭvā tat eva idam iti niścaya pūrvvakam pravarttate tena ayam arthaḥ tad svarūpa mātra paricchede pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ na prabandha vṛtti paricchede 
PVVṬ_7,2^2	 na api artha kriyā sāmarthya paricchede pūrvam eva asya sarvasya paricchinna tvāt tena pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ pravarttakattvam yuktam eva kathantarhi artha anartha vivecanasya anumāna āśraya tvam uktam te na eva atra ātmanā abhipretam api tu catur ārya satyam yatas mukti arthinaḥ vayam muktiḥ ca catur ārya satya darśanāt bhavati iti bhagavatā uktam tat darśanañca bhāvanā abhyāsataḥ niṣpadyate bhāvanāyām pravṛttiḥ ca catur ārya satya niścayena tad niścayaḥ ca parokṣa tvāt anumānāt eva bhavati iti artha anartha vivecana āśraya tvam anumānasya eva 
PVVṬ_7,3	 arthaḥ nirodha mārgau= upādeya tvāt anarthaḥ duḥkha samudayau tyājya tvāt yat vā arthaḥ parama artha satyam anarthaḥ saṃvṛtti satyam tayoḥ yat vivecanam sva rūpeṇa vyavasthāpanantasya anumāna āśraya tvāt artha anartha vivecana kāri ca sarvam jñānam na sva lakṣaṇam gṛhṇāti api tu adhyavasyati iti bhrāntam eva tena yadi śabda ādi jñānam artha anartha vivecana āśrayam iṣyate tat api bhrānta tvāt apramāṇam eva atas eva na tasya iha vyutpādyatā prasaṃgaḥ anumānasyatu bhrānta tve sati api pratibandha vaśāt prāmāṇyam śabda ādi jñānasya tu evam prāmāṇyebhyupagamyamāne a numāna intar bhāvāt apakṣa dharmasya āgamaka tvāt artha anartha vivecana āśraya tvam anumānasya eva 
PVVṬ_8,1	 nanu pratibandha vaśāt anumānasya prāmāṇye nitya ādi vikalpasya api prāmāṇyam syāt kṣaṇikā ādi arthe pratibandhāt atha adhyavasita artha pratibandhena prāmāṇyam maṇi prabhāyāmmaṇi jñānasya prāmāṇyam syāt tat api hi adhyavasitena maṇinā sambaddhan tasmāt sati api pratibandhe yad deśa ādi sambandhi tayā yorthodhi avasitaḥ tad deśa ādi sambandhi tayā santāna ekatva adhyavasāyāt tam artham prāpayat anumāna jñānam pramāṇam eva na sarvam jñānam 
PVVṬ_8,2–8,4	 artha anartha vivecanam ca adhigama rūpam ākāra unumānampramāṇa tvāt yat vā liṅgam eva anumānam atortha anartha vivecanasya anumāna āśraya tvam tad vipratipatteḥ iti tasmin= anumāne sammohāt tad vyavasthāpanāya tasya anumānasya vipratipatti apanayanena avasthāpanāya ahasū tra kā raḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ ityādi yadi anumānam vyavasthāpyam kasmāt pakṣa dharmaḥ ityādinā hetum eva vyavasthāpayati iti ced adoṣoyam hetu vipratipatti dvāreṇa anumāne vipratipatteḥ tad vyutpatti dvāreṇa eva tasya vyavasthāpanam anumāna jñānam ca triru upa liṃgāt utpadyamānam loka pratītam eva atas vipratipattiḥ pratītya eva nirākriyate 
PVVṬ_8,5–8,7	 yat vā anumāna śabdena yadā liṅgam eva ucyate tadā tad vipratipatteḥ hetum eva vyavasthāpayati iti adoṣaḥ atra śloke liṃgasya lakṣaṇam saṃkhyā niyamaḥ saṃkhyā niyama kāraṇam vipakṣa nivṛttiḥ ca uktā pakṣa dharmaḥ tad aṅśena vyāptaḥ iti lakṣaṇam tasya pakṣasya aṅśaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ tena vyāptaḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam tridhā eva iti saṃkhyā niyamaḥ avinā abhau= a niyamāt iti saṃkhyā niyama kāraṇam triṣu eva avina abhāvasya niyata tvāt iti arthaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ tata uparaḥ iti vipakṣa nivṛttiḥ tasmāt hetu trayāt anye hetvābhāsāḥ 
PVVṬ_9,1	 nanu yadi tad aṃśa vyāptiḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva gṛhyate tadā anumānasya utthānan na syāt sādhya dharmiṇi sādhya dharmeṇa hetoḥ vyāpti agrahāt tadā ca pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti vyartham lakṣaṇam agamaka tvāt sarva upasaṃhāreṇa vyāpti grahaṇepi na anumānasya prāmāṇyam syāt vyāpti grāhaka pramāṇa pratipanna viṣaya tvena smṛti rūpa tvāt pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti ca na vakta vyanta daṅśa vyāpti vacanena eva gata tvāt tad aṅśa vyāpti balena ca pakṣa dharmasya gamakatu annam pakṣe sattā mātreṇa tatrasthasya gardabha ādeḥ agamaka tvāt tasmāt nam pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti pṛthak lakṣaṇam vaktavyam 
PVVṬ_9,2–9,4	 tat uktam anyathā anupapanna tvam yatra tatra trayeṇa kim na anyathā anupapanna tvam yatra tatra trayeṇa kim iti kim ca anupalabdheḥ tāvat na pakṣa dharma tvam anya upalabdheḥ puruṣa dharma tvāt svabhāva hetoḥ ca dharmi rūpa tvāt kārya hetoḥ api svātantryeṇa dharmī anapekṣa tvāt na ca kalpitasya pakṣa dharmasya kārya svabhāva hetu tvam sādhyavyāptiḥ ca iti na pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti vaktavyam 
PVVṬ_9,5–9,7	 tathā yadi hetu tvena tritvam vyāptantadā hetu tvasya aniyata tvāt anyatra api saṃyogi ādiṣu hetu tvam anivāritam eva iti tridhā eva iti avadhāraṇam na yujyate atha hetu tvam tri tvena vyāptantadā tritvasya hetau= aniyata tvāt kārya ādīnām api ahetu tu antataḥ ca kārya ādeḥ eva hetu tvam iti na ghaṭate kim ca yadi anupalambhasya sādhya pratibandhaḥ na asti tadā apratibaddhopi hetuḥ gamakaḥ iti tridhā eva saḥ iti niyamaḥ na ghaṭate 
PVVṬ_9,8–9,9	 atha pratibandha usti tadā kārya svabhāvayoḥ eva antarbhāvāt tridhā eva sa hetuḥ iti tathā api na yujyate hetvābhāsāḥ tatas aparaḥ iti na yuktam hetu antarasya atyanta parokṣa tvāt na tad abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa ādi niścitaḥ iti ayuktam uktam pakṣa dharmaḥ tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ hetuḥ tridhā eva saḥ avinā abhauva niyamāt hetvābhāsāḥ tatas aparaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_9,10	 atra ucyate yadi api sādhya sādhanayoḥ vyāptiḥ sarva upasaṃhāreṇa pratipannā tathā api na vyāpti grahaṇa mātrāt iha sādhya dharmiṇī dānīm sādhya dharmaḥ iti viśeṣeṇa niścayaḥ bhavati anumānāt tu syāt tasmāt pratipanna viśiṣṭa deśa ādi sambandhi sādhya artha pratipādaka tvena pramāṇam eva anumānantat ca pakṣa dharma tve sati eva bhavati na anyathā yatas na anya deśa ādi sthena sādhya dharmiṇā anya deśa ādi sthaḥ sādhana dharmaḥ sambaddhaḥ atas viśiṣṭa deśa ādi avacchinna sādhana avagati sāmarthyāt eva viśiṣṭa deśa ādi avacchinna sādhya pratītiḥ eva anumānam na tu dhama mātrāt agni mātra pratītiḥ tasyāḥ vyāpti grāhaka pramāṇa phala tvāt na api yatra sādhana dharmaḥ tatra sādhya dharmaḥ iti aviśeṣeṇa avagamepi sādhanasya pakṣa dharma tvam sidhyati sādhya dharmi dharma tayā viśeṣeṇa apratīteḥ sāmānyena abhidhānāt tasmāt viśiṣṭa deśa ādi avacchinna sādhya pratipattaye pakṣa dharma tvan darśanīyam 
PVVṬ_10,1–10,2	 tena yat uktam yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra agniḥ iti anena eva pakṣa dharmasya ukta tvāt pradeśa viśeṣa igni siddhi arthandhūmaḥ ca atra iti na vaktavyam uktā artha tvāt iti tad apāstam nanu evam anumānasyam prāmāṇye apakṣa dharmmam api anumānam pramāṇam syāt apratipanna adhigamāt yathā adhastāt nadī pūrandṛṣṭvā uparivṛṣṭi anumānam tathā śiśuḥ ayam brāhmaṇaḥ mātā pitroḥ brāhmaṇyāt iti tat uktam 
PVVṬ_10,3	 nadī pūra upyadhaḥ deśe dṛṣṭaḥ san= uparisthitām niyamyaḥ gamayati eva vṛttām vṛṣṭim niyāmikām evam pratyakṣa dharma tvam jyeṣṭham hetu aṅgam iṣyate tad pūrva uktāni adharma tva darśanāt vyabhicāryate pitroḥ ca brāhmaṇa tvena putra brāhmaṇa tā numā sarva loka prasiddhāḥ na pakṣa dharmam apekṣate kleśena pakṣa dharma tvam yaḥ tatra api prakalpayet na saṃgaccheta tasya etat lakṣyeṇa saha lakṣaṇam yathā loka prasiddham ca lakṣaṇaiḥ anugamyate lakṣyasya lakṣaṇam evam syāt tat apūrvat na sādhyate iti 
PVVṬ_10,4	 atra ucyate kasmāt upari eva vṛṣṭi anumānam na anyatra pūrasya tad sambandhi tvāt iti ced yadi evam yatoyam nadī pūraḥ āyātaḥ tatra vṛṣṭi anumānat nānyatra vyabhicārāt parasya ca tad sambandhi tva niścaye sati gamaka tvam anyathā anaikāntika tvam syāt tathā śiśuḥ ayam brāhmaṇaḥ mātā pitroḥ brāhmaṇī āditi atrāpi yasya eva śiśoḥ brāhmaṇyam sādhyantasya eva mātā pitṛ brāhmaṇya lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ sambandhī gamakaḥ na mātā pitṛ brāhmaṇya mātram anya sambandhi mātā pitṛ brāhmaṇyasya āgamaka tvāt tena asya api pakṣa dharma tve sati gamaka tvam atas na kleśena pakṣa dharma tva kalpanā yat vā yaḥ eva avyabhicāre nimittam saḥ eva hetuḥ yathā dhūmasya agni kārya tvam brāhmaṇa bhūta mātā pitṛ janya tvam ca śiśoḥ brāhmaṇya nimittam iti tat eva hetuḥ yuktonyasya tad kalpanā kleśena syāt iti tathā na candra udayāt samudra vṛddhi anumānam candra udayāt pūrvam paścāt api tat anumāna prasaṅgāt candra udaya kāle eva tad anumā ananta dā eva vyāpteḥ gṛhīta tvāt iti ced 
PVVṬ_11,1–11,2	 yadi evantad kāla sambandhi tvam eva sādhya sādhanayoḥ tadā ca saḥ eva kālaḥ dharmīm tatra eva ca sādhya anumānam candrodayaḥ ca tad sambandhī iti katham apakṣa dharma tvam atha kālaḥ na iṣyate na tadā tarhi etat anumānam vyabhicārāt atha bau ddhā nāma itat anumānat na asti kāla abhāvāt tat ayuktam pūrvāhṇa ādi pratyaya viṣayasya mahābhūta viśeṣasya kālaḥ iti abhidheyasya abhyupagamāt evam anyatra api pakṣa dharma tvam yojyam 
PVVṬ_11,3–11,5	 nanu bhavatu pakṣa dharma tve satya numānasya prāmāṇyan tathā api pakṣa dharma iti pṛthak lakṣaṇam na kartta vyanta daṅśa vyāpta vacanena eva gata tvāt satyam kintva pakṣa dharmasya api sādhya vyāptasya hetu tva nirāsa artham kṛtam mahānasa ādi dṛṣṭa dhūma ādi ca udadhau= agni anumāne nanu vyāptasya liṅga tvam na ca mahānasa ādi gataḥ dhūmaḥ udadhau sādhyena agninā vyāptaḥ 
PVVṬ_11,6	 satyam kevalam vyāptaḥ hetuḥ iti etāvat mātrakeṇa lakṣaṇa vacanena yatra eva vyāpya dharmaḥ tatra eva vyāpaka dharma anumānam iti etat na labhyate tatas ca anyatra api sādhya anumāna āśaṅkā nivṛtti artham pakṣa dharma vacanam anupalabdheḥ api pakṣa dharma tvam asti eva yadā hi anyasya bhū tala ādeḥ upalambha janana yogya tā eva anya anupalabdhiḥ tadā yogyatā anya bhū tala ādi svabhāvā iti kathanna anupalabdheḥ pakṣa dharma tvam kṛtaka tva ādeḥ api evam śabda ādi dharma tvam puruṣa dharma rūpāyāḥ api anupalabdheḥ anya bhū tala ādi kārya tvam eva paramārthataḥ tad dharma tvantad āyatta tvāt dhūma ādeḥ api kāryasya evam pradeśa ādi dharma tvaṅkevalam vikalpena teṣām sambandhi svarūpam eva pakṣasya ayam dharmaḥ iti vyavasthāpyate 
PVVṬ_11,7^1	 hetu tvam ca dhūma ādeḥ avinā abhāvena vyāptam ajñāta avinābhāvasya āgamaka tvenā hetu tvāt avinābhāvaḥ ca kārya svabhāvābhyām vyāptaḥ vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ ca sādhya tve satyartha antara vidhāne kārya hetoḥ svabhāva hetoḥ pratiṣedhe ca anupalabdheḥ tena hetuḥ tri tvena vyāptaḥ atosau trividhaḥ eva bhavati na tu trividhaḥ hetuḥ eva kārya adeḥ api ajñātasya ahetu tvāt kāraṇa vyāpaka anulabdyoḥ api pratibandhāt eva gamaka tvam tathā hi yatas eva pratibandhāt kārya vyāpye kāraṇa vyāpake gamayataḥ tatas eva pratibandhāt kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhī kārya vyāpya abhāvaṅga mayataḥ 
PVVṬ_11,7^2	 svabhāva anupalabdhau= api yadā ghaṭa ādeḥ upalambha janana yogyaḥ ātmā upalabdhiḥ ucyatenyahetu sākalye ca upalambha avi abhicārāt upalabdhiḥ sattā tadā anayoḥ tādātmyantena atra api pakṣe pratibandha nibandhanam eva gamaka tvam na ca anupalabdheḥ kārya ādi hetau= antarbhāvaḥ sva sādhye pratibandha anapekṣa tvāt hetoḥ ca sakāśāt sādhya pratītiḥ tad āyatta tve sati syāt na ca saṃyoge sati tad āyatta tvam asaṃyuktānām saṃyoga abhāvāt saṃyuktānām api na saṃyogataḥ tat āyat tatā anyatas eva saṃyuktānām utpatteḥ evam samavāya ipi vācyam tasmāt tad āyatta tvantādātmya tad utpattibhya antena kārya svabhāva anupalambha bahirbhūtānām saṃyogi ādīnām ahetu tvantat āyatta tva abhāvena āvinābhāva abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_12,1–12,3	 atha tadāyatta tvam asti tat eva tarhi gamaka tve nimittam iti sa hetuḥ tridhā eva iti siddham nanu tathā api katham anumānasya utthānat nirvikalpaka pratyakṣeṇa dharma dharmi tad sambandha āgrahāt svātantryeṇa vastu dvaya adhigateḥ ucyate sa vikalpakena api dhūma pradeśa ādīnām dharma dharmi bhāva grahaṇam upari uparibhāva pratibhāsaḥ eva sa ca nirvikalpakepī asti kevalam vikalpetarayoḥ jñānayoḥ ullekhā nullekha kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat ca nirvikalpakam jñānam yathā gṛhīta viṣayam eva idam iha asti idam na asti iti vidhi pratiṣedham janayat pramāṇam iṣyate tena dharma dharmiṇoḥ svarūpa niścayaḥ sambandha niścaya pratyakṣa kṛtaḥ eva bhavati iti 
PVVṬ_12,4–12,5	 pakṣa dharmaḥ iti uktam sūtre pakṣa dharmaḥ ca dharma dharmi samudāyaḥ na ca prativādinam prati samudāya dharma tvam hetoḥ siddhantena sa sarvaḥ hetuḥ asiddhaḥ syāt siddhau vā anumānasya vaiyarthyam iti āha pakṣaḥ dharmī iti avayave samudāya upacārāt eka deśa tvam ca samudāya upacāra nimittantena na dṛṣṭānta dharmī pakṣaḥ ucyate 
PVVṬ_12,6	 ī śva ra se naḥ prāha dharmidha rmmaḥ hetuḥ iti etāvat vaktavyam prayojana abhāvāt anupacāraḥ iti tat āha prayojana ityādi na ityādinā pratiṣedhati na prayojanasya abhāvaḥ katham sarva dharmi dharma pratiṣedha artha tvāt upacārasya iti apekṣyate asati upacāre dharmi dharmaḥ iti nirdeśaḥ kāryaḥ tathā ca dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇā api dharmaḥ hetuḥ syāt upacāre tu sarvasya dharmiṇaḥ dharmaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ bhavati katha miti ced āha tad eka deśa tva ādi tathā hi samudāyasya avayaveṣu upacāraḥ tad eka deśa tvaṃnibandhana tvena na sarvatra upacāraḥ sādhya dharmī ca tad eka deśa tvāt pakṣasya avayava tvāt pakṣa upacāra yogyaḥ tasya yaḥ dharmaḥ tad pratipatti artham upacāra karaṇam tathā ca iti upacāra yogya dharmi pratipattau cākṣuṣa tva ādi parihāraḥ ādi śabdāt kākasya kārṣṇyāt ityādi cakṣuḥ vijñāna viṣaya tvāt iti hetu arthaḥ tadā ayam hetuḥ anaikāntika tvāt tad aṅśa vyāpti vacanena eva nirastaḥ iti kim upacāreṇa atha cakṣuḥ vijñāna janaka tvāt iti hetu arthaḥ tadā api tad janaka tvam sattvam eva tat ca śabdepi asti iti na dṛṣṭānta dharmi dharmaḥ eva ayam iti kaścid 
PVVṬ_13,1–13,2	 tat ayuktam cakṣuḥ vijñāna janaka tvam hi sattva viśeṣaḥ sa ca ghaṭa ādīnām eva dharmaḥ na śabdasya atas tad nivṛti artham upacāra karaṇam na tu asati api upacāre vyāptasya liṃga tvam na ca śabda anityat tvena cākṣuṣa tvam vyāptan tat katham asya liṅga tvam na eṣa doṣaḥ anitya tva mātreṇa hi asya vyāpta tvantat ca śabdepi asti iti katham ahetu tvam syāt 
PVVṬ_13,3	 dharma vacanena ityādi dharmaḥ tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ iti kevalena dharma vacanena api dharmi paratantra tvāt dharmasya avaśyam asau dharmiṇam ākṣipati tena dharmiṇaḥ āśrayaṇam āśrayaḥ parigrahaḥ tasya siddhau satyām yat etat dharmidharma iti atra dharmi grahaṇantasya sāmarthyāt pratyāsattiḥ iha vivakṣitā iti gamyate vyāpti vivakṣāyām dharmi grahaṇam anarthakam syāt tasmāt dharmi vacana sāmarthyāt pratyāsattiḥ siddhāḥ pratyāsattiḥ ca sādhya dharmiṇaḥ eva tatra prathamam hetu upadarśanāt tayā pratyāsattyā sādhya dharmi parigrahaḥ bhaviṣyati na pratyāsatteḥ sādhya dharmi parigrahaḥ kutos dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇopi na kevalam sādhya dharmiṇaḥ pratyāsatteḥ kadācid vyāpti darśana pūrvake prayoge dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇopi prathamam hetu sadbhāva upadarśanāt 
PVVṬ_13,4	 yadi na pratyāsatteḥ sādhya dharmi siddhiḥ pāriśeṣyāt tarhi bhaviṣyati yatas tad aṃśa vyāptyā hetu bhūtayā dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi dharmasya sattva siddhiḥ na hi dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa hetoḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pradarśayitum śakyate iti manyate tatas dharmi grahaṇāt vyatiricyamānāt sādhya dharmiṇaḥ eva parigrahaḥ tad aṃśena iti ca tad śabdena dharma vacana ākṣiptaḥ dharmī sambadhyate iti tad sambandhana artham api dharmi grahaṇam na aśaṅkanīyam 
PVVṬ_13,5	 yatra prayojana anantaram na sambhavati sa pāriśeṣyasya viṣayaḥ dharmi vacanasya tu anyat api prayojanam sambhāvyate iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādi āha siddhe tad aṅśa vyāptyā dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi sattve punar ddharmiṇaḥ vacanan dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇaḥ eva yaḥ dharmaḥ sa hetuḥ iti niyama artham āśaṃkyate tatas ca cākṣuṣa tva ādayaḥ eva hetavaḥ syuḥ na kṛtaka tva ādayaḥ iti aniṣṭam eva syāt tasmāt upacāraḥ karttavyaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_14,1	 kim punar kvacid te rkkaḥ śā stre dṛṣṭam niyama arthamvacanam iti atas āha sajātīyaḥ eva ityādi tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā ca āsan= tad atyaye sa hetuḥ iti atrā cā ryī ye hetu lakṣaṇe sajātīyaḥ eva sattvam iti avadhāraṇena siddhepi vijātīyāt vipakṣāt hetoḥ vyatireke yat etat asan= tad atyayaḥ iti sādhya abhāve asattva vacanam tat niyama arthamā cā rye ṇa vyākhyātam asati eva na astitāḥ yathā syāt na anyatra na viruddhaḥ iti tathā iha api dharmi vacanambhāva niyama artham āśaṃkyate 
PVVṬ_14,2	 nanu apakṣa dharmasya ahetutvāt na niyama arthā śaṅkā yatas vyāptasya hetu tvam na ca anya dharmi sthena sādhya dharmeṇa anya dharmi sthaḥ sādhana dharmaḥ vyāptaḥ tasmāt tad aṃśa vyāpta hetu vacana sāmarthyāt eva sādhya dharmi parigrahaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha sāmarthyāt ityādi anantara uditāt sāmarthyāt arthasya sādhya dharmi parigraha lakṣaṇasya bhavati pratītiḥ paṭu dhiyām śrotṝṇām kintva śabdakam artham svayam anusara tām pratipatti gauravam syāt atas upacāra mātrāt svayam aśabdaka artha abhyūha rahitāt dharmi dharmaḥ iti anena pakṣa dharmaḥ iti samāna nirdeśāt pratipatti gauravam ca parihṛtam bhavati ca śabdena etat āha ye para upadeśam ākāṃkṣanti taiḥ ayam arthaḥ lakṣaṇa vacanāt boddhavyaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_14,3	 yathālakṣaṇam pratīteḥ apakṣa dharmaḥ na hetuḥ iti kutas iyam āśaṅkā tatas teṣām lakṣaṇa anusāriṇām niyama āśaṃkā parihāra arthañcā upacāra karaṇam iti iha vyavaccheda phala tvāt śabda prayogasya avaśyam eva avadhārayitavyam ṣaṣṭhī samāsāt ca pakṣa dharmaḥ iti na anyassamāsa ssambhavati tathā ca pakṣasya eva dharmmaḥ iti evam avadhāraṇāt tad aṃśa vyāptiḥ virudhyate iti viruddha lakṣaṇa tām udbhāvayan= āha 
PVVṬ_14,4	 pakṣasya dharma tve tampakṣam viśeṣaṇam anyatas vyavacchedam apekṣate iti tad viśeṣaṇa apekṣasya dharmasya anyatra pakṣīkṛtāt anyasmin sa pakṣe ananuvṛttiḥ tathā hi yaḥ pakṣeṇa viśeṣyate sa pakṣasya eva bhavati yathā devadattasya putraḥ tatas nyatra ananuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇa tā sādhāraṇa tā na syāt tad aṅśa vyāpti virodhaḥ iti yāvat sādhāraṇa tayā tad aṃśa vyāpti pratipādanāt tatas yadi pakṣa dharmaḥ na tad aṃśa vyāptiḥ atha tad aṃśa vyāptiḥ na pakṣa dharmaḥ iti vyāhatam lakṣaṇam iti 
PVVṬ_15,1	 nanu yadi sādhya dharmiṇi sādhana dharmasya sādhya vyāptiḥ na gṛhītā tadā hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam atha gṛhītā kim dṛṣṭānte hetoḥ ranvayena kathañca pakṣa dharmasya tad aṃśa vyāptiḥ virudhyate sādhya dharmiṇī api vyāpteḥ pratipanna tvāt sarva padārthasya kṣaṇika tve sādhye sattva lakṣaṇasya vā hetoḥ kaḥ dṛṣṭāntenu ayaḥ tasmāt sva sādhya pratibandhāt hetuḥ tena vyāptaḥ sidhyati sa ca viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā sādhya dharmiṇī api sidhyati iti na kiṃcid anyatra anvaya apekṣayā tat katham idam āśaṃkitam anyatra ānana vṛtteḥ asādhāraṇa tā iti 
PVVṬ_15,2–15,3	 sattyam yadi api sādhya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sādhya vyāptim antareṇa na anumānasya utthānantathā api dṛṣṭānte sādhya sādhanayoḥ pratibandha grāhaka pramāṇam antareṇa na sādhya dharmmiṇī api vyāptiḥ sidhyati iti tad artham idam āśaṃkitam yat tu ucyate kārya hetu apekṣayā svabhāva hetu viśeṣa apekṣayā etat āśaṃkitam tatu kṣaṇikatva anumāne sattva apekṣayā tasya hi vipakṣa bādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā eva gamakatvā diti tat etat uttaratra nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt pūrva gṛhīta pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa smṛtaye hetoḥ anyatra vṛttiḥ apekṣaṇīyāḥ 
PVVṬ_15,4	 etat pariharati na ityādinā na anyatra ananuvṛttiḥ kutas ayogaḥ sambandhaḥ tad vyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāt pakṣasya na hi anya yoga vyavacchedena eva viśeṣaṇam bhavati kintu a yoga vyavacchedena api yatra dharmiṇi dharmasya sadbhāvaḥ sandihyate tatra ayoga vyavacchedasya nyāya prāpta tvāt atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ iti caitre hi dhanurdhara tvam sandihyate kim asti na asti iti tatas caitraḥ dhanurddharaḥ iti ukte pakṣa antaram adhanurddhara tvam śrotuḥ ā kāṃkṣa upasthāpitam nirākaroti ayoga vyavacchedotra nyāya prāptaḥ 
PVVṬ_15,5	 para abhimata vyavacchedam nirācikīrṣan= āha na anya yoga vyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāt anyatra ananuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇa tā iti sambandhaḥ atra api dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathāpārthaḥ dhanurddharaḥ iti sāmānya śabda upyayam dhanurddhara śabdaḥ prakaraṇa sāmarthya ādinā prakṛṣṭa guṇa vṛttiḥ iha pā rthe hi dhanurddhara tvam siddham eva iti na ayoga āśaṅkā tādṛśantu sa atiśayam kim anyatra api asti na asti iti anya yoga śaṃkāyām śrotuḥ yadā pārthaḥ dhanurddharaḥ iti ucyate tadā sa atiśayaḥ pārthaḥ eva dhanurddharaḥ na anyaḥ iti pratīyate tena atra anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ nyāya prāptaḥ tathā kim pakṣa istyayam dharmaḥ na vā iti saṃśaye pakṣa dharmaḥ iti ukte pakṣasya dharmaḥ eva na adharmaḥ dharmaḥ ca āśrita tvāt viśeṣaṇantena ayogaḥ vyavacchidyate na anya yogaḥ tad aṃśa vyāptyā anya yogasya pratipādanena dṛṣṭānte sandeha abhāvāt ākṣepsyāmaḥ iti nirdekṣyāmaḥ caturthe paricchede 
PVVṬ_16,1–16,2	 tad aṃśaḥ tad dharmaḥ iti tad śabdena pakṣaḥ parāmṛśyate na dharmaḥ dharmasya dharma asambhavāt tasya pakṣasya aṃśaḥ tasya eva sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ eka deśe rūḍha uṅśa śabdaḥ katham dharmam pratipādayati iti ced āha vaktuḥ abhiprāya vaśāt iti na vastu balena śabdānām vācaka tvam kintu vaktuḥ vivakṣā vaśāt na tat eka deśaḥ tad aṃśaḥ iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ kim punar evam iti ced āha pakṣa śabdena samudāyā vacanāt iti yadi pakṣa śabdena samudāya ubhihitaḥ syāt tadā dharma dharmi samudāya ātmakasya pakṣasya eka deśaḥ dharma ātmakoṅśaḥ bhavati upacaritena tu pakṣa śabdena dharmī ā iva abhidhīyate tasya ca eka ātmakasya kutas eka deśaḥ 
PVVṬ_16,3^1	 vyāptam padam vyāptiḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe tasya pakṣa dharmasya sataḥ vyāptiḥ yom vyāpnoti yaḥ ca vyāpyate vyāpya vyāpaka dharma tayā pratīteḥ yadā vyāpaka dharma tayā vivakṣyate tadā vyāpakasya gamyasya bhāvaḥ eva iti sambandhaḥ tatra iti saptamī artha pradhānam etat na ādhāra artha pradhānam dharmāṇām dharma antara tva abhāvāt tena ayam arthaḥ yatra dharmiṇi vyāpyam asti tatra sarvatra vyāpakasya bhāvaḥ eva iti vyāpaka dharmaḥ vyāptiḥ na tu evam avadhāryate vyāpakasya eva tatra bhāvaḥ iti hetu abhāva prasaṃgāt avyāpakasya api mūrtta tva ādeḥ tatra bhāvāt na api tatra eva iti avadhāryate 
PVVṬ_16,3^2	 prayatna anantarīyaka tva ādeḥ ahetu tva āpatteḥ sādhāraṇaḥ ca hetuḥ syāt nitya tvasya prameyeṣu eva bhāvāt yadā tu vyāpya dharmatā vyāpteḥ vivakṣitā tadā yatra dharmiṇi vyāpakosti tatra eva vyāpyasya bhāva ūnā anyatra atra api vyāpyasya eva tatra bhāvaḥ iti avadhāraṇam hetvabhāva prasakteḥ eva na āśritam avyāpyasya api tatra bhāvāt na api vyāpyasya tatra bhāvaḥ eva iti avadhāryate sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ ahetu tva prāpteḥ sādhāraṇasya ca hetu tvam syāt prameya tvasya nityeṣu avaśyambhāvāt iti vyāpakasya tatra bhāvaḥ iti anena ca anvayaḥ ākṣiptaḥ vyāpyasya vā tatra eva bhāvaḥ iti anena vyatirekaḥ ākṣiptaḥ 
PVVṬ_17,1–17,3	 yat vā vyāpteḥ vyāpya vyāpaka dharmma samvarṇṇanam niyata aniyata tva khyāpana artham tena vyāptaḥ hetuḥ bhavati na tu vyāpakaḥ aniyata tvāt nanu yaḥ dharmaḥ vyāpyam antareṇa bhavati sa katham vyāpakaḥ vyāpya asambandhena avyāpaka tvāt satyam kevalan dharmayoḥ sāmānyena vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ niścīyate yat ca anitya tva sāmānyam prayatna ānantarīyaka tva vyāpakam niścitanta da prayatna ānantarīyakepi dṛśyate iti vyāpakaḥ aniyataḥ ucyate atha prayatna ānantarīyaka svabhāvam eva anitya tvam niścetum pāryate tadā anayoḥ parasparam vyāpya tvam iti vyāptaḥ eva hetuḥ bhavati yadā ca yatra vipratipattiḥ tat eva sādhyam itarat sādhanam iti nyāyaḥ eṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_17,4–17,5	 yadi tarhi pakṣa dharmaḥ tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ iti etāvat hetu lakṣaṇam tatas pakṣa dharma tvanta daṅśa vyāptiḥ ca iti dvi rūpaḥ hetuḥ syāt anyatra ca tri rūpaḥ uktaḥ tat kathat na vyāghātaḥ iti āha etena tad aṃśa vyāpti vacanena anvaya vyatirekau= uktau anvaya vyatireka rūpa tvāt vyāpteḥ iti bhāvaḥ tathā hi yaḥ eva yena anvitaḥ yat nivṛttau ca nivarttate saḥ eva tena vyāptaḥ ucyate iti tad ātmaka tvāt vyāpteḥ vyāpti vacanena anvaya vyatireka abhidhā anantataḥ vyāpti vacanena rūpa dvaya abhidhānāt na vyāghātaḥ iti tau ca jñāpaka hetu adhikārāt niścitau niścayaḥ ca tayoḥ na ekena iva pramāṇena api tuyathāsvam yasya yat ā ātmīyam pramāṇam niścāya kantena yasya ca yat pramāṇantad uttaratra vakṣyate 
PVVṬ_17,6	 nanu bhāva rūpa tvān liṅgasya katham vyatirekaḥ sādhya abhāve abhāva lakṣaṇosya rūpam iti ced na yaḥ eva hi sādhyaḥ eva liṅgasya bhāvaḥ saḥ eva sādhya abhāve vyatirekaḥ tena anvaya vyatireka yoḥ api tādātmyam vikalpa kalpitaḥ tu bhedaḥ sādhya abhāve liṃgasya nirvṛtti dharmaka tvam vyatirekaḥ iti apare yatas ca yatra yatra sādhana dharmmaḥ tatra tatra sādhya dharmaḥ iti evam rūpaḥ nvayaḥ tena yat ucyate ku mā ri la bha ṭṭe na 
PVVṬ_18,1–18,3	 yaḥ savitrudayaḥ bhāvī na tena ādya udayonvitaḥ atha ca adya udayāt sā upi bhavitā śvonumīyate vyomni dṛṣṭam ca dhūma agram bhūmau bahniḥ pratīyate dhūma agram agneḥ anveti na ca bhūmau pratiṣṭhitaḥ evan na deśa kālābhyām liṅgam liṅgī anugacchati tasmāt na asya anvayaḥ nāma sambandha uṅśaḥ pratīyate iti tad apāstam yatas ca yathā upavarṇṇitaḥ sādhya anvayaḥ hetuḥ vidyate tena etat api pratyuktam pratyākhyeya evam eva iha vyāpti sambandha kalpanā yaḥ hi na anvīyate yena sa tena vyāpyate kutas iti 
PVVṬ_18,4	 atas eva īdṛśīmpara parikalpitām vyāptim nirākarttumā cā ryaḥ vyāpakasyatatra bhāvaḥ ityādinā laukikī vyāptindarśitavān sambandha grāhakam pramāṇam liṅgasya sādhyāyat tatā grāhakam yat ca tadāyatta tām gṛhṇāti tat eva anvaya vyatireka ātmikāyāḥ vyāpteḥ grāhakam sa adhyāyat ta tāyāḥ eva vyāpti rūpa tvāt tasmāt vyāpti grāhakāt eva pramāṇāt yatra vyāpya sambhavaḥ tatra vyāpaka bhāvaḥ yatra vyāpaka abhāvaḥ tatra vyāpya abhāvaḥ itya bhāvepi niścayaḥ bhavati tena yat ucyate kumārila bha ṭṭena 
PVVṬ_18,5	 sāmānya viṣaya tvāt ca na pratyakṣenvayam bhavet na ca anumīyate pūrvam avijñāta anvaya antarāt atha anvayenumānam syāt anvaya antara varjjitam siddhe tad anapekṣesmin= anyatra api anvayena kim vyatirekopi liṅgasya vipakṣān na eva labhyate abhāve sa na gamyeta kṛta yatnaiḥ abodhanāt yāvat sarva vipakṣāṇām paryantaḥ na avadhāritaḥ tāvat hetoḥ avṛtti tvam kaḥ tasmāt jñātum arhati iti 
PVVṬ_18,6–19,2	 tat api apāstam pakṣa dharmaḥ ca kim yathāsvam pramāṇena niścitaḥ uktaḥ veditavyaḥ iti sambandhaḥ pakṣa dharmma vacanena eva evam ca trairūpyam eva uktam liṃgasya iti avirodhaḥ tena yat ucyate avi ddha kaḥ rṇṇena satyam anumānam iṣyate eva asmābhiḥ pramāṇam loka pratīta tvāt kevalam liṃga lakṣaṇam ayukta miti tad apāstam trairūpyasya api liṅga lakṣaṇasya loka pratīta tvāt dhūma ādau= iva 
PVVṬ_19,3–19,6	 nanu katham yathāsvam pramā ṇena pakṣa dharma niścayaḥ sāmānyasya liṅga tvāt tasya ca pratyakṣeṇa sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvena agrahaṇāt agṛhītasya ca āliṃga tvāt gṛhītasya ca sva lakṣaṇasya ananvayena āliṃga tvāt na api anumānena sāmānya graha ṇantat liṅgasya api sāmānya rūpa tvena pratyakṣeṇa agrahaṇāt anumānena grahaṇe anavasthā prasaṅgāt tat āha liṅga liṅgī anumānānām ānantyāt eka liṅgini gatiḥ yuga sahasrepu bahuṣu api na vidyate iti atha kārya svabhāva vikalpa pratibhāsi sāmānyam kārya ādi darśana āśraya tayā tad adhyavasāyāt ca kārya ādi hetuḥ iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_19,7	 tat ayuktam tasya api vikalpa avyatirikta tvāt vikalpa vat anyatra vikalpa antare ananugamāt katham sāmānyam liṃgam tasmāt vijātīya vyāvṛttam eva dhūma āde rūpam jñāpaka hetu adhikārāt pratyakṣa niścitam viśeṣa anavadhāraṇena sāmānya lakṣaṇam liṃgam ucyate na tu vijātīya vyāvṛttiḥ vikalpa ākāraḥ vā avastu tvāt tena ayam arthaḥ pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvinā niścayena adhūma vyāvṛtta rūpa avadhāraṇena dhūma ādi sva lakṣaṇam idam pratibhāsamānam kadācid tārṇṇampārṇṇam anyat vā iti viśeṣān avadhāraṇena ca aneka sva lakṣaṇa rūpam sāmānya lakṣaṇam liṅgam pratyakṣa viṣaye vyavasthāpyate yathā ca liṅgasya viśeṣān avadhāraṇena sāmānya rūpa tvan tathā sādhyasya api tat āha 
PVVṬ_19,8–20,2	 atad rūpa parāvṛtta vastu mātra prasādhanāt sāmānya viṣayam proktam liṅgam bheda apratiṣṭhiteḥ iti tathābhūtasya ca sāmānya lakṣaṇasya liṅgasya sādhya kārya tvam sādhya svabhāva tvam ca vastu tvāt aviruddham tat ca liṅgam pratyakṣa ādi niścitam iti sarvam sustham te ete ityādinā tridhā eva saḥ iti etat vyācaṣṭe te ete iti pakṣa dharma tvena yathā uktayā ca vyāptyā yuktāḥ kārya svabhāva anupalabdhayaḥ lakṣaṇam svabhāvaḥ yeṣa ante tathā uktāḥ dhūmāt iti kārya hetoḥ ākhyānam agniḥ atra iti sādhya phalasya na tu ayampakṣa prayogaḥ nanu yaḥ pradeśa ugni sambandhī sa upratyakṣaḥ yaḥ ca pratyakṣaḥ nabhaḥ bhāga rūpaḥ āloka ādi ātmā dhūmavat tayā dṛśyamānaḥ na sa ugnimānataḥ katham pradeśe dhūmasya pratyakṣataḥ siddhiḥ tasmāt dhūmaḥ eva dharmī yuktaḥ 
PVVṬ_20,3	 sa agniḥ ayam dhūmaḥ dhūma tvāt iti evam sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ ityu dyaḥ te kaḥ raḥ tasya api sa agneḥ dhūma avayavasya apratyakṣa tvāt paridṛśyamānasya ca ūrddhva bhāga vartinā ugninā saha āvṛtteḥ katham dhūma sāmānyasya sādhya dharmiṇi pratyakṣataḥ niścayaḥ dhūma avayavī pratyakṣaḥ iti ced na avayava vyatirekeṇa tasya abhāvātas loka adhyavasāyaḥ tasya ekatve vā pradeśasya api tāvataḥ kalpitam eka ātmaka tvam na vāryate pradeśaḥ eva ca loka ugnim pratipadyate na dhūme dharmiṇi tena yadi agneḥ anumānam iṣyate pradeśaḥ eva dharmiṇī anumānam astu iti evamparam etat 
PVVṬ_20,4	 na tu atra pūrva uktaḥ doṣa parihāraḥ iti eke yat vā dṛśyamānaḥ pradeśaḥ dharmī adhastāt agnimān ityetāvat sādhya dharmaḥ na agni mātram īdṛgvidhena ca sādhya dharmeṇa pūrvam eva vyāptiḥ pratipannāḥ dhūmaḥ ca atra pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti katham na anumānam yatu deśa ādi apekṣayā kārya hetoḥ gamaka tvam atra ucyate tad asaṅgatam eva deśa ādeḥ viśeṣaṇasya asiddha tvāt dhūma mātra darśanāt eva asya sādhyasya siddha tvāt ca yat vā pradeśe agnim dṛṣṭvā kiṃśuka ādi rūpeṇa sandeham yadā dhūma darśanāt nivarttayati tadā etat udāharaṇam draṣṭavyam tadā hi pratyakṣeṇa dharmī sādhana dharmaḥ ca siddhaḥ bhavati 
PVVṬ_20,5–20,6	 yat tu ucyate pratyakṣa apratyakṣa rūpaḥ eva dharmiṇi anumānam iti tat ayuktam pratyakṣa aṅśe yadi api hetuḥ siddhaḥ tathā api na tatra sādhya dharma anumānam pratyakṣa bādhita tvāt parokṣa aṅśe tu syāt anumānam kevalantatra hetuḥ asiddhaḥ na ca pratyakṣam pratyakṣa rūpasya dhaṃrmiṇaḥ dharmaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ apratyakṣeṅśe pratyakṣa avyāpārāt yadā vā śravaṇa grāhye śabde anitya tva anumā ananta dā katham dharmiṇaḥ pratyakṣa apratyakṣa rūpa tā iti yat kiñcid etat śiṅśapā tvāt iti svabhāva hetoḥ udāharaṇam 
PVVṬ_21,1	 u mve kaḥ stu atra āha svabhāva hetoḥ gamaka tvam dūra utsāritam eva bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt gamya gamaka bhāvasya na hi abhinne pratibandhaḥ nāma na śiṅśapā vṛkṣa ātmikā tatas vyāvarttamāna tvāt yaḥ hi yasmāt vyāvarttate na sa tad ātmā ghaṭāt iva paṭaḥ vyāvarttate ca khadira ādibhyaḥ śiśaṃpeti a tad ātmikā tad ātma tve ca liṅga grahaṇa velāyām eva avyatirekāt sādhya svarūpa vat liṅga agrahaṇavat tvam sādhyasya gṛhīta tvāt anumeya tva hāniḥ tādātmyena ca śiṃśapā tu asya gamaka tve tādātmya aviśeṣāt vṛkṣa tvasya śiṃśapām prati gamaka tva prasaṅgaḥ atha āsya aniyata tvāt agamaka tvam niyata tā eva tarhi gamaka tve nimittam na tu tādātmyam vyabhicāriṇī api vṛkṣa tve tādātmyasya darśanāt atha tad ātmanā eva vṛkṣe na asti śiṃśapā tad ātmikāḥ sarvathā yayoḥ eva tayā gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ na anātmye tu tādātmya abhāvaḥ evam aśiṃśapā avṛkṣa apohayoḥ apoha buddhyoḥ vā gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ nirākartta vyaiti 
PVVṬ_21,2	 tat ayuktam śiṃśapā hi vṛkṣa viśeṣa svabhāvāḥ vṛkṣa viśeṣa upi śiṃśapā svabhāvaḥ eva iti ubhaya gatantādātmyam tādātmyepi ca kaścid avṛkṣa vyāvṛtte svabhāve kathaṃcid mūḍhaḥ na aśiṃśa pā vyāvṛtte tena śiṃśapā ādeḥ liṅgasya grahaṇa at na anumeya tva hāniḥ yatas ca na vṛkṣa mātra svabhāvā śiṃśapā tena na vṛkṣa tvasya śiṃśapām prati gamaka tvam sādhya sādhana ādi abhāva doṣantu svayam eva śāstra kāraḥ nirākariṣyati iti yat kiñcid etat 
PVVṬ_21,3	 pradeśaḥ iti anupalabdheḥ kathanam pradeśa viśeṣaḥ iti uddiṣṭe deśe kvacid iti vādi prativādi prasiddhe na ghaṭaḥ iti ghaṭa abhāva vyavahāraḥ sādhyaḥ upalabdhi ityādinā hetu nirdeśaḥ upalabdheḥ lakṣaṇāni karaṇāni cakṣuḥ ādīni apratibaddha sāmarthya ādi upalabdhi lakṣaṇāni tāni prāptaḥ su a ābhāsa jñāna janana yogyaḥ svabhāva viśeṣaḥ sva jñāna janana sāmagrī antarbhūta urthaḥ iti arthaḥ tasya anupalabdheḥ tathābhūtasya asat vyavahāra siddhiḥ 
PVVṬ_21,4–22,1	 katham punar yaḥ yatra na asti sa tatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ bhavati upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvam hi jñān a viṣaya tvantasmin= ca sati kutas nāstitvam ucyate yāvatyām sāmagryām satyām pūrvam pratipannaḥ bhāvaḥ tāvatyām eva sāmagryām satyām yadi syāt pūrva kāla vat upalabhyeta iti evam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvam buddhyā parāmṛśya bhāvasya apratibhāsanāt na asti iti niṣedhaḥ kriyate na tu adṛśyasya pratibhāsa parāmarśa upāya abhāvāt sarvadā apratipanna tvāt nanu dṛśyasya abhāve sati sā eva sāmagrī katham pratipannā iti ced na eka jñāna viṣayayoḥ bhāvayoḥ eka upalambhāt iti brūmaḥ svatas eva ca niṣidhyamānasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvad niścīyate etat eva eka jñāna janana yogya tayā upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvandarśayitum āha 
PVVṬ_22,2	 yadi syāt ghaṭa ādiḥ upalabhyam sattvam yasya sa tathābhūtaḥ eva syāt na anyathā iti na kadācid agrāhyaḥ tathābhūtaḥ avaśyam jñānan na vyabhicarati iti yāvat yatas evantena kāraṇena upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya iti yat viśeṣaṇam uktantad arthāt upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta sattvasya iti uktam bhavati atra tu ayam bāhya arthaḥ lakṣyate anena iti lakṣaṇam upalabdhiḥ eva lakṣaṇan tad prāptam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam jñānena avyabhicarita sambandham iti arthaḥ evaṃbhūtam sattvam yasya tat tathā uktam tathābhūtam hi sattvam jñānam nivṛttya avaśyam nivarttate iti bhāvaḥ vidhi pratiṣedhābhyām sarvam sādhanam vyāptam vidhīyamānaḥ ca sādhyaḥ pratibandha dvayena bhidyate iti vidhi pratiṣedhau hetu traya āyattau= iti darśayan= āha tatra ityādi 
PVVṬ_22,3–22,5	 tatra triṣu hetuṣu dvau kārya svabhāva hetū vastu sādhanau vidhi sādhanau dvau= eva iti ca avadhāraṇam na tu vastu sādhanau= eva iti ābhyām sāmarthyāt vyavacchedasya api siddheḥ ekaḥ pratiṣedha hetuḥ iti ukta lakṣaṇa unupalambhaḥ pratiṣedha hetuḥ eva na tu ekaḥ eva iti avadhāryate pūrvvābhyām api vyavaccheda gateḥ kaścid āha vyavacchedaḥ śabda liṅgābhyām prasādhyate yāvān= cit vyavacchedaḥ sa sarva unupalambhāt eva iti anupalambhaḥ eva ekaḥ heturi ti tat ayuktam yatas na tāvat pramāṇa vyāpāra apekṣayā etat ucyate vastuni eva pramāṇa vyāpārāt tadā ahātaḥ eva vastu viṣayam prāmāṇyam dvayoḥ iti na api adhyavasāya vaśāt etat ucyate vastunaḥ eva adhyavasāyāt vyavacchedena saha liṃgasya sambandha abhāvāt ca 
PVVṬ_23,1–23,2	 yaḥ pi manyate anupalambhe asat vyavahāra yogya tā sādhyate na pratiṣedhaḥ yogya tā ca svabhāva bhūtā eva tathā agnimati pradeśe sādhye agni mattā pradeśasya svabhāvaḥ eva sādhyaḥ dhūmavat tvāt iti ca hetuḥ pradeśa abhinnaḥ iti sarvaḥ hetuḥ svabhāva hetuḥ eva iti tat ayuktam evam hi gamakattve gardabha tva ādeḥ api gamaka tvam syāt na bhavati agni kārya tva abhāvāt gardabhasya iti ced yadi evam dhūmasya agni kārya tvam eva gamaka tve nibandhanam iti katham na kārya hetuḥ anyaḥ tu manyate anupalambhaḥ tu pradeśa kāryaḥ iti asat vyavahāre sādhye kārya hetuḥ eva kṛtaka vikalpaḥ ca anitya śabda kāryaḥ iti sarve eva hetuḥ kārya hetuḥ iti 
PVVṬ_23,3	 tat api ayuktam kṛtaka vikalpaḥ hi kṛtaka kāraṇa tvāt tasya eva anumāpakaḥ syāt na anityasya kṛtakasya anitya svabhāva tvāt anitya tvam sādhayati iti ced yadi evam kṛtaka tvāt eva anitya tva pratītiḥ syāt na kṛtaka vikalpāt kṛtaka svabhāva tayā eva anitya tve gamaka tvāt yat vā kṛtaka vikalpaḥ ca syāt na vā anityaḥ iti anaikāntaḥ kṛtaka vikalpa janana sāmarthyam kṛtaka avyatiriktantat ca na pūrvat na paścāttena asau= anityaḥ a vyatiriktantarhi sāmarthyam anitya tvam sādhayati iti katham na svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ iti yat kiñcid etat 
PVVṬ_23,4–23,5	 kim punar dvau= eva vastu sādhanau= iti āha svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ sādhanam kṛte ti samāsaḥ svabhāvena pratibaddha tvam pratibaddha svabhāvam iti yāvat tasmin satyarthaḥ liṃgam artham iti liṅginam na vyabhicarati sa ca svabhāva pratibandhaḥ kutas iti āha tad ātma tvāt iti sādhya svabhāva tvāt tad ātma tve sādhya svabhāva ātma tve sādhanasya yat eva sādhyantadeva sādhanam iti sādhya sādhanayoḥ bheda abhāvaḥ tena pratijñā artha eka deśaḥ hetuḥ iti parama āśaṅkya āha na ityādi sādhya sādhana bhūtānām dharma bhedānām vyāvṛtti bhedena parikalpanāda āropāt 
PVVṬ_23,6–24,1	 etat uktam bhavati dharma bhedaḥ samāropyate tena sādhya sādhana bhedaḥ yatas niścitaḥ gamakaḥ niścetavyaḥ ca gamyaḥ ucyate niścaya viṣayaḥ ca āropitaḥ eva iti niścaya bheda āropitaḥ dharma bhedaḥ etat ca vakṣyāmaḥ anya apoha prastāve ācārya di gnāḥ ge na api etat uktam iti āha tathā ca ityādi sarve eva iti yatra api sādhya sādhanayoḥ agni dhūmayoḥ vāstavaḥ bhedaḥ tatra api sva lakṣaṇena vyavahāra ayogāt anumīyatenena iti anumānaṃliṅgam anumeyaḥ sādhya dharmī sādhya dharmaḥ ca teṣām vyavahāraḥ nānātu a pratirūpaḥ buddhi ārūḍhena dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedaḥ tena buddhi pratibhāsa gatena bhinnena rūpeṇa bheda vyavahāraḥ iti yāvat yadi tarhi buddhi parikalpitaḥ dharma dharmi vyavahāraḥ evantarhi kalpitāt hetoḥ sādhya siddhiḥ prāptā tatas ca hetu doṣaḥ yāvān ucyate sa sarvaḥ syāt tat āha bha ṭṭaḥ 
PVVṬ_24,2–24,3	 yadi vā vidyamānopi bhedaḥ buddhi prakalpitaḥ sādhya sādhana dharma ādeḥ vyavahārāya kalpyate tatas bhavat prayuktā ismin sādhanam yāvat ucyate sarvatra utpadyate buddhiḥ iti dūṣaṇa tā bhavet iti atra āha bhedaḥ ityādi etat āha arthaḥ eva vā artham gamayati kevalam dharma dharmitayā ayam dharmaḥ ayam dharmī iti yaḥ bhedaḥ nānā tva mayam eva buddhi ākāra kṛtaḥ buddhyā parikalpitaḥ na artha upi na liṅgam api buddhayā ākāra kṛtam vikalpa nirmitāt eva liṅgāt kasmāt artha pratipattiḥ na bhavati iti āha vikalpa ityādi vikalpa bhedānām vikalpa viśeṣāṇām icchā mātra anurodhi tvena sva tantrāṇām anartha āśrayāt artha apratibaddha tvesākṣāt anutpatteḥ na artha ālambana tvāt iti arthaḥ taiḥ arthī na āśrayaiḥ vikalpaiḥ kalpitaḥ ca asau viṣayaḥ ca iti tad kalpita viṣayaḥ tasmāt evaṃbhūtāt hetoḥ artha pratītau= abhyupagamyamānāyām anartha pratilambhaḥ eva syāt artha pratilambhaḥ eva na syāt 
PVVṬ_24,4	 dvitīyam pratibandha lakṣaṇam āha kāryasya api ityādi tad svabhāvasya iti kāryaṃsvabhāvasya tad utpatteḥ kāraṇāt utpatteḥ yaḥ anumānasya prāmāṇyam na icchati tam pratyāha etau= anumeya pratyayau pramāṇam iti sambandhaḥ etau= iti svabhāva kārya liṅgau anupalabdheḥ svabhāva hetau= antarbhāvāt dvau= ityāha yat vā prakrānta apekṣayā dvau= ityāha 
PVVṬ_25,1	 svabhāva kāraṇayoḥ anumeyayoḥ pratyayau= iti anumeya pratyayau atad pratibhāsi tvepi iti anumeya sva lakṣaṇa apratibhāsi tvepi atad pratibhāsitu antataḥ sākṣāt anutpatteḥ kathantarhi avyabhicāraḥ iti āha tad utpatteḥ iti anumeyābhyām svabhāva kāraṇābhyām pāramparyeṇa utpatteḥ tat avyabhicāriṇau= iti anumeyāṃvyabhicāriṇau iti hetoḥ pramāṇam pratyakṣa vat 
PVVṬ_25,2	 tena yat ucyate avi ddha kaḥ rṇṇe na anadhigata artha paricchittiḥ pramāṇam atas na anumānampramāṇam artha paricchedaka tva abhāva ādi ti tad apāstam yatas sarve eva prekṣāvān pravṛtti kāmaḥ pramāṇam anveṣate pravṛtti viṣaya artha upadarśaka tvena pravṛtti viṣayaḥ ca arthaḥ artha kriyā samarthaḥ eva na ca anāgatam pravṛtti sādhya artha kriyā sāmarthyam vastunaḥ pratyakṣamparicśinatti iti uktam atas katham asya artha pariccheda mātrāt prāmāṇyam tasmāt sva viṣaye tad utpattyā pratyakṣam yat mayā pūrva pratipannam prabandhena artha kriyā kāri tat eva idam iti niścayam kurvat pravarttaka tvāt pramāṇan tathā anumānam api 
PVVṬ_25,3	 pratyakṣasya api ityādinā vyāptim āha artha avyabhicāraḥ eva iti pūrvam abhimata artha kāri tvena niścitasya arthasya sambhave sati bhāvaḥ eva pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam anyathā tad abhāve artha abhāve bhāvinaḥ pratyakṣasya tad vipralambhāt niścita artha asamvādāt etat uktam bhavati yadā artha kriyā samartham vastu pratyakṣam na paricchinatti yadi ca tathābhūtam api vastu vyabhicaret pramāṇam api na syāt avyabhicāraḥ ca anyasya konyaḥ tad utpatteḥ iti anyaṃsya artha antara bhūtasya yonyena saha avyabhicāraḥ sa tad utpatteḥ konyaḥ na eva anyaḥ tad utpattiḥ eva avyabhicāraḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_25,4–25,5	 kasmāt anāyatta rūpāṇām apratibaddha svabhāvānām sahabhāva niyama abhāvāt avyabhicāra niyama abhāvāt tasmāt artha kriyā kāri tvena niścitāt arthāt utpattiḥ eva pratyakṣasya avyabhicāra iti prāmāṇyantat ca anumānā ipyasti iti samam dvayam iti bhāvaḥ etena etat api nirastam pramāṇasya agauṇa tvāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ iti yadi agauṇa tvam anupacarita tvam ucyate tadā anumānam api anupacaritam eva askhalat buddhi rūpa tvāt 
PVVṬ_25,6–26,1	 atha dharma dharmi samudāyasya sādhya tve hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam anvayaḥ vā na sambhavati tena pakṣa dharma tva prasiddhi artham dharmiṇaḥ sādhya tvam upacaritavyam anvaya siddhi arthañca dharmasya iti evam upacarita viṣaya tvāt anumānam upacaritam tat ayuktam yatas loke dhūma mātram agni mātra vyāptam yatra dharmiṇi dṛśyate tatra eva agni pratītiḥ bhavati iti kasya atra upacāraḥ evam ca samudāyasya api sādhya tvam sidhyati yat āha kevalaḥ eva dharmaḥ dharmiṇi sādhyaḥ tathā iṣṭa samudāyasya siddhiḥ kṛtā bhavati iti na ca anumāna viṣaye sādhya śabda upacāre sati anumānam upacaritat nāma 
PVVṬ_26,2–26,4	 atha pramāṇasya agauṇa tvāt abhrānta tvāt anumānasya tu bhrānta tvāt aprāmāṇyam iti ucyate tat ayuktam bhrāntasya api agni anumānasya tad utpattyā bāhya agni adhyavasāyena loke prāmāṇya darśanāt pratyakṣa vat atha pratyakṣam api pramāṇan= eṣyate tadā loka pratīti bādhāḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ loka pratīta tvāt atha na eva pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ pramāṇa tvam pratiṣidhyate kintu liṅgantri lakṣaṇam catur lakṣaṇam vā na kenacid pramāṇena siddham iti paryanuyoge yadi anumānam ucyate sādhakam punar tatra api sam eva paryanuyogaḥ iti evam sarvatra paryanuyoga parāṇi eva sūtrāṇi tathā casūtram 
PVVṬ_26,5–26,7	 viśeṣenugama abhāvaḥ sāmānye siddha sādhanam iti tat api ayuktam pūrvam eva trairūpya grāhakasya pramāṇasya vyāpti vacaṃnena ākṣipta tvāt na ca apramāṇakena paraḥ paryanuyujyate vādi prativādinoḥ asiddha tvāt atha vacana ātmakam anumānam na vaktuḥ pramāṇam atha vacanena param pratipādayati tathā apramāṇakena paryanuyogaḥ kriyate iti 
PVVṬ_26,8–26,10	 tat api ayuktam dvayoḥ api hi vacanāt artha pratītiḥ pramāṇa bhūtā eva utpadyate artha paricchedaka tvāt kevalam vaktuḥ adhigamasya niṣpanna tvāt pramāṇam naḥ vā tena punar apramāṇam bhavati aprāmāṇye vā dvayoḥ api apramāṇam iti kathantatortha pratītiḥ yat api ucyate para siddhena anumānena anumānat niṣidhyata eti tat api etena nirastam iti saṃyoga vaśāt gamaka tve na ca kenacid aṅgena na saṃyogī hutāśanaḥ dhūmaḥ vā sarvathā tena prāptam dhūmāt prakāśanam iti 
PVVṬ_26,11	 yaḥ sarvathā gamya gamaka bhāva prasaṃgaḥ ācārya di gnāḥ ge na ākṣiptam param prati tat iha api kārya hetau āśaṅkate yadi ityādinā sādhyāt utpatteḥ kāraṇāt kāryaṅgam akaṅkāraṇasya iti adhyāhāraḥ sarvathā gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ prāptaḥ agneḥ sāmānya dharma vat viśeṣa dharmāḥ api tārṇa pārṇṇa ādayaḥ gamyāḥ syuḥ dhūsasya api viśeṣa dharma bat dravya tva pārthiva tvāt ayopi sāmānya dharmā gamakāḥ bhaveyuḥ kutas sarvathā janya janaka bhāvāt tathā hi yathā agniḥ agni tva dravya tva sattva ādibhiḥ sāmānya dharmmaiḥ janakaḥ tathā tārṇṇa pārṇṇa ādibhiḥ viśeṣaiḥ api yathā ca dhūmaḥ dhūma tva pāṇḍu tva ādibhiḥ sva niyataiḥ viśeṣa dharmaiḥ yuktaḥ janyaḥ tathā sāmānya dharmaiḥ api sattva dravya tva ādibhiḥ tatas ca yathā anayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tathā eva gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ syāt iti atas āha 
PVVṬ_27,1	 na ityādi na sarvathā janya janaka bhāvaḥ tatas ca kutas tathā gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ syāt kasmāt iti ced tad abhāve teṣānta arṇṇa pārṇṇa tva ādīnām viśeṣa dharmmāṇām abhāve bhavataḥ dhūma mātrasya tebhyaḥ eva viśeṣa dharmebhyaḥ bhavati iti evam ātmanaḥ tad utpatti niyamasya abhāvāt tathā tad abhāve agni abhāve bhavataḥ dravya tva ādeḥ sāmānya dharmasya agneḥ eva ayam bhavati iti evam rūpasya tad utpatti niyamasya abhāvāt kutas sarvathā janya janaka bhāvaḥ yatas sarvathā gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_27,2	 yatas evantasmāt kāryam dhūma ādikam svabhāvaiḥ yāvadbhiḥ dhūma tva ādibhiḥ sva gataiḥ itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇā tṛtīyā avinābhāvi vinā na bhavati kvāvinābhāvi kāraṇe kāraṇa viṣaye yat vā kāraṇe iti ādhāra saptamī kāraṇa sthaiḥ svabhāvaiḥ yāvadbhiḥ agni tva dravya tva ādibhiḥ avinābhāvi teṣām kāraṇa gatānām sāmānya dharmāṇāṃhetuḥ kāryam gamakam iti arthaḥ kiṅkāraṇam tad kāryatva niyamāt teṣām eva kāraṇa gatānām sāmānya dharmāṇān tatkāryam iti evam rūpasya niyamasya sadbhāvāt na hi tad sāmānya dharmāt kadācid api kāryam vyabhicarati evantā vat kāraṇa gatāḥ sāmānya dharmāḥ gamyāḥ iti ākhyātam 
PVVṬ_27,3	 kārya gatāḥ tu viśeṣa dharmāḥ gamakāḥ iti darśayan= āha taiḥ eva ityādi kāryam apitaiḥ eva dharmaiḥ sva gataiḥ kāraṇa gatānām dharmāṇām gamakāḥ yertha antara asambhavinaḥ dhūma tva pāṇḍu tva ādayaḥ viśeṣa rūpāḥ taiḥ kāraṇa gataiḥ sāmānya dharmaiḥ vinā na bhavanti atra api tad kāryatva niyamāt iti apekṣyate teṣām eva kārya gatānām viśeṣa dharmāṇām kāraṇa gata sāmānya dharma apekṣayā kāryatva niyamāt 
PVVṬ_28,1	 yadi sāmānya dharmāṇām kāraṇa gatānām kārya gataiḥ viśeṣa dharmaiḥ eva avinābhāvāt gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ tadā aṃśena janya janaka bhāvaḥ syāt agneḥ sāmānya dharmāḥ eva janakāḥ dhūmasya ca viśeṣa dharmāḥ eva janyāḥ syuḥ sarvathā ca janya janaka bhāvobhimataḥ iti abhyupagama virodhaḥ etat pariharati na aṃśena janya janaka bhāva prasaṅgaḥ niraṃśa tvena vastunaḥ sarvathā janya janaka tvā abhyupagamāt gamya gamaka bhāvasya api sarvathā abhimata tvāt tat āha tat janyā ityādi yadi hi kāryasya taiḥ kāraṇa gataiḥ viśeṣa dharmaiḥ janyaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ sa grahītum śakyate jñāpaka hetu adhikārāt tadā tad janya viśeṣa grahaṇe abhimata tvāt kāraṇa gata viśeṣa dharmāṇām gamya tvasya tathā hi aguru dhūma grahaṇe bhavati eva tad agneḥ anumānam tathā liṅga viśeṣaḥ liṅgam eva viśeṣaḥ dhūma lakṣaṇaḥ saḥ upādhiḥ viśeṣaṇam yeṣām dravya tva ādīn ānteṣāṃgrahaṇe abhimata tvāt gamaka tvasya na hi dhūmena viśeṣitāḥ dravya tva ādayaḥ agnim vyabhicaranti 
PVVṬ_28,2–28,3	 nanu dhūmaḥ eva tatra gamakaḥ na tu tad viśiṣṭāḥ dravya tva ādayaḥ yathā kṛtaka tve sati prameya tvāt iti atra kṛtaka tvam eva gamakam na prameya tvam satyam etat avyabhicāra mātra pradarśana arthantu evam abhidhānam iti eke anyaḥ tu āha na dhūmasya vyabhicārāt iha sāmānya upādānam kintarhi sarveṣām pratipattṝṇām dṛṣṭe vastuni sāmānya ākāre pratipattiḥ bhavati paścāt viśeṣa avasāyaḥ tatra ca yat upāttam sāmānyantat a parityaktam eva tasmāt pratipad tuḥ adhyavasāya vaśāt viśeṣa upahitam sāmāni aṅgam akambhavati na viśeṣasya vyabhicārāt iti 
PVVṬ_28,4–29,1	 yuktam etat kevalam yadi eṣa niyamaḥ sāmānya pratipatti purassarā eva viśeṣa pratipattiḥ kathantarhi dhūma mātrasya dravya tva ādi rahitasya pratītiḥ pūrva uktam ca ca udyantat avastham eva tasmāt idam atra sādhu liṅga viśeṣasya sāmānya viśeṣaṇa tvena eva upādānāt ahetu tvam hetu tva upādāne hi hetu tvam syāt na anyathā kadā tarhi liṅga gatānām sāmānya dharmāṇām agamaka tvam iti āha aviśiṣṭa ityādi yadā dravya tva ādīni aviśiṣṭāni vivakṣitāni tadā teṣām vyabhicārāt gamaka tvat neṣyate svabhāva hetum adhikṛtya āha 
PVVṬ_29,2	 svabhāvaḥ ityādi hetuḥ iti varttate iti teṣām hetuḥ iti atas svabhāve sādhye kimbhūte bhāva mātra anurodhini hetu sadbhāva mātra anurodhini bhāvaḥ hetuḥ svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ mātra grahaṇam artha antara anapekṣā sandarśana artham kasmāt tad mātra anurodhini eva svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ iti āha tādātmyam hi arthasya tanmātra anurodhinī ā iva iti yosau= arthasya sādhanasya ātmā tad bhāvini eva na anyāyatte na kāraṇa antara pratibaddhe paścāt bhāvini tādātmyam kasmāt iti ced āha tad bhāvaḥ ityādi tasya hetoḥ bhāvi abhūtasya kāraṇa antara āyattasya dharmasya paścāt yaḥ bhāvaḥ tasya niyama abhāvāt na hi kāraṇa antara pratibaddhena paścāt bhāvinā avaśyam bhavitavyam kiṅkāraṇam kāraṇānām kārya vyabhicārāt sambhavat pratibandha tvāt kāraṇānām kutas tebhyaḥ avaśyambhāvaḥ kāryasya 
PVVṬ_29,3–30,2	 nanu ca sādhya svabhāva tā sādhanasya na kenacid iṣṭam tat katham ucyate tad bhāva mātra anurodhini eva tādātmyam iti evam manyate vyatiriktau= api kṛtaka tva anitya tva ākhyau dharmau= api upagacchadbhiḥ avaśyam abhūtvā bhavanam bhūtvā ca abhavanam abhyupagantavyam anyathā ātma ādeḥ iva kṛtaka tva anitya tve paṭa ādeḥ na syātām tasmāt yat eva abhūtvā bhavanambhāvasya tat eva kṛtaka tvam yat eva ca bhūtvā a bhavanam anavasthāyitvantadeva anitya tvam astu kim anyena sāmānyena kalpitena iti anupala iti āha apravṛttiḥ ityādi keṣāma pravṛttiḥ pramāṇānām vahuvacanam vyakti bhedena pramāṇānāmbahutvāt āgama apekṣa sidhyati iti ucyate iti 
PVVṬ_30,3	 evam manyate jñāna jñeyayoḥ bādhāḥ bodha rūpa tvena viśeṣāt bodha rūpam pratyakṣa ādikam pramāṇam svatas eva sidhyati jñeyantu ghaṭa ādikam jaḍa rūpa tvāt pramāṇam apekṣate jñāna jñeya abhāvayoḥ tu nīrūpa tvena viśeṣa abhāvāt katham jñāna abhāvasya svatas siddhi rjñeyā bhāvasya ca jñāna abhāvāt siddhiḥ ucyate atha jñāna abhāvaḥ na anyena sidhyati tathā hi jñānānām sva samvidita rūpa tvena eka jñāna saṃsargi tva abhāvāt kevalam yadi sva santāne jñānam syāt upalabhyeta anupalambhāt asat eva tat iti svatas eva jñāna abhāvaḥ siddhaḥ iṣyate 
PVVṬ_30,4	 tathā sattā abhāvopi siddhaḥ syāt tatra api hi yadi sattā syāt upalabhyeta anupalambhāt na asti iti niścīyate tatas ca apārthika anupalabdhiḥ abhāva siddhau vijñānam vā anya vastuni iti pakṣam dūṣayitum āha atha ityādi anyasya ghaṭa ādi viviktasya bhū talasya upalabdhyā ghaṭa anupalabdhi siddhiḥ iti pratyakṣa siddha anupalabdhiḥ 
PVVṬ_30,5–31,2	 etat uktam bhavati ghaṭa grāhaka tvasya bhū tala grāhakasya ca eka jñāna saṃsargi tvāt yadā bhū tala grāhakam eva tad jñānambhavati tadā ghaṭāgrāhaka tva abhāvam niścāyayati iti pratīti pratyakṣa siddhā eva ghaṭa anupalabdhiḥ tathā anya sat tayā asattā kinna sidhyati tathā iti anupalabdhi vat dvayoḥ api ghaṭa pradeśayoḥ eka jñāna saṃsargi tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ anyasya ghaṭa viviktasya bhū tala ādeḥ sat tayā siddhyā niṣedhyasya arthasya sattā kinna sidhyati nanu bhāva nivṛtti rūpaḥ abhāvaḥ sa katham pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_31,3	 evam manyate abhāvaḥ nāma na asti eva kevalam mūḍhasya bhāva viṣayam eva pratyakṣam anya abhāvam vyavahārayati tena yat uktama rthā paḥ ttyā abhāvaḥ pratīyate iti tat ayuktam yatas na tāvat ghaṭa ādīnām anyonya abhāvaḥ abhinnaḥ ghaṭa vināśe paṭa ādi utpatti prasaṅgāt paṭa ādi abhāvasya vinaṣṭa tvāt atha bhinnaḥ abhāvaḥ tadā ghaṭa ādīnām parasparam bhedaḥ na syāt yadā hi ghaṭa abhāva rūpaḥ paṭaḥ na bhavati tadā paṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ eva syāt yathā vā ghaṭasya paṭa abhāvāt bhinna tvāt ghaṭa rūpa tā tathā paṭa ādeḥ api syāt ghaṭa abhāvāt bhinna tvāt eva 
PVVṬ_31,4	 na api eṣām paraspara abhinnānām abhāve na bhedaḥ śakyate karttum tasya bhinna abhinna bheda karaṇe akiṃcitkara tvāt na ca abhinnānām anyonya abhāvaḥ sambhavati na api paraspara bhinnānām abhāvena bhedaḥ kriyate sva hetubhyaḥ eva bhinnānām utpatteḥ na api bheda vyavahāraḥ kriyate yatas bhāvānām ātmīya ātmīya rūpeṇa utpattiḥ eva svatas bhedaḥ sa ca pratyakṣa pratibhāsanāt eva bheda vyavahāra hetuḥ 
PVVṬ_31,5–31,6	 tena yat ucyate vastu asaṃkara siddhiḥ ca abhāva pramāṇa āśritā iti tad apāstam kiñca bhāva abhāvayoḥ bhedaḥ na abhāva nibandhanaḥ anavasthā prasaṃgāt atha sva rūpeṇa bhedaḥ tathā abhāvānām api sa syāt iti kim abhāvena kalpitena na api prāgabhāva abhāve kāryasya anādi tvam prasajyate hetu abhāvena anutpatteḥ nanuprāgabhāve sati hetoḥ sakāśāt utpattiḥ syāt na asati prāgabhāve vidyamāna tvāt 
PVVṬ_31,7	 yadi evat na kadācana api kārya utpattiḥ syāt virodhinaḥ prāgabhāvasya sannihita tvāt na ca tad vināśāt kārya utpattiḥ prāgabhāvam antareṇa kārya utpatti abhyupagama prasaṅgāt na api kārya utpattiḥ eva prāc abhāva vināśaḥ tad utpatteḥ eva virodhi sannidhānena asambhavāt kāraṇa sattā kāle prāc abhāvasya avināśāt kārya utpatti kāle ca tad vināśāt kāraṇa vināśa vat tasmāt utpatteḥ pūrvam kāryasya na bhāvaḥ na api abhāvaḥ dharma usattvāt niraṃśa tvāt ca vastunaḥ kintu yadā utpadyate tadā sattvam asya anyadā na asti iti vyavahriyate tena asat utpadyate iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_31,8	 pra dhvam sā bhās va sya ca asattvam svayam eva ācārya ubhidhāsyate yat ca yasmāt utpadyatetat tasya kāryam kāraṇam ca ucyate teṣām ca ekakṣaṇa sthāyi tvena utpatteḥ nāśi tvam sva svarūpeṇa eva utpatteḥ paraspara bhinna tā ca sidhyati tena prāc abhāva ādi abhāvepi kāraṇa ādi vibhāgataḥ vyavahāraḥ bhavati eva na ca prāc abhāva ādīnāmparasparambhedaḥ pratibhāsate yasmāt ghaṭa ādeḥ pūrvampaścāt anyatra ca nivṛtti mātram abhinnam pratibhāsate yadi nāma kāla bhedaḥ pratīyate na hi go tvam aneka kāla ādi sambandhi tvena pratīyamānam anekambhavati nivṛtteḥ nī rūpa tvāt ca katham abhāvasya nānātvam bhāva nivṛtti rūpa tvāt ca abhāvasya kevalam yaḥ mūḍhaḥ utpatteḥ pūrvam paścāt anyatra ca kāryasya bhāvam icchati tam pratīdam ucyate kāryasya pūrvampaścāt anyatra ca abhāvaḥ iti bhāva āropaniṣedha mātram kriyate 
PVVṬ_32,1–32,2	 tena na ca avastunaḥ ete syuḥ ākārāḥ ityādi yat uktantat nirastam itas ca etat nirastam draṣṭavyam yatas na prāc pradhvaṃsa abhāva abhyām bhāvasya kaścid tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ virodha lakṣaṇaḥ vā sambandhaḥ asahabhāvi tvena at viṣṭha tvāt atas eva na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ na api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ asahabhāvi tvāt eva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya rūpa tāyāḥ ca vastunaḥ abhāvāt kevalam anya sambandha dvāreṇa ayam kalpyate daṇḍa daṇḍinoḥ iva yadi ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva sambandha balena bhāvasya prāc abhāvaḥ iti pratītiḥ tathā prāc abhāva ādeḥ bhāvaḥ iti api pratītiḥ syāt sambandhasya aviśeṣāt tasmāt prāgabhāva ādeḥ asambandhinaḥ bhāva sambandhi tvena pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ eva 
PVVṬ_32,3–32,4	 na cā nyaḥ nyā bhās vaḥ bhāvānām asti na hi ghaṭasya nivṛttiḥ paṭasya nivṛttiḥ bhavati apratīteḥ na ca paṭe avasthānāt sā tad sambandhinī yuktāḥ evam hi prāc abhāva ādi api anyonya abhāvaḥ syāt kāraṇa ādau= avasthānāt tasmāt anya abhāvaḥ eva asti na anyonya abhāvaḥ tena anya abhāvāt prāc abhāva ādīnām na bhedaḥ iti katham caturvidhaḥ abhāvaḥ ucyate pratyakṣa abhāva nirāśasaḥ ca naiḥ rā tmya si ddhā vabhihitaḥ iti na iha ucyate 
PVVṬ_32,5	 na tu abhāvasya asattvena anubhūta tvāt katham pratyakṣeṇa niścayaḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ yaḥ smāt eka jñāna saṃsargiṇoḥ pratyakṣeṇa ekasya grahaṇam eva anyasya agrahaṇantada grahaṇam eva ca tasya abhāva grahaṇambhāve hi tasya agrahaṇa ayogāt yadā aha anya hetu sākalye tat avyabhicārāt ca upalambhaḥ sattā tad abhāva unupalabdhiḥ asattā anya upalabdhiḥ ca anupalabdhiḥ iti 
PVVṬ_32,6	 tena ayam arthaḥ pratyakṣam abhāvat niścāyayati iti tāvat na niścāya yati iti arthaḥ sa ca dṛśyasya bhāva aniścayaḥ abhāva niścayaḥ eva evam pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvinaḥ vikalpasya pratyakṣa viṣaya anusāri tvam samarthitam bhavati tat evam upalabdhi abhāva vyavahāra vat artha abhāva vyavahārasya api pratyakṣa siddha tvāt na liṅgena asau sādhyate evantā vat amūḍhaṃprati dṛśya anupalambhaḥ na abhāvam vyabhicarati iti abhāva vyavahāraḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ 
PVVṬ_33,1	 na ca api abhāva unupalabdhānām api sattvāt nityam śakyamāna anupalaṃbha vyabhicāraḥ iti kṛtvā vyavaharttum aśakyaḥ iti vaktum yuktam evam hi abhāvasya niścāyakam api pratyakṣan na syāt sandehāt na ca anyat niścāyakam anyat vyavahāra aṅgam yuktam tasmāt pratyakṣa niścāyaka tvāt bhāva vat dṛśyasya abhāvam api vyavahārayati 
PVVṬ_33,2	 kathantarhi asat vyavahārasya sādhya tvam iti āha yadā punar ityādi evaṃvidhe hi upalambha yogya anupalabdhiḥ eva asatām padārthānām asattā na anyā tavā siddhepi pratyakṣeṇa abhāva vyavahārasya viṣaye mohāt viṣayiṇaḥ asataḥ avidyamānasya jñānam na asti iti evam ākāram na asti iti evambhūtaḥ ca śabdaḥ niḥśaṅka avagamana āgamana lakṣaṇā puruṣasya pravṛttiḥ vyavahāraḥ tān apratipadyamānaḥ pumān viṣaya pradarśanena asat vyavahāra viṣayasya ghaṭa vivikta pradeśasya upalambhamānasya pradarśanena samaye abhāva vyavahāre pravarttyate dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā ityādi sāsna ādi samudāya ātmakaḥ eva gauḥ tatas na tatra go tvam sādhyate kintu go vyava hāraḥ yadā ayam mūḍha matiḥ śāvaleye pravarttita go vyavahāraḥ bāhuleye śāvaleya rūpa śūnya tvāt go vyavahāram na pravarttayati sa nimitta pradarśanena go vyavahāre pravarttyate sāsna ādi samudāya nimittakaḥ hi go vyavahāraḥ na śāvaleya rūpa nimittikaḥ bāhuleye api tad nimittam asti iti katham asau na pravarttyate tadvat ghaṭa viviktepi pradeśa inu palambha nimitta pradarśanena asat vyavahāre pravarttyate 
PVVṬ_33,3	 tathā ca iti yena evam vyavahāraḥ sādhyate tena dṛṣṭānta asiddhi codanā api prativyūḍha apratikṣiptā anupalabdheḥ liṅgāt abhāve sādhye yena eva liṅgaḥ na sādhya dharmiṇya bhāvaḥ sādhyaḥ tena eva dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇī api tatra api aparaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti anavasthā syāt vyava hāre tu sādhye na anavasthā pravarttitavyavahārasya eva punar samaye pravarttanāt 
PVVṬ_33,4	 nanu yaḥ hi viṣayam pratipadyate sa viṣayiṇam api pratipadyate iti katham vyavahārasya api sādhya tvam iti āha viṣaya ityādi dṛśyante hi loke tathāvidhāḥ ye viṣaya pratipattau= api apratipanna viṣayiṇaḥ yathā sāṃkhyaḥ sattve rajaḥ na asti iti pravarttitāsa dvi avahāra upi nimitta niścaya abhāvāt mṛd piṇḍe na pravarttayati anupalambha nimitta pradarśane ghaṭa abhāva vyavahāre pravarttyate 
PVVṬ_34,1–34,2	 evam ityādinā upasaṃhāraḥ evam uktena prakāreṇa anayoḥ anupalabdhyoḥ dṛśya adṛśyayoḥ sat vyavahāra pratiṣedha phala tvan tulyam katham sva viparyaya hetvabhāva bhāvābhyām sva śabdena sat vyavahārasya svarūpam gṛhyate viparyaya śabdena sat vyavahāra viruddha usat vyavahāraḥ gṛhyate tayoḥ hetū sva viparyaya hetū tatra sva hetuḥ upalabdhiḥ viparyaya hetuḥ dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ tayoḥ abhāva bhāvau sva viparyaya hetu abhāva bhāvau tābhyām 
PVVṬ_34,3–34,4	 etat uktam bhavati adṛśya anupalabdhau sat vyavahāra nimittāyāḥ upalabdheḥ pratyakṣa anumāna nivṛttau= abhāvāt sat vyavahāra nivṛttiḥ dṛśya anupalambhe tu sat vyavahāra viruddhasya asat vyavahārasya nimitta sadbhāvāt pravṛttiḥ tena sat vyavahārasya nivṛttiḥ iti sat vyavahāra pratiṣedha phala tvan tulyam nanu upalambha nivṛttau= api arthasya sandehāt katham sat vyavahāraḥ nivarttate iti āha ekatra iti adṛśya viṣayāyām anupalabdhau sattvasya saṃśayāt tatas niścaya ātmakaḥ sattva vyavahāraḥ nivarttate eva sandigdhaḥ tu sattva vyavahāraḥ na nivarttate anyatra tu dṛśya anṛpa labdhau viparyayāt iti saṃśaya viparyayaḥ niścayaḥ tasmāt asattvasya niścayāt iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_34,5–34,6	 yadi adṛśya anupalabdhau saṃśayaḥ katham sā pramāṇam iti āha tatra adya ityādi tatra dvayoḥ anupalabdhyoḥ madhye ādyā dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ pramāṇa muktā sat vyavahāra niṣedhe upayogāt vyāpārāt kva tarhi tasyāḥ aprāmāṇyam iti āha na tu ityādi vyatirekasya abhāvasya darśanat niścayaḥ ādi grahaṇāt śabdaḥ vyavahāraḥ ca gṛhyate saṃśayāt yatas na abhāva niścayaḥ utpadyate tasmāt na pramāṇam dvitīyā tu iti dṛśya viṣaya anupalabdhiḥ atra iti vyatireka darśana ādau niścaya phala tvāt niśyacaḥ eva phalam asyāḥ iti kṛtvā sā ca dṛśya viṣaya anupalabdhiḥ prayoga bhedāt caturvidhā iti sambandhaḥ viruddhaḥ ca viruddha kāyam ca iti virūpa eka śeṣaḥ siddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ dṛśya ātmanoḥ iti atra api sambandhanīyam 
PVVṬ_35,1–35,2	 etena svabhāva viruddha upalabdhiḥ viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ ca dve nirdiṣṭe asiddhiḥ hetu bhāvayoḥ dṛśya ātmanoḥ iti upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptayoḥ kāraṇa svabhāvayoḥ anupalabdhiḥ iti arthaḥ etena api kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ ca dve nirddiṣṭe iti caturdhā bhavati abhāva artha iti abhāvaḥ abhāva vyavahāraḥ ca arthaḥ prayojanam yasyāḥ sā tathā 
PVVṬ_35,3	 nanu viruddha kāryayoḥ siddhiḥ iti atra anupalabdhiḥ iti na śrūyate tat katham anayoḥ anupalabdhi tvam iti atas āha yāvān kaścid ityādi yāvān kaścid iti vyāptā ca etat kathyeta na kaścid pratiṣedha vyavahāraḥ liṅgajosti yonu palabdhim antareṇa śakyate karttu na tu pratyakṣa sādhya tvam abhāva vyavahārasya nirākṛtam etat caprāk eva uktantām eva vyāptim darśayitum āha tathā hi iti saḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ dvidhā kriyeta vyavahriyeta kasyacid arthasya vidhinā niṣedhena vā kasyacid vidhau= api kriyamāṇe viruddhaḥ vā vidhīyeta aviruddhaḥ vā aviruddhasya vidhau niṣidhyamāna vidhīyamānayoḥ sahabhāva virodha abhāvāt apratiṣedhaḥ niṣedhya abhimatasya viruddhasya api ityādi evam hi asau viruddhaḥ syāt yadi tatra sva viruddhasya anupaladhiḥ tathā hi ityādina etat eva āha aparyanta kāraṇasya iti akṣīṇa kāraṇasya bhavataḥ santānena utpadyamānasya śīta sparśa ādeḥ agni ādi sannidhānāt pūrvam iti draṣṭavyam anya bhāve agni ādi bhāve abhāvāt anutpādāt virodha gatiḥ na tu abhāvāt ahetuka tvāt vināśasya 
PVVṬ_35,4	 etat uktam bhavati pūrva pūrvasya śīta sparśasya svarasa nirodhe sati uttarottarasya ca agni tāratamyena śīta sparśasya apacaya tāratamya yoginaḥ krameṇa utpadyamānasya yāvat sarva sarveṇa anutpattiḥ uṣṇa sparśa lakṣaṇaḥ bhavati tena nirhetukepi vināśe agni sannidhānāt pūrvam prabandha pravṛttasya śīta sparśasya svarasa nirodhe anyasya ca prabandhena utpitsoḥ agni sannidhāne satya nutpatteḥ agni śītayoḥ virodhauvagatiḥ loke na tu paramārthataḥ virodhaḥ atas eva virodha gatiḥ iti āha yat punar ucyate na kāraṇa nivarttanam antareṇa kasyacid agnyādiḥ nivarttakaḥ nāma iti 
PVVṬ_36,1	 tat ayuktam nirhetuka tvāt vināśasya katham kāraṇasya nivarttakaḥ atha sa hetuka vināśam abhyupagamya evam ucyate tadā yathā asau kāraṇam nivarttayati kāryam kinna nivarttayati yadi ca kāraṇa nivarttanam antareṇa na kāryam nivarttayitum śakyate tadā tad kāraṇasya api kathat nivarttakam yāvat tat kāraṇam na nivarttayati tad kāraṇasya api evam iti anavasthayā na kaścid kasyacid nivarttakaḥ syāt na ca santāna apekṣayā etat vaktum yujyate sa hetuke vināśe santānasya eva abhāvāt iti yat kiñcid etat sa ca iti anya bhāve satyabhāvaḥ nutpatti lakṣaṇaḥ virodha hetuḥ anupalabdheḥ sakāśāt vyavahriyate 
PVVṬ_36,2–36,4	 anena saha anavasthā lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ vyākhyātaḥ dvitīyam virodhan darśayan= āha anyonya upalabdhī ityādi anyonya upalabdhiḥ paraspara pratipattiḥ tasyāḥ parihāraḥ vivekaḥ tena sthitam lakṣaṇam svarūpam yayoḥ tau tathā uktau tayoḥ bhāvonyonya upalabdhi parihāra sthita lakṣaṇa tā sā vā virodhaḥ vā śabdaḥ samuccaye nitya anitya tva vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ nanu prathama virodha īpi asti eva paraspara parihāraḥ dvitīyepi saha anavasthānam tathā hi yayoḥ eva dharmayoḥ ekatra anavasthā anantayoḥ eva dvitīyaḥ virodhaḥ tathā hi rūpa rasayoḥ ayam na iṣyate tat kasmāt virodha dvayam uktam iti ced 
PVVṬ_36,5	 satyam viṣaya vibhāga arthantu uktam pūrvaḥ virodhaḥ dṛśya vastu viṣayaḥ eva dvitīyaḥ tu avastu viṣaya upyadṛśya viṣayaḥ ca iti eke yat vā pūrva konyatonyasya abhāva pratipattyā anyena saha virodhaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu anyena saha ekatva abhāvena sva rūpa viṣayaḥ iti anayoḥ virodha yoḥ mahān bhedaḥ tathā hi nitya tva nivṛtti rūpam anitya tvam anitya tva nivṛtti ḥ ūpañca anitya tvam iti evam anyonya parihāraḥ eva virodhaḥ sva rūpa niṣṭhaḥ na ca nīla nivṛtti rūpampītampīta nivṛtti rūpam ca nīlam anayoḥ bhāva rūpa tvāt nīla abhāve pītasya bhāva prasaṃgāt ca tasmāt na anayoḥ ayam virodhaḥ na api anayoḥ anyonya abhāva avyabhicāreṇa ayam virodhaḥ apratīteḥ atas eva aviruddhasya vidhānam ucyate nīlasya api nīla nivṛtti rūpeṇa ānīlena ayam virodhaḥ na nīla abhāva niyatena ānīlena tathābhūtasya ānīla vastunaḥ pīta ādi vyatiriktasya abhāvāt kathantarhi nīla ādau dṛśyamāne pīta ādeḥ tādātmya niṣedhaḥ 
PVVṬ_37,1	 na eṣa doṣaḥ yasmāt nīlasya ekasya upalambhenyasya adṛśyasya api upalambha māna svabhāva tve sati tathā eva upalambhaḥ syāt iti evam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvamparāmṛśya tādātmyam svabhāva anupalambhāt niṣidhyate atra api ca virodhe sa ca anupalabdheḥ iti apekṣaṇīyantena ayam arthaḥ sa ca anyonya parihāraḥ virodha unupalabdheḥ eva niścetavyaḥ tathā hi virodhinām virodhaḥ eka pratibhāse sati anyā pratibhāsanam eva ucyate bhāvasya ca rūpe pratibhāsamāne tad abhāvaḥ na pratibhāsate tasmāt bhāva abhāvayoḥ tādātmyena apratibhāsanāt virodhaḥ niścīyate evam nitya anityādā= ayat niścetavyaḥ 
PVVṬ_37,2	 apratibhāsanam ca eka pratibhāsanam eva ucyate tat āha tatra api ityādi tatra api anantara ukte virodhe eka upalabdhyā ekasya virodhinaḥ upalabdhyā anya anupalabdhiḥ eva niṣedhya anupalabdhiḥ eva ucyate anyathā iti yadi eka upalabdhyā anyān upalabdhiḥ na ucyate tadā aniṣiddhāḥ upalabdhiḥ yasya niṣedhyasya tasya eka upalabdhau= api abhāva asiddheḥ tatas ca upalabhyamānasya virodhi tvam eva na syāt tasmāt virodha dvayasya api anupalabdhi kṛta tvāt viruddha upalabdhi ādayaḥ vidhi mukhena prayuktāḥ api anupalabdhi svabhāvāḥ bhavanti 
PVVṬ_37,3	 nanu virodhinoḥ virodha lakṣaṇa sambandha grāhika anupalabdhiḥ dṛṣṭānte na ca sambandha grāhakasya pramāṇasya rūpam sambandhinoḥ bhavati na hi agni dhūmayoḥ sambandha grāhakasya pratyakṣasya rūpam dhūmasya bhavati na agneḥ tad katham viruddha upalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ bhavati upalabdhi rūpa tayā pratibhāsanāt tasmāt dṛṣṭānte gṛhīta virodham agni ādikam anyatra pradeśe dṛṣṭvā śīta ādi abhāva unumīyate iti 
PVVṬ_37,4^1	 atra ucyate yadi virodha sambandha dvāreṇa gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ virodhinā antataḥ ca agni darśanāt śītasya pratītiḥ syāt tayoḥ eva virodha sambandhena samutthita tvāt na śīta abhāvasya asambandhi tvāt yadā ca agninā śītaḥ nivarttyate tadā katham virodhaḥ sambandhaḥ dviṣṭha tva abhāvāt na ca śīta abhāvena saha agneḥ virodhaḥ saha avasthānāt na api agneḥ śīta abhāva avyabhicāri tvāt tatas śīta abhāva ādi anumānam agni bhāvepi śīta bhāva darśanāt tasmāt yathā yathā agni sadbhāve śītasya anupalambhaḥ tathā tathā dṛṣṭānte tad abhāvasya pratipanna tvāt 
PVVṬ_37,4^2	 anyatra api agneḥ śīta abhāvaḥ tathā eva anu mīyate tena ayam arthaḥ bhavati sādhya dharmiṇī api agni sadbhāve yadā śītasya anupalambhaḥ tadā eva agneḥ virodhi tvam na anyadā virodhi tvena ca gamaka tvam iti anyānupalambhena gamaka tvam iti uktam bhavati atas viruddha upalabdhiḥ anupalabdhi niyata tvāt anupalabdhi rūpa tvam kevala bhūta la upalabdheḥ ghaṭa anupalabdhi rūpa tva vat evam paraspara parihāra ipi viruddha upalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ eva yathārhatām syāt anityaḥ ghaṭaḥ syāt nityaḥ iti atra hi anitya upalabdhiḥ eva nitya anupalabdhiḥ atas na nitya anitya rūpam vastu 
PVVṬ_38,1	 evam artha antara vidhau= api niṣedhyasya anupalabdhiṅgamikām pratipādya artha antara niṣedha īpi pratipādayitum āha ekasya ityādi kasmāt niṣedhasya ityādi na ca artha antara abhāvāt artha antara niṣedha iti prasaṅgaḥ yatas tatra api iti anya niṣedhe sādhyekāryaka āhaṇayoḥ niṣedhaḥ hetuḥ syāt anubhayasya akāryasya akāraṇasya vā niṣedhaḥ hetuḥ syāt tatra teṣu anubhayasya akārya kāraṇa ātmakasya niṣedhyena saha pratibandha abhāvāt tad abhāve apratibaddhasya abhāve anyena iti pratiṣedhya abhimatena na bhavitavyam iti kutas etat kārya anupalabdhau= api kutas tad abhāvaḥ iti sambandhaḥ tad abhāvaḥ iti kāraṇa abhāvaḥ yatas nānā kāraṇāni tadvanti kārya vanti vaikalya pratibandha sambhavāt etat ca kāraṇa mātra gṛhītvā uktam apratibaddha asāmarthyasya kāraṇasya abhāvaḥ kārya abhāvāt gamyate eva yatonubhayasya kāryasya ca anupalabdhiḥ gamikā tasmāt kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ eva abhāvam gamayati kāryasya iti sambandhāt gamyate 
PVVṬ_39,1–39,2	 svabhāva anupalabdheḥ api abhāva hetu tvāt avadhāraṇam ayuktam iti ced āha svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ tu svayam asat tā eva na atra artha antarasya abhāvaḥ sādhyate svabhāva antarasya ca niṣedhe sādhye kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam atas na vyāghātaḥ kintarhi tatra sādhyate iti āha kevalam ityādi tatra iti svabhāva anupalabdhau viṣayī asat jñāna ādiḥ asyām api iti svabhāva anupalabdhau yadā vyāpakaḥ yaḥ dharmaḥ tasya anupalabdhyā vyāpya abhāvam āha yathā na atra śiṃśapā vṛkṣa abhāvāt iti tadā abheda upi vyāpyasya sādhyate api śabdāt vyavahāra upi yadā hi samunnatayoḥ parvata pradeśayoḥ ekasmin pradeśe taru vanam dṛśyamānam ati gahana tvāt anavadhārita vṛkṣa viśeṣam bhavati tatra aparasmin parvvata uddeśe śiṃśapā bhāvaḥ na niścetum pāryate śiṃśapāyā adṛśya tvāt vṛkṣaḥ tu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ iti śakyate abhāva niścayaḥ karttuntasya tadā vyāpaka abhāvāt vyāpyasya abhāvaḥ sādhyate
