PVVṬ_39,3	 iyam iti ādinā abhāva artha iti ādi kārikā bhāgam vyācaṣṭe viruddha siddhyā iti svabhāva viruddha upalabdhyā yathā ityādi yatra dharmiṇi śīta sparśaḥ parokṣaḥ vahniḥ ca dṛśyate dūrāt tasmin viṣaye ayam prayogaḥ etena iti svabhāva viruddha upalabdhi udāharaṇena vyāpaka viruddha siddhiḥ uktā veditavyā yathā iti ādi udāharaṇam śīta sparśa viśeṣaḥ eva hima anugataḥ tuṣāraḥ tasya vyāpakaḥ śītaḥ tasya viruddha ugniḥ tatra agniḥ viruddham śītam nivarttayan tat vyāpyantuṣāra sparśam api nivarttayati iti arthataḥ svabhāva viruddha upalabdhau= iyam antar bhavati yatra ca vahniḥ pratyakṣaḥ śīta sparśaḥ tuṣāra sparśaḥ ca apratyakṣaḥ tatra ayam api prayogaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ viruddhasya yat kāryantasya asiddhyāḥ yathā ityādi na śīta sparśaḥ tra dhūmāt iti śīta viruddha ugniḥ tasya kāryam dhūmaḥ sa ugnim sannidhāpayati sa ca śītam apanayati yatra ca śīta sparśaḥ parokṣaḥ vahniḥ api dhūmaḥ ca pratyakṣaḥ tatra ayam prayogaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ evantāvat viruddha kāryayoḥ siddhiḥ iti etat vyākhyātam 
PVVṬ_39,4–40,2	 adhunā asiddhiḥ hetu bhāvayoḥ iti etat udāharaṇa ākhyānena ācaṣṭe hetu asiddhyā iti kāraṇa anupaladhyā yathā ityādi yadā mahāhradasya upari vā āspa ādau dhūma ādi rūpa tayā sandehaḥ bhavati tadā ayam prayogaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tatra hi niṣkampe mahāhrade yadi agniḥ syāt prabhāsvaratayā pratyakṣaḥ eva syāt apratyakṣa tvāt eva vahneḥ abhāvāt kārya abhāvaḥ sādhyate svabhāva asiddhyeti svabhāva anupalabdhyā na tatra dhūmaḥ anupalabdheḥ iti upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya iti draṣṭavyam etena iti svabhāva anupalambha prayogeṇa vyāpakaḥ ca asau svabhāvaḥ ca tasya asiddhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ uktāḥ yathā na atra śiṃśapā vṛkṣa abhāvāt svabhāvaḥ eva vṛkṣa tvam śiṃśapā tu asya atas vṛkṣa tvena śiṃśapā vyāptā 
PVVṬ_40,3–40,4	 nanu ca svabhāva anupalabdhau= eva dṛśya niṣedhaḥ na tu viruddha upalabdhi ādau tathā hi adṛśyasya eva śīta sparśasya kāryasya ca adṛśyasya eva niṣedhaḥ sādhyate dṛśya tve hi svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva syāt tena yathā adṛśyasya śīta sparśa ādeḥ niṣedhaḥ tathā piśāca ādeḥ api syāt iti atas āha sarvatra ityādi etat uktam bhavati yathā svabhāva anupalabdhau= anyatra upalabdhasya ghaṭa ādeḥ pradeśa viśeṣe abhāvaḥ sādhyate tathā anyatra pratipanna virodhasya śīta sparśasya pratipanna kārya tvasya ca kāryasya viruddha upalabdhi ādinā sādhya dharmiṇī abhāvaḥ sādhyate na tu sarvadā adṛśyasya iti sarvatra iti vidhi mukhena pratiṣedha mukhena ca prayukta āyāma bhāva sādhanyām iti abhāvaḥ ca abhāva vyavahāraḥ ca abhāva śabdena uktaḥ 
PVVṬ_40,5	 teṣām api yeṣām abhāvena abhāvaḥ sādhyate teṣām kāraṇa ādīnām dṛśya ātmanām eva asiddhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ tad viruddhānām ca pratiṣedhya artha viruddha anāñca svabhāva viruddha ādīna aṃbdhi liṅga tvena veditavyā atra ca dṛśya ātmanām siddhiḥ iti na sambadhyate upalabdhi vacanāt eva dṛśya ātma tāyāḥ labdha tvāt kintu evam sambandhaḥ karttavyaḥ dṛśya ātmanān niṣedhya abhimatānām ye viruddhāḥ teṣām siddhiḥ iti kiṃṅkāraṇam anyeṣām adṛśya ātmanām kāraṇa ādīnām abhāva asiddheḥ adṛśyānām niṣedhya abhimatānām svabhāva viruddhāt iti virodha ādi asiddhiḥ yadi ityādi paraḥ śīta viruddhasya agneḥ kāryam dhūmasya upalabdhyā api abhāva siddhiḥ śītasya tad kāraṇa upalabdhyā tasya śīta viruddhasya agneḥ yat kāraṇaṃkāṣṭha ādiḥ tasya upalabdhyā kinna sidhyati śīta abhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_41,1^1	 tad viruddhasya ityādi ācāryaḥ tena śīta sparśena viruddhasya vahneḥ nimittam kāṣṭha ādiḥ tasya yā upalabdhiḥ prayujyate sā vyabhicāriṇī kadā nimittayoḥ viruddha tva abhāve sati agni śīta nimittayoḥ virodha abhāve sati udāharaṇam āha yathā ityādi atra hi kāṣṭha mātrasya dahana hetoḥ śīta nimittena tuṣāra ādinā virodha abhāvāt yat punar apratibaddha sāmarthyam agni janakam kāṣṭhantasya yadi api śīta nimittena virodhaḥ tathā api tathābhūtasya kāṣṭhasya kārya darśanāt eva niścayāt kārya virodhaḥ eva syāt nimittayoḥ punar virodhe gamikā eva ca kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ yathā na asya puṃsaḥ romaharṣa ādi viśeṣāḥ ādi śavdāt danta vīṇā kampa ādayaḥ 
PVVṬ_41,1^2	 viśeṣa grahaṇam śīta kāryāṇām parihāra artham piśāca ādi vikāra kṛtāḥ api hi te sambhavanti sannihitaḥ dahana viśeṣaḥ yasya puruṣasya sa tathā tad bhāvaḥ tasmāt atra api viśeṣa grahaṇam yathābhūtaḥ dahanaḥ roma harṣa ādi apanayana samarthaḥ tathābhūtasya parigraha artham atra hi paritāpa nimittasya dahanasya romaharṣa ādi nimittena śītena virodha usti tasmāt dahanaḥ sva viruddham śītam apanayan= tad kāryam api romaharṣa ādikam apanayati iti śīta sparśasya tad kāryasya ca romaharṣa ādeḥ parokṣa tve sati vahni darśanāt śīta kāraṇa nivṛttyā yadā romaharṣa ādeḥ nivṛttiḥ sādhya abhipretā tadā ayam prayogaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ 
PVVṬ_41,2	 etena kāraṇa viruddha udāharaṇena tad kāryāt api iti viruddhasya yat kāryantasmāt api tad viruddha kārya abhāva gatiḥ uktā iti yasya viruddhasya kāryam upalabhyate tena viruddhaḥ yaḥ dvitīyaḥ pratiyogī sa tad viruddhaḥ tasya yat kāryantasya abhāva gatiḥ uktāḥ yathā iti udāharaṇam roma harṣa ādi viśeṣaḥ yaḥ śīta kṛtaḥ tena yuktaḥ yaḥ puruṣaḥ sa yasmin pradeśevidyate sa tathā pradeśa upādānam dhūma ādityasya pakṣa dharma tva pratipādana artham puruṣe hi dharmiṇi na pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ syāt dhūmasya pradeśa dharma tvāt ayam ca prayogaḥ yatra vahniḥ śīta sparśaḥ roma harṣa ādi viśeṣaḥ ca parokṣaḥ tatra abhāva sādhane draṣṭavyaḥ tatra hi śīta viruddha agni kāryasya dhūmasya upalabdhyā agni viruddha śīta kāryasya roma harṣa ādeḥ abhāvaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ tena tathābhūtaḥ eva sādhyaḥ dhūmaḥ hi dahanam sannidhāpayati sa śītat nivartayati sa nivarttamānaḥ sva kāryam roma harṣa ādi kat nivarttayati iti arthāt kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhiḥ iyam 
PVVṬ_42,1–42,2	 iyanta t viruddha upalabdhi riti sambandhaḥ kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhiḥ iti arthaḥ hetu asiddhyā eva kāraṇa anupalabdhyā eva prāk eva nirdiṣṭā yasmāt anayoḥ api prayogayoḥ kāraṇa anupabdheḥ eva kārya abhāva gatiḥ tasmāt iyam kāraṇa anupalabdhyā eva uktā iti iyam ityādi maulena prabhedena caturvidhā api satī avāntara prayoga bhedāt aṣṭavidhā bhavati tathā hi svabhāva viruddha upalabdheḥ vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ prabhedaḥ uktaḥ svabhāva anupalabdheḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhiḥ kāraṇa viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ ca viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ tu eka prakāra iti aṣṭavidhā bhavati 
PVVṬ_42,3–42,4	 nanu ciravinaṣṭa īpi agnau vāsagṛha ādau dhūmasya sadbhāvāt katham viruddha kārya upalabdheḥ na vyabhicāraḥ iti atas āha tatra ityādi tatra viruddha kāryepi iṣṭam deśa kāla ādi apekṣaṇam na atra śītaḥ kasmiṃścid kāle yadā agniḥ vartamānībhūtaḥ iti kāla apekṣaṇam vyomni dhūmāt kutracid deśe na asti śītaḥ yatra sannihitaḥ vahniḥ yatoyam dhūmaḥ utthitaḥ iti deśa apekṣaṇam ādiṃśabdāt avasthā viśeṣa apekṣaṇam yovasthā viśeṣaḥ dhūmasya sannihita agneḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tam apekṣya varttamānepi kāle śīta abhāva unumīyate agniḥ atra dhūmāt iti kārya hetau= api deśa kāla ādi apekṣaṇam iṣṭam asya eva arthasya samuccaya arthaḥ api śabdaḥ 
PVVṬ_42,5	 nanu deśa kāla ādi apekṣi tvasya kārya hetu viśeṣaṇa tve asiddhaḥ hetuḥ syāt dharmiṇaḥ abhāvāt iti ced na pradeśaḥ eva dharmiṇi deśa kāla ādi apekṣi tvena gamaka tvāt iti ukta tvāt anyathā iti yadi na deśa ādi apekṣaṇantadā vyabhicāri viruddha kāryam syāt yathā bhasma anapekṣita deśa kālam aśīta sādhane śīta abhāve sādhye vyabhicāri tadvat evantā vat viruddha ādi upalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ iti pratipāditam 
PVVṬ_43,1–43,2	 yaḥ tarhi ityādi paraḥ sama guṇa iti sannihita anupahitena yathā kṣitivīja udaka ādi kāraṇa kalāpam dṛṣṭvā aṃkuraḥ kāryaḥ numīyate sa katham kāraṇa ākhyaḥ hetuḥ trividhe svabhāva kārya anupalambha ākhye hetau= antarbhavati na tāvat anupalabdhau vidhi sādhana tvāt kāraṇa svabhāva tvāt na kārya hetau artha antareṇa artha antarasya anumānāt na svabhāva hetau antarbhāvam āha 
PVVṬ_43,3	 hetunā ityādi samagreṇa iti yāvataḥ kāraṇa kalāpāt kāryam utpadyamānam dṛṣṭantāvatā na antya avasthā prāptena tatra liṅgi grahaṇāt prāk eva kāryasya pratyakṣa tvāt apratyakṣa tve vā antya avasthā niścaya ayogāt anumānam na ca yaḥ tān niścetum śakṣyati tasya anumāna m antyakṣaṇānām arvāc darśanena aniścayāt yaḥ kārya utpāda unumīyate sa hetoḥ svabhāvaḥ varṇitaḥ kutortha antara anapekṣa tvāt tena ayam arthaḥ kārya utpādana yogya tā mātra anubandhi tvāt svabhāva bhūtāḥ 
PVVṬ_43,4	 nanu yadā antya avasthā apekṣaḥ kārya utpādaḥ tadā katham anya anapekṣaḥ iti āha asau= api iti kārya utpādaḥ yathāsannihitaḥ yādṛśaḥ sannihitaḥ kāraṇa kalāpaḥ tādṛśāt sannihitāt na anyam artham apekṣate iti tādṛś mātra anubandhī svabhāvaḥ kasya bhāvaḥ samagrasya kāraṇa kalāpasya santāna apekṣayā etat ucyate na kṣaṇa apekṣayā janakaḥ kāraṇa kalāpa santānonapekṣaḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_43,5	 yadi api anapekṣaḥ kārya utpādaḥ tathā api artha antara tvāt katham svabhāvaḥ iti āha tatra ityādi yasmāt tatra samagreṣu kāraṇeṣu samagrāt kāraṇāt liṅgāt kārya utpattiḥ tathā anumīyate sambhavati asmāt iti sambhavaḥ kārya utpādana yogya tā anumīyate iti arthaḥ etat eva vyanakti samagrāṇām kārya utpādana yogya tā anumānāt iti yogyatā casāmagrī mātra anuvandhinī kāraṇa antara anapekṣa tvāt 
PVVṬ_44,1	 yadi tarhi kārya utpādana śaktiḥ tanmātra anuvandhinī niyataḥ tarhi kārya utpādaḥ iti saḥ eva kasmāt na anumīyate iti paraḥ pṛcchati kim punar sāmagryāḥ sakāśāt kāryam eva anumīyate iti atra āha sāmagrī ityādi sāmagryāḥ phalañca tāḥ śaktayaḥ ca iti sāmagrī phala śaktayaḥ tathā hi pūrvasmāt samagrāt uttarasya samarthasya kṣaṇasya utpattiḥ tasya ca ātmā atiśayaḥ śaktiḥ iti sāmagrī phalam śaktiḥ tāsām pariṇāmaḥ uttarottara prabandhena utpattiḥ tad anuvandhini tad apekṣiṇi kārye kāraṇena anumātavye anaikāntika tā kiṅkāraṇam pratibanadhasya sambhavāt 
PVVṬ_44,2–44,3	 tat vyācaṣṭe na hi ityādi samagrāṇi iti eva sannihitāni iti eva kāraṇa dravyāṇi sva kārya janayanti kiṅkāraṇam sāmagrī ityādi sāmagryāḥ sakāśāt janma yāsām śaktīnā antāsām uttarottara pariṇāmaḥ pūrvva pūru vakṣaṇāt uttarottara viśiṣṭa kṣaṇa utpādaḥ yaḥ tad apekṣa tvāt kārya utpādasya atra antare ca iti santāna pariṇāma kāle pratibandha sambhavāt nanu yogya tā api uttara uttara kṣaṇa pariṇāma prativaddhā tatra api ca pratibandha sambhavāt kathantad anumānam api iti āha yogyatāyāḥ tu ityādi dravya antara anapekṣa tvāt sannihita kāraṇa kalāpa vyatirekeṇa kāraṇa antara anapekṣa tvāt na virudhyate anumānam 
PVVṬ_44,4	 tat eva anumānam āha uttarottara ityādi pūrva pūrvakṣaṇam upādāya uttara samartha kṣaṇa utpādaḥ uttarottara śakti pariṇāmaḥ tena hetu bhūtena kārya utpādana samartha iti sādhya nirdeśaḥ iyam kāraṇa sāmagri iti dharmī śakti pariṇāma pratyayasya anyasya apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt iti hetuḥ śakteḥ pariṇāmasya yaḥ aparaḥ sahakāri pratyayaḥ tasya apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_45,1–45,2	 kutas tarhi śakteḥ prasavaḥ iti āha pūrva ityādi pūrva sajātiḥ sadṛśaḥ pūrvaḥ kāraṇa kalāpaḥ tāvat mātram hetuḥ yasyāḥ śakti prasūteḥ sā tathā tad bhāvaḥ tasmāt atas kāraṇāt sā yogyatā ananyā apekṣiṇī iti ucyate nanu kāryam prati kāraṇasya yogyatā yadi śaktiḥ ucyate tadā kārya vyabhicāre yogyatāyāḥ api vyabhicāraḥ iti katham etat anumānam atha yogyatāsambhavaḥ ucyate tadā ayam arthaḥ syāt kāryam syāt vā na vā iti tathā api katham asya anumānam sandehāt iti 
PVVṬ_45,3	 atra ucyate pareṇa hi katham etat anumānantrividha hetu janyam iti codyate yadi etat anumānampareṇa samarthyate tadā trividha liṅga jam eva ityā cā rye ṇa pratipādyate na tu etat parama artha tā anumānam iti evamparam etat iti eke athavā yadi ekāntena kārya utpādana yogya tā anumīyate tadā vyabhicārāt anumānam na syāt yadā tu kadācid kāryam syāt iti evaṃrūpaḥ sambhavonumīyate tadā katham asya vyabhicāraḥ tena ayam arthaḥ uttarottara pariṇāme yadi prabandha abhāvaḥ tadā kāryam syāt anyadā tu na asti iti para ukte tu ekāntena kārya anumāne vyabhicāraḥ eva 
PVVṬ_45,4	 anye tu pariṇāmavatyām sāmagryām pratibandhaka abhāve sati ekāntena kārya utpādana yogya tā bhavati iti sā eva anumīyate kārya utpādana yogya tā pratītiḥ ca kāryam api viśeṣaṇa tvena ākṣipati iti na pṛthak kārya anumānam kriyate iti manyante kevalam sāmagrī mātrāt kārya anumāne vyabhicāraḥ ucyate pratibandhaka abhāvaḥ katham pratipannaḥ iti ced satyam yaḥ hi tam jñātum śaknoti tasya etat anumānam yaḥ hi dhūmasya agni janya tvam jñātum śaknoti tasya dhūmāt agni anumānam na anyasya tadvat 
PVVṬ_45,5	 yā tarhi ityādinā punar api tridhā eva saḥ iti asya vyāghātam āha akārya kāraṇa bhūtena anumeyāt arthāt anyena asvabhāvena rasa ādinā ādi śabdāt gandha ādinā rūpa ādi gatiḥ atra api ādi śabdāt sparśa ādi grahaṇam andhakāre hi mātuluṅga ādi rasam āsvādya campaka gandham āghrāya vahneḥ ca sparśam anubhūya teṣām rūpa sāmānyam anumīyate tathā vahni rūpam dṛṣṭvā tad sparśaḥ sā kathantrividhe hetau= antarbhavati iti prakṛte 
PVVṬ_46,1	 na ca apramāṇam iyantataḥ liṅga antara prasaṃgaḥ iti āha sā api ityādi sā api gatiḥ iti sambandhaḥ rūpa ādeḥ kimviśiṣṭasya ekasāmagrī adhīnasya rasasya janikā yā sāmagrī tasyām eva sāmagryām āyattasya rasataḥ liṅga ādyāḥ gatiḥ sā hetu dharma anumānena rasasya yaḥ hetuḥ pūrvam apāda anantasya yaḥ dharmom rūpa janakatvantasya anumānena tena ayam arthaḥ rasāt sakaśāt tad hetorasa samāna kāla bhāvi rūpa janaka tvat niścīyate evam hi tasya rasa samāna kāla bhāvi rūpa janaka tvam niścīyate yadi samāna kāla bhāvinaḥ rūpasya api niścayaḥ syāt tena atīta eka kālānām ekā eva gatiḥ kārya liṅga jāḥ 
PVVṬ_46,2^1	 nanu anabhihitāt rasa hetoḥ sakāśāt paścāt samāna kālasya rupasya anumānam hetoḥ kārya anumāne vyabhicārāt kārya utpādana yogya tā anumāne ca na rasa samāna kālasya rūpasya anumānam syāt anumita anumāna pratīteḥ abhāvāt ca tena yat ucyate yadā atītānām gatiḥ tadā kāryaḥ ca tad liṅgaḥ ca tasmāt jātā iti kārya liṅga jāḥ yadā tu samāna kālān āṅgatiḥ tadā kāryam liṅgam yasya hetu dharma anumānasya tad kārya liṅgantasmāt jātā kārya liṅga jā iti tad apāstam tatra pare mā ca avaya vi dravye rūpa ādayaḥ guṇāḥ vyavasthitāḥ tena tatra rūpa ādeḥ asatas gatiḥ yuktā na bau ddhā nām rūpa ādi vyatirekeṇa avayavinaḥ anabhyupagamāt na dharmiṇaḥ abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_46,2^2	 dharmiṇam antareṇa ca anumāne rasataḥ rūpa ādeḥ sarvatra anumāna prasaṅgāt asamudāyaḥ ca sādhyaḥ syāt apakṣa dharmaḥ ca hetuḥ syāt na api hetu dharma anumānam yujyate rūpa ādi kārya tvena rasa ādeḥ apratipanna tvāt na ca kṣaṇika pakṣam aniścitya evam ucyate kṣaṇika tve hi rūpa ādeḥ samāna jātīya kārya tvam syāt na rasa ādi kārya tvam pratibandha grāhaka abhāvāt na kṣaṇānām anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ sambandha aniścayāt santāna āśrayeṇa tu anumāna ādi vyavahāre rūpa ādi santānānām na parasparam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratipannaḥ iti katham anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ iti 
PVVṬ_46,3–46,4	 evam manyate na sarva trarasāde rūpa ādi anumānam api tu āmra ādau dharmiṇi tatra ca rūpa ādīnām paraspara avinirbhāgarbhāga niyamaḥ pratīyate eva sa ca pratibandha hetukaḥ anyathā ghaṭa paṭa ādīnām api paraspara avinirbhāga niyamaḥ syāt pratibandhaḥ ca teṣām na tādātmyam bhedena pratīteḥ na api tad utpattiḥ samāna kāla tvāt na ca eka artha samavāyaḥ teṣām yatas na tāvat asamavetānām samavāya balāt eka artha samavāyaḥ samavāyasya eva abhāvāt atiprasaṅgāt ca samavetānām api kim samavāyena sva hetubhyaḥ eva tathā niṣpatteḥ tathā niṣpattya eva vācya abhidhānāt gamaka tvam tasmāt ekasāmagrī adhīna tvam pratibandhaḥ niścita pratibandhasya ca anyasmin kālenumānam yadi api ca atra avayavī ma vidyate tathā api āmra ādi pratyaya viṣayasya dharmi tvantena tatra rasataḥ rūpa ādi gatiḥ nanu tathā api katham eṣām ekasāmagrī adhīna tvam yatas yena eva svabhāvena rūpaṃrūpam janayati na tena eva rasa ādikam janayati teṣām paraspara abheda prasaṃgāt na api anyena anyam janayati tasya svabhāva bheda prasaṃgāt 
PVVṬ_47,1	 na eṣa doṣaḥ yasmāt na tatra rūpasya pūrvvam eka kārya janaka tvam yena āyan doṣaḥ syāt kintu eka kālam aneka kārya janaka tvam eva tatas tasya eva utpatti darśanāt na ca kāraṇasya kārya abhāvaḥ eva kāraṇa tvam yena anekam ekasmāt utpadyamānam ekam prasajyeta kintu kārya utpattau prāgbhāvaḥ eva tasya kāraṇa tvam loke yathā ca eka kārya utpattau tasya prāgbhāva kāraṇa tvan tathā kalāpa utpattau= api dṛṣṭa tvāt yat vā yena eva svabhāvena rūpam rūpam janayati tena eva rasa ādikam api svarūpa bhedaḥ tu eṣām upādāna bheda kṛtaḥ na sahakāri kṛtaḥ tathā hi vāyau sparśa sadbhāvepi rūpa ādi abhāvāt rūpa ādi anutpattiḥ agnau ca rūpa ādi sadbhāvepi rasa abhāvāt rasa anutpattiḥ apsu rasa ādi bhāvepi gandha abhāvāt gandhān utpattiḥ tena rasa ādeḥ niyatam kāraṇam rasa ādiḥ evāvasīyate niyatam ca kāraṇam upādāna kāraṇam samāna jātīyam abhinna santāna vartti vā tasmāt upādāna kāraṇa bhedāt rūpa ādīnām svabhāva bhedaḥ 
PVVṬ_47,2–47,3	 yat punar ucyate tatra aneka śaktīnām samuccayaḥ tena rūpam ekayā śaktyā rūpam janayati anyānyayā rasa ādikam iti tat ayuktam aneka śakti dvāreṇa api ekasya aneka kārya kāraṇa abhyupagame aneka tva prasaṅgaḥ anivāritaḥ eva bhāvasya aneka śaktīnām eva aneka svabhāva tvāt abhinna tvāt ca śaktīnām śakti bhede rūpasya bheda prasaṅgaḥ bhede vā śaktīnām rūpasya ākāraka tva prasaṅgāt na ca śakti yogāt kāraka tvam aśaktasya śakti yoga abhāvāt śaktasya api kim śakti yogena sva rūpeṇa eva kāraka tvāt śakteḥ ca kāraka tvam na syāt śakti yoga abhāvāt atha śakti tvāt na sā śaktim apekṣate bhāvopi tarhi śakta tvāt kim iti śaktim apekṣate 
PVVṬ_47,4–47,6	 yopi mī mām sa kaḥ manyate bhāvasya svarūpa atiśayaḥ eva śaḥ ktiḥ sā ca bhinna abhinnā yatas bhāve gṛhyamāṇe śaktiḥ na gṛhyate atas bhāvāt bhinnā kāryānyathā anupapattyā tu sā bhāvasya abhinnā anyathā bhāvasya kāraka tvat na syāt tat uktam śaktayaḥ sarva bhāvānām kārya arthāpatti kalpitāḥ iti sā upi nirastaḥ ekasyāḥ śakteḥ bhinna abhinna rūpa tva virodhāt kim ca artha āpattyā kāryāt prāgbhāvinaḥ eva bhāvasya abhinnā śaktiḥ kalpyatām iti prāgbhāvaḥ eva śaktiḥ sa ca pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti katham na śaktiḥ pratyakṣāḥ kevalam sā kārya darśanāt niścīyate tasmāt kāryāt rasa ādeḥ kāraṇa dharma anumānāt asya kārya hetau= antarbhāvaḥ dhūmeḥ adhana vikāra vat iti yathā dhūmāt agni ādi sāmagrī anumitau bhasma aṅgāra ādi in dhana vikāra anumitiḥ tadvat 
PVVṬ_48,1	 nanu ca rasa kāryeṇa anumitāt kāraṇāt sakāśāt samāna kālinaḥ kāryasya anumānam idam na tu hetu dharma anumānam iti atas āha tatra iti rasāt rūpe pratipattau hetuḥ eva tathābhūtaḥ iti rūpa janana sambandha unumīyate yasmin= anumīyamāne kārya antaram api tad viśeṣaṇat niścitam bhavati na tu anumitāt kāraṇāt paścāt kārya antaram anumeyam kutas iti āha hi yasmāt pravṛttā na pratibaddhā śaktiḥ yasya tat pravṛtta śakti tathābhūtam ca tad rūpa upādāna kāraṇam ca iti tathā uktam tasya sahakāri pratyayaḥ san rasa hetuḥ rasam janayati tathābhūte ca hetau= anumiterthāt rūpa anumānam rūpa rasayoḥ eka sāmagrī adhīna tvāt indhana vikāra viśeṣaḥ bhasma aṅgāra ādiḥ tasya upādānam kāṣṭham tasya sahakāri pratyaya ugniḥ tasya yathā dhūma jananantena tulyanta dvat rūpa rasayoḥ eka sāmagrī adhīna tvam 
PVVṬ_48,2	 tathā hi ityādinā samarthayate śakti pravṛttā iti sūtram asya vyākhyānam sva kāraṇasya ityādi sva kāraṇasya iti rasasya yat sva kāraṇantasya phala utpādanam pratīti rasa utpādanam pratyābhimukhyena anuguṇyena vinā na rasaḥ utpadyate sā eva iti śakti pravṛttaḥ anya kāraṇam iti asya vyākhyānam rūpa upādāna ityādi rūpasya ye upādāna hetavaḥ pūrva lakṣaṇa saṅgṛhītāḥ rūpa paramāṇavaḥ teṣām rūpa jana nam prati ābhimukhyam pravṛttiḥ tasyāḥ kāraṇam rasa hetunā eva sahakāriṇā rūpa upādānasya sva kāryam pratyābhimukhyāt sā api rasa upādāna kāraṇa pravṛttiḥ rūpa upādāna kāraṇasya rūpa jananam prati yā pravṛttiḥ tayā saha karttu śīlam yasyāḥ rasa upādāna kāraṇa pravṛtteḥ sā tathā uktā yatas evantasmāt yathābhūtāt hetoḥ iti pravṛtta śakti rūpa upādāna kāraṇa sahitāt pūrvakṣaṇa saṃgṛhītāt rasāt liṅga tvena abhimataḥ rasaḥ utnnaḥ tathābhūtam eva hetum anum āpayan gamayan samāna kālaṃrūpam gamayati tena ayam arthaḥ hetu niścayaḥ eva īdṛśaḥ na anyaḥ 
PVVṬ_49,1	 na punar anumitāt kāraṇāt paścāt kārya anumānam yatas ca kārya janaka tvena eva hetu dharma niścayaḥ na anyathā tena eva āha iti tatra api ityādi iti anena dvāreṇa tatra api rasa āde rūpa ādi anumāne atītānām eka kālānām ca gatiḥ rasa upādāna samāna kāla bhāvinaḥ atītāḥ liṅga bhūta rasa sahabhāvinaḥ eka kālāḥ teṣa aṅgatiḥ nā anāgatānām varttamānena liṃgena anumānam vyabhicārāt anāgatam hi kāraṇa antara pratibaddhan tatra pratibandha vaikalya sambhavāt na bhavet api yat ca ādya udayāt śvas sūrya udaya ādi anumānan na tad anumānam niyāma kaliṅga abhāvāt adya gardabha darśanāt śvas sūrya udaya anumāna vat tasmāt iyam api rasāde rūpa ādi gatiḥ kārya liṅga jā iti anumānam yatas ca sa adhya āyattatvena hetuḥ gamakaḥ tena kāraṇena trividhāt hetoḥ na anyaḥ hetuḥ saṃyogi ādiḥ gamakosti kasmāt tādātmya tad utpattibhyām liṅginya pratibaddha svabhāvasya avinā abhāva niyama abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_49,2	 etat uktam bhavati na tāvat aśliṣṭānām saṃyoga usti śliṣṭānām api kim saṃyogena sva hetubhyaḥ eva śliṣṭānām utpatteḥ tasmāt na saṃyoga vaśāt gamaka tvam apratibaddha tvāt ghaṭa ghaṭayoḥ iva tathā pṛthak siddhānāt na samavāyaḥ apṛthak siddhānām api kim samavāyena sva hetubhyaḥ eva upari upari bhāvena niṣpatteḥ tena na samavāyena api gamaka tvam sa adhya āyat tatva abhāvāt na ca samavāya usti iti vakṣyati atas eva eka artha samavāyinoḥ abhāvaḥ iti pūrvam eva uktam rasa ādi anumāne virodhī ca anupalabdhau= antar bhāvitaḥ 
PVVṬ_49,3	 yat ca nai yā yi koktam pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam ca anumānaṃnyāya sūtram tatra pūrvavat kāraṇāt kārya anumānam tat ca vyabhicāri iti pratipāditam śeṣavat anumānam ca kāryāt kāraṇa anumānam tat iṣṭam eva śāstra kṛtāḥ sāmānyatas dṛṣṭantu anumānam yat anyatra dharmiṇi sādhya sādhanayoḥ vyāptindṛṣṭvā anyatra anumānam yathā devadattasya deśa antara prāptim gati pūrvikām dṛṣṭvā adityasya api deśa antara prāptyā gati anumānam etat api kārya liṅga jam eva deśa antara prāpteḥ gati kārya tvāt sarvam eva anumānam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam eva iti svayam evā cā ryan= tṛtīye paricchede vakṣyati 
PVVṬ_49,4–50,2	 yat apyu dyaḥ te kaḥ re ṇa sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam udāhṛtam yathā valākātaḥ toya anumā anantat api kārya liṅga jam eva iti pra mā ṇa vi ni śca ye abhihitam tasmāt hetu traya vyatirekeṇa na anyaḥ hetuḥ gamakosti iti sthitam etena iti rasāde rūpa ādi anumānasya kārya liṅga ja tva kathanena pipīlikā utsara ṇanta āsām gṛhīta aṇḍānām anyatra sañcaraṇam matsyānām udvarttanam matsya vikāraḥ ādi śabdāt vidyut vikāsa maṇḍūka ruta ādi parigrahaḥ varṣa ādi anumānam iti atra api ādi śabdāt vāta ādi anumānam uktam yathā tat api kārya liṅga ja hetu dharma anumānāt 
PVVṬ_50,3–50,4	 etat eva āha tatra api ityāda tatra api pipīlika utsaraṇa ādau bhūta pariṇāmaḥ eva varṣa hetuḥ iti eva kāraḥ bhinnakramaḥ varṣa hetuḥ eva bhūta pariṇāmaḥ pipīlikā saṃkṣobha ādeḥ utsaraṇa ādi lakṣaṇasya hetuḥ tasmāt yathābhūtāt bhūta pariṇāmāt varṣa hetuḥ pipīlikā ādīnām vikāraḥ jātaḥ tathābhūtasya hetoḥ anumānāt samāna kāla varṣa ādi anumānam anyatra tu yogyatā anumīyate na tu varṣaḥ eva pratibandha sambhavena vyabhicārāt tasmāt samagrāt api kāraṇa kalāpāt na asti kārya anumānam kevalam yogya tā anumānam eva ye tu mī mām sa kā dayaḥ asamagrāt api kāraṇāt kāryam anumimate te atyanta nyāya bahiṣkṛtāḥ iti etat darśayan= āha 
PVVṬ_50,5^1	 hetunā tu asamagreṇa ityādi asamagreṇa iti vikalena śeṣavat anumānam anaikāntikam iti arthaḥ kutosāmarthyāt asya vyākhyānam samagrāṇi eva hi ityādi kāryasya tāvat sarvathā na anumānam yogyatām api anumāpayanti samagrāṇi eva anumāpayanti iti etat api śabdena āha asamagrasya ekāntena asāmarthyāt iti uttarottara pariṇāmena api asāmarthyāt na pākṣikam api kārya anumānam dehāt rāga anumāna vat iti asya udāharaṇasya vyākhyānam yathā ityādi dehaḥ ca indriyāṇi ca buddhayaḥ ca iti dvandvaḥ rāga ādi mānayam puruṣaḥ dehavat tvāt indriyavat tvāt buddhimat tvāt evandeha ādibhyaḥ rāga ādi anumānam ādi śabdāt dveṣa moha ādi parigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_50,5^2	 sūtre tu deha rāga grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam na hi indriyā ādi eva kāraṇam rāga ādeḥ yasmāt ātma ātmīya abhiniveśa pūrvakā rāga ādayaḥ ātmani ātmīye ca aham mama iti yobhi niveśaḥ sa pūrvaḥ kāraṇam yeṣām rāga ādīna antena tathā uktāḥ ayoniśaḥ iti ādyasya eva samarthanam yoniḥ padārthānām anitya duḥkha an ātma ādi samyak darśana prasati hetu tvāt tam śaṃsati ālambataḥ itiyoniśas yonim yonim manaskaroti iti saṃkhyā eka vacanāt ca vīpsāyām iti śas pratyayaḥ vā tathābhūtaḥ ca asau manaskāraḥ ca iti yoni śoma naskāraḥ nairātmya jñānam tad viruddham ātma ādi jñānam ayoni śomanaskāraḥ tad pūrvaka tvāt sarva rāga ādi doṣa utpatteḥ 
PVVṬ_51,1	 nanu deha indriya buddhayopi rāga ādinām hetavaḥ tad rahiteṣu rāga ādi adarśanāt iti āha deha ādīnām hetu tvepi iti kevalānām iti a yoni śoma naskāra rahitānām rāga ādau sādhye rāga ādi rahitāḥ upala khaṇḍa ādayaḥ vipakṣaḥ tatra hetuḥ deha ādimattvasya yā vṛttiḥ tasyāa dṛṣṭau= api viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt śeṣa vat anumānam asmāt ca saṃśayaḥ bhavatina niścayaḥ yathā ca etat anantara uktam na pramāṇan tathā vipakṣe hetoḥ adṛṣṭi mātreṇa kārya sāmānyasya kārya mātrasya darśanāt hetu jñānam viśiṣṭa kāraṇa anumānaṃpramāṇa ābham pramāṇa ābhāsam anaikāntikam iti yāvat kim iva vacanāt rāgita ādi vat 
PVVṬ_51,2	 nanu sarvam eva vacanaṃrāga ādi kāryam iti kathantad kārya sāmānyam iti atas āha na hi ityādi oṣṭhayoḥ calanam spandaḥ vacana kāle ca tasya avaśyaṃbhāvāt ādi śabdāt anyasya api vacana kāla bhāvinaḥ mukha vikāra ādeḥ grahaṇam aviśiṣṭa vivakṣā mātram vaktu kāma tā sāmānyantadeva hetuḥ yeṣām spanda ādīna ante tathā uktāḥ tad bhāvaḥ tasmāt sā eva vaktu kāma tā rāgaḥ iti ced āsakti rūpa tvāt rāgasya iti manyate ā cā ryaḥ āha iṣṭa tvāt na kiṃcid bādhitam vaktu kāma tā kāryasya vacanasya iṣṭa tvāt na kiñcid aniṣṭam na ca vaktu kāma tā rāgaḥ api tu nitya sukha ātmā ātmīya ākāram yad darśanam abhiniveśaḥ tena ākṣiptam janitam sa āsrava dharma viṣayam iti pañca upādāna skandha ālambanam cetasā ubhiṣu aṅgam rāgam āhuḥ vidvāṃsaḥ 
PVVṬ_52,1^1	 syāt matam vīta rāga abhimatānām maitrī karuṇā ādayaḥ iṣyante te ca satva ālambana tvāt ātma ādi darśana pravṛttāḥ sattva anunaya pravṛttyā ca abhiṣvaṅga svabhāvāḥ tatas vīta rāgāḥ api rāgiṇaḥ prasaktā iti atas āha na evam karuṇā ādayaḥ iti na sattva ālambanāḥ vīta rāgāṇām karuṇā ādayaḥ anyathā api sambhavāt dharma ālambanānām api sambhavātetat ca anantaram eva nivedayiṣyāmaḥ atra vacanāt rāga anumāne kriyamāṇe vacana mātrāt apratipattiḥ iti anena sambandhaḥ yasmāt yathā raktaḥ bravīti tathā viraktā upīti prakṣīṇa rāga upi na vacana mātrāt rāga anumānam kintarhi vacana viśeṣāt 
PVVṬ_52,1^2	 yaḥ rāgeṇa eva janyate iti āha na api viśeṣāt iti kiṅkāraṇam abhiprāyasya durbodha tvāt viraktaḥ hi rakta vat ceṣṭate raktopi virakta vat iti abhiprāyaḥ durbodhaḥ tatas ca vyavahāra saṃkareṇa sarveṣām iti vacanānām vacana mātrasya vacana viśeṣasya ca rāga ādeḥ liṅga tvena upanītasya vyabhicārāt na viśeṣāt api rāga ādi anumānam yat uktan tathā viraktaḥ bravīti iti tatra uttaram āśaṃkate prayojana ityādi vacana uccāraṇam vyava hāraḥ na hi vīta rāgasya vacana uccāraṇe phalam asti tathā ca avyabhicāraḥ rāga vacanayoḥ iti bhāvaḥ na ityā cā ryaḥ na prayojana abhāvaḥ para artha tvāt vyāhārasya 
PVVṬ_52,2	 na yuktaḥ ityādi paraḥ vīta rāgaḥ hi pareṣṭa vyāsaktaḥ na ca saktim antareṇa para artha pravṛttiḥ asti iti bhāvaḥ na etat evam karuṇayā api pravṝtteḥ sā eva karuṇā rāgaḥ iti ced tat etat iṣṭam karuṇā rāgaḥ iti nāmakaraṇam sattva darśana viparyāsa āyāta tvāt karuṇā api rāga ātmakaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced āha aviparyāsa ityādi aviparyāsa udbhava tva meva āha asati api ātma grahaṇaḥ ityādi duḥkha viśeṣa darśana mātreṇa iti saṃskāra duḥkha tā nirūpaṇa mātreṇa abhyāsa bala utpāditā iti pūrva pūrvasa jātī ya kṣaṇa utpannā bhavati eva karuṇā āgamena api saṃsyandayan= āha tathā hi ityādi ādi śabdāt anālambanāḥ gṛhyante sattva ālambanā pṛthagjanānām dharma ālambanāḥ āryāṇām anālambanāḥ grāhya grāhaka abhiniveśa vigatānām buddha bodhisattvānām maitrī ādayaḥ maitrī karuṇām udita upekṣāiṣyante siddhānte 
PVVṬ_53,1–53,2	 nanu ca sattva ālambanāḥ eva pṛthagjanena abhyastāḥ tāḥ tat katham dharma ādi ālambanāḥ ucyante iti atas āha etāḥ ca maitrī karuṇām udita upekṣāḥ sajātīya abhyāsa vṛttayaḥ pūrva pūrva sadṛśa kṣaṇa balena utpatteḥ etāvān= tu viśeṣaḥ yāvat sattvam paśyati tāvat sattva ālambanāḥ yāvat dharmantāvat dharma ālambanāḥ na rāga apekṣiṇyaḥ iti na anuśayena sattveṣu pravarttante iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_53,3–53,4	 nanu duḥkha viśeṣa darśana mātreṇa abhyāsa bala utpādinī iti anantaram eva ayam arthaḥ uktaḥ satyam karuṇām eva āśritya adhunā sarvāṇi eva iti viśeṣaḥ ātma darśana nivṛttau= api tarhi karuṇā vat abhyāsāt rāga ādayaḥ pravarttante iti āha na evam rāgāt ayassajātīya abhyāsa vṛttayaḥ yena ātma dṛṣṭi nivṛttau= api pravartteran ātma ādi viparyāsa abhāve abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_53,5	 kāruṇikasya niṣphalaḥ para arthe ārambhaḥ aviparyāsāt ātma ādi abhiniveśa abhāvena sva arthasya eva abhāvāt na ayan doṣaḥ para arthasya eva phala tvena iṣṭa tvāt iṣṭaḥ nāma parārthaḥ tathā api katham phala tvam iti ced āha icchā ityādi icchayā lakṣyate iti icchā lakṣaṇam icchā viṣaya tvāt iti arthaḥ yat iṣṭan tat phalam iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_53,6–53,7	 nanu aham iti buddhi rahitasya katham parārthā api pravṛttiḥ iti ced na akliṣṭā jñāna sadbhāvāt pravṛttiḥ iti eke yoga balena śuddha laukika citta sammukhīkaraṇāt iti apare vineyānām tathā pratibhāsanāt iti anye sarvathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ yadi vacanāt vīta rāgasya vaktu kāma tā sādhyate atha karuṇā tena sa rāgaḥ iti ucyate sarvathā abhūta asamāropāt vīta rāga ādiḥ nirdoṣaḥ doṣa svabhāvasya rāga ādeḥ avaśya bhāvāt tad anyena rāga āt ibhyonyena vaktu kāma tā ādinā vīta rāgasya doṣavat tva sādhane na kiṃcid aniṣṭam 
PVVṬ_54,1	 syāt matiḥ vaktari ātmani rāga ādiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tatas sa pakṣe sattva darśana mātreṇa vīta rāga abhimateṣu api anumānam bhaviṣyati iti āha vaktari ātmani ityādi anyatra tad anumāna eti vīta rāga abhimate rāga ādi anumāne ati prasaṃgaḥ vaktari ātmani yāvān kaścid viśeṣaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasya sarvasya anyatra anumāna prasaṅgaḥ ātmani dṛṣṭasya śyāma gaura tā ādi lakṣaṇasya viśeṣasya vyabhicārāt ananya anumānaḥ iti rāgāt anyasya ātma gatasya viśeṣasya anumāne iha iti sādhya abhimate rāga ādau= api avyabhicāraḥ iti kaḥ niścayaḥ na eva kaścid pratibandha abhāvāt rāga vacanayoḥ yasmāt ātma nidarśanāt na anumānantasmāt karaṇa karaṇa guṇaḥ tālu ādīnām pāṭava ādiḥ sa ca vaktu kāma tā ca iti dvandvaḥ dvitīyāt vivacanam eva etat rāga utpādana yogya tāra hita īpāṣāṇa ādau vacana adarśanāt sā eva vacanāt avasīyate iti āha rāga ityādi tad anumāna eti yogya tā anumāne ati prasaṃgaḥ tathā hi yathā pāṣāṇa ādau rāga utpādana yogya tā virahaḥ tathā sarva puruṣa dharmaiḥ api tatas tathābhūte vacana adarśanāt yadi rāga utpādana yogya tā anumānam evam sarva puruṣa dharmasya 
PVVṬ_54,2	 atha matam rāga utpādana yogya tā hi rāga vacanayoḥ ekaṅkāraṇantadanu māne ca rāga upyarthatonumitaḥ bhavati tena yogyatā eva anumānam na sarveṣām puruṣa dharmāṇām iti atra āha rāgasya ityādi rāgasya anupayoge vacanam prati tālu ādi vyāpārāt eva śabda niṣpateḥ kathantad śaktiḥ rāga śaktiḥ vacanaṃpratyupayujyate atha tālu ādi vyāpāra kāle rāga śakteḥ api vacanam prati upayogaḥ iṣyate tatas ca adya varṇṇa niṣpatti kāle rāgasya api niṣpattiḥ eka sāmagrī adhīna tvāt tasya ca rāgasya santāna vāhi tvan tathā ca dvitīya ādi varṇṇa niṣpatau rāgaḥ eva upayukta ssyāt tat āha śakti upayoge hi saḥ eva upayuktaḥ syāt iti na ca rāgasya upayoga usti iti uktaṃprāc 
PVVṬ_54,3	 athavā ātma ātmīya abhiniveśa rahitānām rāgasya anupayoge vacanaṃprati katham tat śaktiḥ rāga śaktiḥ vāsana ākhyātma ātmīya abhiniveśa lakṣaṇā vacanam prati upayujyate vīta rāgāṇām ātma ādi abhiniveśasya abhāvāt śakti upayoge hi vacanam prati saḥ eva rāgaḥ upayuktaḥ syāt ātma ādi abhiniveśavatām sarveṣām eva rāgi tvāt tat ca rāgasya vacanaṃpratyupayogi tvat na asti iti uktam vaktu kāma tā sāmānya hetu tva āditi atra antare 
PVVṬ_55,1^1	 tasmāt ityādi nigamanam na āntarīyakam eva iti kāraṇena avinā abhāvi eva tad pratibandhāt tatra kāraṇe āyatta tvāt na anyat apratibaddham vipakṣe hetoḥ adarśana īpi arvāk darśanasya adarśana mātreṇa aniścayāt sarva darśinaḥ tu darśana nivṛttyā syāt niścayaḥ tasya hi sarvajñeya vyāpi jñānam etat eva āha sarva darśanaḥ ityādi kimpunar adarśana mātrāt na abhāva niścayaḥ iti āha kvacid tathā ityādi tena prakāreṇa dṛṣṭānāṃprāk punar deśa kāla saṃskāra bhedena iti bheda śabdasya pratyekam sambandhaḥ saṃskāraḥ kṣīra avaseka ādiḥ pūrva dṛṣṭa prakārāt anyathā syāt kim iva iti āha yathā āmalakyā eti 
PVVṬ_55,1^2	 saṃskāra bhedasya etat udāharaṇan na ca evamba hulam iti na madhura phalāḥ bahulandṛśyante kaṣāya phalānām bāhulyena darśanāt na ca idānīm bahulam madhura phalānām adarśanāt kvacid sambhavinaḥ madhura phalasya pratikṣepaḥ tathā deśa bhedena piṇḍa kharjjūrasya sambhavaḥ kāla bhedena puṣpa ādeḥ āmalakī dṛṣṭāntena ca etat āha yathā āmalakyaḥ kṣīra ādi saṃskārāt anyathā bhavanti tathā rāga ādi yogyaḥ citta santānaḥ tattva abhyāsa abhisaṃskārāt yogyaḥ bhavati abhyāsāt ca nairātmya ālambanam eva vijñānam spaṣṭa abhamvaiḥ a ārāgyam ucyate nairātmya darśanāt ātma ādi abhiniveśa vigamena rāga ādi anutpatteḥ 
PVVṬ_55,1^3	 sarva dharma kṣaṇika tva ādi ālambanam ca jñānam spaṣṭa ābham sarvajña tvam ca ucyate sarva ajñāna vigamāt tasmāt tattva abhyāsa nimittā sphuṭa ābha tva bṛddhiḥ eva tattva sākṣātkaraṇena pratyakṣa tva kāriṇī rāga ādi yogya svabhāva tām jñānasya bādhate tatas ca anyathādṛṣṭam api hetu balāt anyathā bhavet api tena yadi nāma rāgā rahite kvacid vacanam na dṛṣṭantāvatā sarvatra vīta rāge vacanena na bhāvyam iti na asti niścayaḥ tatas ca aniścita vyatirekāt vacana mātrāt na rāgadi anumānam yatas evantena kāraṇena etat yuktam vaktum mādṛśaḥ vaktā yoham iva ayoni śoma naskārān 
PVVṬ_55,1^4	 tat eva āha rāga utpatti ityādi kaḥ punar asau= iti āha ātmā ityādi ātma darśanam sa tkā yaḥ dṛ ṣṭiḥ nitya sukha ādi viparyāsaḥ ayoniśaḥ manaskāraḥ dvandva samāsaḥ ca ayam ātma darśanam eva ayoni śoma naskāraḥ iti viśeṣaṇa samāsovāḥ tadā iti mādṛśaḥ vaktā iti viśeṣaṇa īpya pārthakaḥ vacana udāhāraḥ vacana āditi asya hetoḥ udāharaṇam anarthakam iti arthaḥ tadā hi yaḥ mādṛśaḥ rāga utpatti pratyaya viśeṣeṇa yuktaḥ sa rāgī yathā aham iti ayam eva hetuḥ syāt yatas evam adarśana mātrāt na asti niścayaḥ tasmāt vipakṣe adṛṣṭiḥ vipakṣe hetoḥ adarśanam ahetuḥ liṅgasya vyatireka niścayam prati 
PVVṬ_56,1–56,2	 syāt matiḥ vipakṣa dṛṣṭyā hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ na ca vīta rāge vacanam dṛṣṭantasmāt adarśanāt sādhya abhāve vyatirekaḥ siddhaḥ iti atas āha na ca adarśana mātreṇa iti vipakṣe hetoḥ avyabhicāritā kasmāt mambhāvi avyabhicāra tvāt sambhāvyaḥ vyabhicāraḥ yasya sa tathā tad bhāvaḥ tasmāt yadi api na dṛṣṭaḥ vipakṣe tathā api tatra sambhavaḥ na viruddhaḥ iti saṃmbhāvyate vyabhicāraḥ sthālī antargatāḥ taṇḍulāḥ sthālī taṇḍulāḥ teṣām pāka vat 
PVVṬ_56,3	 etam eva dṛṣṭāntam samarthayitum āha na hi ityādi bāhulyena sthālī antargatānā aṃpakvānān darśanepi na sthālī antargata tvena kevalena pākaḥ sidhyati mātra grahaṇantu viśeṣa nirāsa artham yat vakṣyati evantu syāt iti kutas asiddhiḥ vyabhicārasya darśanāt evaṃsvabhāvāḥ iti ye pakvāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ taiḥ tulya svabhāvāḥ etaiḥ eva pakvaiḥ samānaḥ pāka hetuḥ yeṣa ante pakvāḥ iti anyathā tu iti asati etasmin viśeṣaṇe śeṣostīti śeṣa vat anirṇṇītaḥ viṣaya uḥ ti iti yāvat tat ca vyabhicāri 
PVVṬ_56,4	 kinnaiḥ yā yi kaḥ ktam kāryāt kāraṇa anumāna rūpam śeṣavat anumānam iha abhipretamuta anyadeva iti pṛcchati kiṃpunar ityādi śeṣavat svarūpam āha yasya ityādi yasya hetoḥ adarśana mātreṇa apramāṇakena vipakṣa vyatirekaḥ prasādhyate tasya hetoḥ saṃśaya hetu tvāt saṃśaya kāri tvāt śeṣavat tad anumānam udāhṛtam kiṅkāraṇantasya hetoḥ sa vyatirekaḥ aniścitaḥ iti vipakṣepi vṛttiḥ āśaṃkyeta kiṃpunar na niścitaḥ iti āha vyatireka ityādi anupalambhepi katham saṃśayaḥ iti āha na sarva ityādi dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ eva na gamikā yatas evanna adarśana mātrāt vyatirekaḥ tasmāt eka nivṛttyā sādhya nivṛttyā anya nivṛttiṃsādhana nivṛttim icchatā tayoḥ sādhya sādhanayoḥ kaścid svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇa upyeṣṭavyaḥ na kevalam adṛṣṭi mātram anyathā pratibandha aniṣṭa avagamakaḥ hetuḥ syāt vyāpteḥ aniścita tvāt 
PVVṬ_57,1–57,2	 yatas evantena kāraṇena hetoḥ triṣu api rūpeṣu pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekeṣu niścayaḥ varṇṇitaḥ ācārya di gnāḥ ge na pra mā ṇa sa mu cca yā diṣu asiddhaḥ tu dvayoḥ api sādhanam ityādinā kasya nirāsena iti āha asiddha ityādi ādi a ādi tvāt tṛtīya arthe tasi vipakṣeṇa iti arthaḥ tatra asiddha vipakṣeṇa pakṣa dharma tva niścayaḥ varṇṇitaḥ viparota artha aviruddhaḥ tasya vipakṣeṇa anvaya niścayaḥ vyabhicāryanaikāntikaḥ tasya vipakṣeṇa vyatireka niścayaḥ 
PVVṬ_57,3	 anvaya vyatireka niścayam ca varṇṇayatā pratibandha upyarthataḥ darśitaḥ eva yasmāt na hi asati pratibandhe anvaya vyatireka niścaya usti tena kāraṇena tam eva tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇam pratibandhan darśayan= ākṣipat niścayam āha yasya doṣasya nirāsena yaḥ niścayaḥ uktaḥ tam vyācaṣṭe tatra ityādi viruddha tad pakṣyāṇām iti viruddhānām viruddha pakṣyāṇām ca viruddha pakṣyāḥ yeṣām sattvam vipakṣe niścitam sa pakṣa sattvam sandigdham sandigdha anaikāntikāḥ eva ete para prasiddhyā tu evam abhidhānam vyatirekasya aniścayena iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ anaikāntikasya nirāsaḥ iti sambandhaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ sādhāraṇa anaikāntikasya iti tad pakṣasya ca anaikāntika pakṣasya ca śeṣavat ādeḥ ādi śabdāt sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sandigdhasya nirāsaḥ yasya sa pakṣa sattvam vipakṣe ca adarśana mātrāt vyatirekaḥ tat śeṣavat 
PVVṬ_58,1	 prasiddhaḥ tu dvayoḥ ityā cā ryaḥ grantham idānīm vyācaṣṭe dvayoḥ ityādi dvayoḥ iti anena ekasya vādinaḥ prativādinaḥ vā yaḥ siddhaḥ tasya pratiṣedhaḥ prasiddha vacanena sandigdhayoḥ śeṣa vat asādhāraṇayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti sambandhaḥ kva sandigdhayoḥ iti āha sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ api iti śeṣavataḥ asapakṣa sandehaḥ asādhāraṇasya tu sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ tasmāt niścaya vacana ādā cā rye ṇā pi pratibandhaḥ iṣṭaḥ eva 
PVVṬ_58,2–59,1	 anyathā asati pratibandhe sādhya sādhanayoḥ vipakṣe adarśana mātreṇa vyatirekea ācāryeṇa iṣyamāṇe vyabhicāri vipakṣeṇa anaikāntika pratipakṣeṇa vaidharmya vacanam ca yat pratijñātantadapārthakam iti ākūtam kva punar ācāryeṇam pratijñātam iti āha yadā ityādi nyā ye mu khe ca etat uktam yat ubhayam vaktavyam iti sādharmyam vaidharmyam ca kasya pratipakṣeṇa kim uktam iti āha viruddha ityādi sādhanasya vacanam viruddha pratipakṣeṇa vaidharmya vacanam anaikāntika pratipakṣeṇa yadi adṛṣṭi phalantat ca adarśana mātra phalantat ca iti vaidharmya vacanam etat eva vyācaṣṭe yadi ityādi tena iti vaidharmya vacanena vipakṣe hetoḥ adarśanam tyadarśanam anuktepi vaidharmye gamyate darśana abhāva lakṣaṇasya adarśanasya vaidharmya vacanāt prāk api siddha tvāt tasmāt apārthakam vaidharmya vacanam 
PVVṬ_59,2	 hetoḥ darśana bhrāntiḥ vipakṣesti tat nivṛti artham vaidharmya vacanam iti ced āha na hi ityādi tasya iti pratipādyasya vaidharmya vacanāt prāk hetoḥ vipakṣe darśana bhrāntiḥ asti yā vaidharmya vacanena nivarttyate tasmāt etat yathā sa pakṣe hetoḥ darśane na bhrāntiḥ kintu tat vismṛtam iti sādharmya vacanena smaryate tathā smṛtiḥ vācā vaidharmya vacanena adarśane kriyate iti ced dṛṣṭāntam eva vighaṭayitum āha darśanam ityādi darśanam apratīyamānam asmaryamāṇam na sādhya pratipatti aṅgam iti yuktantatra iti darśane vācā smaraṇa ādhānam smṛti jananam adarśana arthantu na yuktam yasmāt adarśanantu darśana abhāvaḥ hetoḥ vipakṣe sa darśanena bādhyate tad abhāve vipakṣa darśana abhāve siddhaḥ eva darśana abhāvaḥ iti apārtha kantat siddhaye darśana abhāva siddhaye vaidharmya vacanam ayam abhiprāyaḥ darśanamparokṣa tvāt vismaryeta iti tad smaraṇa artham vacanam yuktam darśana abhāvaḥ tu darśana nivṛtti rūpaḥ sa ca darśana anubhava abhāvāt eva pratibhāsate pratibhāsamānasya ca kim smaraṇena tad siddhaye apārtha kamvacanam 
PVVṬ_59,3	 na vai anupalabhamānasya puṃsaḥ tāvatā iti adarśana mātreṇa vipakṣe hetuḥ na asti iti evam niścayaḥ bhavati deśa ādi viprakṛṣṭānām anupalambhepi sattvāt tad arthat na asti iti niścaya utpādana artham vaidharmya vacanam iti ced tat na yasmāt na ca na asti iti vacanāt apramāṇakāt tad pratikṣipyamāṇam na asti eva kathantarhi na asti iti gamyate iti āha yathā ityādi 
PVVṬ_59,4	 etat uktam bhavati hetoḥ sva sādhye pratibandha grāhakam eva pramāṇam sādhyāyat tata agrāha kantat ca iha darśanam abhipretam yat ca sādhyaḥ eva hetoḥ darśanam idam eva sarvatra vipakṣe adarśanam tena yasya sādhya sādhanayoḥ pratibandha grāhakam darśanam pravṛttam vismṛtam ca tasya eva puṃsaḥ darśana adarśanayoḥ pratītayoḥ sādharmya vaidharmya vacanābhyām smaraṇam kriyate na anyasya iti arthaḥ yat āha pramāṇam dṛṣṭāntābhyām upadarśyate iti yathā yadi na asti sa khyāpyataiti yathā yena prakāreṇa sva sādhya pratibandhena vipakṣe hetuḥ na asti yadi sa nyāya iti pratibandha grāhakam pramāṇam khyāpyate smaryate tadā na asti iti gamyate na tu pratibandham antareṇa 
PVVṬ_60,1–60,2	 yadi ityādi prathamam kārikā bhāgam āha yadi anupalabhamāna unupalambha mātrāt na asti itina pratyeti tadā vaidharmya vacanāt api apramāṇakāt na pratyeṣyati yasmāt tat api vaidharmya vacanam tvatā tena anupalambham eva khyāpayati na adhikam viśeṣam syāt matam sādhya abhāva kṛtaḥ hetu abhāvaḥ vaidharmya vacanena khyāpyate tatosti viśeṣaḥ iti atas āha na ca eka ityādi eka anupalambhaḥ iti sādhya anupalambhaḥ anya abhāvam sādhana abhāvam asati pratibandhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ atiprasaṃgāt iti pratibandham antareṇa nivṛttau go nivṛttyā api aśvasya niyamena nivṛttiḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_60,3	 atha matam ācārya di gnā ge na vipakṣe hetuḥ nna astī tyuktam atas eva niścayaḥ iti atas āha na ca ityādi tenā cā rye ṇa na asti iti yat vaidharmya vacanam kṛtam tasmāt tathā bhavati vastunaḥ na astitvam eva bhavati atiprasaṅgāt tad vacanasya hi prāmāṇye pratijñā mātrāt api sādhya siddhiḥ syāt tat iti tasmāt katham vaidharmya vacanena anaikāntika parihāraḥ na eva tasmāt vipakṣāt hetoḥ vyāvṛttim icchatā tatra vyāvṛttau nyāyaḥ vaktavyaḥ sādhya sādhanayoḥ pratibandha grāhakam pramāṇam yatas iti nyāyāt asya iti pratipādyasya sādhanam vyāvṛttim iti niścayaḥ bhavati 
PVVṬ_60,4	 nanu ityādi paraḥ tad abhāve sādhya abhāve anupalambhātttiḥ hetoḥ ayam eva nyāyaḥ iti manyate yadi adṛṣṭyā hetoḥ vipakṣāt nivṛttiḥ syāt tadā śeṣavat anumānaṃ vyabhicāri kim na eva vyabhicāri syāt kīdṛśam punar tat iti āha yathā ityādi etāni phalāni iti upayuktāt anyāni ayam ca dharmi nirddeśaḥ pakvāni evam rasāni ca iti sādhya dharmaḥ evaṃrasāni madhurāṇi amlāni vā rūpa aviśeṣāt iti hetuḥ upayuktasya phalasya yat rūpam rakta tā ādi tena tulya tvāt eka śākhā prabhavāt vā iti hetuḥ upayukta vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ kasmāt adarśana mātrāt vyatirekaḥ iṣyamāṇe śeṣavataḥ vyabhicāri tvam syāt iti āha atra api ityādi atra śeṣa vat anumāne vivakṣitaṃrūpa viśeṣa ādi yuktam upabhuktāt anyat phalantasya aśeṣasya pakṣīkaraṇe hetoḥ rūpa ādi śeṣa ādikasya sādhya abhāvenupalaṃbha usti iti vipakṣa avyāvṛttiḥ atas ca avyabhicāritā syāt tathā hi yat pakṣīkṛtam phalam yat ca upayuktam sa pakṣa tvena upāttantad vyatirekeṇa vipakṣa bhūte tṛtīye rāśau na asti yathā uktasya hetoḥ vṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_61,1^1	 pratyakṣa bādha ityādi kadācid eka śākhā prabhavasya api phalasya apakvasya atad rasasya vā pratyakṣeṇa anubhava sambhavāt pratyakṣa bādha āśaṅkāḥ eva śeṣavataḥ vyabhicāraḥ iti eke ī śva ra se na prabhṛtayaḥ tat ayam arthaḥ na kevalābhyām anvaya vyatirekābhyām hetuḥ gamakaḥ api tu abādhita viṣaya tve sati iti na ityādinā pariharati pakṣīkṛtoyaḥ viṣayaḥ parokṣaḥ tatra pratyakṣa bādhāyāḥ abhāvāt na pravṛttena pratyakṣeṇa bādhā śaṅkā kintu kadācid gandha pratyakṣa bādhā pakṣam iti ced āha tathā ityādi tathā kadācid pratyakṣa bādhā bhavet iti āśaṅkāyām atiprasaṃgaḥ yasmāt anyatra abhimate hetau pratyakṣa bādhāyāḥ abhāva niyama abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_61,1^2	 na hi sambandha abhyupagame parasya bādhā āśaṅkā nivarttate iti bhāvaḥ tasmāt pratibandha anabhyupagama vādinā vṛttam pramāṇam bādhakameṣṭavyam avṛtta bādhane apravṛttena eva pramāṇena bādhane sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ sarvatra hetau na syāt āśvāsaḥ gamakatva niścayaḥ bādhakasya śaṃkyamāna tvāt na evam pratibandha vādinaḥ sarvatra hetau= anāśvāsaḥ sādhya pratibaddhe hetau bādhāśaṃkāyāḥ api abhāvāt hetu prayogāt tu pūrvam syāt bādhāśaṃkā atas eva sandigdhe hetu vacanam ucyate na ca vṛttam pramāṇam śeṣavataḥ bādhakam asti tasmāt sthitam etat adarśana mātrāt vyatireke śeṣavatā upya vyabhicāri tvam syāt iti 
PVVṬ_62,1	 nanu pratibandha balāt sādhya abhāve hetoḥ vyatireke sati sattā mātreṇa vyatirekaḥ gamakaḥ syāt iti atas āha vyatirekaḥ tu ityādi hetoḥ yaḥ vipakṣāt vyatirekaḥsa siddhaḥ eva niścitaḥ eva sādhanam iti hetoḥ tathā abhāva niścayam sādhya abhāve yaḥ hetu abhāvaḥ tad niścayam apekṣate etat āha na asma akambhavatām iva darśana abhāva mātrāt vyatirekaḥ kintu sādhya sādhanayoḥ sati pratibandhe sādhya abhāve hetoḥ vipakṣāt vyāvṛtta tvam svagataḥ dharmaḥ hetoḥ ca yat rūpantat avaśyam sva niścayam apekṣate jñāpaka tvāt iti katham tvad matena śeṣavataḥ vyabhicāri tvam iti ced āha anupalambhāt tu ityādi kvacid vipakṣa eka deśe hetoḥ abhāva siddhau= api apratibaddhasya hetoḥ sādhye tad abhāve sādhya abhāve sarvatra vipakṣe abhāva asiddheḥ kāraṇāt saṃśayaḥ tatas vipakṣāt avyatirekaḥ yaḥ saḥ eva vyabhicāraḥ śeṣavataḥ 
PVVṬ_62,2	 kiṃca iti doṣa antara samuccayaḥ yadi adarśanāt vyatirekaḥ tadā vyatireki api hetuḥ syāt kīdṛśam na idam nirātmakam ityādi prasaṅga mukhena ca id am uktam aprāṇa ādimattva prasaṅgāt prāṇa ādima tvāt ca sa ātmakam ayam ca hetuḥ sā ātmake kvacid na dṛṣṭaḥ niḥ ātmakebhyaḥ ca vyāvṛttaḥ iti sādhya nivṛttau nivṛtti dharma avyatirekī kathyate tathā hi nirātmakeṣu ātma rahiteṣu ghaṭa ādiṣu dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭeṣu prāṇa ādi adarśanāt prāṇa apāna unmeṣa nimeṣa adarśanāt dṛṣṭeṣu svabhāva anupalambhena eva adarśanam prāṇa ādīnām upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt adṛṣṭeṣu api tad jātīya tayā tena nairātmyam prāṇa ādi abhāvena vyāptam jīvat śarīre tu tad nivṛttyā prāṇa ādi mattva abhāva nivṛttyā nairātmyasya nivṛtteḥ ātma gatiḥ syāt tava tarhi katham saṃśaya hetuḥ iti ced āha adṛśya ityādi adṛśyasya ātmanā unupalambhāt ghaṭa ādiṣu abhāva aprasiddhau ghaṭa ādī kāraṇāt nirātmakāt prāṇa ādeḥ anivṛttiḥ prāṇa ādi abhāvena sandigdhasya nairātmyasya api asiddhiḥ iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_63,1^1	 bauddhena nairātmyam abhyugatamatobhi upagamāt nirātmaka tvam ghaṭa ādeḥ siddham iti ced yadi bauddha abhyupagamaḥ pramāṇam katham idānīm ātma siddhiḥ jīvat śarīre tat api bauddhena nirātmakam iṣṭam jīvat śarīre nairātmya abhyupagamaḥ apramāṇakaḥ tatosya ātmā sādhyate iti yadi evam parasya api jīvat śarīrāt anyasya api ghaṭa ādeḥ apramāṇikā katham nairātmya siddhiḥ na hi bauddhasya abhyupagamaḥ kvacid pramāṇam kvacid na iti kim ca abhyupagamena kevalena sa ātmakān ātmakau vibhajya ghaṭa ādayaḥ pareṇa asmābhiḥ ca anātmakāḥ abhyupagatāḥ tena anātmakāḥ 
PVVṬ_63,1^2	 jīvat śarīram sa ātmakam asmābhiḥ abhyupagatantvayā tu nirātmakam evam vibhajya tatra nirātmakeṣu prāṇa ādīnām abhāvena ātma viṣaye gamaka tvam kathayata apareṇa āgamika tvam ātmani pratipannam na anumeya tvam tasmāt ātmanaḥ ghaṭa ādau= adarśana īpya dṛśya svabhāvasya ātmanaḥ nivṛtti a siddheḥ na asti kutaścid nirātmakāt prāṇa ādeḥ nnivṛttiḥ iti agamaka tvam etat tāvat na eva ātmanaḥ kutaścid nivṛttiḥ siddhāḥ abhyupagamya tu ucyate tad nivṛttau= api ātma nivṛttau= api kvacid iti dṛṣṭe ghaṭa ādau nivṛttau= api prāṇa ādīnām apratibandhāt ātmanā saha sambandha abhāvāt sarvatra adṛṣṭeṣu api ghaṭa ādiṣu ātma nivṛttyā prāṇa ādīnām nivṛtti asiddheḥ sandigdha vyatireki tvāt na gamaka tvam 
PVVṬ_63,2	 adarśana mātrāt vyatireka abhyupagame sati ayama paraḥ doṣaḥ iti āha yā api ityādi kā punar sā iti āha tathā sa pakṣe san= ityādi ā cā ryaḥ sya ca ayaṅgranthaḥ tatra sandihi uktam pakṣa dharmaḥ vādi prativādi niścitaḥ gṛhyate tena ubhayoḥ anyatarasya ca asiddhasya gdhasya āśraya asiddhasya ca vyudāsaḥ yathā ca pakṣa dharma niścayena caturvidhasya asiddhasya vyudāsaḥ tathā sa pakṣe sannasan= iti evamādiṣu api anvaya vyatireka niścayena nirastam asiddha jātam anyatara asiddha ādīnām sa pakṣa ādiṣu asambhavāt yathāyogam udāhāryam iti āha sā api na vācyāḥ asiddhi yojanā 
PVVṬ_64,1	 tadvayā ācaṣṭe anupalambhaḥ eva ityādi apramāṇakenu palambhaḥ eva sati hetoḥ vipakṣe saṃśayāt katham upalambhe tad asambhavāt vipakṣe hetoḥ upalambhe sati tasya saṅaśayasya abhāvāt tasmāt anupalambhāt hetoḥ vipakṣāt vyatirekaḥ iti arthāt sandigdha vyatirekaḥ hetuḥ iṣṭaḥ eva tasmāt saṃśayitaḥ anivāryaḥ saṃśayena viṣayīkṛtaḥ saṃśayitaḥ vyatirekaḥ na vāryaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_64,2	 yathāyogam udāhāryam iti atas yathāyoga vacanāt saṃśayitaḥ anivāritaḥ eva iti cetaḥ na etat evam tad anantaram eva yaḥ eva tu ubhaya niścaya vācī ityādi vacanāt yaḥ eva śabdaḥ ubhaya niścitasya trairūpyasya asiddha tva ādeḥ vācakaḥ saḥ eva sādhanam dūṣaṇam na ca anyatara prasiddha sandigdha vācī punar sādhana apekṣaṇāt iti ayam granthaḥ iha udāharaṇam anyatarasya vādinaḥ prativādinaḥ vā yosiddham sandigdham vā vakti na sa sādhanam dūṣaṇam vā sandigdha vyatireka niścaya hetuḥ ubhayoḥ api vipakṣe sandigdhaḥ tasmāt tad abhidhānam asādhanam yasmāt ubhaya niścitaḥ eva hetuḥ uktaḥ tena anupalambhepi sati nivṛtti saṃśayāt vipakṣāt hetoḥ anivṛttim manyamānaḥ tasya sandigdha vyatirekasya hetu tva pratiṣedham āha asiddhi yojanayā 
PVVṬ_64,3	 kiñca yadi adṛṣṭyā nivṛttiḥ iṣyate tadā viśeṣasya asādhāraṇasya śrāvaṇa tva ādeḥ vyavaccheda hetu tā syāt kim kāraṇam nittya aniti ayoḥ adarśanāt tat vyācaṣṭe śrāvaṇa tvasya api ityādi tathā hi adarśana mātrāt vyāvṛttiḥ iṣṭāḥ asti ca nitya aniti ayoḥ adarśanam śrāvaṇa tvasya tad vyavaccheda hetu tā syāt nitya anitya pratiṣedha hetu tu am bhavet yadi nāma adarśanāt tatas vyāvartteta śrāvaṇa tvantad vyavaccheda hetutvantu kutas iti āha na hi iti na tad vyāvṛtteḥ anyat vyavacchedanat nitya anitya vyavacchedanam tava api katham śrāvaṇa tvat na vyavaccheda hetuḥ iti ced āha avyavacchedaḥ tu ityādi kutaścid nityāt anityāt ca adarśana mātreṇa vyāvṛtteḥ eva aniścayāt aniścayaḥ ca anyataratra pratibandhā niścayāt avaśyam ca etat evam anyathā yaḥ hi dharmaḥ yatra na asti iti niścitaḥ sa bhavan kvacid dharmiṇi kathantad a bhāvam yatra na asti iti niścitaḥ tasya abhāvam katham na gamayet 
PVVṬ_65,1	 nitya anityāt vyāvṛttasya api śrāvaṇa tvasya ubhaya vyavacchede sādhye pramāṇa antara bādhā ced śaṃkyeta atha api iti ādyasya eva vyākhyānam śrāvaṇa tvena ubhaya vyavacchedenitya anitya vyavacchede sādhye pramāṇa antaram bādhakam asti tat āha anyonya ityādi anyonya vyavacchedaḥ rūpam yeṣa ante tathā tathā hi nitya vyavacchedaḥ eva anitya tvantad vyavacchedaḥ eva ca nitya tvan tathā bhāva vyavacchedaḥ eva abhāvaḥ abhāva vyavacchedaḥ eva ca bhāvaḥ teṣām ekasya vyavacchedena anya vidhānāt dvitīyasya viruddhasyavidhānāt apratiṣedhaḥ 
PVVṬ_65,2	 etat uktam bhavati yadā hi śrāvaṇa tvam nityāt vyāvṛttam iti tat vyavacchidyāt tat eva anitya tvam vidadhyāt tat eva ca tad anityāt vyāvṛttam iti anityam vyavacchidyāt nityam ca vidhattaḥ iti ekasya ekadā eva vidhi pratiṣedhau syātām tat ca ayuktam iti vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ yugapad virodhāt na kasyacid api pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedha vinivṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ hi vidhiḥ vidhi nivṛttiḥ eva ca pratiṣedhaḥ tau ca paraspara viruddhau yugapad ekasya katham syātām atas na kutaścid api vyāvṛtti niścayaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt 
PVVṬ_65,3–66,1	 na idānīm iti siddhānta vādī idānīm iti bādhā sambhave sati adṛśaḥ adarśanāt vipakṣe hetoḥ na astitāḥ tasmāt evam satya darśanat na pramāṇamba ādhā sambhavāt śrāvaṇa tvaḥ eva apramāṇam bhavatu na anyatra bādhā abhāvāt iti ced āha tathā ityādi anyatra api hetoḥ vyatireka sādhanasya adarśanasya sambhāvyam pramāṇa antara bādhanam kutas lakṣaṇa ityādi hetoḥ vipakṣa adarśana vyāvṛtti nibandhanam iti yat lakṣaṇantena yuktam śrāvaṇa tvasya yat adarśanantasmin bādhā sambhave sati tad lakṣaṇam eva tasya vyatireka sādhanasya adarśanasya sarva viṣayam eva lakṣaṇam svarūpam dūṣitam syāt iti sarvatra adarśane vyatireka sādhanena āśvāsaḥ na gamakatva niścayaḥ yadi evam anumāna viṣayepi kvacid pratyakṣa anumāna virodha darśanāt tathā hi nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt śabda tva vat iti kṛte nitya tvam anumānena bādhyate evam aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ sattvāt ghaṭa vat iti pratyakṣeṇa tatas ca sarvatra tad avaśiṣṭa lakṣaṇena anumānepyana āśvāsa prasaṃgaḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_66,2^1	 na etat evam yathā uktaḥ iti kārya svabhāva anupalambha ja iṅga jenu māne pratyakṣa anumāna virodhasya abhāvāt pratyakṣa ādi virodha sambhavinaḥ ca ātad lakṣaṇa tvāt tad anumāna alakṣaṇa tvāt yadi yathā ukta lakṣaṇe anumāne na asti bādhā tadā hetu lakṣaṇa yuktam paraspara viruddha artha sādhakam hetu dvayam ekasmin dharmiṇī avatīrṇṇam viruddha avi abhicārī uktamā cā rye ṇa tasya avacanam iti ced anena abhyupeta hānim āha anumāna viṣaye viruddha vyabhicārya vacanāt iṣṭam eva iti kutobhyupeta hānam kva tarhi ācāryeṇa uktaḥ iti āha viṣayaṃca ityādi asya viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ kiṃca ityādi iha vai śe ṣi ke ṇa vāyoḥ sattva sādhana artham sparśaḥ ca na ca dṛṣṭānām iti sūtram uktam asya ayam arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_66,2^2	 yaḥ guṇaḥ sa dravya āśrayī tat yathā rūpa ādiḥ apākaja anuṣṇa aśīta sparśaḥ ca guṇaḥ tasmāt tasya āśraya bhūtena dravyeṇa bhavitavyam na ca ayam dṛṣṭānām pṛthivī ādīnām guṇaḥ teṣām pāka ja an uṣṇa aśīta sparśa ādi guṇa tvāt tatas yasya ayam guṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ bhaviṣyati iti ukte vaiśeṣikeṇa tatra ācārya di ṅ nā ge na uktam yadi adarśana mātreṇa dṛṣṭebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate na ca sā upi yuktaḥ iti yat etat uktantat virudhyate iti vā rtti kaḥ kā raḥ darśayan= āha daṣṭa ityādi yadi adṛṣṭyā nivṛttiḥ syāt tathā adṛṣṭeḥ adarśanāt kāraṇāt apāka jasya anuṣṇa aśīta sparśasya dṛṣṭā ayuktiḥ dṛṣṭeṣu pṛthivī ādiṣu asaṅga tiryā varṇṇitā vaiśeṣikaiḥ yasyāḥ ācāryeṇa ayukta tvam uktam sā syāt avirodhinī yuktā eva syāt iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_67,1–67,2	 tat vyācaṣṭe yadi ityādi yat āha ācāryaḥ vāyu prakaraṇe yadi adarśana mātreṇa dṛṣṭebhyaḥ pṛthivī ādibhyaḥ sparśasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate vai śe ṣi ke ṇa na ca sā upi yuktā eti yadi ācāryasya api adarśana mātreṇa vyatirekobhimataḥ tadā katham ayuktaḥ sparśasya pratiṣedhaḥ yuktaḥ eva syāt kim kāraṇam atra api hetoḥ anupalambhāt abhāva siddheḥ abhyupagamāt nanu ityādi paraḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ kāraṇāt apākajasya anuṣṇa aśīta sparśasya anupalabhyamānasya pṛthivī ādiṣu yuktaḥ eva pratiṣedhaḥ 
PVVṬ_67,3	 na yuktaḥ iti siddhānta vādī kim kāraṇam yaḥ pṛthivī ādiḥ anuṣṇa aśītāt anyena sparśena yuktaḥ pratyakṣaḥ sa dṛśyaḥ anyatra ca deśa ādau= apratyakṣa upi tathābhūta sparśa yuktaḥ eva pṛthivī ādiḥ tad svabhāvaḥ dṛśyaḥ ca tad svabhāvaḥ ca iti dvandvaḥ tat eva viṣayaḥ saḥ eva tanmātram supsupa iti samāsaḥ tasmin= apratiṣedhāt sparśasya tatra hi pratiṣedhe syāt eva niścayaḥ yāvatā pṛthivī ādi dharmi bhūtam sāmānyena aviśeṣeṇa eva gṛhītvā ayam vaiśe ṣi kaḥ sparśasya pratiṣedham āha yat kiṃcid pṛthivī ādi tat sarvam anuṣṇa aśīta sparśa rahitam iti na ca pṛthivī ādi mātre sparśasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptiḥ asti na ca eka sparśa niyamaḥ pṛthivī ādīnām yatas tatra pṛthivī ādi sāmānye tūla upala pallava ādiṣu bhedeṣu tad bhāvepi pṛthivī ādi bhāvepi sparśa bheda darśanāt tathā hi tūlasya anyaḥ sparśaḥ ślakṣṇa tva lakṣaṇa unyaḥ ca upala ādeḥ karkaśa tu a ādi lakṣaṇaḥ asya api iti anuṣṇa aśīta sparśasya kvacid pārthiva dravya viśeṣe sambhava āśaṃkayā bhavitavyam iti kṛtvā sarvatra pṛthivī ādau= adarśana mātreṇa anuṣṇā śīta sparśasya ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
PVVṬ_68,1–68,2	 yat tu ucyate sarvatra pṛthivī ādeḥ tulya tvāt tulyaḥ eva anuṣṇa aśīta sparśaḥ yaḥ tu pṛthivī ādi bhāvepi ślakṣṇa tva ādi bhedaḥ sa pṛthivī ādi paramāṇu saṃyogasya niviḍa aniviḍa kṛta tvāt iti tat ayuktam aniviḍānām hi nairantarya abhāvāt saṃyoga abhāvaḥ tena yathā upala paramāṇūnām saṃyogasya niviḍa tvan tathā tūla paramāṇūnām iti katham ślakṣṇa tva ādi bhedaḥ syāt tasmāt sati api saṃyoge svarūpeṇa anyādṛśāḥ eva upala paramāṇa vonyādṛśāḥ ca tūla paramāṇavaḥ tad kṛtaḥ eva ca ślakṣṇa tva ādi bhedaḥ na saṃyoga niviḍā niviḍa kṛtaḥ tathā ca yathā pṛthivī ādi bhedāt sparśasya ślakṣṇa tva ādi bhedaḥ tathā anuṣṇa aśīta bheda upi sambhāvyeta 
PVVṬ_68,3–68,4	 nanu mā abhūt adṛṣṭa viṣaye vāyu anunam dṛṣṭa viṣaye tu anuṣṇa aśīta sparśasya dṛśyasya pathivī ādi sambandhi tvena anupalabhyamāna tvāt tatas vāyu anumānam syāt evam manyate yadi sparśa ādeḥ guṇa rūpa tā siddhā syāt tatas vāyu dravya anumānam syāt sā eva tu asiddhāḥ svātantryeṇa pratīteḥ sparśa viśeṣaḥ eva ca asmākam vāyuḥ ucyate ācārya di gnāḥ ge na tu sparśa vyatiriktam vāyuṃmabhyupagamya tatra parakīyam anumānam ayuktam uktam iti adoṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_68,5–68,6	 tasmāt sthitam etat anvaya vyatirekayoḥ niścayam adarśana mātrāt ca pratiṣedha abhāvam bruvata ācāryeṇa iṣṭaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti kaḥ tarhi evam upālabdhaḥ iti ced āha evam ityādi evam iti anantara uktābhiḥ upapattibhiḥ ācāryasya śiṣyaḥ ā cā ryī yaḥ kaścid ācārya grantha anabhijñaḥ anupalambhāt abhāvam bruvāṇaḥ upālabdhaḥ 
PVVṬ_68,7–69,1	 api ca iti adarśana mātreṇa abhāva abhyupagame pratyakṣa bādhām darśayitum āha deśa ādi bhedāt ādi śabdāt kāla saṃskāra bhedāt bhinnāḥ nānā rūpāḥ dṛśyante dravyeṣu eka jātīyeṣu api śaktayoḥ rasa vīrya vipāka ādi lakṣaṇāḥ tatra iti aneka śaktiṣu dravyeṣu eka dṛṣṭyā eka svabhāvasya dravyasya kvacid darśanāt na anyatra api deśa ādau yuktaḥ tad bhāva niścayaḥ yathā paridṛṣṭa dravya svabhāva niścayaḥ yadi ityādina etat eva vyācaṣṭe yadi vipakṣe hetoḥ adarśana mātreṇa apratibaddhasya sva sādhye tat avyabhicāraḥ sādhya avyabhicāraḥ iṣyate tadā ekatra dṛṣṭasya dravyasya yat rūpam upalabdhan tattasya anyatra api dravya sāmānyāt anumeyam syāt asti hi tatra api tad kālam hetoḥ vipakṣe adarśana mātram 
PVVṬ_69,2^1	 na ca idam yuktam yasmāt kvacid deśe kānicid dravyāṇi kathaṃcid dṛṣṭa anipratiniyata rasa ādi tvena punar anyathā iti yathā dṛṣṭa ākāra vaiparītyena anyatra deśe dṛśyante yathā ityādinā viṣayam āha vīryan doṣa apanayana śaktiḥ pariṇāmaḥ vipākaḥ viśiṣṭā rasa vīrya vipākā yāsām iti vigrahaḥ na anyatra iti kṣetra viśeṣāt anyatra yathā deśa viśeṣāt tathā kāla saṃskāra bhedāt viśiṣṭa rasa vīrya vipākāḥ bhavanti saṃskāraḥ kṣīra ādi avasekaḥ na ca tad deśaiḥ iti pradeśaḥ yeṣām puruṣāṇa antaiḥ tathā aviśiṣṭa rasa ādi yuktāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ iti kṛtvā sarvā atad deśāḥ api tattvena tulya rūpa ādi tvena tathābhūtāḥ yathā gṛhīta svabhāva tulyāḥ sidhyanti kim kāraṇam guṇa antarāṇām rasa ādi viśeṣāṇāṃkāraṇa antara apekṣa tvāt 
PVVṬ_69,2^2	 viśeṣa hetu abhāve tu syāt eka svabhāvatā anumānam adṣṭaḥ karttā yasya vaidikasya tat tathā tat api puruṣa saṃskāra pūrvakam puruṣa prayatna hetukam etat ca sādhya phalam vākyeṣu pauruṣeya apauruṣeya tvena abhimateṣu viśeṣa abhāvāt anena hetuḥ kathitaḥ prayogā punar yat vastu yat abhinnasvabhāvan tat tad samāna heṃtukam yathā ekaḥ dhūmaḥ dhūma antara samāna jātīyaḥ pauruṣeya vākya abhinna svabhāvāni ca apauruṣeya abhimatāni vākyāni iti svabhāva hetuḥ na ca asiddhaḥ hetuḥ tathā hi yaiḥ prakāraiḥ viṣa ādi apanayanāt iti vaidikānām viśeṣaḥ iṣyate teṣām sarva prakārāṇām puruṣaiḥ kāraṇa darśanāt tathā hi śa ba rāḥ dimantrāṇām ipi viṣa ādi apanayana ādayaḥ dṛśyante 
PVVṬ_69,3	 yadi śabda svabhāva sāmyāt adṛṣṭa karttṛkasya api pauruṣeya tvam anumīyate evantarhi sva citta santati darśanāt sarve citta dharmāḥ jñātāḥ tena yāvat bodha rūpantā vat pañca indriya āśritam sa vikalpakam ca sarvam ca rāga ādi janana vāsanā garbham yathā idānīn tathā anāgata avasthāyām api yathā ca mama tathā pareṣām api tena citta tvena indriya āśrita tvena vacana ādi hetu tvena ca sarvasya puṃsaḥ cittam sarvadā rāga ādi yuktat niyata vastu grāhi tvāt a sarva viṣayam kinna anumīyate iti āśaṃkya āha na evam ityādi yathā vākyāni asambhavat viśeṣa hetūni na evaṃmasambhavat viśeṣa hetavaḥ puruṣāḥ yena viśeṣa hetu asambhavena vacana ādeḥ ādi grahaṇena indriya āśrita tva citta tva ādi grahaṇam vacana ādeḥ eva kiṃcid mātreṇa eka deśena sādharmyāt tasmāt liṅgāt puṃsām rāga ādima tvena niyata viṣaya tvena anyena vāsarva ākāreṇa sāmyam anumīyeta 
PVVṬ_70,1^1	 viśeṣa hetu sambhavaḥ eva kutas iti āha sarveṣu eva cetaḥ guṇeṣu viśeṣasya darśanāt rāga prajñā ādayaḥ hi sva viṣaya grahaṇaṃprati manda manda vṛttayā upi kāla antareṇa paṭutarāḥ bhavanti sva viṣayaḥ ca eṣām spaṣṭataraḥ bhavati iti viśeṣaḥ dṛśyate sa punar kutas bhavati iti āha saṃskāra ubhyāsaḥ tasya viśeṣeṇa prajñā ādīnām viśeṣa pratīteḥ bhavatu prajñā ādīnām manaḥ guṇānām abhyāsāt prakarṣaḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt sarvajña ādayaḥ tu na dṛṣṭāḥ iti kathanteṣa am bhāvaityataḥ āha tadvat ityādi anyasya api sarvajña tva ādeḥ viśeṣasya sambhavāt abhyāsa vaśāt ca nairātmya ākārasya sarva padārtha grāhiṇaḥ ca sāmānya vikalpasya yat sphuṭā abhatu antadeva vairāgyam sārvajñam ca padam 
PVVṬ_70,1^2	 tena tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ vairāgya sarvajña tva viśeṣā sambhava anumānam syāt yadi nairātmya viṣayasya sarva viṣayasya vā vikalpasya asambhavaḥ sambhave vā yadi manaḥ guṇānām na viśeṣaḥ syāt sati vā viśeṣe viśeṣa hetuḥ yadi na jñātaḥ syāt yāvatā nairātmya ādi viṣayasya vikalpasya sambhavosti viśeṣa hetuḥ ca abhyāsaḥ vijñātaḥ tasmāt yathā asati pratibandha vaikalye samartheyam bīja kāraṇa sāmagrī aṅkura utpādāya iti sāmarthya anumānam tadvat asati pratibandha vaikalye cira kālāt naiḥ antaryavataḥ ca abhyāsa viśeṣāt ca nairātmya viṣayasya sarva padārtha viṣayasya ca jñānasya sphuṭa ābha tvam sambhavati iti vairāgya sarvajña tvayoḥ sambhava anumānam evantā vat sambhava anumānam asmākam 
PVVṬ_70,2	 asambhave tu anumātavye bhavatām na tasyadharmasya bādhakaḥ kaścid hetuḥ vidyate tad abhāvāt na asaṃbhavat viśeṣa hetavaḥ pumāṃsaḥ iti sambandhaḥ katham punar bādhakasya abhāvaḥ iti āha vairāgyasya adṛṣṭa tvāt upalakṣaṇam ca etat sarvajñasya api adṛṣṭa tvāt adṛṣṭena ca vairāgyeṇa saha hetoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva asiddheḥ 
PVVṬ_71,1	 syāt matam na vacana ādeḥ vairāgya ādīnām sākṣāt asambhavonumīyate yena bādhakaḥ hetuḥ mṛgyate kintu vīta rāga abhimateṣu rāgāt ayonumīyante teṣu anumiteṣu arthataḥ vīta rāga ādi pratiṣiddham adṛṣṭena api vairāgyeṇa rāgi tvasya virodhāt ityataḥ āha rāga ityādi na hi rāga ādīnām avyabhicāri kāryam asti ādi grahaṇāt asarvajña parigrahaḥ tathā hi vyavahāra vyutpattim ārabhya yathā yathārtha parijñānan tathā tathā tad viṣayam vaktṛ tvam bhavati iti tena yadi sarva viṣayam kasyacid vijñānam syāt tad viṣayam api vaktṛ tvam kena vāryate 
PVVṬ_71,2–71,3	 syāt etat yadi vairāgya ādi lakṣaṇantasya viśeṣa usti katham asmābhiḥ na upalabhyate iti āha sambhavepi teṣām vairāgya ādi lakṣaṇānām viśeṣāṇām para santāne draṣṭum aśakyatvāt na ca tathābhūtānām anupalambhāt pratikṣepaḥ iti āha tādṛśaḥ ca viprakarṣiṇām apratikṣepa arha tvāt syāt etat yathā puruṣāḥ apratikṣepa arhāḥ tadvat vākyāni iti āha na evam ityādi kim kāraṇam dṛśya viśeṣa tvāt tathā hi vaidikānām vākyānām viśeṣaḥ dṛśyaḥ eva iṣyate atha na iṣyate evam adṛśya tvepi viśeṣasya abhyupagamyamāne tena anupalabdhena viśeṣeṇa adṛṣṭa viśeṣāṇām vaidika vākyānām laukika vākyebhyaḥ vijātīyatva upagama virodhāt 
PVVṬ_71,4	 syāt matam dṛśyāḥ eva viśeṣāḥ vaidikānām duḥśravaṇa tva durbhaṇa tva ādayaḥ taiḥ pauruṣeyebhyaḥ bhinnāni bhaviṣyanti iti atas āha tad viśeṣāṇām ityādi anyatra iti pauruṣeyeṣu na kevalam adṛṣṭa viśeṣāṇām vijātīyatva upagama virodhāt adṛśya tvam viśeṣāṇām ayuktam itaḥ ca pratyakṣāṇām apratyakṣa svabhāva virodhāt na hi ekasya svabhāva dvayam viruddham ghaṭate viśeṣāḥ pratyakṣāḥ eva kevalam bhrānti nimitta sadbhāvāt viṣa ādi śakti vat na avadhāryante iti ced āha bhrānti nimitta abhāvāt iti rūpa sādharmya darśanam hi bhrānti nimittam viṣa ādiṣu na evam vaidikeṣu kathaṅgamyate iti ced āha bādhaka abhāvāt bhrāntya siddheḥ iti yadi vaidikānām viśeṣe bhrāntyā anupalakṣyamāṇe punar viśeṣa avalambi pramāṇam utpadyeta bhrānteḥ bādha kanta dāḥ bhrānteḥ tad nimittasya ca bhavati niścayaḥ tat ca na asti tasmāt laukikaiḥ śabdaiḥ vaidikānām aviśeṣe sādhye na asti sādhakam pramāṇam 
PVVṬ_72,1	 puruṣeṣu tarhi kim bādhakam yena sarva ākāra guṇa sāmya sādhane doṣaḥ iti āha puruṣeṣu ityādi prajñā ādi viṣayasya atiśayasya abhyāsa pūrvakasya yat darśanantat eva bādhakam yadi asambhavat vairāgyam puruṣasya cittam bhavet na abhyāsādheya viśeṣam bhavet bhavati ca tatas viśeṣa darśanasya bādhaka tvāt asamānam veda vākya anumāne yat uktam pratyakṣāṇām śabdānām apratyakṣa svabhāva abhāvāt iti syāt ayan doṣaḥ yadi viśeṣaḥ svabhāva bhūtaḥ syāt kintu para bhāva bhūtaḥ iti āha para bhāva bhūtasya iti para bhāvaṅgataḥ para bhāva bhūtaḥ anya svabhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ atad viśeṣa tva āditya vākya viśeṣa tvāt yatas na asti viśeṣaḥ vākyānān tad tasmāt abhinna svabhāvānām sarveṣām pauruṣeya apauruṣeya abhimatānāṃpuruṣa kriyā puruṣaiḥ karaṇam na vā kasyacid laukisya api na puruṣa kriyā iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_72,2	 evam ācāryīyasya adarśana mātreṇa vipakṣāt hetoḥ vyatirekam icchataḥ grantha virodham pramāṇa virodham ca ukttvā tī rthi kā nām paraspara vyāghātam āha kiṃca ityādi mṛdaḥ cetanā etat ca laḥ kā yaḥ te darśanam ātmā ca mṛd cetanā ca iti dvandvaḥ ādi śabdāt kṣīra ādiṣu dravya ādi teṣām abhāvasya sādhanāya anupalambhaḥ pareṇa ukta upiyaḥ tasya abhāvasya aprasādhakaḥ iṣṭaḥ ātma ādi vādibhiḥ anupalambha mātrasya apramāṇa tvāt iti saḥ eva anupalambhaḥ ātma ādi niṣedhe pramāṇa tvena aniṣṭaḥ kim hetu abhāvasya hetaḥ vipakṣāt vyatirekasya sādhakaḥ hetu abhāve ca anupalambham ca asya vai śe ṣi kā deḥ pramāṇayataḥ ātma vādaḥ nirālambaḥ nirāśrayaḥ syāt tatra anupalambhasya abhāva sādhanasya sambhavāt tathā hi na pratyakṣeṇa ātmanaḥ upalambhaḥ nitya parokṣa tva abhyupagamāt atha syāt ātmanā unumānam eva upalambha usti eva iti atas āha tad kārya ityādi apratyakṣa tvāt eva ātmanaḥ tad kārya svabhāva rūpasya liṅgasya aniścayāt na anumānam upalambhaḥ 
PVVṬ_73,1	 yathā nitya parokṣāṇām api indriya ādīnām anumānantathā ātmanaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ce dāha indriyāṇām ityādi ādi śabdāt smṛti bīja ādīnām vijñārnam eva kāryantasya kādācid ka tvāt tathā hi satsu api rūpa ālokamanaskāreṣu nimīlita locana ādi avasthāsu vijñānasya abhāvāt punar ca unmīlita locana avasthāsu bhāvāt vijñāna kāryam kāraṇa antara sāpekṣam sidhyati tatosya sa apekṣya siddhyā indriya ādīnāmprasiddhiḥ ucyate 
PVVṬ_73,2^1	 etat uktam bhavati yat sa apekṣam idaṅkādācitkam vijñānantat kim api asya vijñānasya kāraṇam asti iti anumīyate tat eva ca indriyam iti vyavahriyate na tu evaṃbhūtam iti na rūpa viśeṣeṇa mūrtta tva ādinā yuktam indriyam anumīyate iti arthaḥ evam iti yathā kādācid ka vijñāna kāryāni atha anupapattya indriya anumānam tathā sukha ādi kāryam yasya sukha ādi kāryantatkim api asti iti anumānena tat ca ātma svarūpam iti prasādhitam kañcitma vādinaḥ na puṣṇāti yena kenacid anirdiṣṭa viśeṣeṇa kāraṇena kāraṇavat tva abhyupagamāt sukha ādīnām na ca evaṃbhūtaḥ ātmā nitya karttṛ bhoktṛ tva ādi lakṣaṇa tvena abhyupagamāt yatas ca yathā abhyupagatasya ātmanaḥ na asti kārya liṅgam tathā ca sati anupalambhaḥ eva ātmanaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_73,2^2	 tasmāt tam ātmā anantena anupalambhena pratyakṣa anumāna nivṛtti lakṣaṇena pratyācakṣāṇaḥ kim iti prativyūḍhaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ ātma vādinā anupalambha mātrāt na asti asattvam ātmanaḥ iti katham asādhanam sat vipakṣāt hetoḥ prāṇa ādima tu a ādeḥ vyatirekam sādhayet bhūtānām eva śaktiḥ caitanyam iṣyate cā rvā kaiḥ bhūta svabhāvā ca mṛd iti evam mṛdaḥ khalu api caitanyam anupalabhyamānam api icchan lo kāya ti kaḥ yat āha tebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ caitanyammada śakti vat vijñānam iti punar tatas eva apramāṇakāt anupalambhāt adarśanāt vacana ādeḥ asarvajña tva ādi sādhanāya liṃga tvena upanītasya vipakṣāt vyāvṛttim āha dadhi ādikam kṣīra ādiṣu anupalabhyamānam api icchan 
PVVṬ_74,1	 aparaḥ iti sām khyaḥ punar saḥ eva para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṅghāta tvāt iti abhidhāya apara artheṣu śaśa viṣāṇa ādiṣu saṅghāta tvasya adarśanāt vyatirekam āha evantā avat asya paraspara vyāghātaḥ na ca adarśana mātreṇa asya hetoḥ vyāptiḥ sidhyati kaḥ hi atra niyamaḥ saṅghātaiḥ avaśyam para arthaiḥ bhavitavyam yatas saṃghāta tvāt cakṣuḥ ādīnām pārārthya siddhi ātma artha tvam sām khya sya sidhyet yat uktam dadhi ādikam kṣīra ādiṣu api anupalabhyamānam api iti tat na yasmāt asti eva upalambhaḥ dadhi ādīnām kṣīra ādiṣu kosau= iti āha anumānam iti anumānam ca āha aśaktāt anutpatteḥ iti yadi hi kṣīra ādau dadhi ādi śaktiḥ na syāt tatas aśaktāt kṣīra ādeḥ dadhi ādi na utpadyeta prayogaḥ tu yat yat janane na śaktam na tasya tatas utpattiḥ yathā śāli bījāt yava aṅkurasya utpadyate ca dadhi ādiḥ kṣīra ādibhyaḥ tasmāt asti dadhi ādi śaktiḥ kṣīra ādau= iti kārya hetu pratirūpakaḥ vaidharmya prayogaḥ śakteḥ eva ca dadhi ādiḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhedāt iti manyate 
PVVṬ_74,2	 atha ityādi siddhānta vādī yosau dadhi ādikaḥ bhāvaḥ paścāt upalabhyate kim saḥ eva bhāvaḥ śaktiḥ uta anyat eva kiñcid dadhi ādeḥ artha antaram tathā eva iti niṣpanna rūpa dadhi ādi vat kṣīra avasthāyām upalabhyeta viśeṣa abhāvāt anyat ced iti dadhi āt ibhyortha antaram ced śaktiḥ tadā katham anya bhāvenyasya śakti ākhyasya bhāve tat dadhi ādikam asti na eva iti abhiprāyaḥ dadhi ādi janana sāmarthyāt kṣīra ādau dadhi ādi iti upacāra mātram syāt anupalambham apramāṇīkṛtya punar tasya eva pramāṇīkaraṇam ayam paraspara vyāghātaḥ eṣām ātma ādi vādinām iti upasaṃhāraḥ 
PVVṬ_74,3	 yatas ca adarśana mātrāt na asti vyatirekaḥ tasmāt tanmātra sambandhaḥ hetu sattā mātra sambaddha svabhāvaḥ sādhya tvena abhimataḥ svayat nivarttamānaḥ bhāvam eve svabhāva bhūtam eva hetu tvena upanītam nivarttayet vā śabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇa vikalpa apekṣī yathā vṛkṣaḥ nivarttamānaḥ śiṃśapāt nivarttayati kasmāt śākhādimat viśeṣasya eva tathā śiṃśapā iti prasiddheḥ sa vṛkṣaḥ tasya śiṃśapā ākhyasya svabhāvaḥ svañca svabhāvam vṛkṣam parityajya katham śiṃśapā ākhyobhāvaḥ bhavet kiṅkāraṇam svabhāvasya eva vṛkṣasva ātmanaḥ eva bhāva tvāt śiṃśapā rūpa tvāt iti hetoḥ tasya ātma bhūtasya sādhanasya śiṃśapa ādeḥ svabhāva pratibandhāt eva svabhāve sādhya abhimate vṛkṣa ādau yathā uktena prakāreṇa pratibandhāt eva avyabhicāraḥ kāraṇam vā anivarttamānam iti adhyāhāraḥ kāryat nivarttayet iti prakṛtam kasmāt avyabhicārataḥ kāryasya kāraṇa avyabhicārāt iti arthaḥ kāraṇam ityādinā vyācaṣṭe 
PVVṬ_75,1	 anyathā iti yadi kāraṇe nivarttamāne kāryam na nivartteta tadā tad kārya abhimataṃtasya kāraṇasya kāryam eva na syāt tasmāt kāraṇam nivarttamānam kāryam avaśyaṃnivarttayati yadi api vāsagṛha ādau= agni kāraṇa nivṛttau= api na dhūmasya nivṛttiḥ tathā api dṛṣṭa kāraṇa vyatirekeṇa na anyasmāt asya utpattiḥ abhipreta iti arthaḥ atas eva āha siddhaḥ tu ityādi siddhaḥ tu kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ kāryasya svabhāvam kāraṇe niyamayati sati tasmin bhavati asati na bhavati iti evantad avyabhicāriṇam karoti ubhayathā iti tādātmyena tad utpattyā vā yaḥ svabhāva pratibandhaḥ tasmāt eva sādhya nivṛttyā hetoḥ nivṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_75,2–75,3	 anyathā iti yadi pratibandhaḥ na iṣyate ekasya apratibandhakasya sādhyasya nivṛttya anya nivṛttiḥ apratibaddhasya sādhana dharmasya nivṛtiḥ katham bhavet na eva yasmāt na aśvavān iti aśva rahitaḥ iti kṛtvā marttyena manuṣyeṇa na bhāvyam gomatā api kim sannidhānāt tathā ekasya iti svabhāvena asambaddhasya hedoḥ sannidhānāt katham anyasya sādhyasyasannidhiḥ na eva sannidhānam yasmāt gomān iti eva marttyena bhāvyam aśvavatā api kim 
PVVṬ_76,1	 yatas evantasmāt svabhāva pratibandhāt eva sādhya abhimate vastuni pratibaddha tvāt eva hetuḥ svasādhyaṅgamayati na tu sambandhāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ asahabhāvena vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ ca eka tvena dviṣṭha sambandha abhāvāt sa ca iti svabhāva pratibandhaḥ tad bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ iti sādhya svabhāva lakṣaṇaḥ tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ vā saḥ eva svabhāva pratibandhaḥ avinābhāva ākhyaḥ sādharmya vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntābhyām pradarśyate 
PVVṬ_76,2	 etat uktam bhavati sādhya sādhanayoḥ pratibandha grāhakam eva pramāṇam vyāpti grāhakantena eva sādhanasya sādhya āyat tatā grahaṇāt sādhya abhāve abhāvaḥ gṛhītaḥ eva kevalantada vinā bhāva grāhakam pramāṇam vismṛta tvāt dṛṣṭāntābhyām upadarśyate yatas ca pramāṇa khyāpanā t eva avinā abhau= a smṛtyā sādhya abhāve sādhana abhāvaḥ niścitaḥ bhavati 
PVVṬ_76,3–76,5	 tasmāt vaidharmya dṛṣṭānte tad viṣaye avaśyam niyamena iha hetau kārya svabhāva lakṣaṇa a āśrayaḥ vastu bhūtaḥ dharmī na iṣṭaḥ svabhāva anupalambhe tu iṣṭaḥ eva tatra hi viparyayeṇa upalambhaḥ khyāpanīyaḥ kiṅkāraṇam āśrayaḥ na iṣṭaḥ iti āha tad abhāve ca ityādi tad abhāve vyāpaka kāraṇayoḥ abhāve tat vyāpya kārya ākhyam liṅgam netina bhavati iti evam vaidharmya vacanāt api āśraya rahitāt tad gateḥ vyatireka gateḥ kiṅkāraṇam yatas ityādi svabhāva hetau sādhyasya tad bhāvaḥ sādhana vyāpaka tvam kārya hetau sādhyasya hetu bhāvaḥ kāraṇa tvam khyāpyate tad avedinaḥ iti tad bhāva hetu bhāva āvedinaḥ puṃsaḥ 
PVVṬ_76,6	 tat vyācaṣṭe dṛṣṭānte hi ityādi sādhya dharmasya tad bhāvaḥ sādhana svabhāva tvam khyāpyate tanmātra anubandhena sādhana mātra anubandhena kṛtaka niṣpannasya anitya tvasya kṛtaka mātra anubandhena yā tad svabhāva tā sādhana svabhāva tā tayā evaṃbhūtayā tad bhāvaḥ khyāpyate na tu nimitta antarāt paścāt utpadyamānena anitya tvena yathā eke vipratipannāḥ iti tad mātrava tvam eva darśayan= āha yā etyādi yaḥ hetuḥ kṛtakam svabhāvem janayati saḥ anitya rūpam eva santam janayati iti arthaḥ iti anena dvāreṇa avinābhāva viṣayam pramāṇam dṛṣṭāntena khyāpyate na tu darśana arśana mātram anyathā iti yadi evam pramāṇam na upadarśyate tadā eka dharma sadbhāvāt sādhana dharma sadbhāvāt tad anyena api sādhya dharmeṇa api bhavitavyam iti niyama abhāvāt sādhanasya sādhya vyabhicāra āśaṃkā syāt 
PVVṬ_77,1	 yadi nāma dṛṣṭāntena pramāṇam upadarśanīyan tathā api kim siddham iti āha tena ca pramāṇena tanmātra anubandhaḥ iti sādhana mātra anubandhaḥ katham khyāpyate iti āha kṛtakasya yat kāraṇantasmāt eva kṛtakaḥ tathā jātaḥ jātaḥ yaḥ naśvaraḥ kṣaṇa sthiti dharmāḥ kṣaṇika tvena eva naśvaraḥ na tu kāla antaram sthitvā iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_77,2^1	 katham punar sva hetoḥ eva tathā utpannaḥ iti āha anyatas iti sva hetoḥ anyasmāt vināśa hetoḥ tasya kṛtakasya tad bhāva niṣedhāt anitya tā svabhāva niṣedhāt vakṣyamāṇakāt hetu bhāvaḥ vā tena ca pramāṇena khyāpyate iti sambandhaḥ sādhya dharmasya sādhanaṃprati hetu bhāvaḥ vā kāraṇa tvam vā khyāpyate tasmin sati eva sādhanasya bhāvāt iti anena prakāreṇa pramāṇam dṛṣṭāntena pradarśyate kasya punar sādhyasya hetu bhāvaḥ pradarśyate iti āha artha antarasya sādhanāt vyatiriktasya tathā dṛṣṭānta upadarśitena pramāṇena prasiddhe tad bhāva hetu bhāve 
PVVṬ_77,2^2	 svabhāvasya sādhyasya tad bhāve sādhana svabhāva tve kāraṇasya hetu bhāve prasiddhe sati dahana abhāve dhūmaḥ na bhavati iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ saḥ iti anitya svabhāvaḥ vahniḥ ca tasya iti kṛtaka tvasya dhūmasya ca yathākramam svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ vā vā śabdaḥ samuccaye yatas evam katham asau kṛtakaḥ dhūmaḥ vā svam svabhāvam anityaṃhetum ca agnim antareṇa bhavet na eva bhavet iti evam anuddiṣṭa rūpe viṣaye vyatirekekathyamāne āśrayam antareṇa api vaidharmya dṛṣṭānte prasidhyati vyatirekaḥ 
PVVṬ_78,1–78,3	 tena yat ucyate bha ṭṭaḥ dyaḥ te kaḥ rā bhyām vyatirekopi liṃgasya vipakṣān na eva labhyate abhāve sa na gamyeta kṛta yatnaiḥ abodhana ādi ti tat nirastam evantā vat tad bhāva hetu bhāva khyāpanāya tad avedinaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ vaktavyaḥ yeṣām punar pūrvam prasiddhau= eva tad bhāva hetu bhāvau yathāsvam pramāṇena pakṣa dharma mātra tvam niścitanteṣa antad bhāva hetu bhāvaṃprati viduṣām hetuḥ eva yad artham iti anvaya vyatireka niścaya artham pratipādyasya svayam eva sorthaḥ siddhaḥ iti kintat vacanena tadā iti niścita anvaya vyatireka kāle 
PVVṬ_78,4	 yat api mūḍham prati dṛṣṭānta pradarśanam kriyate tadā tad pradarśanepi dṛṣṭānta pradarśanepi vaidharmyam vinā api āśrayeṇa yathā ukta vidhinā sidhyati eva vyatirekaḥ tatas kim vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta āśrayeṇa iti manyamānaḥ ā cā ryaḥ āśrayam pratikṣipati nyā yaḥ mu khāḥ dau tathā hi tatra evam coditam yadā tarhi ākāśa ādikam nityantāvat abhyupaiti prativādī tadā kathat nityāt kṛtaka tvasya vyatirekaḥ iti tatrā cā ryaḥ āśrayam pratikṣipan= āha tadā sandehaḥ eva na asti tad abhāvāt tatra āvṛtteḥ iti 
PVVṬ_78,5	 etat uktam bhavati gṛhīta pratibandhasya tatra ākāśa ādau vyāpaka abhāvāt vyāpya abhāva siddheḥ anitya abhāvaḥ ca nityasya asatvāt siddhaḥ iti yāvat yasmāda dṛṣṭāntābhyām pratibandhaḥ kathyate tena kāraṇena jñāta sambandhe hetau sati dvayoḥ sādharmya vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ anyatara uktitaḥ dvitīyepi tābhyām eva anyatarasmin= anuktepi smṛtiḥ samupajāyate arthāpattyā 
PVVṬ_79,1	 etat api ācārya vacanena saṃsyandayan= āha yat āha ityādi nyā ye mu khe ca ayam granthaḥ vā śabdaḥ tatra eva pūrva vikalpa apekṣī anyatareṇa iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntena vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntena vā ubhaya pradarśanāt anvaya vyatireka pradarśanāt tatra api granthe dṛṣṭāntena svabhāva hetau kāryaṃhetau ca yathā kramantadbhāva hetu bhāva pradarśanam kriyate iti manyamānaa ācāryorthāpattyā ekasya anvayasya vyatirekasya vā vacanena dvitīyasya yathākramam vyatirekasya anvayasya vā siddhim āha etat eva āha tathā hi iti yat kiñcit kṛta kantat a nityam eva iti ukte vyaktam avaśya mayam anitya tva ākhyaḥ dharmosya kṛtakasya svabhāvaḥ tanmātra anubandhī kṛtaka mātra anubandhī pramāṇa dṛṣṭaḥ iti pramāṇena niścitaḥ 
PVVṬ_79,2–79,4	 nanu kāryā ipi kāraṇam avaśyam bhavati na ca tat tasya svabhāvaḥ iti atas āha anartha antaraḥ iti kathantanmātrā anubandhī iti āha tad bhāva niyamāt iti kṛtaka bhāve avaśyam anitya tā bhāvāt iti arthaḥ nanu na kṛtaka mātra anubandhī svabhāvaḥ nitya tvasya pratyakṣa niścitaḥ kṣaṇikoyam iti aniścayāt tat katham ucyate pramāṇa dṛṣṭaḥ iti atha kṛtakaḥ vināśam pratyanapekṣa tvāt tat bhāva niyataḥ iti anumāna dṛṣṭaḥ tat ayuktam yatas nirhetukepi vināśe yadā eva ghaṭa ādeḥ nāśaḥ pratīyeta tadā eva ahetukaḥ syāt na anyadā tat katham kṣaṇika tvam atha ekakṣaṇa sthāyi tvena ghaṭasya utpatteḥ pūrvam api nāśaḥ 
PVVṬ_79,5	 nanu yathā ekakṣaṇa sthāyi tvena utpattiḥ sva hetubhyaḥ tathā aneka kṣaṇa sthāyi tvena api utpattiḥ syāt vicitra śaktayaḥ hi sāmagryaḥ dṛśyante na ca yadi vināśaḥ kvacid kadācid bhavet tad kāla dravya apekṣa tvāt asya anapekṣa tva hāniḥ vināśaka hetu anapekṣa tvāt anyathā dvitīyepi kṣaṇe vināśaḥ na syāt tad kāla ādi apekṣa tvāt atha krama yaugapadyābhyām sāmarthya lakṣaṇam sattvam vyāptam nityeṣu ca krama ākrama nivṛttau sattvam nivarttamānam kṣaṇikeṣu eva avatiṣṭhate iti sattva yuktasya kṛtakasya gamaka tvam 
PVVṬ_79,6	 tat api ayuktam kṣaṇika tve sati krama apratipatteḥ yena hi jñānakṣaṇena pūrvakam vastu pratipannam na tena uttaram yena uttaram na tena pūrvakam iti katham krama pratītiḥ yaḥ hi pūrva vastu pratipati anantaram aparasya grāhakaḥ sa krama grāhī syāt tathā vā kṣaṇika tvam asya syāt yasya ca bau ddha sya kālaḥ eva na asti tasya katham krama grahaḥ bhinna kāla vastu agrahāt kāla abhāve ca aneka vastu rūpaḥ eva kramaḥ tathā ca nityasya api krama karttṛ tvam na virudhyate yathā ca nityasya krama karttṛ tvāt aneka rūpa tvan tathā kṣaṇasya api syāt atha kṣaṇa vat dvitīye kṣaṇe nityasya api abhāvaḥ syāt kārya abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_80,1	 tat ayuktam kāla abhāvāt bhavatu vā krama grahaḥ tathā api katham krama ākramābhyām sattvasya vyāptiḥ krama yaugapadi a vyatirekeṇa anyena prakāreṇa artha kriyā sambhavāt na ca prakāra antarasya dṛśya anupalambhāt abhāva niścayaḥ evam hi viśiṣṭa deśa ādau= eva abhāva niścayaḥ syāt na sarvadā na api adṛśya anupalambhāt abhāva niścayaḥ sandehāt tasmāt nityeṣu krama akrama ayogepi sattva anivṛtteḥ katham sattvasya kṣaṇika svabhāva tvam iti śam kaḥ ra prabhṛtayaḥ 
PVVṬ_80,2–80,4	 bhavatu vā prakāra antara abhāvāt krama yaugapadyābhyām sattvasya vyāptiḥ tathā api nityeṣu na pratyakṣa ādinā krama ākramā yogaḥ siddhaḥ nittyānām atīndriya tvāt tad asiddhau ca na teṣu sattva nivṛtti siddhiḥ tad asiddhau ca na satvasya kṣaṇika svabhāva tva siddhiḥ kiñca sattvāt krama yaugapadya anumānam syāt tena eva vyāpta tvāt na tu kṣaṇika tva anumā anantatra krama karttṛ tva asambhavāt iti atra ucyate krama yaugapadye pratyakṣa siddhe eva sahabhāvaḥ hi bhāvānām yaugapadyam kramaḥ tu pūrva apara bhāvaḥ sa ca kramiṇām abhinnaḥ tad pratibhāsaḥ ca eka pratibhāsaḥ sa tu eka pratibhāsā anantaram aparasya pratibhāsaḥ krama pratibhāsaḥ na tu ekasya eva atiprasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_80,5–80,7	 satyam tatra api yadā ekasya pratibhāsaḥ na tadā aparasya tad bhāve hi yaugapadya pratibhāsaḥ syāt tasmāt kramiṇoḥ pūrva uttarābhyām jñānābhyām grahe kramaḥ gṛhītaḥ eva tatas abhedāt kevalam pūrva anubhūta vastu āhita saṃskāra prabodhena idam asmāt anantaram iti ānupūrvī vikalpa utpattyā krama grahaḥ vyavasthāpyate kramiṇām grahepi kathaṃcid ānupūrvī vikalpa anutpattau krama āgraha vyavasthā apanāt ataḥ eva kramiṇām eka grahepi na krama grahaḥ ucyate kim ca kāla abhyupagama vādinā upi katham krama grahaḥ eka kāla tvāt sarva kāryāṇām atha bhinna kāla kāraṇa upādhikramāt kārya kramaḥ tat ayuktam kālasya eka tvātaḥ atas eva na nityaṃsya bhāvaḥ atha pūrva apara rūpa tvāt kramavān kālaḥ 
PVVṬ_80,8	 nanu tasya api kramaḥ yadi apara kāla apekṣaḥ tadā anavasthā syāt atha tasya svarūpeṇā kramaḥ tathā sahāya rahitānāmbahūnām kāryāṇām api kramaḥ syāt asmākantu pūrva ādi pratyaya viṣayaḥ mahābhūta viśeṣaḥ kālaḥ loka pratīta usti eva tasya ca bhedāt krama ādi pratītiḥ yujyate eva na api prakāra antareṇa nityasya karta tvam sambhavati yatas prakāra antareṇa ekadaika kārya karaṇe aneka karaṇe vā anyadā avastu tvam syāt kārya abhāvāt punar punar kārya karaṇe ca kramaḥ eva na prakāra antara sambhavaḥ atha prakāra antareṇa na ekadā kāryam karoti punar punar ca na karoti tadā asya avastu tvam syāt sarvadā akarttṛ tvāt
