PVVṬ_81,1^1	 tasmāt krama ākramābhyām ghaṭa ādiḥ artha kriyā kārī pratyakṣa siddhaḥ saḥ eva ayam iti jñānāt akṣaṇikaḥ ca pratīyate eva tasya ca yadā eka kārya karaṇaṃprati sāmarthī antat tadā eva na pūrvam na paścāt tad kārya abhāvāt sāmarthyam ca tat avyatiriktam evam uttarottara kārya utpattau= api draṣṭavyam sāmarthya bhedena ca padārtha bhedāt kṣaṇikaḥ eva krama ākramayoḥ niyamaḥ tena yatra sattvantatra krama ākrama pratītau= api kṣaṇika tva pratītiḥ eva yaḥ eva kṣaṇike krama ākramayoḥ niyamoyam eva nityeṣu tayoḥ ayogaḥ tasmāt yat etat ghaṭa ādau nitya tvam pratītam tat sattva viruddham iti nityasya krama yaugapadyābhyām artha kriyā virodhaḥ siddhaḥ ucyate 
PVVṬ_81,1^2	 yathā ca dṛṣṭe ghaṭa ādau sattvam kṣaṇikatva vyāptam tathā adṛṣṭeṣu api aviśeṣāt iti vyāptim sarva upasaṃhāreṇa pratipadya yathā yathā teṣu sattvam niścīyate tathā tathā kṣaṇikatva anumānam sattva aniścaye tu śaśa viṣāṇa vat teṣu asattā śaṃkayā kṣaṇikatva apratītiḥ syāt na ca tatra api bādhaka pramāṇena eva kṣaṇika tvasya siddha tvāt anumānasya vaiyarthyam gṛhīta vyāptikasya puṃsaḥ sattva niścaya mātreṇa eva sādhya artha avagateḥ bādhaka utthāna vaiyarthyāt vistarataḥ tu ayam vyāpti grahaṇa prakāraḥ nairātmya siddhau= abhihitaḥ iti tatra eva avadhāryaḥ 
PVVṬ_81,2–81,3	 ye tu sattvasya vipakṣāt abhāvena sarvatra kṣaṇika tva vyāptim pratipadya sattvāt tatra eva kṣaṇika tvam anumāpayanti teṣām anumāna utthānam eva na syāt vyāpti grahaṇāt eva pramāṇāt sarvatra kṣaṇika tvasya siddha tvāt na ca dharmī siddhaḥ sarvasya trailokyasya pratyakṣa tvāt hetuḥ ca asiddhaḥ pakṣīkṛte ca sarvasmin dharmiṇi bādhaka vaśāt yadi vipakṣa abhāvaḥ siddhaḥ tadā sādhyasya api siddha tvāt na anumānasya utthānam syāt na anyaḥ ca dharmī siddhaḥ iti katham bādhakasya pravṛttiḥ iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt sthitam etat asya sattva viśiṣṭasya kṛtaka tvasya kṣaṇikatva ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ svabhāvaḥ tanmātra anubandhī asya vā kṣaṇika tvasya svabhāvaḥ tanmātra anubandhī kṛtaka mātra anubandhī pramāṇa dṛṣṭaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_81,4	 yat vā sattva viśeṣaṇa rahitasya api kṛtaka tva ādeḥ kṣaṇika tve sādhye na anaikāntika tvam yatas tasya prathame kṣaṇe yaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ saḥ eva ced dvitīye kṣaṇe tadā abhūtvā bhavanam eva syāt prathama kṣaṇa vat tatas ca kṣaṇika tvam atha prathama kṣaṇe kṛtakasya janma eva na sthitiḥ dvitīye tu kṣaṇe sthitiḥ eva na janma evam api kṣaṇika tvam syāt janma janminā uḥ abhedāt sthiti sthitimatoḥ ca na ca dvitīye kṣaṇe janma vinā sthitiḥ yuktā janma ced na tadā sthitiḥ tasya advitīya ādi kṣaṇa bhāvi tvāt tatra api evam iti sarvatra utpattiḥ eva na sthitiḥ iti kṣaṇika tvam eva utpattiḥ ca hetu kṛtā iti tatra eva kṛtaka tvam na sthitau tasmāt kṛtaka tvasya akṣaṇika tva viruddha tvāt na anaikāntika tvam vistareṇa ca asya kṛtaka tvasya kṣaṇika tva vyāptiḥ naiḥ rā tmya si ddhā vabhihitā iti tatra eva avagantavyā 
PVVṬ_82,1–82,2^1	 tasmāt sattva anantarbhūtasya api kṛtaka tvasya vyāptiḥ pramāṇa dṛṣṭā tat āha asya svabhāvaḥ tanmātra anubandhī pramāṇa dṛṣṭaḥ tad bhāva niyamāt kṛtaka bhāve avaśyam anitya tā bhāva niyamāt iti evam jñāta tad bhāvasya anitya svabhāvam kṛtakam jñātavataḥ puṃsortha āpattyā sādhyasya anitya tvasya abhāve kṛta kan na bhavati iti evaṃniścayaḥ bhavati iti yasmāt na hi svasya ātma bhūtasya anitya tvasya abhāve bhāvaḥ bhavati tad ātma bhūtam kṛtaka tvam bhavati kim kāraṇam abhedāt sādhya sādhanayoḥ anyathā iti yadi anitya tva abhāve kṛtaka tvam bhavet tadā tad bhāve kṛtaka tva abhāve avaśyam anitya tvam bhavati iti eva na syāt tathā iti yathā sādharmya prayoge vaidharmya gatiḥ tathā vaidharmya prayogenvaya smṛtiḥ bhavati iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_82,2^2	 tad abhāvaḥ iti nitya tva abhāve kṛtaka tvat na bhavati avaśyam iti ukte tatas eva vaidharmya prayogāt tad bhāvatā vedinaḥ sādhanasya sādhya svabhāva tā vedinaḥ puṃsaḥ kathantat bhāva tām vetti iti ced āha tathā hi ityādi ayam anitya tva ākhyaḥ dharmosya kṛtaka tvasya svabhāvaḥ yena tad abhāve kṛtaka tvat na bhavati anyathā iti anitya tvam yadi kṛtakasya svabhāvaḥ na bhavet tadā tad abhāve kṛtaka tvat na bhavet iti asya ayogāt iti hetoḥ tad svabhāvatā pratipattyā kṛtakasya anitya svabhāvatā upratipattyā anvaya smṛtiḥ bhavati 
PVVṬ_82,3–83,2	 etat uktam bhavati yaḥ eva hetoḥ sādhyaḥ eva bhāvaḥ saḥ eva vipakṣe abhāvaḥ iti anvaya vyatirekayoḥ tādātmyam anyonya vyāptiḥ ca atas hetau= anvaya pratītyā vyatireka pratītiḥ vyatireka pratītyā ca anvaya pratītiḥ anumānam eva tena yat ucyate sāmarthyam icchataḥ kī rtte rna ṣṭam dvi tva avadhāraṇam itinyāyam aṃjarī tad apāstam yat vā na eva etat pramāṇam kevalam saṃketa vaśāt anvaya mukhena vyatireka mukhena vā prayuktam ekam vākyam ubhayam gamayati iti adoṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_83,3	 svabhāva hetau= anyatara prayogāt ubhaya gatim uktvā kārya hetau= āha tathā ityādi yatra iti sarva nāmnā sarva upasaṃhāraḥ tatra agniḥ avaśyam iti ukte asmāt eva anvaya vacanāt kāryan dhūmaḥ dahanasya iti evat niścayaḥ bhavati kiṅkāraṇam yena dhūme avaśyam agniḥ bhavati anyathā yadi na kāraṇam agni dhūrmasya tadā artha antarasya agneḥ tad anubandha niyama abhāvāt dhūme yonubandhaḥ vyāpanaṃtat niyamasya abhāvāt tatas ca svātantrī ambhāvasya dhūma svabhāvasya syāt atas iti svātantryāt tad abhāvepi agni abhāvepi dhūma svabhāvasya avaikalyāt na abhāvaḥ syāt na ca evantasmāt kāryaḥ dhūmaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ yatas kārye tu dhūmebhyupagate avaśyantatra kāraṇam agniḥ bhavati idam iti asya eva samarthanam artha antara bhāvaḥ iti kārya abhimatasya bhāve svabhāva upadhānam svarūpa pratyupasthānam kāryasya api tad bhāvaḥ eva kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva bhāvaḥ kārya tvam tat ca kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva bhāvi tvam asti dhūme tasmāt kāryam dhūmaḥ iti evam anvayena vidita tad kārya tvasya puṃsaḥ dahana abhāve dhūmaḥ na bhavati iti arthāt bhavati 
PVVṬ_83,4	 adhunā vaidharmyeṇa anvaya gatim āha tathā ityādi asati agnau dhūmaḥ na bhavati iti ukte asmāt vyatireka vacanāt vidita tad kārya tvasya dhūme avaśyam agniḥ bhavati iti evam arthāt anvaya pratipattiḥ bhavati anyathā yadi vaidharmya vacanena agneḥ kāryam dhūmaḥ iti etat na kathyatetat abhāve agni abhāve kinna bhavet dhūmaḥ bhavet eva iti vyatireka niścayaḥ eva na syāt tasmāt sthitam etat satyartha antara tve yad abhāve yat avaśyat na bhavati tat tasya kāryam atas ca vyatireka kathanāt anvayaḥ gamyate iti 
PVVṬ_84,1	 atra paraḥ vyabhicāram āha nanu ca ityādi nitya anitya arthayoḥ kāryat = itya anitya artha kāryantadbhāvaḥ tattvam tasya abhāvepi tathā hi śravaṇa jñānam śabdasya eva gharma tvāt asā ādhāraṇantatra na jñāyate kinnityasya sataḥ śabdasya kāryam śravaṇa jñāna muta anityasya iti tatas ca na nitya artha kārya tvam śravaṇa jñānasya na api anitya artha kārya tvan tathā api śravaṇa jñānan na bhavati tad abhāvepi nitya anitya artha abhāve tad vyatireke vyatiricyate iti yāvat nitya artha abhāve tāvat na bhavati anityeṣu ghaṭa ādiṣu abhāvāt anitya abhāvepi na bhavati nityeṣu ākāśa ādiṣu abhāvāt na vai na bhavati iti si ddhā ntavādī na vai tad śrāvaṇa tvad nitya anitya abhāve na bhavati iti evam śakyam vijñātum yadi tu tad abhāvena bhavati iti evat niścayaḥ syāt tadā tad kārya tvat niyamena syāt kintu tad abhāve na bhavati iti eva na asti kiṅkāraṇantayoḥ eva nitya anitya tvayoḥ tatas śrāvaṇa tvāt saṃśayāt anyathā anitya anitye vastuni abhāvena niścitāt śrāvaṇa tvāt kathantad bhāva parāmarśena śabde saṃśayaḥ syāt tasmāt nitya anityābhyām vyāvṛttiḥ eva na asti śrāvaṇa tvasya 
PVVṬ_84,2–84,3	 kathantarhi asādhāraṇa tvāt śrāvaṇa tvam nitya anityayoḥ na asti iti ucyate iti āha kevalantu ityādi nitya anityeṣu śrāvaṇa tvasya bhāva niścaya abhāvāt śrāvaṇa tvam nitya ānatyayoḥ na asti iti ucyate nanu anitya ādike sādhye yadi śrāvaṇa tvam sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ dṛṣṭam syāt syāt śabde śrāvaṇa tvāt sandehaḥ prameya tvāt iva na ca etat sa pakṣa avipakṣayoḥ dṛṣṭam atas apratipattiḥ iti bhās ṭṭaḥ dyaḥ te kaḥ rau atha śabdavastu kadācid nityam anityam vā vastu dharmaḥ ca śrāvaṇa tvantena atas sandehaḥ ucyate 
PVVṬ_84,4–84,5	 tat ayuktam evam hi vastu dharma tvasya eva sandeha hetu tvam syāt na śrāvaṇa tvasya iti atra ucyate yadi hi yatra yatra śrāvaṇa tvantatra tatra nitya anityayoḥ abhāvaḥ iti pratipannam syāt tatas nitya aniti ayoḥ apratipattiḥ syāt na ca anitya ādi yukte ghaṭa ādau śrāvaṇa tvasya abhāvaḥ iti śabdepya bhāvaḥ tena śrāvaṇa tvāt tatra sandehaḥ eva nanu śrāvaṇa tvam śravaṇa jñānaṃprati sāmarthyan na ca nityasya sāmarthyam asti artha kriyā virodhāt tat katham atas sandehaḥ anitya tvasya eva niścayāt iti 
PVVṬ_84,6	 evam manyate yadi sāmarthya mātram hetuḥ tadā sattvam eva tat iti na kācid kṣatiḥ tasya sa pakṣa sādhāraṇa tvāt evam prameya tva ādiṣu api draṣṭavyam atha śravaṇa jñānaṃprati yat sāmarthyantat hetuḥ tat ca na kvacid anitya tva vyāptam siddham iti katham atas anitya tva siddhi rasādhāraṇa tvāt ayaṃśabdaḥ eva tad anitya tva vyāptam siddham tena eva hi bādhakena pramāṇena anitya tvasya tatra siddha tvāt śrāvaṇa tvasya vaiyarthyam syāt evam sa ca asādhāraṇa hetūnām agamaka tvam boddhavyam 
PVVṬ_85,1	 tasmāt sthitam etat kārya hetau dṛṣṭāntābhyām sādhya sādhanayoḥ hetu phala bhāvaḥ kathanīyaḥ na tu darśana adarśana mātram evam hi artha apattyā anyatareṇa dvitīya pratītiḥ bhavet anyathā na syāt iti āha yadā punar ityādi tadā yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti eva na syāt iti anvayaḥ eva na syāt pratibandha abhāvāt yadā ca anvayaḥ eva na siddhaḥ tadā kutogni abhāve dhūmaḥ na asti iti arthāt vyatireka siddhiḥ tathā vaidharmyeṇa adarśana mātrasya khyāpanāt sādhya abhāve hetu abhāva asiddheḥ kutas tad vāreṇa anvaya smṛtiḥ yathā uktaḥ iti tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ eka sadbhāve kārya svabhāva liṅgasya sadbhāve anya prasiddhi artham kāraṇasya svabhāvasya ca liṅginaḥ prasiddhi artham tad abhāve yathā ukta pratibandha abhāve sati eka sadbhāve anya prasiddheḥ asambhavāt 
PVVṬ_85,2	 hetu svabhāva abhāvaḥ iti hetu abhāvaḥ vyāpaka svabhāva abhāvaḥ ca atas iti anantara uktāt kāraṇāt kasyacid kāryasya vyāpyasya ca pratiṣedhe cakārāt pratiṣedha vyavahāre ca sādhye hetuḥ liṅgam kiṅkāraṇam yasmāt tau= eva hi kāraṇa vyāpakauni varttamānau sva pratibaddham kāryam vyāpyam ca svabhāvam nivarttayate iti kasyacid arthasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vā pratiṣedham api sādhayitu kāmena api śabdāt vyavahāram api hetoḥ kāraṇasya vyāpakasya ca svabhāvasya nivṛttiḥ hetu tvena ākhyeyāḥ kiṅkāraṇam apratibandhe hi ityādi na ca tābhyām anyaḥ pratibandha usti iti bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ nyāyyaḥ upalambhaḥ yasya sa tathā adṛśyasya iti arthaḥ tasyati svabhāvasya anupalambhanam pratiṣedha hetuḥ na ca ayam pratiṣedhasya eva hetuḥ kintu pratiṣedha viṣayaḥ vyavahāraḥ tasya hetuḥ iti kṛtvā tad hetuḥ pratiṣedha hetuḥ iti uktaḥ kim kāraṇam na pratiṣedha hetuḥ tathābhūta anupalambhasya dṛśya anupalambhasya svayam pratiṣedha hetuḥ vyāpakān upalabdhiḥ iti kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ca ubhayasya api iti pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedha vyavahārasya ca 
PVVṬ_86,1	 iti evam iyam anupalabdhiḥ saṃkṣipya tridhā api uktā satī punar anekadhā uktā yathā atra evā aṣṭadhā prāk vibhaktā kena prakāreṇa iti āha tat tat viruddha ityādi tad śabdena prakrāntam svabhāva kāraṇa vyāpaka trayam gṛhyate tena svabhāva ditrayeṇa viruddhanta dvis uddhantrividham eva bhavati svabhāva viruddha kāraṇa viruddha vyāpaka viruddha bhedāḥ tad viruddham ādiḥ yasya tad tad viruddha ādi ādi śabdena viruddha kāryasya kāraṇa viruddha kāryasya ca parigrahaḥ tat ca tad viruddha ādī tayoḥ agati gatī tat agatiḥ tad viruddha ādi gatiḥ ca iti arthaḥ tayoḥ bhedaḥ tena prayogaḥ tasmāt prayoga bhedatonekadhā uktā tatra tad agatyā tisra unupalabdhayaḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ca tad viruddha gatyā tisraḥ eva svabhāva viruddha upalabdhiḥ kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhiḥ vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ ca ādi śabdāt viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ kāraṇa viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ ca iti evam aṣṭavidhasya prāk uktasya anupalambhasya saṃgrahaḥ bhavati 
PVVṬ_86,2	 trividhaḥ eva hi ityādinā kārikā artham āha upalabhya sattvasya iti upalambha yogyasya hetoḥ anupalabdhiḥ iti sambandhaḥ vyāpakasya sva ātmanaḥ ca upalabhya sattvasya iti varttate soyantrividha pratiṣedha hetuḥ prayoga vaśena aneka prakāraḥ uktaḥ iti sambandhaḥ katham prayoga vaśena iti āha tad tad viruddha ādi agati gati bheda prayogataḥ iti etat eva tasya āgatya ityādinā vibhajyate tasya āgatya iti svabhāva kāraṇa vyāpaka an upalabdhyā tat viruddha gatyā iti svabhāva kāraṇa vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhyā viruddha kārya gatyā iti viruddha kārya upalabdhyā iti ādi bheda prayogaiḥ iti kāraṇa viruddha kārya upalabdhi ādi bheda prayogaiḥ yathā uktam prāk anu pala bdhi pra bhe da ci ntā yām 
PVVṬ_87,1	 yatas evam pratibandha vaśāt gamaka tvāt tasmāt kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt vā niyāmakāt sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyabhicāra sādhakāt svabhāvāt vā tādātmya lakṣaṇāt niyāmakāt kāryasya svabhāvasya ca liṅgasya avinābhāvaḥ sādhya dharmam vinā na bhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ na ca asādhāraṇasya sādhyāvinā abhā= a usti sandeha hetu tvāt avinā abhāve tu tad niścāyakena eva pramāṇena tatra dharmiṇi sādhyasya siddha tvāt katham asya gamaka tvam 
PVVṬ_87,2–87,4	 tena bha ṭṭe na yat ucyate avinābhāva śabda upya sakala artha bhāj na anumā yogya sambandha pratipatti karoti naḥ yadi tāvat vinā abhāvaḥ na sa paścāt viśiṣyate tatas asādhāraṇepi asti saḥ iti syāt akāraṇam yaḥ hi asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ sa tena eva ātmasātkṛtaḥ vinā na bhavati iti eva jñātaḥ hetuḥ prasajyate iti tad apāstam avinā abhāvaḥ eva hi niyamaḥ sādhyam vinā na bhavati iti kṛtvā 
PVVṬ_87,5	 yadi evam kim artham punar niyama grahaṇam sattyam para mata nirāsa artham sa hi avinābhau= a vyatirekeṇa anyam niyamam icchati yat āha bhās ṭṭaḥ evam anya ukta sambandha pratyākhyāne kṛte sati niyamaḥ nāma sambandhaḥ sva matena ucyate adhunā kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi sambandhānām dvayī gatiḥ niyama aniyamābhyām syāt niyamasya anuma aṅga tā sarva īpya niyamāḥ hi ete na anumā utpatti kāraṇam niyamāt kevalāt evat na kiñcid na anumīyate tasmāt niyamaḥ eva ekaḥ sambandhaḥ atra avadhāryate gamakasya eva gamyena sa ceṣṭaḥ prāk nirūpitaḥ niyama smarataḥ samyak niyamya eka aṅga darśanāt niyāmaka aṅga vijñānam anumā ananta daṅgiṣu iti tad apāstam 
PVVṬ_88,1	 kāya kāraṇa bhāva ādi sambandha abhāve niyamaḥ eva na syāt apratibaddhānām sahabhāva niyama abhāvāt pāṇḍu tva ādi mātrasya ca agni akārya tvāt deśa kāla ādi apekṣayā ca liṅgasya gamaka tvāt niyamaḥ eva iti katham kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi sambandha ipi dvayī gatiḥ ucyate atha syāt kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi sambandham abhyupagacchatā api yāvat sādhanasya sādhyeniyamaḥ na niścitaḥ tāvat na sādhya pratipatti aṅgatvantena kārya kāraṇa bhāve sati api niyamaḥ eva sambandha ubhyupagamyate tasya eva pratipatti aṅga tvāt tat vaktum saḥ eva ekonumānāṅgam śeṣāḥ tad vyakti hetavaḥ iti tat ayuktam niyamaḥ hi tad āyatta tā eva sā ca tādātmya tad utpatti svabhāva eva tena tādātmya tad utpatti niścayaḥ eva niyama niścayaḥ na punar darśana adarśanābhyāt niyama niścayaḥ vyabhicārāt 
PVVṬ_88,2–88,4	 nanu yathā darśana adarśanayoḥ niyama niścayaṃprati vyabhicāraḥ tathā kārya kāraṇa bhāva niścayepi syāt iti tat ayuktam viśiṣṭābhyām eva darśana adarśanābhyām kārya kāraṇa bhāva niścaya abhyupagamāt etat ca atra eva vakṣyati yat apyu mve ke na ucyate śataśas yat agnau dhūma darśanantat anyathā anupapattyā niyata uyam dhūma ugnau= iti yat niyama jñānam utpadyate tasya anagnau dhūma darśa nambādhakam na ca tat asti iti dhūmasya agnau niyamaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_88,5–88,6	 tat ayuktam agni kārya tva abhāve hi anagnau dhūma adarśanasya anupalabdhi mātra tvena apramāṇasya ābādhaka tvāt anagnau dhūmasya śaṃkyamāna tvena katham agnau niyamaḥ stasmāt sthitam etat kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt vā svabhāvāt vā niyāmakāt avinā abhau= a niyamaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi niścayāt ca avina abhāva niyama niścayaḥ adarśanāt na na darśanāt sādhya abhāve hetoḥ adarśana mātra at nāvina abhāva niyama niścayaḥ na darśanāt na api sādhya sādhanayoḥ saha bhāva darśanāt 
PVVṬ_88,7–88,8	 tasmāt tat utpattyā eva artha antarasya artha antareṇa avinābhāvaḥ anyathā iti āsatya antad utpattau paraiḥ sādhya abhimataiḥ parasya anātma abhūtasya liṃgasyakaḥ avaśyambhāva niyamaḥ anartha antare tu liṅge tanmātra anubandhi tvam sādhya dharmasya iṣṭavyam anyathā kṛtaka tvasya yat nimittantasmāt artha antara mudgara ādi nimittam yasyāḥ nitya tvasya iṣyate tasmin vā dharme avaśyambhāva niyamaḥ kaḥ kim iva vāsasi rāga vat niṣpanne vāsasi kusumbha ādi nimittaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ paścāt bhāvī 
PVVṬ_89,1	 tatra yathā na avaśī ambhāva niyamaḥ tadvat anitya tvasya artha antara hetutvaḥ iṣyamāṇe na kevala mayan doṣaḥ ayam aparaḥ doṣaḥ iti āha api ca ityādi artha antara nimittaḥ nitya tva ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ syāt anyaḥ eva tasmāt svabhāva bhūtāt kṛtakādeḥ tathā hi sādhya dharmasya artha antara nimitta tva abhyupagame dvayam iṣṭam sādhana niṣpattau= aniṣpattiḥ bhinna hetuka tvam ca etat ca na antareṇa svabhāva bhedam ghaṭate yasmāt na hi tasmin sādhana svabhāveniṣpannepya niṣpannaḥ bhinna hetukaḥ vā sādhya dharmaḥ tad svabhāvaḥ yuktaḥ pūrva niṣpannasya bhinna hetukasya ca liṅgasya svabhāvaḥ yuktaḥ yasmāt ayam eva khalu loka pratītaḥ bhedaḥ bhāvānām yaḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ viruddha dharma yogaḥ niṣpatti aniṣpattī ca atra viruddhau dharmau tathā ayam eva bheda hetuḥ bhedasya janakaḥ yaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ sāmagrī bhedaḥ ca atra kāraṇa bhedaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ etena bheda svarūpa bheda kāraṇañca uktam 
PVVṬ_89,2	 bheda pratibhāsaḥ tu bheda grāhakaḥ tau ced biruddha dharma adhyāsa kāraṇa bhedau na bhedaka āviṣyete tadā na kasyacid vastunaḥ kutaścid arthāt bhedaḥ iti ekandravyam viśvaṃsamaḥ tan jagat syāt traiguṇyasya aviśeṣāt aikyam sarvasya iṣṭam eva iti ced āha tatas ca iti eka tvāt saha utpatti vināśau ekasya utpāde sarvasya utpādaḥ vināśe ca vināśaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ sarvasya ca sarvatra kāryaḥ upayogaḥ kāraṇa tvam syāt saha utpati ādi anabhyupagame sarvam vastu ekam iti eva na syāt atha upayoga ādi bhedena paraspara bhinna ātmatā iṣyate bhedāḥ nām syāt bahūnām ekam iti saṃjñā kṛtā syāt kiṅkāraṇamaḥ artham paraspara bhinnam abhyupagamya tathā abhidhānāt ekam iti abhidhānāt 
PVVṬ_90,1–90,2	 atha syāt prāc pradhvaṃsa abhāva antar varti sattā sambandhaḥ anitya tā sā ca kṛtaka niṣpatti kāle niṣpannā eva kevalam pradhvaṃset na uttara kālam abhivyajyate iti tat api ayuktam yatas yāvat pradhvaṃsaḥ na utpadyate tāvat katham antarāla vartti anitya tā pradhvaṃsa utpattau= api katham antarāla vartti tvam asyāḥ kṛtaka svabhāva tvam vā bhāvasya eva abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_90,3	 nanu ityādi paraḥ anartha antara hetu tvepi vināśa kāraṇa anapekṣa tvepi tvad matena anitya tāyāḥ bhāva kāle anitya tā niṣpatteḥ bhāvasya sattā kāle tasyāḥ anitya tāyāḥ aniṣpatte rbhāvāt uttara kālam anitya tā bhavati iti manyate tulyā atad svabhāvāḥ yathārtha antara hetu tvepi niṣpattiḥ syāt tayoḥ nānātu antarthā anartha antara hetu tvepīti tulyā atad svabhāva tā 
PVVṬ_90,4–90,5	 na ityādinā pratividhatte apūrva svabhāva lābhaḥ niṣpattiḥ ucyate anitya tā ca bhāva nivṛtti rūpā tatas niṣpatteḥ eva abhāvāt katham viruddha dharma saṃrgaḥ yadi tarhi na anitya tā vastu satī katham sādhya sādhanayoḥ tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ iti āha saḥ eva hi bhāvaḥ iti kṣaṇe sthitiḥ yā sā eva dharmaḥ yasya iti nivṛtti dharmā svabhāvaḥ eva anitya tā ucyate saḥ eva sādhyaḥ tena tādātmyam hetu sādhyayoḥ vyatirikta artha tva nitya tā nīrūpāḥ tena bhāvasya anitya tā bhavati iti iti evamādibhiḥ vākyaiḥ bhāvasya na kiṃcid rupam vidhīyate api tu dṛṣṭam rūpam na asti iti ayam artha ubhidhīyate dharma antara abhidhāne bhāva nivṛtti apratipādana prasaṅgāt yadi bhāvaḥ eva anitya tā kathantarhi śabdasya dharmiṇaḥ nityatā dharmaḥ iti vacana bhedaḥ iti atas āha vacana bhedepi ityādi dharma dharmi tayā yaḥ vacana bhedaḥ vācakānyatu antatra api nimittam uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ 
PVVṬ_90,6	 etena yat api ucyate adhya yaḥ nā vi ddha kaḥ ṇ rṇaḥ dyaḥ te kaḥ rā di bhiḥ yadi tulā antayoḥ nāma unnāma vat kāryet patti kāle eva kāraṇa vināśaḥ tadā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na syāt yatas kāraṇasya vināśaḥ kāraṇa utpādaḥ evam bhāvaḥ eva nāśaḥ iti vacanāt evañca kāraṇena saha kāryam utpannam iti prāptam yadi ca bhāvaḥ eva nāśaḥ prathamepi kṣaṇe bhāvasya na sattā syāt vināśāt bhāva nivṛttiḥ ca vināśaḥ loka pratītaḥ na bhāvaḥ eva sarvakālam ca nāśa sadbhāvāt bhāvasya satvam syāt atha kāraṇa utpādāt kāraṇa vināśaḥ bhinnaḥ tadā kṛtaka svabhāva tvam anitya tvasya na syāt vyatirikte ca nāśe jāte tasya kṣaṇasya na nivṛttiḥ iti katham kṣaṇika tvam iti 
PVVṬ_91,1–91,2	 tad apāstam dvividhaḥ hi vināśaḥ iṣyate bhāva nivṛtti rūpaḥ bhāvaḥ ca tena utpannaḥ bhāvaḥ kāryaṅkaroti kārya kāle ca kāraṇa nivṛttiḥ upaḥ vināśaḥ loka pratītaḥ eva na ayambhāva svabhāvaḥ iṣyate na api kāraṇa utpādāt abhinnaḥ bhinnaḥ vā nīrūpa tvāt kevalam asya bheda abheda pratiṣedhaḥ eva kriyate tathā ca vakṣyati bhāve hi eṣa vikalpaḥ syāt vidheḥ vastu anurodhata iti 
PVVṬ_91,3	 tena vyatirikte nāśe jāte kṣaṇasya na nivṛttiḥ iti apāstam yatas ca dvitīya kṣaṇa utpatti kāle eva prathama kṣaṇe nivṛttiḥ tena ekakṣaṇa sthāyī bhāvaḥ vināśa śabdena ucyate ayam ca vināśaḥ bhāva rūpa tvāt sādhana svabhāvaḥ eva kārya utpatti kāle ca nivartteta iti kārya bhinna kāla bhāvī na ca asya sarva kālambhāvaḥ bhāvasya asatvāt 
PVVṬ_91,4–91,5	 yat vā vinaśvaraḥ ayam vināśaḥ asya iti dvābhyām dharma dharmi vācakābhyām avināśi vyāvṛttasya eva ekasya bhāvasya bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepābhyām abhidhānāt bhāvaḥ eva nāśaḥ ucyate iti sarvam sustham yadi tarhi bhāvaḥ eva anitya tā tadā bhāva pratyakṣīkaraṇe sā api pratyakṣā eva iti kasmāt na tathā eva niścīyate iti atas āha tām ityādi kṣaṇa sthiti dharma tām svabhāvam anitya tā ākhyaṃpaśyan= api pratyakṣīkurvāṇopi na vyavasyati na niścinoti iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_91,6	 kasmāt kṣaṇa sthiti dharmatā svabhāvaḥ iti āha sva hetoḥ eva sakāśāt tathā kṣaṇa sthita dharma tayā utpatteḥ kim punar paśyan= api na vyavasyati iti āha manda buddhiḥ iti anādi saṃsāra abhyastayā nitya ādi rūpa avidyā = āsanayā mandā buddhiḥ yasya sa tathā anyathā dṛṣṭe vastuni sarva ātmanām kim iti na niścayaḥ syāt anena tu yoginām sati api sadṛśa darśane manda buddhi tva abhāvāt kṣaṇika tva niścayaḥ bhavati iti uktam bhavati 
PVVṬ_91,7–91,8	 yadi tarhi avidyayā na anitya tva adhyavasāyaḥ vinaśyati api bhāve mā abhūt anityatā adhyavasāyaḥ iti āśaṃkya bāhmam api bhrānti bījam āha satta upalambhena ityādi yaḥ sattāyāḥ eva upalambhaḥ na abhā= asya tena satta upalambhena etat uktam bhavati uttara kṣaṇa utpāda kāle eva pūrva kṣaṇa vināśāt pūrva uttarayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ abhāvena avyavadhānāt nairantaryeṇa anyatva agrahāt sarvadā dvitīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu api sattāyā eva upalambhena tathā abhāvaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭasya bhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ tasya yā śaṅkā kadācid saḥ eva ayam iti evaṃrūpā bhūtāḥ bhrāntasya api saḥ eva ayam iti darśanāt śaka iti āha tayā vipralabdhaḥ vaṃcitaḥ na vyavasyati 
PVVṬ_92,1–92,3	 agni dhūmayoḥ api tarhi kārya kāraṇa bhāva niścayaḥ na syāt abhāva avyavadhānena anyatva agrahāt iti a āha sadṛśa apara utpatteḥ ityādi dṛṣṭam ca sadṛśa apara darśanam śuktikā ādau sati api bheda bhrānti nimittam etat ca naiḥ rā tmya si ddhau vibhaktam iti tatra eva ābadhārya tena sarva ātmanā pūrvakṣaṇa sadṛśasya aparasya utpattiḥ tayā vipralabdhaḥ na pūrvakṣaṇāt uttara kṣaṇam anya tvena adhyavasyati api tu saḥ eva ayam iti atas eva na pūrvakṣaṇasya vināśa pratītiḥ uttarasya ca utpatti pratītiḥ agni dhūmayoḥ tu ekāntena visadṛśa tvāt nairantarye sati api anyatva grahāt bhavati kārya kāraṇa bhāva niścayaḥ vā śabdaḥ tu anavakpti sūcana arthaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ yadi satta upalambhe vyabhicāraḥ sadṛśa apara utpattyā vā vipralambhaḥ sarvadā asti eva vipralambhaḥ iti evam paraḥ 
PVVṬ_92,4	 athavā kim punar paśyan= api na vyavasyati iti āha satta upalambhena pūrvam yaḥ satta upalambhena pratīyamāne tad bhāva śaṅkā pūrva dṛṣṭa bhāva āropaḥ tena vipralabdhaḥ na vyavasyati evantarhi ādi kṣaṇa darśanaḥ eva adhyavasāyaḥ syāt pūrvam satta upalambha abhāvāt iti āśaṃkyāha sadṛśa apara utpatti vipralabdhaḥ vā iti vā śabdaḥ ca arthe prathama kṣaṇa sadṛśasya dvitīya kṣaṇasya utpattyā ca vipralabdhaḥ na vyavasyati yoginām api tarhi niścayaḥ na syāt iti āha manda buddhiḥ iti tena bāhya ādhyātmika vipralambha nimitta sadbhāvāt pṛthagjanānām niścayaḥ yoginā antu sati api sadṛśa darśane paṭu buddhi tvāt niścayaḥ bhavati eva 
PVVṬ_92,5–92,7	 tasmāt sthitam etat kṣaṇa sthiti dharma tām paśyan= api sadṛśa apara utpattyā vipralabdhaḥ na vyavasyati iti nanu bhāvasya kṣaṇika tve sati pūrva uttarakṣaṇānām vibhāgena pratibhāsaḥ syāt apratibhāsanāt ca kathampaśyan= api na vyavasyati iti ucyate atha nīla ādi avyatirikta tvāt kṣaṇiṃka tvasya nīla grahe grahaḥ yuktam etat kintu idam atra nirūpyate kim idam nīla makṣaṇikam uta kṣaṇa rūpam atha santānaḥ tatra yadi akṣaṇi kanta dāḥ nīla pratibhāse katham kṣaṇika tva pratibhāsaḥ atha kṣaṇa rūpam nanu idam eva asiddham iti katham nīla pratibhāse kṣaṇa pratibhāsaḥ ucyate kṣaṇa apratibhāsanāt ca na santāna rūpasya nīlasya pratibhāsaḥ atha nīla mātra pratibhāse sati kṣaṇika tva pratibhāsaḥ tat ayuktam pratibhāsā pratibhāsābhyām hi pratyakṣasya grahaṇa agrahaṇe na anyathā tat āha tat yat api gṛhṇāti tad pratibhāsena iti na ca kṣaṇānām pratibhāsaḥ iti uktam 
PVVṬ_93,1	 yadi ca nīla ādi avyatiriktam kṣaṇika tu antadāḥ nīla niścaye kṣaṇika tvasya niścita tvāt anumānasya vaiyarthyam syāt yaḥ tu āha eka jñāna viṣaya tvam eva kṣaṇika tvam pūrva uttara jñāna viṣaya tva vyāvṛttasya eva ced ānīntana jñāna viṣaya tvasya pratibhāsanāt pūrva aparakṣaṇa vilakṣaṇaḥ eva kṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣeṇa anubhūta niścita unumānena tu pratyakṣa vṛttam eva parāmṛśyate iti na anumānasya vaiyarthyam iti 
PVVṬ_93,2	 tat ayuktam yatas yadi eka jñānasya akṣaṇika tvan tadārthasya api akṣaṇika tvam syāt atha tasya kṣaṇika tvan tat kutas avagatam tasya api eka jñāna viṣaya tvāt iti ced anavasthayā eva pratipattiḥ kṣaṇika tvasya atha jñā na kṣaṇasya pratibhāsaḥ abhyupagamyatesauvartha kṣaṇasya kinnābhyupagamyate anyathā ekasya api kṣaṇasya aneka jñāna viṣa tvāt aneka tvam syāt 
PVVṬ_93,3–93,4	 bha ṭṭa vā su de vaḥ stvā ha pūrva uttara kṣaṇānām vināśena apratibhāsanam eva akṣaṇika tva pratibhāsana matokṣaṇika tva grāhakam eva sarvam pratyakṣam kevalam kṣaṇikatva anumānena bhrāntam sādhyate iti etat api ayuktam pratijñāyāḥ pratyakṣa bādhita tvena anumānasya utthāna abhāvāt nirvikalpakasya api pratyakṣasya bhrānta tve sambandha grahaṇāt ca paśyan= api iti grantha virodhaḥ ca tasmāt ayuktam uktam paśyan= api na vyavasyati iti 
PVVṬ_93,5^1	 atra ucyate yathā hi artha kṣaṇānām paurvāparyan tathā jñāna kṣaṇānām api tena pūrvakeṇa jñāna kṣaṇena pūrvakaḥ eva artha kṣaṇaḥ gṛhyate na uttaraḥ uttareṇa api uttaraḥ eva na pūrvaḥ iti ekasmin jñāne tayoḥ apratibhāsanāt katham pūrvasmāt ayam anyaḥ iti vibhāgena pratibhāsaḥ syāt iti codyate sva rūpa pratibhāsaḥ eva ca bhāvasya anyasmāt viveka pratibhāsaḥ sumeru bhinna pratibhāsa vat sa ca kṣaṇasya api asti e vā iti katham na viveka pratibhāsaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ dṛśyate iti pratīteḥ ca anyaḥ hi dṛṣṭaḥ svabhāvonyaḥ ca dṛśyamānaḥ tathā hi prathama darśī dṛśyamānam eva svabhāvambhāvasya paśyati na tu dṛṣṭam iti anayoḥ bhedaḥ eva 
PVVṬ_93,5^2	 kevalam ekānta sadṛśayoḥ pūrva apara kṣaṇayoḥ abhāvena avyavadhānāt ghaṭa paṭa ādi vat vibhāga pratipattiḥ na bhavati na api vibhāgena apratibhā āsāda bheda upi na hi śuktikāya an tadeva idam asmadīyam rajatam iti pravarttamānasya śuktikāra jatayoḥ viveka pratibhāsā bhāvāt abheda upi tasmāt yathā atra nirvikalpake jñāne śuktikāyāḥ sva rūpa pratibhāsaḥ eva anyasmāda viveka pratibhāsaḥ tathā ekasya api kṣaṇasya syāta kevalam pūrvaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kasmāt na vibhāgena smaryate iti yadi param ca udyam syāt tatra ca uktam eva sadṛśa apara utpatti vipralabdhaiḥ na smaryate iti 
PVVṬ_94,1	 nanu tathā api kṣaṇaḥ na pratibhāsate ekāṇu atyaya kāla tvena eva bhāvasya apratīteḥ na tu yadi ekasmin kṣaṇesya apratibhāsaḥ katham akṣaṇikasya pratibhāsaḥ pratikṣaṇam apratibhāsanāt utpadyamānasya ca bhāvasya pūrva apara rūpa viviktasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt katham kṣaṇika tva grahaḥ na api akṣaṇikaḥ pratīyate pūrva apara kālayoḥ apratibhāsāt eva tad sambandhi tayā idānīm pratyakṣe apratibhāsanāt pūrva kāla sambandhi svabhāvasya idānīm apratibhāsa eva vināśaḥ anya svabhāvasya pratibhāsaḥ eva utpādaḥ iti katham ucyate pūrva uttarakṣaṇānām vināśa utpāda apratibhāsanāt akṣaṇikaḥ iti na api aneka kṣaṇa rūpaḥ idānīntanaḥ kāla ūneka kṣaṇa sambhave gṛhīta ādi rūpa tā asya syāt na vyartha tā 
PVVṬ_94,2–94,4	 na hi pratyakṣa bhāvinā niścayena idānīm eva idam asti iti niścīyate kintarhi idānīm asti iti anumānena tu idānīm eva asti iti sādhyate tasmāt sthitam etat paśyan= api na vyavasyati ityādi nanu yadi nityam sadṛśaḥ iti pratyakṣeṇa niścayaḥ syāt saḥ eva ayam iti buddhiḥ bhrāntiḥ yāvatā sarvadā saḥ eva ayam iti pratītiḥ dṛḍha rūpa utpadyate iti katham bhrāntiḥ tat āha bhaṭṭaḥ 
PVVṬ_94,5–94,7	 nityam sadṛśaḥ eva iti yatra rūḍhā matiḥ bhavet saḥ iti pratyabhijñānam bhrāntiḥ tatra avakalpate iha nityam saḥ eva iti vijñānam jāyate dṛḍham tad astitva atirekāt ca prāmāṇyantasya yujyate deśa kāla ādi bhedena tatra asti avasaraḥ mitaḥ idānīntanam astitvam na hi pūrvadhiyaḥ gatam na ca sarvadā anumānena sadṛśa niścayaḥ pratyakṣa pratyabhijñā bādhita tvāt pratyabhijñāyai anumāna utthāna abhāvāt na ca pratyabhijñāyai aprāmāṇyam itaretara āśraya doṣāt yatas na yāvat aprāmāṇyam asyāḥ tāvat na anumānasya utthānam yāvat ca na anumāna uttha anantā vat na asyāḥ aprāmāṇyam anyonya āśraya doṣaḥ iti atra ucyate saḥ iti anena pūrva kāla sambandhī svabhāvaḥ viṣayīkriyate ayam iti anena ca varttamāna kāla sambandhī anayoḥ ca bhedaḥ na ca kathaṃcid abhedaḥ varttamāna kāla bhāvi rūpa eka svabhāva tvāt vastunaḥ tasmāt bhedaḥ eva pratyabhijñāne sati bhāsate iti katham anena kṣaṇikatva anumāna bādhā 
PVVṬ_95,1^1	 yat vā vastunaḥ pūrva kāla sambandhi tvam idānīm asat eva pūrva kāla abhāvāt sattve vā asya varttamāna kāla sambandhi tvam eva syāt na pūrva kāla sambandhi tvam virodhāt iti uktam tasmāt pūrva kāla sambandhi tvasya asataḥ grāhakaḥ saḥ iti jñāna aṃśaḥ bhrāntaḥ a nyathā vastunaḥ spaṣṭa bāla ādi avasthā grāhakaḥ syāt na ca bhavati tasmāt bhrāntāt pūrva dṛṣṭa rūpa āropeṇa saḥ eva ayam iti jñānāt katham anumāna bādhā yatra ca akṣa vyāpāraḥ tad grāhakam pratyakṣam utpadyate na ca pūrva kāla astitve adhunā kva vyāpāraḥ asannihita tvāt na api tat abhedena tat katham pūrva uttara kāla astitvayoḥ aikya grāhakam jñānam pratyakṣam syāt yadā ca bāla ādi avasthāyām dṛṣṭaḥ vṛddha avasthāyām pratyabhijñāyate na tatra vā pratyabhijñāne nitya tvam pratibhāsate kevalam saḥ eva ayam iti tattva madhyavasīyate na ca tattu ambāla vṛddha avasthayoḥ bhedāt na api tattva grahaṇā ani atha anupapattyā nitya tva ādi kalpanā sadṛśa apara utpatti bhrānti nimittāt api utpatti sambhavāt lūna punar jāteṣu iva keśeṣu 
PVVṬ_95,1^2	 na ca atra keśa tva sāmānyāt bhinnāt pratyabhijñānam tat iha iti buddhi utpāda prasaṅgāt na api abhinnāt anyatra anugame vā anugata vyāvṛtta rūpayoḥ paramparā saṃśleṣeṇa ekānta bhinna tvāt tatas ca te eva amī keśāḥ iti pratyabhijñā sadṛśa apara utpatti nimitta eva atas eva bhrāntiḥ tathā ghaṭa ādiṣu asya abhrānta tva aśaṃkayā anumānasya utthānam yujyate eva na api ita retara āśraya tvam yatas na anumānena pratyabhijñāyai aprāmāṇyam kriyate api tu jñāyate sva hetutaḥ eva apramāṇa rūpāyāḥ niṣpatteḥ dṛṣṭaḥ dṛśyate iti grahāt dṛṣṭa tvam hi na pūrvambhāvasya asti tadā dṛśyamāna eka rūpa tvāt na api adhunā atas eva na api pūrva kāla sambandhi tvam dṛśyamānasya idānīm pūrvam abhāvāt tasmāt dṛṣṭa tvam āropya grāhikā pratyabhijñā bhrānta tvāt apramāṇā eva utpadyate na api asyāḥ aprāmāṇya nimittam anumānasya utthānam api tu sādhya pratibandha nimittam atas pratyabhijñāyāḥ bādhakam vistaraḥ tu ayam pratyabhijñā bhaṅga vicāraḥ naiḥ rā tmya si ddhau kṛtaḥ iti tatra eva avadhāryaḥ 
PVVṬ_95,2–95,3	 tasmāt sthitam etat tām punar kṣaṇa sthiti dharma tām svabhāvampaśyan= api sadṛśa apara utpatti vipralabdhaḥ pūrvakṣaṇa vināśa aviniścayāt na vyavasyati iti katham punar gamyate sadṛśa apara utpattyā vipralabdhaḥ na vyavasyati iti atas āha antya ityādi sadṛśa kṣaṇa antara apratisandhāyī kṣaṇaḥ antya kṣaṇaḥ tad darśinām naṣṭaḥ iti niśca avagamyate prāk api ayampratikṣaṇam eva naśyati kevalam yathā uktāt eva vipralambha hetoḥ na niścīyate 
PVVṬ_96,1	 nanu antya kṣaṇa darśinā upi kathat naśvara tva niścayaḥ yāvatā tadā api satta upalambhaḥ asti na hi sattāyām eva upalabhamānaḥ tad abhāvam avaitīti āha paścāt ityādi na brūmonti a kṣaṇa darśana mātrāt niścayaḥ bhavati iti kintu antyam kṣaṇam dṛṣṭvā paścāt vibhavati tadā na upalabhyate tat tasya kāryam na ca agnika aṣṭa ādi sannidhāne bhavataḥ dhūmasya apanīte aśva ādau anupalambha usti agni ādau tu anīte bhavati anupalambhaḥ evamparaspara sahitau pratyakṣa anupalambhau= abhimateṣu eva kāraṇeṣu asan digdham kāraṇa tvam sādhyate iti tat ca iti yathoktam kārya lakṣaṇam dhūmesti tasmāt agneḥ eva dhūmaḥ bhavati sarvakālam ca agni sannidhāne bhavataḥ dhūmasya anagni janya tvam kadācid sadasatorajanya tvāt ahetu tvāt adṛśya hetutvāt vocyate tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ iti tṛ tī ye pa ri cche dea śaktam sarvam iti cedi tyatra antare pra vā vakṣyāmaḥ na api ahetutvam iti tatra eva vakṣyati na api adṛśya hetu tvam dhūmasya agni ādi sāmagrya nvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt 
PVVṬ_97,1–97,2	 atha syāt adṛśyasya ayam svabhāvaḥ yat agni ādi sannidhānaḥ eva dhūmam karpūra ādi dāha kāle sugandha ādi yuktam ca karoti na anyadā iti tat kim agnim antareṇa kadā cit dhūma utpattiḥ daṣṭā yena evam ucyate na iti ced tad kathat na agni kāryaḥ dhūmaḥ tad bhāve bhāvāt dhūma utpatti kāle ca agniḥ sarvadā pratīyamānopi kākatālīya nyāyena avasthitaḥ iti alauki koyam vyapadeśaḥ athavā saḥ eva adṛśyasya svabhāvaḥ yadi agninā na upakriyate tat kim agni ādi sannidhānaḥ eva dhūmam karoti na pūrvat na paścāt tasmāt agni ādi sannidhānaḥ eva asvabhāvaḥ dhūma janakaḥ bhavati na anyat ā iti tatra api pāramparyeṇa dhūmasya agni janya tvam eva syāt 
PVVṬ_97,3	 kiñca yathā deśa kāla ādikam antareṇa dhūmasya anutpatteḥ tad apekṣā pratīyate tathā sarvadā agnim antareṇa anutpatti darśanāt agni apekṣā asya kena vāryeta tad apekṣā ca tad kārya tā eva yathā ca adṛśya bhāvaḥ eva dhūmasya bhāvāt tat janya tvam iṣyate tathā sarva kālam agni bhāve bhāva darśanāt agni janya tvam kinneṣyate yāvatām ca sannidhānaḥ eva utpadyamānaḥ bhāvaḥ dṛśyate tāvatām eva hetu tvam sarveṣām prāgbhāvasya tulya tvāt tathā ca agni adṛśya ādi sāmagrī janya tvam dhūmasya iti kutogni vyabhicāraḥ 
PVVṬ_97,4	 anyaḥ tu āha bhavatu agni dhūmayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvataḥ tathā api na tayoḥ ekena jñānena grahaṇambhinna kāla tvāt na api anena pūrvakeṇa hi nirvikalpakena pūrvakam vastu mātram gṛhītam na tu kāraṇa rūpam kāryasya bhāvi tvena apratyakṣa tvāt uttareṇa api uttaram vastu mātram gṛhyate na tu kārya rūpam kāraṇasya atīta tvena agrahāt na api sa vikalpakena tatra api asya ca udyasya tulya tvāt tena idam asmāt utpannam iti na kenacid gṛhītam atas eva na smaraṇena api gṛhyata inubhava abhāvāt iti 
PVVṬ_97,5^1	 atra ucyate kāryasya tāvat anutpanna avasthāyām asattvāt eva na kāraṇa sambandhi tvam niṣpanna avasthāyām api evam nirapekṣa tvāt tathā kāraṇam api kārya niṣpatti aniṣpatti avasthāyām kārya asambandhyā iva na api anayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ bhinna kāla tvāt kevalam asya idam kāryam kāraṇam ca iti kalpitoyam vyapadeśaḥ tena hetoḥ sakāśāt sva rūpa lābhaḥ eva kārya tvam kāraṇasya api kāryam prati prāgbhāvaḥ eva kāraṇa tvam sa ca ātma lābhaḥ prāgbhāvaḥ ca bhāvasya abhinna tvāt pratyakṣa gṛhītaḥ eva ca iti katham na pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ kevalam kārya darśane satīdam asya kārya kāraṇam ca iti vyavahriyate 
PVVṬ_97,5^2	 yatas na akārya kāraṇayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sambhavati na api kārya kāraṇa bhāva yogāt tayoḥ kārya kāraṇa tā abhinnā karttum śakyate virodhāt na api bhinnā tayoḥ svarūpeṇa akārya kāraṇa tā prasaṅgāt svarūpeṇa kārya kāraṇayoḥ api kim kārya kāraṇa bhāvena artha antareṇa kalpitena sva rūpeṇa eva kārya kāraṇa rūpa tvāt tasmāt pūrva uttara bhāvaḥ eva tayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tena pūrvake vastuni gṛhyamāṇe kāryaṃpratyānantarya kāraṇa ātmakam gṛhītam eva uttareṇa ca jñānena uttaram vastu kāraṇa anantaram gṛhyamāṇam kārya ātmakam eva gṛhyate tadā ānantaryasya tad abhinna svabhāva tvāt atas eva asmāt anantaram idambhavati iti smaraṇam api bhavati ānantaryasya anubhūta tvāt iti 
PVVṬ_98,1–98,3	 a vi ddha kaḥ rṇṇa stu āha avinā abhāvi tvam ekam dṛṣṭvā dvitīya ādi darśane sati sidhyati na ca kṣaṇika vādinaḥ draṣṭuḥ araḥ vasthānam asti na ca anyena anubhūterthenyasya avinā bhāvi tva smaraṇam asti ati prasaṅgāt iti tat ayuktam prathama ādeḥ artha kṣaṇasya prathama ādi jñā nakṣaṇena grahaṇāt eka santati patitānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvena smaraṇa sambhavāt ca yathā ca kṣaṇika pakṣe kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tathā uktam eva vakṣyati ca nanu evam api kṣaṇānām aniścayena katham kārya kāraṇa bhāva niścayaḥ na ca santānena tad niścayaḥ tasya santānibhyaḥ bhinnasya abhāvāt kevalam santāninaḥ eva pūrva apara kāla bhāvinaḥ tatra ca yadā ekaḥ kṣaṇaḥ na tadā anyaḥ iti eka kṣaṇa avabhāsaḥ eva iti katham santāna avabhāsaḥ tad abhāvāt katham kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_98,4	 tat ayuktam eka paramāṇu ātmakasya vastunaḥ bhāvāt sthūla ātmanām santāninām nairantarya pratibhāsaḥ eva santāna pratibhāsaḥ tatra ca kṣaṇa viveka an avadhāraṇena sādṛśyena ca ekatva adhyavasāyāt eka santati vartinām kṣaṇānām na kārya kāraṇa bhāva niścayaḥ bhinna santāna vartinām tu santāna pravṛttyā vijātīya tvāt bhavati tad niścayaḥ tena agni santāna pūrvakasya dhūma santānasya pratīteḥ agni dhūma santānayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva niścayaḥ ucyate iti yat kiñcid etat 
PVVṬ_98,5–99,3	 a dhya yaḥ na stu āha sva lakṣaṇayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva grahaṇe sati katham sāmānyayoḥ gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ bhinna tvāt iti tat api ayuktam aneka sva lakṣaṇa ātmakasya sāmānyasya abhyupagamāt tat uktam atad rūpa parāvṛtta vastu mātra prasādhanāt sāmānya viṣayam proktam liṅgam bheda apratiṣṭhiteḥ iti pra sa tena sva lakṣaṇānām sambandha grahaḥ eva sāmānyānām sambandha grahaḥ na tu anyaḥ nanu anumāna vādinā bau ddhe na yāvanti sva lakṣaṇāni trailokye tāni sarvāṇi agni vyāptāni gṛhītavyāni ekasya api agrahīte na eva anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ syāt na ca evam pratyakṣam karttum śaknoti sannihita viṣaya tvāt na vā anyeṣām sva lakṣaṇānām anumānataḥ sādhya dharmeṇa vyāpti grahaṇam anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti 
PVVṬ_99,4^1	 tat ayuktam yatas pratyakṣam agni bheda sannidhānaḥ eva dhūma bhedāt pratipad eṣu adhūmavyāvṛttam rūpam dhūmam anagni vyāvṛtta agni mātra kāryam eva iti avadhārayati yathā atra tathā anyatra api deśāḥ dā= etat rūpam agni janyam eva iti ca avadhārayati anyathā atra agni sambandhi tayā na pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate evam agni anagni kārya tvesya ubhaya sambandhi tayā pratītiḥ syāt na agni sambatdhi tayā eva pratīyate ca tasmāt anyatra api etat rūpam agneḥ eva bhavati iti niścayāt kutas dhūmasya agni vyabhicāraḥ yaḥ ca tad rūpam vāṣpa ādi vilakṣaṇam avadhārayitum śaknoti tasya eva etat anumānam na anyasya 
PVVṬ_99,4^2	 sāmānya vyāpti grahaṇa vādinā api gopāla ghaṭikā ādau= agnim antareṇa dhūma sāmānya darśana avyabhicāra śaṃkayā agni niyata dhūma sāmānya avadhāraṇena eva tad anumānam agni niyata dhūma sāmānya avadhāraṇañca agni saṃmbat ha dhūma avyakti avadhāraṇa purassaram eva na ca sarvatra deśa ādāva agni sambaddha dhūma vyakti viśiṣṭasya dhūma sāmānyasya grahaṇaṅkenacid pramāṇena sambhavati na api mahānasa ādau= agni sambaddha dhūma vyakti viśiṣṭam dhūma sāmānyam pratipannam anyatra anuyāyi vyakteḥ ananvayāt yat ca dhūma sāmānyam anuyāyi tat na agni avyabhicāri tasmāt sāmānya vyāpti grahaṇa vādinā upi katham viśiṣṭam dhūma sāmānyam sarvatra agninā vyāptam pratipannam iti tulyam ca udyam 
PVVṬ_99,5–99,6	 atha dhūmasya anyatra agni janya tve na kiṃcid bādhakam asti tat eva idam iti ca pratīteḥ tad sāmānyam pratipannam iṣyate a smākam api tat eva idam iti pratyayasya utpatteḥ tat pratipannam iṣyate iti āvayoḥ kaḥ bhedaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat etam eva arthan darśayan= āha sa dhūmaḥ bhavan= tad abhāve agni abhāvehetu matta ambi laṃghayet ahetukaḥ syāt yat vā sa dhūma ugni sambandhi tayā pratītaḥ tad abhāva igni abhāve bhavan hetumat tām agni sambandhi tayā na pratyakṣeṇa pratīyeta pratīyate ca tasmāt sakṛt api na kevalam bhūyas tathā adarśanāt iti anantara uktāt pratyakṣa anupalambhātaḥ kiṅkāraṇam akāraṇāt agneḥ sakṛt api na kevalam bhūyaḥ abhāvāt na hi bālukābhyaḥ sakṛt api tailam bhavati kāryasya ityādinā kārikā artham āha na hi ityādyasya eva samarthanam 
PVVṬ_100,1–100,3	 etena vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavati ca dhūma ugnim antareṇa vyabhicāra vādinaḥ anena ca pakṣa dharmaḥ kathitaḥ tat iti tasmāt agnim antareṇa bhāvāt na tad hetuḥ na agni hetuḥ tathā ca ahetuḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ anya hetuka tva ādi vahneḥ yat anyat śakra mūrddhā ādi tad hetuka tvāt dhūmasya na ahetuka tvam iti ced na etat evantatra api artha antare hetau kalpyamāne tulya tvāt tathā hi tad abhāvepi anya kāraṇa abhāvepi punar agnau bhavati iti tat api anyat kāraṇam na hetuḥ syāt api ca yosau vahniḥ yat ca tatonyat kāraṇantat kim dhūma janana svabhāvam āhosvit naḥ yadi ajanana svabhāvantadā kathanta tā ugneḥ anyatas vā śakra mūrddhādera tad janana svabhāva tvāt adhūma janana svabhāvāt dhūmaḥ bhavat na eva bhavet kim kāraṇam atad svabhāvasya svayamadhūma janana svabhāvasya ajananāt tasya dhūmasya ahetu tā syāt 
PVVṬ_100,4–100,6	 atha dhūma janana svabhāva unyaḥ tadā dvayoḥ api vahni tvam dhūma janana svabhāva lakṣaṇa tvāt vahneḥ etat ca uttaratra abhidhāsyate na vai saḥ eva ityādi vyabhicāra vādī athavā agni janitaḥ dhūmaḥ saḥ eva anyatas bhavati iti evam na ucyate yadi saḥ eva anyatas syāt bhavet ahetu tu antādṛśasya vahni janita dharma svabhāva tulyasya anyatas bhāvāt anyādṛśāt ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī tat kim kārya sadṛśam kāraṇam iṣyate yena evam ucyatenyādṛśāt bhavan kathantādṛśaḥ iti na anyārtha tvāt yaḥ hi dhūma janakaḥ vahniḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tatas visadṛśāt bhavan dhūmaḥ kathantādṛśaḥ bhavati vahni janita dharma tulya svabhāvaḥ bhavati 
PVVṬ_100,7	 etat uktam bhavati yathā dhūma bheda anānta arṇṇa parṇṇa ādīnām paraspara apekṣayā tādṛśa tvan tathā agni bhedānām api tārṇṇa pārṇṇa ādīnām dhūma jana kānāntādaśa tvam paraspara apekṣayā eva tena yādṛśaḥ dhūma bhedaḥ ekasmāt agni bhedāt utpadyamānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tādṛśasya dhūma bhedasya tādṛśāt eva agni bhedāt utpattiḥ yaḥ tu anagneḥ utpannaḥ sonyādṛśaḥ eva vā aṣpa ādi vat 
PVVṬ_101,1–101,2	 nanu agni janyena dhūma kṣaṇena tādṛśaḥ dhūma kṣaṇa janyaḥ dhūma kṣaṇaḥ tena anyādṛśāt api tādṛśaḥ bhavati iti ced na agni janyasya hi dhuma kṣaṇasya agni janyaḥ eva anyaḥ dhūma kṣaṇaḥ tādṛśaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ na hi vā aṣpa ādīna anta adṛśa tva adhyavasāya ipi tādṛśa tvam bhavati dhūma kṣaṇa janyasya api dhūma kṣaṇasya anyaḥ dhūma kṣaṇa janyaḥ eva dhūma kṣaṇaḥ tādṛśaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ tasmāt tādṛśāt eva tādṛśa utpattiḥ iti kutas vyabhicāraḥ tena kṣaṇika tve kathambhāvāḥ kvacid āyatta vṛttayaḥ prasiddha kāraṇa abhāve yeṣa ambhāvaḥ tatas nyatas tatas ca anagnitaḥ dhūmāt yathā dhūmasya sambhavaḥ śakra mūrdhnaḥ tathā tasya kena vāryeta sambhavaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_101,3	 nirastam prathamasya hi agni janyasya dhūma kṣaṇasya aparogni janyaḥ eva dhūma kṣaṇaḥ tādṛśaḥ dhūma kṣaṇa janyasya dhūma kṣaṇasya dvitīyasya anyaḥ dhūma kṣaṇa janyaḥ eva dvitīyaḥ dhūma kṣaṇaḥ tādṛśaḥ bhavati tathā tṛtīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu api iti kṣaṇa apekṣayā api avyabhicāraḥ tādṛśasya etam eva āha tādṛśāt hi bhavan= tādṛśaḥ syāt anyādṛśāt api avahni sadṛśāt api yadi tādṛśaḥ bhavet vahni janita dhūma tulya svabhāvaḥ bhavet tad śakti niyama abhāvāt sadṛśā sadṛśayoḥ kāraṇayoḥ yā śaktiḥ tasyāḥ yaḥ niyamaḥ sadṛśī sadṛśam eva janayati asadṛśī vilakṣaṇam iti tasya abhāvāt kāraṇāt na hetu bhedaḥ kāryasya bhedakaḥ iti kṛtvā akāraṇam viśvasya vaiśvarūpyam syāt yatas kutaścid kāraṇāt utpatteḥ na ahetuka tvam iti ced āha sarvam vā sarvasmāt ityādi aśaktāt api ced utpattiḥ sarva sarvasmāt jāyeta na ca evam tasmāt ityādi tat na dhūmaḥ iti tat iti tasmāt yatas utpadyamānaḥ dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sa dṛṣṭa ākāraḥ vahniḥ tat vijātīyāt avahneḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_102,1–102,2	 tathā ca iti ahetuka tve sati nityam sattvam asat tvam vā dhūmasya syāt kiṅkāraṇam ahetoḥ bhāvasya sva niṣpattau= anya anapekṣaṇāt kāraṇa antara anapekṣaṇāt kāraṇa antara anapekṣa tvepi kādācid kam svabhāvataḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced āha apekṣātaḥ hi iti etat uktam bhavati aniṣpannasya asattvāt eva katham svabhāvataḥ kādācid ka tvam niṣpannasya tu asti svabhāvaḥ kevalam sā eva niṣpattiḥ katham kvacid bhavati iti codyate sa hi ityādim ā etat eva vyācaṣṭe na kadācid na bhavet sarva kālam bhavet kiṅkāraṇantadbhāve dhūma svabhāvasya bhāve kāraṇa anapekṣa tvena vaikalya abhāvāt iṣṭa kāla vat tadā api ca iti dṛṣṭa kālepi dhūmaḥ na bhavet dhūma abhāva kāla aviśeṣāt 
PVVṬ_102,3	 paścāt arddham vibhajan= āha apekṣayā hi iti yogya deśa kāla apekṣayā yasmāt kāryasya yau bhāva abhāva kālau tayoḥ yathākramantadbhāvasya kārya utpādasya ye yogyatāya ugyate tābhyām yogāt kāla grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa param evam deśa dravyayoḥ api vācyam atha evam na iṣyate tadā tulye yogyatāya ugyate yayoḥ kārya bhāva abhāva vatoḥ deśa kālayoḥ tayoḥ tadvat tā itarayoḥ niyama ayogāt kārya kālasya eva tadvat tā kāryavat tā tad anyasya itarāḥ akāryavat tā iti asya niyamasya ayogāt dvau= api tau kārya bhāva abhāva kālau kāryavantau syātām yogya tā sādṛśyāt na vā tulya tvāt ayogya tāyāḥ tasmāt tad bhāva kālasya eva yogyatā tām vā apekṣamāṇaḥ 
PVVṬ_102,4–102,5^1	 bhavatu nāma iṣṭasya deśa kāla ādeḥ yogyatā na tāvatā hetu bhāvaḥ iti atas āha sā ca ityādi yatas evam ahetu tve nityam sattva asattvam syāt na ca bhavati tasmāt ityādi yat parihāreṇa pravarttate tad anapekṣaḥ yatra ca varttate tad sāpekṣaḥ yadi nāma kvacid deśa ādau vṛttaḥ tathā api kathantad sāpekṣaḥ iti ced āha tathā hi iti tathā vṛttiḥ iti eka parihāreṇa anyatra vṛttiḥ deśa ādikam apekṣate eva bhāvaḥ tena tu deśa ādinā na tasya upakāraḥ kriyate iti ced āha tad kṛta upakāra ityādi tad niyayam āyogāt iti tasmin= aiva deśa ādau tena na bhāvyam iti niyama ayogāt tat iti tasmāt deśa kāla grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam dravyasya api parigrahaḥ yatra iti deśa ādau dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt iti 
PVVṬ_102,5^2	 yathā uktena pratyakṣeṇa yeṣām sannidhāne dṛṣṭaḥ teṣām eva anyatara vaikalye ca punar na dṛṣṭaḥ anyathā iti yadi tat janyosya svabhāvaḥ na syāt saḥ iti dhūmaḥ tad pratiniyata ugni ādika sāmagrī hi yatas agneḥ anyatra kathambhavet na eva bhavet bhavan vā na dhūmaḥ syāt yasmāt tat janitaḥ hi agni janitaḥ hi svabhāva viśeṣaḥ dhūmaḥ iti tathā hetuḥ api vahniḥ tathā bhūta kārya janana svabhāvaḥ dhūma janana yogya tā svabhāvaḥ dhūma rahita avasthāyām api asti eva yogyatā kāraṇa bhūta iti tena nā avyāpi lakṣaṇam evam agni dhūmayoḥ paraspara apekṣayā niyata svabhāva tve pratyakṣa vyavasthāpite 
PVVṬ_103,1	 yadi tasya dhūmasya agneḥ anyatopi bhāvaḥ iṣyate tadā na sa dhūma jananaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya avahneḥ tathā hi anagneḥ yadā dhūmasya utpattiḥ tadā anagneḥ eva dhūma jananaḥ svabhāvaḥ jātaḥ yaḥ ca anagneḥ svabhāvaḥ sa katham agneḥ syāt tatas ca adhūma janana svabhāva tvāt agneḥ sakṛt api na dhūmam janayet dhūmasya api dhūma svabhāva tā na syāt iti āha na ca ityādi agneḥ anyatas bhavat na vā sa dhūmaḥ kim kāraṇam adhūma janana svabhāvāt anagneḥ bhāvāt utpatteḥ tad svabhāva tve ca anagneḥ api dhūma janana svabhāva tve ca abhyupagamyamāne saḥ eva agniḥ dhūma janaka rūpa tvāt asya iti anena dvāreṇa avyabhicāraḥ dhūmasya 
PVVṬ_103,2–104,1	 sukha grahaṇa artham agni svabhāvaḥ ityādi śloka dvayam āha agni svabhāvaḥ iti dhūma janana svabhāvaḥ yadi iti arthaḥ agniḥ eva sa śakra mūrddhā dhūma janana svabhāva tvāt atha anagni svabhāva ūsau śakra mūrddhā tatra iti śakra mūrddhani kasmāt na bhavet iti āha dhūma ityādi hi yasmāt dhūma hetu svabhāvaḥ yasya iti vigrahaḥ kutas etat tad śakti bhedavān tayā dhūma janikayā śaktyā karaṇa bhūtayā vastu antarāt khadyota ādeḥ bhedavān visadṛśaḥ adhūma hetoḥ iti avahni svabhāvāt dhūmasya bhāveutpāde abhyupagamyamāne sa dhūmaḥ syāt ahetukaḥ yathā uktam prāk 
PVVṬ_104,2	 katham ityādi paraḥ idānīm iti ekasya dhūma ādeḥ vijātīyāt utpatti anabhyupagame kathambhinnāt paraspara vijātīyāt sahakāriṇaḥ sakāśāt ekasya kāryasya utpattiḥ katham iti āha yathā ityādi ādi śabdāt āloka manaskāra ādayaḥ evañca sati cakṣuḥ svabhāvāt api utpadyate vijñānam acakṣuḥ svabhāvāt api rūpa manaskāra ādeḥ na cedam ahetukam evam dhūma upi agneḥ utpadyatām anagneḥ ca śakra mūrdhnaḥ na ca ahetukaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ca udakaḥ manyate 
PVVṬ_104,3	 na vai kiṃcid ityādinā pratividhatte cakṣuḥ ādiṣu tad svabhāvam janaka svabhāvam sat ekaikam paraspara anapekṣam na vai janakam yadi hi syāt tadā pratyekam kāraṇa vyabhicārāt ahetukam syāt kintu sāmagrī janikā tad svabhāvāḥ janaka svabhāvāḥ sāmagrī janikā iti etāvatā eva tad svabhāva tvam labdham atad svabhāvasya ajanaka tvāt tat kim svabhāvā iti pṛthak ucyate satyam kintu avadhāraṇa artham uktam sāmagrī avasthāyām eva tad svabhāva tā na pūrvat na paścāt na pṛthak iti sva hetu sāmarthya niyata sannidhi iti ekasmin kārye samastau= anye kāraṇāni hetuḥ iti samudāya arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_104,4	 kecid tu vā śabdam paṭhanti sāmagrī janikā tad svabhāvā vā iti atra tu vā śabdasya na kiṃcid prayojanam iti apapāṭhaḥ eva ayam yadi sāmagri iti uktvā sāmagrī antarāt api cakṣuḥ vijñānam syāt tadā bhinnāt utpādera hetuka tvam bhavet sā eva sāmagrī anumīyate kāryeṇa na pratyekam kāraṇāt anyatas na asti vyabhicāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_104,5	 syāt etada agni ādi sāmagrayāḥ ādyaḥ eva dhūma kṣaṇaḥ janitaḥ na ca tasya liṅga tvantasya aniścayāt yaḥ ca dhūma pratibandhaḥ gṛhyate sa pūrva dhūma hetuḥ eva kathanta tā ugni ādi sāmagryā anumānam iti atas āha sā eva ca ityādi kārya prabandhasya svabhāva sthiteḥ āśraya ādyam kāraṇam sāmagrīm antareṇa dhūma santānasya eva abhāvāt tatas dhūma santānam agni kārya tvena ekīkṛtya dahana ādi santateḥ kāraṇa bhūtāyāḥ anumānam na hi kṣaṇa vibhāgena arvāk darśanasya vyavahāraḥ sambhavati iti 
PVVṬ_105,1	 syāt etat atīvaḥ eva vahniḥ anumīyate na ca tena artha kriyā arthinaḥ kiṃcid prayojanam iti etat api codyamānena eva parihṛtam tadā ca ayam arthaḥ sā eva ca sāmagrī prabandhena pravarttamānā kārya svabhāva sthiteḥ kārya prabandha vṛtteḥ hetuḥ pūrva pūrvam agni ādi kṣaṇam pratītya uttarottarasya dhūma kṣaṇasya utpatteḥ na hi ayam niyamaḥ yat ekaḥ eva dhūma kṣaṇa ugninā janyaḥ na aparaḥ iti yāvat indhanasya na sarvathā bhasmībhavanantā vat dhūma kṣaṇānām utpattiḥ aviruddhāḥ tasmāt uttara uttara dahana kṣaṇa jananam arthena prabandha pravṛttena agninā yathābhūtaḥ dhūma prabandhaḥ janitaḥ pratyakṣa avadhāritaḥ tathābhūtam anyatra avadhārya artha kriyā samartha dahana santānasya anumānantad arthinaḥ na viruddham anyaḥ eva ca svabhāvaḥ vicchinna dahana santānasya dhūmasya anyaḥ eva vicchinna dahana santateḥ vāsa gṛha ādi sthasya sphuṭaḥ ca tayoḥ bhedam avadhārayati lokaḥ iti kutas vyabhicāraḥ 
PVVṬ_105,2–105,4	 athavā anyathā vyākhyāyate nanu sāmagrī samagrebhyonyāḥ tasyāḥ ca eka tvāt ekam eva kāryam utpadyate anyathā samagrāṇām pratyekam sāmarthyāt kārya bahu tvamparyāyeṇa ca eka kārya janaka tvam syāt na ca bhavati tasmāt katham eka janaka tvam iti āśaṃkya āha sā eva ca ityādi sā eva ca sāmagri iti samagrāḥ eva sāmagrī śabdena ucyante kim kāraṇam svabhāva sthityā svarūpa sannidhānena kāryasya āśrayaḥ bhavati yatas 
PVVṬ_105,5	 evam manyate yadi sāmagryāḥ eva kārya utpattiḥ tadā samagrāṇām akāraka tvam syāt tathā ca pratīti bādhāḥ samagrāṇām api kāraka tve sutarām kārya bahu tvam syāt paryāyeṇa ca eka kārya janaka tvam syāt na ca sāmagrī balāt teṣām eka rūpa tā sāmagryāḥ eva abhāva prasaṅgāt tasmāt te samagrāḥ sva hetubhyaḥ eva eka kārya karaṇe niyatāḥ utpannāḥ sāmagrī śabdena ucyante na ca bahūnām eka kārya karaṇe bādhakam asti na ca asmākaṅkāraṇam eva kāryaḥ bhavati iti matam yena anekasya eka kārya tvam virudhyeta yathā ca eka kāryam tyeprakasya prāgbhāvaḥ eva kāraṇa tvan dṛṣṭa tvāt tathā anekasya api yathā vā te eva samagrāḥ saṃyoga lakṣaṇām ekām sāmagrīn janayanti tathā ekam api kāryam kinna kurvanti iti 
PVVṬ_106,1–106,2	 yat kiñcid etat yatas ca sāmagrī janikā atas eva sahakāriṇām aparyāyeṇa jananam paripāṭyā jananam na asti iti arthaḥ yat api ityādinā vijātīyāt utpattim āśaṃkya pariharati na anyādṛśāt tādṛśantasya utpattiḥ iti yat uktanta deva atra darśayati iti arthaḥ ādi śabdāt go śṛṅgāt śaraḥ gomayāt vṛścikaḥ tatra api iti vijātīyāt kārya utpattau= api tathā abhidhānepi iti vijātīya utpannasya śālūka ādeḥ śālūka ādiḥ iti abhidhānepi svavījāt śālūka ādi lakṣaṇāt prabhavaḥ utpattiḥ yasya tasmāt svavīja prabhavāt śālūka ādeḥ sakaśāt asti eva svabhāva bhedaḥ kiṅkāraṇam hetu svabhāva bhedāt hetoḥ sāmagrī dvaya lakṣaṇasya svabhāva bhedāt bījāt kandāt ca udbhavaḥ yasyāḥ kadalyāḥ sā tathā sā ca hetu tva bhedāt paraspara bhinnā 
PVVṬ_106,3–106,4	 na ca ayambhedaḥ sādhanīyaḥ iti āha sphuṭam ityādi vivecayati bhede vā bhāvasya iti su vivecita ākāram bhrānti hetubhyaḥ sadṛśa ākārebhyaḥ vibhāgena niścita ākāram tad bhāvaḥ eva bhāvaḥ anvayaḥ tad abhāve ca abhāvaḥ eva vyatirekaḥ anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ ca anvaya vyatirekantasmāt yaḥ kārya svabhāvaḥ yasya anuvarttanīyasya kāraṇasya anuvarttakaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasya anuvarttakasya svabhāvaḥ tad hetuḥ sonuvarttanīyaḥ kāraṇāt sā hetuḥ yasya iti vigrahaḥ yadā tu kāraṇa apekṣayā ucyate tadā svabhāvaḥ tasya anuvarttanīyasya agni ādeḥ tad hetuḥ tasya kārya abhimatasya dhūma ādeḥ hetuḥ yatas ca evam paramparā apekṣayā kārya kāraṇayoḥ svabhāva niyamaḥ atas kāraṇāt bhinnāt vijātīyāt na sambhavaḥ 
PVVṬ_106,5^1	 tasmāt sakṛt api darśana adarśanābhyām iti yathā uktābhyām pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyāṃkārya kāraṇa bhāva siddheḥ kāraṇāt bhavati tatas kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddhitaḥ tad pratipattiḥ anvayam vyatireka pratipattiḥ na anyathā iti kārya kāraṇa bhāva niścayantyaktvā kevalābhyān darśana adarśanābhyām na anvaya vyatirekayoḥ pratipattiḥ kiṅkāraṇam niḥśeṣi darśana adarśana āyatta tvāt darśana mātra pratibaddhāyāḥ anvaya vyatireka pratipatteḥ evam hi darśanam anvayam sādhayati yadi niḥśeṣe sa pakṣe hetoḥ darśanam syāt evam adarśanam api vyatirekam sādhayet yadi niḥśeṣe sādhya vyatireke hetoḥ adarśanam syāt 
PVVṬ_106,5^2–107,2	 yathā ekatra dhūma vyaktau sakṛt api kāryatva siddhyā sarvatra tathā abhāvaḥ evam kvacid sa pakṣāsa pakṣayoḥ darśana adarśanāt sarvatra anvaya vyatireka niścayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti api mithyā yasmāt kvacid amūrta tve ākāśa ādi gate nitya tvasya darśane para prasiddhyā ca etat ucyate anyatra sukha ādau anyathā iti anitya tve hetoḥ amūrtta tvasya dṛṣṭeḥ kāraṇāt ekatra darśanam na sarvatra tathā abhāva sādhanam atas darśanam anvaye vyabhicāri tathā kvacid ghaṭa ādau nitya tva abhāvepya dṛṣṭasya amūrtta tvasya punar nitya tva abhāvaḥ eva sukha ādau dṛṣṭeḥ atas vipakṣa eka deśa ādarśanam asādhanam vyatireka niścaye tasmāt hetu phala bhāva niścayāt eva anvaya vyatirekayoḥ niścayaḥ svabhāvaḥ ityādi paraḥ idānīm iti kārya hetau= avinā abhāve sādhite saṃpratisvabhāva hetau kartha sādhyena avinābhāvaḥ nanu svabhāve bhāvopi bhāva mātra anurodhini hetuḥ iti ādinā prāk eva svabhāva hetau= avinābhāvaḥ sādhitaḥ 
PVVṬ_107,3	 satyam evantu manyate yathābhūte svabhāve tanmātra bhāvinyavinā bhāvaḥ varṇṇitaḥ tatra pratijñā artha eka deśa tā prāpnoti iti siddhānta vādī api anantareṇa anya apoha prasādhanena pratijñā artha eka deśatā parihāram manyamānaḥ tanmātra anurodhini eva avinābhāvam pūrva uktam anuvadati svabhāvepya vinābhāvaḥ ityādi svabhāvepi svabhāva hetau= api avinābhāvaḥ kasmin sādhye bhāva mātra anurodhini yaḥ hi iti ādyasya eva vyākhyānam avinā abhāvaḥ bhāvasya iti kṛtaka tva ādeḥ yasmāt tad abhāve bhāva mātra anurodhi sādhya dharma abhāve bhāvasya hetu tvena upāttasya abhāvaḥ syātḥ kim kāraṇam sādhya sādhanayoḥ abhedataḥ abhedam eva yaḥ eva ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yaḥ eva anityādi kobhāvaḥ kṛtaka bhāva mātra anurodhī svabhāvaḥ iti ucyate saḥ eva svayam anya nimitta anapekṣa tayā vastutas paramārthataḥ bhāvaḥ kṛtaka tvam sa ca bhāvaḥ ātmānam svabhāva bhūtam anitya tvam parityajya katham bhavet 
PVVṬ_108,1–108,2	 yaḥ eva tarhi iti paraḥ pakṣa nirdeśaḥ pratijñā tasyāḥ arthaḥ dharma dharmi samudāyaḥ tasya eka deśaḥ sādhya dharma ātmakaḥ hetuḥ syāt tathā hi yāvat uktam anityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya tvāt iti tāvat anityaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti tathā ca asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ iti si ddhā nta vā dī yasmāt sarve bhāvāḥ ityādi atra prathamayā kārikayā dharma kalpanā bījam dvitīyayā dharma kalpanā tṛtīyayā pratijñā artha eka deśatā parihāraḥ ca kathyate iti samudāya arthaḥ sarve bhāvāḥ svabhāva para bhāvābhyām vyāvṛttimbhajantaḥ iti ghinuh sarva bhāvāḥ svabhāvena svarūpeṇa na para rūpeṇa sajātīyāt vijātīyāt ca vyāvṛttāḥ sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ svasmin svabhāve avasthānāt 
PVVṬ_108,3–108,4	 nanu aśva ādibhyaḥ gauḥ jātyāḥ bhinnaḥ viṣāṇī gauḥ dravyeṇa go vyakti antarāt bhinnaḥ śuklaḥ gauḥ guṇena viṣāṇinaḥ go vyakti antarāt bhinnaḥ iti evamādi paramāṇu antaḥ bhedaḥ jāti ādi viśeṣaṇa kṛtaḥ sarva bhāvānām na svabhāvena iti atra ucyate na jāti ādinā tāvat bhāvānām abhinnānāmbhedaḥ kriyate bhinna abhinna bheda karaṇe tatra tasya akiñcitkara tvāt na api bhinnānām vaiyarthyāt na api eṣā ambheda vyavahāraḥ kriyate svarūpa bhinnānām pratyakṣe avabhāsāt eva bheda vyavahāra siddheḥ 
PVVṬ_108,5–109,1	 kiñca jāti ādīnām anyonyantadvataḥ ca sakāśāt bhedaḥ na anyatas jāti ādeḥ anavasthā prasaṅgāt sva rūpeṇa ca bhede bhāvānām eva asau kinnābhyupagamyate kim jāti ādi kalpanayā yopi di ga mba raḥ manyate sarva ātmakam ekam syāt anya apoha vyatikrame tasmāt bhedaḥ eva anyathā na syāt anyonya abhāvaḥ bhāvānām yadi na bhavet iti 
PVVṬ_109,2–109,3	 sa upyanena nirastaḥ abhāvena bhāva bhedasya karttum aśakyatvāt na api abhinnānām hetutaḥ niṣpannānām anyonya abhāvaḥ sambhavati bhinnāḥ ced niṣpannāḥ katham anyonya abhāvaḥ sambhavati bhinnāḥ ced niṣpannāḥ katham anyonya abhāva kalpanā iti uktam nanu sarve bhāvāḥ bhinnāḥ iti yadi etat anumāna vṛttantad āśraya asiddhaḥ hetuḥ sarva bhāvānām pratyakṣa aviṣaya tvāt atas eva na etat pratyakṣa vṛttam parāmṛśyate 
PVVṬ_109,4–109,5	 anyaḥ tu āha yadi api bhāvāḥ svabhāvena bhinnāḥ teṣān tu jāti ādayaḥ dharma āssanti eva pratīyamāna tvāt tathā api nirvikalpa kantu vijñānaṅga vādiṣu sattā mātram gṛhvāti na bhedam anyasmāt viśeṣa grahaṇam eva hi bheda grahaṇam viśeṣaḥ ca na avikalpya gṛhyate iti sa vikalpakasya viṣayaḥ na nirvikalpasya tat uktam viśeṣāḥ tu pratīyante sa vikalpaka buddhibhiḥ te ca kecid pratidravyam kecid vahuṣu saṃsthitāḥ tān akalpayat utpannam vyāvṛtta anugama ātmanā gavāśve ca upajātantu pratyakṣat na viśiṣyate iti 
PVVṬ_109,6–109,8	 tasmāt na nirvikalpake pratyakṣa bheda avabhāsaḥ iti yopya āha sa vikalpakena api bhedaḥ na gṛhyate anyonya abhāva grahaṇa nimittakaḥ hi bhāvānām bheda grahonyonya abhāvaḥ ca bhedaḥ na ca abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ na hi gavyaśvosti iti pratyakṣam paricchinatti atas sattā mātrasya eva grāhakam pratyakṣam iti tat uktam ma ṇḍa ne na 
PVVṬ_109,9–109,11	 āhuḥ vidhātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣeddhya vipaścitaḥ na ekatve āgamaḥ tena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate iti tat etat ubhayam api ayuktam sattā mātrasya apratibhāsanāt gavāśu ādīnām sva svarūpeṇa eva pratibhāsanāt tat uktam tattva yuktam pratidravyam bhinna rūpa upalambhanāt na hi ākhyātum aśakya tvāt bhedaḥ na asti iti gamyate iti 
PVVṬ_109,12	 yopya āha bhāvānāmbhedaḥ eva na asti tathā hi goḥ aśvā an utpāde yādṛśam svarūpam aśva utpādepi tādṛśam eva na aparam adhikam kiñcid jātam iti katham atas bhedaḥ bhavatu vā bhedaḥ na asau pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ asmāt ayambhinnaḥ iti evaṃrūpasya vyāpārasya pratyakṣe abhāvāt yat āha na hi idam iyataḥ vyāpārān karttum samartham iti 
PVVṬ_110,1	 sā upi nirastaḥ gavāśu ādīnām sva svarūpeṇa utpattiḥ eva bhedaḥ te ca sva svarūpeṇa pratyakṣa iva bhāsante tathā avabhāsaḥ ca loke bheda avabhāsaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt purovasthiteṣu sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ iti asya hetoḥ pratyakṣeṇa bhedam pratipadyamānaḥ sarva upasaṃhāreṇa pratipadyate a tas sarva bhāvāḥ vyāvṛtti bhāginaḥ iti vyāpti grahaṇa pramāṇa phalam iti yatas ca jātyādayortha antara bhūtāḥ na santi iti pratipādayiṣyate atas pāramārthikaḥ dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ na asti iti uktam bhavati 
PVVṬ_110,2–110,4	 nanu sāmānya yogāt sajātīyāḥ ucyante yadi ca sāmānyat na asti katham sajātīyāt vyāvṛttiḥ iti ucyate na etat asti na samānānām utpannānāmbhāvānām sāmānya yogāt samāna rūpa tā sva hetubhyaḥ eva tathā aniṣpanna tvāt tena yadu dyaḥ te kaḥ re ṇaḥ cyate na gavi go tvam yena go tva yogāt prāk gauḥ eva asau= iti vyartham go tvam syāt api tu yadā eva vastu tadā eva go tvena abhisambadhyate go tva yogāt tu prāk vastu na vidyate na ca avidyamānaṅ gauḥ iti vā agauḥ iti vā śakyam vyapadeṣṭum iti 
PVVṬ_110,5	 tat nirastam yadā eva vastu tadā eva tasya go rūpatayā niṣpanna tvāt kim go tva yogena na api asamānānām sāmānya yogāt samāna rūpa tā teṣām sāmānyasya eva abhāvāt samānānām ca bhāvaḥ sāmānyam iti abhyupagamyate sāmānyāt ca samāna rūpa tve bhāvānām abhyupagamyamāne yāvat na sāmānya yogaḥ tāvat na samānāḥ bhāvāḥ yāvat ca na samānāḥ tāvat na sāmānya yogaḥ iti anyonya āśraya tvam syāt tasmāt sva hetubhyaḥ eva samānāḥ utpannāḥ tena 
PVVṬ_110,6–110,8	 śāvaleyāt ca bhinna tvam bāhuleya aśvayoḥ samam sāmānyam na anyat iṣṭam ced kvāgopa ūhaḥ prakalpyatām iti nirastam sāmānyeṣu eva agopoha prakalpanāt asamānānām ca apohya ātmatayā prakalpanāt yat api uccate samānāḥ iti pratibhāsāt eva nirvikalpake jñāne sāmānya pratibhāsonyathā bāhuleya aśva vat śāvaleya bāhuleyayoḥ api vailakṣaṇya pratītiḥ syāt sarva ātmanā bhedāt bhavati ca samānāḥ iti pratītiḥ tasmāt asya eva sāmānyam iti 
PVVṬ_110,9	 tat uktam nirvikalpaka bodhena dvi ātmakasya vastunaḥ grahaṇam iti yat vā sa vikalpake na ced sāmānyam gṛhyate nirvikalpakena api gṛhītam eva sa vikalpa abhinna pratibhāsa tvāt tathā hi yaḥ eva śāvaleya ādayaḥ gauḥ iti jñānena gṛhyante te eva nirvikalpake jñāne pratibhāsante kevalam ekantāna vikalpya gṛhṇāti anyat vikalpya iti tayoḥ sva rūpa bhedaḥ na pratibhāsa bhedaḥ tasmāt nirvikalpakepi jñāne sāmānyam pratibhāsate iti 
PVVṬ_111,1	 tat api nirastam sva hetubhyaḥ eva keṣāñcid samānānām pratibhāsanāt sāmānyasya ca vyakti paratantram svarūpam na ca nirvikalpakam jñānam pāratantryam vastunaḥ gṛhṇāti svātantryeṇa vastu grāhi tvāt tat katham sāmānya grāhakam ucyate anugatasya ca rūpasya pratyeka vat yugapad bahuṣu apratibhāsanāt atas eva vikalpaḥ samāneṣu ekānta bhinneṣu nirvikalpaka pratyakṣa bādhitam anugata ākāram gṛhṇan bhrāntaḥ bhavati nirvikalpaka gṛhīta sāmānya grāhī vā apramāṇam syāt gṛhīta grāhi tvāt atha vikalpya grāhi tvāt agṛhīta grāhi tvam smṛti ādeḥ api tarhi smaryamāṇa viṣaya tā gṛhīta grāhi tvat na syāt atha jāti ādi viśiṣṭa vastu grāhi tayā vikalpasya agṛhīta grāhi tvam evam api yadi jāti ādi viśiṣṭa tvam vastunaḥ pāramārthikaḥ dharmaḥ tadā nirvikalpakena api gṛhītam eva iti katham agṛhīta grāhi tvam atha kalpikaḥ tadā tad grāhakasya katham prāmāṇyam āropita artha tvāt tasmāt na asti eva jāti ādiḥ iti sthitam 
PVVṬ_111,2–111,5	 kathantarhi bhāvāḥ vyāvṛtti bhāginaḥ iti ucyante kalpita dharma dvāreṇa ayam vyapadeśaḥ iti adoṣaḥ atas agonivṛttiḥ sāmānyam vācyam yaiḥ parikalpyate go tva vastu eva taiḥ ukta magopoha girā sphuṭam iti nirastam pāramārthikasya go tvasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate na tu kalpitasya iti vakṣyati yadi paramārthikaḥ dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ na asti kathantarhi kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti buddhīna ambhedaḥ śabda eka svarūpa viṣaya tvāt 
PVVṬ_111,6–111,8	 atha nirviṣayā etāḥ vāsanā bījamātrataḥ pratipattiḥ pravṛttiḥ ca bāhyertheṣu katham bhavet atha bāhya adhyavasāyāt pravṛttiḥ evam api kṛtaka tvasya yovasāyaḥ saḥ eva anityasya abhedāt iti kathambuddhi bhedaḥ kṛtaka aniti ayoḥ abhedāt eva tad anubhava ahita vāsanā bhedasya abhāvāt na tattvataḥ buddhi bhedaḥ iti atra āha yasmāt ityādi yasmāt sarvasmāt sarva bhāvāḥ vyāvṛttāḥ tasmāt yatas yatas nitya ākṛtaka ādeḥ śabda ādīnām arthānām vyāvṛttiḥ tad nibandhanāḥ vyāvṛttyauvadhi vyāvṛtti nibandhanāḥ dharma bhedāḥ anitya kṛtaka ādayaḥ kalpyante vikalpaiḥ āropyante kimviśiṣṭāḥ tad viśeṣa avagāhinaḥ tasya sva lakṣaṇasya ye viśeṣāḥ akṛtaka ādi vyāvṛtti rūpa lakṣaṇāḥ tad avagāhinaḥ tad avagāhana śīlāḥ tad abheda avabhāsana śīlāḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_112,1	 etat uktam bhavati akṛtakaḥ na bhavati iti anena dvāreṇa prabodhitāyāḥ eva kṛtaka vikalpa vāsanāyāḥ eṣā prakṛtiḥ yatas tatas vikalpa utpadyamānaḥ kṛtakaḥ iti su a ākāra abhinnaḥ sa kṛta kavyāvṛttam eva śabda sva lakṣaṇam pratipadyate na tu anityaḥ iti tathā nityaḥ na bhavati iti anena api dvāreṇa prabodhitāyāḥ eva anitya vāsanāyāḥ sāmarthyam yat tatas vikalpa utpadyamānaḥ anityaḥ iti su a ākāra abhinnam nitya vyāvṛttam eva śabda sva lakṣaṇam pratipadyate na tu kṛtakaḥ iti tena buddhi bhedaḥ bhavati yatas ca bādhyamāna tvāt vikalpa pratibhāsi arthaḥ bāhyaḥ na bhavati atas vāsanā vaśāt eva bāhya avabhāsaḥ vikalpaḥ tena vikalpasya bāhya rūpaḥ eva pratibhā samānorthaḥ su ākāraḥ ucyate na tu su a ākāre bāhya āropaḥ sādṛśyāt yat āha nāma nimitta prakaraṇe 
PVVṬ_112,2–112,4	 sārūpyāt bhrāntitaḥ vṛttiḥ arthe ced syāt na sarvadā deśa bhrāntiḥ ca na jñāne tulyam utpattitaḥ dhiyaḥ tathāvidhāyāḥ bāhya artha pratibhāsāyāḥ iti etena yat ucyate yat vāhya atyanta visadṛśasya su a ākārasya tādrūpya grahaṇantad anya nivṛtti kṛta sādṛśya param yathā ghaṭa visadṛśopi paṭaḥ vṛkṣa abhāva viśiṣṭaḥ avadhāryamāṇaḥ yam api avṛkṣaḥ iti ghaṭa sadṛśaḥ vadhāryate vṛkṣa vyāvṛtteḥ ghaṭa paṭayoḥ tulya tvāt tathā vikalpa viṣayaḥ atyantam vāme visadṛśopi vāme avadhāryate anya nivṛtti kṛta sārūpya grahaṇāt iti 
PVVṬ_112,5	 tad apāstam sva hetutaḥ eva bāhya ābhāsāyāḥ vikalpa buddheḥ utpatteḥ na ca asadṛśānām anya nivṛttyā sādṛśyam kriyate tatra tasyāḥ bheda abheda sādṛśya karaṇe akiñcitkara tvāt na ca anya nivṛttiḥ sadṛśī vidyate sadṛśānām api katham anya nivṛttyā sādṛśyam kriyate sva rūpeṇa eva sādṛśyāt na api pūrvam su a ākāra pratibhāsaḥ paścāt tatra anya nivṛtti kṛta sādṛśya grahaṇa paraḥ bāhya āropaḥ pratibhāsate na hi marīcikāyām pūrvam svarūpa apratibhāsesati sādṛśya grahaṇa hetukaḥ jala āropaḥ sambhavati bāhya āropāt ca pūrvam na su a ākāraḥ grāhya āroposti vikalpasya eva abhāvāt bhāve bodha eka rūpaḥ eva asau= iti na bāhya sadṛśaḥ tatas ca anya nivṛtti kṛta sādṛśya abhāvāt kathambāhya rūpaḥ pratīyate anumānasya tu na anya nivṛtti grahaṇa pūrvikā pravṛttiḥ liṅgasya tayā saha sambandhāt siddheḥ yadā ca tad viśeṣa avagāhi tvam vikalpānām pratīyate tadā vidhi rūpeṇa eva pravṛttiḥ vastu svarūpasya vidhoyamāna tvena adhyavasāyāt arthāt anya nivṛttiḥ pratīyate tena vidhiḥ eva śabda arthosmākam api bāhya tayā aropitasya ca vidhi pratiṣedhābhyām sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_113,1–113,2	 nanu niyata rūpa grāhī vikalpaḥ pratibhāsate tena itara rūpa śūnyam eva vikalpayat niyatam artham vikalpayati tasmāt yat niyata rūpa avadhāraṇantadanya nivṛtti viṣayantat katham ucyate vidhiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ iti tat ayuktam anya nivṛttim aham vikalpayāmi iti apratīteḥ na ca sa vikalpa viṣayaḥ yaḥ na vikalpya pratibhāsate yadi ca itara rūpa nivṛttim eva vikalpayat niyatam artham vikalpayati tadā itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ syāt itara rūpasya api niyata rūpa tvena anya nivṛtti dvāreṇa pratipatti prasaṅgāt atha vidhi rūpeṇa itara rūpam vikalpayati na tarhi tad anya nivṛtti avadhāraṇa pūrva kanniyata rūpa avadhāraṇam 
PVVṬ_113,3	 na ca yathā sāmānyavantam artham paśyāmi iti na asti jāti tadvatoḥ viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāve pratibhāsaḥ atha ca viśiṣṭa pratyaya anurodhāt sāmānya viśiṣṭa vyakti darśananna eyāḥ yi kā dayaḥ kalpitavantaḥ tathā anyaiḥ nivṛtti m aham vikalpayāmi iti apratītau= api bāhya sadṛśa āropāni athā anupapattyā anya nivṛtti param vikalpa ākāre bāhya rūpam āropyate iti yuktam sādṛśyam antareṇa vāsanā balāt eva adhya vasita bāhya rūpasya vikalpasya utpatteḥ yat āha tad anubhava ahita vāsanā prabhava prakṛteḥ adhyavasita tad bhāva svarūpam tathā vikalpa vāsanāyāḥ ca tādṛśī prakṛtiḥ yat evam eṣā pratibhāti iti 
PVVṬ_113,4–113,5	 na api bāhya rūpa āropakasya jñānasya anya vitti kṛta sārūpya nimitta tvepi anya nivṛtti viṣaya tvam na hi marīcikāyām jala jñānasya sādṛśya viṣaya tvam āropita jala viṣaya tvāt na ca niyatam rūpam bhāvānām anya nivṛttyā kriyate tasyāḥ avastu tvena ākāraka tvāt sva hetubhyaḥ eva ca tatas utpatte na api niyata rūpa avadhāraṇantadanya nivṛtti viṣayam niyata rūpa viṣaya tvāt asya atas eva na tad anya nivṛtti purassaram eva dhāryate pratyakṣeṇa eva 
PVVṬ_113,6	 na ca tad anya nivṛttiḥ artha antara bhūtā yujyate iti vakṣyati na api sā tattva anya tvābhyām avācyā yujyate evam hi abhāvaḥ eva asyāḥ syāt śaśaviṣāṇa vat na ca syāt pratyakṣa gamyāḥ nīrūpa tvāt na api anumāna gamyā sambandha abhāvena liṅgasya asiddheḥ na api niyata rūpāni atha anupapattyā tad kalpanā aniyata rūpāṇām anya nivṛtteḥ abhāvāt niyata rūpāṇām ca katham anya nivṛttyā niyata rūpa tvam sva hetubhyaḥ eva niyata rūpāṇām utpatteḥ tasmāt niyata rūpa avadhāraṇa purassara eva anya nivṛttiḥ pratīyate tathā hi ghaṭaḥ iti ukte aghaṭaḥ na bhavati iti sāmarthyāt pratīyate atas vikalpa kalpitā eveṣā na paramārtha tosti 
PVVṬ_114,1–114,3	 tasmāt sthitam etat chat baliṅgābhyām vidhi rūpeṇa vastu pratipādyaterthāt anya niṣeghaḥ taṃthā ca vakṣyati tad gatau= eva śabdebhyaḥ gamyate anya nivarttanam ityādi tena yat ucyate ku mā ri le na na tu anya apoha kṛt śabdaḥ yuṣmad pakṣenu varṇṇitaḥ niṣedha mātrat na eva iha pratibhāsā iva gamyate kintu gauḥ gavayaḥ hastī vṛkṣaḥ ityādi śabdataḥ vidhi rūpāvasāyena matiḥ śābdī pravarttate tasmāt yeṣu eva śabdeṣu nañyogaḥ teṣu kevalam bhavet anya nivṛtti aṅgaḥ sva ātmā iva anyatra gamyate iti 
PVVṬ_114,4–114,5	 etat siddham sādhyate vidhi rūpasya api śabda arthasya iṣṭa tvāt kathantarhi para matāt bau ddha matasya bhedaḥ katham vā śabda liṃgayoḥ apohaḥ viṣayaḥ ucyate nanu asti eva mahān bhedaḥ paraiḥ pāramārthika artha viṣaya tvena iṣṭasya vikalpasya bau ddhaiḥ kalpita viṣaya tvena iṣṭa tvāt kalpitaḥ ca ākāraḥ apoha āśrita tvāt apohaḥ ucyate apohyate anena iti vā anya nivṛtti mātram tu arthāt ākṣiptam apohanam apohaḥ iti ucyate sva lakṣaṇam tu apohyatesmin= iti apohaḥ ucyate 
PVVṬ_114,6	 tasmāt anyāni avyāvarttya vastu vyapekṣayā dharmāḥ kalpita bhedāḥ vikalpaiḥ viṣayīkriyante atas bhinna viṣayāḥ vikalpāḥ tad samāna viṣayāḥ ca śabdāḥ api aparyāyāḥ iti darśayitum āha tasmāt ityādi yatas ca evam dharma bhedāḥ kalpyante tasmāt yaḥ sva lakṣaṇa viśeṣaḥ vyāvarttanīya nitya vyapekṣayā vyavasthāpitaḥ anitya lakṣaṇaḥ yena dharmeṇayena śabdena yathā anitya śabdena śabdopi dharma vācaka tvāt dharmaḥ ucyate na sa śakyaḥ tatonyena anitya śabdāt anyena kṛtaka ādi śabdena vyāvarttanīya antara vastu adhikena pratyetum tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ tena kāraṇena vikalpānām na eka viṣaya tvam śabdānām ca na paryāya tvam 
PVVṬ_115,1–115,3	 tena yat ucyate yayoḥ tādātmyan na tayoḥ gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ yayoḥ ca vikalpita rūpayoḥ gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ na tayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti tad apāstam akṛta kavyāvṛttasya eva sva lakṣaṇasya jñāpaka hetu adhikārāt kṛtakaḥ iti jñātasya gamaka tvāt tasya ca nitya vyāvṛtta vastu rūpa tvāt tādātmyam sarve eva hi ityādinā advai te vā dam nirākurvan kārikā artham āha svarūpe sva ātmani sthitiḥ yeṣa ante tathā sarve eva hi bhāvāḥ sva rūpa sthitayaḥ na ātmānam pareṇa miśrayanti ekīkurvanti kiṅkāraṇam tasya miśrīkriyamāṇasya parasya aparatva prasaṅgāt ātma tā āpatteḥ 
PVVṬ_115,4–115,6	 syāt matam sarva vastuṣu buddhiḥ ca vyāvṛtta anugama ātmikā jāyate dvi ātmaka tvena vinā sā ca na yujyate atas sāmānya ātmakāḥ viśeṣāḥ viśeṣa ātma kañca sāmānyam iti ubhaya rūpam vastu iti atra api ekasya vā rūpasya bhinnebhyaḥ abhedaḥ bhinnasya ca ekasmāt abhedaḥ tatra prathamam pakṣam nirākarttum āha teṣām iti bhāvānām abhinnam iti eka ātma bhūtam iti avyatiriktam yat rūpaṃsvabhāvaḥ na tat teṣām bhāvānām iti śakyam vaktum kasmāt tat ānīntasya iti apekṣyate tasya abhinnasya rūpasya teṣām abhāvāt abhedāt eva 
PVVṬ_115,7–115,8	 atha punar ekasmāt bhinnasya abhedaḥ tatra api āha tat eva hi syāt abhinnasya bhāvāt ekam ced rūpam pratipanna abhā= aḥ tat eva abhinnam rūpanteṣām syāt na bhinnam kutas etat tasya eva abhinnasya rūpasya bhāvāt atha syāt teṣām bheda upīṣyate eva iti atra āha tasmāt abhinna ātmanortha antarasya bhinnasya nānā rūpasya abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_115,9–115,10	 atha syāt viśeṣasya yaḥ bhedassaḥ eva sāmānyasya abhedāt yat āha sāmānyasya tu yaḥ bhedam brūte tasya viśeṣataḥ darśayitvā abhyupetavyaḥ iti atra api āha taṃsya eva ca punar bheda virodhāt tasya eva ekasya aneka tva ayogāt atha syāt viśeṣa dvāreṇa sāmānyasya bhedaḥ na svarūpaḥ tadā anugata vyāvṛtta rūpayoḥ paraspara asaṃśleṣāt ekāntena bhedaḥ syāt tat āha tat ca eka rūpam sva ātma nisva svabhāve vyavasthitam amiśram eva vyakti rūpeṇa amiśre ca miśra rūpa tayā pratīteḥ mithyā tvam eva 
PVVṬ_116,1–116,3	 atha kathaṃcid sāmānyasya vyakti abhinna tvāt na etat mithyātvam tat āha na etat aśva ādi buddhīnām adhyāra upādya sambhavāt sthitam na eva hi jāti ādeḥ bhinna tvam vyaktitaḥ hi naḥ iti tat ayuktam ekatvena yena eva rūpeṇa bhinnantena eva asya abhedaḥ virodhāt na ca ekasmin pramāṇe bheda abhedam pratibhāsate ekena ca bheda grahaṇe sati yadi anyena abhedaḥ gṛhyate kathantat grāhakam pramāṇam bhrāntam na syāt anyathā grahaṇāt tasya ca eka rūpa tvāt 
PVVṬ_116,4–116,6	 yat vā amiśraṇāt eva ekasya rūpasya sāmānya rūpa tā na syāt artha antara tvāt ghaṭa vat u dyaḥ te kaḥ rastvāha gavā ādiṣu anuvṛtti pratyayaḥ piṇḍa ādi vyatirikta nimitta bhāvī viśeṣat tvāt nīla ādi pratyaya vat tat ca nimittam samāna vyakti karaṇāta sāmānyam iti ucyate atra api na tāvat samānānām artha antareṇa samāna rūpa tā kriyate tathā eva niṣpanna tvāt api asamānānām iti darśayan= āha artha antaram iti sattā go tva ādikam na teṣāṃ vyakti bhedānām sāmānyam atad rūpa tvāt teṣām bhedānām asamāna rūpa tvāt samānānām ca bhāvaḥ sāmānyam iṣyate 
PVVṬ_116,7	 athavā atad rūpa tvāt vyaktibhyortha antara tvāt ekatva vat atha artha antaram api bahuṣu samavetam iti yadi tat teṣām sāmānyam tadā dvi tva ādi kārya dravyeṣu api prasaṃgaḥ dvi tvam api hi aneka dravya samavetam ādi grahaṇāt bahutva ādiḥ tathā saṃyogoneka dravya samavetaḥ kārya dravyam ca avayavi saṃjñitam ārambhaka dravyeṣu samavetam atas dvi tva ādiṣu sāmānya rūpa tā prasaṃgaḥ yasmin na artha antare sati samānāḥ bhedāḥ bhavanti tat eva sāmānyam na sarvam iti atra āha na hi yasmāt sambandhinā anyena artha antareṇa eka tva lakṣaṇena anye asamānāḥ bhinnā na samānāḥ na ekīkriyante bhinna abhinna samāna bhāva karaṇe tad anupayogāt bhinna deśa ādīnām pratibhāsanāt ca katham samānāḥ eva bhavanti kevalaṃtadvantaḥ eka dharmavantaḥ syuḥ bhedāḥ bhūtāni graha nakṣatrāṇi teṣām kaṇṭhe dīrghā guṇa ūrccana artham nibadhyate tena ekena kaṇṭhe guṇena yathā bhūtāni tadvanti na tu ekībhavanti tadvat vyaktayopi 
PVVṬ_117,1	 nanu guṇasya mūrtta tvāt tadvat tā pratītiḥ yuktā na vyaktiṣu sāmānyasya amūrtta tvāt iti ced na tad samaveta tvasya iṣṭa tvāt artha antara bhāvasya ca yatas ca eka sambandha ipi na samānāḥ vyaktayaḥ tatas eva na abhinna pratyaya viṣayāḥ eka ākāra jñānasya abhrāntasya na viṣayāḥ bhūta vat yathā bhūtāni aguṇa svabhāvāni na eka guṇa ākāra pratyaya viṣayaḥ tadvat evantā vat aneka sambandha ipi artha antaram na teṣām sāmānyaṃdvi tvā ādiṣa prasaṅgat iti sthitam pratīyante ca samānāḥ iti tasmāt tadā ātmānam eva hi tayoḥ bhedayoḥ ātmānam eva eka rūpam idam dvyam iti eka aṃśena sva gatena saṃsṛjantī buddhiḥ sāmānya viṣayā pratibhāsate na eka sambandhinau= iti ekena sāmānyena sambandhinau= etau= iti na evambuddhiḥ pratibhāsate yena sāmānyam artha antarampramāṇa siddham syāt bhūta vat iti vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā buddhiḥ bhūtāni ekena guṇena sambaddhāni gṛhṇāti na evam iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_117,2–117,6	 yat vā yathā bhūtāni eka sambandhīni tathā bhinnau= eka sambandhinau= iti sāmānya viṣayā buddhiḥ pratibhāsate iti na evam atha syāt sāmānyam hi vyaktīnām viśeṣaṇam viśeṣaṇam ca viśeṣe sva anuraktām buddhim janayati atas na asya vyaktibhya ūrtha antara bhāvena pratibhāsaḥ nanu viśeṣaṇa tvepi tasya na viśeṣyeṇa saha aikyam daṇḍasya iva daṇḍinā tat katham abheda pratibhāsaḥ abheda aṃśena api ekatvāt na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ tasmāt sāmānyasya vyakti abheda pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ eva atha sarva daivam pratīteḥ abhrāntiḥ tat āha yaḥ hi anya rūpa saṃvedyaḥ samvedyeta anyathā punar sa mithyā na tu tena eva yaḥ nityam avagamyate iti 
PVVṬ_117,7–118,1^1	 tat ayuktam tasya vyakti abhinna tvam eva syāt goḥ go tvam iti pratīti bheda abhyupagamāt ca na ca lākṣā sphaṭikayoḥ iva jāti tadvatoḥ saṃsarga avagatiḥ abhrāntiḥ alākṣā rūpasya sphaṭikasya lākṣā rūpeṇa gateḥ bhrānta tvāt evam jāti taṃdvatoḥ eka tva grahaḥ bhrāntiḥ sāmānyam kevalam paśyati eva buddhiḥ tasyāḥ tu tart darśinyāḥ samavāyasya sūkṣma tvāt sā bhrāntiḥ yat etat vyaktīnām sāmānya abhedena grahaṇam iti ced tad darśinī iti kutas pāramārthika sāmānya darśinī sā buddhiḥ iti kutas niścayaḥ sarvadā asyāḥ vyakti abheda viṣaya tvāt 
PVVṬ_117,7–118,1^2	 na asyāḥ bījam asti iti nirbījā tathā ca asau bhrāntiḥ ca tasyāḥ ayogāt na hi bhrāntiḥ utpadyamānā nirnimittā ghaṭate jala ādi bhrānti vat bhrāntiḥ ca iyam asaṃsṛṣṭān api bhāvān saṃsṛjantī buddhiḥ atosyāḥ nimittena bhavitavyam yat tat nimittantat sāmānyam iti atra āha te eva bhedāḥ tad sāmānya jñāna ādi ekaṅkāryam yeṣa ante tad eka kāryā bījam bhrānteḥ etat ca pratipādayiṣyate na ca sāmānyam dṛṣṭā tad āropeṇa vyaktiṣu eka ākārā bhrāntiḥ yujyate tathā hi sādṛśyam bhrānti kāraṇam atyanta vilakṣaṇam ca sāmānyam vyaktibhyaḥ tasya avarṇṇa saṃsthāna ākāra tvāt vyaktīnām ca varṇṇa saṃsthāna ākāra tvāt 
PVVṬ_118,2	 atha syāt na sāmānyasya sādṛśya nimittaḥ bhedeṣu āropopi tu ekāntena bhinneṣu saḥ eva ayam iti eka tva avasāya vibhramaḥ na eka rūpam antareṇa iti brūmaḥ yadi evam ekena sambandhinaḥ iti eva kṛtvā vinā api bhrānti nimittena yadi eka ākāra bhrānti viṣayāḥ bhavanti tadā saṃkhyā ca saṃyogaḥ ca kārya dravyam ca ādi śabdāt vibhāga ādi ca ekam vastu vidyate yeṣa ante tad vantaḥ teṣu bhūteṣu ca eka guṇena yukteṣu syāt eka ākārā bhrāntiḥ na ca bhavati atas vyaktīnām api na ekatva nimittā bhrāntiḥ iti tat iti tasmāt yathā vyaktibhyaḥ bhedena iṣṭam sāmānyam tathā sāmānya buddhau niveśa abhāvāt pratibhāsā bhāvāt na sāmānyam anyat sati vā sāmānye tasya api sāmānyasya sva ātma nisvasmin svabhāve avasthānāt amiśraṇam anyena vyakti rūpeṇa vyaktiṣu anavasthānāt na dharma rūpatvantasya iti arthaḥ tasmāt iti sva svabhāva vyavasthānāt ime bhāvāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ sa jātīya abhimatāt tulya ākāra tvena abhimatāt anyasmāt ca iti vijātīya ādi vyatiriktāḥ pṛthak bhūtāḥ svabhāvena prakṛtyā eka rūpa tvāt sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_118,3	 dvitīya kārika artham āha yatas yatas bhinnāḥ te bhāvāḥ tasmāt bhedaḥ tad bhedaḥ tasmāt bhinnāḥ svabhāvāḥ tasya pratyāyanāya pratibhinna svabhāvam kṛta sanniveśaiḥ śabdaiḥ kṛta saṃketaiḥ śabdaiḥ karaṇa bhūtaiḥ aneka dharmāṇaḥ kṛtaka tva ādi dharmmavantaḥ pratīyante svabhāvāḥ bhedepi na hi ekasya sva lakṣaṇasya svabhāva nānātvam asti kathantarhi aneka dharma tvam iti āha tatas tatas bhedam upādāya iti yatas yatas vyāvṛttāḥ tatas tatas bhedam upādāya āśritya tepi śabdāḥ ye tasya tasya bhedasya bhinna svabhāvasya khyāpanāya kṛta saṃketāḥ teṣu asmin bhinne svabhāve vācaka tvena niyatāḥ tatas na ekaḥ śabdaḥ sarvān bhinna svabhāvān ākṣipati atas tepi śabdāḥ pratyekantaiḥ sarva bhedān ākṣepa īpi eka bheda codanāt ekaikasya bhinnasya svabhāvasya codanāt tad sva lakṣaṇa niṣṭhāḥ eva bhavanti yasya sva lakṣaṇasya sa svabhāvonyasmāt bhinnaḥ yaḥ śabdena adhyaṃvasīyate tat ca tat sva lakṣaṇam ca tad niṣṭhāḥ eva tad viṣayāḥ eva bhavanti 
PVVṬ_119,1	 nanu bāhya tayā adhyavasitorthaḥ śabda pratibhāsī sādhāraṇonyaḥ eva anyat ca sādhāraṇam sva lakṣaṇantat kathantad niṣṭhāḥ iti atra āha tat ekasmāt api yatas yatas vyāvṛtta ūrthaḥ śabdaiḥ viṣayīkriyate tasmāt tasmāt atad kāraṇāt atad kāryāt ca ekasmāt api tasya sva lakṣaṇasya anaka vyāvṛttasya bheda usti iti kṛtvā tad viṣayāḥ ucyante na tu tad viṣayāḥ eva yat vā tasya vyāvṛtti āśrayasya dharmasya yat sva lakṣaṇantad niṣṭhāḥ eva tad prāpti paryavasānāḥ eva bhavanti kim kāraṇam tat ekasmāt api tasya bheda usti iti vyākhyātam eva 
PVVṬ_119,2	 upasaṃharan= āha tasmāt iti yasmāt sajātīya vijātīyāt vyāvṛttiḥ tasmāt ekasya bhāvasya yāvanti para rūpāṇi tāvatyaḥ tad apekṣayā para rūpa apekṣayā para rūpebhyaḥ vyāvṛttayaḥ kalpitāḥ dharma bhedāḥ vyāvarttate vijātīyam ebhiḥ iti kṛtvā kim kāraṇam tasmin vyāvarttye avadhi bhūte dharmiṇya sambhavi kāryam kāraṇam ca yasya vivakṣitasya dharmiṇaḥ sa tad asambhavi kārya kāraṇaḥ tasya tad bhedāt tasmāt atad kāryāt atad kāraṇāt ca bhedāt vyāvṛtta tvāt yāvatyaḥ ca vyāvṛttayaḥ tāvatyaḥ śrutayaḥ niveśitāḥ atad kārya kāraṇa parihāreṇa vyavahāra arthāḥ tad vivakṣitam kāryam kāraṇam ca yasya sa tad kārya kāraṇaḥ yathā śrotra vijñāna kāryaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna kāraṇaḥ ca sa tathā yaḥ na bhavati saḥ atad kārya kāraṇaḥ tasya parihāreṇa vyavahāra arthāḥ pravṛtti nivṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ vyavahārorthaḥ phalam yāsām iti vigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_120,1	 viṣayam āha prayatnaḥ kāraṇam yasya sa prayatnā anantarīyakaḥ ucyate tenā atad kāraṇasyā aprayatna kāraṇasya vidyut ādeḥ parihāra arthaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka dhvaniḥ śrotra jñānam kāryam yasya tachrāvaṇantena śrāvaṇa dhvaniḥ atad kārya parihāra arthaḥ sarva vyavahārāṇām ca artha kriyā nimitta tvāt hetu phala bhāva lakṣaṇa tvāt ca artha kriyāyāḥ ghaṭa ādi śabdeṣu api tad atad kārya kāraṇa parihārtha tvam yojyam
