PVVṬ_120,2	 tasmāt ityādinā tṛtīya ślokam vyācaṣṭe yasmāt bhinnāḥ vyāvṛtti bhedāḥ śrutayaḥ ca yathāsvambhede niyatāḥ tasmāt ekasya dharmiṇaḥ svabhāvā abhedepi dharmiṇā iti asya vivaraṇam nāmnā iti śabdena iti arthaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti asya arthaḥ bhedaḥ kṛtaka ādi lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ kalpitaḥ pratīyate na sa śakyaḥ tatonyena tasmāt vivakṣitāt kṛtaka ādi śabdāt anyena anityādi śabdena pratyāyayituntasmāt na pratijñā artheka deśaḥ hetuḥ anitya kṛtaka śabdayoḥ bhinna artha tvāt 
PVVṬ_120,3–120,4	 katham ityādi paraḥ śabdaḥ ca liṅgaḥ ca tābhyām yadi api iha liṅgam prakṛtantathā api śabdasya upādānam liṅga vat nirviṣaya tu a khyāpana arthantena ve da sya prāmāṇyam nirākṛtam bhavati nanu vidhi rūpeṇa śabda liṃge arthaḥ pratipādyate iti uktantat katham idam āśaṃkitam vyavacchedaḥ pratipādyate iti katham gamyate iti 
PVVṬ_120,5	 na etat asti vyavacchidyatena ina iti vyavacchedaḥ bāhya rūpa tayā āropitaḥ eva ākāraḥ ucyate tena saḥ eva śabda liṅgābhyām vidhinā pratipādyate na vastu rūpam iti kutas gamyate yat vā vyavacchidyatesmin= iti vyavacchedaḥ sva lakṣaṇam ucyate saḥ eva vidhi rūpeṇa pratipādyate adhyavasīyate na punarvastunaḥ rūpaṃpāramārthika dharma dharmi bhāva lakṣaṇam pratipādyate iti kutas gamyate 
PVVṬ_121,1	 pramāṇa antarasya ityādi prativacanam tena ayam arthaḥ yadi tāvat pāramārthikaḥ dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ sarva ātmanā abhinnaḥ tadā ekena pramāṇena śabdena vā adhigaterthe sarva ātmanā paricchedāt anyasya pramāṇa antarasya śabda antarasya vā pravṛttiḥ syāt gṛhīta grāhi tvenā prāmāṇyāt bhavati ca śabda antara ādeḥ pravṛttiḥ atas kalpitaḥ eva dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_121,2	 yadi api pūrva sāmānya nirākaraṇāt eva kalpitaḥ dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ prasādhitaḥ tathā api prakāra antareṇa anena api prasādhyate iti adoṣaḥ etam eva pratipādayan= āha tathā hi ityādi ekasya iti dharma dharmi vibhāga rahita tatvāt niraṃśasya artha svabhāvasya artha ātmanaḥ svayaṃsvarūpeṇa pratyakṣasya sataḥ konyaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt pratyakṣa dṛṣṭāt svabhāvāt konyaḥ svabhāvaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ anumāna saṃjñakaiḥ parīkṣyate vyakti bhedāt bahuvacanam sarve eva dṛṣṭaḥ niraṃśa tvāt bhāvasya tasmāt na pramāṇa antara parīkṣyaḥ syāt iti ekaḥ ityādi vivaraṇam ekaḥ hi artha ātmā niraṃśaḥ sa tāvat pratyakṣa ubhyupagantavyaḥ yatra anumānam pravarttate kim kāraṇam pramāṇena prāc asiddhe dharmiṇi sādhana asambhavāt āśraya asiddha tvena liṃgasya asambhavāt tasmāt prasiddhena dharmiṇā bhāvyam 
PVVṬ_121,3	 etat uktam bhavati liṅgasya eva pravṛttiḥ na syāt kim punar liṃgi niścitā pramāṇāḥ ntarasya pravṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati yathā anitye sādhye śabdaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ tasya pratyakṣeṇa eva pramāṇena svarūpa siddheḥ kāraṇāt sarva ākāra siddhiḥ kasmāt tad anyasya asiddhasya śabda svabhāvāt anyasya svabhāvasya asiddhasya abhāvāt bhāve vā asiddhasya svabhāva syaa tatsvabhāva tvam aśabda svabhāva tvam siddha asiddhayoḥ eka svabhāva tva virodhāt 
PVVṬ_121,4	 tat eva āha na hi ityādi alabdha dharma anuvṛttiḥ yogaḥ labdha dharma anuvṛttiḥ kṣemaḥ ekaḥ yogaḥ kṣemaḥ ca yasya sa tathā tulya dharmā iti yāvat yaḥ svabhāvaḥ yena sadā ekaka yogakṣemī na bhavati sa bhinna yogakṣemaḥ tad svabhāvaḥ yatas bhinna yogakṣemaḥ tasyataḥ tanmātra nibandhana tvāt bheda vyavahārasya nānātvam vyavasthāyāḥ 
PVVṬ_122,1	 anyathā iti yadi etat bheda kāraṇam na iṣyate tadā abheda vyavahārasya abhāva prasaṅgāt iti uktam eṣa hi bheda abheda hetuḥ vā iti atra prastāve yatas evantasmāt pratyakṣe dharmiṇi śabda ādau tad svabhāva sākalya paricchedāt dharmi svabhāvasya sākalyena avagamāt tatra dharmiṇi anavakāśā nirviṣayī pramāṇa antarasya anumānasya vṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_122,2	 tava api tulyaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced āha no ca ityādi bhrānti nimittena sadṛśa apara utpatti ādinā kāraṇa bhūtena vikalpa buddhyā saṃyojyeta samāropyeta guṇa antaram sthira tva ādi vā śabdaḥ iva arthe śuktau= iva rajata ākāraḥ saṃyojyeta katham rajata rūpeṇa śuktikā rūpasya yat sādharmya ca ekacikya ādi tasya darśanāt anavadhārita viśeṣam śuktikā rūpam eva sadṛśa pratyaya nibandhana tvāt rūpa sādharmyam uktam na tu sādharmyam nāma dvayoḥ sādhāraṇam asti 
PVVṬ_122,3	 etat uktam bhavati yadi bhrānti nimittena guṇa antaran na saṃyojyeta bhavet mama api doṣaḥ kintu samāropyeta tatas samāropa vyavaccheda artham pramāṇa antaram pravarttate tena ayam artha anubhūta niścite pramāṇa antarasya gṛhīta grāhi tvena apravṛttiḥ syāt samāropeṇa tu anubhūta aniścite tad samāra upa vyavaccheda artham pramāṇa antaram anumānam pravarttate iti eke 
PVVṬ_122,4–122,5	 tat ayuktam liṅgasya vyavacchedene saha sambandha asiddheḥ na api yāvat hetunā pūrvam pakṣa vyavacchedaḥ na kriyate tāvat sandigdhā sādhya pratītiḥ syāt hetoḥ sādhyena sambandhāt yatra ca na sādhyam na tatra tad vipakṣaḥ virodhāt tasmāt liṅgam sva vyāpakam vidhi rūpeṇa niścinvat arthāt anya samāropam niṣedhati nanu evam api kathantad niṣedhaḥ kṣaṇikatva anumānepi pravṛtte akṣaṇikā āropāt 
PVVṬ_122,6	 satyam kevalam anumānena akṣaṇikā artha niṣedhe kṛte na aya makṣaṇika ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ tad janyā upi tu sadṛśa apara utpatti janya tvena āropitaḥ iti pratipādyate tasmāt tasya eva anubhūtā niścitasya kṣaṇika tva ādeḥ niścaya anumānam pravarttate yatra api viparīta samāropaḥ na asti abhyāsādeḥ aṃbhāvāt ca na anubhavaḥ niścaya janana samarthaḥ na tatra api niścaya arthā pramāṇa antara vṛttiḥ eka aṃśa niścayena sarva ātmanā niścita tvāt na ca tat vastu pratibhāsate yasya na kaścid api svabhāvaḥ niścitaḥ tasmāt tatra api eka pramāṇa pravṛttau= aparasya apravṛttiḥ syāt eva iti 
PVVṬ_123,1	 yadi ityādinā vivaraṇam dṛṣṭam sarvantattvam svarūpam yasya iti vigrahaḥ tathā niścaya pratirodhinā yathā dṛṣṭa niścaya vibandhakena bhrānti nimittena sadṛśa apara utpatti lakṣaṇena guṇa antara sthira tva ādi na saṃyojyeta na āropyeta yathā śuktau viśiṣṭa rūpeṇa gṛhītāyām api śukla sādharmyāt rajata ākāraḥ saṃyojyeta tadā syāt anavakāśā pramāṇa antara vṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_123,2	 syāt matam na śuktau viśiṣṭa rūpa grahe rajata samāropaḥ kintu yat rajata rūpa sāmāni antat dṛṣṭeḥ eva madhyavasāyaḥ iti atra āha na hi iti na hi śuktau dve rūpe sambhavataḥ ekam rajatena samānam rūpam aparam viśiṣṭam avadhāraṇam ca kim kāraṇam tathā sāmānya viśeṣa rūpeṇa śavala ābhāsāyāḥ pratipatteḥ sarvadā prasaṅgāt apratipattau vā vivekena iti idam sāmānya mayam viśeṣaḥ iti evam vivekena vibhāgena apratipattau dvi tva vikalpā yogāt śuktau dve rūpe iti kalpanāyāḥ ayogāt pratibhāsa bhedam antareṇa dvi tva kalpanāyām atiprasaṅgāt anyatra api ekatva abhimate dvi tva kalpanā syāt na idam rajatam iti bādhakasya anutpāda prasaṃgāt ca tasmāt śuktau rūpa dvaya ayogātaḥ 
PVVṬ_123,3^1	 paśyan śukti rūpam puruṣaḥ viśiṣṭam eva sva lakṣaṇam eva paśyati na sāmānyam abhyāsa ādayaḥ niścaya pratyayāḥ teṣām vaiphalyāt tu aniścinvan dvi viśiṣṭam śuktikā rūpantat sāmānyam rajata rūpa sāmānī ampaśyāmī iti manyate tatas iti rajata rūpa sāmānya grahaṇa abhimānāḥ dasya draṣṭuḥ śuktau rajata samāropaḥ yat vā śuktikāra jatayoḥ yat sāmānyam tulyam rūpantat paśyāmi iti manyate tatas rūpa darśanāt asya draṣṭū rajata samāropaḥ tathā hi yādṛśam eva mayā rajatasya rūpam pratipannanta adṛśam eva asya api rūpantasmāt tat eva idam rajatam iti pratītiḥ yathā śuktau rajata samāropaḥ tathā dṛṣṭe śabda ādau dharmiṇi sadṛśa apara apara utpattyā sadṛśasya dvitīyasya kṣaṇasya utpattyā bhrānti nimittena pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ alakṣita nānā tvasya puṃsaḥ tad bhāva samāropāt sattā samāropāt sthiti bhrāntiḥ 
PVVṬ_123,3^2	 tasmāt yāvantosya śabda ādeḥ kṣaṇikā an ātma ādi svabhāvasya para bhāvāḥ nitya ādayaḥ tāvanta eva yathāsva nimitta bhāvinaḥ yasya yat anurūpam nimittantadbhāvinaḥ samāropāḥ iti tad vyavacchedakāni tasya samāropasya arthāt vyavacchedakāni bhavanti iti utpadyamānāni pramāṇāni anumāna saṃjñitāni vyakti bhedāt bahuvacanam saphalāni syuḥ sārthakāni syuḥ teṣāntu vyavaccheda phalānām samāropa pratiṣedha phalānām pramāṇānām na apratītasya vastu aṅaśasya vastu bhāgasya pratyāyane prakāśane pravṛttiḥ tasya vastu aṃśasya niraṃśe dharmiṇi dṛśyamāne dṛṣṭa tvāt kim kāraṇam anaṃśasyeka deśena darśana ayogāt 
PVVṬ_124,1–124,2	 yatas evantasmāt pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭaḥ eva akhilaḥ guṇaḥ samastaḥ svabhāvaḥ tathā api bhrāntteḥ sadbhāvāt niścīyate na iti kṛtvā tad niścaya arthaṃsā dhanam anumānam vidhi rūpeṇa eva pravarttate iti spaṣṭam eva uktam tasmāt na adṛṣṭa grahaṇa arthāḥ dṛṣṭe pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇa antarasya kintarhi dṛṣṭa niścayā ca eva pravṛttiḥ iti anena api vidhi arthaḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva uktonya niṣedhaḥ tu arthāt 
PVVṬ_124,3–125,1	 vastu grahaḥ ityādi cakāraḥ pratyakṣa apekṣayā samuccaya arthaḥ anumānena ca vastu graha iṅgīkriyamāṇe śabda ādi dharmiṇaḥ dharmasya ekasya kṛtaka tva ādi lakṣaṇasya niścayena niraṃśa tvāt dharmiṇaḥ sarva dharma niścayaḥ tadā nitya tva ādi anumāna antara vaiphalyam iti ākūtam apohaḥ bāhya tayā āropitaḥ ākāra upohyate anena iti kṛtvā tasmin= anumānena pratipādya iṅgīkriyamāṇe yat vā apohyatesmin= iti apohaḥ sva lakṣaṇam tasmin su a ākāra abhinna tayā anumāna grāhye abhyupagamyamāne na ayam anantara uktaḥ doṣaḥ prasajyate 
PVVṬ_125,2–125,3	 na kevalam ityādi vivaraṇam kvacid pratyakṣa dṛṣṭe dharmiṇī iti sambandhaḥ kasmiṃścid pratyakṣa dṛṣṭe dharmiṇī iti arthaḥ na sarvaḥ dharmī pratyakṣaḥ bhavati iti kvacid grahaṇam anantara uktena nyāyena pramāṇa antarāvṛttiḥ tadā anumānam api vastu śabda ādikam vidhinā pratyāyati iṣyate vastu adhyavasāyena arthān na samāropa vyavaccheda kṛt tadā iti vidhi rūpeṇa vastu svarūpa grahaṇe eka dharma niścaye sati tadavyatirekāt niścita dharma avyatirekāt sarva dharma niścayaḥ iti pramāṇa antarāvṛttiḥ anumāna antara apravṛttiḥ sati api avyatireke na sarva dharma niścayaḥ iti ced āha na hi ityādi tasmin= iti prathama anumāna niścite dharme tat ā ātmā iti niścita dharma ātmā sanna niścitaḥ na hi yuktaḥ 
PVVṬ_125,4	 apohe na ayan doṣaḥ prasajyate iti etat vivṛṇvan= āha yadā punar ityādi yadā punar anumānena vastu adhyavasāyam kurvatā arthāt sa māropa vyavacchedaḥ kriyate na tu sākṣāt jñāpaka tvāt asya tena etat nirastam sa māropa vyavacchedaḥ eva vyavahārāt anya artha pravṛttiḥ na syāt anumānena aniścita tvāt iti tadā ekena kṛtaka anumānena ekasya akṛtaka samāropasya vyavacchedāt anyasya nitya samāropasya vyavacchedaḥ kṛtaḥ na bhavati iti kṛtvā tad artham anya samāra upa vyavaccheda artham anyaditi anitya tva ādi anumānam pravarttate tasmāt na vikalpānām sva rūpeṇa bāhyaḥ grāhyaḥ api tu su a ākāreṇa saha ekīkṛtaḥ eva bāhyaḥ viṣayaḥ sa ca asatyaḥ apohyate anyat anena iti apohaḥ ucyate 
PVVṬ_125,5	 sthite ca evamparonavagata abhiprāyaḥ prāha nanu ityādi pūrvanta dviparīta ākāra samāropī viparyāsaḥ pravarttate tatas tad viparyāsa pūrvaka upratītasya arthasya liṅgāt niścayaḥ bhavati iti na āyat niyamaḥ viparyāsa rahitepi anumāna sambhavāt tat āha yathā ityādi akasmāt iti atarkkita upasthitāt sahasā eva kvacid pradeśe dhūmāt agni pratipattiḥ na hi tatra iti akasmāt agni pratipattau= anagni samāropaḥ sambhāvyate tat iti tasmāt na sarvatra vyavacchedaḥ kriyate arthāt iti a numānena 
PVVṬ_126,1	 uktam ityā cā ryaḥ atra hi vastu svarūpa grāhaka tvena anumānasya pravṛttau= uktam uttaram pratyakṣeṇa dharmi pratipattau tad dharmāṇām dharmiṇaḥ sakāśāt abhedāt sarva prapitatteḥ anumāna vaiphalyam iti dharmiṇaḥ sakāśāt dharmasya bhede vā abhyupagamyamāne dharmiṇā saha na tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ bheda abhyupagamāt na ca anitya tva ādīnām dharmi svarūpāt utpattiḥ na ca anitya tva ādibhyaḥ dharmiṇaḥ utpattiḥ tatas ca asambaddhasya dharmasya tatra rmiṇyapratipattiḥ iti etat api uktam ahetu phala bhūtasya tatra anumāna asambha va āditi atra antare yatas evantasmāt tatra api akasmāt dhūma darśanāt agni pratipattau tad darśinaḥ pradeśa darśinaḥ paṃsaḥ tad svabhāvā niścaya ugnimattva svabhāvā niścaya usti eva sa ca aniyataḥ kṛtaḥ viparyāsāt eva anagnimatā pradeśena tulya tva grahaṇāt eva 
PVVṬ_126,2–126,4^1	 etat eva āha sa ca ityādi yat vā tad svabhāva aniścayaḥ kutas kintu niścayaḥ eva syāt aviparyāsāt bhavati ca aniścayaḥ tasmāt na dharmi pratipattiḥ vastu svarūpa grāhiṇī iti apoha viṣayā kiñca sa ca ityādi sa ca iti puruṣaḥ tad viviktena iti vahni vivekena tam pradeśam agnimantam api tad viviktena rūpeṇa niścinvan buddhyā kimbhūtayā agni sattā bhāvanā vimuktayā agni sattā sambhāvanā rahitayā katham aviparyastaḥ nāma viparyastaḥ eva ātasmin= tad grahāt tathā hi yāvat tatra pradeśe dhūman na paśyati tāvat anyena agni rahitena pradeśena sadṛśantam api adhyavasyati yadi nāma kvacid anubhava yoge sati yadi iha niścayaḥ tathā api tatra saṃśayena bhāvyam saṃśayaḥ ca ubhaya aṃśa avalambī sa ca pakṣe tad viparītam saṃspṛśati eva atas saṃśaya vyudāsepyanya vyavacchedaḥ kutas bhavati eva liṅgena 
PVVṬ_126,4^2	 avaśyam ca liṅgāt eva anumeyam pratipadyamānaḥ taṃtra anumeye viparyāsa saṃśayābhyām yuktaḥ bhavati yasmāt tad ākāra samāropa saṃśaya rahitaḥ ca anagni ākāra samāropeṇa saṃśayena ca rahitaḥ ca puruṣaḥ tad pratipattau agni pratipattau na liṅgam anusaret na pakṣa dharmam samāśrayet tathā na tasya liṅgasya anvaya vyatirekayoḥ ādriyeta yāvatā anusaret ādriyate ca tasmāt tad ākāra samāropa saṃśayavān pratipattā liṅga balena samāropam apanayati kvacid saṃśayam atas sarvatra sva vyāpaka pratipatti dvāreṇa samāropa vyavacchedaḥ kriyate 
PVVṬ_127,1–127,2	 tasmāt apoha viṣayam anya vyavaccheda viṣayam iti uktena prakāreṇa na tu sākṣāt anyathā iti yadi samāropam antareṇa anumānasya pratipattiḥ iṣyate tadā kenacid pramāṇena dharmiṇaḥ siddhau kim asiddhantasya dharmiṇaḥ rūpam atas siddhāt svabhāvāt param anyat asti yasya pratyāyanāya liṅgam pravartteta nanu saṃśaya viparyaya utpāde sati bhāgaḥ syāt yat āha na ca imāḥ kalpanāḥ apratisamviditāḥ eva udayante vyayante ca iti na api tad pratipattau liṅga anusaraṇena tad ākāra samāropa saṃśayaḥ śakyate kalpayitun niścaya anutpatti pakṣepi sādhya niścaya artham liṅga anusaraṇasya sambhavāt 
PVVṬ_127,3–127,5	 anyathā dharmiṇaḥ siddhau= asiddham kim atas param iti anena api dharmi viṣayasya jñānasya kalpita viṣaya tvam syāt na tu dharmiṇi samāropaḥ sidhyati iti kathantad anu mānasya arthāt sa māropa vyavacchedaḥ iti sattyam kintu ayam abhiprāyaḥ na yāvat pakṣa dharma tva niścayaḥ na tāvat anumānasya utthānam asti hetoḥ asiddha tvāt agnimati ca pradeśe pradeśa mātra sambandhi tayā yaḥ dhūmasya niścayaḥ ayam eva viparyāsaḥ anyathā avadhāraṇāt na hi atra agniḥ na asti iti evam rūpaḥ eva viparyāsaḥ sa agneḥ pradeśa āt ayam anyaḥ iti evam rūpasya api rṣi pratyayasya viparyāsāt tena atra api anumāne sa agniḥ ayam pradeśaḥ na pradeśa mātram iti samāropa niṣedha usti eva 
PVVṬ_127,6–128,1	 bhavatu tāvat samārope tad vyavacchedāya sva viṣaye pravarttamānam liṅgam anya apoha kṛt yat punar idam pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvi vikalpa vijñānanta dasati samārope bhavat katham anya apoha kṛt avaśyam ca tad anya apoha viṣayameṣṭavyam sāmānya viṣaya tvāt anya apoha lakṣaṇa tvāt ca sāmānyasya bhavatān darśanena iti atas āha kvacid ityādi kasmiṃścid rūpa ādau dṛṣṭā ipi pratyakṣeṇa tad pṛṣṭha bhāvi yat jñānam sāmānya artham sāmānya viṣayam atas eva vikalpakam asamāropitaḥanya aṅśaḥ pratiyogi ākāraḥ yasmin viṣaye sa tathā tatra pravarttamā anantat api tad mātra apoha gocaram tena ayam arthaḥ bhavati samāropa rahitam sva lakṣaṇam su a ākāra bhedena gṛhṇan vikalpakam jñānambhrānta tvāt tad samāra upa rahita bāhya adhyavāsāyakam eva na tu bāhya svarūpa grāhakam atas tanmātram eva niyata bāhya avasāyaḥ eva anyasya samāropasya apoha gocaram vikalpakam jñānam 
PVVṬ_128,2–128,3	 yat vā asamāropitaḥ ca asau= anya aṃśaḥ ca tasmin sati vikalpakam jñānam pravarttamānaḥ ntanmātra apoha gocaram yosau= asamāropi ta unya aṅśaḥ tanmātra vyavaccheda viṣayam bhavati etat uktam bhavati yatra api samāropaḥ pravṛttaḥ na tatra api samāropa niṣedhaḥ śabda liṅgābhyām pratipādyate sambandha abhāvāt atas eva ayam na kriyate ahetu tvāt ca nāśasya kevalam pūrvakasya samāropasya svarasa nirodhāt śabda liṅgābhyām anitya ādi niścaye sati anyasya samāropasya anutpāde sati samāropa niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati tathā pratyakṣa dṛṣṭā ipyanya vikalpasya samāropa vyavacchedaḥ kena vāryate tena na pūrvatra anyādṛśaḥ eva sa māropa vyavacchedaḥ uktaḥ adhunā anyādṛśaḥ eva ucyate iti bhinna vākyatā 
PVVṬ_128,4–128,6	 tena idam ca nirastam prāc agauḥ iti vijñānam go śabda śrāviṇaḥ bhavet yena ago vyavacchedāya pravṛttaḥ gauḥ iti dhvaniḥ iti yadā śabda liṃgayoḥ sva viṣaye niścaya jananena anya niṣedhe vyāpāraḥ kalpyate tadā vidhi rūpeṇa eva pravṛttiḥ iti siddham tena yadi gauḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ samarthoni anivarttane janakaḥ gavi go buddheḥ mṛgyatām aparaḥ dhvaniḥ iti nirastam 
PVVṬ_128,7–129,2	 tathā yat api ucyate yadi appoha vinirmukte na vṛttiḥ śabda liṃgayoḥ yuktā tathā api bodhaḥ tu jñātuḥ vastu avalambataḥ iti tat iṣṭam eva asmākam śabda liṃga pratipāditasya ca arthasya anya niṣedhe vyāpāraḥ na śabda liṅgayoḥ tena yat ucyate ku mā ri le na niṣedhasya nirūpa tvāt bheda abhāvāt ca na liṅga liṅgi bhāvaḥ na api śabda vācya tvam 
PVVṬ_129,3–129,4	 na gamya gamaka tvam syāt avastu tvāt apohayoḥ bhavat pakṣe yathā loke kha puṣpa śaśa śṛṅgayoḥ niṣedha mātra rūpam ca śabda arthaḥ yadi kalpyate abhāva śabda vācyā syāt śūnyatā anya prakārikā bhinna sāmānya vacanāḥ viśeṣa vacana āśraye sarve bhaveyuḥ paryāyāḥ yadi apohasya vācya tā tathā yadi ca apohya bhedena apohasya bhedaḥ tad aupacārikaḥ syāt yasya ca apohasya nīrūpa tve dharmi bhedena na bhedaḥ kathantasya bahis bhūtaiḥ apohaiḥ bhedaḥ kriyate tat āha 
PVVṬ_129,5–129,8	 nanu ca apoha bhedena bheda upohasya setsyati na viśeṣaḥ svatas tasya paratas ca aupacārikaḥ saṃsargiṇā upi ca ādhārāḥ yat na bhindanti bhāvataḥ apohyaiḥ sa vahiḥ saṃsthaiḥ bhidyeta iti ati kalpanā iti nirastam vyavaccheda mātrasya śabda ādi aviṣaya tvāt yat ityādinā ślokam vyācaṣṭe ādi śabdāt śabda ādi parigrahaḥ na asya liṃgam asti iti iliṅga rūpa ādikam etat iti niścaya jñānam asati samārope bhavati na hi pratyakṣa dṛṣṭe rūpa ādau tadānīm viparīta ākāra samāroposti tat katham vyavaccheda viṣayam bhavati iyatā ślokasya pūrva arddhaḥ vyākhyātaḥ uttara arddham vyākhyātum āha samāropa viṣaye tasya niścaya jñānasya abhāvāt tad vyavaccheda viṣayambhavati iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ etat eva āha yatra bhedesya puṃsaḥ samāropaḥ na tatra bhede samāropa viṣayeniḥ cayaḥ bhavati asthiraḥ nirātmakaḥ iti vā 
PVVṬ_130,1	 kim kāraṇam niścaya āropa manasoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ niścaya jñānasya tad viparīta samāropa jñānasya ca bādhya bādhaka bhāvataḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvam eva sādhayan= āha na hi iti sarvatas sajātīyāt vijātīyāt ca bhinnaḥ dṛṣṭopi bhāvaḥ tathā eva iti yathādṛṣṭena sarveṇa ākāreṇa pratyabhijñāyate niścīyate na hi iti sambandhaḥ kim kāraṇam kvacid bhede kṣaṇika tva ādike vyavadhāna sambhavāt bhrānti nimitta gataḥ yathā śukteḥ sarvatas vyāvṛttāyāḥ darśanepi śuktikā ādi tve rajata sādharmyasya bhrānti nimittasya sambhavāt na niścayaḥ yatra tu ākāre bhrānti nimittam na asti tatra eva asya pratipattuḥ anubhavaḥ ttara kāla bhāvī smārttaḥ niścayaḥ bhavati tad darśana aviśeṣepi sarva sva ākāreṣu pratyakṣasya aviśeṣepi smārttaḥ iti smṛti rūpaḥ 
PVVṬ_130,2–130,3	 nanu tat iti ullekhena anutpatteḥ katham smṛti rūpaḥ satyam nirvikalpaka viṣayasya su a ākāreṇa ekīkṛtya viṣayīkaraṇāt smṛti rūpaḥ ucyate yatas ca pratyakṣa aviśeṣepi samāropa rahitaḥ eva viṣaye niścayaḥ bhavatitasmāt samāropa niścayayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ gamyate tatas bādhya bādhaka bhāvāt kāraṇāt samāropa viveke samāropa viraha niścayasya asya pravṛttiḥ iti gamyate 
PVVṬ_130,4	 bhavatu nāma samāropa viveke pravṛttiḥ tathā api na anya apoha viṣaya tvam vidhi rūpeṇa pravṛtteḥ iti āha tad vivekaḥ eva anya apohaḥ samāropa vivekaḥ eva ca anya apohaḥ tasmāt samāra uparahite vṛtti vaśāt tat api iti na kevalam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti niścaya jñānam pūrva uktena nyāyena tad mātra apoha gocarantat api pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvi niściya jñānam apitanmātra apoha gocaram na vastu svabhāva niścāyakam sva rūpeṇa kiṅkāraṇam tathā hi kasyacid ākārasya rūpa tva ādeḥ niścaya ipi anyasya kṣaṇika tva ādi ākārasya apratipatti darśanāt 
PVVṬ_131,1–131,2	 yadi tu pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvinā niṣcayena vastu svabhāvasya niścayaḥ kriyate tadā tad svabhāva niścaye ca niraṃśa tvāt vastunaḥ tasya ayogāt anyasya ākāra antarasya aniścaya ayogāt yatas ca vastu adhyavasāyena eva niścayasya pravṛttiḥ śabdasya vā na vastu svarūpa grāhaka tvena tasmāt yāvantaḥ ekasya aṃśa samāropāḥ rūpa antara samāropāḥ pravṛttāḥ apravṛttāḥ ca tad nirāse samāropa nirāsa arthantāvante eva niścayāḥ śabdāḥ ca tāvantaḥ eva sva viṣaye pravarttante tena kāraṇena te niścayāḥ śabdāḥ ca bhinna gocara abhinna viṣayāḥ sva sva hetu todhya vasita sva sva ākāra abhinna bāhya viṣaya tvāt tena etat 
PVVṬ_131,3–131,4	 buddhi āropita buddhi sthaḥ na artha buddhi antara anugaḥ nābhi preta artha kārī ca sa upi vācyaḥ na tattvataḥ pratibhā api ca śabda arthaḥ bāhya artha viṣayāḥ yadi eka ātma niyate bāhye vicitrāḥ pratibhāḥ katham atha nirviṣayā etāḥ vāsanā mātra bhāvataḥ pratipattiḥ pravṛttiḥ ca bāhya artheṣu katham bhavet sva aṃśe bāhya adhimokṣeṇa pravṛttiḥ ced sadā matā śabda arthaḥ atāttvikaḥ prāptaḥ tathā bhrāntyā pravarttanāt iti nirastam kalpita viṣaya tvena iṣṭa tvāt vikalpasya 
PVVṬ_131,5	 anyathā iti buddhi śabdābhyām vastu svarūpa grahaṇe ekena śabdena vyāpte sarva ākāreṇa viṣayīkṛte ekatra ekasmin buddhyā vā niścaya ātmikayā vyāptena anya viṣayaḥ anyaḥ ca asau= ākāraḥ viṣayaḥ ca iti anya viṣayaḥ tasya vastunaḥ na aparaḥ ākāraḥ viṣaya bhūtaḥ vidyate pratyāyyaḥ athavā tad vastu pratyāyakasya anyasya śabdasya jñānasyavā na viṣayaḥ iti hetoḥ śabdānām pratīte viṣaye paścāt pravarttamānānām paryāyatā syāt vṛkṣa pādapa ādi śabda vat madhuraḥ rasaḥ snigdhaḥ guruḥ śītaḥ iti evamādi bhinna viṣaya anupātinyāḥ ca buddheḥ pravṛttiḥ na syāt iti eka viṣaya tva prasaṃgaḥ 
PVVṬ_132,1	 bhinnam dharma dharmi bhāvam pārama arthi kandūṣayitum upanyasyan= āha yasya api ityādi yasya api vai śe ṣi kaḥ sya parasparam āśrayāt ca bhinna tvāt nānā upādhayaḥ viśeṣaṇāni dravya tva ādayaḥ yasya arthasya ghaṭa ādeḥ sa nānā upādhiḥ tasya tatas eva upādhi bhedāt bhedinorthasya vidhinā eva buddhigrāhikā niścaya ātmikā dhīḥ sā ca pratyupādhi bhinnāḥ dhiyaḥ ca viṣaya bhedan darśayatā śabdānām api arthataḥ darśitaḥ eva 
PVVṬ_132,2	 tat vyācaṣṭe yopi ityādinā upādhayaḥ dravya tva ādayaḥ parasparam anyonyambhinnāḥ āśrayāt ca iti upādhimatas bhinnāḥ tad nibandhanāḥ bhinna upādhi nibandhanāḥ śruti grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam evam buddhayopi tad ādhāre sthiti upādhīnām ādhāreṣu tatra eva ca iti upādhiṣu eva varttante vācaka tayā pravarttante tat iti tasmāt ayam iti śabda jñāna antarāṇām paryāyata alakṣaṇaḥ aprasaṃgaḥ 
PVVṬ_132,3–132,5	 uttaram āha tasya api ityādi nānā prakārāṇām upādhīnām upakārasya aṅgam kāraṇam yāḥ śaktayaḥ tābhyaḥ abhinna ātmanaḥ upādhimataḥ ekena niścaya jñānena grahe niścaye sarva ātmanā kṛte sati upakāryasya upādhi ka lāpasya kaḥ bhedaḥ kaḥ upādhi viśeṣaḥ syāt aniścitaḥ sarve eva niścitaḥ syāt nanu agni dhūmayoḥ sati api sambandhe na agni niścaye dhūmasya niścayaḥ dṛśyate tathā dharmi niścaye dharma aniścayaḥ bhaviṣyati nanu idam eva adarśanan na syāt niścaya pratyayena sarva ātmanā agni svarūpa grahe sati dhūma ādi kāraṇa tvena eva niścayāt dhūma ādīnām api niścita tvāt tasmāt na niścayena tad svarūpa grahaṇam nirvikalpakena api tarhi sarva ātmanā grahaḥ na syāt dhūma apratibhāsāt eva tad kāryatva agrahāt 
PVVṬ_133,1	 na etat asti agneḥ hi dhūma jananaṃprati kāraṇa tvam pūrva bhāvaḥ eva ucyate sa ca pratyakṣe pratibhāsate iti katham na agneḥ tad kārya tva grahaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ na agni dhūmayoḥ paramārthataḥ paraspara apekṣitā vidyate niṣpannā niṣpanna avasthāyām sambandha abhāvāt kevalam agnau sati eva dhūmaḥ bhavati iti tau kārya kāraṇe ucyete dharma dharmiṇoḥ tu paraspara apekṣi tvāt dharmiṇaḥ sarva ātmanā niścaye sarva dharmāṇām sākṣāt niścayaḥ syāt na arthāt ākṣepaḥ yadā tu bāhya adhyavasāyakaḥ vikalpaḥ bhavati na tu grāhakaḥ tadā adhyavasitasya arthasya anya vyāvṛtti sambhavena arthāt anya dharmākṣepaḥ yujyate paraspara apekṣa tve ca yāvat na dharma niścayaḥ na tāvat dharmi niścayaḥ yāvat ca na dharmi niścayaḥ tāvat na dharma niścayaḥ iti anyonya āśraya tvañca syāt 
PVVṬ_133,2–133,3	 nanu ca upādhi upādhimat bhāvaḥ āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ eva ucyate sa ca samāna kāla bhāvinoḥ eva na ca tayoḥ upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ bhinna kāla tvāt asya tat katham ucyate eka upādhi viśiṣṭa grahe sarva grahaḥ iti sattyam kintu paraiḥ anyaḥ eva janya janaka bhāvonyaḥ ca upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ iṣyate tathā hi vadara dravyam sva hetu janyam api kuṇḍena upakriyate atas evam samāna kāla bhāvinoḥ ayam upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ iṣyate iti tad abhiprāyāt idam uktam yat vā dharmaḥ niścīyamānaḥ dharmya āśrita tvāt eva āśrayasya pratītim ākṣipati sa ca āśritānām dharmāṇām iti sarva niścayaḥ tasmāt śabda pramāṇa antara vṛtteḥ kalpitaḥ eva dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ na ca asmin pakṣe dharma bheda abheda kalpanāyām pramāṇa antara vaiyarthyam avastu tvena teṣām bheda abhedasya paramārthataḥ abhāvāt pramāṇa antaraiḥ eva ca dharma antarāṇām kalpanīya tvāt tad abhāve katham dharma bheda abheda kalpanā iti yat kiñcid etat 
PVVṬ_133,4	 yadi api ityādinā kārikā artham vyācaṣṭe śabda antarāṇām jñāna antarāṇām arthaḥ upādhimati pratipattau pratinimittam bhinnāḥ eva upādhayaḥ yadi api abhyupagamyante sa tu tat vā anupādhimānarthaḥ śabda jñānaiḥ upalīyate viṣayīkriyate tasya tadvataḥ nānā upādhīnām upakāra āśrayāḥ yāḥ śaktayaḥ tad svabhāvasya sva ātmani svarūpe bhedaḥ na asti tatas ca eka upādhi dvāreṇa api grahe sarva ātmanā grahaṇantasmin sati kaḥ eva upādhi bhedaḥ tasya aniścitaḥkintu sarve eva niścitaḥ syāt kim kāraṇam sarva upādhi upakāraka tvena grahaṇāt 
PVVṬ_134,1	 eka upādhi dvāreṇa upādhim atas svarūpam eva grahītam na tu upādhi upakāraka tvam iti ced āha na hi ityādi na hi upādhi upakāraka tvam anya deva agṛhītam iti anena sambandhaḥ tasya iti upādhimataḥ svena rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇasya svarūpāt upakāraka tvasya abhedāt yatas evam atas kāraṇāt asya iti upādhimataḥ yat eva svabhāvena svarūpeṇa grahaṇanta deva upakāraka tvena api grahaṇam iti 
PVVṬ_134,2	 bhavatu eka upādhi dvāreṇa upādhim atas sarva upādhi upakāraka tvasya svabhāva bhūtasya grahaḥ upādhīna antu tasmāt vyatiriktānām katham grahaṇam iti atas āha tayoḥ ityādi upādhi kalāpasya upādhimataḥ ca upakārya upakāraka bhūtayoḥ ātmani svabhāvenyonya sambandhaḥ sambandhāt upakārya upakāraka sambandhasya ātma bhūta tvāt iti yāvat tatas ca upakāraka svabhāvasya ekasya jñāne sati sambandhāt dvaya grahaḥ upādhi upādhi matos grahaḥ 
PVVṬ_134,3–134,4	 stat vyācaṣṭe ātma bhūtasya ityādi tathā hi upādhimati gṛhīte tasya ātma bhūtaḥ upakāraka bhāvaḥ tāvat gṛhītaḥ tasmin gṛhīte upādhīnām api ukārya bhāvaḥ ātma bhūtaḥ gṛhītaḥ tad grahaṇana āntarīyaka tvāt upakāraka bhāva grahaṇasya atas kāraṇāt eka jñāne dvayoḥ api upādhi upādhimatos grahaṇam iti kṛtvā eka upādhi viśiṣṭepi tasmin= upādhimati gṛhyamāṇe sarva upādhīnām grahaṇam tad grahaṇana āntarīyaka tvāt iti upādhi grahaṇana āntarīyaka tvāt anyathā iti upādhīnām agrahe tathā api na gṛhyeta upādhīnām upakārakaḥ upādhimān iti evam api na gṛhyeta yaḥ eva tadānīm jñāna śabda pravṛtti nimittam upādhiḥ tam pratyeva upakāraka tvam upādhimataḥ gṛhītam na tu upādhi antara upakāraka tvam iti ced āha na hi anyaḥ eva ityādi anya upakāra kaiti anyasya upādheḥ upakārakaḥ svabhāvaḥ yaḥ na gṛhītaḥ kintu sarve eva gṛhītaḥ niraṃśa tvāda vastunaḥ 
PVVṬ_135,1	 syāt matam upādhimatonapa īkṣita sambandhinaḥ upakārakaḥ iti eva grahaṇam na tu asya upakārakaḥ iti tatas na upādhīnām grahaṇam iti atas āha na ca api ityādi tathā gṛhītaḥ iti upakārakaḥ iti evam gṛhīte upakāra kāryasya upādheḥ agrahaṇam kim kāraṇam tasya api ukārakasya upakārakaḥ iti evam agrahaṇa prasaṃgāt etat kathayati sambandhi tvāt upakārakasya antareṇa dvitīya sambandhi grahaṇam upakārakaḥ iti api grahaṇam na asti iti tathābhū tañca dṛṣṭāntam āha sva svāmi tva vat iti na hi sva grahaṇam antareṇa asti svāmi tvasya grahaṇam yatas evam eka upādhi dvāreṇa pravṛttepi ekasmin jñāne śabde ca sarva upādhīnām grahaṇam upādhimataḥ ca sarva ātmanā tasmāt artha antara upādhi vādepi artha antara bhūtāḥ upādhaye iti evaṃvādepi samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ śabda jñāna antarāṇām paryāyatā prāpnoti iti 
PVVṬ_135,2–135,3	 atha api ityādinā paramāśaṅkate yābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ śaktimān upādhīn upakaroti tāḥ śaktayaḥ śaktimataḥ sakāśāt bhinnāḥ tatas iti bhedāt na ayam prasaṃgaḥ iti eka upādhi upakāraka śakti abheda grahe sarva śaktīnām grahaṇam tad grahaṇāt ca sarva upādhīnām iti ayam prasaṅgaḥ na asti uttaram āha dharma upakāra ityādi dharmāḥ upādhayaḥ teṣām upakārasya yāḥ śaktayaḥ tāsāṃśaktimataḥ sakāśāt bhede abhyupagamyamāne tāḥ śaktayaḥ tasya śaktimataḥ kimbhavanti na kiṃcid bhavanti na tad sambandhinyaḥ iti arthaḥ yadā yadi na upakāraḥ tatas śaktimatan= tāsām śaktīnām atha sambandha siddhi artham upakāraḥ iṣyate tadā śakti upakāriṇyaḥ parāḥ vyatiriktāḥ śaktayā uṅgīkarttavyāḥ yābhiḥ śaktīḥ upakaroti tāsām ca sambandha tva siddhi artham upakāraḥ kalpanīyaḥ tatra aparā śakti kalpanā iti tathā syāt anavasthitiḥ 
PVVṬ_136,1	 tat vyācaṣṭe yadi ityādi upādhim upādhim prati pratyupādhi upakāraka tvāni śaktayaḥ tasya upādhimataḥ na sva ātma bhūtāni na svabhāva bhūtāni kintu vyatiriktāni na api tatas upādhimataḥ upakāram anubhavanti ātmasāt kurvanti kintasya tāḥ ucyante upādhimatas śaktayaḥ iti kasmāt ucyante sambandha abhāvāt sambandha siddhi artham upādhi mataḥ sakāśāt tāsām upādhi upakāriṇīnām śaktīnām upakāra iva aṅgī kriyamāṇe yābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ upādhi upakāriṇīḥ śaktīḥ upakaroti ayam upādhimān yadi tāḥ tasya ātma bhūtāḥ iṣyante tadā sva ātma bhūtābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ ayam upādhimān ekaḥ iti anaṃśaḥ upādhi upakāriṇīḥ śaktīḥ upakurvan 
PVVṬ_136,2	 tathā hi ityādinā sarva ātmanā grahaṇam sādhayati eka upādhi grahaṇe tad upakāriṇyaḥ upādhi upakāriṇyaḥ vyatiriktāyāḥ śakteḥ grahaṇam tad grahaṇaḥ iti upādhi upakāri śakti grahe tad upakārī upādhi upakāri śakti upakārī kiṃbhūtaḥsva ātma bhūta sakala śakti apakāraḥ sva ātma bhūtāḥ sakalāḥ upādhi upakāriṇīnām śaktīnām upakārāḥ śaktayaḥ yasya sa tathābhūtaḥ bhāvaḥ gṛhītaḥ sarvāḥ upādhi upakārikāḥ śaktīḥ grāhayati tāḥ ca imāḥ śaktayaḥ gṛhītāḥ sva upakārya anupādhīn grāhayanti iti tad avasthaḥ prasaṃgaḥ kaḥ bhedaḥ syāt aniścitaḥ iti yaḥ uktaḥ 
PVVṬ_136,3	 atha mā abhūt eṣa doṣaḥ iti tāḥ api śakti upakāriṇyaḥ śaktayaḥ bhinnāḥ eva upādhim atas bhāvāt iṣyante tadā tat upakāriṇya upi śaktayaḥ vyatiriktāḥ kalpanīyāḥ tathā tad upakāriṇyaḥ iti evam anavasthānāt upādhīnām tad śaktīnām ca upādhi upakāra śaktīnām ca apara aparāsu eva śaktiṣu aparyavasānena aniṣṭhayā yat ghaṭanantasya udghaṭanāt sambandhanāt tathā hi upādhayaḥ vyatiriktāsu śaktiṣu sambaddhāḥ tāḥ api vyatiriktāsu eva evam uttarottarā śaktiḥ pūrva pūrvāsu śaktiṣu vyatiriktāsu eva anavasthānena sambaddhā na tu upādhimati tatas ca saḥ ekaḥ upādhimān tābhiḥ upādhi upakārikābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ saha kadācid api agṛhītaḥ tad upakāra ātmā śakti upakāra ātmā upādhi upakārikāṇām śaktīnām yāḥ śaktayaḥ tat ātmā iti yāvat śaktīna antataḥ vyatirekāt tadvat tvena upādhi upakāra śaktimat tvena tat agrahāt upādhimat tvena api atas vyartha eva upādhi kalpanā iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_137,1	 evantā vat yadā upādhimati jñāna śabdayoḥ vṛttiḥ tadā uktaḥ doṣaḥ yadā upādhiṣu eva tadā anyaḥ doṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ tad abhidhānāya upādhi pakṣam upanyasyati yadi punar ityādi kevalān iti āśraya rahitān upādhīn viśeṣaṇa bhedān śabda jñānāni upalīyeran pratyāyaka tvena samāśrayeyuḥ tasya upādhimatas śabda jñānaiḥ asamāveśādaviṣayīkaraṇāt tad pratipatti mukhena upādhimat pratipatti mukhena ekena api śabda jñānena sarvasya upādheḥ pratipattiḥ 
PVVṬ_137,2^1	 atra api doṣam āha tadā api ityādi tasya upādhimatas anākṣepa āditya pratipādanāt tatra iti upādhimati katham vyarthaḥ iti āha artha kriyā ityādi artha kriyām purodhāya pravṛtteḥ artha kriyāḥ āśraya ālambanam yasya vyavahārasya sa tathā sarvaḥ yāvān kaścid prekṣā pūrva kāriṇām vyavahāraḥ hita ahita viṣayaḥ sa ca dvābhyām prakārābhyāṃ vidhi pratiṣedhābhyām tṛtīya prakāra abhāvāt itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇā pāṇiniḥ ca iyam tṛtīyā upādhayaḥ ca go tva ādayaḥ tatra artha kriyā āyām asamarthāḥ samarthaḥ ca vyakti bhedaḥ śabdena eva ucyate iti kim aphalaiḥ śabda prayogaiḥ yatas ca evam artha kriyā samarthaḥ vyakti bhedaḥ na ca ucyate śabdaiḥ tatas ca abhimatāḥ upādhayaḥ go tva ādayaḥ upādhayaḥ na syuḥ na viśeṣaṇāni syuḥ yasmāt kvacid upādhimati upādhi dvāreṇa śabdasya jñānasya vā apravṛttau satyām 
PVVṬ_137,2^2	 kasyacid upādhimataḥ pradhānasya iti viśeṣyasya aṅga abhāvāt viśeṣaṇa bhāvāt tad apekṣayā pradhāna apekṣayā tathā ucyante upādhayaḥ iti ucyante iyam nyāya upādhi vyavasthā yadā tu upādhayaḥ eva śabdena ucyante tadā tasya upādhimatas śabdenā anākṣepāt apratipādanāt na te upādhayaḥ kasyacid pradhānasya aṅga bhūtāḥ iti kim upādhayaḥ na eva iti yāvat yadi upādhi mātram codyate tathā api śabdaiḥ lakṣitāḥ ye upādhayaḥ taiḥ upādhimataḥ lakṣaṇāt paricchedāt adoṣaḥ śabda prayoga vaiyarthya doṣaḥ na iti ced sa samānaḥ sarva upādhi grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ tam eva āha sa tāvat ityādi saḥ iti upādhimān na antarīyaka tayā iti upādhi upādhi matora vyabhicāreṇa upalakṣyamāṇaḥ ekena api upādhinā niraṅśa tvāt sarva ātmanā upalakṣitaḥ iti tad avasthaḥ sarva upādhi graha prasaṃgaḥ 
PVVṬ_138,1	 syāt matam yatra śabdena sākṣāt upādhimataḥ ca udananta tra ayam prasaṃgaḥ na tu yatra artha vaśāt iti atas āha kaḥ hi atra viśeṣaḥ iti śabdāḥ vai enam upādhimantam sākṣāt pratipādayeyuḥ tad lakṣitāḥ vā śabda lakṣitāḥ vā upādhayaḥ upādhimantam lakṣayeyuḥ iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ na kaścid tathā hi sa tāvat upādhimān tadānīm upādhi balena lakṣaṇa kāle niścīyate sarva upakārakaḥ sarveṣām upādhīnām upakārakaḥ iti tathā ca pūrvavat sarva upādhi grahaṇa prasaṃgaḥ atas lakṣita lakṣaṇāt iti yat uktam etat na kiñcid pūrva ukta doṣa duṣṭa tvāt yasmāt upādhi upakārikāṇām śaktīnām vyatireke anavasthā syāt atas na vyatiriktāḥ śaktayaḥ 
PVVṬ_138,2	 tasmāt ekasya upādheḥ upakārake tasmin= upādhimati grāhyebhyupagamyamāne upādhi antarāṇām upakārakāḥ śakti bhedāḥ tatas eka upādhi upakāraka svabhāvāt apare anye na bhavantiye dṛṣṭe tasmin= upādhimatya dṛṣṭāḥ bhavanti kintu ananye atas kāraṇāt tad grāhye tasya upādhimatas grahe sakala upādhi upakāraka svabhāvasya grahaḥ 
PVVṬ_139,1	 yopi bha ṭṭaḥ manyate bhinnāḥ bhinnāḥ eva dharmāḥ tena eka dharmeṇa dharmiṇī avadhāryamāṇena sarva dharma avadhāraṇam bhedāt tat āha āvirbhāva tirobhāva dharmakeṣu anuyāyi yat tad harmi yatra vā jñānam prāc dharma grahaṇāt bhavet ananta dharmake dharmiṇī eka dharma avadhāraṇe śabdobhyupāya mātram syāt na tu sarva avadhāraṇaḥ iti sa upyubhaya pakṣa bhāvi doṣa prasaṃgāt eva nirastaḥ 
PVVṬ_139,2–139,3	 yadi ityādinā para abhiprāyam āśaṃkate ekena niścaya jñānena sarva ātmanā gṛhītepi vastuni bhrānti nivṛtti artham anyat iti pramāṇa antaram syāt etat ityādina etat eva vyācaṣṭe nirbhāgasya niraṃśasya vastunaḥ grahaṇe sati konyaḥ bhāgaḥ tadā nirbhāga vastu grahaṇa kāle na gṛhītaḥ nāma sarve eva gṛhītaḥ sa tu gṛhītā upi bhrāntyā na avadhāryate iti pramāṇa antaram pravarttate 
PVVṬ_139,4	 yadi evam ityādinā siddhānta vādī yat tat bhrānti nivṛtti artham uttaram pramāṇam iṣyatetat vyavaccheda viṣayam anya apoha viṣayam siddham pūrva uktena nyāyena tadvat uttara pramāṇa vat tatas uttara kāla bhāvi pramāṇāt aparam api pūrva kāla bhāvi niścaya jñānantat api vyavaccheda viṣayam kim kāraṇam asamāropa viṣaye vṛtteḥ 
PVVṬ_140,1	 tad tarhi ityādinā ślokam vyācaṣṭe anyasya ākārasya yaḥ samāropaḥ tad vyavaccheda phalam iti kṛtvā siddham anya apoha viṣayam utpitsu samāropaniṣedha dvāreṇa tadvat anyat api pūrvam api niścaya jñānam anya apoha viṣayam kim kāraṇam avidyamāna samārope viṣaye vṛtteḥ etat eva āha yatra ākāresya pratipatteḥ iti hetoḥ samāropa abhāve varttamānaḥ paurastyaḥ niścayonya apoha viṣayaḥ siddhaḥ 
PVVṬ_140,2–140,3	 kiñca niścaya gṛhīta ipi arthe bhrānti nivṛtti artham pramāṇa antaram icchatā niścaya viṣayaḥ ca na ca niścitaḥ iti abhyupagatam syāt anyathā bhrānteḥ ayogāt tat ca ayuktam iti āha api ca ityādi yat rūpam niścayaiḥ na niścīyate tad rūpanteṣām niścayānām viṣayaḥ kathat na eva kim kāraṇam yasmāt iyam eva niścayānām sva artha pratipattiḥ yat tasya arthasya niścayanam tat ced niścaya viṣaya abhimatam ākāra antara vat aniścitam yat niścaya viṣaya tvena anabhimatantadvattaiḥ niścaye gṛhītam katham ityādi paraḥ pratyakṣa gṛhīte samāropa vyavaccheda artham pramāṇa antaram icchatā anya apoha vādinā api aniścīyamāna ākāraḥ pratyakṣa gṛhīta tvena iṣṭaḥ yadi vā niścaya vaśāt eva grahaṇam katham idānīm aniścīyamānam rūpam pratyakṣeṇa api gṛhītam iti tulyaḥ prasaṃgaḥ 
PVVṬ_140,4^1	 na ityādinā pariharati kalpanā vivikta tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ tat iti pratyakṣam yam api nīla ādi ākāraṅgṛhṇāti iti ucyate tat grahaṇam na niścayena kintarhi pratibhāsena niraṅśasya vastunaḥ sarvathā pratibhāsanam iti sarvathā grahaṇam tat iti tasmāt na niścaya aniścaya vaśāt yathākramam pratyakṣasya grahaṇa agrahaṇe kiṃtu pratibhāsana apratibhāsana vaśāt tasmāt aniścaye sati pratibhāsana mātreṇa pratyakṣa gṛhīta vyavasthāpanat na virudhyate na evam niścayānām pratyakṣa vat a niścitasya api ākārasya pratibhāsana mātreṇa grahaṇam apratibhāsa mātreṇa agrahaṇam iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_140,4^2	 kasmāt iti ced āha kiñcid ityādi yathā puruṣam dṛṣṭvā puruṣa tvad niścinvata upyanyatra taskara ādau= aniścayena pravṛtti bhedāt vyavahāra bhedāt tathā hi puruṣa tva niścayena puruṣonurūpaḥ viśvāsa ādi vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate caura tva aniścayāt ca tad anurūpaḥ bhaya ādi vyavahāraḥ na dṛśyate tatas ca yat niścaya anurūpaḥ pravṛtti bhedaḥ tasya niścayena grahaṇam yat aniścaya anurūpaḥ ca apravṛtti bhedaḥ tasya agrahaṇam iti yatas evantasmāt ityādi asya iti ākārasya anyathā iti yadi niścaya vaśāt tasya grahaṇam na vyavasthāpyate tadā eka ākārepi niścita tvena abhimata īpi ākāre tat iti niścayena grahaṇaṃna syāt 
PVVṬ_141,1–141,2	 kim punar kāraṇam iti paraḥ sarvatas bhinnaḥ iti sajātīya vijātīyāt vyāvṛtteḥ tathā eva iti yathā anubhavam sarveṣu eva bhedeṣu na smārttaḥ niścayaḥ bhavati yatas bheda antarenyākāra vyavaccheda artham anya apoha vādinā pramāṇa antara vṛttiḥ iṣyate saha kāri vaikalyāt iti siddhānta vādī na hi anubhava mātra niścaya hetuḥ kintu abhyāsādayopi sahakāriṇaḥ te yatra eva santi tatra eva ākāre niścayaḥ na anyatra 
PVVṬ_141,3–141,4	 nanu kṣaṇikā kārepi sarvadā darśanāt abhyāsa usti eva iti niścayaḥ syāt na anubhūta niścita viṣayotra abhyāsobhi pretaḥ na ca kṣaṇikam bhrānti nimitta sambhavāt anubhūta niścitam iti kathantatra abhyāsaḥ tasmāt sthitam etat yatra eva ākāre abhyāsaḥ tatra eva niścayaḥ iti tat eva āha tatas ca ityādi viśeṣe sarvatas vyāvṛtte nīla ādi lakṣaṇe aṅśa vivarjite nirvibhāge sarva ātmanā pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītepi sati yasya viśeṣasya arvasāye niścayesti sahakāri pratyayaḥ sa pratīyate niścīyate 
PVVṬ_142,1^1	 yadi api ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sarva bhedeṣu kṣaṇika tva ādiṣu tāvatā iti anubhāva mātreṇa niścaya utpādanaṃpratyanubhava jñānasya kāraṇantara apekṣa tvāt taṃdeva āha anubhavaḥ hi ityādi yathā vikalpa abhyāsam iti yasya yādṛśaḥ vikalpa abhyāsaḥ tena sahakāriṇā janayati iti arthaḥ udāharaṇam āha yathā ityādi mṛta strī rūpa darśanā viśeṣepi parivrāṭkāmukaśunām yathākramam kuṇapa kāminī bhakṣya vikalpāḥ yathā vikalpa abhyāsan jāyante na ca vikalpa abhyāsaḥ eva sahakārī kintu anya upyasti iti āha tatra ityādi tatra api rūpa darśana aviśeṣa īpi buddheḥ pāṭavantīkṣṇa tā yathā yoginām buddhi pāṭavāt darśana mātreṇa kṣaṇika tva ādi niścayaḥ ādi śabdāt arthi tva sāmarthya ādi parigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_142,1^2	 ityādayaḥ iti evamādayaḥ anubhavāt pratyakṣāt upādānakāraṇāt sakāśāt bheda niścayasya utpattau sahakāriṇaḥ yadā tarhi bahuṣu niścayeṣu yathā uktāni kāraṇāni na bhavanti tadā teṣām niścayānām katham krama bhāvaḥ iti āha teṣām eva ca ityādi teṣām iti niścaya kāraṇānāṃpratyāsatti tāratamya bhedāt yasya niścayasya pratyāsannatamat niścaya kāraṇantattāvat ādau= utpadyate ādi śabdāt adhimātra tāratamyasya bhedāḥ nniścayānām paurvāparyam yathā ityādinā uda āharaṇam āha pitā iva yadā upādhyāyaḥ bhavati tadā ekasya puruṣasya janakatvā adhyāpaka tva aviśeṣa īpi pitaram āyāntam dṛṣṭvā pitā me āgacchaḥ iti pitṛ tva niścaye kāraṇasya pratyāsanna tāmatvāt 
PVVṬ_142,2–143,1	 nanu sati api kṣaṇika tva nairātmya vikalpa abhyāse sahakāriṇī tattva ada arśinām nam pratyakṣāt kṣaṇika tva ādi niścayaḥ bhavati iti atas āha sā upītyādi asati bhrānti kāraṇe bhavati na tu niścaya pratyaya mātrāt yatas evam asati bhrānti kāraṇe sahakāri pratyasākalye ca sati pratyakṣāt niścayaḥ utpadyate na kevalāt tasmāt na anubhūtaḥ ityādi tatas ca sthitam etat anya vyavacchedaḥ śabda liṅgābhyām pratipādyate iti 
PVVṬ_143,2–143,3	 nanu vyavaccheda upi yadi padārthāt abhinnaḥ tadā ekena pramāṇena śabdena vā asya viṣayīkaraṇenyasya vaiyarthyam syāt sarva ātmanā niścita tvāt atha bhinnaḥ tadā api tasya āśrita tvāt eka vyavaccheda upādhike padārthe pramāṇena ekena niścīyamāne pūrva uktena nyāyena sarveṣām vyavacchedānām niścita tvāt anyeṣām pramāṇa ādīnām apravṛttiḥ syāt atas samānaḥ prasaṃgaḥ iti tat na yatas na bhāvānām anyonya vyavacchedaḥ abhinnaḥ bhinnaḥ vā asti kevalam sva hetubhyaḥ eva bhinnāḥ samutpannā iti uktam vakṣyati ca 
PVVṬ_143,4–143,5	 kathantarhi anya vyāvṛttiḥ ityādi vyapadeśaḥ buddhiḥ ca pravarttate iti atra āha tatra api ityādi tatra api canya apohe śabda arthe anyasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ anyasmāt vyāvṛttoyam iti api ye śabdāḥ dharma dharmi vacanāḥ niścayāḥ ca ubhaya viṣayāḥ te saṃketam anurundhate saṃketa anuvidhānena eṣām dharma dharmi viṣaya vibhāgaḥ kalpitaḥ paramārthataḥ tu vyāvṛttiḥ eva na asti iti arthaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe tatra anya apohaḥ ityādinā goḥ aśvāt vyāvṛttiḥ anyā dharma bhūtāḥ anyaā iva aśvāt vyāvṛttaḥ dharmī vyāvṛttyā viśiṣṭaḥ gauḥ iti etat na asti kintu yā eva vyāvṛttiḥ saḥ eva vyāvṛttaḥ iti vakṣyati 
PVVṬ_143,6	 yadi ca aśvāt vyāvṛttiḥ anaśvatā go dravyasya anyā syāt tadā aśva vyāvṛtteḥ api go dravyeṇa nivarttita vyambhedāt tatas ca tad vyāvṛtteḥ anaśvatāyāḥ sakāśāt nivarttamānasya goḥ tad bhāva prasaṅgāt aśva bhāva prasaṅgāt aśva vat evam hi aśva vyāvṛtteḥ anaśva tva lakṣaṇāyāḥ gauḥ vyāvṛttaḥ bhavati yadi asya aśva tvam syāt tathā ca goḥ aśva bhāva āpatteḥ aśvāt goḥ vyāvṛttiḥ tasyāḥ abhāvaḥ gavā śvayoḥ eka tvāt 
PVVṬ_143,7–144,1	 tena yat uktañja ena jaiminīyaiḥ sarva ātmakam ekam syāt anya apoha vyatikramaḥ iti tān pratīdam uktam yadi anya vyāvṛttiḥ artha antaram syāt gavāśu ādīnām eka tvam syāt iti na api goḥ abhinna aśva vyāvṝttiḥ aśva vyāvṛttau gauritya pratīti prasaṃgāt go vināśe ca aśvasya utpatti prasaṅgāt aśva nivṛtteḥ vinaṣṭa tvāt tasmāt na asti eva vyāvṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_144,2	 tena yat ucyate bha ṭṭaḥ dyaḥ te kaḥ rā bhyām yoyama gopa ūhaḥ sa kim gavi bhinne arthaḥ bhinnaḥ yadi bhinnaḥ kim āśritaḥ atha anāśritaḥ yadi āśritaḥ tad āśrita tvāt guṇaḥ iti go śabdena tadā guṇī abhidhīyate na go dravyam iti gauḥ tiṣṭhati iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam syāt atha anāśritaḥ kena arthena ṣaṣṭhī arthaḥ gorapohe iti atha abhinnaḥ gauḥ eva syāt iti na kiñcid aniṣṭham ayam ca apohaḥ prativastu yadi ekoneka sambandhī ca tat eva go tvami ti 
PVVṬ_144,3	 tat nirastam anya vyāvṛtteḥ eva abhāvāt kevalam sva hetutaḥ svakīyena rūpeṇa utpannaḥ bhāvoni asmāt vyāvṛttaḥ tasya ca anyasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ kalpyate yatas ca na paramārthataḥ vyāvṛttiḥ asti tasmāt yā eva vyāvṛttiḥ saḥ eva vyāvṛttaḥ dvābhyām a ekasya eva viṣayīkaraṇāt tasya eva ca anya vyāvṛttasya liṅga tvam liṅgi tvam sambandhaḥ vikalpa viṣaya tvañca vikalpaḥ hi anya vyāvṝt tam su a ākāra abhinna madhyasya puruṣan tatra pravarttayati iti atyartha kāri tvāt atas saḥ eva bāhyaḥ śabda arthonyavyāvṛttaḥ 
PVVṬ_144,4–144,5	 yat api ucyate ku mā ri le na kadācid ekasmāt eva bhāvasya apohaḥ syāt sarva asmāt vā yadi ekasmāt eva tadā yathā aśva apoha dvāreṇa go dravyasya gauḥ iti abhidhānanantathā siṃha ādeḥ api syāt aśva apohasya go śabda pravṛtti nimittasya bhāvāt tat āha tata uśva apoha rūpa tvāt siṃha ādiḥ sarve eva te tad nimittam agopoham vibhraducyeta gauritī ti 
PVVṬ_144,6–144,8	 atha sarvasmāt apohaḥ go dravyasya tatra api yadi pratyekam apohyam aśva ādayaḥ tadā apohyānām ānantyāt apohaḥ eva na sidhyet apohyānām ca bhinna tvāt apoha bhedaḥ prasajyate tathā ca ekasmin= api piṇḍe jāti bahu tvāt jāti antara buddhiḥ syāt jāti antareṣu iva aśu ādiṣu tatas gauḥ iti sāmānyam vācyam ekam na sidhyati na api te samudāya rūpeṇa sarve apohyāḥ sambhavanti samudāyaḥ hi eka deśa tvena vā syāt na ca apohyānām eka deśa ādi tvam sambhavati na api teṣām samudāyaḥ vyatiriktaḥ asti avyatireke ca ānantyam tad avastham na ca api sāmānya rūpeṇa te apohyāḥ sāmānyasya avastu tvāt apohya tve ca vastu tvam syāt iti 
PVVṬ_145,1–145,2	 tat ayuktam yatas sarva bhāvānām svena eva svena eva rūpeṇa utpadyamānānām sarvasmāt apohaḥ sva hetubhyaḥ siddhaḥ eva atha katham asau jñāyate iti codyate tad kiṅgauḥ atīta anāgata varttamānā arśvādi svabhāvaḥ pratyakṣe pratibhāsate na iti ced katham na tatra sarva apohaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ na hi pramāṇam hastābhyāṅgṛhītvā anyat apohati api tu niyata rūpa artha prakāśanam eva asya anya apoham tasmāt niyata rūpa artha pratibhāsaḥ eva pratyakṣasya sarvasmāt apoha grahaḥ tat ca svaviṣayat niścāyayat yat evam na bhavati tat sarvam anya tvena niścāyayati atas yugapad sarvasya anyasya sāmānyena aviśeṣeṇa niṣedhaḥ kriyate sāmānyasya anirddhārita viśeṣa rūpa tvāt tat uktam 
PVVṬ_145,3–145,5	 atad rūpa parāvṛtta vastu mātra prasādhanāt sāmānya viṣayam proktam liṅga bheda apratiṣṭhiteḥ iti pra sa tena apohyasya kasyacid vastu tvam iṣyate eva na ca apohya tvāt vastu tvam iti atra kiñcid pramāṇam asti abhāvasya api apohya tvāt na ca asya vastu tvam iti uktam tasmāt yugapad sarva apoha lakṣaṇena agopohena ekasmin= api piṇḍe go tvam pratyeka aśva ādi apohena anaśva tva āsiṃha tvā mahiṣa tva ādayaḥ jāti bhedāḥ kalpitāḥ tad dvāreṇa ca tad abhidhāyakāḥ pravarttante iti yat kiñcid etat 
PVVṬ_145,6	 yadi vyavṛtti vyāvṛttā abhidheya arthasya na bhedaḥ katham vyāvṛtti vyāvṛttaḥ iti śabda jñāna bhedaḥ tathā hi vyāvṛttiḥ iti anyaḥ śabdaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ iti anyaḥ eva śabdaḥ tathā jñāna bheda upi vyāvṛttiḥ iti ukte dharma mātram pratīyate vyāvṛttaḥ iti dharmī iti tatas āha śabda ityādi śabdāt dharma dharmi vācinaḥ yā pratītiḥ sā śabda pratipattiḥ śabdaḥ ca śabda pratipattiḥ ca iti virūpa eka śeṣaḥ śabda bhedaḥ śabdāt ca yā pratipattiḥ tasya abhedaḥ iti arthaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhi karaṇam saṃketaḥ tasya bhedāt saṃketa bhedam ca anantaram eva bheda antara pratikṣepa itya ādinā pratipādayiṣyate na vācya bheda usti dharma dharmi śabdayoḥ vastutas iti adhyāhāraḥ 
PVVṬ_145,7	 nanu ca ityādi paraḥ kim punar vācya aviśeṣe saṃketa bhedaḥ na yuktaḥ iti ced āha dvayoḥ ityādi karttari ca iyam ṣaṣṭhī karttṛ karmaṇoḥ kṛtī iti ubhaya prāptau karmaṇi iti niyamasya śeṣe vibhāṣā iti vikalpanāt dvābhyām dharma dharmi śabdābhyām ekasya arthasya abhidhānāt iti arthaḥ ekam ced dvābhyām abhidheyantataḥ vyarthaḥ saṃketaḥ tathā ca iti dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhede vyatirekiṇyāḥ iti vyatireka abhidhāyinyām goḥ go tvam iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tasyāḥ iti vyatireka vibhakteḥ bheda āśraya tvāt vastu bhedam āśritya pravṛtteḥ yathā devadattasya kamaṇḍaluḥ iti evam saṃketa abhāve vyatireka vibhakti abhāve ca codite 
PVVṬ_146,1	 vibhakti abhāva doṣantāvat pariharan= āha dvayoḥ ityādi dharma dharmi vācinoḥ śabdayoḥ ekasya arthasya abhidhāna ipi vibhaktiḥ vyatirekiṇī vyatirekasya vācikā ṣaṣṭhī iva śabdaḥ bhinnakramaḥ bhinnam iva artham anveti darśayati vācye saṃketa bheda kṛtena leśena mātrayā yaḥ viśeṣaḥ tatas kāraṇāt na tu paramārthataḥ vastu bhedāt 
PVVṬ_146,2^1	 yat vyācaṣṭe na vai śabdānām ityādinā viṣaya svabhāva āyatta iti bāhya sva lakṣaṇa āyattā kim kāraṇam icchātaḥ puruṣa icchā avaśāt abhāveṣu api vṛtti abhāva prasaṅgāt te iti icchā pratibaddha vṛttayaḥ śabdāḥ yathā yena prakāreṇa bheda pratipādanena vyatirikte yathā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti avyatirikte yathā ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ draṣṭā iti tathā niyuktāḥ iti abhinna ipi arthe bhedam iva upādāya prayuktāḥ tam artham apratibandhena bhinnam iva prakāśayanti vastutas sva lakṣaṇasya abhedepi yatas evantena kāraṇena gauḥ iti dharmi vācinam āha go tvam iti dharma vācinam 
PVVṬ_146,2^2	 ābhyām eka abhidhāna īpya go vyāvṛttasya goḥ abhidhānepi kasyacid viṣayasya pratyāyana artham iti ago vyāvṛtti nimittasya go tvasya prakāśana artham ago vyāvṛtti mātram go tva śabdena pratipādyam iti evaṃkṛte saṃkete bhede vyatirikta arthāḥ na vibhaktiḥ asya go tvam iti bhavati ṣaṣṭhī vyatiriktaḥ arthosyāḥ iti vigrahaḥ dharmiṇa ssakāśāt dharmam artha antaram iva ādarśayantī pratibhāti anapīti avyatiriktepi dharme kim kāraṇam tathā prayoga darśana abhyāsāt vastu bhede sati ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prayoga darśana abhyāsāt devadattasya kamaṇḍaluḥ iti ādau 
PVVṬ_147,1^1	 etat uktam bhavati vastubhinnambhavatu mā vā bhūt sarvathā vyatireka vibhaktiḥ icchā mātra anurodhinī kevalam prayoga darśana abhyāsāt śabda artham bhinnam iva darśayati iti tāvatā iti vibhakti prayoga mātrāt sarvatra iti artha abhedepi gauḥ gotvam iti ādau na dharma dharmiṇoḥ paramārthataḥ bhedaḥ tasmāt anyatra api artha abhedepi puruṣa icchā vaśāt pravṛttasya vyatireka abhidhāyinaḥ śabdasya pratibandha abhāvāt dṛṣṭā ca puruṣa icchā vaśāt śabdānām pravṛttiḥ asati api tathābhūte bāhye vācyaḥ iti āha yathā ityādi ekam vastu kvacid prakaraṇe eka vacanena khyāpyate 
PVVṬ_147,1^2	 yathā tvam iti tat aviśeṣepi ekatva aviśeṣepi tat eva vastu bahuvacanena yūyam iti atas ca ekasmin= api bahuvacana darśanāt na yathāvastu śabdānāmpravṛttiḥ iti gamyate yuṣmadi gurau= ekeṣām iti atideśa vākyāt ekasmin= api bahuvacanam iti ced cintyam etat kim atideśa vākyeṃna ekasya bahu tvam kriyate kim vā bahuvacana mātram aprāptam vidhīyate iti na tāvat ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ vacana mātreṇa vastūnām vidhāna asambhavāt dvitīyepi pakṣe siddhā eva icchā mātreṇa śabdānām pravṛttiḥ iti evantāvat vibhakti abhāva doṣaḥ parihṛtaḥ 
PVVṬ_147,2	 saṃketa abhāva doṣantu pariharttuntam eva upanyasyati prayojana abhāvāt tu ityādi dharmi dharma śabdābhyām ekasya abhidhānāt prayojana abhāvaḥ tat api prayojanam asti eva go tva apekṣayā bheda antarāṇi dravya tva pārthiva tva ādīni teṣām pratikṣepaḥ asvīkāraḥ tau pratikṣepa apratikṣepau yathākramantayoḥ dvayoddharma dharmi vācinoḥ śabdayoḥ yaḥ saṃketa bhedaḥ tasya kimviśiṣṭasya jñātṛ vāñcha anurodhinaḥ pratipad tricchā anuvidhāyinaḥ padam prayojanam 
PVVṬ_147,3	 etat uktam bhavati yadā anya vyāvatta rūpa nirākāṅkṣaḥ pratipatta aśvāt eva ekasmāt vyāvṛttam gopiṇḍam jijñāsate tadā yāvat aśvāt vyāvṛttim artha antara bhūtām āropya tathā eva saṃketa pūrvakam laukikena dharma vācakena śabdena na kathayati tāvat na parasya jijñāsitorthaḥ pratipādayitum śakyate atas tam pratyanaśva tvam asya iti ucyate evam hi dharmiṇaḥ aprādhānyāt anya vyāvṛtta rūpān ākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati aśvāt eva ekasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ ca na tadā evam ucyate anaśvaḥ iti anena hi anya vyāvṛttasya api rūpasya ākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt na ca evampareṇa jijñāsitam ajijñāsitam ca kathayan kathat na unmattaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_148,1–148,2	 yadā punar anya vyāvṛtta rūpa sāka aṃkṣe aśvāt vyāvṛttam gopiṇḍam jijñāsate tadā api yāvat aśva vyāvṛtti viśiṣṭam piṇḍam dharmi svabhāvatayā aropya tathā eva saṃketa pūrvakam laukikena dharmi vācakena na kathayati tāvat na parasya jijñāsitorthaḥ pratipādayitum śakyate a taḥ tam pratyanaśvoyam iti ucyate evam hi dharmiṇaḥ prādhānyāt anya vyāvṛtta rūpākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati aśva vyāvṛttaḥ ca gopiṇḍaḥ kathitaḥ bhavati na tadā evam khyāpyate anaśva tvam asya iti para jijñāsitāni avyāvṛtta rūpa an ākṣepa prasaṅgāt ajijñāsitam ca artham kathayan kathanna unmattaḥ sarvaḥ ca śābdaḥ vyavahāraḥ saṃketa pūrvakaḥ saṃketaḥ ca vikalpa kalpita artha pūrvaka eva iti vikalpaiḥ api anena eva dvāreṇa dharma dharmi bhāva pratītiḥ yuktā tena yat ucyate bhavatu dharma dharmi vācakānām bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepa artha pravṛttiḥ dharmi dharma vikalpa anāntu katham pratipattiḥ iti apāstam 
PVVṬ_148,3^1	 etat eva vṛttyā spaṣṭayan= āha yadā ayam ityādi pratipattā iti śrotā tasmāt aśva ādyaḥ anyaḥ mahiṣa ādiḥ tasmāt vyavacchedaḥ mahiṣa ādi vyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya bhāva anapekṣaḥ sattā anapekṣaḥ piṇḍa viśeṣe gavi aśva vyavaccheda mātram jijñāsate kim asya aśvāt vyāvṛttam rūpam asti iti tathābhūta jñāpana artham iti yathā pratipattrā jñātum iṣṭantad anu rodhena tathābhūtasya aśvāt bheda mātrasya jñāpana arthan tathā kṛta saṃketena iti aśva vyavaccheda mātre pratikṣipta bheda antare kṛta saṃketena anaśva tvam śabdena prabodhyate prakāśyate anaśva tvam asya piṇḍasya asti iti aśva ādyaḥ vyavacchedaḥ tad apekṣayā mahiṣa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttayoḥ vyavaccheda antarāṇi teṣu anirāka aṃkṣaḥ pratipattā tam iti piṇḍam apratikṣipta bheda antareṇa aśva vyavacchedena yuktaṅ go dravyam jñātum icchati iti yāvat aparityaktāni mahiṣa ādi vyavaccheda antarāṇi yena tasmin= aparityakta bheda antare 
PVVṬ_148,3^2	 tatra eva vā aśvavyavacchede dharmi vācinam śabdam prayuñjate vaktāraḥ anaśvoyam iti katham prayuñjate iti āha tathā prakāśanāya iti apratikṣipta bheda antarasya aśva vyavavacchedasya prakāśanāya apratikṣipta bheda antaram eva aśva vyavacchedan tathā prakāśanāya iti anye paṭhanti tadā api ayam arthaḥ apratikṣipta bheda antarantam eva aśva vyavacchedam aśva vyāvṛtti rūpam prayuñjate abhidadhati anaśvoyam iti anena dharmi vacanena śabdena kimartham tathā aprakāśanāya apratikṣipta bheda antarasya prakāśanāya iti yena eva dharma vācī śabdaḥ pratikṣipta bheda antaraḥ atas eva pūrvatra iti dharma vācini śabde pratikṣiptambheda antaram yena iti sāmānyena anya padārtham kṛtvā bhāva pratyayaḥ karttavyaḥ paścāt śabda vṛtteḥ iti anena sambandhaḥ anyathā pratikṣiptam bheda antara tvāt iti syāt evam anyatra api evaṃjātīyeṣu śabdeṣu vyutpattiḥ draṣṭavyā 
PVVṬ_149,1	 bhinna nimittayoḥ śabdayoḥ ekasmin= adhikaraṇe vṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ vyavacchedya vyavacchedaka bhāvaḥ udāharaṇaṅ go tvam asya śuklam iti guṇa śabdasya abhidheya vat liṅgavat tvena napuṃsaka tvam śuklaḥ iti anye paṭhanti evam ca ācakṣate guṇa śabdaḥ hi pratikṣipta bheda antareṇa guṇa mātre varttamānaḥ upāttaḥ guṇa mātra vṛttīnām śukla ādi śabdānām pulliṅga tvam tadvati tu varttamānānām abhidheya vat liṅga tā evam ca anayorddharma mātra vṛttyoḥ na sāmānādhikaraṇyam na api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_149,2	 kasmāt na sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti āha tanmātrā ityādi etat kathayati buddhi pratibhāsinī ā iva artha sāmānādhikaraṇyā ādi na bāhye sva lakṣaṇe tasya avācya tvāt kevala madhyavasāyāt bāhyepi ucyate yadi ca dharma dvaya yukta eka dharmi pratibhāsinī śabda dvaya janitā buddhiḥ eka artha utpadyeta bhavet sāmānādhikaraṇyam iha tu tanmātra viśeṣeṇa pratikṣipta bheda antareṇa go tva mātra viśeṣaṇa uparaktāyāḥ buddheḥ tad āśraya bhūtāyāḥ iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya āśraya bhūtāyāḥ ekatvena dharmya bhedena apratibhāsanāt go tva śukla tvābhyām yuktam ekandharmiṇam gṛhītvā buddheḥ apratibhāsanāt iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_149,3	 yat vā tad āśraya bhūtāyāḥ iti tat eva go tvam āśraya bhūtam yasyāḥ tasyāḥ buddheḥ tanmātra viśeṣeṇa pratikṣipta dharma antareṇa go tva mātreṇa viśeṣeṇa saha gopiṇḍasya eka tvena apratibhāsanāt tathā hi asya go tvam iti prayoge niṣkṛṣṭa rūpam dharmam pratiyatī buddhiḥ utpadyate tatas na sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti dharma antara pratikṣepāt eva tad anyeṣu bhedeṣu nirāka aṃkṣa tvāt ca buddheḥ na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_150,1^1	 dvitīye tu dharmi vāci śabda pakṣe bhavati sāmānādhikaraṇyam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ vā śuklaḥ gauḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇye kāraṇam āha tathā ityādi tathā saṃketa anusāreṇa iti apratikṣipta bheda antare vastuni dharmi śabdasya saṃketa anusāreṇa hetunā ekasmin dharmiṇi yojanam saṃhāraḥ vyavaccheda hetukāḥ dharmāḥ vyavaccheda dharmāḥ saṃhṛtāḥ ca te sakala vyavaccheda dharmāḥ ca iti karmadhārayaḥ taiḥ dharmaiḥ karaṇa bhūtaiḥ vibhāgavataḥ vibhakta aneka dharmavataḥ dharmiṇaḥ ekasya iva śabda sandarśanena pradarśanena buddheḥ pratibhāsanāt 
PVVṬ_150,1^2	 aneka dharma van tandharmiṇam ekam iva sandarśayantī buddhiḥ pratibhāsate iti yāvat na tu buddhi pratibhāsa sandarśitaḥ dharmī vastutas ekaḥ vikalpa nirmitasya dharma dharmi vibhāgasya alīka tvāt ekasya eva iti api paṭhanti tatra api pratipad tṛ adhyavasāya vaśāt eva yuktam iti boddhavyam tatas siddham sāmānādhikaraṇyam yatas ca bheda antara apratikṣepeṇa dharmmi śabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ tatas eva tad janitāyāḥ buddheḥ apratikṣipta bheda antara apekṣa tvāt bhavati viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ yat gauḥ śuklaḥ nīlaḥ vā iti caśabdaḥ ca pūrvavat atīta hetu apekṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_150,2	 idam eva vyāpakam sarva vyavahārasya na aparaspara parikalpita sāmānya guṇa ādi kāntasya pramāṇa bādhita tvāt iti āha bhedaḥ yam a iva ityādi dravya bhāva abhidhāyinoḥ śabdayora dharma antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepa lakṣaṇaḥ sarvatra iti sāmānya sāmānyavati guṇa guṇavati kriyā kriyāvati sarvasmin viṣaye dharmi vacanaḥ dravya abhidhāryāḥ dharma vacanaḥ bhāva abhidhāyī yatas evantena kāraṇena na tayoḥ dravya bhāva śabdayoḥ vācye viśeṣaḥ paramārthataḥ kaścana asti 
PVVṬ_150,3	 tat vyācaṣṭe tasmāt ityādi niścaya pratyaya viṣaya tvena karaṇena na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tathā hi yathā go tvam iti ukte tatra eva ago vyavacchede niścayaḥ tathā gauḥ iti ukte yadi api apratikṣipta bheda antarasya ago vyavacchinnasya abhidhānan tathā āpi a go vyavaccheda mātre niścayonyeṣa antu bhedānām apratikṣepa mātram saḥ eva ca śabda arthaḥ yatra śābdaḥ niścayaḥ bhavati iti na asti bhāva dravya abhidhāyinoḥ śabdayoḥ vācye viśeṣaḥ bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepam ātrantu bhidyate tat eva āha ekaḥ tam eva ityādi ekaḥ iti dharma śabda stamiti ago vyavacchinnam pratikṣiptam bheda antaram yena dharma śabdena sa tathā uktaḥ anyaḥ iti dharmi śabdaḥ apratikṣepeṇa tam eva piṇḍam sāmānādhikaraṇyena gamayati iti na asti dravya niścayam prati bhedaḥ pratikṣepa apratikṣepam ātrantu bhidyate evam gamanan devadattasya gacchati devadattaḥ iti na kaścana bhedaḥ iti anyatra api evam yojyam 
PVVṬ_151,1–151,2	 yā api jāti guṇa kriyā sambandha bhedena catuṣṭhayī śabdānām vṛttiḥ sā api anena eva vastu gata dharma bhedena saṃgṛhīta iti āha jijñāpayiṣuḥ ityādi jñāpayitum icchuḥ arthantambheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepa lakṣaṇam tad hitena tad hita pratyaya antena kṛtā api vā kṛt saṃjñaka pratyaya antena vā anyena vā kṛt tadhita vyatiriktena tiṅntenā avyutpannena vā śabdena śukla ādinā yadi brūyāt tatas bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepa lakṣaṇāt viśeṣāt aparaḥ bhedaḥ na asti tat vyācaṣṭe etāvantam ityādinā etāvantam iti pratikṣipta bheda antara lakṣaṇam kṛtā api vā darśayet iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_151,3^1	 yadā vā adhiśrayaṇa ādi kriyāyām karttṛ sthāya ampaciḥ varttate tatra eva ca ghan pratyayaḥ tadā pācaka tva śabdena kriyā kārakayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāya ubhidhīyate iti pācaka tva śabdena samāna arthaḥ pāka śabdaḥ dvau= api etau pratikṣipta bheda antaram apācaka vyavacchinnam artham pratipādayataḥ yadā tu karma sthā eva kriyā vikttiḥ paceḥ arthaḥ tadā pācaka tva śabdasya katham sambandha abhidhāyi tvam pācaka tva pākayoḥ bhinna artha tvāt anyena vā kṛt tat hita vyatiriktena tiṅādinā tathābhūta jñāpanāya pratikṣipta bheda antara jñāpanāya svayam kṛtena samayena darśayet iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_151,3^2	 yathā devadattena śayyate paṭasya śukla tvam iti atra api śāyaka śabdasya yaḥ eva arthaḥ saḥ eva pratikṣipta bheda antaraḥ śayyate iti asya api tathā śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti yaḥ eva aśukla vyavacchinnaḥ pratikṣipta bheda antarorthaḥ saḥ eva pratikṣipta bheda antaraḥ paṭasya śuklaḥ iti asya api tathā abhidhānaṇa iti pratikṣipta apratikṣipta bheda antarasya eka dharmi gatasya vyavacchedasya abhidhāna mātreṇa tat eva vastu artha antaram eva paramārthataḥ dharma dharmi rūpeṇa vibhaktam eva na punar bhavati iti sambandhaḥ kiṅkāraṇam tathābhūtasya eva pratikṣipta apratikṣipta bheda antarasya eva ekasya jñāpanāya dharma dharmi śabdasya kṛta saṃketa tvāt 
PVVṬ_152,1–152,2	 yat vā tathā abhidhāna mātreṇa iti artha antara bhūta dharma abhidhāna mātreṇa tad dharma svarūpamparama artha tortha antaram eva bhavati tathābhūtasya eva bheda antara nirapekṣasya eva tasya eka vyāvṛttasya jñāpanāya dharma śabdasya kṛta saṃketa tvāt nanu ca ityādi paraḥ sambandhaḥ ucyate iti pāka kriyāyāḥ pācakasya ca karttuḥ sambandhaḥ samavāya lakṣaṇaḥ tathā hi kṛdantāt bhāva pratyayaḥ sambandhasya abhidhāyakaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā āha sama asakṛt tad hiteṣu sambandha abhidhānam iti kṛdantaḥ ca pācaka śabdaḥ na pākaḥ eva kriyā ātmakaḥ pācaka tva śabdena ucyate 
PVVṬ_152,3	 etat uktam bhavati anyā eva karttṛ vyatiriktā kriyā anyaḥ ca tayoḥ ca sambandhonyaḥ eva tatas ca karttṛstha kriyā abhidhāne sati api pacateḥ na pākapācaka tva śabdayoḥ tulya urthaḥ iti na vai pākena ityādinā pariharati pākena kartṛ sthe na vastu bhūtena vyāpāreṇa yuktonyaḥ eva pāka kriyā vyatiriktaḥ pācakaḥ nāma karttā abhidhīyatepācaka śabdena yādṛśaḥ varṇṇyate vai śe ṣi kā dibhiḥ kriyā vyatiriktaḥ svatantraḥ kartā yatra kriyā kāraka sambandhaḥ vastu bhūtaḥ syāt tasya svatantrasya karttuḥ kriyā vyatiriktasya niṣetsyamāna tvāt na ced vyatiriktā kriyā karttā vā kutassambandhaḥ yasya bhāva pratyayena abhidhānam iti bhāvaḥ yat punar asya iti pācaka śabdasya asya abhidheyam apācake vyavacchinnam apratikṣipta bheda antaram vastu m ātrantad eva pācaka śabda abhidheyam pācaka tvena api abhidhīyate iti adhyāhāryaḥ tasya eva pratikṣipta bheda antarasya abhidhānāt na tu sambandha ubhidhīyate tasya asattvāt tat eva yathoktam pācaka śabda abhidheyam pāka śabdena api iti api śabdāt 
PVVṬ_153,1	 aparam vyākhyānam na vai pākena iti pāka śabdena anya apoha vādi pakṣe anyaḥ eva vyatiriktaḥ kriyā āśraya bhūtaḥ pācakobhidhīyate yādṛśaḥ varṇṇyate pareṇa yaḥ kriyā kāraka sambandhasya āśrayaḥ syāt tasya asiddha tvāt kintva pācaka vyāvṛttiḥ bheda antara pratikṣepeṇa abhidhīyate tat eva āha yat punar ityādi yat iti apācaka vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam pratikṣipta bheda antaram abhidheyam asya iti pāka śabdasya anantaram eva darśitam tat eva pāka śabda abhidheyampācaka tva śabdena api abhidhīyate na sambandhaḥ tasya asiddha tvāt apratiṣṭhitaiḥ avastu bala āyātaiḥ atas eva mithyā vikalpāḥ 
PVVṬ_153,2	 kathampunar gamyate kriyā vyatiriktā na asti tad samavāyaḥ vā iti atas āha yathā ityādi tad samavāyaḥ vā iti kriyā kāraka samavāyaḥ yatas ca vyāvṛtti vyāvṛttim atorabhedaḥ tena kāraṇena anya apoha viṣayaḥ jātimān śabdaiḥ abhidhīyate iti tadvat pakṣaḥ tatra yaḥ doṣaḥ sonya apohepi syāt iti tadvat pakṣa upavarṇṇṇanam pratyākhyātam yasmāt pṛthaka tve hi jāti tadvatoḥ abhyupagamyamāne syāt tadvat pakṣa uditaḥ doṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_153,3	 tad viśiṣṭasya iti anya apoha viśiṣṭasya arthasya śabdaiḥ abhidhānāt tadvat pakṣa uditaḥ iti tadvat pakṣe yaḥ uktaḥ yathā kila sāmānyam abhidhāya tadvati varttamānaḥ śabdaḥ asvatantraḥ syāt tatas ca śabda pravṛtti nimitta bhūtena sāmānyena vaśīkṛtasya śabdasya vyakti gata paraspara bhedān ākṣepāt taiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam na syāt upacaritā ca tadvati śabda pravṛttiḥ iti ādikaḥ doṣaḥ iti evam vyāvṛttim abhidhāya tadvati varttamāna usvatantraḥ dhvaniḥ iti sarvaḥ prasaṃgaḥ syāt tat api tadvat pakṣa upavarṇṇanam anena iti vyāvṛtti vyāvṛttim atoḥ ananya tvena prativyūḍham pratyākhyātam yasmāt tatra hi tadvat pakṣe artha antaram upādāya iti vastu bhūtam sāmānyam upādāya ani atra artha antare tadvati sākṣāt sāmānyavataḥ anabhidhānāt asvātantryam ādi śabdāt asamāna adhikaraṇyā upacāra doṣa parigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_153,4–154,1	 anya apoha pakṣe tu vyāvṛtti vyāvṛttim atoraikyāt na artha antaram upādāya artha antare śabda pravṛttiḥ tatas na asti asvātantrya ādi doṣaḥ iti āha na ca ityādi anyasmāt vastunoḥ yā vyāvṛttiḥ sā vyāvṛttān na anyā dvayoḥ dharma dharmi vācinoḥ śabdayoḥ ekasya vyāvṛtti bhedasya abhidhānāt iti uktam anantaram eva katham ityādi paraḥ idānīm iti vyāvṛtti tadvatoraikye ekasya vyāvṛttasya sva lakṣaṇasya ananugamāt artha antara asaṃsargāt kathantasya sva lakṣaṇasya ātma bhūta avyāvṛttiḥ sva lakṣaṇa vadana nvayinī sāmānyam syāt na eva dṛṣṭā ca sāmānyam 
PVVṬ_154,2	 tat buddhau= ityādinā siddhānta vādī sāmānya buddhau vikalpikāyām tathā eka ākāreṇa pratibhāsanāt eka ākāraḥ eva vyāvartyatenena iti vyāvṛttiḥ sāmānyam ucyate etat āha na vyāvṛtteṣu sva lakṣaṇeṣu ātma bhūtā vyāvṛttiḥ ekā sāmānyam kevalam vyāvṛtta sva lakṣaṇa anubhava uttara kāla bhāvī vikalpaḥ prakṛtyā eka kāryeṣu bhāveṣu ekam ākāram ādarśayan= iva utpadyate tad vikalpa vaśāt sāmānyam āsthīyate niḥsāmānyeṣu api anena ca sākṣāt śabda ādi viṣayaḥ darśitaḥ 
PVVṬ_154,3	 etat eva sphuṭayan= āha na vai kiṃcid ityādi vastu bhūtam iti abhiprāyaḥ kathantarhi sāmānya sāmāna adhikaraṇya ādi vyavahāraḥ iti āha śabda ityādi śabdaḥ āśrayaḥ sahakāri kāraṇa tvena yasyāḥ sā vikalpikā buddhiḥ anādi vāsanā sāmarthyāt dharmān asaṃsṛṣṭān api saṃsṛjantī eka ākārān iva kurvāṇā jāyate tasyāḥ buddheḥ eka ākāra pratibhāsa vaśena sāmānyam dharma dvaya yukta eka dharmi pratibhāsa vaśena sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca vyavasthāpyate ayam ca sāmānya ādi vyavahāraḥ asat vyāpi vyavasthāpyate katham asat arthaḥ iti āha arthānām ityādi sva lakṣaṇāṃnām saṃsarga abhāvāt sāmānya vyavahāraḥ asat arthaḥ ekasya ca sva lakṣaṇasya bheda abhāvāt sāmānādhikaraṇya vyavahārosad arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_154,4	 nanu virūpatayā ayam sarva vyavahāraḥ pravṛttaḥ iti katham anya apoha viṣayaḥ iti atas āha tasya sarvasya sāmānya ādi vyavahārasya arthāḥ samāśrayaḥ iti anena sambandhaḥ tad kāryantat camanurūpam yeṣa anteṣa ambhāvaḥ tayā karaṇa bhūtayā anyebhyaḥ iti atad kārya kāraṇebhyaḥ bhidyamānāḥ arthāḥ sarvasya sāmānya ādi vyavahārasya āśrayaḥ bhavanti atas kāraṇāt anya apoha viṣayaḥ uktaḥ na tu anya apohaḥ tatra pratibhāsate bāhyasya eva eka ākārasya vidhi rūpa tayā pratibhāsanāt yasmāt ca niścaya prayuktaḥ puruṣam aniṣṭa parihāreṇa aniṣṭāt vyāvṛtte sva lakṣaṇe pravarttayati atopi kāraṇāt anya apoha viṣayaḥ uktaḥ na tu pratibhāsā apekṣaḥ vidheḥ pratibhāsanāt 
PVVṬ_155,1	 tena yat ucyate bha ṭṭaḥ dyaḥ ta kā rābhyām go śabdasya arthaḥ kimbha āvothā bhāvaḥ yadi bhāvaḥ kim gauratha āgauḥ yadi gauḥ na asti vivādaḥ atha agauḥ go śabdasya agauḥ arthaḥ iti ati śabda kauśalam atha abhāvaḥ tat ayuktam na hi go śabda śravaṇāt abhāve preṣya saṃpratipattiḥ śabda arthaḥ ca pratipattyā pratīyate na ca go śabdāt abhāvam kaścid pratipadyate tathā agauḥ na bhavati iti ayam apohaḥ kim go viṣayothā ago viṣayaḥ yadi go viṣayaḥ katham gorga vyā iva abhāvaḥ atha ago viṣayaḥ katham anya viṣayāt apohāt anyatra pratipattiḥ na hi khadiret chidyamāne palāśa icchidā bhavati athā gauḥ gavi pratiṣedhaḥ agauḥ na bhavati iti kena gorago tvam prasaktam yat pratiṣidhyate iti 
PVVṬ_155,2–155,4	 apāstam go viṣaya tvāt go śabdasya kevalam kalpita viṣaya tvāt vivādaḥ yathā vā gopratiṣedhaḥ asati api samārope tathā uktam prāk iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt sthitam etat vidhiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ iti etat eva darśayan= āha tatra ityādi anapekṣitam sva rūpeṇa bāhya tattvam yena vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsinā dharmiṇā sa tathā uktaḥ buddhi pratibhāsa vaśāt ekoneka vyāvṛttaḥ iti anekasmāt vyāvṛttasya ekasya dharmiṇaḥ sandarśanena buddheḥ pratibhāsanāt tad vaśena ekaḥ dharmī aneka vyāvṛttaḥ vyavasthāpyate yaḥ ca anekasmāt vyāvṛttaḥ tasmāt tatra vyāvṛttayaḥ dharma bhedāḥ kalpyante iti bhāvaḥ saḥ eva bhūtaḥ dharmī śabdaiḥ viṣayīkriyate tathābhūta vikalpa pratibhāsa jananāya vaktṛbhiḥ śabdasya uccāraṇāt yatas ca anya vyāvṛttaḥ vikalpa pratibhāsaḥ śabdaiḥ viṣayīkriyate tatas vidhi viṣaya tvam siddham iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_156,1	 na kevalam śabdaiḥ vikalpaiḥ api viṣayīkriyate iti āha tad anubhava ityādi tasya tasya sva lakṣaṇasya anubhavaḥ tad anubhavaḥ tena āhitāḥ vāsanā śaktiḥ tasyāḥ prabodhaḥ kārya utpāda anugaṇī antataḥ janma yeṣām vikalpāna antaiḥ viṣayīkriyate iti sambandhaḥ kim viśiṣṭaiḥ adhyavasita tad bhāva arthaiḥ adhyavasitaḥ tad bhāvaḥ bāhya bhāvaḥ yasmin vikalpa pratibhāse sodhya savitatat bhāvaḥ evam bhūtorthaḥ viṣayaḥ yeṣām vikalpāna ante tathā dṛśya vikalpau= ekīkṛtya pravṛtteḥ iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_156,2–156,3	 adhyavasita tad bhāva arthaḥ iti pāṭhā antaranta dā adhya vasita tad bhāvaḥ ca asau= arthaḥ ca iti karmadhārayaḥ ekopi aneka vyāvṛt todhya vasita tad bhāva arthaḥ iti sambandhaḥ tasmāt buddhi pratibhāsa vaśāt sāmānya ādi vyavahāraḥ tatra eva ca buddhi pratibhāse ayam iti bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepa lakṣaṇe vyavahriyate iti vyavahāraḥ karma sādhanaḥ dharma dharmiṇau= eva vyavahāraḥ etat uktam bhavati buddhi pratibhāse yau dharma dharmiṇaḥ vyavasthā apyete tauparasparan tattva anya tvābhyām avācyāt iti pratanyate paramārthataḥ tena pāramārthika dharma dharmi tattva anyatva pakṣe yaḥ doṣaḥ pramāṇa antara ādi vaiyarthyam svātantrya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ uktaḥ saḥ iha na bhavati iti uktam bhavati 
PVVṬ_156,4	 tattva anya tva pakṣayoḥ doṣa antaram api āha na hi ityādi dharmiṇaḥ sakāśāt na anyaḥ dharmaḥ kiṅkāraṇam anartha antara abhidhānāt dharma dharmi śabdābhyām ekasmāt eva vyavacchinnasya abhidhānāt na api yaḥ eva dharmī saḥ eva dharmaḥ kasmāt tad vācinām iva dharmi vācinām iva śabdānām dharma vācinām api vyavaccheda antarākṣepa prasaṃgāt tathā ceṣṭā pratyāyanāt dharma śabdena iṣṭasya pratikṣipta bheda antarasya bhedasya apratyāyanāt saṃketa bheda akaraṇam pratikṣipta bheda antaram vyavacchedam pratyāyayati dharma śabdaḥ iti asya saṃketa bhedasya akaraṇam etat anantara uktantattva anyat tvābhyām avācya tvam dharma dharmiṇoḥ śabda arthe buddhi pratibhāsinī arthe uktam vastuni iti bāhya sva lakṣaṇe avidyamāna tvāt eva tattva anyat tvābhyām avācyam yathāpratibhāsantu śabda ādi viṣayaḥ vyavasthāpyate 
PVVṬ_157,1–157,2	 nanu ca ityādi paraḥ dṛṣṭā prayogeṣu upalabdhāḥ goḥ go tvam iti ṣaṣṭhī ādi śabdāt gavi vyavasthitam go tvam go tvena nimittena gavi go śabdaḥ varttate ityādi vibhakti parigrahaḥ go tva dravya tva ādīnām ca dharmāṇām bahu tvāt tatra bahuṣu dharmeṣu go tva dravya tva pārthiva tvāni iti dṛṣṭaḥ yaḥ vacana bhedaḥ sa na syāt dharma dharmiṇa uḥ abhede pāramārthika bheda abhāve dharmāṇām ca paraspara ram uktam atra iti siddhānta vādī na vai śa bdānām kācid viṣaya svabhāva āyattā vṛttiḥ ityādinā ukta tvāt 
PVVṬ_157,3–157,4	 bhūyas ca adhika artha vidhānena pratipādayitum āha api ca ityādi yeṣām vādināṃvastu vaśāḥ vācaḥ vastu āyattāḥ na vivakṣā para āśrayāḥ vivakṣā eva paraḥ pradhānam āśrayaḥ yāsām vācā antāḥ vivakṣā para āśrayāḥ ṣaṣṭhī na syāt vacana bheda ādayaḥ ca na syuḥ iti evam ṣaṣṭhī vacana bheda ādiṣu codyam ṣaṣṭhī vacana bheda udi codyam ādi śabdāt gorbhāvaḥ go tvam ityādi tad hita pratyaya abhāva codyam tān vastu vādinaḥ prati yuktimat ete śabdāḥ ṣaṣṭhī ādayaḥ kvacid iti vastu abhedepi praṇinīṣitāḥ praṇetum iṣṭāḥ vastu pratibandhāt vastu āyatta tvāt dhūma ādi vat na hi agni pratibaddhaḥ dhūmaḥ vahni pratyāyana samarthaḥ tad vaiparītyena jala pratyāyane niyoktum pāryate tadā vastu pratibaddha tve śabdānām ayam upālambhaḥ syāt asati vyatireke katham ṣaṣṭhī ādayaḥ iti etat eva na asti iti āha yadā punar ityādi yat vacaḥ yathā yena prakāreṇa bhedasya abhedasya vā pratipādanāya kim viśiṣṭam anapekṣita bāhya artham vācaka tvena rūpeṇa vac tṛthā iti tat vacanam yathāyogam vācakam 
PVVṬ_158,1^1	 tat vyācaṣṭe na hi ityādi vyatireke vastu bhede sati ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktiḥ bāhulyejasā ādayaḥ bahuvacana pratyayāḥ bhavanti iti vai yā ka ra ṇā nām vyavasthānam etat api puruṣa abhiprāya nirapekṣam vastu sannidhi mātreṇa na svayam pravṛttam saṃketa balena eva pravṛttam iti yāvat etat eva āha te tu tatra ityādi te tu vaiyākaraṇa ādayaḥ tatra vyatireke bāhulye ca tathā iti ṣaṣṭhī bahuvacanam ca yathā saṃketam prayuñjate iti kṛtvā tatas ṣaṣṭhī ādeḥ tathā pratītiḥ bhavati vyatireka ādi pratītiḥ anyeṣām api bhavati tathābhūta vyavahāra upalambhāt na tu tāvatā vastu balena vyatireka bāhulye ca ṣaṣṭhī ādīnām niyamaḥ evam anyatra api iti dharma dharmiṇoḥ avyatirekepi eka tve ca vastunaḥ kṛta katva anitya tva ādīnām kathaṃcid iti bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepa lakṣaṇam dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedam upādāya 
PVVṬ_158,1^2	 kṛtaka tva ādiṣu vyāvṛtti bheda upalakṣita nānā tvam upādāya yathākramam ṣaṣṭhī bahuvacana ādayaḥ te prayoktṛbhiḥ prayuktāḥ tathā eva yathāyogam pratīti hetavaḥ bhavanti tatra evam icchā mātra nibandhana tve śabdānām sthite sati puruṣa āyatta vṛttīnā antad icchā vaśena pravṛtteḥ avastu sandarśinām śabdebhyaḥ sva lakṣaṇasya apratibhāsanāt yathā abhyāsam yasya yathā saṃketa abhyāsaḥ tathā vikalpa prabodhaḥ vikalpa udayaḥ tasya hetūnām saṃketa anurūpasya śrotṛ santāne vikalpasya kāraṇānām iti arthaḥ evam bhūtānām śabdānām vācyeṣu artheṣu yeyampravṛtti cintā vyatireke ṣaṣṭhī ādayaḥ iti ādikāḥ nai yā yi kā dīna antad vaśāt iti śabda vaśāt vastu vyavasthānam vyatiriktasya vastunā uṅgīkaraṇam goḥ go tvam iti yasmāt ṣaṣṭhī tasmāt sāmānyam vyatiriktam ityādi jāḍya khyāpanam śabda artha vyavasthā anabhijña tva khyāpanam eva kevalam 
PVVṬ_158,2	 tathā ityādi paraḥ tathā akṛta vyavasthā dharma dharmī ādiṣu iti dharme dharmiṇi ca bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepābhyām dharma dharmi śabdāḥ kṛta vyavasthāḥ ādi śabdāt dravya tva pārthiva tvāni ityādi bahuvacana śabdāḥ vyāvṛtti bhedena kṛta vyavasthāḥ na punar vāstavāt eva dharma dharmiṇoḥ vyatirekāt ṣaṣṭhī vaḥ tu bhedāt dravya tva ādīnām dharmāṇām paramārthataḥ eva bhedāt vahuvacanam iti kutas etat tathā ityādi prativacanam tathā vyavahārāti vyavahāra viṣayayoḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ vāstave vyatireke dharmāṇām ca parasparam para paramārthataḥ bhede sāmānya ādi vyavahārā yogāt 
PVVṬ_159,1^1	 etat eva grahaṇaka vākyam na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe vyavahāra viṣayayoḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ vastu tve parasparam tattvam anya tvam vā abhyupagantavyam vastunaḥ prakāra antara abhāvāt iti dvayam upanyastam bhede tattva rūpa tve ca iti pakṣa dvayepi doṣa udbhāvanā artham anyathā pareṇa vyatireka vastu bhedāt iti bheda pakṣe avalambite tattva pakṣa upanyāsaḥ na prakaraṇa anurūpaḥ syāt tad sambaddhaḥ iti sāmānya tadvatoḥ sambandhaḥ śabdānām vā yathāvastu pravṛttau= abhyupagamyamānāyām sāmānya ādayaḥ yujyante etat ca antaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ vastu kṛtam iti vastūnām eka aneka tva ādikam śabda pravṛtti bhedam ekaṃvacana bahuvacana ādīnām pravṛtti bhedam dārāḥ śabdaḥ nitya bahuvacana antaḥ pulliṅgaḥ ca iṣyate 
PVVṬ_159,1^2–159,3	 yatra yadā eka strī viṣaya udārāḥ iti śabdaḥ tadā bheda vyavasthiteḥ ṣaṇṇagarī iti bahūnānnagarāṇām ekavacanena abhidhānāt abheda vyavasthiteḥ kinnibandhanam bāhyam na eva kiṃcid ādi śabda ātmika tā prāsāda mālā ityādau bheda abheda vyavasthiteḥ khasya svabhāvaḥ kha tvam ca iti khasya svabhāva aiti atra vyatireka ṣaṣṭhyāḥ kinnibandhanam atha tattvam iti anena uktena kim yadi khasya svabhāvaḥ iti asya vākyasya kha tvam itīyan tat hita vṛttiḥ bhavati ityet kathyate tat na asti na hi svabhāvaḥ iti asmin= arthe bhāva pratyayaḥ kintarhi bhāva artha na ca tad hita vṛtti pradarśanena kiñcid prayojanam asti anyatareṇa vyatireka pradarśanāt atra eke vṛtti vākyābhyām sarvaḥ vyavahāraḥ vyāptaḥ iti tad vyāpti pradarśana artham dvayam uktam iti anye anyathā vyācakṣate khasya svabhāvaḥ iti vyatireke kinnibandhanam tathā kha tvam iti vyatireka abhidhāyinaḥ bhāva pratyayasya kinnibandhanam iti 
PVVṬ_160,1	 yadā ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yadā yasmin kāle yat śabdam anye paṭhanti yasmāt iti arthaḥ yena evambhavatoti dārāḥ ityādi bahuvacanam bhavati eka tvāt eka vacanam eva prāpnoti iti bhāvaḥ ekasyāḥ api striyaḥ sikatānām ca bahvyaḥ śaktayaḥ tatas śakti bhedaḥ bahuvacana kāraṇam iti sarvatra iti yatra api ekavacanam iṣṭam vṛkṣaḥ iti ādau eka śakteḥ arthasya abhāvāt sarvasya nānā śakti tvāt evam sati ekasmin= eka vacanam iti ayam yatnaḥ ca vyarthaḥ syāt sati api śakti bhede vastu abhedāt śakti āśrayasya abhedāt anyatra eka vacana viṣayerthe vṛkṣaḥ paṭaḥ iti ādau= eka vacanam iti ced iha api dāra ādau= eka vacanam ekasyāḥ striyāḥ vastu abhedāt yatas evam na vastu aśakti āśrayaḥ vā śabda pravṛtti bhedaḥ tasmāt ayam śabda pravṛtti niyamaḥ nirvastukaḥ bāhya vaḥ tu anāśrayaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ puruṣa icchāyāḥ svātantryam śabda prayoge khyāpayati 
PVVṬ_160,2	 ṣaṇṇām nagarāṇām samāhāraḥ kriyā ātmakaḥ guṇa ātmakaḥ vā ekosti tatas eka vacanam iti ced āha na hi nagarāṇi eva kiṃcid iti nagara avaya vi dravyasya anabhyupagamāt kutas teṣān nagarāṇām samāhāraḥ kriyā ātmakaḥ guṇa ātmakaḥ vā yatas evam abhidhīyeta kriyā guṇayoḥ dravya āśrita tvāt kim punar dravyam iti āha prāsāda ityādi gṛha ādi samudāyaḥ nagaram vijātīyānām ca prāsādī dānām dravya ārambha anabhyupagamāt kutas tad samudāyaḥ prāsāda ādi samudāyaḥ nagaram dravyam syāt yāvatā prāsāda toraṇa puruṣa ādīnām samudāyaḥ nagaram iṣyate teṣām prāsāda ādīnām samastānām asaṃyogāt ca kāraṇāt nagarandravyam saṃyoga sahāyānām dravyāṇām dravya ārambhaka tvam iṣyate na prāsāda puruṣa kuḍya ādīnām viśliṣṭānām saṃyoga usti yena prāsāda ādi janyam nagarandravyam syāt 
PVVṬ_160,3–161,1	 syāt matam yadi api sākalyena prāsāda ādīnām na asti saṃyogaḥ tathā api yeṣām tāvat prāsāda puruṣa ādīnām parasparam saṃyogaḥ tad saṃyoga ātmakam nagaram bhaviṣyati evam apivastu tvam nagarasya asiddham saṃyogasya guṇa padārtha tvāt iti atas āha na saṃyogaḥ ityādi na saṃyoga svabhāvat nagaram tathā kāṣṭha iṣṭakā ādīnām vijātīyānām kārya dravya anārambhāt prāsāda upi na dravya ātmakaḥ kintu saṃyoga svabhāvaḥ iṣyate saṃyogaḥ ca guṇaḥ nirguṇāḥ ca guṇāḥ iti kutas prāsādasya saṃyogaḥ yena tad saṃyoga ātmakam nagaram syāt etat eva āha prāsādasya ityādi pareṇa iti artha antareṇa asaṃyogāt ca na saṃyogaḥ nagaram cakāreṇa anantara nirdiṣṭāt prāsāda ādīnām viśliṣṭānām asaṃyogāt ca na saṃyogaḥ nagaram iti etat samuccīyate tat evam prāsāda ādīnām ubhayathā saṃyoga abhāvena nagarasya saṃyoga svabhāva tā nirastāḥ 
PVVṬ_161,2	 prāsāda ādīnām yā saṃkhyā tad ātmakam nagaram bhaviṣyati iti ced āha tatas eva saṃkhyā bhāvaḥ iti yasmāt saṃyoga ātmaka prāsādaḥ tatas eva kāraṇāt prāsādasya saṃkhyāyāḥ abhāvaḥ nirguṇa tvāt guṇānām saṃkhyā api hi guṇa svabhāvāḥ sa ca asau saṃyogaḥ ca tad saṃyogaḥ prāsāda ātmakaḥ saṃyogaḥ iti arthaḥ tad saṃyogena puruṣaiḥ ca viśiṣṭā yā sattā sā nagaram iti ced kim asyāḥ sattāyāḥ eka tvāt nitya tvāt ca niratiśayāyāḥ viśeṣaṇam na hi prāsāda puruṣa ādayaḥ sattām viśiṃṣanti anādheya atiśaya tvāt tasmāt sattā nirviśeṣaṇā tasyāḥ nagara tve sarvatra nagara tvam syāt iti abhiprāyaḥ sattāyāḥ ca eka tvāt iti dravya guṇa karmasu ekā eva sattā vyāpinī nagara bahu tvepi nagara vyavasthā āśrayāṇām prāsāda ādi samudāyānām bahu tvepi iti arthaḥ anyathā sattā ātmake nagare prakṛte nagara bahu tvam katham syāt dvayasya iti prāsāda puruṣa ādeḥ sattāyāḥ ca yā paraspara sahita tā sā nagaram iti ced evam hi sati na sarvatra nagara buddhiḥ prāsāda ādīnām sarvatra abhāvāt prāsāda ādi bahu tvāt bahuvacanam ca siddham iti paraḥ manyate 
PVVṬ_161,3^1	 uttaram āha anupakārya ityādi anupakārya upakārakayoḥ sattā prāsādayoḥ kassahāyībhāvaḥ tathā hi dvividhaḥ sahakāra arthaḥ paraspara atiśaya ādhānena santāne viśiṣṭa kṣaṇa utpādana lakṣaṇaḥ pūrva sva hetoḥ eva samarthānām utpannānām eka kārya kriyā lakṣaṇaḥ ca na tāvat pūrvaḥ sattāyāḥ anādheya atiśaya tvāt na api dvitīyaḥ yasmāt yathā sattā kevalāḥ nagara buddhi jananam pratyasam arthā tathā prāsāda ādi sahitā api sāmarthye vā kevalā api janayet yadi ca dvayasya paraspara sahita tā nagaram tadā ekam api nagaram aneka ātmakam prāsāda ādi ātmaka tvāt tatas puruṣa saṃyoga sattāna ambahu tvāt nagaram iti eka vacanam syāt 
PVVṬ_161,3^2	 saṃyoga śabdena prāsāda ātmakaḥ saṃyogaḥ uktaḥ tathābhūtānām iti paraspara sahitānām puruṣa saṃyoga sattānām kvacid arthaḥ iti nagaram iti vijñāne śabde ca niṣpādye abhinnā ekā śaktiḥ asti sā iti abhinnā śaktiḥ nimittam eka vacanasya iti ced na kim kāraṇam śakteḥ vastu svarūpa avyatirekāt puruṣa ādibhyaḥ vastu rūpebhyaḥ avyatirekāt tadvat eva aneka tvam iti kutas tad āśrayam eka vacanam vastu svarūpāt vyatireke vā śakteḥ abhyupamyam agāne puruṣa saṃyoga sattābhiḥ anupakāryasya śakti rūpasya puruṣa ādi pāratantryan na syāt tatas ca puruṣa ādīnām śaktiḥ iti sambandhaḥ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_162,1	 atha vyatiriktāyāḥ api śakteḥ puruṣa ādi pāratantrya siddhi artham puruṣa ādi kṛtaḥ upakāra eṣyate tadā śakteḥ upakāre vā puruṣa ādi kṛte iṣyamāṇe yayā śaktyā puruṣa ādayaḥ prathamam śaktim upakurvate tasyāḥ prathama śakti upakāriṇyā api śakte śakteḥ vyatirekenavasthā syāt avyatireke vā ādyāyām api eka vacana nibandhana tvena iṣṭāyām śaktāva vyatireka prasaṃgaḥ avyatireke ca vastu vat eva bāhulyam iti tad avasthaḥ bahuṣu bahuvacana prasaṃgaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat śakti parikalpane khasya svabhāvaḥ iti vyatireka āśrayā ṣaṣṭhī na syāt ṣaṣṭhī kāraṇa tvāt bhāva pratyaya upyupacārāt ṣaṣṭhī śabdena uktaḥ tena ayam aparorthaḥ kha tvam iti vyatireka āśrayā tad hita utpattiḥ na syāt iti khasya svabhāvaḥ kha tvam iti anayā vyutpattyā bhāva pratyayasya utpatteḥ vyatireka āśraya tvam 
PVVṬ_162,2^1	 athavā yathāyogam sambandhaḥ grantha= chedaḥ ca kāryaḥ kha tvam iti vyatireka āśrayāt tad hita utpattiḥ iti adhyāhāraḥ khasya svabhāvaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī na syāt iti na hi kha śabda vācyāt arthāt anyaḥ svabhāvosti bhāvaḥ vā yaḥ yathākramam vyatireka ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tad hitasya vā nibandhanam syāt kha tvam nāma sāmānyam asti tad vyatireka nibandhanam iti ced āha na tatra ityādi eka ātmaka tvāt khasya na asmin kha tva sāmānyam yadi api sattvam dravya tvam ca ākāśesti tathā api na tat khasya svabhāvaḥ ghaṭa ādi sādhāraṇa tvāt na api sattva dravya tve kha tvam iti atra bhāva pratyayasya nibandhanam tayoḥ śaśabda pratyaya akāraṇa tvāt sva anurūpa jñāna abhidhāna nibandhana svabhāva pratyayasya kāraṇam iṣṭam na api vibhu tva ādayaḥ guṇāḥ iti ādi śabdāt eka tva para tva ādi parigrahaḥ tathā ucyate iti khasya svabhāvaḥ iti dravyāt artha antarasya vibhu tva ādeḥ guṇasya tad svabhāva tva ayogāt ākāśa svabhāva tva ayogāt
