PVVṬ_162,2^2	 na hi artha antaram artha antarasya svabhāvaḥ yuktaḥ yadi ca vibhu tva ādayaḥ ākāśa svabhāvāḥ tadā teṣām ca vibhu tva ādīnām ākāśa svabhāva tveniḥsvabhāva tva prasaṃgāt tathā hi yaḥ teṣām guṇa svabhāvaḥ sati a ākāśam eva jātam naca apara svabhāva usti iti niḥsvabhāva tā syāt teṣām ca niḥsvabhāva tve ākāśasya vyatiriktaḥ svabhāvaḥ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ vibhu tva ādeḥ api artha antara svabhāva tvam iti ced āha tasya api ityādi tasya iti vibhu tva ādeḥ atha antaram svabhāvaḥ asya iti vigrahaḥ atiprasaṃgaḥ iti yat tad artha antaram vibha tva ādeḥ svabhāva tvena iṣṭantasya api artha antara svabhāva tvena bhāvyam anyathā tasya api vibhu tva avyatirekāt tadvat eva niḥsvabhāva tā syāt tathā ca apara apara svabhāva parimārgaṇena anavasthānāt ekasya api pratiṣṭhita svabhāvasya abhāvāt ādi asya ākāśa svabhāvasya apratipattiḥ tatas ca saḥ eva vyatireka abhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_163,1–164,1	 evaṃdravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyānāṃṣaṇṇām padārthānām vargaḥ ādi śabdāt prāsāda mālā ityādayaḥ vācyāḥ katham asati vyatireke ṣaṣṭhī iti na hi tatra ṣaṣ padārtheṣu sāmānyam sambhavati yad varga śabdena ucyate dravya guṇa karmasu eva sāmānya abhyupagamāt tathā saṃkhyā saṃyogaḥ vā na sambhavati tayoḥ guṇa padārtha tvena dravyaḥ eva bhāvāt katham ityādi paraḥ idānīm iti artha antara svabhāva anabhyupagame kha śabda vācyasya bhāva śabda vācyasya ca arthasya asatya niścaye katham svabhāvaḥ iti bhedena nirdeśaḥ na punar kham iti eva bheda nibandha abhāvāt abhedena eva nirdeśaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_164,2–164,3	 khasya ityādinā pariharati khasya iti kha śabda vācyasya arthasya artha antarasya iti pṛthivī ādeḥ yat sādhāraṇam rūpam anupātta viśeṣa antarasya aparāmarśena tyāgena kha śabda pravṛtti nibandhanam rūpam anya t ravya asādhāraṇam tathā jijñāsāyāḥ atra artha antara asaṃsargi mevam ucyate khasya svabhāvaḥ iti tathā kha tvam iti yathā gamyeta khasya ayam svabhāvaḥ na anyasya iti anena bheda antara pratikṣepeṇa eka vyāvṛtta rūpa an abhidhānāt anyat eva vyatireka abhidhāna nimittam uktam tena ghaṭasya abhāvaḥ ityādi vyapadeśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati 
PVVṬ_164,4–164,5	 anye punar āhuḥ khasya svabhāvam pratipādayan svabhāva śabdaḥ svabhāva vyāvṛtti mātreṇa pratipādayati na tu svabhāva antara apratikṣepeṇa kha śabdaḥ tu tam eva rūpa antara apratikṣepeṇa tatas svabhāva antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepa lakṣaṇena bheda leśena khasya ayam svabhāvaḥ kha tvam iti bhedena nirddiśyate iti tat etat na ati śliṣṭam bheda antara pratikṣepa apratipatteḥ artha antara sādhāraṇa rūpa aparāmarśena kha śabda pravṛtti nibandhanam rūpam evam ucyata iti bruvatā sva lakṣaṇam eva vācyam uktam iti matvā paraḥ brūte ityādi na tu sarve ityādi 
PVVṬ_164,6–165,1	 na ityādi siddhānta vādī yat sarvasmāt vyāvṛttam sva lakṣaṇa ātmakantadeva rūpaṃśabda utthāyām buddhau śabdaiḥ samarpyate na iti sambandhaḥ kasmāt tasya sva lakṣaṇasya indriya buddhau= iva śābde vijñāne pratyavabhāsane satyam atīndriya tva prasaṅgāt pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgāt kintarhi śabdena kriyate iti ced āha kevalam ityādi ayam iti pratipādakaḥ dṛśya vikalpayoḥ eka tva adhyavasāya vipralabdhaḥ tathābhūtam asādhāraṇam artham pratyāyayiṣyāmi iti evam abhiprāyaḥ śabdena karaṇa bhūtena śrotari yaḥ vikalpaḥ tasya prativimba bāhyatayā adhyam a ākāram arpayati kim bhūtam asaṃsṛṣṭa tad svabhāvam agṛhīta vastu rūpam ācārya di ṅ nā ga sya api etat abhimatam iti āha yat āha ityādi adṛṣṭa arthe svarga ādi śabde uccaritertha vikalpa mātram śrotuḥ bhavati adhyavasita bāhya artha svabhāvaḥ vikalpaḥ bhavati na tu bāhya svarūpa grāhakam anena cā cā rye ṇā pi vidhi arthaḥ śabda arthaḥ abhipretaḥ iti darśayati na evam vikalpa prativimbe śabdena śrotari janite pratipādya pratipādakābhyām yathāsaṃkhyam sva lakṣaṇaṃpratipannam pratipāditam vā bhavati 
PVVṬ_165,2	 yadi hi śabdena sva lakṣaṇam pratipādyate tadā svarga ādi śabda śravaṇepi tad anubhavinām iva svarga ādi pratyakṣa vedinām iva pratibhāsā bhedaḥ syāt śrotuḥ api svarga ādi sva lakṣaṇa ākāra pratipattiḥ syāt yatas ca na śabdāt sva lakṣaṇa pratipattiḥ tasmāt ayam śrotā śabdāt apratipadyamānopi bhāva svabhāvaḥ tathābhūtaḥ eva asaṃsṛṣṭa vastu svabhāva eva vikalpa pratibimbe tat adhyavasāyī sva lakṣaṇa adhyavasāyī sva lakṣaṇam eva mayā pratipannam iti santuṣyati kim kāraṇam tathā bhūta tvāt eva sva lakṣaṇasya agrahepi adhyavasita sva lakṣaṇa rūpa tvāt eva śabda artha pratipatteḥ yatas ca sva lakṣaṇa adhyavasāyena śabda arthasya pratītiḥ tena etat evam ucyate śabdaḥ svarūpam āha iti artha antara sādhāraṇa rūpa aparāmarśena kha śabda pravṝtti nibandham asādhāraṇam rūpam ucyate iti vacanāt na punar sva rūpa pratibhāsasya eva vijñānasya jananāt 
PVVṬ_165,3–165,5	 tasmāt sthitam etat vidhi arthaḥ śabda artha ulīka tvāt para matāt bhedaḥ iti katham ityādi paraḥ ekānta vyāvṛttam rūpam yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ teṣa ambhāvānām asaṃsargāt anyasya ca iti bhāvebhyaḥ vyatiriktasya sāmānyasya uktam iti siddhānta vādī kīdṛśa m uktam iti āha asaṃsṛṣṭānām paraspara vyāvṛttānām ekena vijātīyena asaṃsargaḥ yathā go vyaktīnām ekena āgo svabhāvena asaṃsargaḥ saḥ eva asaṃsargaḥ tad vyatirekiṇa antasmāt ago svabhāvāt vyāvṛttānām go bhedānām samāna tā go tvam evam anyat api sāmānyam boddhavyam 
PVVṬ_166,1	 etat uktam bhavati samānām iti karttari ṣaṣṭhī tena samānāna ambhāvaḥ sāmānyam iti vijātīya vyāvṛttāḥ samāna ākāra utpannāḥ bhāvāḥ sāmānyam iti arthaḥ asya eva ca sāmānyasya liṅga tvam liṅgitvantad sambandhaḥ ca vastu tvāt artha kriyā kāri tvāt ca pravṛtti viṣaya tvam vikalpa viṣaya tvam ca yathā adhyavasāyam na tu jñāna ākārasya etad viparīta tvāt 
PVVṬ_166,2	 tat evam samāropa pakṣe parokṣam dūṣaṇamparihṛtya anya vyāvṛtti pakṣe parokṣam dūṣaṇa m anya vyāvṛtti anabhyupagamāt eva nirasya ani avyāvṛttā eva bhāvāḥ eka tvena adhyavasīyamānāḥ sāmānyam iti ca pratipādya buddhi ākārepi sāmānye paroktam dūṣaṇam apanetum āha api ca ityādi bhāvān āśritya bhedinaḥ iti vyāvṛttāni sva lakṣaṇam vāśritya dhīḥ eka artha pratibhāsinī utpadyate yayā svarūpeṇa su ākāreṇa ekena rūpeṇa para rūpam paraspara vyāvṛttam valakṣaṇam samvriyate pracchādyate diti dhi kimviśiṣṭayā yā saṃvṛtyā saṃvriyate anayā sva lakṣaṇam iti kṛtvā samvṛta nānā arthā sthagita nāna arthāḥ svayambhedinā upi kenacid rūpeṇa vijātīya vyāvṛtti upakalpitena go tva ādi rūpeṇa abhedinaḥ iva ābhānti saṃsṛṣṭaḥ iva tena buddhi ākāraḥ ca buddhi sthaḥ na artha buddhi antara anugaḥ nābhi preta artha kārī ca sa upi vācyaḥ na tatvataḥ ityādi nirastam 
PVVṬ_166,3–167,1	 tasmāt buddheḥ abhiprāya vaśāt eka ākāra adhyāra upavaśāt sāmāni aṃsa kesna prakīrtitam buddhi āropitaḥ eva ākāraḥ sāmānyam uktam iti yāvat yathā tayā saṃkaropitam tathā tat sāmānyam asat parama arthena nanu yadi abhinnaḥ pratibhāsaḥ abhyupagamyate katham sāmānyam asat iti ucyate na vyaktibhyaḥ bhinnasya abhimatasya abhedena pratibhāsanāt sarva ātmanā ca abhede vyakti vat ananvayāt anugatasya pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ eva bheda abhede ca tathā eva ubhaya rūpa tayā pratibhāsaḥ syāt na ca yatra pratyaye yadā eva gauḥ iti pratibhāsaḥ tadā eva tatra go tvam asya iti pratibhāsaḥ 
PVVṬ_167,2	 atha syāt yat ananugame yasya anugamaḥ tat tatas bhinnam yathā nīlāt anīlam śāvaleyān anugame ca go tvasya anugamaḥ vyakti antare tasmāt tatas bhinnam śāvaleya abhinna gotva grāha kantarhi pratyakṣam bhrāntam syāt bhinnasya anya pramāṇa gṛhītasya abhedena grahaṇāt na ca ekasya yena eva rūpeṇa bhedaḥ tena eva abhedaḥ virodhāt na api vastūnām viśeṣa rūpa tayā bhedaḥ sāmānya rūpa tayā abhedaḥ evam hi viśeṣāṇām eka deśa ādi tvam syāt na ca syāt sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ ca pratibhāsa bhedaḥ na syāt sarva ātmanā abhinna tvāt bhede vā anugata vyāvṛtta rūpayoḥ paraspara asaṃśleṣeṇa ekānta bhinna tva prasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_167,3	 yadi ca prativyakti tad abhinnantada ekam sāmānyam asti iti kutas na ca tatra prathama vyakti darśane agṛhītam api dvitīya ādi vyaktau saḥ eva ayam iti pratīteḥ ekam sāmānyam asti iti yuktam saḥ iti smaraṇa aṃśasya anubhūta sāmānya viṣaya abhāvena utpatti asambhavāt tatas ca yathā prathama vyaktau na gṛhītan tathā dvitīya ādi vyaktau= api pratyekam gṛhītam iti katham saḥ eva ayam iti jñānasya utpattiḥ syāt na ca saḥ iti smaraṇāni atha anupapattyā prathama vyaktau nirvikalpakena anyena vā jñānena sāmānya grahaṇa kalpanā yuktā anugata rūpa pratibhāsā bhāvāt na api dharma rūpa tayā tatra asya grahaṇam yuktam anugata eka rūpa tvāt sāmānyasya na api pūrva apara vyakti sambandhi tayā asya pratyabhijñā pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam iti śakyate vaktum idam eva iti evam pratyakṣasya utpatti prasaṃgāt pūrva vyakteḥ asannihita tvāt ca sannihita artha niścaya lakṣaṇam ca pratyakṣam iṣyate 
PVVṬ_167,4	 tasmāt ago vyāvṛtta eka viśeṣa anubhava pūrvakam anyasmin= ago vyāvṛtte anubhūyamāne sati saḥ eva ayam iti eka ākārasya bhrāntasya pratyayasya vāsanā sāmarthyena utpatteḥ tat eva asya nimittam kalpayitum yuktat na anyat bhrānta tvāt ca buddheḥ ayam sāmānya ākāraḥ vyavasthāpyate na vāhyasya yathāpratibhāsam tu bāhyānām eva arthānām sāmānyam ucyate 
PVVṬ_167,5	 buddhiḥ ityādinā kārikā artham vyācaṣṭe buddhiḥ vikalpikā iti anena sambandhaḥ tebhyaḥ sajātīyebhyonyaḥ tasmāt vyatirekaḥ sa yeṣām asti te tad anya vyatirekiṇaḥ vijātīya vyāvṛttān iti arthaḥ sva vāsanā prakṛtim vikalpa vāsanā svabhāvambhinneṣu abhinna pratyaya janana sāmarthī an tadanu vidadhatī anukurvatī evam hi tayā sva kāraṇam anukṛtam bhavati yadi bhinneṣu api eka ākāra utpadyate eṣām iti padārthānām adhyasya iti padārtheṣu āropya bhāvānām eva ekam rūpam iti tān bhāvān sṛjantī abhinna anivakurvāṇā sandarśayati eka rūpān iva darśayati iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_168,1	 nanu vikalpasya anubhūta artha ahita vāsanā bala utpattā viṣyamāṇāyām katham sāmānya ākārasya vikalpasya utpattiḥ sāmānyasya ananubhūta tvāt iti atas āha sā ca ityādi ekam sadṛśam sādhyam sādhanañca yeṣa ambhāvānām yathā ghaṭa ādīnām ekam udaka ādi dhāraṇa ādi sādhyam sādhanam ca mṛd piṇḍa ādi te eka sādhya sādhanāḥ tad bhāvaḥ tayā karaṇa bhūtayā anyebhyotat sādhya sādhanebhyaḥ vivekinām bhāvānā sā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ bhinnānām api prakṛtyāḥ eka ākāra vikalpa janana lakṣaṇaḥ tathābhūtasya vikalpasya hetuḥ yā vāsanā tasyāḥ ca sā tādṛśī prakṛtiḥ yat evam svarūpam paratra āropayantī eṣā buddhiḥ pratibhāti vyakti abhinna sāmānya grāhiṇī pratibhāsate iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_168,2–168,4	 tena yat ucyate smārttam etat abhedena vijñānam iti yaḥ vadet nūnambandhyā sutepyasti tasya smaraṇa śakya tā iti nirastam bhinnānām eva anubhūtānām eka kārya karttṛ tvena sva viṣaya abhinna ākāra pratyaya janane sāmarthyāt anubhūta spaṣṭa ākārasya arthasya sva viṣayaḥ spaṣṭa smaraṇa janana sāmarthya vat tat udbhava iti varṇṇa vikalpa vāsanāyāḥ vivekibhyaḥ svabhāvebhyaḥ yathāsaṃkhyam sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca udbhavaḥ yasyāḥ sā tathā sā ca iyam iti buddhiḥ saṃvṛtiḥ iti ucyate samvriyate anayā buddhyā svarūpeṇa sva pratibhāsena para rūpam vastu rūpam iti karaṇa sādhanam ktinam vidhāya te ca bhāvāḥ tayā iti buddhyā saṃvṛta bhedāḥ pracchādita nānātvāḥ kenacid rūpeṇa iti vikalpa buddhi āropitena pratibhānti vikalpa buddhau 
PVVṬ_169,1	 tat eṣām ityādi buddhi pratibhāsam vikalpa buddhi ākāram anurundhānaiḥ puruṣaiḥ tat buddhi upasthāpitam ekam rūpam sāmānyam ucyate iti anena sambandhaḥ keṣām sāmānyam ucyate buddhi parivarttinām eva eṣām buddhi parivarttinām iti sambandhaḥ sva lakṣaṇāni anubhūya yathā anubhavam asau śuklaḥ ghaṭaḥ kṛṣṇonyaḥ vā iti evam vikalpa buddhiṣu aspaṣṭāḥ ghaṭa ākārāḥ te buddhi parivarttinaḥ bhāvāḥ ye teṣām eva sāmānyam sambandhi na sva lakṣaṇānām sāmānya buddhau= apratibhāsanāt asambandhi tvāt ca buddhi parivarttinām eva viśeṣaṇam bahis iva parisphuratām iti bahis iva pratibhāsamānānām iti arthaḥ bahis sphuraṇe ca kāraṇam āha ākāra viśeṣa parigrahāt iti 
PVVṬ_169,2–169,4	 bāhya artha vikalpa saṃsthānasya spaṣṭasya anukārāt bāhya adhyavasāyaḥ iti eke etat ca ayuktam na hi sādṛśya nimittaḥ bāhya tva āropaḥ iti niveditam etat tasmāt ākāra viśeṣaḥ ghaṭa ādi ākāraḥ tasya parigraha unubhavaḥ tasmāt bahis iva parisphuraṇam etat uktam bhavati ghaṭa ādi anubhava āhita vāsanā sāmarthyena vikalpaḥ utpadyamānaḥ su a ākāram bāhya ghaṭa ādi abhedena adhyavasyati na tu gṛhṇāti tena śabda vihiterthe kvacid saṃśayaḥ bhavati agrahaṇāt tatra tu vikalpaḥ sva hetutaḥ eva bāhya abhinnam su a ākāra madhyavasyati na tu sādṛśyāt sadṛśasya arthasya abhāvāt agrahaṇāt ca 
PVVṬ_169,5–169,6	 nanu buddhi parivarttinām api svarūpe vyatirekeṇa konyaḥ eva ākāraḥ pratibhāsate yat sāmānyam syāt satyam tatra tāvat kecid āhuḥ eka jñāna avyatirekāt ekatvanteṣām iti anye tu āhuḥ pratyekanteṣām sva vyakti apekṣayā sāmānya rūpa tā iti tat etat ubhayam api ayuktam eka pratibhāsā bhāvāt kevalam eka rūpa tayā teṣām adhyavasāyāt paraiḥ sāmānyam iṣṭam iti tad abhiprāyāt evam ucyate ā cā ryaḥ sya tu samānāḥ iti pratibhāsobhipretaḥ na ekaḥ iti tathā ca vakṣyati 
PVVṬ_169,7–170,1	 athavā astu pratibhāsaḥ dhiyāmbhinnaḥ samānāḥ iti tad grahaṇa ādi ti yadi buddhi parivarttinām eva vikalpa buddhi sandarśitam rūpam sāmānyantasya ca vidhi rūpa tvāt katham idānīm anya apohaḥ sāmānyam iti ucyate saḥ eva iti siddhānta vādī saḥ eva vikalpa buddhi vyavasthāpitaḥ pratibhā asamānaḥ anya apohaḥ ucyate anya vivikta padārtha darśana dvāra āyāta tvāt 
PVVṬ_170,2–170,5	 yadi vikalpa ākāraḥ sāmānyam katham bāhyānām samāna rūpa tayā pratītiḥ yat āha atha nirviṣayā etāḥ vāsanā mātra bhāvataḥ pratipattiḥ pravṛttiḥ ca bāhya artheṣu katham bhavet iti atas āha tam eva ityādi tam iti vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsam gṛhṇatī sā vikalpikā buddhiḥ vastu grāhiṇī iva pratibhāti kasmāt vikalpānām prakṛti vibhramāt svabhāvena eva su a ākāra abhedena artha grahaṇa vibhramāt kathantarhi apoha viṣayā iti ucyate iti āha sā hi vikalpikā buddhiḥ adhyavasāya vaśāt tad anya vivekiṣu bhāveṣu sva lakṣaṇeṣu bhavantī viveka viṣaya iti gamyate kāryataḥ na tu viveka svabhāva viṣayīkaraṇāt 
PVVṬ_170,6^1	 paraḥ tu avidita abhiprāyaḥ prāha nanu ityādi sāmānyāt bāhyāḥ sva lakṣaṇāni iti arthaḥ evam hi bāhya ādhyātmikānām saṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati vivekinaḥ paraspara vilakṣaṇā na ca teṣu iti sva lakṣeṇeṣu kathanteṣu vikalpa buddhiḥ bhavati iti ucyate vyākhyātāraḥ ityādinā pariharati te hi yathā avasthitam vastu vyavasthāpayantaḥ evam vivecayanti anyaḥ vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsaḥ nyatsva lakṣaṇam iti na vyavaharttāra evam vivecayanti te tu vyavaharttāraḥ sva ālambanam eva iti vikalpa pratibhāsam eva artha kriyā yogyam bāhya sva lakṣaṇa rūpam manyamānāḥ etat eva spaṣṭayati 
PVVṬ_170,6^2	 dṛśyorthaḥ sva lakṣaṇam vikalpya ūrthaḥ sāmānya pratibhāsaḥ tau= ekīkṛtya sva lakṣaṇam eva idam vikalpabuddhyā viṣayīkriyate śabdena ca udyate iti evam adhimucya artha kriyā kāriṇī arthe pravarttante tad abhiprāya vaśāt vyavaharttṛṇām abhiprāya vaśāt evam ucyate vivekiṣu bhāveṣu vikalpa buddhiḥ bhavati iti dṛśya vikalpyau= ekīkṛtya pravṛtteḥ iti vadatā na su a ākāre bāhya āropaḥ iti uktam bhavati anyathā su ākāraḥ eva pravṛtti prasaṅgāt marīcikāyām jala āropāt iva na api bāhye su a ākāra āropaḥ āropyamāṇa phala arthi tvena eva pravṛtti prasaṃgāt jala arthinaḥ iva jala bhrāntau 
PVVṬ_171,1	 nanu dṛśya vilpayoḥ ekīkaraṇam kim ucyate yadi dṛśyasya vikalpyāt abhedaḥ bāhyerthe pravṛttiḥ na syāt vikalpyasya dṛśyāt abhedaḥ sva lakṣaṇam śabda arthaḥ syāt na ca dṛśya vikalpyayoḥ ekīkaraṇam pratyakṣeṇa tasya vikalpya aviṣaya tvāt na api vikalpena tasya dṛśya aviṣaya tvāt atīta ādau ca dṛśya abhāvāt kathantayoḥ ekīkaraṇam 
PVVṬ_171,2	 atra ucyate artha anubhave sati tad saṃskāra prabodhena tat ākāraḥ utpadyamānaḥ vikalpaḥ svākārambāhya abhinnam adhyavasyati na tu abhinnam karoti tena vikalpa viṣayasya dṛśya ātma tayā adhyavasāyāt dṛśya vikalpayoḥ ekīkaraṇam ucyate darśana arhaḥ dṛśyaḥ śakyatā ivā draṣṭum iti vikalpaka darśanasya api yaḥ viṣayaḥ sa dṛśyaḥ tena anāgatasya api arthasya āgama upadarśitasya dṛśya tvam siddhan tathā abhāvasya api atas eva abhāvaḥ pratyayaḥ su ākārambhāva rūpam api padārtha abhāva avyatirekeṇa adhyasya pratyeti iti abhāva viṣayaḥ ucyate na tu abhāvam gṛhṇāti sarva vikalpānām nirviṣaya tvāt 
PVVṬ_171,3	 tad kāritayā ityādi na kevalantad abhiprāya vaśāt vikalpa buddhiḥ sva lakṣaṇeṣu vivekeṣu bhavati iti ucyate tathā tad kāritayā karaṇena atad kāribhyaḥ bhinnān arthān śabdena vaktāraḥ pratipādayantī iti ucyate vyākhyātāropi dṛśya vikalpayoḥ aikyam kim iti na pratipadyante iti ced āha pratibhāsa bheda ādibhyaḥ iti dṛśyasya hi spaṣṭaḥ pratibhāsaḥ na vikalpasya vikalpa anubaddhasya spaṣṭa tva ayogāt ādi śabdāt niruddhepi dṛśye vikalpasya anirodhāt artha kriyāyāḥ karaṇāt akaraṇāt ca tattva cintakāḥ nyāya anusāriṇaḥ vyākhyātāraḥ śeṣa ṣaṣṭhī ceyan tattvasya cintakāḥ iti tattvasya te cintakā na atattvasya iti sambandhi antara vyavaccheda mātra apekṣāyām kriyā kāraka bhāvasya avivakṣita tvāt cintayateḥ vā pacādi ajantasya tattva śabdena ṣaṣṭhī samāsam kṛtvā svārthikaḥ kan pratyayaḥ kṛtaḥ tatotra tṛjakābhyām ityādinā ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pratiṣedhaḥ na aśaṃkyaḥ na abhedam anusandhatte dṛśya vikalpayoḥ iti prakṛte 
PVVṬ_171,4	 yadi ityādi ca udakaḥ pratipattrabhiprāyonuvidhīyate bāhyeṣu sāmānya vyavasthānam tadā anya apohopi sāmānyam mā bhūta kim kāraṇam na hi evam iti anya apohaḥ śabdena codyate iti evam vyavaharttṝṇām na asti pratipattiḥ ā cā ryaḥ pi tulya tāṃkhyāpayan= āha na vai kevalam ityādi evam apratipattiḥ iti anya apoha rūpeṇa tvayā yathā vyakti vyatirikta ādibhiḥ ākāraiḥ iṣṭam sāmānyantathā api na eva pratipattiḥ āśrayāt vyatiriktam vai śe ṣi kā dīnām avyatiriktam sām khyā dī nā mā ādi śabdāt pratyeka parisamāpta tva ādi parigrahaḥ tatra bhedaḥ tāvat sāmānyasya na pratibhāsate eva iha sāmānyam iti buddhi anutpatteḥ abheda īpi vyaktīnām eva pratibhāsaḥ syāt na sāmānyasya bheda abhede ca ubhaya pakṣa bhāvī doṣaḥ syāt na api tad pratyeka parisamāptam yujyate yatas eka vyaktau= eka sambandhyā iva tat syāt na aneka sambandhi na ca evam sāmānyam aneka sambandhi tvāt asya samānāna ambhāvaḥ sāmānyam iti vacanāt 
PVVṬ_172,1	 atha vyakti antareṣu tasya pratyabhijñānāt tad sambandhi tvam evam api bhūta guṇavat ekam aneka sambandhi syāt na pratyeka parisamāptam ekaikasyām vyaktau= aneka sambandhi tvena apratīteḥ pratītau vā tatra aneka vyakti pratibhāsaḥ syāt atha vyakti antarāle apratibhāsanāt pratyeka parisamāptantat ucyate tat kim etāvatā tasya aneka sambandhi tvam ekatra sidhyati na ca sāmānye pratyabhijñānam yujyate iti api uktam tasmāt na tasya pratyeka parisamāptiḥ na api nitya tvam eka tvam vyāpi tvam ca pratibhāsate iti sthitam 
PVVṬ_172,2	 yadi vastu bhūtasya sāmānyasya apohasya ca tulyaḥ pratipatti abhāvaḥ vyavahāre kaḥ tarhi asyāḥ āśrayaḥ iti atas āha kevalam ityādi sva lakṣaṇānām vijātīya rahita tvam anya apohaḥ saḥ abhinna ākārāyāḥ buddheḥ nimitta tvena ucyate kim kāraṇam tasya vijātīya viraha lakṣaṇasya anya apohasya bhinneṣu api sarvatra vastuṣu bhāvāt tathābhūtasya ca anya apohasya sāmānya buddhi hetu tvam pratyavirodhāt tathā hi yathā ekam vṛkṣam avṛkṣāt vyāvṛttam paśyati evam anyam api atas tatra eka ākārā buddhiḥ utpadyate na ca atra bādhakam pramāṇam asti 
PVVṬ_172,3	 tṛtīya kāraṇam āha vyavahārasya ca ityādi tathā darśanāt iti anya apoha nibandhana tvena darśanāt etat ca tad anya parihāreṇa pravarttate iti ca dhvaniḥ ucyate ityādinā pratipādayiṣyate yathā iti eka ākārāḥ iyam vikalpa buddhiḥ pratibhāti tathā bāhyantad sāmānyat na asti iti vākya arthaḥ tatas na vastu bhūtam sāmānyam vikalpa darśana āśrayaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_173,1–173,3	 sāmānya abhāve ca kāraṇam āha yasmāt ityādi vyaktayaḥ sva lakṣaṇāni na anuyanti na miśrībhavanti etena avyatirikta sāmānya abhyupagamaḥ nirastaḥ vyatirikta nirākaraṇa artham āha anyat anuyāyi iti anuyāyi yat iṣṭam bhedebhyonyat sāmānya rūpantad pratyakṣa buddhau na bhāsate nanu vikalpa pratibhāsepi sāmānye bheda abheda pakṣayoḥ ayam ananvaya ādi doṣaḥ tulyaḥ eva iti katham sāmānyam iṣyate samāna ākāraḥ tāvat pratibhāsate eva yāvat asau na budhyate bheda abheda rahitaḥ iti tāvat asya alaṅkāraḥ eva avastu tva pratipādanāt atas eva yathāpratibhāsam tu asau= asti iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_173,4	 anvāviśanti miśrībhavanti yadi parasparam anvāveśaḥ syāt tadā eka rūpa āpatteḥ bheda abhāvaḥ tena kāraṇena sāmānyasya eva abhāva prasaṅgāt tena bhedānām samānānām eka ākāra pratyaya nibandhana tvam dharmaḥ sāmānyam tad bheda abhāvena bhavet iti arthaḥ anyat ca iti vyaktibhyaḥ anyat iti asya vivaraṇam vyatiriktam iti tathā tena rūpeṇa sāmānya buddhau anena upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya sāmānyasya abhāva vyavahāre sādhye svabhāva anupalambhaḥ uktaḥ na ca anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sāmānyam abhyupeyam yasmāt apratibhāsamānam casāmānyam katham ātmanā svena sāmānya rūpeṇa anyam iti sāmānyavantam grāhayet vyapadeśayet vā svena rūpeṇa katham anyam iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ sāmānya balāt vyaktiṣu abhinna abhidhāna jñāna vṛttiḥ iṣṭāḥ tasmāt sāmānyam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam eva iṣṭam iti samudāya arthaḥ evantā vat grāhya lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalambhāt na asti ekam aneka sambandhi 
PVVṬ_173,5	 bhavatu nāma ekam aneka sambaddhan tathā api sāmānya rūpa tā na yuktā iti āha na ca ityādi taiḥ iti vyakti bhedaiḥ uktam iti dvi tva ādi saṃyoga kārya dravyeṣu api sāmānya svabhāva tvam prāpnoti iti aprasaṃgasya ukta tvāt ekam aneka sambaddham iti eva kṛtvā na sāmānyam kintu abhinna abhidhāna pratyaya nimittam eka sāmānyam na sarva dvi tva ādi api tasya yathā ukta śabda jñāna animitta tvāt iti ced katham anyatas sāmānyāt anyatra vyakti bhede sāmānyena eka rūpa tām anāpādite pratyaya vṛttiḥ eka ākāra jñāna vṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_174,1–174,2	 tad sambandhāt iti paraḥ tābhiḥ vyaktibhiḥ sambandhāt anyatopi sāmānyāt anyatra pratyaya vṛttiḥ saṃkhyā ityā cā ryaḥ bhāva lakṣaṇā ca iyam saptamī saṃkhyāyām satyām kārya dravye avayavini sati ādi śabdāt saṃyoga ādiṣu sanna pratyaya vṛtteḥ tepi sāmānyam prāpnuvanti iti samudāya arthaḥ asāmānya ātmaka tvāt saṃkhyā ādīna anta dvalena dravye na eka ākāra pratyaya vṛttiḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_174,3	 nanu saḥ eva ayam sāmānya ātmā vicāryate koyam sāmānya ātmā iti saṃkhyā ādibhyaḥ vivekena sāmānya lakṣaṇasya eva apratīta tvāt na etat vyaktam iti yāvat tat eva āha tatra ityādi tatra koyam sāmānya ātmā iti pṛṣṭe tvayā uktam ekasya anekena sati sambandhe vyaktiṣu abhinna pratyaya vṛttiḥ tatas iti pratyaya vṛtteḥ kāraṇāt aneka sambaddham ekaṃsāmānyam iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam 
PVVṬ_174,4	 atra sāmānya lakṣaṇe asmābhiḥ ucyate aneka sambandhinaḥ vidyante yeṣām kārya dravya ādīnām ādi śabdāt dvi tva ādi parigrahaḥ tebhya upi tad āśraya dravyeṣu eka ākāra pratyaya utpattiḥ syāt kiṅkāraṇam nimitta sambhavāt tathā hi aneka sambandhāt eva nimittāt sāmānyāt eka pratyaya utpattiḥ iṣyate asti ca aneka sambandhi tvam eka pratyaya nimittandravyādiṣu api tatas ca iti eka pratyaya pravṛtteḥ saṃkhyā ādīnām sāmānya ātma tā anyathā iti yathā ukta sāmānya lakṣaṇa yogepi saṃkhyā ādiṣu sāmānya ātma tā yadi na iṣyate anyatra api sāmānya abhimate mā bhūt kim kāraṇam viśeṣa abhāvāt tathā cadravya ādīnām api sāmānya rūpa tā āpattau dravya guṇa ādīnām rūpa saṃkaraḥ buddheḥ eva pratibhāsaiti vikalpa buddheḥ eka ākāra pratibhāsaḥ sāmānyam iti sambandhaḥ sa ca jñāna rūpa tvāt jñāna vat san= ā iva tat uktam 
PVVṬ_175,1–175,2	 sāmānyam vastu rūpam hi buddhi ākāraḥ bhaviṣyati vastu rūpā ca sā buddhiḥ śabda artheṣu upajāyate tena vastu eva kalpyeta vācyam buddhi anapohakam iti tat na ityādinā pratiṣedhati yat tat jñāna rūpam sāmānyam iṣyate tad jñānāt avyatiriktaṃjñāna sva lakṣaṇa vat katham athantarambāhyam brajet na teṣām sāmānyam iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_175,3–175,5	 tat vyācaṣṭe jñānasya ityādi tasya jñāna rūpasya teṣu artheṣu abhāvāt satyam na jñāna rūpasya vyaktiṣu anvayaḥ kintu tasmin buddhi pratibhāse tad bhāva adhyavasāyāt bāhya bhāva adhyavasāyāt tathā bhrāntyā samāna vyavahāra eti ced etat ca iṣṭam eva si ddhā nta vā di naḥ kevalam prakṛtyā eka kāryāḥ vyaktayaḥ atad kāryāt vyāvṛttāḥ tathābhūtāyāḥ vikalpa buddheḥ nimittam iti anya apoha āśrayā sā buddhiḥ iti abhimatam śāstra kārasya 
PVVṬ_175,6	 paraḥ tu evaṃbhūtam nimittam na icchati atas eva siddhānta vādī nimittam eva paryanuyuṃkte tatra ityādi tatra vyakti bhedeṣu avastu bhūteṣu vyaktīnām ca prakṛtyā vijātīya vyāvṛttānām eka kārya tva anicchatataḥ jñāna utpatteḥ kinnibandhanam na eva kiñcid tathā hi paraḥ vijātīya vyāvṛttānām bhedānām eka pratyaya hetu tvat na icchati na ca asti vastu bhūtam sāmānyam anāśrayasya iti animittisya sāmānya jñānasya utpattau sarvatra syāt iti gauḥ iti eka ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ vṛkṣeṣu api syāt 
PVVṬ_175,7	 jñānāt avyatiriktam iti ādeḥ aparam artham āha athavā ityādi pūrvam artha antara śabdena bāhyam uktam adhunā jñāna antaram nirdiśyate atas eva āha katham anyasya punar jñānasya iti kimviśiṣṭasya jñānasya vyakti antara bhāvinaḥ ekasyām go vyaktau yat vikalpa vijñānanta toni atra go vyakti antareṇa samutpannasya vikalpa jñānasya iti arthaḥ tathā hi aneka jñāna vyāpanāt vā sāmānyambhavet bāhya vyakti vyāpanāt vā jñāna pratibhāsasya tu dvayam api asat tat āha tatas ca ityādi vyakti antaram iti bāhyam 
PVVṬ_176,1–176,3	 tasmāt iti upasaṃhāraḥ na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe kenacid iti sāmānya rūpeṇa tathā eṣām grahaṇam iti arthānām samānāḥ iti grahaṇam nanu si ddhā nta vā di nā pyasya vikalpasya nibandhanam vācyam anāśrayasya utpattau sarvatra prasaṃgāt iti āha itaretara bhedaḥ ityādi saṃjñā saṃketa kriyā yad arthikāḥ yaḥ itaretara bhedaḥ arthaḥ phalam pratyāyya tvena yasya iti kṛtvā saḥ evambhūtaḥ itaretara bhedaḥ bhāvānām anyonya vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇa ūsya mithyā vikalpasya bījam saṃjñā saṃketa kriyā yad arthikāḥ yasya itaretara bhedasya pratyāyana phalāḥ 
PVVṬ_176,4–176,5	 yasya ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yasya itaretara bhedasya pratyāyana artham saṃketaḥ kriyate atat sādhyebhyaḥ iti atad kāryebhyaḥ bhinna asādhyān bhāvān bhedena jñātvā tad parihāreṇa iti etat kārya parihāreṇa tad kāryeṣu pravartteta iti kṛtvā saṃketaḥ kriyate soyam yathā uktaḥ itaretara bhedaḥ tasya eka ātma tā pratibhāsinaḥ eka ākārasya mithyā vikalpasya bījam kāraṇam tam eva gṛhṇan= iti bhedam bhinnam iti arthaḥ etat ca adhyavasāya vaśāt ucyate na punar vikalpasya vastu gṛhaṇam asti eṣa vikalpaḥ iti sāmānya ākāraḥ vikalpaḥ sva vāsanā prakṛteḥ iti vikalpa vāsanā svabhāvāt evam iti eka ākāra tayā pratibhāti katham punar bhinnānām sva lakṣaṇānām abhinnam kāryam eka ākāra vikalpa ātmakam yena iti eka kārya tvena tad anyebhyaḥ atad kāryabhyaḥ bhedāt hetoḥ vyaktīnām abhedaḥ iti ucte eka asaṃsargaḥ tad vyatirekiṇām samāna ta iti vacanāt 
PVVṬ_177,1	 prakṛtiḥ ityādinā pariharati prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ eka ākāram pratyabhijñānam eka pratyavamarśaḥ anubhava jñānam artha jñānam eka pratyavamarśaḥ ca artha jñānam ca iti dvandvaḥ pūrva nipāta lakṣaṇasya vyabhicāri tvāt alpa ājtara tvepi artha jñāna śabdasya na pūrva nipātaḥ kṛtaḥ te ādī yasya iti vigrahaḥ ādi śabdāt dahana gṛha ādi kārya grahaṇam eka pratyavamarśa ādiḥ eva ekorthaḥ iti karmadhārayaḥ tasya sādhane siddhau bhedepi nānā tvepi niyatāḥ kecid svabhāvena prakṛtyā indriya ādi vat athavā ekāntena bhedepi sva hetubhyaḥ kecid samānāḥ utpannāḥ kecid asamānāḥ iti etat ca uktantatra ye samānāḥ utpannāḥ te tena svabhāvena eka ākāram pratyayan janayanti vinā api sāmānyena indriya ādi vat tatra eka pratyavamarśa jñāna sādhane niyatāḥ iti etat dārṣṭa antika tvena upanyastam artha jñāna ādi eka artha sādhanaḥ iti etat tu dṛṣṭānta tvena ubhaya siddha tvāt 
PVVṬ_177,2	 atas eva ādau vibhajyate yathā indriyā ityādi yathā indriya āloka manaskārāḥ rūpa vijñānam ekam janayanti iti sambandhaḥ etat vastu bala siddham udāharati ātmā ityādi para siddhānta āśrayeṇa nityam aṇu manaḥ śīghram ca iti aṇu svarūpam manaḥ tad sannikarṣa aityātma indriya manortha sannikarṣāḥ ātmā manasā saṃyujyate manaḥ indriyeṇa indriyam arthena iti vacanāt ātma indriya manorthāḥ ca tad sannikarṣāḥ ca iti dvandvaḥ ātma indriya manorthāḥ yathāsvam sannikarṣa sahāyāḥ vijñānam janayanti iti para abhyupagamaḥ asatī api tad bhāva niyate iti eka kāryatva niyate na hi cakṣuḥ ādīnām cakṣuḥ vijñāna janaka tvam nāma sāmāni ampareṇa iṣṭam 
PVVṬ_178,1	 adhunā dārṣṭa antikam vyācaṣṭe śiṃśapa ādayaḥ iti śiṃśapā khadira nyagrodhāt ayaḥ parasparān anvayepi vṛkṣa tva sāmānya viraha īpi vṛkṣaḥ iti eka ākāram pratyabhijñānam janayanti pratyabhijñānāt anyām vā dahana gṛha ādikām kāṣṭha sādhyām artha kriyām śiṃśapāt ayojanayanti iti prakṛtam yathāpratyayam iti yāvat agni sahakāri pratyaya lābhaḥ tadā dahanam janayanti gṛha anukūla pratyaya saṃpāte gṛham ādi śabdāt ratha ādi kārya parigrahaḥ na tu bheda aviśeṣepi jala ādayaḥ kāṣṭha sādhya artha kriyā samarthāḥ prakṛtyā teṣām atad kārya tvāt atra api dṛṣṭāntam āha śrotra ādi vat rūpa jñānaḥ iti yathā śrotra śabda ādayaḥ rūpa vijñāne karttavye na samarthāḥ ādi śabdāt rasa ādi vijñāne 
PVVṬ_178,2–179,2	 syāt etat bahūnām pratyekam eka kārya karttṛ tvam sāmānyam antareṇa na sidhyati iti atas āha jvarāt ityādi saha iti vyakti antara sahitāḥ pratyekam iti eka eka rūpāḥ jvara ādi śamane ekasmin kārye dṛṣṭāḥ yathā oṣadhayaḥ vā śabdaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭānta apekṣayā na ca aparāḥ dadhitra puṣa ādayaḥ yathā ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na tatra jvara ādi śamane karttavye sāmānyam oṣadhi tvam nāma apekṣante kiṅkāraṇam bhedepi tad prakṛtika tvāt jvara ādi śamana kārya svabhāva tvāt yadi bhedānām asāmarthyam syāt bhavet sāmānya apekṣā na tat avi bheda aviśeṣepi dadhi trapusa ādayaḥ dadhyeva manda jātandadhitrapusam dadhi ca trapusaḥ ca iti dvandvam anye vyācakṣate tāsu guḍūcī vyakti ādiṣu tathābhūtāsu eka kārya kāriṇīṣu kiṃcid iti vyatiriktam avyatiriktam ca tat uktam nirvarttyamānam yat karma jātiḥ tatra api sādhanam sva āśrayasya abhiniṣpattyai sā kriyāyāḥ prayojikā iti tatas eva sāmānyāt tat ekam jvara ādi śamana lakṣaṇam kāryantataḥ ca asiddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_179,3^1	 tat ayuktam iti si ddhā nta vā dī aviśeṣāt sāmānyasya iti eka tvāt nitya tvāt ca aviśiṣṭam sāmānyanti śamana kārya kṛt anyathā sāmānyasya aviśeṣāt tāsām gūḍūcī ādi vyaktīnām kṣetra ādi bhedepi tasya api jvara ādi śamana kāryasya aviśeṣa prasaṃgataḥ cira śīghra ityādi viśiṣṭa kṣetra utpannānām śīghra praśamanam viparītānām cira praśamanam ādi śabdāt ciratara śīghratara ādi parigrahaḥ kṣetra saṃskāra ādi bhinnānām gūḍūcī ādīnām upayogāt dehe ārogya ādi lakṣaṇasya guṇasya tāratamyam ca na syāt sāmānyasya aikyāt atha kṣetra ādi bhedena sāmānyasya viśeṣaḥ iṣyate tadā viśeṣe vā sāmānyasya iṣyamāṇe svabhāva bhedaḥ syāt viśeṣa lakṣaṇa tvāt bhedasya tatas ca svarūpa hānam sāmānya svarūpam ekam hīyate dhrauvyāt ca kāraṇāt sāmānyasya vyaktibhyonupakārataḥ na sāmānyam kārya kṛt iti varttate 
PVVṬ_179,3^2	 yadi hi sāmānyam upakuryāt tadā nitya tvāt sahakāribhiḥ anādheya viśeṣasya anya anapekṣaṇa tvāt sahakārī anapekṣaṇāt tat sāmānyam sva kārya sakṛt janayet atha na janayet tadā tad janana svabhāvam na bhavati ajanana avasthāyāḥ aviśeṣāt kārya kālepi na janayet iti yāvat vyaktīnām tu anityānām kārya kṛt tve na ayam doṣaḥ iti āha vyaktayaḥ tu ityādi saṃskāraḥ jala avaseka ādi viśiṣṭāḥ utpattiḥ yāṃsa antāḥ tathā viśeṣa usya astīti viśeṣa vat kāryam jvara ādi śamana lakṣaṇam na ca tāsu vyaktiṣu yat śīghra kāri tva ādi lakṣaṇam avāntara sāmānyam avasthintad eva viśeṣa vat kārya kārī iti yuktam vaktum oṣadhi anupayogepi puṃsaḥ tad kārya udaya prasaṅgāt tadvat iti viśiṣṭa vyakti vat kecid iti sajātīyāḥ eka pratyabhijñāna ādikam ādi śabdāt ekodaka ādi āharaṇa ādi tat akāribhyaḥ iti pratyabhijñāna ādya kāribhyaḥ bhedāt abhinnāḥ iti ucyante na tu eka sāmānya yogāt 
PVVṬ_180,1–180,3	 kārya dvāreṇa abhedam pratipādya kāraṇa dvāreṇa āha ekena vā ityādi yathā prayatnena ghaṭa bhedāḥ atat janyebhyaḥ iti aprayatna janyebhyaḥ bhedāt abhinnāḥ iti ucyante yadi api pratighaṭam prayatnasya bhedaḥ tathā api eka pratyabhijñāna hetu tvena tasya api ekatvam etat ca uttaratra niścāyayiṣyate kimpunar ityādi paraḥ bhedaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ lakṣaṇam nimittam yasya tena sāmānyenā tad kāryebhyaḥ atad kāraṇebhyaḥ ca vyāvṛttam sva lakṣaṇam samānam iti pratyeyam anyathā anyat eva iti sva lakṣaṇāt anyat vikalpa buddhi parivartti rūpam anartha kriyā kāri tena bheda lakṣaṇena sāmānyena samānam iti pratyeyam nanu tat eṣām buddhi pratibhāsam anurundhānaiḥ buddhi viparivarttinām eva bhāvānām ākāra viśeṣa parigrahāt bahis iva parisphuratām sāmānyam ucyate iti pūrvam ukta tvāt sandeha anuvṛttiḥ eva 
PVVṬ_180,4–181,1^1	 satyam kintu adhikasya doṣasya vidhāna artham upanyāsaḥ doṣa vijñāna artham āha kiṃca atas iti itaraḥ yadi ityādinā praśna abhiprāyam āha yadi sva lakṣaṇam pratyeyaṃkatham vikalpa viṣayaḥ tathā hi vikalpa buddhi abhiprāya vaśāt bheda lakṣaṇam sāmānyam vyavasthāpyate tasyāḥ abhiprāya vaśāt sāmānyam sat prakīrtitam iti vacanāt tathābhūtena ced sāmānyena sva lakṣaṇam samānam pratyeyam tadā vikalpasya viṣayaḥ syāt na ca etat yuktam atha anyat eva buddhi parivartti rūpam samānam iti pratyeyam atra api doṣam āha 
PVVṬ_180,4–181,1^2	 anyatas vā katham artha kriyā na hi buddhi pratibhāsi rūpāt artha kriyā sambhavati tatas ca atad kāribhyaḥ bhedāt abhinnāḥ iti ucyante iti kārya dvāreṇa sāmānya vyavasthā na ghaṭate yatas ca buddhi parivartti rūpam samā anantataḥ sva lakṣaṇe ca anitya tva ādi sāmānyasya apratīteḥ atādrūpyam anitya ādi rūpa tvam sva lakṣaṇasya na bhavet sva lakṣaṇe ca anitya tva ādīnām apratīteḥ teṣām ca anitya tva ādī nām avastu dharma tā na ityādinā pariharati buddhi pratibhāsinī ā iva rūpe sāmānya ādi vyavahāraḥ iti ayam pakṣaḥ gṛhītaḥ tat āha jñāna pratibhāsini arthaḥ ityādi 
PVVṬ_181,2	 etat ca grahaṇaka vākyam asya eva vyākhyānam yat etat jñānam vikalpakam iti anena sambandhaḥ atad viṣayam api vastu svabhāva viṣayam api tat viṣayam iva sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam iva adhyavasita tad bhāvam āropita bāhya bhāvam svarūpam yasya tat tathā yatas ca adhyavasita tad bhāvam atas sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam eva iti manyate adhyavasita tad bhāva svarūpa tvam eva katham iti ced āha tad anubhava ahita vāsanā prabhava prakṛteḥ iti tasya sva lakṣaṇasya yonu bhavaḥ tena āhitāḥ vāsanā tatas prabhavaḥ utpādaḥ tasya sāmānyasya sā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ yena adhyavasita bhāva svarūpambhavati iti arthaḥ abhinna kāryāḥ ye padārthāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ eka ākāra pratyaya jñāna hetavaḥ tebhyaḥ paramparayā prasūteḥ abhinna artha grāhī iva pratibhāti na tu sāmānya vastu bhūtam kiṃcid vyatiriktam avyatiriktam vā asti yat tat gṛhṇīyāt paramārthataḥ tu tad anya bheda sama ākāram tebhyaḥ sajātīya abhimatebhyaḥ anye vijātīyāḥ tebhyaḥ bhedaḥ bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ saḥ eva parama arthena samānaḥ ākāraḥ yasya iti vigrahaḥ tatas eva tasya utpatteḥ tad nivarttana tvāt ca tad anya bhedaḥ tasya samānaḥ ākāraḥ iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_181,3	 tatra anantara ukte jñāne ekaḥ iva iti sarva vyakti anugataḥ iva tad kārī iva iti artha kriyā kārī iva kim punar tathā pratibhāti iti ced āha vyavahāriṇām ityādi tathā adhyavasāya iti vikalpa aṃśam eva bāhya tvena eka tvena artha kriyā kāri tvena adhyavasāya vyavahāriṇām pravṛtteḥ vyavahāribhiḥ iti anye paṭhanti vyavahāribhiḥ iti adhyavasāya iti anena pūrva sambandhāt tṛtīyā eva kṛtā na tu ṣaṣṭhī na loka avyaya niṣṭheti ṣaṣṭhī pratiṣedhāt anyathā iti yadi vikalpa aṃśe bāhya adhyavasāyaḥ na bhavet tadā tathābhūte vikalpe jātā ipi artha kriyā kāriṇī pravṛttiḥ na syāt tat api vikalpa pratibimbakam vyavaharttṛ puruṣa adhyavasāya vaśāt artha kriyā kāritayā pratibhāsate tatas ca tad atad kāribhyaḥ bhinnam iva vikalpa prativimbakam eva tattvam kasmāt na iti ced āha na ca ityādi tad vikalpa prativimba kan na tattvam na vastu kiṅkāraṇam anartha kriyā kāri tvena parīkṣāyāḥ vyabhicārasya anaṅga tvāt etat ca anantaram eva pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ 
PVVṬ_182,1	 tatra ye sva lakṣaṇa dvārāḥ yātāḥ artha ākārāḥ vikalpa buddhau pratibhānti te a rtha avikalpa buddhi pratibhāsinaḥ tena bheda lakṣaṇena sāmānyena samānāḥ iti gṛhyante kutaścid vyāvṛttāḥ iti vijātīya vyāvṛttyā tathā hi vikalpa pratibhāsinā upi vṛkṣa bhedāḥ adhyavasita bāhya rūpa tvāt avṛkṣebhyaḥ vyāvṛttāḥ iva bhāsante tathā anyā iti na sva lakṣaṇantena samānam iti gṛhyate iti liṅga vacana vipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ kiṅkāraṇam tatra sāmānya pratibhāsini vikalpe sva lakṣaṇa apratibhāsanāt 
PVVṬ_182,2	 evantā vat buddhi pratibhāsinī arthe sāmānya vyavahāraḥ uktaḥ saṃprati sāmāna adhikaraṇya vyavahāram āha te eva ityādi te eva vikalpa pratibhāsinorthāḥ kutaścid vyāvṛttāḥ iva santaḥ yathā anutpalāt vyāvṛttāḥ utpalabhedāḥ te eva punar anyata upya nīlāt vyāvṛttimantaḥ pratibhānti tatas ca vyāvṛtti dvaya anugatasya ekasya eva dharmiṇaḥ pratibhāsanāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam 
PVVṬ_182,3	 ayam ca anantara anukrāntaḥ buddhi pratibhāsiṣu artheṣu sāmānya sāmāna adhikaraṇya vyavahāraḥ mithyā arthaḥ eva kriyate kim kāraṇam svayam asatām api vikalpa ākārāṇān tathāḥ eka ākāra anugata tvena vyāvṛtti dvaya anugatena dharmma svarūpeṇa vikalpa buddhyā upa eka ākāreṇa pratibhāsanāt sāmānya vyavahāraḥ aneka ākāreṇa ca ekasya pratibhāsanāt sāmāna adhikaraṇya vyavahāraḥ 
PVVṬ_183,1	 yadi mithyā arthaḥ eva sarvaḥ vikalpaḥ kasmāt kṛtaka tva ādi dvāra āyātāḥ anityān ātma ādi vikalpāḥ pramāṇam nityāḥ vikalpāḥ tu na iti atas āha sarvaḥ ca ayam ityādi sarvaḥ viplavaḥ iti sambandhaḥ viplavaḥ bhrāntiḥ ayam iti sāmānya ādi rūpaḥ sva lakṣaṇānām eva yat darśanantena āhitāḥ yā vāsanā tad kṛtaḥ paramparayā sarva vikalpānām vastu darśana dvāra āyāta tvāt tathā hi nitya ādi vikalpāḥ api vastu darśanena eva utpannāḥ sadṛśa apara apara utpatti darśana āyāta tvāt tatra tulye sarva vikalpānām vastu darśana dvāra āyāta tve tad pratibaddha janma nāmanitya ādi vikalpānām atad pratibhāsi tvepi sva lakṣaṇa apratibhāsi tvepi vastuni avisamvādaḥ adhyastasya anitya ādi rūpasya vastuni vidyamāna tvāt kevalam sva lakṣaṇa rūpeṇa na pratibhāsate iti vikalpaḥ vibhramaḥ ucyate maṇi prabhāyām iva maṇi bhrānteḥ maṇi svarūpa agra hepya visamvādaḥ maṇi prabhāyāḥ maṇau pratibaddha tvāt prabhā āśrayeṇa ca maṇi bhrānteḥ utpatteḥ 
PVVṬ_183,2	 na tu evat = itya ādi vikalpāḥ teṣām vastu darśana dvāra āyāta tvepi vastuni avidyamānasya eva ākārasya samāropāt tat āha na anyeṣām ityādi anyeṣām nitya ādi vikalpānām vastuni samvādaḥ iti anena sambandhaḥ tad bheda prabhave satyapi iti artha abhedāt utpādepi sati iti arthaḥ yathā dṛṣṭaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ kṣaṇika tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tasya anusaraṇam niścayam parityajya kiñcid sāmānyam iti vyatiriktasya avyatiriktasya vā sāmānyasya grahaṇena viśeṣāt tasya sthira tva ādeḥ samāropāt dīpa prabhāyām ivabhāsura tva ādi sāmyāt pravṛttāyāḥ maṇi buddheḥ na maṇi vastu samvādaḥ pāramparyeṇa api adhyavasite maṇau= apratibaddha tvāt yatas ca mithyā arthāḥ eva vikalpāḥ tena na vikalpa viṣayeṣu artheṣu artha kriyā kāri tvam tatas ca yat uktam anyatas vā katham artha kriyā iti tad siddham sādhyate 
PVVṬ_183,3	 kathantarhi atad kāri vī ava= cheda lakṣaṇam sāmānyam vikalpa viṣayeṣu artheṣu vyavasthāpyate iti ced na bahis iva parisphuratām eka artha kriyā kāritayā tad akāribhyaḥ bhinnānām iva pratibhāsanāt yat ca uktam sva lakṣaṇe ca anitya tva ādi apratīteḥ atādrūpyam iti tad parihāra artham āha na api ityādi calāt vastunaḥ yasmāt na anitya tvad nāma kiñcadasti yena asambaddhāt sva lakṣaṇasya anitya tvena ayogaḥ syāt kintu calam eva vastu nityam sva lakṣaṇasya eva anitya rūpa tvāt evam anātma ādi api draṣṭavyam tena pratyakṣeṇa sva lakṣaṇe gṛhyamāṇe anitya tvam gṛhītam eva kevalam bhrānti nimitta sadbhāvāt aniścitam atas tad niścaya mātre anumāna vyāpāraḥ tena tat niścayaḥ eva sva lakṣaṇe anitya tva pratītiḥ iti siddham 
PVVṬ_184,1	 yadi sva lakṣaṇam eva anityam katham anityoyam arthaḥ anitya tvam asya iti vā dharmi dharma rūpa tayā pratītiḥ iti atas āha kṣaṇa ityādi sva lakṣaṇasya tathābhūtasya iti cala rūpasya kṣaṇa apratyupasthāna tayā eka kṣaṇa sthāyi tvena grahaṇāt uttara kāla mantya kṣaṇa darśinām etat evambhavati anityoyam ityādi bheda antara apratikṣepa vivakṣāyām anityoyam iti bheda antara pratikṣepa vivakṣāyām anitya tvam asya iti evam dharmi dharma bhāva pratītiḥ bhavati 
PVVṬ_184,2	 vikalpa kalpita tvāt katham bāhye dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ iti atas āha tad dharmatām ityādi tad dharmatām sva lakṣaṇa dharma tām eva avatarantaḥ sva lakṣaṇam adhyavasyantaḥ vikalpāḥ iti arthaḥ vyāvṛtti bhede kṛta saṃketa śabda anusāreṇa nānā rūpāḥ eka rūpāḥ ca dharmāḥ te ca vyatirekāḥ ca iti dvandvaḥ nānā dharmān anitya kṛtaka tva ādīn ekam dharmam bahūnām ghaṭa ādīnām anitya tvam vyatirekaḥ ca ghaṭa ādīnām anitya tvam iti darśayanti vastuni iti adhyāhāraḥ na ca vikalpa vyavasthā aṃpitat nāna eka dharma ādi kantattvam vikalpasya avastu grāhi tvāt atas eva āha darśayanti iti 
PVVṬ_184,3^1	 avastu grāhi tvāt tarhi te nirāśrayāḥ prāpnuvanti iti ced āha na ca te iti na iti nānā dharma ādi darśakāḥ vikalpa vastu bhedasya anitya ādi rūpasya sva lakṣaṇasya yat darśanam anubhavaḥ tad āśraya tvāt vikalpānām tathā hi paramārthataḥ anitya ādi rūpam sva lakṣaṇam dṛṣṭvā darśana sāmarthya bhāvinaḥ vikalpāḥ dṛṣṭa ākāra adhyavasāyena pravarttante yatas ca yathādṛṣṭasya eva abhilapanena pravarttante vikalpāḥ anitya ākārāḥ na artha antarat nitya tva ādi vikalpa vat anusaranti tatas yat uktam teṣām ca avastu dharma tā iti parihṛtambhavati iti āha na iti teṣām anitya tva ādīnām na avastu dharma tā kim kāraṇam tad svabhāvasya eva tathā anitya ādi dharma tayā khyāteḥ pratibhāsanāt adhyavasāyāt iti yāvat yadivastu dharmaḥ eva anitya tva ādikam khyāti kaḥ tarhi vikalpa kṛtaḥ vibhramaḥ iti āha vastunaḥ tu ityādi ekasya vastunaḥ nānā rūpeṇa grahaḥ bahūnām ca eka tvena dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca vyatirekeṇa grahaḥ vibhramaḥ bhrāntaḥ iti arthaḥ kim punar kāraṇam eka tva ādi grahaḥ vibhramaḥ iti āha tasya ekāneka ityādi 
PVVṬ_184,3^2	 eka kārya kāriṇaḥ ghaṭa ādi bhedasya eka udaka ādi āharaṇa ādi kārya kāriṇaḥ tathā bhāva jijñāsāsu eka kārya karttṛ tva jijñāsāsu tathā abhāva khyāpanāya eka kārya kāri tva khyāpanāya tathā akṛta sthiti tvāt ghaṭa ādinā eka rūpeṇa vyavahāra lāghava artham vyavasthāpita tvāt tathakasya api anekārya kāriṇaḥ yathā ghaṭasya cakṣuḥ vijñāna udaka dhāraṇa kādācitka jñāna ādi kārya kāriṇaḥ tathā abhāva jijñāsāsu tathā abhāva khyāpanāya aneka kārya tva khyāpanāya tathā akṛta sthita tvāt cākṣuṣa pārthivān ityādi rūpeṇa vyavasthāpita tvāt evam anyatra api yathāyogam vācyam na vastu bhedāt ekasmin padārthe aneka dharma vyavasthāpanam kiṅkāraṇam tasya eva ekasya vastunaḥ aneka tva ayogāt tatas ca ekasya aneka tva grahaḥ vibhramaḥ iti ākhyātam tathā anekasya api ekatva vyavasthā apanantat akārya vyāvṛtti dvāreṇa eva na vastu abhedāt iti āha anekasya ca eka tva ayogāt iti tathā ca anekasya ekatva grahaḥ vibhramaḥ evam dharma dharmiṇoḥ vyatireka graha upi bhrāntaḥ eva kiṅkāraṇam vyatiriktasya ca sāmānyasya prāk eva niṣedhāt vyaktayaḥ na anuyanti anyat iti ādinā 
PVVṬ_185,1	 dharmiṇaḥ sakāśāt vyatiriktāḥ eva dharmāḥ tatas ca yathāvastu śabda arthaḥ bhaviṣyati iti āha teṣām ityādi teṣām anitya tva ādīnām dharmāṇām prakṛteḥ svabhāvasya bhedāt kāraṇāt yathāvastu śabda artha abhyupagame nīlotpalam anityaḥ śabdaḥ ityādi sāmāna adhikaraṇyā yogāt nīla ādi guṇānām utpala ādi jātīnāñca parasparam svabhāva bhedāt tad vācinām śabdānām ekasmin= adhikaraṇe vṛttiḥ na asti iti sāmānādhikaraṇyā yogaḥ tasmāt na yathāvastu śabda artha vyavasthā iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_186,1^1	 tad upādheḥ iti ādinā para abhiprāyam āśaṃkate te nīla ādayaḥ dharmāḥ upādhiḥ yasya dravyasya tasya ekasya dvābhyām guṇa jātibhyām abhidhānāt adoṣaḥ sāmāna adhikaraṇya abhāva doṣaḥ na asti uttaram āha anupakāriṇī ityādi upādhi tvena abhimatānām nīla ādīnām dharmāṇām anupakāra kandravyam na hi nīla guṇasya utpala tva jāteḥ vā dravyeṇa upakāraḥ kaścid kriyate tatas ca anupakāriṇi dravye tad anādheya vṛttīnām nīla ādīnāṃpāra tantrya ayogāt nīla ādayaḥ dharmāḥ anupādhiḥ pāratantrya abhāvāt anyathā asya ayam upādhiḥ iti eva na syāt 
PVVṬ_186,1^2	 atha iṣyate dravya viṣayam pāratantryam dharmāṇānta dā pāratantrī epi dravya janya tvam aṅgīkarttavyam anyathā dravya pāratantrya ayogāt janakam ca kṣaṇikameṣṭavya makṣaṇikasya artha kriyā yogāt tatas ca kārya abhimatānām upādhīnām kāraṇa abhimatasya ca dravyasya saha anavasthiteḥ kāraṇāt dvayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ vastu rūpayoḥ yugapadanabhidhānam kāraṇa abhimatasya viśeṣasya tadānīm nirodhāt ekasya iti viśiṣṭasya api upādhimataḥ adhyāhāraḥ upadarśanantadāḥ na vastu viṣayaḥ śabda arthaḥ syāt buddhi āropitasya eva viśeṣasya śabdena abhidhānāt 
PVVṬ_186,2–186,3	 syāt matam yat vinaṣṭam viśeṣyantat viṣayasya śabdasya bhavatu buddhi pratibhāsa viṣaya tvam yaḥ punar san= ā iva upādhiḥ tad vācinaḥ śabdasya vastu viṣaya tvam eva astu iti ced āha buddhi pratibhāsā ityādi buddhi pratibhāsaḥ viṣayaḥ yasya abhidhānasya tat tathā tad bhāvaḥ tasmin sati sarvam viśeṣaṇa viṣaya abhimatam api abhidhānantathā eva vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsa viṣayam eva astu kim kāraṇam tathā bhinna upādhimataḥ nānā viśeṣaṇavataḥ ekasya grahaṇe buddha avabhāsanāt tathā hi upādhimataḥ vinaṣṭasya adhyāhārikā vikalpa buddhiḥ aṅgīkarttavyā tadā ca upādhimatas abhāve upādheḥ api abhāvaḥ pāratantrya abhāvāt bhinna upādhimate ekasya apratibhā āsane kutas sāmānādhikaraṇyam yadā tu viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ dvayoḥ api vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsi tvam iṣṭanta dā kalpita dharma dvaya gṛhīta eka dharmi pratibhāsini ekā eva buddhiḥ jāyate iti aviruddham sāmānādhikaraṇyam 
PVVṬ_186,4	 upakārya ityādinā para abhiprāyam āśaṃkate adoṣaḥ yoyam ekasya buddhyā adhyāhāraḥ ityādinā uktaḥ upādhimatā sama kālasya niṣpanna rūpasya upādheḥ pāratantrya abhāvāt anupādhi tvam prāk pāratantrī anta deva upādhi tvam iti ced āha na ityādi na hi aniṣpannasya śaśa viṣāṇa tulyasya pāratantryam upādhi tvam vā sarvathā sataḥ asataḥ ca asat pāratantryam iti hetoḥ kalpanā āropitam upādhīnāmpāratantryam kṛtvā pāratantrya vyavahāre sarvathā iti sarveṇa prakāreṇa yathā pāratantrya vyavahāre buddhiḥ anuvidhīyate tathā viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya vyavahāre sā eva āropikā buddhiḥ kinna anuvidhīyate tad anuvidhānam hi nyāyyam buddhi sandarśita artha pratibhā sam anāśritya vyavaharttum aśakyatvāt vastunaḥ ekena śabdena pramāṇena ca viṣayīkaraṇe vastu balāt vastu svabhāva bhūta aśeṣa dharma ākṣepāt tad anyasya śabda ādeḥ vaiyarthyam ca yat prāk uktam ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya ityādi 
PVVṬ_187,1–187,2	 va stu vā di pakṣe tad buddhi pratibhāsa anurodhena syāt kim kāraṇam buddhi pratibhāsasya nirvastuka tvāt vastu sāmarthya bhāvinān doṣāṇām aprasaṅgaḥ bahuvacanena etat āha na kevalam tad anya vaiyarthya doṣasya aprasaṅgaḥ tathā vyatiriktasya sāmānyasya abhāvaḥ upādhīnām ca pāratantrya ayogāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tva abhāvaḥ bhinna upādhimate ekasya buddhau= apratibhāsanāt sāmānādhikaraṇya abhāvaḥ ca yaḥ uktaḥ teṣām api atra sambhavaḥ na asti iti tat eva āha tat abhinnam ityādi tathā hi tad buddhi pratibhāsi rūpam abhinnam pratibhāti tasmāt sāmānyam yathā pratītiḥ na virudhyate iti vacana pariṇāmam kṛtvā vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ nīlam iti ukte anīla vyāvṛttyā nīlatvasya ekasya ākārasya viṣayīkaraṇepi vikalpa buddhyā tatra eva nīla ākāre saṃśaya vyāvṛttiḥ na ākāra antare tatas tad buddhi pratibhā asi rūpam aniścita ādi ākāram anutpala vyāvṛtta utpala ākārasya aniścayāt yasmin= ākāre niścayaḥ na utpannaḥ tad ākāra antarantatra sākāṃkṣaya utpala śabda prayogāt utpannayā buddhyā grāhyaṃpratibhāti iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_187,3–188,1	 etena viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya nimittam uktam sāmāna adhikaraṇasya āha bhinna ityādi bhinnasya śabda arthasya nīlotpala lakṣaṇasya upasaṃhāre pratipādanepi dharma dvaya upagṛhītam abhinnam eka dharmitayā buddhi pratibhāsa rūpam vikalpa buddhau pratibhāti iti kṛtvā sāmānya ādīni yathāprati iti na virudhyante tena yat ucyate bha ṭṭe na anya nivṛtti mātram apoham gṛhītvā anīla ādi vyāvṛttau= anutpala ādi vyāvṛtteḥ abhāvāt anutpala ādi vyāvṛttau ca ānīla ādi vyāvṛtteḥ abhāvāt ca na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ tayoḥ dharmayoḥ tad abhāvāt ca na tadā abhidhāyakayoḥ śabdayoḥ śabdayoḥ api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ na api sāmānādhikaraṇyam śabda vācyayoḥ bhinna tvāt na api yatra arthe apohayoḥ bhāvaḥ tad dvārakam sāmānādhikaraṇyam avastu tvena apohasya ādheya tva abhāvāt na ca sva lakṣaṇam śabda viṣayonyat ca adhikaraṇam na iṣyate na ca sva lakṣaṇa īpohayoḥ bhāvepi śabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam eka viṣaya tvasya apratīteḥ iti apāstam 
PVVṬ_188,2–188,3	 bāhya bhinnasya su a ākārasya śabda ādi viṣaya tvena iṣṭa tvāt tena nīlotpala ādi śabdeṣu śabda artha abhidhāyitvam iṣyate eva iti sarvam sustham dharma dharmi bheda upyasya buddhi pratibhāsasya yathā pratītiḥ na virudhyate iti vacana pariṇāmena sambandhaḥ tam eva aneka ityādinā āha anekasmāt arthāt buddhi pratibhāsasya alīka tvāt kutas neka artha bhedaḥ kevalam puruṣa adhyavasāya vaśāt evam ucyate tasya buddhi pratibhāsasya ekasmāt arthāt yaḥ bhedaḥ tasya vidhi pratiṣedha jijñāsāyām kim anityaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati cākṣuṣaḥ na bhavati iti tat eva buddhi pratibhāsa bhūtam vastu pradarśyate iti sambandhaḥ kena prakāreṇa iti āha pratikṣiptā ityādi 
PVVṬ_188,4	 yat vā dharma dharmi bheda upyasya vastunaḥ na virudhyate iti sambandhaḥ kutas iti āha anekasmāt arthāt bāhyasya bheda sambhave sati tasya ekasmāt yaḥ bhedaḥ tasya vidhi pratiṣedha jijñāsāyām kim anityaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati cākṣuṣaḥ na bhavati iti tat eva bāhyam vastu pradarśyate iti sambandhaḥ kena pradarśyate iti āha pratikṣiptā ityādi dharma śabdena saṃcodya vyatiriktam dharmam iva vyavasthāpya iti sambandhaḥ tathā hi anitya tvat na cākṣuṣa tvam iti dharma śabdena codane kṛte vyatiriktaḥ iva anitya tva ādikaḥ dharmaḥ vyavasthāpitaḥ bhavati kiṅkāraṇam iti āha tathā buddheḥ pratibhāsanāt dharma śabdena codane vyatiriktasya eva dharmasya grāhiṇyāḥ buddheḥ pratibhāsanāt aviśeṣeṇa iti sarva bheda apratikṣepeṇa aparamasya bāhyasya apratikṣipta bheda antaram svabhāvam dharmi tayā vyavasthāpya śabdena pradarśyate 
PVVṬ_189,1	 etat uktam bhavati dharma śabdena saṃcodya vyatiriktam dharmam iva pradarśya punar ddhami śabdena saṃcodya aparam svabhāvam dharmi tayā vyavasthāpya tat eva bāhyam vastu pradarśyate anitya tvam śabdasya na cākṣuṣa tvam anityaḥ na cākṣuṣaḥ śabdaḥ iti bhāva bhāvā aṅśena iti bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepeṇa dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedāt bhedavatī iva buddhiḥ vikalpikā pratibhāti bhinna ākārā iva na tu vastunaḥ bhedaḥ na vastu bhedāt bhedavatī buddhiḥ kutas yathā ukta doṣāt anupakāriṇi dharmiṇi dharmāṇām pāratantrya ayogāt 
PVVṬ_189,2–189,3	 tathā sādhyam anitya tvam sādhanam kṛtaka tvam iti sādhya sādhana bhedaḥ ca iti atas āha tathābhūta ityādi tathābhūtānām pratikṣipta bheda antarāṇām dharma bhedānāmbāhulya codanayā vacana bhedaḥ sādhya sādhana bhedaḥ ca kriyate iti sambandhaḥ tasya tatas tatas vyāvṛttasya vastunaḥ svabhāvaḥ samāśrayaḥ yeṣāntaiḥ ddharma pratibhāsa bhedaiḥ vikalpa buddhi prativimbaiḥ ddharma ātmakaiḥ pratibhāsa bhedaiḥ iti arthaḥ kimartham kriyate iti āha tad svabhāva ityādi tasya eva vyāvṛttasya vastu svabhāvasya pratipattaye prāptaye vā 
PVVṬ_189,4	 praṇālikayā teṣām vastu pratibandhāt prakṛtasya eva arthasya sukha grahaṇa artham saṃgraha ślokam āha tad svabhāva ityādi tasya vastu svabhāvasya anubhavāt u urddhvam yā dhīḥ prajñāyate vikalpikā api śabdaḥ bhinnakramaḥ anarthikā api tad arthā iva vastu viṣayā iva adhyavasāya vaśāt atad kāryebhyaḥ yaḥ bhedaḥ tad niṣṭhā tad anubhava bala utpatteḥ vyāvṛttasya ca vastunaḥ samvādāt tad niṣṭhā iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_189,5	 tasyām ittham bhūtāya ambuddhau yortha ākāraḥ dṛśya vikalpayoḥ ekīkaraṇāt bāhyam iva sajātīyāsu vyaktiṣu samam pratibhāsamānam ekam iva anyatas vijātīyāt vyāvṛttam iva ābhāti tat tu vyāvṛttam eva buddhi rūpasya alīka tvāt tat buddhi rūpam nistattvaṃniḥsvabhāvam kiṅkāraṇam parīkṣā anaṅga bhāvataḥ artha kriyā samartham eva parīkṣā aṅgam ataḥ parīkṣā anaṅga bhāvena artha kriyām pratyasamartha tvāt iti uktam bhavati yatas ca buddhi pratibhāsi rūpat nistattvam atas tat viṣayaḥ vyavahāraḥ mithyā arthaḥ eva pravarttate iti āha 
PVVṬ_190,1	 arthāḥ ityādi jñāna viśiṣṭāḥ iti vikalpa buddhi ārūḍhāḥ te jñāna viśiṣṭa assantaḥ yatas vijātīyāt vyāvṛtti rūpiṇaḥ vyāvṛtti rūpavantaḥ yathā anutpalāt vyāvṛtti rūpiṇaḥ utpala arthāḥ tena iti antataḥ vyāvṛtti rūpeṇa utpala tvena abhinnāḥ iva ābhānti na paramārthataḥ buddhi rūpasya alīka tvāt etena sāmānya vyavahārasya nimittam uktam vyāvṛttāḥ punar anyatas te eva iti te eva jñāna viśiṣṭāḥ arthāḥ anyatas vyāvṛtti rūpiṇaḥ santaḥ punar anyatas sajātīyāt api vyāvṛttāḥ bhānti yathā te eva nīla bhedāḥ anīlāt atas ca vyāvṛtti dvaya upagṛhītasya ekasya arthasya bhāsanāt 
PVVṬ_190,2	 sāmānādhikaraṇya bīja m uktam tat eva āha teṣām ityādi teṣām iti buddhi pratibhāsinām arthānām vyavahāraḥ pratanyate iti sambandhaḥ teṣām iti vyavahāra apekṣā karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ mithyā arthaḥ kaiḥ karaṇa bhūtaiḥ iti āha sāmānya ityādi samāna ādhāra tvam samāna ādhāraḥ bhāva pradhāna tvāt nirdeśasya sāmānya viṣayaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya viṣayaiḥ ca jñāna abhidhānaiḥ sāmānya gocaraiḥ sāmānya vyavahāraḥ pratanyate itaraiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyavahāraḥ 
PVVṬ_190,3	 yadi api śabda jñāna ātmakaḥ eva iha vyavahāraḥ tathā api sa vya apāra tām upādāya jñāna śabdayoḥ karaṇa rūpa tā tayoḥ eva artha prakāśa lakṣaṇā kriyā vyavahāra tvena vivakṣita iti adoṣaḥ yathā jñānasya pramāṇa tvam phala tvam vā iti sa ca sarvaḥ jñāna abhidhāna lakṣaṇaḥ vyavahāraḥ padārthānām sva lakṣaṇānām yonyonya abhāvaḥ paraspara vyacchedaḥ tad saṃśrayaḥ vyāvṛtta padārtha anubhava dvāreṇa utpatteḥ tena iti anyonya abhāva saṃśraya tvena sa vyavahāra unya apoha viṣayaḥ ucyate na tu anyavyāvṛtti viṣaya tvāt vidhi viṣaya tvāt asya vyavahārasya 
PVVṬ_191,1	 vastu lābhasya ca vastu prāpteḥ ca āśrayaḥ na bhavati vyavahāraḥ na ca sarvaḥ kintuyatra vyavahāre asti pāramparyeṇa tathābhūta vastu sambandhaḥ udāharaṇam āha yathā ukta anumitau yathā iti yathā ukta anumitiḥ pūrva ukta anumāna vikalpaḥ na anyatra sthira ādi vikalpe tatra pāramparyeṇa api vastu sambandha abhāvāt vastunaḥ asthira ādi rūpa tvāt anumāna vikalpasya itarasya ca sva pratibhāsenarthe artha adhyavasāyat bhrānti sāmya īpi dīpa tejaḥ maṇau yathā iti yathā maṇi tejasi maṇi buddhiḥ bhrāntāḥ tathā dīpa tejasi apitulyepi bhrānta tve maṇiprabhā maṇi tvena gṛhītā maṇau= adhi gantavye samvādikāḥ na tu dīpa tejaḥ tadvat sthira ādi vikalpaḥ samvādakaḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_191,2	 yadi jñāna niviṣṭānām eva arthānām sāmānya ādi vyavahāraḥ bāhyeṣu artheṣu tarhi sāmānya ādi vyavahāra abhāvāt pravṛttiḥ na syāt iti atas āha tatra ityādi tatra śabdaḥ vākya upanyāse nirddhāraṇe vā tatra vyaktiṣu eka kāryāḥ vyaktayaḥ nirddhāryante aneka upyeka kāryaḥ yathā ghaṭa bhedāḥ eva udaka āharaṇa ādi kāryāḥ tat akāryāya tathābhūta kāryanukurvate tebhyaḥ nyatā vyāvṛttiḥ sā āśrayaḥ yeṣām jñāna abhidhānāt taiḥ aneka upi padārthaḥ ekatvena vyavahāram pratāryate sāmānya vyavahāram prāpyate iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_191,3	 tathā iti anantara sāmānya vyapekṣayā ekopi aneka kārya kṛt yathā ghaṭaḥ ca cakṣuḥ vijñāna udaka āharaṇa ādi kārya kṛt tad bhāva dīpane aneka kārya karttṛ tva prakāśane atad kāryebhyaḥ bhedena hetunā nānā dharmā ghaṭaḥ cākṣuṣaḥ pārthivaḥ ityādi tena sāmānādhikaraṇya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva vyavahāraḥ ca bāhyeṣu eva darśitaḥ 
PVVṬ_191,4	 yadi bāhyeṣu sāmānya ādi vyavahāraḥ pāramārthikaḥ tarhi prāptaḥ iti āha yathā pratīti kathitaḥ iti vikalpa buddhi anurodhena śabda arthaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇaḥ parama artha tosā vasan= api yathā pratīti kathitaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca yathāpratīti kathitam yasmāt vastuni asya śabda arthasya sāmānādhikaraṇyasya ca na sambhavaḥ 
PVVṬ_192,1–192,2	 dharma dharmi vyavahāraḥ ca jñāna pratibhāsinī arthaḥ iti yat prakṛtantad saṃgraha artham āha dharma ityādi ayam dharmaḥ ayam dharmī iti vyavasthā anantayoḥ ca bhedaḥ asya ayam dharmaḥ kṛtaka tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ abhedaḥ kṛta koyam iti yādṛśaḥ ayam ca vikalpa āropita tvāt asamīkṣita tattva arthaḥ anapekṣitaḥ tattva arthaḥ vastu arthaḥ yena iti vigrahaḥ yathā loke buddhi ārūḍha upyadhi avasita tad bhāva tayā pratīyate tam dharma ādi vibhāgan tathā eva iti yathāloka pratītiḥ sādhya sādhana saṃsthitiḥ vidvadbhiḥ avakalpyate iti sambandhaḥ kimartham parama artha avatārāya anitya ādi vastu svabhāvasya avagāhanāya 
PVVṬ_192,3	 kim punar kāraṇam eka tva ādi vyavahārasya vastuni asambhavaḥ iti āha saṃsṛjyanta aityādi pāramārthikāḥ arthāḥ svatas na saṃsṛjyante tatas na sāmānya vyavahāraḥ vastuni na bhidyante kṛtaka tva ādi dharmaiḥ pratyekam tasya vastunoneka tva ayogāt atas ca teṣu artheṣu bahuṣu rūpam ekam ekaṃsmin= arthe anekam rūpam yat adhyavasīyate tad buddheḥ vikalpikāyāḥ upaplavaḥ bhrāntiḥ yatas ca na saṃsṛjyante na bhidyante pāramārthikāḥ arthāḥ 
PVVṬ_192,4	 tatas kāraṇāt sāmānyam idam bahūnām tathā dharmāṇām dharmiṇām ca bhedaḥ iti apiyoyambhedaḥ nānātva vyavahāraḥ sa bauddherthe na bāhye sva lakṣaṇe buddhi pratibhāsasya alīka tvāt kathantarhi tatra sva lakṣaṇe kṛtaka tva ādi dharma bhedaḥ iti ced āha tasya eva ca ityādi tasya eva sva lakṣaṇasya anya vyāvṛttyā dharma bhedaḥ prakalpyate 
PVVṬ_192,5	 kasmāt kalpita dharma bheda dvāreṇa gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ na vastu darśana mātreṇa iti atas āha sādhya ityādi idam sādhyam idam sādhanam iti asmin saṃkalpe vastu darśana hānitaḥ yat vā pratyakṣa vat anumānena sāmānya viśiṣṭam sva lakṣaṇam eva kasmāt na gṛhyate iti atas āha sādhya ityādi sādhya sādhana saṃkalpe vastu darśana hānitaḥ kutas sva lakṣaṇasya sāmānya viśiṣṭasya grahaṇam bhedaḥ sāmānya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ grāhyaḥ iti ācārya di gnāḥ ga prabhṛtibhiḥ sāmānya saṃsṛṣṭasya sva lakṣaṇasya grahaṇam pratijñātam iti āśaṅkām apanayan= āha bheda etyādi bhedaḥ sāmānya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ pratīyate iti atra api vacane grāhyam na sva lakṣaṇam eva nirdiṣṭam iti naivamba uddhavyam iti arthaḥ kintu bāhyāḥ eva bhedāḥ tena anya apoha lakṣaṇena sāmānyena saṃsṛṣṭāḥ adhyavasīyante na tu gṛhyante iti tatra api boddhavyam 
PVVṬ_193,1–193,2	 anye tu bhedaḥ sāmānya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ grāhyaḥ iti pulliṅgena paṭhanti tatra ayam arthaḥ bhedaḥ sāmānya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ grāhyaḥ iti atra api vacane na sva lakṣaṇam boddhavyam kimpunaḥ kāraṇantatra eva boddhavyam iti ced āha samāna ityādi anekasmin= eka ākāraḥ samāna ākāraḥ ekasmin= aneka dharma tvam bhinna ākāraḥ ādi śabdāt dharma dharmya ākāra parigrahaḥ na tat sva lakṣaṇam grāhyam kathaṃcana kim kāraṇam tatra ekasmin sva lakṣaṇe kṛtaka tva anitya tva ādi rūpeṇa bahu bhedānān dharmāṇām kimviśiṣṭānāmbhedānām vastu rūpāṇa an tatra ekasmin sva lakṣaṇe ayogāt na hi ekasya vastu rūpāṇi bahūni yujyante niraṅśa tvāt sva lakṣaṇasya 
PVVṬ_193,3–193,4	 upasaṃharan= āha tad rūpam ityādi tat tasmāt rūpam sva lakṣaṇam sarvatas bhinnam asādhāraṇan tathā tena asādhāraṇena rūpeṇa tasya sva lakṣaṇasya na pratipādikā śrutiḥ śabdaḥ na asti kalpanā vā asti na iti prakṛtam asādhāraṇena svarūpeṇa sva lakṣaṇasya grāhakaḥ na asti iti arthaḥ kim kāraṇam sāmānyena eva śabdasya kalpanāyāḥ ca vṛttitaḥ tad pratipādikā na śrutiḥ asti iti bruvatā sva lakṣaṇe śabdāḥ na niyujyante iti uktam atas codayati 
PVVṬ_193,5	 kimpunar ityādi saṃketena viṣayīkṛtāḥ saṃketinaḥ tam āhuḥ śabdāḥ vyavahārāya saṃketaḥ smṛtaḥ tadā vyavahāra kāle tat sva lakṣaṇat na asti yatra saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ ekasya api sva lakṣaṇasya kṣaṇika tvāt kāla antare tena eva rūpeṇa anugamaḥ na asti akṣaṇika tve vā saṃketaḥ jñāna abhāvāt eva tad viṣaya tvasya kāla antarenu gamaḥ na asti kim uta deśa kāla bhinneṣu sva lakṣaṇeṣu tena kāraṇena tatra sva lakṣaṇe saṃketaḥ na kriyate iti adhyāhāraḥ 
PVVṬ_194,1–194,2	 na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe api nāma iti kathannu nāma prāk iti saṃketa kāla kṛta sambandhasya śabdasya iti sambandhaḥ ekatra ekassiman sva lakṣaṇe paścāt iti vyavahāra kāle kiṅkāraṇam na yuktam iti āha tasya ityādi tasya iti saṃketa kāla dṛṣṭasya vyavahāra avasthāna ādiṣu deśa kāla bhedeṣu anāskandanāt anugamāt na hi ekatra dṛṣṭaḥ bhedonyatra sambhavati 
PVVṬ_194,3–194,4	 vyatiriktam iti vai śe ṣi kaḥ darśanena avyatiriktam sām khya darśanena samāna jātīya vyakti vyāpanāt vyāpi sāmānyam tat tasmāt na vyavahāra kāla abhāva doṣaḥ vyavahāra kāle śabda arthasya abhāva doṣaḥ na asti sāmānyasya śabda artha tvāt tasya eva eka tvena saṃketa vyavahāra kālayoḥ vidyamāna tvāt katham nāma iti asmin= arthe api śabdaḥ vyavahāra kāle śabdāt uccaritāt artha kriyā kṣamān arthān vijñāya tad sādhanāya artha kriyā sādhanāya kathat nāma pravarttata pumān iti anena abhiprāyeṇa artheṣu saṃyojyante abhidhāyakāḥ śabdāḥ 
PVVṬ_194,5	 na khalu iti ādinā vyācaṣṭe phala nirapekṣam kvacid tātparya vyasanam yat ayaṃlokaḥ saṃketayan saṃketam akurvāṇaḥ saṃketiterthe śabdān prayuñjānaḥ vā sarve eva itiśābda unyaḥ vā avadheyaḥ grahaṇa arhaḥ ārambhaḥ vyavahāraḥ phala arthaḥ na tu niṣphalaḥ kiṅkāraṇa niṣphala ārambhasya prekṣā pūrva kāribhiḥ upekṣaṇīya tvāt agrāhya tvāt tat iti tasmāt ayam pratipattā kvacid abhimaterthe niyuñjānaḥ saṃketayan phalam eva īhitum yuktaḥ iti prayojanam eva apekṣitum arhati iti yāvat tat ca iti phalam iṣṭasya āpti lakṣaṇam aniṣṭasya ca tyāga lakṣaṇam iti yathāyogam sambandhaḥ yena iṣṭā aniṣṭa prāpti parihāra rūpaḥ eva puruṣa arthobhipretaḥ tena ayam puruṣaḥ tayoḥ iṣṭayoḥ phalayoḥ sādhanam asādhanam ca artham jñātvā tatra iṣṭa sādhane pravṛttim aniṣṭa sādhane ca nivṛttim kuryām kārayeyamvā parān iti anena abhiprāyeṇa śabdāt niyuñjīta prayoktā śrotā api niyoge vā ādriyeta 
PVVṬ_195,1–195,3	 yuktantā vat param vyavahārayeyam iti śabda niyogaḥ śabda niyogasya para aṅga tvāt svayantu pravṛtti nivṛtti kāraṇe kaḥ śabdasya upayogaḥ satyam kevalam śabda prayoga abhyāsāt svayam api pratipadyamānaḥ kadācid evam pratipadyate iti upanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ anyathā upekṣaṇīya tvāt iti phalam antareṇa śabda niyogasya upekṣaṇīya tvāt tatra evam vyavasthite nyāye jātiḥ anartha kriyā yogyā atas na śabda viṣayāḥ tat vyācaṣṭe na hi ityādi na jātiḥ vāha doha ādikam karttum samarthāḥ tatas ca vāha doha ādi arthinaḥ jāti codanā niṣphala iti na tad arthaḥ śabda prayogaḥ 
PVVṬ_195,4	 yā api sva pratipatti lakṣaṇa artha kriyā jāteḥ upavarṇṇyate na tad arthampuruṣaḥ pravarttate śabda prayogāt eva tasyāḥ siddha tvāt jāti mātra pratipatti artham śabda prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced atas āha na vā ityādi tādṛśam iti vāha doha ādi prakaraṇam niṣphalasya śabda prayogasya upekṣaṇīya tvāt iti ukta tvāt jātau ca vācyāyām satyām gām ānaya iti atra vākyena vākya artha pratītiḥ syāt go tvasya kriyā tvenvaya abhāvāt na api lakṣita lakṣaṇayā vākya artha pratītiḥ apratīteḥ na hi padebhyaḥ tāvat sāmānyānām pratītiḥ punar tebhyaḥ viśeṣāṇām viśeṣebhyaḥ ca anvayasyā iti evam vilambita rūpā vākya artha pratītiḥ 
PVVṬ_195,5–196,3	 nanu apohepi vācye katham bāhya artha pratītiḥ nīrūpa tvāt apohasya na ca jñāna aṃśeśabda niveśaḥ yuktaḥ anartha kriyā kāritvāt sattyam kevalam artha kriyā kāri tvena eva pratibhāsanāt tatra śabda niveśaḥ yuktaḥ iti pratipādayiṣyate na tu evam api tasya jñāna aṅśasya sva lakṣaṇa tvāt katham śabda vācya tvam atra ucyate bāhya abhinnaḥ tāvat sva aṅśaḥ vikalpe pratibhāsate eva na tāvat asya vikalpa grāhya tvāt pratibhāsaḥ sarva ātmanā niścaya prasaṅgāt anabhyupagamāt ca 
PVVṬ_196,4	 na api vikalpena bāhya ātma tayā adhyavasāyaḥ eva asya grahaṇam yathā avasthitena svarūpeṇa agrahaṇāt agrahaṇe ca kathantatra pratibhāsaḥ jñāna sva lakṣaṇa tve tu sva aṃśasya samvid svabhāva tvāt pratibhāsaḥ yuktaḥ tena avidyā rūpasya sva aṃśasya vikalpasya ca yadi jñāna sva lakṣaṇa tvam na iṣyate tadā pratibhāsa eva na syāt evam ajñāna rūpeṇa ca vikalpena katham sva aṅśasya paricchedosya jñāna dharma tvāt tasmāt jñāna sva lakṣaṇa tvāt eva sva aṃśasya vikalpe pratibhāsaḥ sa bāhya abhinnaḥ vikalpa viṣayaḥ vyavasthāpyate tasya samvidita rūpasya eva bāhya abhedena vikalpena adhyavasīyamāna tvāt atas eva vikalpaḥ sāmānya viṣayaḥ ucyate na sva lakṣaṇa viṣayaḥ artha sva aṃśayoḥ ekasya api svarūpeṇa agrahaṇāt tena sva aṃśasya jñāna sva lakṣaṇasya api bāhya ātma tayā adhyaḥ tasya sāmānya rūpa tvam tathā ca vakṣyati 
PVVṬ_196,5–196,7	 jñāna rūpa tayā artha tve sāmānye ced prasajyate tathā iṣṭa tvāt apohi artha rūpa tvena samāna ta iti pra vā tasya ca śabda vācya tvam yuktam eva lakṣita lakṣaṇa ityādi paraḥ satyam na sāmānyam artha kriyā kāri kintu vyaktiḥ eva kevalam vyakteḥ aśakya codana tvāt kāraṇāt sāmānye niyuktaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyam lakṣayati tena sāmānyena śabda lakṣitena sambandhāt vyaktiḥ api lakṣyate iti 
PVVṬ_196,8–196,9	 tat etat apratītikam na hi go śabdāt uccaritāt go tvam pratīyate gauḥ api tu gauḥ eva avasīyate na nāma evantathā api ucyate aśabda codita ityādi yadi nāma jāti tad vataḥ ssambandhaḥ tathā api aśabda codite vyakti viśeṣe katham pravarttate na eva daṇḍa daṇḍinaḥ ssati api sambandhe na hi kaścid prekṣā pūrva kārī daṇḍan śindhī iti ukte daṇḍinañchinatti aśabda codita tvāt tathā jātau coditāyāṃ vyaktau pravṛttiḥ na yuktā iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_196,10	 jātau vāha doha ādīnām asambha vāda śabda coditāyām api vyaktau pravṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced āha na api ityādi kevalam artha antara sambhavi kāryam asambhavinī arthe codayan vaktā pratipādyasya asambaddha pralāpī syāt na punar tatas samarthāt coditāt samarthe pravṛttiḥ balīvarda doha codanā vat na hi kenacid balīvardan dogdhi iti ukte tatra dohāsambhavāt balīvardāt anyatra sambhavāyām gavi dogdhum pravarttate śrotā kevalantasya evambhavatya sam vaktā iti 
PVVṬ_197,1–197,4	 syāt matam valīvarda codane sambandha abhāvāt mā bhūt strī gavyām pravṛttiḥ jātau tu coditāyām sambandhāt tad vyaktau pravṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati iti āha na ca ityādi artha antarasya sāmānyasya sambandhasya api codanena arthānta nanu aśabda codite sati api sambandhaḥ ityādinā uktaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ satyam adhika vidhāna arthantu punar prastāvaḥ tat eva pūrvapakṣayati aniyata ityādi aniyataḥ sambandhaḥ yasya daṇḍasya sa tathā uktaḥ tathā hi daṇḍinam antareṇa api daṇḍe vidyate tad bhāvaḥ tasmāt tatra iti daṇḍini na iti ced iti daṇḍe codite pravṛttiḥ na bhavati iti arthaḥ jātau tu coditāyām niyata sambandhāt vyaktau pratītiḥ bhavati iti bhāvaḥ tat ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī tat iti aniyata sambaddha tvam tulyam jātau= api 
PVVṬ_197,5	 katham iti ced āha vyaktīnām ityādi syāt etat yathā bhrātṛ ādi śabdāḥ sva artham abhidadhānāḥ dvitīyam ākṣipanti tathā jāti śabdāḥ iti atas āha bhrātṛ ādi śabdāḥ tu ityādi ādi śabdāt putra ādi śabdāḥ sambandhi śabda vācya tvāt sambandhi antara apekṣā eva teṣām vyavasthāpita tvāt iti yāvat ākṣipeyuḥ param iti dvitīyam bhrātṛ ādikam ākṣepaḥ ca dvitīya sambandha ākāra vikalpa jananam na tu upasthāpanam eva vinaṣṭepi sambandhini vikalpa utpatteḥ na tathā iti vaidharmya kathanam yadi sambandhi vācinyaḥ syuḥ tadāyan doṣaḥ syāt iti āha apeta ityādi apetāḥ vinaṣṭā vyakta yassambandhi tvena yāsām pā ṇḍa vā di jātīna antāsām api tat śrutibhyaḥ jāti vācakebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ nityam apeta vyakti sambandhi tvena api anugama prasaṃgaḥ evam hi apeta vyakti sambandhi tvena tāsām anugamaḥ yadi apetānām api vyaktīnām anugamaḥ syāt yat vā jātīnām sambandhibhyaḥ yāḥ apetāḥ vyaktayaḥ tāsām tad śabdebhyaḥ nityam anugamana prasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_198,1–198,2	 sarvadā ityādi paraḥ sarvadā iti vyakti apāya anaṣāya kālayoḥ tad sambandha yogya tā pratīteḥ iṣṭam eva vyakti anugamanam iti ced etat kathayati yathā bhrātṛ ādi śabdāḥ sva artham abhidadhānāḥ sambandhi nama viśeṣaṇāt kṣipanti tathā jāti śabdāḥ api iti uttaram āha sarvadā iti sarvadā iti vyakti apāyā anapāya kālayoḥ go śabdāt apravṛttiḥ vāhadodādi yogye vyakti viśeṣe kiṅkāraṇaṃ= iti ced āha sahita ityādi saptamī dvivacanam etat jāteḥ vyakti sahitā sahita avasthayoḥ viśeṣeṇa artha kriyā kṣamasya viśeṣasya anākṣepāt etat uktam bhavati yathā atīta anāgata vyakteḥ śabda artha rūpa tayā jāti śabdena ākṣepaḥ tathā varttamānāyāḥ vyakteḥ ubhayatra śabda artha rūpa tayā pratibhāsanasya aviśeṣaṇāt iti 
PVVṬ_198,3–198,4	 vyakti sambandhinyāḥ jāteḥ codanāt vyaktau pratītiḥ na prāpnoti iti ayama doṣaḥ iti ced bhavatu evam kintu sā api vyaktiḥ tad viśeṣaṇa tvena jāti viśeṣaṇa tvena jāti codanāyām ākṣiptā eva iti na jātiḥ kevala abhidheyāḥ kintu tat vā anabhidheyaḥ syāt iti pakṣa antara parigrahaḥ syāt tatra ca anantaram eva doṣam vakṣyāmaḥ iti ākūtam 
PVVṬ_198,5–198,6	 jāti tadvatoḥ sambandham abhyupagamya etat uktam sambandhaḥ eva tu na asti iti āha na ca ityādi kim kāraṇam anyonyamparasparam ajanya janaka tvena anupakārāt tatas iti sambandha abhāvāt jāti codanayā vyakteḥ lakṣaṇam api uktam phala abhāvāt iti artha kriyāyāḥ abhāvāt vyakti abhinna sāmānya vādinā upi pratyakṣa vat śābde jñāne vyakti pratibhāsaḥ syāt bheda aṃśena tu tasya api lakṣaṇam ayuktam evam ityādinā pakṣa antaram āśaṅkate tat vān iti jātimān alam iti samarthaḥ tatra iti tadvati sa ca iti si ddhā nta vā dī 
PVVṬ_198,7–199,2	 asya eva vyākhyānam sa ca śabdaḥ ityādi tatra iti vyaktau kim anyena sāmānyena vyavadhinā vyavadhāyakena kalpitena ānantyāt ca iti paraḥ idam ānantyam samam iti uttaram etat eva vyācaṣṭe syāt etat ityādinā tadvatī api iti jātimatī api yasmāt jātya ādi viśiṣṭāḥ satyaḥ vyaktayaḥ eva vaktavyāḥ iti hetoḥ avaśyantatra iti vyaktiṣu śabdasya sambandhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kasmāt akṛta sambandhasya anabhidhānāt karttari ṣaṣṭhī kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ yasya śabdasya tena anabhidhānāt iti arthaḥ karmaṇi vā ṣaṣṭhī akṛta sambandhasya vā arthasya śabdena anabhidhānāt sa ca iti sambandhaḥ tadvatā saha na śakyam karttum ānantyāt tasmāt ayukta uyampakṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_199,3–199,4	 tad sambandhini vyakti sambandhini sāmānye śabdasya sambandha karaṇāt hetoḥ tatra api jāti sambandhibhyām vyaktau sambandhaḥ kṛtaḥ eva iti ced uktam atra uttaram sāmānyasya sati api sambandhe ekatra jātau kṛtāt saṃketāt anyatra vyaktau= apratītiḥ na ca jāti tadvatoḥ sambandhoḥ ti iti etat ca uktam na hi sati api sambandhe daṇḍa śabdāt daṇḍini pratipattiḥ tathā na ca jāti tadvatoḥ kaścid sambandha usti iti samprati ukta tvāt 
PVVṬ_199,5	 evantā vat sarva bhāvāḥ ityādinā vā rtti kaḥ kā raḥ sva abhimatam vidhi śabda liṃga viṣayam ākhyāya saṃprati yena abhiprāyeṇa ācārya di gnāḥ ge na bheda lakṣaṇam sāmānyam uktantaddarśayitum pṛcchati api ca ityādi evam manyate yathā go śabdāt apratīyamāne go tve go śabdaḥ saṃketyate tathā tad kāriṇām vivakṣita artha kriyā kāriṇa āma tad kāribhyaḥ ye vivakṣita artha kriyā kāriṇaḥ na bhavanti tebhyaḥ yaḥ bhedaḥ tena sāmānyam sarveṣa an tad kāriṇā ām a tad kāribhyaḥ bhinna tvāt atas tasmin bheda sāmye anya apoha lakṣaṇe kinna kṛtaḥ kasmāt saṃketaḥ na kṛtaḥ iti pṛcchati param etat eva āha yām artha kriyām ityādi dāha pāka ādi lakṣaṇasya arthasya kriyām niṣpattim adhikṛtya abhipretya ayam puruṣortheṣu abhipreta artha kriyā kāriṣa śabdāt niyuṅkte prayuṅkte tad kāriṇām abhipreta artha kriyā kāriṇām anyebhyaḥ atad kāribhyaḥ bhedāt kāraṇāt tad kāriṇaḥ sarva vijātīya vyāvṛttāḥ abhinnāḥ bhavanti tataeṣām arthān āntatra eva abhedaḥ iti anya vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇe kinna śabdaḥ prayujyate vyāvṛtti viśiṣṭasya api saṃketa vaśāt pratītiḥ syāt iti praśna abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_200,1–200,2	 tadvat ityādi jātimat pakṣe yaḥ doṣaḥ ācārya di gnāḥ ge no ktaḥ tadvataḥ na asvatantra tvāt ityādinā yaḥ tadvat doṣaḥ tasya sāmyāt tasya doṣasya avatārāt bhedenyavyāvṛtti lakṣaṇe śabdaḥ na niyujyate astvayandoṣaḥ iti abhyupagacchati na eva ayan doṣa usti iti pratipāditam abhyugamya tu evam uktam jātiḥ alamparā jātiḥ tu anyā na yuktā iti arthaḥ syāt ityādinā vyācaṣṭe anyasmāt atatkāriṇaḥ vyāvṛttepi vastuni śabda arthebhyupagamyamāne tadvataḥ iti vyāvṛttimataḥ na tadvat pakṣāt asya vyāvṛttimat pakṣasya viśeṣaḥ etat eva āha kaḥ hi ityādi tvayā vyāvṛttiḥ iti uktam pareṇa jātiḥ ityādi atra vācye kaḥ viśeṣaḥ na eva kaścid anyatra śabda bhedāt 
PVVṬ_200,3	 astu nāma iti si ddhā nta vā dī jātiḥ anyā iti vastu bhūtā kimpunaḥ tulye doṣe vyāvṛttiḥ aṅgīkriyate na vastu bhūtā jātiḥ iti āha jātim api hi ityādi tad abhāva eti vyāvṛtti abhāve asyai api iti vastu bhūtāyāḥ jāteḥ bhāvānām bheda abhāve satyaneka artha samaveta rūpāyāḥ jāteḥ abhāvāt na ca jātyā bhedaḥ kriyate iti uktam tasmāt avaśyambheda ubhyupagantavyaḥ sa ca ekasmāt atat kāryāt bhedaḥ tad anyeṣān tasmāt atad kāryāt anyeṣa antad kāryāṇām abhedaḥ tad viśiṣṭeṣu abheda viśiṣṭeṣu pratipattiḥ astu pratipatti ālambana tvāt pratipattiḥ iti uktaḥ na punar saḥ eva pratipattiḥ karaṇa sādhanaḥ vā pratipatti śabdaḥ pratipadyante anayā vyāvṛttyā karaṇa bhūtayā bhāvān iti kṛtvā 
PVVṬ_201,1	 sarvathā iti yadi vyāvṛtti viśiṣṭaḥ jāti viśiṣṭaḥ vā arthaḥ vācyaḥ tadvat pakṣa uditaḥ yathā ānantyādi doṣaḥ tad parihārasya karttum aśakyatvāt tulyaḥ ced doṣaḥ jātiḥ eva kasmāt na abhyupagamyate iti ced āha artha antara ityādi artha antaram vastu bhūtā jātiḥ bhinneṣu abhinna pratyaya jananam jāteḥ prayojanam iti ced āha tad arthasya iti jāti sādhyasya anyena iti atad kārya vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇena abhedena jātyā api hi sorthaḥ sādhyate iti kasmāt jāti tyāge vyāvṛtti abhyupagamaḥ iti atas āha tat ityādi tad abhyupagamasya iti vyāvṛtti abhyupagamasya tad anabhyupagame hi jāti kalpanā eva na syāt iti uktam 
PVVṬ_201,2–201,3	 adhunā śabdena avaśyam vyāvṛttiḥ codanīyā iti atas āha api ca ityādi vivakṣitāt arthāt anyaḥ tasya parihāreṇa śrotā pravarteta iti kṛtvā dhvaniḥ ucyate pratipādakena cakāraḥ eva śabdasya arthe bhinnakramaḥ ca tad anya parihāreṇa iti asya anantaram draṣṭavyam tena iti dhvaninā tebhyaḥ iti anabhimatebhyaḥ tasya abhimatasya arthasya avyavacchede avyavacchedena abhidhīyamānaḥ iti arthaḥ katham śrotā pravartteta iti śabdam ityādinā etat eva vyācaṣṭe eṣa vaktā artheṣu abhimata artha kriyā kāriṣu aniṣṭa parihāreṇa anabhimata artha vyavacchedena pravartteta katham nāma śrotā iti anena abhiprāyeṇa prayuṅkte 
PVVṬ_201,4–202,1	 yadi śabdena anya vyavacchedaḥ na codyeta tadā tatra pratyāyya abhimate anyatra ca iti anabhimatepravṛttiḥ anujñātā bhavati tasyām ca satya antasya abhimatasya arthasya yat nāma abhidhānantasya grahaṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt tathā hi ānayā iti ukte vastu mātram ākṣiptantatra anabhimata vyavacchedāya agni śabdaḥ prayujyate agnim ānaya iti yadi tu tasmin= api prayukte anagni ānayanam na vyavacchinnantadā agni śabdena uccāritena na kiṃcid prayojanam ānaya iti anena api anānayanasya pratikṣepāt ānayanam anānayanam ca anujñātam syāt atas pravṛtti nivṛttyā anujñāyām ca satya antad nāma grahaṇa vaiyarthya prasaṃgāt iti pūrveṇa eva sambandhaḥ evam ekasya abhimatasya agni ādeḥ ekasya ca ānayana ādi lakṣaṇasya anuṣṭhānasya yā codanā tasyāḥ anādarāda vacanam eva śabdānām syāt anya vyāvṛtti anabhidhāne sati athavā pravṛtti nivṛtti anujñāyām iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhanīyam yathā ukta vidhinā pravṛtti nivṛtti anujñāyām ca eka codanā anādarāt ekasya pravṛtti lakṣaṇasya nivṛtti lakṣaṇasya vā vyāpārasya codanā anādarāt iti śeṣam pūrvavat vyākhyeyam 
PVVṬ_202,2	 evam ca śabda vyavahāra ucchedaḥ syāt na ca evantasmāt avaśyam ityādi sa ca iti anya vyavacchedaḥ tad anyeṣu iti tasmāt atad kāryāt anyeṣu eka kāryeṣu abhinnaḥ sarveṣām atad kāryāt vyāvṛtta tvāt iti kṛtvā aneka artha vyāvṛtti tvam jāti dharma upyasti vyavacchedasya tam iti vyavacchedaṅa kim viśiṣṭam niyatam abhyupagamaḥ yasya sa tathā tad anabhyupagame jāteḥ abhāva prasaṅgāt niyatam codanam abhidhānam yasya tat tathā tat acodane śabda prayogasya naiṣphalyam syāt vyaktiṣu buddhi śabdayoḥ anugama lakṣaṇaḥ jāti arthaḥ tasya prasā prasādhyate anena iti kṛtvā evaṃbhūtam vyavacchedam parityajya artha antarasya sāmānyasya kalpanam kevalam anartha nirbandha evā avastu abhiniveśaḥ eva kevalam na anyat kiñcita kāraṇam asti iti arthaḥ kiṅkāraṇam yathā kalpanam nitya vyāpita ādya kāraiḥ asya sāmānyasya ayogāt iti anyavyāvṛtti abhidhāne ayam abhiprāyaḥ ācārya di gnāḥ ga sya 
PVVṬ_202,3–202,4	 na ityādi paraḥ na vai na kriyate eva śabdena vyavacchedaḥ kintu kriyate eva kimarthantarhi jātiḥ uktā iti atas āha pravṛtti ityādi artha kriyā arthinaḥ hi yā pravṛttiḥ tasyāḥ viṣayaḥ jātiḥ tam kathayadbhiḥ asmābhiḥ jātiḥ uktāḥ vyavaccheda ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī asya śabdasya abhidheyaḥ vyavaccheda usti ced asya vā jātimataḥ vyavacchedaḥ śabda vācyā usti ced nanu etāvat anya vyavacchedena iṣṭa pravarttanam prayojanam śabdānām iti kṛtvā tatra iti vyavacchedena iṣṭa pravarttane karttavye tatra vā pravṛtti viṣaye kim sāmānyena apareṇa vaḥ prayojanam 
PVVṬ_203,1	 nanu ityādi paraḥ uktam ityā cā ryaḥ tathā hi iti ayukta tva pratipādanam sā iti jātiḥ artha kriyām pratyasāmarthyāt na pravṛtti yogyā jātiḥ na api go śabdāt jātiḥ pratīyate niveditam etat iti tatra anartha kriyā yogyāḥ jātiri pra satya ādinā jāti dvāreṇa ca dravye artha kriyā samarthe puruṣasya pravṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced āha tad dvāreṇa ityādi aśabda codite sati api sambandhe katham pravartteta ityādinā jāti dvāreṇa tadvān eva codyate iti ced āha tadvat codanaḥ ityādi vyavadhānam uktam iti liṅga pariṇāmena sambandhaḥ sāmānyena tatra vyavadhānam iti uktam sa ca sākṣāt na yojyate kasmāt kintatra anyena vyavadhāna ityādinā 
PVVṬ_203,2–204,1	 syāt matam na jātiḥ kevalāḥ vyaktiḥ vā śabda āśrayāḥ pravṛtteḥ āśrayaḥ kevalāyāḥ jātarertha kriyā āyām asāmarthyam vyakteḥ ca kevalāyāḥ aśakya codana tvāt tasmāt jāti tadvantau sahitau pravṛtti viṣayaḥ tayoḥ eva samastayoḥ śabda artha tvam iti atas āha jāti tadvatoḥ ityādi pravṛtti viṣaya tvaḥ iti śabda āśrayāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ viṣaya tvebhyupagamyamāne vyāvṛtti ta dvantau kinneṣyete pravṛtti viṣaya tvena iti adhyāhāraḥ pramāṇa siddhau hi vyāvṛtti ta dvantau= iti bhāvaḥ vyāvṛtteḥ śabda bhūtāyāḥ buddhi parikalpita tvāt avastu tvam atas vāha doha ādi artha kriyāṃpratyasādhana tvāt na pravṛtti viṣaya tvam iti ced tat etat asādhana tvaṃjāteḥ tulyam sā api vāha doha ādau= asamarthāḥ tadvataḥ iti jāti matā urtha kriyā sādhanāt pravṛtti abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ doṣaḥ na bhavati iti ced tulyam ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī tat iti artha kriyā sādhana tvam 
PVVṬ_204,2^1	 evantā vat pratibandhaka nyāyena avidyamānāyāḥ api vyāvṛtteḥ sadbhāvam abhyupagamya śabda artha tvam uktam ācārya di g nā gena iti vyākhyāya punar vidhim eva śabda artham āha ava ca ityādi yadi avastu viṣayaḥ katham artha kriyā arthinam puruṣam pravarttayati iti ced āha sa vibhrama ityādi saḥ iti śābda pratyayaḥ vibhrama vaśāt puruṣam pravarttayati vibhramaḥ eva katham iti āha akārakepi sva pratibhāsā irtha kriyā yogya tvāt kārakaḥ bāhyorthaḥ tat adhyavasāyī yatas kathantarhi anumāna ādeḥ vastu samvādaḥ iti atas āha vastu samvādaḥ ityādi tasmin sādhye pratibandhe sati pratibandhaḥ eva kutas vastu utpattyā sādhya vastu utpattyā hetu bhūtayā anyathā iti asati pratibandhe na eva asti samvādaḥ śabda ādeḥ pratyayasya vastu utpatteḥ abhrāntiḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_204,2^2	 syāt etat yadi vastunaḥ ca utpadyate vastu samvādi śābda ādi jñānam iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhim manyate na etat evam sati api vastu utpatta avatat pratibhāsinaḥ vastu rūpā pratibhāsinaḥ tad adhyavasāyāt vastu adhyavasāyāt bhrānti tvam tatas vastu rūpa utpatti bhrāntyoḥ virodha abhāvāt sandigdha vyatirekitāḥ hetoḥ iti bhāvaḥ maṇiprabhāyāmmaṇi bhrāntiḥ maṇim samvādayati eva vyabhicāram eva samarthayan= āha vitatha ityādi etat āha yadi bhrānteḥ samvādasya ca virodhaḥ syāt tadā bhrānteḥ avastu samvādanam sādhyam pratyavyabhicāraḥ syāt sa ca na asti yasmāt vitatha pratibhāsaḥ bhrānti lakṣaṇam na visamvādane tat na antarīyaka tayā iti vastunā antarīyaka tayā tatas utpatteḥ iti yāvat ayam samvādaḥ na pratibhāsā apekṣī na vastu gatampratibhāsam apekṣate vastu pratibaddha tvena eva atad pratibhāsasya api samvādāt 
PVVṬ_204,3–205,1	 tasmāt sthitam etat vitatha pratibhāsi api śābdaḥ pratyayaḥ sati vastu pratibandhe tasya samvādakaḥ iti atha punar yathāvastu eva śābdaḥ pratyayaḥ iṣyate tadā vastuni bāhye yathābhāvam yathāvastu arpita cetasaḥ āropita jñānasya śabda bala ādi anyathā vastu utpanna jñānasya iti yāvat evam pravṛttau= abhyupagamyamānāya antasya śābdasya jñānasya sāmānyam grāhyam eṣṭavyam sva lakṣaṇe śabdena codanā bhāvāt tasya ca grāhyasya sāmānyasya anartha kriyā yogya tvāt hetoḥ apravṛttiḥ tasmin vikalpa vijñāna viṣaye sāmānye anyatra iti sāmānyāt anyatra vyakta avaśabda coditāyām api pravṛttau= ati prasaṅgaḥ go śabdāt aśva vyaktau= api pravṛttiḥ syāt go tva sāmānyasya aśva vyakteḥ ca sambandha abhāvāt na evam iti ced na aśabda codite sati api sambandhe pravṛtti ayogāt ityādi uktam 
PVVṬ_205,2	 atha na kevalā jātiḥ śabdena coditā iti kintu tat vān iti tadā tadṛbhyupagamyamāne sāmānya vaiyarthya ādayaḥ proktāḥ vyaktiṣu eva sākṣāt śabdaḥ niyujyatām kim sāmānyena iti sāmānya vaiyarthyam uktam ādi śabdāt ānantyādi doṣa parigrahaḥ jātiḥ eva śabdena codyate sā tu jātiḥ vyakti samaveta tvāt na śakyate kevalā gṛhītum ataḥ vyakti rūpeṇa ekībhūtā gṛhyate tat eva aśaṅkate jāti ityādi śliṣṭa ābhāsā iti sva sāmānya lakṣaṇābhyām sambhinna ābhāsā buddhiḥ artha kriyā kāriṇyām vyaktau pravarttayati iti ced tadā na jātiḥ na tadvān svena rūpeṇa gṛhyate iti adhyāhāraḥ kiṅkāraṇam ekasya api sāmānyasya tadvataḥ vā yā svabhāva sthitiḥ asaṃsṛṣṭam rūpam tasya śliṣṭa ābhāsayā bhrāntayā buddhyā agrahaṇāt tatas ca bhrāntāyāḥ buddheḥ pravṛtti abhyupamagāt para vādaḥ eva anya apoha vādi darśanam eva 
PVVṬ_205,3–205,4	 evam ityādi paraḥ anvayinaḥ iti aneka vyakti gamyasya sāmānyasya na eṣa doṣaḥ iti si ddhā nta vā dī ādi śabdāt udaka āharaṇa antānta ambhedepi paraspara vyāvṛtta tvepi vastu dharma tayā tām tām jñāna ādikām sadṛśīm artha kriyām kurvataḥ dṛṣṭvā tad anyebhyaḥ tad kāryebhyaḥ yaḥ viśleṣaḥ vicchinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa viṣayaḥ yeṣām dhvanīna antaiḥ dhvanibhiḥ antar jalpa rūpaiḥ saha saṃyojya arthān saḥ eva ayam iti kuryāt api pumān api śabdaḥ bhinna kramonya darśanepi iti arthaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭāt arthāt anyasya vilakṣaṇasya darśanepi sadṛśa artha kriyā kāri tvena vipralambhāt eka tvam āropya pratyabhijñānam kuryāt iti samudāya arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_206,1–206,3	 katham punar bhinnāḥ abhinnām artha kriyām kurvanti iti atas āha uktam etat ityādi eka pratyavamarśa artha jñāna ādi eka artha sādhane ityādinā prāc ukta tvāt ekām iti sadṛśīnteṣu iti bhinneṣu anyeṣu paśyataḥpuṃsaḥ anyebhyaḥ iti atad kāṃribhyaḥ vyāvarttamānāḥ bhāvāḥ vastu dharma tayā eva vastu svabhāvena eva tat eva idam iti evam ākāram mithyā pratyayam janayanti iti sambandhaḥ kim viśiṣṭam iti āha tat ityādi tebhyaḥ atad kāryebhyaḥ yā vyāvṛttiḥ eka artha kriyā kāriṇām arthānām sā viṣayaḥ yasya dhvaneḥ tena saṃsṛṣṭam saṃsaktam sa abhilāpam iti yāvat
