PVVṬ_249,3–249,4	 nanu anya vyāvṛttyā viśiṣṭaḥ vastu bhāgaḥ paramārthataḥ eva kasmāt na gṛhyate iti āha rūpam svabhāvaḥ na asya api bhedasya kiñcana nivṛtti rūpasya bhedasya asattvāt vikalpa pratibhāsinaḥ ca buddhi vibhramāt yadi bhedasya na rūpam kiñcana kathantarhi śabda unyavyāvṛtti viśiṣṭān eva bhāva ānāha iti ucyate iti atas āha tad gatau= ityādi tasya yathā uktasya bhedasya vijātīya vyāvṛttasya svabhāvasya vidhi rūpeṇa gatau= eva śabdebhyaḥ gamyatenyanivarttanam 
PVVṬ_249,5–249,6	 tathā hi vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte arthāt avṛkṣa nivarttanam pratīyate etāvat mātreṇa ca anya vyāvṛtti viśiṣṭa tvam uktam na tu paramārthataḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ tat āha na ityādi tatra iti anya apohe śabda arthe ā cā rya granthe vā kaścid paraḥ iti anyasmāt vyāvṛtta ūrthaḥ kenacid anya vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ na gamyate iti tena yat ucyate bha ṭṭe na 
PVVṬ_249,7–250,2	 na ca asādhāraṇam vastu gamyate apohavat tayā katham vā parikalpyeta sambandhaḥ vastu avastunoḥ sva rūpa sattva mātreṇa na syāt kiñcid viśeṣaṇam sva buddhyā rajyate yena viśeṣyanta dviśeṣaṇam na ca api aśva ādi śabdebhyaḥ jāyate apoha bodhanam viśeṣya buddhiḥ iṣṭā iha na ca ajñāta viśeṣaṇā na ca anya rūpam anyādṛś kuryāt jñāna viśeṣaṇam katham ca anyādṛśe jñāne tat ucyeta viśeṣaṇam abhāva gamya rūpe ca na viśeṣya isti vastu tāḥ viśeṣitam apohena vastu vācyam na teḥ tyata iti apāstam nanu ekasya śabdasya katham vidhi pratiṣedha lakṣaṇam vyāpāra dvayam āha 
PVVṬ_250,3	 na ca api śabdaḥ dvaya kṛt sva artha abhidhānam anya vyāvarttanam ca dvayam karoti kiṅkāraṇam anyonya abhāvaḥ iti iti śabdaḥ hetau yasmāt avṛkṣa bheda abhāvaḥ vṛkṣa arthaḥ tad abhāvaḥ ca avṛkṣa arthaḥ itaretara abhāva tvena tasmāt vṛkṣa śabdāt vṛkṣa artha pratipattyā eva arthāt avṛkṣa nivṛtti pratipattiḥ api bhavati iti na dvau vyāpārau sākṣāt śabdasya tena yadi gauḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ samarthoni anivarttane janakaḥ gavi go buddheḥ mṛgyatām aparaḥ dhvaniḥ na ca jñāna phalāḥ śabdāḥ na ca ekasya phala dvayam apavāda vidhi jñānam phalam ekasya vaḥ katham iti nirastam 
PVVṬ_250,4–250,5	 yadi śabda vācyaḥ bhedassarvatra anuyāyī tat eva tarhi pāramārthikam sāmānyambhaviṣyati iti atas āha asau= iti śabda viṣa yonuyāyī bhedaḥ arūpaḥ niḥsvabhāvaḥ tasmin= arūpe dṛśya vikalpayoḥ ekīkṛtya vaktṛ śrotroḥ yat rūpavat tvena darśanantat buddhi viplavaḥ bhrāntiḥ iti arthaḥ niveśyamānaḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yasmāt bhidyate vṛkṣa ādi korthaḥ tat nivartti atat tyaktvā niveśyate iti sambandhaḥ kutra iti āha bhidyamānānām ityādi etat ca kā ri kā vyākhyāne vibhakta artha ākṣiptā tad anya vyāvṛttiḥ yena śabdena iti vigrahaḥ saḥ eva ca ayam samāna rūpa pratibhāsī bhedaḥ nirddiṣṭaḥ ācārya di ṅ nā ge na katham iti āha artha antara vyāvṛttyā tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgaḥ gamyate iti tathā śabda urtha antara nivṛtti viśiṣṭān eva bhāva ānāha ityādinā ādi grahaṇāt śabda artha antara apoham kurvatī śrutiḥ abhidhattaḥ ityādi parigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_251,1	 sa hi iti ādyasya eva samarthanam sa hi vṛkṣa śabda stambhedam avṛkṣa vyāvṛttam svabhāvam kathayat na artha antarasya avṛkṣa arthasya vyavacchedam ākṣipan= eva varttate kim kāraṇam eka gata bhedasya ityādi yathā hi vṛkṣa bhedāḥ eva khadira ādayaḥ svabhāvena eva avṛkṣebhyaḥ bhinnāḥ evam avṛkṣāḥ api vṛkṣebhyaḥ bhedasya dviṣṭha tvāt tatra vṛkṣa śabdena eka gatasya vṛkṣa artha gatasya bhedasya bhinnasya svabhāvasya eka ākāra pratibhāsinaḥ yā codanā tasyāḥ tad anya vyāvṛtti na antarīyaka tvāt tasmāt vṛkṣa arthāt anyasya avṛkṣasya yā vyāvṛttiḥ tat na āntarīyaka tvāt evam hi avṛkṣāt vyāvṛtta rūpaḥ vṛkṣa arthaḥ abhihitaḥ syāt yadi avṛkṣa arthasya tatra nivṛttiḥ gamyeta saḥ eva anyasmāt bhidyamānasya vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsī bhedaḥ bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ tad vyāvṛttyā artha antara vyāvṛttyā yathā ukta nyāyena arthāt gamyamānayā gataḥ ca buddhaḥ bhāgaḥ vastunaḥ iti uktaḥ iti adhyāhāraḥ vyāvṛtta vastu darśana dvāra āyāta tvāt vastu rūpa tvena adhyavasāyāt ca vastu bhāgaḥ gataḥ iti ucyate iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_251,2	 etat uktam bhavati atatparāmarśa jananebhyaḥ vyāvṛtta rūpantad parāmarśa jananeṣu āropita eka tvam vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsanam eva ākāram avibhakta bāhya ādhyātmika bhedam śabdaḥ pratipādayati śābde jñāne tasya eva pratibhāsanāt tañca pratipādayan= anya vyāvṛttim arthāt ākṣipati atonena abhiprāyeṇa uktamā cā rye ṇa anya vyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgaḥ iti na punar anya vyāvṛttyā śabda artha bhūtayā viśeṣaṇa rūpayā bāhyasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgaḥ gṛhyate anya vyāvṛtteḥ eva abhāvāt iti evantā vat anya vyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgaḥ iti etat samarthitam 
PVVṬ_251,3–252,2	 adhunā śabda artha antara nivṛtti viśiṣṭān eva bhāva ān āha iti etat samarthayan= āha tad gateḥ ityādi tad gateḥ anya nivṛtti gateḥ tad upādhi tvāt asti bheda upādhi tvāt saḥ eva bhedaḥ tad viśiṣṭaḥ gataḥ iti ucyate ā cā rye ṇa iti yat vā tasya yathā uktasya vastu bhedasya śabdāt gateḥ pratipatteḥ sa avadhāraṇa tvena tad upādhi tvāt sā tad anya nivṛttiḥ upādhiḥ artha ākṣepāt yasyāḥ tad gateḥ sā tathā uktā tad anya nivṛttinā antarīyaka tvam eva tad upādhi tvam etat uktam bhavati yārtha antara vyāvṛttiḥ arthāt gamyate tat na antarīyaka tvāt saḥ eva bhedaḥ śabdāt gamyamānonya vyāvṛttyā viśiṣṭaḥ gataḥ iti ucyate ā cā rye ṇa iti 
PVVṬ_252,3	 nanu artha antara vyāvṛttiḥ śabda pravṛtti nimitta bhūtāḥ yayā viśiṣṭāḥ bāhyāḥ arthāḥ gavā ādi śabdaiḥ ca udyante apratīteḥ daṇḍi vat iti vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā daṃṇḍa dvāreṇa tadvān daṇḍī iti ucyate na evam vyāvṛtti dvāreṇa vyāvṛttimān iti kasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ artha antara bhūtā na iti āha dvayoḥ hi ityādi yasmāt dvayoḥ vṛkṣāvṛkṣayoḥ parasparam bhidyamānayoḥ yaḥ bhedaḥ tasya ubhaya gata tvāt vṛkṣāvṛkṣa gata tvāt vṛkṣāvṛkṣa bhinna svabhāva tvāt iti arthaḥ tena eka gata bheda abhidhāna ipi avṛkṣa apekṣayā vṛkṣa gataḥ yaḥ bhedaḥ bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya śabdena abhidhāna ipi na antarīyakaḥ tad anyākṣepaḥ bhavati avṛkṣa apekṣayā vṛkṣa gatasya bhedasya avṛkṣa nivṛtti lakṣaṇasya vṛkṣa apakṣaya api avṛkṣa gatasya vṛkṣa nivṛtti lakṣaṇasya ākṣepaḥ bhavati iti śabdaḥ hetau asmāt hetoḥ tad upādhi tvāt tad viśiṣṭaḥ gataḥ iti uktam iti adhyāhāraḥ na tayoḥ iti eka gatasya bhedasya tad anya vyāvṛteḥ ca na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_252,4–252,5	 kaḥ punar ayam eka gataḥ bhedaḥ kā ca tad anya vyāvṛttiḥ yena anya vyāvṛttinā antarīyakasya eka gata bhedasya śabdāt pratyayaḥ bhavati iti ced ucyate vṛkṣa śabda vācyaḥ tāvat vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsī śākhā ādi mada ākāraḥ sarva vṛkṣeṣu abhinna rūpa iva atad rūpebhyaḥ bhinnaḥ iva bhāsamānaḥ eva gataḥ bhedaḥ bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ evam ghaṭa ādi śabda vācya upyeka gataḥ bhedaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tambha idam ca pratipādayan śabdaḥ vijātīya nivṛttim prasajya pratiṣedha lakṣaṇām arthāt gamayati sā tad anya vyāvṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_252,6	 nanu yadi anya vyāvṛtti viśiṣṭaḥ vastu bhāgaḥ na gamyate kimarthantarhi anya vyāvṛtti viśiṣṭaḥ iti ādi uktam iti āha eka bheda abhidhānaḥ ityādi yaḥ ca ayam yathā vibhaktaḥ ekagataḥ bhedaḥ saḥ eva śabdena codyate tad pratītiḥ eva anvaya gatiḥ yā tu arthāt anya vyāvṛtti gatiḥ sā vyatireka gatiḥ evam anvaya vyatirekābhyām śabda urthavān bhavati tena anvaya vyatireka codanayā anvayasya sākṣāt arthāt tu vyatirekasya codanā draṣṭavyā tayā codanayā vyavahāra aṅga tām śabdānām darśayan= ācārya di ṅ nā gaḥ āhatat vyāvṛttyā gamyate vastu bhāgaḥ iti tathā tad viśiṣṭaḥ vā iti āha vyāvṛtti śabdena vyatirekaḥ uktaḥ vastu bhāga śabdena anvayaḥ anena etat api vyākhyātam śabda antara apoham kurvantī śrutiḥ sva artham abhidhattaḥ iti arthaḥ tatra yosau= eka gataḥ bhedaḥ vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsī vyākhyātaḥ saḥ eva sva arthaḥ tatra artha antara vyāvṛttiḥ artha antara apohaḥ prasajya pratiṣedha lakṣaṇaḥ tam kurvati iti arthāt gamayanti iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_253,1–253,3	 yadi ca anya nivṛtti purassarā eva vṛkṣa ādi śabda pravṛttiḥ tadā anvaya vyatireka codanayā ityādi vyākhyānam vyartham syāt tasmāt vidhiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ yatas eva eka bheda abhidhāne arthāt anya vyāvṛtti gatiḥ atas eva ityādi sva arthasya bheda rūpa tvāt iti yaḥ vṛkṣa śabdasya arthaḥ śākhā ādi mada ākāraḥ vikalpa pratibhāsī sa bheda rūpaḥ bhinna svabhāvaḥ abheda ākāra vyāvṛtta tvāt svayam atas bheda rūpasya sva arthasya abhidhānāt eva arthāt anya vyāvṛtti gatiḥ evam hi avṛkṣāt bheda rūpasya eva vṛkṣa arthasya gatiḥ bhavet 
PVVṬ_253,4–253,5	 yadi arthāt tatra vṛkṣa nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti tasmāt sva artha abhidhānam eva śabdasya vyāpāronya vyāvartta nantu arthāt iti na śabdasya vyāpāra dvayam nanu vidhāyakena vākyena anvaya mātram pratipādyate na anyasya vidhānam pratiṣedhaḥ vā niṣedhakena api niṣedha mātram eva kevalam pratīyate na anyasya vidhānam pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti atas āha 
PVVṬ_253,6–254,1	 na hi anvayaḥ ityādi pratiniyatasya arthasya vidhānam anvayaḥ yathā vṛkṣaṃcchindhī iti tatra avṛkṣasya arthāt nivṛttiḥ vyatirekaḥ sa yatra na vidyate sovyatirekaḥ evam bhūtaḥ nvayaḥ na me sti kintu sarve eva sa vyatirekaḥ tena yat ucyate bha ṭṭaḥ dyaḥ te kaḥ rā bhyām vidhi rūpaḥ ca śabda arthaḥ yena na abhyupagamyate na bhavet vyatirekopi tasya tad pūrvakaḥ hi asau= iti nirastam iṣṭa tvāt ananvayaḥ vā anvaya rahitaḥ vā vyatirekaḥ na hi iti sambandhaḥ tatra viśeṣasya pratiṣedhaḥ vyatirekaḥ tatra arthāt śeṣa gatiḥ anvayaḥ eka anvayaḥ ityādinā etat eva samarthyate eka anvayasyā iti ekasya vidhānasya parihārya abhāve vyavacchedya abhāve niṣphala codana tvāt 
PVVṬ_254,2^1	 yadi vṛkṣan śindhi iti ukterthādavṛkṣasya na tatra vyavacchedaḥ tadā vṛkṣa śabda prayogaḥ niṣphalaḥ syāt yat vā kimvṛkṣan chinadmi uta anyam iti śrotuḥ jijñāsāyām satyām vṛkṣan śindhi iti uktenyaniṣedhaḥ pratīyate eva anyathā parihārya abhāve niṣphalam abhidhānam syāt tathā yadā api āka aṃkṣā ra hitaḥ śrotā vṛkṣan śindhi iti śabdena codyate tadā api vṛkṣaḥ eva pravarttate na anyatra vaktā hi vṛkṣaḥ eva ayam pravarttate na anyatra iti anena abhiprāyeṇa śabdam prayuṅkte vivakṣā anugamanam ca dhvaneḥ tasmāt na asti vyatireka rahita unvayaḥ tathā eka parihārasya iti eka pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhasya eva ekasya iti arthaḥ kvacid iti pratiṣedhena viṣayīkṛte vastuni sthiti abhāve niṣphala codana tvāt 
PVVṬ_254,2^2–254,3	 tathā hi surā viṣayasya pānasya pratiṣedhe yadi surāyāḥ anyatra api pānasya na avasthānam syāt tadā sarvasmin viṣaye niṣiddhasya pānasya viśeṣe pratiṣedhaḥ narthakaḥ tatra surā apeyā iti surā pāna mātrasya pratiṣedhe caritārtha tvāt vākyasya yadi api udaka ādi pānam śabdena na vidhīyate tathā api surāyāḥ anyatra pānasya avasthānan na nivāryate iti arthāt anvaya gatiḥ anyathā surā grahaṇam anarthakam syāt yat vā kim udaka ādi vat surā pātavyā kim vā na iti praśne surā na pātavyā iti ukte surā eva iti pratīteḥ na udaka ādi pāna vidhānam prakṛtat niṣedhyate tena sarvatra vidhi pratiṣedha rūpasya eva śabda artha tvam kaḥ tarhi vidhi pratiṣedha paryudāsa vākyānāmbhedaḥ mahān bhedaḥ vidhāyakam hi vākyam vidhim prādhānyena abhidhāya anya niṣedha kam arthāt niṣedhakam ca niṣedham prādhānyena abhidhāya arthāt anya vidhānam āha paryudāsa pratipādakantu vākyam pratiṣedha pūrva kam anya vidhānam prādhānyena āha iti asti eva viśeṣaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_254,4	 nanu yadi anya nivṛttiḥ arthāt pratīyate sā eva tarhi pāramārthikī bhāvānām asti yayā viśiṣṭāḥ gṛhyante iti evam kasmāt na iṣyate kim punar evantat gateḥ tad upādhi tvāt tad viśiṣṭaḥ gataḥ iti vyākhyāyate iti atas āha sa ca ayam ityādi yaḥ bhedaḥ vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ ācārya di ṅ nā ge na viśeṣaṇa tvena abhimataḥ sa ca ayam arūpaḥ niḥsvabhāvaḥ na asya vyatiriktam avyatiriktam vā rūpam asti iti kṛtvā kathantarhi bhāvānām vijātīyāt bhedaḥ iti pratītiḥ iti ced āha rūpavat tvena bhāva sambandhi tvena tasya bhedasya kevalan darśanampratītiḥ viplavaḥ bhrāntiḥ kevalam iti tathābhūta bāhya nirapekṣam kā ri kā yā mapi evam vyākhyānam draṣṭavyam 
PVVṬ_255,1	 nanu yadi rūpavat tvena darśanam katham buddhi viplavaḥ iti atas āha tena eva ityādi rūpavat tvena bhāva sambandhi tvena yat darśanambhedasya tena eva aparama arthaḥ na vastu bhūtaḥ asattvāt asau= iti bhedaḥ prasajya rūpaḥ anyathā iti evam aniṣyamāṇe na hi vastunaḥ sva lakṣaṇasya sambandhinī vyāvṛttiḥ vastu bhavati kim kāraṇam bhedosya asmādi ti īraṇāt 
PVVṬ_255,2	 etat uktam bhavati yadi hi sā vastu bhūtā syāt tadā vṛkṣebhyaḥ avṛkṣa vyāvṛttiḥ abhinnā bhinnā vā syāt yadi abhinnā asmāt avṛkṣāt vṛkṣasya bhedaḥ iti vyatireka pratītiḥ na syāt palāśāt ca ekasmāt avṛkṣa vyāvṛtteḥ abhinna tvāt dhava ādīnām avṛkṣa vyāvṛttiḥ na syāt palāśa vat tad svabhāvāyāḥ vyāvṛtteḥ teṣu ananugamāt atha palāśāt bhinnā sā tatra api avṛkṣa vyāvṛtteḥ sakāśāt palāśasya vyāvṛttiḥ syāt avṛkṣa vyāvṛtteḥ ca vyāvarttamānasya palāśasya avṛkṣa rūpa tā syāt avṛkṣa vat tatas ca asmādavṛkṣāt asya vṛkṣasya bhedaḥ iti pratītiḥ na syāt iṣyate ca tasmāt tat vyāvṛttiḥ na vastu bhedosya asmādi ti īraṇāt uccāraṇāt iti arthaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat pratīteḥ api grahaṇam 
PVVṬ_255,3	 rūpam hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe hi yasmāt rūpam kim ucyate parama arthaḥ vastu svabhāvaḥ bhedaḥ nyavyāvṛttiḥ yadi rūpam syāt yadi svabhāvaḥ bhavet tat iti avṛkṣāt vyāvṛtti rūpam tad rūpam iti yat tat vyāvṛttam palāśa sva lakṣaṇam tad ātmakam atad rūpam vā iti tatonyat iti arthaḥ vastunaḥ tattva anyat tva anatikramāt iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_255,4	 tādrūpyaḥ ityādinā prathama pakṣe doṣam āha tādrūpye palāśāt anyat tve yayā vyāvṛttyā sāmānya bhūtayā sarve vṛkṣa bhedāḥ vyāvṛttāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ tasyāḥ tādrūpye palāśāt ananya tvebhyupagamyamāne tat eva palāśa sva lakṣaṇam eva vyāvṛttiḥ iti kṛtvā palāśaḥ eva avṛkṣāt bhinnaḥ prāpnoti na anyaḥ dhava ādiḥ tatas iti avṛkṣāt bhidyeta kiṅkāraṇam iti āha na hi ityādi avṛkṣāt hi vyāvṛttiḥ palāśasya eva rūpam na ca tasya rūpam anyasya dhava ādeḥsyāt 
PVVṬ_256,1	 na tat eva ityādinā dvitīya pakṣa upanyāsaḥ na tat eva palāśa sva lakṣaṇam eva tasya bhedasya rūpam rūpam ca svabhāvaḥ ca asau bhedaḥ iṣyate tatonyat eva palāśāt vyāvṛtti rūpam syāt yat vā rūpam ca anyat eva bhedasya syāt tatas ca anyat tvāt kāraṇāt bhāvaḥ palāśa ātmakaḥ tasmāt avṛkṣa vyāvṛtti rūpāt vyāvartteta tatas kāraṇāt ūṣmā āt itya vṛkṣāt tasya palāśasya bhedaḥ iti na syāt yasmāt yat khalu vastu yatas bhedaḥ yad bhedaḥ tasmāt vyāvarttate tat tat eva bhavati avṛkṣa vyāvṛtteḥ bhavati avṛkṣa vyāvṛtteḥ avṛkṣa nivṛtti rūpāyāḥ nivarttamānampalāśa sva lakṣaṇam avṛkṣam iva syāt avṛkṣa vat mā vā bhūt vṛkṣāvṛkṣayoḥ eka tvantathā api sosya bhedaḥ iti ca na syāt 
PVVṬ_256,2	 yadi ca ayam avṛkṣāt bhedaḥ palāśāt anyaḥ syāt tat ayam avṛkṣāt bhedaḥ sya palāśasyasambandhī iti na syāt na hi ityādyasya iva samarthanam anyaḥ svatantronyasya sambandhī bhedaḥ dharma rūpaḥ bhavati sati vā iti sambandhi tvebhyupagamyamāne vā sambandhaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva uṅgīkarttavyaḥ bhinnayoḥ kārya kāraṇam antareṇa sambandha ayogāt tatra vyāvṛttimān kāraṇam vyāvṛttiḥ kāryam iti hetoḥ rūpam vastu antaram eva tad janitantena vyāvṛttimatā sva lakṣaṇena janitam bhedaḥ iti padārtha antarasya nāma kṛtantasmāt kārya tvena abhimatāt bheda ākhyāt padārtha āt aviśeṣāt anyatra api kāraṇānām yānikāryāṇi tāni sarvāṇi vyāvṛttayaḥ bhedāḥ syuḥ na ca evam tadā anyatra api bheda abhimate bhedaḥ iti vyapadeśaḥ mā bhūt 
PVVṬ_256,3	 atha kāryam bhedaḥ iti na ucyate kintu bhedaḥ kāryaḥ iti ucyate tadā api āha artha antara tve ca bhedasya abhyupagamyamāne tata upi vyāvṛttim atopyasya bhedasya bheda usti anyathā bhedasya artha antara tvam eva na syāt tatas ca palāśasya avṛkṣāt yaḥ bhedaḥ tasya bhedasya palāśāt bhedaḥ iti kṛtvā sa bhedaḥ bheda upādhiḥ sa palāśāt bhedaḥ upādhi viśeṣaṇam yasya bhedasya sa bheda upādhiḥ tad bhāvaḥ tat tvantasmāt asau= avṛkṣāt bhedaḥ palāśasya na bhedaḥ syāt dravya antara vat yathā hi dravya antaram ghaṭa ādikam api aghaṭa apekṣayā yaḥ bhedaḥ tad upādhi tvāt na palāśasya bhedaḥ tadvat svatantra tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_257,1	 nanu yadi nāmam bheda upādhiḥ bhedaḥ tathā api kim iti palāśasya bhedaḥ na bhavati iti atas āha na hi ityādi ayam atas iti viśeṣa nirdeśāt ayamavṛkṣāt bhedaḥ atas iti avṛkṣāt asya iti etat apekṣaṇīyam asya palāśasya ayam bhedaḥ asmādavṛkṣāt iti evam viśeṣa nirdeśāt pāratantryeṇa nirdeśāt palāśasya sambandhī bhedaḥ dharmaḥ sidhyati pāratantryeṇa ca nirdeśaḥ bhedasya abhede sati sidhyati bheda antara pratikṣepeṇa na tu artha antara tve bhedasya artha antara tve hi bheda upādhi tvāt ghaṭa vat na palāśasya bhedaḥ syāt tatas ca asmāt asya bhedaḥ iti viśeṣa nirdeśaḥ na syāt tat evam vyatireka pakṣe avṛkṣāt bhedasya api palāśāt yaḥ bhedaḥ sa upi rūpavān iti tasya api sva āśrayāt bhedena bhavitavyam tathā ca sarva bhedānām bhinna svabhāva tayā bheda upādhi tvena svayat na rūpa bhedatā iti na kaścid bhedaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_257,2–257,3	 etat eva āha tatas ca ityādi upādhi abhāvaḥ iti vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇasya dharma bhūtasya upādheḥ abhāve sarvasya svabhāva antara tvena dharmi tvāt bhedasya eva abhāvaḥ syāt tasya dharmi rūpa tvāt yopi manyate yadi rūpavatī vyāvṛttiḥ syāt syāt tattva anya tva pakṣa bhāvī doṣaḥ yāvatā nīrūpā sā asti tayā ca bhāvāḥ viśiṣṭāḥ gṛhyante iti 
PVVṬ_257,4–257,5	 tat ayuktam tad gatau= eva śabdebhyaḥ gamyate anya nivarttanam na tatra gamyate kaścid viśiṣṭaḥ kenacid paraḥ pra vā iti grantha virodhāt nīrūpasya ca astitva virodhāt śaśaviṣāṇa vat nīrūpa tvāt eva ca na tasyāḥ pratyakṣam grāhakam na api anumānam sambandha abhāvāt na api niyata rūpāni atha anupapattyā tad kalpanā sambandha abhāvāt eva sva hetubhyaḥ eva ca niyata rūpāṇām utpanna tvāt iti sarva bhāvā svabhāvena vyāvṛtti bhāginaḥ iti atra antare abhihita tvāt 
PVVṬ_257,6	 na api ca sā apratipannā viśeṣaṇam bhavitum arhati na hi daṇḍa apratītau daṇḍī iti pratītiḥ bhavati na api sā kvacid āśritāḥ nīrūpa tvāt na ca asambaddham viśeṣaṇam bhavati na api anya nivṛtti grahaṇa purassaram vṛkṣa ādiṣu vṛkṣa śabdaḥ pravarttate apratītiḥ iti ukta tvāt nivṛtteḥ nī rūpatayā apratipanna tvena saṃketasya apravṛtteḥ ca katham śabda viṣaya tvan tasmāt anubhava dvāreṇa vṛkṣaḥ ayam na avṛkṣaḥ iti evam niścayaḥ utpadyate tena anya nivṛttiḥ pratiṣedha vikalpena kalpitā yathā saṃketam ca vṛkṣa ādau śabdaḥ pravarttamāna ūrthāt anya nivṛttim ākṣiti anya nivṛtti vikalpam ākṣipati iti arthaḥ tena anya nivṛttyā viśiṣṭaḥ vastu bhāgaḥ gamyate iti ucyate iti 
PVVṬ_258,1	 yadi vyāvṛttayaḥ sāmānya bhūtāḥ bahis vastu tvena na iṣyante na api para parikalpitam sāmānyam evam sati bāhyam vastu eva vācyam āpatitam tatra ca doṣaḥ iti āha kathantarhi iti abhinnasya niraṃśasya vastunaḥ śabdena codane upalakṣaṇam ca etat liṃgena pratipādane tasya eva abhinnasya vastunaḥ ekasmāt bhinnasya punar anyatopi bhedāt tathā hi yena svabhāveṃna na śabdaḥ akṛtakāt bhinnaḥ tena eva mūrtta anitya tvāt ca tasya anaṃśa tvāt anaṃśasya ca vastunaḥ kṛtaka śabdena ekasya akṛtakāt bhedasya bhinnasya svabhāvasya codane tathā liṃgena pratipādane sarva bheda gatessarvebhyaḥ bhinnasya svabhāvasya pratipatteḥ tatra anaṃśevaḥ tuni katham śabda pramāṇa antarāṇi vyarthāni na syuḥ ekena śabdena codane śabda antarāṇām vaiyarthyam syāt ekena liṅgena pratipādane pramāṇa antarāṇām vaiyarthyam syāt 
PVVṬ_258,2	 yasmāt ityādinā pariharati tasmāt yaḥ yena dharmeṇa viśeṣaḥ saṃpratīyate ityādinā prāk eva idam ca udyamparihṛtam adhika vidhāna arthantu punar upanyāsaḥ artheṣu ākāra antara samāroportha ślaṣaḥ sa ca pratipatti bhedena anekaḥ tatra iti buddhi pratibhāsini dharmiṇi bāhya bhinnatayā akhyeyāḥ te bāhya tayā adhyaḥ tasya eva buddhi ākārasya śabda vācya tvāt na punar bāhi ambuddhi ākāraḥ vā kevalaḥ śabda vācyaḥ sva lakṣaṇa tvāt tatra dharmiṇi vidhi rūpa tayā sva artha pratipatti dvāreṇa eka artha śleṣa vicchede apanayane ekaḥ dhvaniḥ vyāpriyate 
PVVṬ_258,3	 liṅgam ca eka artha śleṣa vicchede vyāpriyate tatra sva artha abhidhāna dvāreṇa samāropa vyavacchede śabda pramāṇa antarāṇām sāphalyam iti yāvat na punar jñānāt vyatiriktambāhyam vastu sva lakṣaṇam sva lakṣaṇāt vā vyatiriktambāhyam vastu sāmānya lakṣaṇam vācyam kiñvanāsti yasya vastunaḥ abhidhānataḥ akhile vastu svabhāve gatiḥ bhavet vastu vaśāt yatas ca śabdaḥ sva abhidhāna dvāreṇa vyavacchedam karotitatas kāraṇāt tam tam vyavacchedam kurvat nānā phalaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati eka ādhāraḥ ca katham artha kriyā yogya madhya vasāya anartha kriyā kāriṇā api svābhāsam artha kriyā kāri tvena sva lakṣaṇa rūpattvena adhyasya iti arthaḥ tatra eva iti buddhi pratibhāse bāhya tayā adhyaste kiṃbhūte taiḥ taiḥ bhrānti kāraṇaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭa rūpaḥ iva bhāti 
PVVṬ_259,1	 sadṛśa apara utpatti ādibhiḥ bhrānti hetubhiḥ nityādi a ākāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭa rūpaḥ iva pratibhāsamāne te anitya ādi śabdāḥ yathā saṃketam yasya yasya samāropasya vyavaccheda artham sva pratibhāse saṃketaḥ kutas tasya tasya pratiyoginaḥ vyavacchedāya vyāpriyante saṃketa anurūpam eva pratipādayan= āha na ca ityādi hi arthe caśabdaḥ yatas yathā saṃketaṃ vyāpāraḥ tatas na hi eka śabda sādhyam vyavacchedam anyaḥ śabdaḥ karoti kiṅkāraṇam saṃketa pratiniyamāt ekaika vyavaccheda arthambuddhi ākāraḥ avibhakta bāhya rūpe śabda niveśanāt vyavahāra kālepi sva artha abhidhāna dvāreṇa tantam eva vyavacchedam pratyāyayati iti arthaḥ śabda grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam evam liṅgam api iti draṣṭavyam 
PVVṬ_259,2	 nanu adhya vasita bāhya rūpa tvāt śabda arthasya tatas ca śabdenanya lakṣaṇasya sarva ātmanā viṣayīkaraṇāt katham na śabda antarāṇām vaiyarthyam iti āha na ca ityādi avadhāraṇaḥ ca śabdaḥ na eva vicchinnam jñāna aṃśāt bhinnam kiñcid vastu sva lakṣaṇam sva lakṣaṇāt vyatiriktam sāmānya lakṣaṇam anya nivṛtti lakṣaṇam vā ākṣipyate gṛhyate śabdena liṅgena vā yasya abhidhānāt vastu balena iti vastu grahe niraṃśa tvāt vastunaḥ sarvathā gatiḥ syāt dharmāṇāntataḥ vyatirekāt vyatirekepi upādhīnām nānā upādhi upakāra aṅga śakti abhinna ātmanaḥ grahaḥ ityādinā sarvathā grahaṇasya ukta tvāt kasmāt śabdaiḥ vicchinnam vastunā ākṣipyate iti atas āha śabdānām ityādi 
PVVṬ_259,3–260,1	 etat uktam bhavati yatas buddhi ākāram abāhi ambāhyam adhyavasyanti śabdāḥ tatas vicchinna vastu grāhakāḥ iva bhavanti iti arthaḥ buddheḥ viplavaḥ ca buddhi ākārasya bahīrūpa tayā grahaḥ tad viṣaya tvāt śabdānām buddhi viplavepi vācya vastu sāmarthyāṃdakhile gatiḥ kinna iti ced āha tatra ca ityādi tatra buddhi viplave avastuni vastu sāmarthya abhāvāt yadi api buddhi ākāraḥ jñāna sva lakṣaṇa tvāt vastu tathā api asau śabdaiḥ vikalpaiḥ vā bāhya abhinna tayā adhyastaḥ avastu eva tena śabdaḥ vikalpaḥ vā na sva lakṣaṇa viṣayaḥ yathāvat ekasya api bāhyasya jñāna ākārasya vā agrahaṇāt iti 
PVVṬ_260,2	 yadi buddhi viplava viṣayāḥ eva sarva śabdāḥ katham kṛtakān iti ādi śabdānān tathā bhūte vastuni avyabhicāraḥ iti atas āha tathābhūta ityādi tatas tatas akṛtakanityādeḥ bhinnasya arthasya anubhava t vāreṇa iti arthaḥ ayam vyavahāraḥ iti sambandhaḥ kimbhūtaḥ na anā eka ityādi nānā ekaḥ ca nānā ekam tat ca dharmaḥ ca iti karmadhārayaḥ tatas bheda abheda śabda abhyān tri padaḥ dvandvaḥ nānā eka dharma bheda abhedāḥ eva buddhau pratibhāsantaḥ iti pratibhāsāḥ te eva viplavaḥ bhrānta tvāt tad anusārī tena ākāreṇa pravṛttaḥ iti hetoḥ tasya vyavahārasya tad pratibandha itamin= tathābhūte sva lakṣaṇe pāramparyeṇa utpatti pratibandhe sati tat avyabhicāraḥ vastu avyabhicāraḥ yathā hi kṛtaka ādi ākārāḥ śabdāḥ viplavāḥ tathāvastūnām api kṛtaka ādi rūpeṇa parama artha tova sthānam iti anena ākāreṇa avi abhicāraḥ draṣṭavyaḥ 
PVVṬ_260,3	 etat eva āha tata upi ityādi tatas buddhi viplava viṣayāt śabdāt vyavahārāt para artha anumāna lakṣaṇāt vitathāt iti bhrāntāt pravṛttasya ante pravṛtti parisamāptautathā bhūtaḥ eva kṛtaka ādi rūpaḥ eva vastuni natva kṛtaka ādi rūpe anena avyabhicāra svarūpam uktam jñāna samvādāt sva lakṣaṇa grāhi jñāna utpatteḥ śabdasya vā jñānasya samvādāt 
PVVṬ_260,4	 asmin= eva anya apohe śabda arthe sāmānādhikaraṇyam sidhyati na tu vastuni iti āha na punar bhinna ityādi bhinnāḥ ākārāḥ jāti guṇa ādayaḥ śabda pravṛtti nimitta bhūtāḥ tad grāhiṇām jñāna śabdānām eka vastu viṣaya tvāt śabdaḥ eka ādhāraḥ iti sambandhaḥ yadi hi bhinna ākāram jñānam eka vastu viṣayam pravartteta tatas tad anusāreṇa śabdopi tathā syāt tathā ca nānā phalaḥ śabdaḥ eka ādhāraḥ iti bhavet sāmānādhikaraṇyam tat ca na asti vyāghātāt tathā hi nīlotpala śabdayoḥ ekam vā vastu vācyam syāt anekam vā ādye pakṣe ekena eva śabdena niraṃśasya vastunaḥ sarva ātmanā abhidhānāt dvitīyasya śabdasya apravṛttiḥ syāt pravṛttau vā paryāyata iti na nānā phala tvam dvitīye pakṣaḥ eka ādhāra tā na asti ghaṭa paṭa ādi śabda vat nānā viṣaya tvāt 
PVVṬ_261,1–261,2	 atha matam nīla śabdaḥ nīla guṇa viśiṣṭandravyam āha utpala śabda upyutpala jāti viśiṣṭantad eva dravyam āha atas viśeṣaṇayoḥ bhedāt nānā phalaḥ śabdaḥ viśeṣya abhedāt eka ādhāraḥ iti tat api asat yatas nīla guṇena viśiṣṭa dravyat nīla śabdena abhidhīyamānam sarva ātmanā abhidhīyate niraṃśa tvāt tatas koparaḥ dravyasya utpala jāti viśiṣṭaḥ ātmā anabhihitā usti yad utpala śabdena abhidhīyeta iti tathā eva paryāyatā syāt atha viśeṣaṇa bhedāt viśeṣya dravyasya bhedaḥ tadā api ekādhāra tā na syāt apoha vādinaḥ tu ayama doṣaḥ iti āha yathāvarṇṇitaḥ ityādi buddhi pratibhāsaḥ āśrayaḥ yasya śabda arthasya sa tathā uktaḥ 
PVVṬ_261,3–261,4	 yathā ca na doṣaḥ tathā pratipādayan= āha vicchedam ityādi ekaḥ nīla śabda ekam vyavacchedam anīla vyavacchinnam nīla svabhāvam sūcayan= anyam anutpala vyavacchinnam utpala svabhāvam apratikṣipya varttate na nirākāroti iti arthaḥ saḥ iti anutpala vyavacchinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ tena nīla śabdena vyāptaḥ ākrāntaḥ ākṣiptaḥ san= utpala śabda prayoge buddhau= eka tvena pratibhāsate ekasya eva dharmiṇaḥ vyavaccheda dvaya āyāta nīlotpala dharma dvaya yuktasya vikalpa buddhau pratibhāsanāt yadā ca evantadā sāmānādhikaraṇyam syāt buddhi anurodhataḥ 
PVVṬ_261,5	 etat uktam bhavati nīla śabda prayogāt buddhi pratibhāsī dharmī nīla rūpaḥ eva pratibhāsate tatra arthāt anīlam vyāvarttyate na tu anutpala vyavacchinnaḥ svabhāva utpala śabda prayogāt api utpala rūpa tayā pratīyamāna unutpalam vyāvarttyate na tu anīla vyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvaḥ śabda dvaya prayoge tu nīlotpala dharma dvaya yuktā eka dharmi pratibhāsinī vikalpa buddhiḥ utpadyate tatas nānā phalaḥ śabdaḥ eka ādhāraḥ bhavati iti bhavet buddhi anurodhena sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti 
PVVṬ_261,6	 tena yadu dyaḥ te kaḥ re ṇā ucyate yasya ca anya apohaḥ śabda artha ḥ tena anīla anutpala vyudāsau katham samāna adhikaraṇau= iti vaktavyam yasya punar vidhīyamānaḥ śabda arthasya jāti guṇa viśiṣṭam nīlotpala śabdābhyām dravyam abhidhīyate jāti guṇau ca dravye varttete na punar anīla anutpala vyudāsau tasmāt samāna adhikaraṇa arthaḥ na asti iti nirastam vidhīyamānasya śabda arthasya abhyupagamāt 
PVVṬ_262,1	 kim ca punar śabdasya sva artha abhidhāna dvāreṇa samāropa vyavaccheda karaṇebhyupagamyamāne yat vā vyavaccheda karaṇe vyavacchinna svabhāva viṣayīkaraṇe leśataḥ vastu dharmasya vastu svabhāvasya vijātīya vyāvṛttasya saṃsparśaḥ syāt prāpti lakṣaṇaḥ kim kāraṇam sattyam iti vidyamānaḥ sa hi adhyavasīyamānaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ tatra vastuni iti kṛtvā na eka vastu abhidhāyini śabdebhyupagamyamāne vastu dharmasya saṃsparśaḥ sāmānyasya eva vastunaḥ abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_262,2	 katham iti ced buddhau= ityādi upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalambhāt asattvam iti yāvat yatas evam vastuni śabda arthe doṣaḥ tena kāraṇena anya apoha viṣayā vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsa viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ buddhayaḥ ca proktāḥ ācārya di ṅ nā ge na kimbhūtā buddhayaḥ sāmānya gocarāḥ vikalpikā iti arthaḥ buddhīnām eva etat viśeṣaṇam na tu śabdānānteṣām sāmānya viṣaya vyabhicārāt kiṅkāraṇam vastuni eṣām śabdānām vikalpānām ca sambhavāt 
PVVṬ_262,3	 yadi hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe vastu eva yadi viṣayīkriyeta gṛhyeta na tu vidhi rūpeṇa adhyavasīyeta soyam iti anantara uktaḥ sarva arthānām sarveṇa ākāreṇa vastu sāmarthyāt pratīti prasaṃgaḥ ādi śabdāt aviśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva pramāṇa antara apravṛti ādi parigrahaḥ praṇetā ācārya di ṅ nā gaḥ etau= iti buddhi śabdau anya upohyatenena iti vikalpa ākāraḥ ucyate tad viṣayau tathā bhinna ākārābhiḥ buddhibhiḥ ekam vastu yadi viṣayīkriyeta tathā eva śabdena ca abhidhīyeta tadā bhinna phalayoḥ śabdayoḥ ekatra dravye vṛtta tvāt syāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam etat tu na sambhavati tathā hi tad śabda vācyam sāmānyam sva lakṣaṇāt abhinnam bhinnam vā syāt tatra ādye pakṣe eka tvāt vastu rūpasya bhinna rūpā sāmānya viśeṣa ākārā bhinnā matiḥ kutas 
PVVṬ_263,1–263,2	 sva lakṣaṇāt ca sāmānyasya avyatireke śāvaleya ātmakaḥ bhedaḥ yatas bāhuleya ātmakāt bhedāt vyāvarttate bāhuleye śāvaleya ātmakam go tvam anveti iti ekasya arthasya eka adhikaraṇau= anvaya vyatirekau prāpnutaḥ tat ca ayuktam iti āha anvaya vyatirekau= ityādi ekorthaḥ gocaraḥ viṣayaḥ yayoḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ tau tathā uktau tat ekam ityādinā vyācaṣṭe eka tvāt eva anaṃśam ekasya aṃśa abhāvāt ākriyate iti ākāraḥ buddhi pratibhāsaḥ tasya bhedaḥ tad āśrayāt bhedasya vastu nānātvasya yadi bhinna ākārābhiḥ buddhibhiḥ gṛhyeta bhinnam syāt na ca evantasya ca abhāvāt vastunaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa ubhaya ātmaka tvāt vastunaḥ ekasya api bhinna ākāra buddhi grāhya tvam iti ced āha tad ātmanā upītyādi sva lakṣaṇa ātmanaḥ tad eka yogakṣema tvāt sva lakṣaṇena eka yogakṣema tvāt tadvat eva abhinna tvam tat iti tasmāt ayam sāmānādhikaraṇya ādiḥ na syāt iti sambandhaḥ kim kāraṇam anyonya artha parihāreṇa paraspara artha parihāreṇa bhinna pravṛtti nimitta tvena iti yāvat śabdayoḥ eka viṣayayoḥ eka dravya ādhārayoḥ vṛtti a sambhavāt 
PVVṬ_263,3	 anvaya ityādi śloka bhāgam na ca ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yadā ekaḥ eva vastu ātmā sva lakṣaṇam sāmānyam ca tadā śāvaleya sva lakṣaṇasya go tva sāmānya ātmaka tvāt tatra eva bāhuleye vṛttiḥ punar sva lakṣaṇa ātmaka tvāt tatra eva āvṛttiḥ tasmin kāle prayuktāḥ sāca ayuktā vyāghātāt pramāṇa bādhita tvāt sva lakṣaṇāt abhinna tvāt na eva sāmānyam anyatra varttate tatas na ekasya ekatra vṛtti avṛttī iti ced āha na ca ityādi sāmānyasya ityādi tatas na ekasya vṛtti avṛttī iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_263,4–264,1	 na ityā cā ryaḥ sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ sām khya ādi darśanena bheda abhāvāt tat iti ādyasya eva samarthanam tat hi vastu eka rūpam eka ātmakam sat sāmānyam vā bhavet viśeṣaḥ vā iti sāmānyāt viśeṣasya avyatirekāt sāmānyam eva syāt viśeṣaḥ eva vā viśeṣāt avyatirekāt sāmānyasya na tu ekam dvi rūpam yatas na hi asati rūpa bhede ayam pravibhāgā eti sāmānyam viśeṣaḥ iti ca sati vā pravibhāge sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ avyatirekaḥ na syāt iti uktam prāk tat iti tasmāt ayam vastu ātmā avibhāgaḥ iti anaṃśaḥ yadi sāmānyam eva tadā anviyāt vyakti antar aṅga= chet atha viśeṣa ātmakaḥ eva tadā na vā anviyāt ekasya tu viruddha dharma dvaya asambhavaḥ iti yāvat tat eva āha na punar ityādi 
PVVṬ_264,2	 yopī iti vai śe ṣi kādiḥ dravyāt bhinnam eva sāmānyam śabda vācyam āha vyakteḥ sāmānyānām bhede abhyupagamyamāne abheda vyavahārāḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahārāḥ syuranibandhanāḥ yathāsvam iti vīpsāyām avyayībhāvaḥ tathā hi nīlotpala ādi śabdāḥ yathāsvad nīlotpalādimparaspara bhinnam sāmānyam āhuḥ yadā api nīla śabdaḥ nīla guṇa abhi dhāyi iṣyate tadā api bhinna artha abhidhānam asti eva ekaḥ dharmī arthaḥ viṣayaḥ yasya abuddhessā eka arthā ca asau buddhiḥ ca iti karmadhārayaḥ pumvadbhāvaḥ ca asyāḥ āśrayāḥ kāraṇam katham syuḥ tatas ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam na syāt iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_264,3	 yadi nīlotpala ādi śabdāḥ viśeṣaṇa dvaya yuktā eka dharmi viṣayām buddhim janayeyuḥ tadā eka artha pratipādanena syāt sāmānādhikaraṇyantat ca na asti vyakteḥ artha antaram sāmāni antat abhidhāyinaḥ ca anākṣepakāḥ tad gatānām bhedānān ta da parityāgena vṛttiḥ ākṣepaḥ na tathā kasmāt nirāka aṃkṣa tvāt yadā vṛkṣa śabdaḥ vṛkṣa tvam eva abhidhatte tadā tasya nirviśeṣaṇa tvāt tāvatā eva asau nirāka aṃkṣaḥ iti kathandhava ādīn ākṣipet anākṣiptāḥ ca katham vṛkṣa śabda arthasya bhedāḥ dhava ādayaḥ atadbheda tvāt ca katham vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapā iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ tat āha katham ityādi sāmānya viśiṣṭasya dravyasya abhidhāna anna yatha uktaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na ukta uttara tvāt viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭasya api dravyasya abhidhāne vastu sāmarthyāt ekasmāt api śabdāt akhila gateḥ śabda antarasya tatra apravṛttiḥ pravṛttau ca aparyāyata iti tat evam vastu śabda artha vādinaḥ na kathaṃcid sāmāna adhikaraṇya ādi sambhavaḥ 
PVVṬ_265,1–265,2	 sāmānyam api teṣām na sambhavati iti uktam tathā hi yadā tāvat sva lakṣaṇāt avyatiririktam sāmānyantadā sva lakṣaṇa vat vyakti antarān anugamāt a sāmānyam vyatirekepi katham anyasya samānyam ati prasaṅgāt ityādi prāk uktam vyāvṛtti vādinaḥ tu ayama doṣaḥ iti āha sarvatra ityādi ete doṣāḥ iti sāmānya sāmāna adhikaraṇya abhāva ādayaḥ yathā hi ityādi ekaḥ go bhedaḥ śāvaleyaḥ tasmāt ago svabhāvāt bhinnaḥ tathā anyopi bāhuleya ādiḥ atas vijātīya vyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvatra tulyaḥ iti bhedasya vijātīya bhinnasya svabhāvasya vikalpa buddhyā sarvatra su a ākāra abhedena adhyastasya asāmānya doṣaḥ na asti pariśiṣṭa abhāvaḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi abhāvaḥ prāk eva uktaḥ vicchedam sūcayan= ekam apratikṣipya varttata ityādinā 
PVVṬ_265,3–265,4	 evantā vat vijātīya vyāvṛttam svabhāvam sarvatra buddhyā su a ākāra abhedena adhyastam ekam śabda abhidheyam pratipādya adhunā abhinna ākāram antareṇa api eka kāryeṣu bhāveṣu ekaḥ śabdaḥ niyujyate iti āha api ca ityādi tad kārya paricodane eka kārya tā paricodanā artham yat vā eka kāryāṇām paricodana artham eka kāryeṣu bhedeṣu ekasya bhāva rahiteṣu api samā ekā śrutiḥ kṛtā saṃketitāḥ vṛddhaiḥ vyavahāra jñaiḥ tad kāryāṇa ambhedānām atad kāryebhyaḥ yā yāvṛttiḥ tad nibandhanā vijātīya vyāvṛtta tayā eka kāryeṣu ekā śrutiḥ nibadhyate iti arthaḥ nanu yadi na sāmānye śabda niveśaḥ sva lakṣaṇe tarhi śabda niveśaḥ syāt anyasya abhāvāt na ca sva lakṣaṇam śabda vācyam 
PVVṬ_265,5	 na etat asti yatas pratipādakaḥ tāvat tri kāla sthān bhāvān eka kāryāt saṃketa karaṇa abhiprāyeṇa viṣayīkṛtya teṣu eva saṃketam karoti vyavahāra kāle paricodana artham tena yadi api buddhi parivarttinaḥ bhāvāḥ sāmānya rūpāḥ tathā api teṣu eva bahuṣu bahis iva parisphuratsu ekaḥ śabdaḥ niveśyate na tu teṣu sarveṣu bhinna rūpe sāmānye sthite prativyakti bhinnā iva śrutiḥ kasmāt na saṃketita iti āha gaurava ityādi gauravāt sāmānyaṃa śakteḥ vaiphalyāt ca bheda ākhyāyāḥ bhinnāyāḥ śruteḥ yat vā bheda ākhyāyāḥ bheda kathanasya etat ca vṛttau spaṣṭayiṣyāmaḥ na bhāve vastu bhūte sāmānye samā śrutiḥ kṛtā kim kāraṇam sarva bhāvānām svabhāvasya svarūpasya vyavasthiterasāṃkaryāt 
PVVṬ_266,1	 yat rūpam śāvaleyasya ityādinā vyavasthita svabhāva tvam āha tatas na avi atiriktam sāmānyam vyatiriktam api svasmin svabhāvā iva sthitam tat api katham vyaktīnām samānam rūpam na hi anyena anye samānāḥ iti uktam sāsna ādi ākāra pratyayasya hetavaḥ atad kāryāḥ tebhyaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ vyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvaḥ dvayoḥ iti śāvaleya bāhuleyayoḥ tasmāt atad kārya vyāvṛttiḥ bhinnānām api aviruddhā iti sā eva artha abhedaḥ śabda abhedasya kāraṇam eṣṭavyam yata ūrthāt abhedena vinā śabda abhedaḥ na yujyate kathantarhi bahuṣu ekā śrutiḥ artha abhedaḥ eva pravṛtteḥ iti atas āha tasmāt ityādi yāpīyantad kāryata eka kārya teṣṭāḥ yasyāḥ paricodana arthambahuṣu ekā śrutiḥ iti uktam sā api atad kāryāt eva bhinna tā draṣṭavyā bahūnām a tad kāryāt eva bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ 
PVVṬ_266,2^1	 na tu tat kāryatā nāma sāmānyam asti vinā api ca sāmānye yathā vilakṣaṇeṣu eka śabda niveśaḥ na viruddhaḥ tathā darśayan= āha cakṣuḥ ādau= ityādi rūpa vijñānam ekam phalam yasya cakṣuḥ ādeḥ iti vigrahaḥ kvacid iti yasmin kāle vijñāna janana samarthāḥ te codayitum iṣṭāḥ athavā kvacid kāle sāṃketikīm śrutim kuryāt iti sambandhaḥ kimartham kuryāt iti āha aviśeṣeṇa sāmānyena tad kāryasya cakṣuḥ vijñāna eka kāryasya kāraṇa kalāpasya parebhyaḥ prakāśana sambhave sati yadā tu cakṣuḥ ādīnām asādhāraṇa kārya tvam codyate tadā na ekā śrutiḥ teṣu saṃketyate iti arthaḥ sakṛt eka kālam sarvasya kāraṇa kalāpasya prati iti artham ṛtepī ityādi teṣām cakṣuḥ ādīnān tad rūpa sāmānyasya iti eka kāryatva lakṣaṇasya sāmānyasya vyatiriktasya abhāvepi iti arthaḥ sattā evam teṣām sāmānyam iti ced na tasyāḥ aviśeṣāt sarvadā sarvatra cakṣuḥ vijñāna prasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_266,2^2	 abhinnam artham antareṇa iti sāmānyam vastu bhūtamvinā bahuṣu śāvaleya ādiṣu teṣām iti śāvaleya ādi bhedānām yadi teṣām sāmānyam syāt tadā tatra sāmānye śabda niveśāt sarvatra bhede niveśitaḥ syāt ekantu sāmānyam vinā bahuṣu eka śabda sanniveśaḥ na yuktaḥ tatas ca asau śabdaḥ saṃketyamānaḥ ekatra eva bhede saṃketitaḥ syāt tathā ca eka vṛtteḥ ekatra bhede kṛta sanniveśasya anyatra bhede vilakṣaṇe pratyaya ajananāt dvitīyā go vyaktiḥ tatas śabdāt gauḥ iti evam na pratīyeta tatra pratyāsatti nibandhanasya sāmānyasya abhāvāt svabhāva anugama abhāvepi śāvaleye niveśitaḥ apratyāsanne bāhuleye pratyayam janayiṣyati iti ced āha apratyāsattike ca ityādi atiprasaṅgāt go śabdāt aśvepi pratītiḥ syāt evantāvat ekam sāmānyam vinā bahuṣu eka śabda niveśa abhāvaḥ uktaḥ 
PVVṬ_267,1	 abhyupagamya vaiphalyam āha teṣu ca ityādi tathā hi bahuṣu ekā śrutiḥ niveśyate aneka vṛttim ekam artham pratipādayitum tān eva vā bhedān asaṃkareṇa tatra ādyasya abhāvam āha eka artha niyoga abhāvāt iti yadi ekasmin= arthe śabdasya niyogaḥ syāt tadā bhavet ekārtha pratipādanam dvitīya abhāvam āha bhinna ityādi bhinna svabhāvānām asaṃkīrṇṇānām śāvaleya ādīnām pratipattayaḥ iti adhyāhāraḥ pṛthak iti ekaikasmin bhede ekasya śabdasya niyoge saṃkete kṛte paścāt vyavahāra kāle yathā coditānām iti asaṃkareṇa pratipatti artham coditānām vibhāga aparijñānāt tasmāt na teṣu śabda niyogaḥ phalavān evam hi sva lakṣaṇeṣu pṛthak pṛthak śabda niyogaḥ phalavān bhavati 
PVVṬ_267,2–267,3	 yadi tasmāt śabdāt asaṃkareṇa sva lakṣaṇāni pratīyeran= iti kriyate ca bahuṣu eka śabda niyogaḥ tasmāt vastu bhūtena sāmānyena bhāvyam iti abhiprāyaḥ tasya api ityā cā ryaḥ ekam vastu sāmānyam asti iti eva kṛtvā antareṇa api prayojanam lokena śabdaḥ niveśanīyaḥ iti ekaḥ vikalpaḥ dvitīyam āha tat vā ityādi tad iti sāmānyam vastu śaktyā eva iti puruṣa vyāpāram anapekṣya ekām śrutim dhvanayati utthāpayati na asti eva tat dvayam api antareṇa prayojanam puruṣa vyāpārañca prayoga abhāvāt tat eva kintarhī ityādinā āha kenacid prayojananā iti ebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ vyavahāre tat atad sādhanam artham jñātvā pratipadyeta iti anena prathama vikalpa abhāvam āha 
PVVṬ_268,1–268,2	 nirdeśyante iti anena dvitīyasya nirdeśyante saṃketyante vyavaharttu kāmaiḥ iti adhyāhāraḥ tatra etasmin nyāye anekam kāraṇam ekatra kārye upayujyeta vyāpriyeta tat iti anekam kutas kāraṇa kalāpāt tat utpadyate iti eva tatra etasmin kārye vyavaharttu kāmaiḥ avaśyantad ca anekaṅkāraṇam atad kārya vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam eka kārya tām āśritya ekena eva śabdena codayitum yuktam anekena codane doṣam āha tasya ityādi pṛthak pṛthak iti bhinnaiḥ śabdaiḥ etat ca sva lakṣaṇa śabda niveśam abhyupagamya uktam etat eva na sambhavati iti āha na ca ityādi asya vastunaḥ ananya sādhāraṇam rūpam iti na anya sādhāraṇam ananyasādhāraṇam sva lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ na api asya iti aneka śabda niveśanasya 
PVVṬ_268,3^1	 etat ca gaurava aśakti vaiphalya ādityasya yathākramam vivaraṇam kasmāt vaiphalyam iti ced āha kevaṃlam ityādi anena prayoktrā tatra etasmin kārye terthāḥ kāraṇa bhūtāḥ codanīyāḥ iti etāvat prayojanam te tu kāraṇa bhūtāḥ padārthāḥ ekena vā śabdena codyeran bahubhiḥ vā iti svātantryam atra codane vaktuḥ yatas evantat iti tasmāt iyam ekā śrutiḥ bahuṣu vācyeṣu vaktuḥ abhiprāya vaśāt hetoḥ pravarttamānā na upa śakyā pravarttayitum iti ced āha na ca iyam ityādi iyam ekā śrutiḥ aśakyam pravarttana mayasyāḥ iti vigrahaḥ kasmāt na aśakya pravarttanā iti āha icchā adhīna tvāt icchāyāḥ adhīnam aśakya pravarttanam yadi hi ekatra api ityādi tathā hi icchayā eva tatra para parikalpite sāmānye na vastu sthityā eva ekasyāḥ śruteḥ pravattiḥ kintarhi vaktuḥ icchā vaśāt tathā na yadi prayoktuḥ icchā bhavet 
PVVṬ_268,3^2	 katham iyam ekā śrutiḥ ekatra api pravartteta na eva iti abhiprāyaḥ tathā ekatra api pravarttayitum icchā eva kāraṇam na vastu śakti tadā bahuṣu api na kaścid vyāghātaḥ iti āha icchāyām vā ityādi eka trāpi pravarttayitum icchāyām kāraṇa tvena kalpyamānāyām enām ekām śrutim prayojana abhāvāt ityādi na hi ekam vastuvinā bahuṣu eka śabda niveśanam phalavat uktam prāk kim uktam iti āha bhinneṣu ityādi bhinneṣu śāvaleya ādi bhedeṣu ekasmāt go śabdāt pratītiḥ a tad prayojanebhyaḥ bhedena tad gobheda sādhyam vāha doha ādikam kāryam prayojanam na bhavati yeṣām aśva ādīn a antebhyaḥ bhedena iti kim punar vastu bhūtam eva ekatvam na ca udyate iti atas āha na punar svabhāvasya eka tvāt na punar vastu bhūtasya sāmānyasya ekatvāt bhinneṣu ekā śrutiḥ tasya eva sāmānya vyatiriktasya avyatiriktasya ca ayogāt 
PVVṬ_269,1	 bhavatu nāma sāmānyam vyatiriktantat api tasmin svabhāve vyavasthitam amiśram eva tat eva āha yathāsvam ityādi yasya yat lakṣaṇantena vyavasthita svabhāvānām anyonya rūpā saṃśleṣāt katham eka nimittaḥ sāmānya nibandhanaḥ śabdaḥ bhinneṣu bhavet na eva iti abhiprāyaḥ na hi anyena anye samānāḥ bhavanti etat ca uktam prāk sarve bhāvāḥ svabhāvena sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ iti atra prastāve 
PVVṬ_269,2–269,3	 anya apoha vādinaḥ tu ayama doṣaḥ iti āha atat prayojana ityādi atad prayojanebhyaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ tu bhinnānām api aviruddhā iti kṛtvā sa eva atad prayojanebhyaḥ bhedaḥ tad prayojanānām abhedaḥ tad vyāvṛtteḥ sarvatra bhāvāt śabda abhedasya kāraṇam bhavatu yatas ca na kathaṃcid vastu bhūtam sāmānyam ghaṭate tena ime go bhedāḥ tad prayojanāḥ vāha doha prayojanāḥ iti yat uktantat atad prayojanebhyaḥ aśva ādibhyaḥ bhinnāḥ eva uktāḥ na punar eṣām anyā tad kāryatā anyatra anyatas bhedāt anya vyāvṛttaḥ eva svabhāvaeṣām abhedaḥ iti yāvat etena tad kārya tā api ityādi kā ri kā bhāgaḥ vyākhyātaḥ 
PVVṬ_270,1	 yathā ityādinā cakṣuḥ ādau yathā rūpa vijñāna eka phalaḥ ityādi vyācaṣṭe ātma indriya ṛṣeṣu iti para prasiddhyā uktam rūpa vijñānam ekam kārya yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ tad rūpa vijñānam kāryam yeṣa antāni tad kāryāṇi teṣām sāmānyam aviśeṣeṇa eka kārya karaṇa sāmarthī antasya codanā prakāśanā tasyāḥ sambhave sati kena punar prastāvena codanā sambhavaḥ iti āha kutas rūpa vijñānam iti aviśeṣeṇa sāmagrī gate praśne sati iti arthaḥ vyavahāra lāghava artham ekena śabdena bahūnām pratipādana artham rūpa vijñānasya hetuḥ cakṣuḥ ādi kalāpaḥ saraḥ śaraḥ vā iti evam śrutinniveśayet iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_270,2^1	 api nāma ityādinā vyavahāra lāghavam eva vyācaṣṭe tad hetūnām cakṣuḥ vijñāna hetūnām na ca atra iti cakṣuḥ ādau yena anugāminā rūpeṇa ekam cakṣuḥ vijñānam janayanti tathābhūtam sāmānyañcakṣuḥ ādīnāt na asti sattā vidyate iti ced tasyāḥ tarhi sarvatra aviśeṣāt sarvatra cakṣuḥ ādi vijñānam syāt na ca sambandhi bhedāt sattāyāḥ bhedaḥ nitya tvena anādheya atiśaya tvāt kevalantad artha tayā rūpa vijñāna eka kārya tayā bhāvāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ atad arthebhyaḥ rūpa vijñāna ajanakebhyaḥ bhinnāḥ iti kṛtvā bhedaḥ eva atad kāryebhyaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ eva eṣām cakṣuḥ ādīnām abhedaḥ sarveṣām atad kārya vyāvṛtteḥ tulya tvāt 
PVVṬ_270,2^2	 yathā cakṣuḥ ādīnām abhedaḥ sarveṣām atad kārya vyāvṛtteḥ tulya tvāt yathā cakṣu ūrūpa ādiṣu ekam sāmānyam vinā api eka kārya tva khyāpanāya ekaḥ śabdaḥ niveśyate evaṃjātīyāḥ sarve ityādi samūhasya santānasya avasthā viśeṣasya ca vācakāḥ śabdāḥ samūha santāna avasthā viśeṣa śabdāḥ tatra samūha abhidhāyinam śabdam adhikṛtya āha ye samasta aityādi ye rūpa rasa gandha ādayassamastāḥ kiñcid ekam udaka ādi āharaṇa ādi kāryam teṣa aṃrūpa ādīnām tatra kārye kāraṇa tayā viśeṣa abhāvāt sarveṣām hi ekam kāryam iti kṛtvā tena eka kārya tvena viśeṣa abhāvaḥ ucyate na tu sva lakṣaṇasya aviśeṣāt 
PVVṬ_270,3–271,2	 teṣām eka kārya karaṇa śakti khyāpana mātre karttavye apārthikāḥ viśeṣa codanā pratirūpa ādi bhinnena śabdena codanā niṣphala iti kṛtvā sakṛt eka kālam sarveṣām kvacid kārye niyojana artham rūpa ādi viśeṣeṣu udaka dhāraṇa ādi kārya sameṣu ghaṭaḥ iti ekam śabdam prayuṃkte ayam loka eti vyavaharttā nanu bhinnāḥ eva rūpa ādayaḥ katham ekasmāt ghaṭa śabdāt abhedena pratīyante iti cat āha tepi ityādi sajātīyāt rūpāt anyatas ca rasa ādeḥ bheda aviśeṣepi tad prayona aṅga tayā viśiṣṭa udaka ādi āharaṇa kārya aṅga tayā tad anyebhyaḥ iti tad kārya karaṇa asamarthebhyaḥ paṭa ādibhyaḥ bhidyante iti bhedaḥ eva eṣām abhedaḥ tatas abhedāt tasmāt abhedāt aviśeṣeṇa eva sāmānyena eva ekasmāt ghaṭa śabdāt sarve rūpa ādayaḥ pratīyante yadi rūpa ādayaḥ eva kevalāḥ ghaṭaḥ na tu tad vyatiriktam dravyam kathantarhi ghaṭasya rūpa ādayaḥ iti vyatirekaḥ iti ced āha tatra ityādi ghaṭasya rūpa ādayaḥ iti api yaḥ vyatirekaḥ tasya ayam arthaḥ ghaṭa svabhāvāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ na paṭa ādi svabhāvāḥ iti 
PVVṬ_271,3	 etat eva vyācaṣṭe udaka ityādi udaka āhāraṇasya viśeṣaḥ ghaṭāt anyena asādhya tvam ādi śabdāt anyasya api ghaṭa sādhyasya kāryasya parigrahaḥ tasmin kārye samarthāḥ saptamī iti yoga vibhāgāt samāsaḥ ayam atra arthaḥ rūpa ādi śabdāḥ rūpa ādīn rūpa sādhya kārya mātra śakti yuktān aviśeṣeṇa pratipādayanti ghaṭa śabdaḥ tu viśiṣṭa kārya śakti yogena paṭa ādi svabhāvebhyā upi rūpa ādibhyaḥ bhedena viśiṣṭān rūpa ādīn āha atas ghaṭasya rūpa ādayaḥ iti śabda dvaya vyāpāreṇa sāmānya viśeṣa ākāra buddhi utpatteḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ vyatireka vimatiḥ ca prayujyate iti etam eva sāmānya ityādinā āha sāmānya kāryam rūpa ādi mātra sādhyantasya siddhiḥ sādhanantasmin prasiddhena ātmanā svabhāvena itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇā tṛtīyā hetau vā itthaṃbhūtena rūpeṇa hetunā vā rūpa ādi śabdaiḥ karaṇa bhūtaiḥ prasiddha āssantaḥ viśiṣṭam kāryam ghaṭa sādhyam ghaṭa sādhyam eva udaka āharaṇa ādi tasya sādhanam sādhyatenena iti kṛtvā tathābhūtā ākhyā saṃjñā yasya sa tathā tena viśiṣṭāḥ te iti rūpa ādayaḥ evam ucyante iti 
PVVṬ_271,4	 na punar atra rūpa ādi saṃhatau hi atra vā ghaṭaḥ iti vyavahāre yathāvarṇṇita lakṣaṇamiti rūpa ādi vyatiriktandravyam tasya avayavinaḥ tādṛśasya iti rūpa ādi vyatiriktasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ ca avayavī paraiḥ iṣṭaḥ dārśanam spārśanam dravyam iti vacanāt tena upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvena abhyupagatasya rūpa ādi vyatirekeṇa anupalambhāt iti vākya arthaḥ yathāvāntareṇa api avayavinam paramāṇavaḥ eva pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ tathā dvitīye paricchede pratipādayiṣyate 
PVVṬ_272,1^1	 yadi rūpa ādayaḥ eva saṃhatā ghaṭaḥ kathantarhi bahuṣu ghaṭaḥ iti eka vacanam iti ced āha eka vacanam ityādi yathā bahuṣu ekaḥ śabdaḥ eka śakti sūcanā arthaḥ tathā eka vacanam api teṣām rūpa ādīnām ekasmin= udaka āharaṇa kārye yā śaktiḥ tasyāḥ sūcanā artha eka kārya karttṛ tvena teṣu eka tvam āropya eka vacanam iti arthaḥ na punar teṣu ekā śaktiḥ vidyate anapekṣita vāhya āryamaka vacanam saṃketa paratantram vā etat ca yeṣām vastu vaśāḥ vāca ityādinā pratipāditam santāna abhidhāyinaḥ śabdān adhikṛtya āha tathā ityādi hetuḥ ca phalam cahetu phale tayoḥ viśeṣaḥ upādāna upādeya bhāvena eka santānaḥ na āśraya tvam tambhūtāḥ prāptāḥ prāpti vacanaḥ bhavatiḥ sa karmakaḥ 
PVVṬ_272,1^2–272,2	 sādhanam kṛtā iti dvitīyā tatpuruṣaḥ hetu phala śeṣaḥ vā bhūtaḥ niṣpannaḥ yeṣām iti baha vrīhiḥ āhita ādeḥ ākṛti gaṇa tvāt bhūta śabdasya para nipātaḥ kiṃcid ekam sādhayanti iti yathā aṃkura nāḍa patra ādayaḥ phalam ekam sādhyante ca ekena yathā te eva upādāna bhūtena bījena tepyakura ādayaḥ na eka kṣaṇa ātmakāḥ sakṛt prati iti arthaḥ tena eka kārya tvena eka kāraṇa tvena vā sāmyena brīhi ādi śabdaiḥ santāna abhidhāyibhiḥ kṛta saṃketāḥ saṃketa kāle paścāt vyavahāra kāle kathyante vyavahāra lāghava artham abhedena prabandha jijñāsāyām bīja aṃkura ādi bhedena aneka śabda prayogasya vaiphalyāt ādi grahaṇena manuṣya ādi śabda grahaṇam taiḥ api bāla kumāra ādi bheda bhinnasya prabandhasya abhidhānāt nanu brīhi ādi śabdāḥ api samudāya śabdāḥ eva rūpa ādi samudāya abhidhāyi tvāt 
PVVṬ_272,3	 satyam kintu hetu phala viśeṣa phala prabandha abhidhānāt evam ucyate tathā samudāya śabda uneka samudāya apekṣayā jāti śabdaḥ bhavati evam avasthā śabda upi kevalam viśiṣṭa artha vivakṣayā kaścid śabdaḥ iti ucyate iti adoṣaḥ yathā ca ghaṭasya rūpa ādayaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti ca eka vacanam yena nibandhanena uktam tathā brīhe rūpa ādayaḥ brīhiḥ iti na eka vacanam draṣṭavyam atas eva āha pūrvavat vācyam iti avasthā śabdān adhikṛtya āha yepi ityādi yepi nīla ādi paramāṇavaḥ pṛthak iti nīla pīta ādayaḥ paraspara anapekṣāḥ samastāḥ vā iti paraspara sahitāḥ kvacid iti cakṣuḥ vijñāne sva deśe parasya utpatti pratibandhe vā sakṛt eva pratyāyana artham ekasmāt śabdāt bahūnām niścaya artham tatra ye cakṣuḥ vijñāne upayujyante tevasthā viśeṣa vācinaḥ sa nidarśanāḥ iti ucyante ye sva deśe parasya utpattim pratighnanti te sa pratighāḥ iti 
PVVṬ_273,1–273,2	 nanu nīla pīta ādayaḥ atyanta bhinnāḥ te katham ekena sa nidarśana ādi śabdena ucyantaḥ iti atas āha tad anyebhyaḥ bheda sāmānyena iti tad anyebhyaḥ anidarśana apratighebhyaḥ yaḥ bhedasya eva teṣām sāmānyam sarveṣa antataḥ vyāvṛtta tvāt tena hetunā sa nidarśana ādi śabdāḥ api paramāṇu samudayā abhidhānāt samudāya śabdāḥ eva iti ced na ekasya api paramāṇoḥ sa pratigha ādi śabdaiḥ abhidhānāt 
PVVṬ_273,3	 kārya dvāreṇa śabda pravṛttim uktvā kāraṇa dvāreṇa āha yathā eka kāryāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ tad kārya codanāyām tad udaka dhāraṇa ādi ekam kāryam yasya rūpa ādi sāmarthyasya tasya codanāyām eka śakti codanāyām iti arthaḥ tad anyasmāt ghaṭa ādeḥ bhedena ghaṭa ādi śabdaiḥ ādi grahaṇāt brīhyādi parigrahaḥ kṛta samayāḥ khyāpyante iti prakṛtam tathā kāraṇa apekṣayā api aneka ūrthaḥ ekena śabdena kṛta samayaḥ khyāpyate iti vacana pariṇāmena sambandhaḥ vyavahāra artham eva lāghavena iti arthāt draṣṭavyam yathā śavalāyāḥ gorapatyāni sarvāṇi eva eka kāraṇa tvena śāvaleya śabdena ucyante bahulāyāḥ ca apatyāni bāhuleya śabdena yāvān= ca puruṣa prayatnena kāraṇena janitaḥ śabdaḥ sarvaḥ samāna kāraṇa janya tvena prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ kathyate kariṣyāmi iti cetanā prayatnaḥ tasya anantaram avyavadhānan tatra bhavaḥ iti graha ādeḥ ākṛti gaṇa tva acchaḥ deśa grahaṇantatra na smaryate tasya svārthikaḥ kan etat ca kāraṇa viśeṣa apekṣayā uktam 
PVVṬ_273,4–274,1	 kāraṇa mātra āśrayeṇa āha kṛtakaḥ vā iti kāraṇa āyatta janmanaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakasya anyasya ca sarvasya kṛtakaḥ iti abhidhānāt evantāvat vidhi mukhena uktam pratiṣedha mukhena āha tathā ityādi tasya cākṣuṣasya nīla ādeḥ yat kāryañcakṣuḥ vijñānantasya pratiṣedhena ācākṣuṣaḥ śabdaḥ na samarthañcakṣuḥ vijñānam prati iti evam acākṣuṣa śabdena sāmānyena ucyate anitya śabdopi nitya vyavacchedena vyavasthāpyamānaḥ tad kārya pratiṣedhena eva tathā hi nityam paraiḥ vastu eva iṣṭantad ca asādhya sādhana bhūtam vyavahāra patham na avatarati iti sādhya sādhanam ca aṅgīkartavyam nitya kārya pratiṣedhena anityaḥ ātma śabdopi kvacid kārye svatantrasya khyāpanāya kṛtaḥ iti anātma śabdaḥ atad kārya vyavacchedena syāt 
PVVṬ_274,2^1	 evam kārya pratiṣedhena abhidhāya kāraṇa pratiṣedhena āha tat ityādi tasya sa svāmikasya aśūnyasya ca yat kāraṇantasya pratiṣedhena ayam śabda ādikaḥ bhāvosvāmikaḥ śūnyaḥ iti vyavahāra artham khyāpyate iti sambandhaḥ tathā hi svatantreṇa ātma ādinā yodhiṣṭhitaḥ sa sa svāmikaḥ paraiḥ iṣyate evam aśūnyā upi tathābhūtena adhiṣṭhātra adhiṣṭhita tvāt eva adhiṣṭhitā ca adhiṣṭhātavya svīkaraṇam anyathā adhiṣṭhātṛ tva ayogāt tasmāt sa svāmika ādi śabdāḥ kāraṇa dvāra pravṛttāḥ pareṣām na pratikṣaṇa viśara aruṣu bhāveṣu sāmagrī mātra pratibaddheṣu vyavasthita svabhāvaḥ kaścid adhiṣṭhātā asti yat pratibaddha āssaṃskārāḥ pravarttante 
PVVṬ_274,2^2	 tatosvāmikāḥ śūnyāḥ ca yathā ukta kāraṇa pratiṣedhena vyavasthāpyante iti evam anyat api iti duḥkha aśūnyānātha apratiśaraṇa ādikam api yathāyogam iti kiṃcid kārya pratiṣedhena kiṃcid kāraṇa pratiṣedhena iti arthaḥ duḥkha aśūni ādi kārya pratiṣedhena sukha śūni a ādīnām aprātikūlya kārya tvena vyavasthāpyamāna tvāt sarvasya ca saṃskṛtasya vipariṇāma dharmi tvena pratikūla tvāt anāthā pratiśaraṇa ādi kārya pratiṣedhena svatantrasya nātha ādeḥ abhāvāt tat evam kārya kāraṇayoḥ vidhi pratiṣedha mukhena catuṣṭayī śabdānāmpravṛttiḥ ākhyātā bhavati 
PVVṬ_274,3	 nanu ca aśūnyanitya ādeḥ vyavacchedyasya abhāvāt katham śūnya ādi śabdeṣu anya vyavaccheda abhidhānam iti ced āha śūnya ityādi yathākathitam iti yasya yādṛśī siddhānta āśrayaṇa kalpanā tayā samīhitaḥ racitaḥ śūnya nitya ādīnām yaḥ ākāraḥ tam vikalpya buddhau= āropya tad vyavacchedena para parikalpitā aśūnya ādi ākāra vyavacchedena śūnya ādi vyapadeśaḥ kriyate kasmāt iti āha buddhi ityādi buddhessamīhāḥ imam artham āropayāmi iti saṃkalpaḥ tathā sarvvam sāṃkaryam yasya śabdasya sa tathā tad bhāvaḥ tasmāt sarva grahaṇāt etat āha yatra api vastu bhūte īti 
PVVṬ_274,4	 etat uktam bhavati na vastu sva lakṣaṇam śabdaiḥ sva rūpeṇa vidhīyate apanīyate vā kevalam vikalpa buddhi sandarśitaḥ eva sarvaḥ vidhi pratiṣedha vyavahāraḥ tatas ca anitya ādi śabdeṣu anitya ādi pratipakṣaḥ nitya ādiḥ vyavacchedyaḥ na asti iti apratipakṣa doṣaḥ tasya upakṣepa audbhāvanam ādi śabdāt na asti ātmā iti pratiṣedhe ca apratiṣedha doṣaḥ iti evamādi upakṣepaḥ ca durmatīnāmu dyaḥ te kaḥ ra prabhṛtīnām vispanditāni vijṛmbhita ani a sambaddhāni iti yāvat na hi nyāya anugata buddhiḥ asambaddham udbhāvayet atas ca te doṣa upakṣepāḥ upekṣaṇīyāna avadhāna arhāḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_275,1	 atha ityādi paraḥ api śabdaḥ bhinnakramaḥ ekasya vastunaḥ sāmānyasya vṛtteḥ api kāraṇāt anekaḥ vyakti bhedaḥ ekā śrutiḥ eka śrutiḥ sā ca adhikāḥ asya anekasya asti iti eka śrutimān eka śabda vācyaḥ yadi bhavet iti arthaḥ eka kārya tvena ekaḥ śabda bahuṣu ekena vā sāmānyena iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti manyate atas eva vyācaṣṭe na kevalam ityādi tad anyasmāt atad kāryāt yaḥ bhedaḥ saḥ eva sarveṣām tad kāryāṇām aviśeṣaḥ tasmāt eka śabdena ucyante api tu eka vṛttyā api ekasya sāmānyasya varttanena api anekaḥ padārthaeka śabdena ucyeta kaḥ virodhaḥ syāt yathā eka kārya tvena bahuṣu eka śabda pravṛttau na asti virodhaḥ tathā vastu bhūtena api sāmānyena tasmāt vastu bhūta sāmānya kalpanā api yuktā eva iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_275,2	 uktam ityā cā ryaḥ tasya vastu bhūtasya sāmānyasya upalabhyate rūpeṇa abhimatam abhimata tve upalabhya tvam karaṇa tvena vivakṣitam iti karttṛ karaṇe kṛtā iti eva samāsaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya vyakti vyatirekeṇa anupalabdheḥ abhāvaḥ sāmānyasya iti vākya arthaḥ anupalabhyamāna tāyām vā aṅgī kriyamāṇāya antad darśana āśrayāḥ iti sāmānya darśana āśraya avyapadeśa pratyabhijñāna ādayaḥ na bhaveyuḥ iti uktam iti sambandhaḥ bahuṣu eka śabdaḥ vyapadeśaḥ tulya ākāram jñānam pra tya bhi jñāḥ nam ādi śabdāt sāmānya āśrayā vyaktau pravṛttiḥ na bhavet iti ādeḥ parigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_275,3	 na hi svayam anupalabhyamānam upalambha nibandhanam vyapadeśa pratyabhijñānam anyatra pravarttayati na bhaveyuḥ iti ādīni anena ca ādi śabdena anyasya api pūrva uktasya doṣasya grahaṇam na hi anyena anye samānānām atadvantaḥ nāma syuḥ tathā na jātiḥ vāha doha ādau= upayujyate ityādi anena etat āha jāti kalpanāya ambādhakam pramāṇam asti tatas na tad nibandhanaḥ vyapadeśa ādiḥ eka kārya tve tu virodha abhāvāt tat kṛtam eva vyapadeśa pratyabhijñāna ādikam yuktam iti dūṣaṇa antaram api āha api ca ityādi vastu bhūte sāmānyam icchatā sva āśraye na ekasmin= tasya pravṛttiḥ eṣṭavyāḥ na hi tatra āvarttamānam āśraye vyapadeśa ādi kāraṇam yuktam sā ca sāmānyasya sva āśraye pravṛttiḥ ādheya tā vā bhavet tad balena avasthānāt āśraya balena upalabdhiḥ vyaktiḥ sā vā vṛttiḥ bhavet etat dvayam api tasmin sāmānye na yujyate 
PVVṬ_276,1	 yat etat ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yat etat ekam iti vastu bhūtam sāmānyam anekatra āśraye varttamānam ekām śrutim varttayati tasya sāmānyasya sva āśraye kā iyam vṛttiḥ iti praśnayitvā svayam eva vikalpa dvayam āha ādheya tā ca ityādi athavā kiṃśabdaḥ pratikṣepe kā iyam vṛttiḥ na kācid iti arthaḥ tathā hi vṛtteḥ sva āśraye ādheya tā vā syāt yathā kuṇḍe ādhāre badarāṇi varttante iti vyaktiḥ vā tasya sāmānyasya āśraye vṛttiḥ syāt taiḥ āśrayaiḥ vyakteḥ prakāśanāt tatra yadi ādheya tā vṛttiḥ iṣyate tadā vyaktayaḥ tad ādhāra tvena eṣṭavyāḥ nityam ca sāmānyam abhyupagatam vyakti utpatteḥ pūrvvantat ana ādheyantatonityasya āśrayaiḥ anupakārya tvāt hetoḥ āśraya abhimatāḥ vyaktayaḥ na ādhāraḥ 
PVVṬ_276,2	 nityam hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe atha nityam na iṣyate tadā api anitya tve apara apara utpatteḥ anyasya anyasya utpatteḥ anekam sāmānyam aneka tvāt kāraṇāt bhedeṣu iva bheda vat tasmin sāmānye eka pratyaya ayogāt ekasya jñānasya ayogāt kāraṇāt nityam sāmānyam iṣya tā eti anena sambandhaḥ nityasya ca sāmānyasya kiṃkurvāṇaḥ āśrayaḥ ādhāraḥ syāt na eva iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_277,1–277,2	 na upakāraka tvāt ādhāraḥ kintu tasya sāmānyasya tatra āśraye samavāyāt yadā ho dyaḥ te kaḥ raḥ katham tarhi go tvam goṣu pravarttate āśraya āśrayi bhāvena kaḥ punar āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ samavāyaḥ tatra vṛttimat go tvam vṛttiḥ samavāyaḥ iha pratyaya hetu tvāt iti upakārya upakāraka tva abhāve samavāyam asambhāvayan= āha koyam ityādi apṛthak ityādi paraḥ abhinna deśa tvena siddhāḥ apṛthak siddhāḥ teṣām yoyam āśraya āśrayi bhāvassamavāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_277,3–277,4	 tat ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī tat eva idam āśraya tvam anupakārakasya āśrayasya na sambhāvayāmaḥ kasmāt atiprasaṅgāt yadi anupakārakasya āśraya tvam iṣyate tadā sarvaḥ sarvasya āśrayaḥ syāt na bhavati sarvasya sarva asamaveta tayā pratīteḥ iti ced nanu upakāraka abhāve go tva vat sarvasya eva sarva samaveta tvena ekasmāt na pratītiḥ bhavati iti idam eva codyate atha upakārya upakāraka bhāva ādeḥ anyaḥ eva ayam samavāya lakṣaṇa ssambandhaḥ sa ca na sarvatra asti iti katham atiprasaṃgaḥ 
PVVṬ_277,5	 ucyate satyam kevalam kvacid samavetasya samavāyaḥ bhavati tad samaveta tvam ca tad āyatta tayā tad āyatta tvañca artha antarasya tad utpattiḥ eva tena upari upari bhāvena utpattiḥ eva iha buddheḥ nibandhanan na samavāyaḥ iti arthāpatti kṣayaḥ upari uparibhāve i syāt na api asamavetānām samavāyosti yena samaveta tvam syāt sarveṣām sarvatra samaveta tva prasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_277,6	 upasaṃharan= āha tasmāt ityādi apṛthak siddhayoḥ samavāyaḥ yathā ārabhyārambhakayoḥ dravyayoḥ pṛthak siddhānām saṃyogaḥ yathā agni dhūmayoḥ ekasmin= arthe samavāyaḥ eka artha samavāyaḥ yathā rūpa rasayoḥ ekasmin dravye ādi śabdāta saṃyukta samavetasya parigrahaḥ vastu bhūtāḥ sambandhāḥ vastūnām vā sambandhāḥ iti viśeṣaṇa samāsaḥ ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ vā vastu grahaṇam kalpanā kṛta nivṛtti artham kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt na vyatiricyante na vathā abhavanti etat eva sādhayan= āha parasparam ityādi parasparam anyonyam upakāriṇām anyatas vā aśraya abhimatāt anupakāriṇām apratibandhāt anāyattatvāt apratibadhan= asya ca asambandhāt kāraṇāt sarva vastu sambandhāḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt na vyatiricyante iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_278,1–278,2	 nanu ca āśrayāt sati upakāre āśritayoḥ parasparam upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ na eva asti iti kim artham anyatas vā iti asya upanyāsaḥ satyam etat kintu yadi api sākṣāt anyonyam na upakāraḥ tathā api eka kāraṇa āyatta tayā pāramparyeṇa api sambandham kalpayet iti upanyāsaḥ eka artha samavāyinaḥ parasparam upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ na eva iṣyate iti ced āha yadi api ityādi tatas ekasmāt āśrayāt upakārasya abhāve yathā ukta doṣa prasaṅgāt atiprasaṅga bhayāt iti uktaḥ doṣaḥ yatas ca sva āśrayāt eka artha samavāyinoḥ avaśyam upakāraḥ atas sva āśraya kṛtaḥ samavāyinoḥ yaḥ sva upakāra ātma upakāraḥ tena dvāreṇa param api dvitīyam api samavāyinam saṃghaṭayya pratipādayitrā khyāpya tesamavāyinau= iha sambaddhau= iti 
PVVṬ_278,3	 etat uktam bhavati yathā parasya eka artha samavāyinoḥ paraspara asambaddha īpi eka artha samavāyāt sambandhaḥ tathā asmākam eka kārya tvena tayoḥ sambandhaḥ yatas evantasmāt tatra api ekārtha samavāyini kārya kāraṇa bhāva kṛtaḥ eva āśrayeṇa saha yaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tad kṛta eva yad dvāreṇa āropitaḥ eva sambandhaḥ yasmāt upakāra dvāreṇa eva ādhāra ādi bhāvaḥ tasmāt ayam āśrayaḥ śāvaleya ādiḥ sva ātmani sāmānya svabhāvenupakurvāṇaḥ sāmānyasya anapekṣasya ādhāraḥ iti yā ci ta ka me ṇḍa na me tat maṇḍanam alaṅkāraḥ maṇḍyatenena iti kṛtvā tasya yācitaka śabdena karmadhā arayaḥ kasmāt parasmāt yācita kammaṇḍa nandaridrasya ātmani avidyamānam tadvat sāmānya āśrayasya api sāmānyam pratyādhāra tvam bhāva sādhanaḥ vā tṛtīyā samāsaḥ ca yathā yācitakena alaṅkāreṇa maṇḍana kriyā tathā sāmānya āśrayasya parasmāt prārthitena ādhāra bhāvena ādhāra vyapadeśaḥ na vastu sthityā tatas upakāra abhāvāt iti 
PVVṬ_278,4	 katham iti ādi paraḥ na hi kuṇḍam badarāṇām janakam teṣām sva hetoḥ eva niṣpatteḥ tatas ca yat uktam sarvatra vastu sambandhāḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt na vyatiricyante iti tad anekāntikam iti manyate pravisarppataḥ deśa antara visarppaṇa śīlasya badara ādeḥ tad deśa jananam upādāna bhūtasya pūrvakasya badara lakṣaṇasya yaḥ deśaḥ kuṇḍa sambaddhaḥ tasmin= eva deśe jananam anyatra āgamanāt iyam śaktiḥ kuṇḍādeḥ ādhāra abhimatasya badara ādiṣu ādheyeṣu 
PVVṬ_279,1	 prakṛti ā iva ityādinā vyācaṣṭe prakṛtyā svabhāvena eva asamānaḥ deśe yasya tat tathā uktam prakṛti śabdam apekṣamāṇasya api gamaka tvāt bahu brīhiḥ tathābhūtam ca tat kāryam ca iti karmadhārayaḥ kāryam ca badara ādikam eva uttara uttara kṣaṇa saṃgṛhītam tasya utpādanam tat eva dharmaḥ svabhāvaḥ yasya guruṇaḥ dravyasya badara ādeḥ pūrvakṣaṇa saṃgṛhītasya samāna deśa kārya utpādana bhāvaḥ ādhāra kṛtaḥ ātmanā tulya deśasya utpādaka tvam ādhāra kṛtam iti arthaḥ yatas evantasmāt pāścātyasya badara kāryasya yaḥ pūrvakṣaṇaḥ upādāna bhūtaḥ tasya sahakāri kuṇḍam tatra eva upādāna kṣaṇa deśaḥ eva badara kārya janayat kuṇḍamādhāraḥ iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_279,2–279,3	 anena ca eka sāmagrī adhīnayoḥ kuṇḍa bada rakṣaṇayoḥ ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ iti uktam bhavati anyathā yadi kuṇḍena badarāṇām yathā uktaḥ upakāraḥ na kriyate tadā iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi iti evam vyāpadeśaḥ na syāt niyata ādhārasya vyapadeśasya nimittam antareṇa ayogāt tad upakāra kṛtaḥ iti ādhāra upakāra kṛtoyam vyāpadeśaḥ iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi iti kintarhi kuṇḍa badarayoḥ yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tad kṛtaḥ kimpunar ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī pṛcchataḥ ca ayam abhiprāyaḥ kṣaṇika tve sati saṃyoga ādīnāmbhavadbhiḥ kalpanā iṣyate akṣaṇika tvam ced bhāvānām abhyupagamyate saṃyoga ādīnām eva utpattiḥ na syāt iti arthaḥ tayoḥ iti kuṇḍa badarayoḥ saṃyogaḥ iti api vyapadeśa nimittam na asti upakārya upakāraka tva abhāvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_280,1	 tābhyām ityādi paraḥ tābhyām kuṇḍa badarābhyām saṃyogasya jananāt tayoḥ saṃyogaḥ iṣyate dvābhyām eva saṃyogasya jananam ubhayatra samavāyaḥ pareṇa uktaḥ iti avamṛśya si ddhā nta vā dyā ha saḥ ityādi sa saṃyogaḥ ekatra eva kuṇḍe badare vā kin na samavaitijanyate vā ekena kuṇḍena badareṇa vā pṛcchataḥ ca ayam bhāvaḥ yadi tau kuṇḍa badara ākhyau bhāvau saṃyoga janane ādhāra bhāva upagamane vā pratyekam samartha svabhāvau tadā kim iti anyonyam apekṣate iti pṛthak arthan tat ubhayam paraspara sahitam eva samartham iti ced āha tat ityādi yat kuṇḍa badara vastu pṛthak a samartham tad paraspara sahitam api tādṛśam eva asamartham eva akṣaṇika tvāt iti bhāvaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ tu pratyekam pṛthak asamarthāḥ paścāt sahakāri kṛta viśeṣa assahitāḥ samarthāḥ iti aviruddham tatas ca saṃyogam pratyanupakāraka tvāt kuṇḍabadara ākhyam vastu na saṃyogena tad dharmyāt 
PVVṬ_280,2–280,3	 sahitasya ityādi paraḥ sahitasya kuṇḍasya badarasya ca tad anya upakārāt tasmāt kuṇḍāt yaḥ yaḥ badara ātmā tasmāt kuṇḍasya upakārāt tasmāt vā badarāt yat anyat kuṇḍantasmāt badarasya upakārāt viśeṣa utpatteḥ hetoḥ kuṇḍa badarayoḥ saṃyogasya janane ādhāra bhāva upagamane vā sāmarthyam na kevalayoḥ iti koyamityā cā ryaḥ badarāṇām kuṇḍa ādīnām ca ajanya janaka bhūtānām koyam upakāraḥ na eva asti ajanya janaka tvam eva katham iti ced āha svarūpa ityādi badara svarūpasya anyatas hetoḥ eva siddheḥ akārya tvāt na badarāṇām janya tvam na api janaka tvam kuṇḍasya iti bhāvaḥ na hi paraḥ badara ādīnām kuṇḍa ādeḥ sakāśāt svarūpa utpattim vāñchati sva hetoḥ eva teṣān niṣpatteḥ na kuṇḍena badara rūpam eva kriyate kintu tatonyat rūpam iti atas āha para rūpa ityādi tatra iti ādheye na hi artha antare kṛtertha antaram upakṛtam syāt ubhayathā iti sva rūpa para rūpa kriyābhyām anantara uktena vidhinā anupakārakasya kuṇḍa ādeḥ akiñcitkara tvāt 
PVVṬ_280,4	 etat ca ukta prāyam prāya śabdaḥ bāhulya vacanaḥ prāyeṇa ukta mukta prāyam rāja danta ādeḥ ākṛti gaṇa tvāt prāya śabdasya para nipātaḥ ayam ca arthaḥ kāryaḥ ca tāsām prāpta ūsau jananam yat upakriye tyādi vistareṇa uktaḥ prāya śabdam sadṛśa artham anye prāhuḥ uktena sadṛśa mukta prāyam prāc uktena āśraya kṛtena sāmānyasya svarūpa upakāreṇa īdaṃkuṇḍa ādi kṛtam ādheyasya upakāra karaṇan tulyam iti arthaḥ sarve eva ityādinā upasaṃhāraḥ sarve eva vastu sambandhāḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt hetoḥ vyavasthāpyante iti sambandhaḥ vibhāgaḥ teṣām na syāt iti ced āha janakasya eva ityādi yat vā kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt sakāśāt pravibhāgena bhedena vyavasthāpyante kathambhedaḥ iti āha janakasya eva ityādi kāraṇa kṛtaḥ kāryasya yaḥ upakāra viśeṣaḥ tasya balāt iti arthaḥ tathā hi pravisarppaṇa dharmaṇaḥ badara ādeḥ sva upādāna deśa utpādana lakṣaṇena upayogena ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ pradīpa kṛtena ca vijñāna janana samartha svarūpa utpādena ghaṭa pradīpa ādīnām vyaṅgya vyañjaka lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ iti evam anyasmin= api sambandhe yathāyogam vācyam 
PVVṬ_281,1	 nanu sarve eva vastu sambandhāḥ ityādinā na saṃyoga lakṣaṇasya sambandhasya kārya kāraṇa bhāva intarbhāvaḥ samāna kāla bhāvinoḥ eva asya sattvāt atha akṣaṇika pakṣe saṃyoga utpattiḥ na yujyate kṣaṇike tarhi bhaviṣyati saṃyukta asaṃyukta avasthayoḥ ca kuṇḍa badarayoḥ na svarūpa bhedaḥ pratīyate tena akṣaṇikepi saṃyoga usti eva pratīteḥ 
PVVṬ_281,2^1	 yadā aho dyaḥ te kaḥ raḥ yadi saṃyogaḥ na na artha antaram bhavet tadā kṣetra bīja udaka ādayaḥ nirviśiṣṭa tvāt sarva dā eva aṃkura ādi kāryam kuryu rna ca evam tasmāt sarvadā kārya anārambhāt kṣetra ādīni aṅkura utpattau kāraṇa antara sāpekṣāṇi yathā mṛd piṇḍa ādi sāmagrī ghaṭa ādi karaṇe kulāla ādi sāpekṣā yaḥ sau kṣetra ādi nirapekṣaḥ sa saṃyogaḥ iti siddham kim ca asau saṃyogaḥ dravyayoḥ viśeṣaṇa bhāvena pratīyamāna tvāt tatortha antara tvena pratyakṣa siddhaḥ eva tathā hi kaścid kenacid saṃyukte dravye āhara iti uktaḥ yayoḥ eva dravyayoḥ saṃyogam upalabhate te eva āharati na dravya mātram 
PVVṬ_281,2^2	 kim ca dūratara varttinaḥ puṃsaḥ sa antarepi vane nirantara rūpa avasāyinī sā iyam buddhiḥ udayam āsādayati mithyā buddhiḥ mukhya padārtha anubhavam antareṇa na kvacid upajāyate na hi ananubhūta go darśanasya gavaye gauḥ iti vibhramaḥ bhavati tasmāt avaśyam saṃyogaḥ mukhya ubhyupagantavyaḥ tathā na caitraḥ kuṇḍalī iti anena pratiṣedha vākyena na kuṇḍalam pratiṣidhyate tasya anyatra deśa ādau sattvāt tasmāt caitrasya kuṇḍala saṃyogaḥ pratiṣidhyate tathā caitraḥ kuṇḍalī iti anena api vidhi vākyena na caitra kuṇḍalayoḥ anyataravidha anantayoḥ siddha tvāt pāriśeṣyāt saṃyoga vidhānam tasmāt asti eva saṃyogaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_281,3^1	 atra ucyate yathā kṣetra ādīnām viśiṣṭa avasthā pratilambhena saṃyoga ārambhaka tvam iṣyate tathā saṃyogam aṃtareṇa kārya ārambhaka tvam eva kinneṣyate anyathā sarvadā saṃyoga ārambhaka tvam syāt na api nirvikalpakena pratyakṣeṇa saṃyukte dravye sva rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇe tṛtīyaḥ saṃyogaḥ pratibhāsate na api sa vikalpake jñāne saṃyukte dravye muktvā saṃyoga śabdam ca aparaḥ saṃyogaḥ viśeṣaṇa bhāvena pratibhāsate na api saṃyukta pratyayāni atha anupapattyā saṃyoga kalpanā utpanna nirantara avasthayoḥ eva bhāvayoḥ saṃyukta pratyaya hetu tvāt yāvat ca tasyām avasthāyām saṃyoga janaka tvena saṃyukta pratyaya viṣayaḥ tāviṣyete tāvat saṃyogam antareṇa saṃyukta pratyaya hetu tvena tad viṣayau kim neṣyete 
PVVṬ_281,3^2	 kimpa āramparyeṇa na api sa antare vane nirantara avabhāsinī buddhiḥ mukhya padārtha anubhava pūrvikā skhalat pratyaya viṣaya tvena anupacarita tvāt tathā na caitraḥ kuṇḍalī ityādau caitra sambandhi kuṇḍalam pratiṣidhyate vidhīyate vā na saṃyogaḥ tasmāt ekasāmagrī adhīnayoḥ eva saṃyutau= iti pratītiḥ yathā kuṇḍa badarayoḥ tasmāt saṃyogasya api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva antarbhāvaḥ kevalam bheda antara pratikṣepeṇa saṃyuktau= etau saṃyogasya iti vā pratītiḥ na punar vastu bhūta saṃyoga balāt yatas ca na asti kārya kāraṇa bhāvam antareṇa vāstavaḥ sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_282,1–282,2	 tat ayam ityādi badara ādiṣu janana śaktiḥ eva kuṇḍa ādīnām ādhāraḥ iti sambandhaḥ sāmānyasya āśrayaḥ janana śaktyā eva ādhāroḥ tu iti ced āha na ityādi sā iti janana śaktiḥ atra iti sāmānye na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sva upādāna deśaḥ eva jananam janana viśeṣaḥ sa lakṣaṇaṃyasya ādhāra bhāvasya sa tathā tasya ajanya tvāt iti sāmānyasya nitya tvena ajanya tvāt tad abhāveni āśraya abhāvepi sāmānyasya avasthiteḥ hetoḥ āśraya vaśena na sthitiḥ sāmānyasya 
PVVṬ_282,3	 atha ityādinā vyācaṣṭe tasya iti sāmānyasya tat abhāvepi iti vyakti abhāvepi vyaktiśanye deśe sāmānyasya sthānāt yadi hi vyakti śūnye deśe sāmānyam na bhavet tadā tatra apūrva vyakti utpāde sāmānya sambandhaḥ na bhaveta na hi tasya anyatas āgamanam niṣkriya tvāt na ca bhinna deśa avasthitā vyaktiḥ tasya sāmānyasya ādhāraḥ bhinna deśa tvāt eka tvāt sāmānyasya na asti bhinna deśa tā iti ced sarvāḥ tarhi vyaktayaḥ eka jāti matyaḥ eka deśāḥ prāpnuvanti na ca sarvāḥ jāti matyaḥ syuḥ ekasya kathambhinna deśa avasthita tvam iti ced ayam aparosya doṣoḥ tu 
PVVṬ_283,1^1	 patana dharma ityādinā upacaya hetum āha hi śabdaḥ ca arthe api śabda ubhyupagama sūcanā arthaḥ abhyupagamya api ayam prakāraḥ sāmānye vyavasthāpayitum aśakyaḥ sāmānyasya āpatana dharmma tvāt iti evam artham upanyāsaḥ na tu ajanakasya sthāpaka tvam sambhavati atas eva āha atra api ityādi atra api pāta pratibandhāt sthāpaka abhyupagame yadi nyāya vādī kaścid pāta pratibandham na paryanuyuñjīta tadā bhavet ajanakopi sthāpakaḥ sva samaya anurodhena iti ākūtam atra api ayam paryanuyogaḥ sambhavati yaḥ sthāpayitrā kriyatepāta pratibandhaḥ sa sthāpyasya ātma bhūtaḥ vā syāt tata ūrtha antaram vā pāta abhāva mātram vā 
PVVṬ_283,1^2	 na tāvat ātma bhūtaḥ tad svabhāvasya anyatas niṣpatti abhyupagamāt na api artha antaram iti āha arya antara tvebhyupagamyamāne tatra eva pratibandhertha antara bhūte asya ādhārasya upayogaḥ iti kaḥ patataḥ badara ādeḥ pratibandhaḥ vighātaḥ na eva kaścid tatas ca kuṇḍa ādi stham api badara ādi patet eva iti bhāvaḥ ādhāra kṛtena artha antareṇa pāta pratibandhena badara ādeḥ apātaḥ kriyate iti ced āha pratibandhāt apātepi ityādi pratibandha ākhyāt yadā arthāt badara ādeḥ apātebhyupagamyamāne tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ yoyam pratibandha ākhyena padārthena āpātaḥ kriyate sa kim badara ādeḥ ātma bhūtortha antaram vā artha antara tve tatra eva asya pratibandhasya upayogaḥ ityādi sarvam anantara uktam tulyam 
PVVṬ_283,2–283,3	 atha tena api apāta ākhyena arthena badara ādeḥ apātar kriyate tatra api tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ iti āha anavasthā ca iti tasmāt ityādinā tṛtīya pakṣa upanyāsaḥ sa pāta abhāvaḥ katham kenacid kriyate na eva kenacid abhāvasya akārya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ kathantarhi abhāvam karoti iti vyapadeśaḥ iti ced āha abhāvam ityādi abhāvaṅkaroti iti vyapadeśe na abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid kāryaḥ iṣyate kasmāt iti āha tasya ityādi tasya iti abhāvasya kāryatvāt bhāvaḥ eva syāt iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_284,1	 nanu yathā ghaṭa vat kāryatvāt paṭasya na ghaṭa rūpa tā tathā bhāva vat na abhau= asya kārya tvāt abhāva rūpa tā bhaviṣyati iti ced na ghaṭa ādeḥ api hi bhāva rūpa tvam bhavana dharma tvāt eva tat ca abhāvepi asti iti katham na bhāva rūpa tvam abhāva rūpa tvena pratibhāsanāt na bhāva rūpa tā iti ced na abhāvasya pratibhāsā bhāvāt abhāvānāmparaspara vibhāga pratīteḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ paṭa abhāvaḥ iti atra paṭa ādīna ambhedaḥ na abhāvānām ekatvena pratibhāsanāt iti uktam yatas evantasmāt bhāvasya yā kriyā tasyāḥpratiṣedha nirdeśaḥ abhāvaṃkaroti iti 
PVVṬ_284,2	 atas eva spaṣṭayati bhāvam na karoti iti yāvat iti yāvān eva asya vākyasya arthaḥ tāvān eva abhāvam karoti iti asya api iti arthaḥ tathā ca iti pāta pratibandhasya abhāva mātra tvena akārya tve ayam iti kuṇḍādiḥ tena kāraṇena ayam iti badara ādiḥ kena citkuṇḍa ādinā ādhāreṇa pratibaddhaḥ pātāt anivāritaḥ na kadācid tiṣṭhet sadā eva patet iti arthaḥ tasmāt ityādinā upasaṃhāraḥ api śabdāt ādheyaḥ iti anena api vyapadeśena kṣaṇikānām pūrvakṣaṇa saṃgṛhītena upādānena samāna deśasya uttarakṣaṇa saṃgṛhītasya kāryasya utpādanam ucyate tasmāt sāmānye ayam api prakāraḥ na sambhavati iti khyāpanāya abhyupagamya etat uktam pāta pratibandhāt ajana kopi sthāpakaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_284,3	 tam eva asambhavan darśayitum āha astu nāma ityādi pātinā ambada sadīnān tad pratibandhaḥ pāta pratibandhoḥ tu nāma ajanana svabhāvaḥ tad karaṇāt iti pāta pratibandha karaṇāt gatimataḥ dravyasya iti sa kriyasya sāmānyasya punar amūrtta tvāt akriyasya kim lakṣaṇām sthitim kurvāṇaḥ āśrayaḥ sthāpakaḥ syāt na hi sāmānyasya pātaḥ asti yena tad pratibandhaḥ sthitiḥ bhavet kintu sthitiḥ hi tasya sāmānyasya svarūpa apracyutiḥ eva ucyate sā ca svarūpa apracyutiḥ na āśraya āyattā sāmānyasya nitya tvāt abhyupagamya api ucyate sā api āśraya āyattā sāmānyasya sthitiḥ ayuktā eva sāmānyāt tasyāḥ sthiteḥ bheda abheda vivecane anyat tvān anyat tva vicāre kriyamāṇe 
PVVṬ_285,1	 astu nāma ityādinā vyācaṣṭe āśraya hetuka iti āśraya āyattā sā iti sthitiḥ tām eva āśrayāt anyām sthitim saḥ āśrayaḥ karoti na sāmānyam sā sthitiḥ sāmānye pratibaddhā tatas sambandha sambaddhāt sāmānyam upakṛtam eva iti atas āha sā ca ityādi sā iti artha antara bhūtā sthitiḥ na hi tasyāḥ sāmānye pratibandha kāraṇam kiṃcid asti kim sāmānyasya āśrayeṇa kṛtam bhavati iti adhyāhāraḥ 
PVVṬ_285,2^1	 abhyupagamyate eva sthiteḥ sāmānye pratibandhaḥ iti ced āha pratibandhe ca ityādi pratibandhe vā abhyupagamyamāne sthiti karaṇam ced āśrayeṇa janitā yā sthitiḥ tasyāḥ sthiteḥ sthitiḥ sāmānyena kriyate tatas sa āśraya janitā sthitiḥ sāmānyepratibaddhā iti tatra api sthiteḥ sthiti karaṇe tulyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yā sā ca āśraya pratibaddhāyāḥ sthiteḥ sāmānyena sthitiḥ kriyate sā āśraya hetukāyāḥ sthiteḥ ātma bhūtā vā abhavet vyatiriktā vā ātma bhūta tve āśrayeṇa eva sā kṛtā iti katham sāmānyena kriyate vyatirikta tve ca sā eva sthitiḥ sāmānyena kṛtāḥ āśraya janitāyāḥ ādyāyāḥ sthiteḥ kim sāmānyena kṛtam syāt atha sāmānyena dvitīyā sthitiḥ kriyate sā āśrayeṇa janitāyām sthitau pratibaddhāḥ tadā kaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti vācyam sāmānya janitāyāḥ sthiteḥ āśraya janitayā sthityā aparā tṛtīyā sthitiḥ yatas iti tulyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti anavasthā syāt 
PVVṬ_285,2^2	 tatas navasthānāt āśraya janitāyām sthitau sāmānya kṛtasya upakārasya anavadhāraṇāt asya sāmānyasya sambandhinīyam āśrayeṇa janitā sthitiḥ iti apratītiḥ jananam ced pratibandhaḥ iti prakṛtam na sāmānyena āśraya janitāyāḥ sthiteḥ aparā sthitiḥ kriyate kintu sā eva ādyā sthitiḥ janyate iti tadā kevalam sāmānyam samartham sthitiṃkarotu kim āśrayeṇa śāvaleya ādinām sthiti karaṇāya apekṣitena na hi anupakāra riṇī a pekṣā yuktā tasmāt apekṣā iti hi tad pratibandhaḥ asmin vastuni asya apekṣā iti yā iyam apekṣā sā tasmin= apekṣye pratibandhaḥ tat āyatta tā sa ca pratibandhaḥ nitya tvāt anādheya atiśayasya ayuktaḥ iti kevalam sāmānyam sthitim janayet iti na asti anyaḥ āśrayaḥ sthiti hetuḥ tatas ca sthiti karaṇāt āśrayassāmānyasya ādhāraḥ iti etat ayuktam iti bhāvaḥ evambheda abheda vivecanaḥ iti yat uktantataḥ bheda pakṣaḥ tāvat apanītaḥ 
PVVṬ_286,1–286,2	 dvitīya pakṣam āśritya āha abhedaḥ ityādi sāmānyāt abhede vā sthiteḥ abhyupagamyamāne svarūpam eva tat sthiti rūpam sāmānyasya tat ca svarūpam sāmānyasyanityam asti iti na sthiti rasya sāmānyasya kenacid āśrayeṇa kriyate yatas evantasmāt ityādi tat ityādinā upasaṃhāraḥ tat iti tasmāt asya iti sāmānyasya tat evam vṛttiḥ ādheya tā vyaktiḥ iti yat pakṣa dvayam uktantataḥ ādyasya nirāsaḥ kṛtaḥ 
PVVṬ_286,3–286,4	 dvitīya pakṣam āśritya āha atha punar ityādi avyaktasya iti aprakāśitasya vyakta iti āśrayeṇa jñānasya akāraṇa tvāt tad vyakteḥ tena āśrayeṇa prakāśanam yat tat eva tatra āśraye sāmānyasya vṛttiḥ syāt na ityā cā ryaḥ āṃtmani sva viṣaye vijñāna utpādanam tatra yogya tvam sāmāni antad artham anya anurodhi kāraṇa antara sāpekṣam yat tat vastu vyaṅgyam pratītam tasyāḥ ca sva viṣaya jñāna janana yogya tāyāḥ kāraṇam yat pradīpa ādi tad vyaṅgyasya kārakam eva janakam eva pūrvam ayogyasya paścāt vijñāna janana yogyasya ghaṭa ādeḥ utpādanāt 
PVVṬ_286,5	 yadi punar pradīpa ādi sannidhānāt prāk api ghaṭa ādi su a ākāra jñāna janana yogī antadā prāk eva asya ca ghaṭa ādeḥ yogya tve tat apekṣā iti pradīpa apekṣā sāmānyasya nitya tvāt avikāryasya tat iti yathā ukta lakṣaṇam vyaṅgya tvam sāmānyavataḥ iti āśrayāt sakāśāt kutonā eva iti arthaḥ aparam iti sva santānāt anyambhāvam eva janayan vyañjakaḥ ucyate kimbhūtaṃsva viṣayasya vijñāna utpādana samartham sajātīya upādāna apekṣam iti sva santāna saṅgṛhīta pūrva kṣaṇa sāpekṣam yathā andhakāra avasthita ghaṭa ādi kṣaṇa sāpekṣam vijñāna janana samartham uttaram ghaṭa kṣaṇan janayat prakāśakaḥ 
PVVṬ_287,1	 nanu pradīpa kārya tve ghaṭasya pradīpoya cayepi ghaṭasya upacayopi syāt iti ced na upādāna gatāt vibhedāt kāryasya bhedaḥ na sahakāri gatāt sahakāri kāraṇam ca pradīpa ādiḥ vyaṅgyasya ghaṭasya iti kutas mahatva ādi prasaṅgosya yadvā abhivyaktau= api kriyamāṇāyām tulyoyam prasaṅgaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat na ca vyaṅgyakṣaṇa sadṛśasya kṣaṇasya mṛd piṇḍāt utpattiḥ api tu pradīpāt eva iti kutonyādṛśāt tādṛśasya utpattiḥ anapekṣam ca iti yathā sajātīya upādāna apekṣam sva viṣaya vijñāna janana samartham śabdam janayan= abhighātaḥ na hi abhighātāt prāk śabdosti yena samāna jātīya apekṣaḥ śabdaḥ bhavet śabdopi hi vyaṅgyaḥ paraiḥ iṣyate iti evam uktam 
PVVṬ_287,2	 yadi tarhi kārakaḥ eva vyañjakaḥ kaḥ tarhi kāraka vyañjakayoḥ hetvoḥ viśeṣaḥ iti atas āha paratra ityādi vyañjakāt anyasmin kāraka tvena abhimataḥ iti arthaḥ jñāna jana śaktiḥ anākṣiptāḥ janyasya na hi sva viṣaya vijñāna janana samartham eva kāryam kārakeṇa bīja ādinā janyate tatas janana mātreṇa kāraka tvam sva viṣaya vijñāna janana samartha kārya utpādana lakṣaṇena tu viśeṣeṇa vyañjaka tvam iti 
PVVṬ_287,3	 yadi api vyañjakāt vyaṅgyaḥ vijñāna utpādana yogya tām pratilabhate tathā api na janyate iti ced āha yadi hi ityādi yatas iti vyañjakāt sa ced vyaṅgyaḥ tasya iti vyañjakasya sā yogyatā asya vyaṅgyasya vyañjaka sannidhānāt prāk eva asti yatas vyaṅgyasya svabhāva bhūtā sā yathā avyaṅgyaḥ prāk eva asti tathā tad svabhāva bhūtā api yogya tā tam apekṣate iti vyañjakam vyaṅgyāt vyatiriktā eva yogyatā vyañjakena kriyate iti ced āha para ityādi asyām iti yogyatāyām sā eva yogya tā tatas iti vyañjakāt sthiti vat prasaṅgaḥ yat uktam anyā ced sthitiḥ tām eva āśrayaḥ karoti ityādi tat iha api prasajyeta tam iti vyaṅgyam na api vyaṅgyāt anyat tad karaṇe vyaṅgyasya na kiñcid iti kṛtvā apekṣyate iti anena upakāri tvam uktam akiṃcitkara tvena tad pratiṣedhaḥ tatas vyāhatam etat 
PVVṬ_288,1	 yat uktam janakaḥ eva vyañjakaḥ iti tasya tat tu ityādinā vyabhicāram āha na hi dhūma ugneḥ janakaḥ atha ca kārya tvāt tasya vyañjakaḥ ādi śabdāt balākā ādiḥ salilasya sattyam ityādinā pariharati na tu dhūmam liṅgam apekṣya agniḥ ātmani sva lakṣaṇe jñānam janayati kasmāt tathābhūtasya anumeya tvena abhimatasya agneḥ sākṣāt ajanaka tvāt anyathā agni sva lakṣaṇa ākāra tvāt pratyakṣāt pratibhāsā viśeṣaḥ syāt kevalam ityādinā upādāna kāraṇam eva tasya sākṣāt janakam iti ādarśayati liṅga jñānam upādānam na viṣaya balena agni sva lakṣaṇa balena kiṅkāraṇam asati api tasmin vahnau pūrva dhvaḥ tepi bhāvāt agni jñānasya katham iti āha paramparayā ityādi liṅga anusārī liṅga anusmaraṇa vikalpaḥ tena tathā hi kasyacid puruṣasya kvacid dhūman dṛṣṭavataḥ dhvaste dhūme vahnau ca katham api tatra dhūma anusmaraṇa vikalpaḥ utpanne paścāt anvaya vyatireka anusmaraṇāt abhūt atra dhūmaḥ tasmāt vahniḥ api atra āsīt iti evam paramparayā agni janya dhūmāt agni jñānam utpadyate eva 
PVVṬ_288,2	 na api ityādinā pūrva uktam atra eva yojayati sāmānya ākāra avabhāsi ca anumāna jñānam na sannihita viṣaya tā vinaṣṭepi hi viṣaye anutpanne ca sambhavāt yadā api sannihitaḥ viṣayaḥ tadā api na viṣaya balena utpattiḥ iti niveditam prāk na hi vikalpāḥ ityādinā bhāva abhāvānavidhānāt ca sāmarthyan na pratiditi ādinā tṛtīye paricchede pratipādayiṣyate ca sākṣāt upayogena svarūpa anukāri vijñāna janana sāmarthyena tatra iti sva viṣaya jñāna janane param iti pradīpa ādikam tatas iti apekṣyāt pradīpa ādeḥ 
PVVṬ_289,1–289,2	 etat uktam bhavati na sarvaḥ vyañjakaḥ janakaḥ iti ucyate kintu su a ākāra jñāna janakasya parasya sāhāyyam yaḥ pratipadyate saḥ eva tatas na asti vyabhicāraḥ iti sāmānyam api su a ākāra jñāna janana āśrayam apekṣate iti vyaṅgyam iṣṭantataḥ tena āśrayāt upalambha yogyaḥ ātmā labdhavyaḥ na ca ayam ātma pratilambhaḥ sāmānyasya kutaścid sambhavati nitya tvena abhyupagata tvāt tat iti sāmānyam na eva ityādi paraḥ sva āśraya samavāya vyaktim brūmaḥ iti sambandhaḥ sva āśraya samavāyaḥ katham vyaktiḥ iti ced āha sva āśraya ityādi tat iti sāmānyam anyatra iti sva āśraye 
PVVṬ_289,3	 uktam ityā cā ryaḥ tat eva idam anupakārakasya āśraya tvam na sambhāvayāmaḥ ityādinā ukta tvāt sva āśraya samavetam hi tad ā ātmani anyatra vā vijñāna hetuḥ iti bruvāṇena sva āśraya sāvāya apekṣaḥ sāmānya padārthaḥ vijñāna hetuḥ iṣṭaḥ tatas ca tena sva āśraya samavāyena sāmānya ātmā janyasya syāt kiṅkāraṇam tad hetoḥ jñāna hetoḥ svabhāvasya sva āśraya samavāyāt prāgbhāvāt sva āśraya samavāye sati paścāt ca tatas sva āśraya samavāyāt vijñāna hetoḥ svabhāvasya bhāvāt nityam sāmānyasya vijñāna janana svabhāva tvāt asiddham etat iti ced āha nittyam ityādi tad svabhāva sadbhāvaḥ iti vijñāna janana svabhāva īprāk api sva āśraya samavāyāt vyakti śūnyepi deśe kevalāt sāmānyāt iti arthaḥ sāmānya ākāra vijñāna udaya prasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_289,4–290,1	 na ityādi paraḥ vyaktiḥ āśrayaḥ sāmānyasya saṃskāraḥ yogyatādhānantasmāt hetoḥ navyañjikā sāmānyasya yena tayā janyam syāt sāmānyam kintarhi tad grāhiṇaḥ iti sāmānya grāhiṇaḥ saṃskārāt vyañjaka iti prakṛtam yopī ityādyā cā ryaḥ añjana ādeḥ iva iti vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ añjana ādeḥ sakāśāt yathā indriya saṃskāraḥ yuktaḥ na evam vyakteḥ sakāśāt kasmāt pratipatteḥ jñānasya vyañjaka tvena abhimatāyāḥ vyakteḥ bhāva abhāva kālayoḥ saptamī dvivacanam etat
