PVVṬ_290,2	 saṃskṛtam ityādinā vyācaṣṭe añjana ādibhiḥ saṃskṛtam indriyam kaṃcid atiśayam ātma bhūtam āsādayati pratipattau pratipatti nimittam viśiṣṭa jñāna utpādanāya iti yāvat nimittāt karmma saṃyogaḥ iti anena atra saptamī kutas etat iti ced āha spaṣṭa ityādi pratipatteḥ iti vibhakti vipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ tathā hi timira ādi upa hatam indriyam aspaṣṭam vijñānañjanayati tat eva añjana ādi saṃskṛtam spaṣṭataḥ avasīyate saṃskṛtam indriyam pratipatti artham atiśayam āsādayati iti 
PVVṬ_290,3	 atha añjana ādeḥ sakāśāt na pratipatti bhedaḥ tadā tad akāriṇaḥ ca pratipatti bhedā kāriṇaḥ ca añjana ādeḥ atad saṃskārandriyā saṃskāraka tvāt yathā añjana ādeḥ sakāśāt indriyasya saṃskāraḥ na evam vyakteḥ sakāśāt kiṅkāraṇam tad bhāva abhāva kālayoḥ ityādi tathā hi vyañjikāyāḥ go vyakteḥ abhāva kāle yādṛśam cakṣuḥ vijñānam vṛkṣa ādau= utpannantasyāḥ go vyakteḥ abhāvepi vṛkṣa ādau tādṛśam eva yadi tad abhāva kāle pūrvam aspaṣṭam vijñānam vṛkṣa ādiṣu utpannam paścāt go vyakti kṛtaḥ indriya saṃskāraḥ gamyeta 
PVVṬ_290,4	 viṣaya saṃskāra īpi sati viṣaya antare na eva pratipatti bhedaḥ asti atas sā upi na yuktaḥ iti ced āha viṣaya ityādi viṣayasya gandhādeḥ yaḥ kenacid saṃskāraḥ saḥ indriya aviśeṣa īpi yadi nāma anyatra viṣaya antare indriyasya pratipattim prati viśeṣaḥ na asti tathā api tad viveṣa ādhānantasya saṃskṛta viṣaya grāhakasya jñānasya viśeṣa ādhānāt upakārī syāt na indriya saṃskāraḥ upakārī syāt iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_291,1	 etat uktam bhavati viṣayāḥ hi viniyatāḥ te su a ākārasya eva vijñānasya sādhanam na ākāra antara yuktasya tatas viṣaya saṃskāraḥ pratiniyata tvāt sva viṣayām eva viśiṣṭām pratipattin janayan na virudhyate indriyam tu sva grāhye viṣaya bhede tulyam sādhanam atas tad saṃskāraḥ sarvasmin= tad grāhye pratipatteḥ bhedakaḥ prāpnoti iti na indriyasya vyakti bhedaḥ tad indriya grāhye sarvasmin dṛśye viṣaye spaṣṭa ākāra jñāna jananāya saṃskāram ādhatte kintarhi vyakti utpatteḥ prāc adṛśye sāmānye indriyasya darśana śakti ādhānāt kāraṇāt vyakti bhedaḥ upakārakam iti ced atīndriya darśanāt eva ca spaṣṭam indriyasya saṃskāraḥ gamyate vyakti sannidhānāt pūrvam asamarthampaścāt tad sannidhāne samartham iti sa vyakti bheda uti indriyam sāmānya ākhyam arthan darśayan katham pratipatteḥ sarvatra na bhedakaḥ bhedakaḥ eva iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_291,2^1	 etat uktam bhavati dṛśyepi tāvat aspaṣṭe spaṣṭa ākāra darśana śakti ādhānāt añjana ādi kṛtaḥ indriya saṃskāraḥ sarvatra tad indriya grāhye viṣaye pratipatteḥ bhedakaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kim punar yoti indriyasya arthasya darśakaḥ tathā ca anyasya api atīndriyasya paramāṇu ādeḥ darśakaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ sāmānyasya eva darśanāya indriyasya saṃskāram ādhatte vyakti bhedaḥ tatas na asti atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ced āha eka ityādi ekasmin sāmānye draṣṭavye indriya saṃskārasya pratiniyamaḥ tasmin= abhyupagamyamāne tasmin= eva vyakti bhede śāvaleya ādi kesamavetam yat sāmānya antaram sattā dravya tva ādi tasya darśakaḥ indriya saṃskāraḥ na syāt iṣyate ca ātma samavetānām eva sarva sāmānyānān darśanāya indriya saṃskāraḥ na ekasya eva iti ced āha 
PVVṬ_291,2^2	 vyaktyā ca ityādi tad darśanaḥ iti teṣām vyakti samavetānām sāmānyānān darśane tad vyaṅgyeṣu tayā vyaktyā vyaṅgyeṣu dṛṣṭaḥ ca dūrāt dravya mātra darśane dravya tvam artha tvayoḥ niścayepi sati go tva ādau= aniścayaḥ yasmin= aniścayaḥ tasya darśanāya na ahitaḥ saṃskāra bhedaḥ iti ced āha eka niścayaḥ vā iti na syāt iti sambandhaḥ eka śabda unyārthaḥ aniścitāt anyasya api niścita abhimatasya dravya tva ādeḥ niścayaḥ na syāt kiṅkāraṇam tasyāḥ vyakteḥ avibhāga mayāḥ teṣu sva ātma samavetā iṣu sāmānyeṣu viśeṣa abhāvāt na hi sā vyaktiḥ kvacid pratyāsannā kvacid na tatas sarvasya vā niścayaḥ sāmānyasya na vā kasyacid api iti evantā vat vyakteḥ indriya saṃskāraḥ na ghaṭataḥ iti ākhyātam 
PVVṬ_292,1	 adhunā abhyupagamyā api ucyate vyakteḥ ityādi vyaktessakāśāt pakṣa dvayepi sāmānyasya vijñāna janana svabhāvaḥ iti kṛtvā tasmāt vijñāna jananāt svabhāvāt pracyuteḥ kāraṇāt na hi samarthasya sahakāri apekṣā yuktāḥ saṃskṛtam indriyam sahakāri yasya sāmānyasya tat tathā uktantadbhāvaḥ tasmāt nitya tvāt anādheya atiśayasya sāmānyasya koyam sahakāra arthaḥ na eva kaścid 
PVVṬ_292,2–292,3	 anittyā hi ityādinā vyatirekam āha sahakāriṇaḥ sakāśāt viśiṣṭasya ātmanaḥ lābhāt tam iti sahakāriṇam kasmāt yaḥ hi eṣām kṣaṇikānām janakaḥ ātmā sahakāri sannidheḥ prāk nāsīt tadā eva sahakāri sannidhi kāle tatas sahakāriṇaḥ sakāśāt bhavati iti kṛtvā eṣām iti kṣaṇikānām nanu kṣaṇikānām api katham sahakāriṇaḥ viśiṣṭa ātmalābha apekṣā sahabhāvināmparasparam anupakārya upakāraka tvāt yaḥ ca kṣaṇaḥ jāyate na tasya sat asattva kālayossahakārī apekṣā iti 
PVVṬ_292,4	 ayuktam uktam upakārī hi apekṣate iti na eṣa doṣaḥ sattā apekṣayā etat ucyate atas eva āha janyatā eva eṣām parasparatā upekṣā iti anāsādya param iti sahakāriṇam tad svabhāvaṃsam artha svabhāvam na hi tasya sāmānyasya kevalasya sahakāri vikalasya prāk yaḥ na vijñāna janana svabhāvaḥ sa punar kathaṃcid bhāvī na hi iti sambandhaḥ nitya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_293,1	 kiñca vyakteḥ sāmānya saṃskāre sati tat janyam sāmānyam syāt iti pareṇa indriya saṃskāra uṅgīkṛtaḥ vyakteḥ sakāśāt tathā api vyakti janya tvam prasajyate iti āha vyaktiḥ ityādi tad sahakāri vyakti saṃskṛta indriya sahakāri sāmānyam vijñāna hetuḥ iti abhyupagamyamāne vyakti kāryasya indriyasya kāryatvāt sāmānyam vyakteḥ pāramparyeṇa kāryam uktam syāt 
PVVṬ_293,2	 bhavatu nāma sāmānyasya vyañjikā vyaktiḥ tāvat asyāḥ jātimat tvam na yuktam atiprasaṅgāt iti āha api ca ityādi jātīnām sāmānyānām vyañjakasya vyakti bhedasya jāti mattā yadi iṣyate tadā go tva ādeḥ prakāśakaḥ pradīpa ādiḥ vyañjaka tvāt tena go tva ādinā tadvān go tva ādimān prāptaḥ śāvaleya ādi vat go tva ādhāraḥ prāptaḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_293,3	 yaḥ hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe go tva ādiṣu vyaṅgyeṣu vijñāna hetu tvam pradīpa ādeḥ api asti katham iti ced āha tejaḥ ityādi tasmāt asti ālokasya vijñānam prati hetu tvam tatas iti jñāna hetu tvāt pradīpa ādayaḥ iti ādi śabdāt indriya saṃskāra ādi parigrahaḥ teṣām api jñāna hetu tvāt vyakteḥ sakāśāt viśiṣṭasya eva abhivyaktiḥ sāmānyasya bhavati na tathā pradīpa ādeḥ iti ced āha na hi ityādi vyakteḥ api sakāśāt sāmānyasya abhivyaktiḥ jñāna hetu tām muktvā na hi anyā kācid yadi hi sāmānyasya atiśaya ādhānam vyaktyā kriyate na pradīpa ādinā tadā bhavet viśeṣaḥ tat ca na asti svabhāva atiśayasya ādhātum aśakya tvāt nitya tvāt sāmānyasya iti bhāvaḥ samavāya etyādi vyaktau ca samavetam go tvam na pradīpa ādau tasya iti sāmānyasya ajanya janakayoḥ koyam samavāyaḥ iti ukta tvāt 
PVVṬ_294,1	 bhavatu nāma samavāyaḥ tathā api asya sāmānyasya samavāya mātram vyaktyā saha jātam na anyaḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ vijñāna janana lakṣaṇaḥ pūrvavat iti vyakti samavāyāt prāgvat paścāt api vyakti samavāya ipi yadi api sāmānyasya na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tathā api samavāya balāt eva sva viṣaya jñāna jananam iti ced āha samavāyāt eva ityādi jñāna hetu tvena sāmānyasya abhyupagamyamāne sva āśrayaḥ yaḥ yatra samavetaḥ tad samavāyinam sāmānyasya abhyupagamyamāne sva āśrayaḥ yaḥ yatra samavetaḥ tad samavāyinam sāmānyāt anyeṣām api paramāṇu samavetānām rūpa ādīnām api dṛśyatā āpattiḥsyāt samavāyasya ekatvena sarvatra aviśeṣāt yathā hi sāmānyam atīndriyam api kevala ssamavāyaḥ darśayati evam paramāṇu gatān api rūpa ādīn kin na darśayet yatas ca samavāya pakṣe ayan doṣaḥ tasmāt jñāna hetu tā eva sāmānye vyakteḥ vyañjaka tvam tat ca ittham bhūtam vyañjaka tvantulyam pradīpa aṃdau= api iti saḥ eva prasaṅaḥ prāptaḥ go tva ādinā tat vāniti ādikaḥ 
PVVṬ_294,2–294,3	 tat iti tasmāt na ādheya tā sāmānyasya sva āśraye vṛttiḥ na api sva āśrayeṇa vyakti rabhi vyaktiḥ sva āśraye sāmānyasya vṛttiḥ atas ca āvṛtteḥ kāraṇāt sāmāni anna anekatra vyakti bhede eka ākāra jñāna hetuḥ na hi yaḥ yatra na varttate sa tatra ātma vṛtti dvāreṇa jñāna hetuḥ yuktaḥ atas eva anekatra ekasya sāmānyasya āvṛtteḥ kāraṇāt vyakteḥ sakāśāt anyā yadi jātiḥ athavā an anyā yeṣām vādinām vyaktiṣu apūrvāsu saṃprati utpannāsu paścāt vā dṛśyamānāsu tu śabdaḥ vidyate śabdāt pareṇa draṣṭa vyovadhāraṇa arthaḥ atas eva āha vidyataā iva ityādi vastu sataḥ yeṣām jātiḥ iti yāvat sva sāmarthye sati sva pratipatti dvāreṇa anyatra iti vyakti bhede buddhin janayan kim viśiṣṭām svarūpa anukāriṇīm eka rūpa anugatāṃyatra buddhin janayati tena sambandham apekṣate sambandham antareṇa su a ākāra buddhi janane ati prasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_295,1^1	 sa ca iti sambandhaḥ vyakti antareṇa sāmānyasya sataḥ vidyamānasya tattva pakṣe anyat tva pakṣe ca na sambhavati kasmāt ekatra vyakti bhedasya artha antara bhūtasya anartha antarasya ca anyatra vyakti antare darśana asambhavāt sā hi ityādina etat eva sādhayati sā hi buddhiḥ bhūta grāhiṇī vastu bhūta sāmānya grāhiṇī eka bhāvinī ekatra vyakti bhede utpannā vyakti antaram eva sā skandet gacchet vyakti antaram api sāmānya ākāreṇa gṛhṇīyāt iti yāvat yadi tatra ekasmin vyakti bhede dṛṣṭam kiñcid vastu bhūtam sāmānyam anyatra iti yatra vyakti bhede tayā skanditavyam tat ca aṃ= yatra darśanam 
PVVṬ_295,1^2	 sataḥ iti vastu bhūtasya sāmānyasya na sambhavati iti sambandhaḥ kiṅkāraṇam āśrayāt ananya tvebhyupagamyamāna invaya abhāvāt na hi ekasmāt avyatiriktaḥ tad ātma bhūta uni adanveti āśrayāt anyat tvepi sāmanyasya vyaktau= anapa āśrayāt anantara uktena ādhārādheya ādi bhāva niṣedhena āśraya bhāvasya niṣiddha tvāt yadi vyatiriktasya sāmānyasya asambandhāt na vyakti antare su a ākāra jñāna jananam evantarhi ādyāyām api vyaktau tad tulyam iti kim ucyate vyaktiṣu apūrvāsu iti vyaktiṣu iti eva vaktavyam tathā ekatra dṛṣṭasya anyatra darśana asambhavāt iti api vaktavyam ekatra api vyakti bhede sambandham antareṇa darśana asambhavāt 
PVVṬ_295,2–296,1	 satyam etat abhyupagamya etat uktam itya doṣaḥ yopi manyate tattva anyat tva pakṣe sāmānyasya anya darśanam na sambhavati asmākantu bhinna abhinnam eva sāmānyam tathā hi nirviśeṣam na sāmānyam bhavet śaśa viṣāṇa vat kenacid ca ātmanā eka tvam nānātvam ca asya kenacid yadā ca śabalam vastu yugapad pratibhāsate tadā anyā ananyabheda ādi sarvam eva pralīyate iti tad niṣedha artham āha svabhāvaḥ hi ityādi svabhāvāt tattvam eva anyat tvam eva vā na laṃghayati iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_296,2	 nanu deśa kāla svabhāva abhedepi sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ anugata vyāvṛtti rūpābhyām bheda upīṣyate iti atas āha rūpasya anugatasya svabhāvasya atat bhūtasya vyāvṛtta rūpa svabhāvasya anyat tva avyatikramāt vyāvṛttebhyaḥ viśeṣa rūpebhyaḥ bhinnasya anugata rūpasya sāmānyasya anyat tvam eva syāt iti arthaḥ asti atat rūpa tvam anyat tvam eva katham iti atas āha idam eva ityādi yat na tat iti atad rūpam iti arthaḥ etāvat eva anyat tva lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ ākāra antara vat ṣaṣṭhī arthe vatiḥ tathā hi sukhāt duḥkhasya api anyat tvam asukha rūpam duḥkham iti kṛtvā iyatā ca atad rūpasya anyat tva lakṣaṇena vyāptiḥ uktāḥ asya ca anyat tva lakṣaṇasya aviśeṣāt abhimatepi sāmānye 
PVVṬ_296,3	 etena pakṣa dharmaḥ uktaḥ prayogaḥ tu yat vastu tve satya tad rūpantasya tata unyat tvam eva tat yathā sukhāt duḥkhasya vastu tve satya vyakti rūpam ca iṣyate sāmānyam iti atad rūpa tvena anyat tve vyavahārasya sādhya tvāt svabhāva hetuḥ evantāvat atat rūpa tve sāmānyasya anyat tvam eva āpāditam atha anyat tvam na iṣyate tadā tattvam prāpnoti iti āha tat ca ityādi vyakteḥ ananyat tadā tat eva vyakti rūpam eva tat sāmānyambhavati atattve iti avyakti rūpa tvevaḥ tu antara vat anyat tva prasaṅgāt etat ca anantaram eva uktam 
PVVṬ_296,4^1	 astu ananyat tvam sāmānyasya tathā api vyakti antaram anuyāsyati iti atas āha na ca eka ityādi eka vyakti svabhāvasya vyakti antara anvāveśonugamaḥ vyakti antara svabhātvam iti yāvat kasmāt tasya avagamyamānasya avyakti antara tva prasaṅgāt yadi śābaleya ātmakam sāmānyam bāhuleyasya ātma bhūtam bhavet tadā bāhuleyaḥ śābaleyaḥ eva jātaḥ śābaleya ātmakāt sāmānyāt avyaktiḥ eka acchā baleya vat iti kutosya vyakti antara tvam tata eti tasmāt vyakteḥ avyatirekiṇaḥ sāmānyāt sakāśāt anvayinī iti anugāminī na api vyatirekiṇaḥ sāmānyāt anvayinī buddhiḥ iti prakṛtam kasmāt tasya vyatiriktasya sāmānyasya kvacid bhede anāśrayāt apravṛtteḥ 
PVVṬ_296,4^2	 sambandham antareṇa pravṛtti ayogāt vṛttiḥ ādheya tā vyaktiḥ iti tasmin na yujyate ityādinā ca vyaṅgya vyañjakasya ādhāra ādheya bhāvasya ca sambandhasya niṣiddha tvāt anyaḥ tarhi sāmānya tadvatoḥ sambandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced āha anyasya api ityādi vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāva ādeḥ iti pañcamī ādi śabdāt ādhāra ādheya bhāva parigrahaḥ etasmāt pūrva niṣiddhāt sambandha dvayāt anyasya api yasya kasyacid sambandhasya vyaktim prati sāmānyasya abhāvāt kiṅkāraṇam nitya tvāt kenacid vyakti bhedena anupakāryasya sāmānyasya apratibandhena na hi apratibandhasya kaścid sambandhoḥ ti iti uktam 
PVVṬ_297,1–297,2	 etena ca anyat tve apāśrayāt iti śloka bhāgaḥ vyākhyātaḥ asat sambandham api sāmānyam vyaktiṣu sva rūpa anukāriṇīm pratītim janayati iti ced āha asambandhāt ityādi na asya sambandha usti iti vigrahaḥ sarvasmāt sarvatra pratītiḥ syāt iti arthaḥ tat iti tasmāt ayam iti sā mā nya vā dī ekasya sāmānyasya darśanena hetunā ekasmin śābaleye vyakti bhede vṛttiḥ yasya tasya anyatra vyakti antare vṛttim anvicchin vastu tvena iṣṭasya sāmānyasya vyakteḥ sakāśāt ye tattva anyat tve te nākramati vastunaḥ gati antara abhāvāt ca uktaḥ doṣaḥ iti ayuktam etat vastu bhūtāt sāmānyāt anuyāyi jñānam iti 
PVVṬ_297,3	 yatas evantasmāt artheṣu paraspara vivekiṣu iyam eka rūpa eka ākārā pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ eva bhinneṣu abheda adhyāropeṇa vṛtteḥ kutas tarhi sotman = a iti a āha vikalpa ityādi vijātīya vyāvṛtta padārtha anubhavena yā tathābhūta vikalpasya prakṛtyā janikā vāsanā hitāḥ tatas samutthitāḥ etat ca prāk eva uktam iti āha bhāva bhedaḥ ityādi bhāvānāntad kāryāṇām atad kāryebhyaḥ bhedaḥ tathābhūtānām ca anubhāvena āhitāḥ yā vāsanā tasyāḥ prakṛtiḥ ca svabhāvaḥ ca asyāḥ āśrayaḥ iti nirṇītam etat prāka tatra bhāva bhedaḥ pāramparyeṇa kāraṇaṃvāsanā prakṛtiḥ sākṣāt iti dvayam upanyastam yadi anya apohaḥ eva śabda vācyaḥ kathantarhi idānīm ityādi pradhāna īśvara ādi kārya śabdāḥ iti pra dhā na kārya mī śva ra kāryan jagat iti ādi śabdāccha bda bra hma pariṇāmaḥ ityādi śabdānām parigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_298,1	 bhāveṣu ādhyātmika bāhyeṣu atad bhūtaḥ apradhāna ādi kārya ātmakaḥ bhedaḥ yeṣa ante tathā uktāḥ yadi api apradhāna kāryāt teṣām bhedaḥ syāt tadā bhavet pradhāna ādi kārya ātmakaḥ bhedaḥ saḥ eva ca sarveṣām abhedaḥ tena abhedena animittena sarvatra varttante sa ca na asti bhāvānām anya apoha vādinaḥ matena apradhāna ādi kārya ātmaka tvāt tatas ca katham evaṃbhūteṣu abhedena varttante na eva iti abhiprāyaḥ tatas ca avyāpini apoha vyavasthā iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_298,2	 tepi ityādinā pariharati tepi pradhāna ādi kārya śabdāḥ vikalpa vijñāna pratibhāsini arthe pravarttante iti sambandhaḥ katham iti āha saṃketa ityādi vastuni atathā bhūte icchā vaśāt yaḥ saṃketaḥ pradhāna kārya jagat iti tena āhitāḥ yā vāsanā śakti stayā uttara uttara kṣaṇa vipariṇāmena upaskṛta tvāt vijñāna santateḥ sarveṣām bāhya adhyatmikānām arthānām darśaneṣu anubhaveṣu satsu api anapekṣya tad bhedam apradhāna kāryāt bhedam vastu gatam yadi nāma arthānām apradhāna kāryāṇām eva darśanam vastu dharmeṇa tathā api vastu svabhāvam anapekṣya iti arthaḥ tathā adhyavasāyāt yathā saṃketam apradhāna kāryān api bhāvān pradhāna kārya tvena adhyavasānāt atathābhūta kalpita pradhāna kārya tvena kalpitam caitanyam sām khye na tasya vyavacchedena pradhāna kārya abhāvāḥ iti yat vikalpa vijñānantad pratibhāsinī arthe saḥ eva vijātīya vyavacchedena anya apohaḥ iti bhāvaḥ kim bhūtāḥ te śabdāḥ iti āha upādāna ityādi vikalpa hetoḥ vāsanāyāḥ dārḍhyam upādāna balantasmāt prabhavaḥ utpādaḥ yasya vikalpasya tasmāt samutthitāḥ 
PVVṬ_298,3	 etat uktam bhavati yadi nāma vastuni tathābhūta bheda abhāvaḥ tathā api vikalpa āropitaḥ eva anya apohaḥ śabdānām pravṛtteḥ aṅgantataḥ na asya avyāpitā doṣaḥ iti pradhāna ādi kārya śabdānām abhedena pravṛttau teṣu bhāveṣu sāmānyam eva vastu bhūtam kinneṣyate iti ced āha na hi ityādi teṣu pradhāna kārya tvena adhyāropiteṣu atatha abhuteṣu pradhāna kārya iṣu vyakti abhāvāt sāmānyasya abhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_299,1–299,2	 anya apoha vādinaḥ tu na doṣaḥ iti āha tathā ityādi pradhāna ādi kāryatva kalpanayā iti arthaḥ tad anyasya apradhāna ādi kāryasya bhedaḥ vyavacchedaḥ pradhāna ādi kārya tvena āropitānām bhāvānām pratipad tṛṇā madhyavasāya vaśāt syāt tad adhyavasāya vaśāt eva pratipa paadhi avasāya vaśāt eva śāvaleya ādiṣu anuvṛtti pratyaya nimittam sāmānyam kinna iti ced 
PVVṬ_299,3–299,4	 na etat asti yasmāt tena sāmānya vādinā sāmānyam kalpayata api avaśyam tatra śābaleya ādiṣu vijātīyāt bhedaḥ na antarīyaka tayā iṣṭa vyonyathā go tva ādeḥ asiddhiḥ syāt saḥ eva bhedaḥ sāmānya kārye abhinna śabda pravṛtti ādi lakṣaṇe paryāptaḥ śaktaḥ iti evam niṣprayojanā sāmānya kalpanā etat uktam bhavati yathā pradhāna kāryeṣu api bhāveṣu sāmānyam antareṇa pradhāna ādi kārya śabdāḥ tad buddhayaḥ ca eka ākārāḥ pravarttante tathā gavā ādiṣu gavā ādi śabdāḥ tad buddhayaḥ ca eka ākārāḥ kinneṣyante kim sāmānyena pāramārthikena kalpitena dṛṣṭā ca paraiḥ api sāmānyam antareṇa bahuṣu sāmānyeṣu abhinna abhidhāna pratyaya vṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_299,5–299,7	 tad uktambha ṭṭaḥ dyaḥ te kaḥ rā bhyām tasmāt ekasya bhinneṣu yā vṛttiḥ tad nibandhanaḥ sāmānya śabdaḥ sattā ādau= eka dhīkaraṇena vā iti śloka vā ākṛ tena ayam arthaḥ yathā pratyekam aneka artha samavāyi tvena sattva dravya tva ādau sāmānya śabdaḥ tad buddhiḥ ca sāmānyam antareṇa pravarttete na ca aneka artha samavāyi tvam sāmānyam yat eva sattve tat eva dravya tvādau= asti niḥsāmānyāni sāmānyāni iti vacanāt na ca upacārāt tayoḥ śabda jñānayoḥ vṛttiḥ askhalat buddhi grāhya tvāt tasmāt yathā sāmānyam vinā tayoḥ sattā ādau vṛttiḥ tathā śābaleya ādiṣu sāmānyam antareṇa yathā śābaleyaḥ ago vyāvṛttaḥ tathā bāhuleyaḥ ago vyāvṛttaḥ tathā khaṇḍaḥ a go vyāvṛttaḥ itya bhinna abhidhāna pratyaya vṛttiḥ kinneṣyate iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_299,8^1	 syāt etat sarvatra sāmānya buddhiḥ nirviṣaya iṣṭā eva kevalam sāmānyam antareṇa kvacid avisamvādaḥ na syāt iti atas āha yadi ityādi yadi śabda ubhyupagamat yotana arthaḥ yat i asyāḥ sarvatra nirviṣaya tvam abhyupagamyate satsu iti vidyamāneṣu bhāveṣu ago vyāvṛtteṣu asatsu iti paramārthataḥ pra dhā ne śva rā dikāryatayā avidyamāneṣu bhāveṣu neyaḥ tayā yathā āropitasya abhinna ākārasya bāhyeṣu abhāva bhāvāt atas ca abhūta grahāt viplavaḥ bhrāntiḥ eva iti kṛtvā na asya assāmānya buddheḥ nirviṣayāyāḥ viṣaya nirūpaṇam prati kaścid ādaraḥ yadi sarvā eva sāmānya buddhiḥ bhrāntā kathantarhi anumānāt vastu samvādaḥ iti āha 
PVVṬ_299,8^2	 kvacid ityādi kvacid vastuni asya buddheḥ sakāśāt avisamvādaḥ yasmāt kārya kāraṇa sambaddhāt yathā uktāt etat ca niveditam prāk yatra asti vastu sambandhaḥ yathā ukta anumitau yathā ityādinā na tathā bhūtasya abhinna rūpasya anumāna grāhyasya vastuni samāveśāt vidyamāna tvāt anumāna vikalpasya vastu visamvādaḥ pratyakṣa vat iti vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ kiṅkāraṇam atatha abhāvepi iti vyatītepi vastuni paramparayā liṅga anusāreṇa bhāvāt yat vā atatha abhāvepi sāmānya rahite api vastuni abhinna ākārāyāḥ buddheḥ bhāvāt iti evam nivedayiṣyāmaḥ niveditam ca prāk bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt sāmarthyam iti antare 
PVVṬ_300,1^1	 yadi sāmānya buddhiḥ su a ākāra abhedena bhinnān bhāvān abhinna ānadhyasya vidhi rūpa tayā pratipadyate katham asyāḥ anya apoha viṣaya tvam uktam iti atas āha bheda ityādi asyāḥ sāmānya buddheḥ bhinna padārtha darśana balena iti vijātīya vyāvṛtta sva lakṣaṇa anubhava sāmarthyena utpatteḥ iti adhyāhāraḥ bahula grahaṇam vastu abhāvepi śaśaviṣāṇa ādau vikalpa buddheḥ pravṛtti khyāpana artham teṣu bhinneṣu sva lakṣaṇeṣu bhāva adhyavasāyāt su a ākāra abhedena svarūpa adhyavasāyāt dṛśya vikalpayoḥ ekīkṛtya pravṛtteḥ iti arthaḥ yasmāt bhinna vastu darśana balena utpadyate buddhiḥ utpannā ca tāni eva bhinna vastūni su a ākāra abhedena pratipadyate tasmāt bheda viṣaya tvam bhinna viṣaya tvam iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_300,1^2	 yuktantāvat vastu darśana dvāra āyāteṣu anitya ādi vikalpeṣu vastu darśana bala utpatteḥ bheda viṣaya tvam yatra tu na tathābhūtambhinnam vastu yathā nitya ādi vikalpeṣu śaśa viṣāṇa ādi vikalpeṣu ca tatra kathambheda viṣaya tvam teṣām iti ced āha tathā bhāva ityādi yathā eva bhinna vastu svabhāva grāhya anubhava balena utpannāḥ anitya ādi buddhayaḥ sva pratibhāse bhinna bhāva adhyavasāyena pravarttamānāḥ bheda viṣayāḥ evantathām eva sva pratibhāsaḥ eva bhinna bāhya bhāva adhyavasāya kalpanāyām satyām bhinna viṣaya tve satya paratra iti avidyamāneṣu nitya pradhāna kārya ādiṣu śaśaviṣāṇa ādiṣu ca nitya pradhāna ādi kārya śaśa viṣāṇa ādi vikalpānāmbheda viṣaya tvasya bhāvāt sva āśraya mātra gata vyakti bhedaḥ eva sthitam na tu vyakti śūnye deśe tat uktam bhās ṭṭe na 
PVVṬ_301,1–301,2^1	 piṇḍeṣu eva ca sāmānyam na antarā gṛhyate yatas na hi ākāśa vat icchanti sāmānyat nāma kecana ākṛ pratyeka samaveta tvan dṛṣṭa tvāt na nirotsyate tathā ca sati nānā tvat na eka buddheḥ bhaviṣyati vana yathā ca vyaktiḥ ekā eva dṛśyamānā punar punar kāla bheda īpyabhinnā eva jātiḥ bhinna āśrayā sati iti vana u dyaḥ te kaḥ raḥ pyāha kena sarva gata tvam jāteḥ abhyupagamyate yena mṛd piṇḍe mṛd gavake go tvam syāt api tu sva viṣaye sarvatra vṛttiḥ varttate iti sarva gatā iti ucyate kaḥ punar go tvasya svaḥ viṣayaḥ yatra go tvambhavati kva punar go tvam varttate yatra go tva nimitta ūnu vṛtti pratyayayaḥ bhavati kva punar anuvṛtti pratyayam go tvam karoti yat tasya sādhanam kaḥ punar nitye go tve go ssādhana arthaḥ yat tena vyajyate na hi kakudādi mad artha vyatirekeṇa go tvasya vyaktiḥ iti na piṇḍebhyortha antaram go tvampiṇḍa antarāleṣu agrahaṇāt iti bau ddhaḥ bruvāṇaḥ piṇḍa antara ālamparyanuyojyaḥ kim idampiṇḍa antarālam kim ākāśam āhosvit abhāvaḥ uta dravya antaram iti 
PVVṬ_301,2^2	 yadi ākāśam na tatra go tvam na hi ākāśam gauḥ iti pratīyate etena abhāvaḥ dravya antaram ca vyākhyātam viśeṣa pratyayānām ākasmika tvāt ca ayam piṇḍa pratyaya vyatireka bhāj pratyayaḥ upajāyamānaḥ nimitta antarāt bhavati dṛṣṭā khalu piṇḍa vyatireka bhājām pratyayānām nimitta antarāt utpattiḥ yathā carma vastra kambaleṣu nīla pratyayaḥ tat ca nimitta antaram sāmānyam iti tasmāt vyakti sarva gatam sāmānyam vyakti śūnyepi deśe vidyamāna tvāt na ca tatra sāmānyasya pratītiḥ vyañjikāyāḥ vyakteḥ abhāvāt yatra eva ca vyaktau sāmānyam pratīyate sā eva sāmānya abhivyaktau samarthā sāmānya pratipatti anyathā anupattyā gamyate na anyā iti 
PVVṬ_301,3–301,4	 tat āha bha ṭṭaḥ yat vā sarva gata tvepi vyaktiḥ śakti anurodhataḥ śaktiḥ kārya anumeya ādi vyaktiḥ darśana hetukāḥ tena yatra eva dṛśyeta vyaktiḥ śaktantat eva tu tena eva ca na sarvāsu vyaktiṣu etat pratīyate bhinna tvepi hi kāsāṃcid śaktiḥ kāścid aśaktikāḥ na ca paryanuyogosti vastu śakteḥ kadācana vahniḥ dahati na ākāśam kotra paryanuyujyatām iti 
PVVṬ_302,1^1	 tatra tayoḥ pakṣayoḥ madhye yadi sva āśraya mātra gatam apūrva ghaṭa ādi utpattau ghaṭa tva ādi śūnye pradeśe paścāt utpannāt ghaṭa ādeḥ bhinna deśam yat dravyan tadvarttinaḥ sāmānyasya kathanta iṣu paścāt utpanneṣu ghaṭa ādiṣu sambhavaḥ na eva iti abhiprāyaḥ bhavet sambhavaḥ yadi tasmāt pūrva dravyāt tad sāmāni ampaścāt utpadyam ānandravyam yāti tat ca na asti iti āha yasmāt ityādi tat iti sāmānyam pūrva dravyāt iti yatra tat pūrvam samavetam tasmāt utpitsu dravya mutpattum icchu pūrvam ghaṭa ādikam na yāti amūrtta tvena niṣkriya tvāt sāmānyasya 
PVVṬ_302,1^2–302,2	 pūrva dravyāt acalatopi bhinna deśena yogaḥ bhaviṣyati vimbasya ādarśaḥ iva iti ced āha na hi ityādi anya dravya vṛtteḥ iti utpitsu dravyāt bhinna deśa dravya vṛtteḥ bhāvasya sāmānya ākhyasya tatas pūrvakāt āśrayāt acalataḥ tad ubhaya antarālā vyāpinaḥ pūrva paścāt utpanna dvaya antarālā vyāpinaḥ sva āśrayāt bhinna deśena dravyeṇa yogaḥ na hi yuktaḥ iti sambandhaḥ bimbasya tu bhinna deśe na ādarśena yoga usti iti bruvāṇaḥ kathanna unmataḥ syāt sāmagrī balāt bhrāntam jñānam pratibimba anugata ādarśa pratibhāsi tatra jāyate yathā uktam viruddha pariṇāmeṣu vajra ādarśa tala ādiṣu parvata ādi svabhāvānām bhāvānām na asti sambhavaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_302,3	 yepi tatra bhāva antara utpattim icchanti teṣām api na bimbena yoga usti iti yat kiñcid etat utpitsu dravyāt prāk sāmānya ātmā na ca tatra utpitsu deśeāsīt vyakti śūnye deśe tasya sthāna anabhyupagamāt asti paścāt tad sāmānyaṃvyaktau= utpannāyām sāmānya śūnyāyāḥ vyakteḥ anabhyupagamāt na ca tatra deśe vyaktyā saha utpannam nitya tvāt na ca vyakti utpādaḥ eva sāmānyasya utpādaḥ bhinna tvāt abhinna tve vā tatas na sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ syāt na ca kutaścid pūrvakāt vyakti viśeṣāt āgatam etat na yāti iti yat uktantasya eva upasaṃhāra dvāreṇa upanyāsaḥ 
PVVṬ_303,1–303,2	 yāvadbhiḥ prakāraiḥ sāmānyasya vyakti antare sambhavaḥ te prakārāḥ na iṣyante tatra ca sāmānyam iṣyate iti vyāghātaḥ sa ca prājñānānduḥsaha tvāt bhāraḥ atas eva āha kaḥ imam ityādi prājñaḥ hi katham ayuktam sahate jaḍaḥ tu ajñānāt yukta ayukta vicāraṇa akṣamaḥ saheta api yadā aha ani atra jāḍyāt iti nanu ca utpitsu dravye sāmānyasya utpattau= api samaveta tvam pratibhāsāt eva avagantavyam sa ca vyakti samaveta tva pratibhāsaḥ nutpādepi sāmānyasya vidyate eva iti kim utpādena vyakti samavetan ca sāmānyasya rūpam iṣyate tena tad pūrva dravya samavetam api tatas avicaladutpitsu dravya samavetam ca pratibhāsate iti kathat na yāti ityādi dūṣaṇāya ucyata ibhīṣṭa tvāt 
PVVṬ_303,3	 sattyam yaḥ hi sāmānyasya pratibhāsam na icchati tasya idam dūṣaṇam syāt pratibhāsa taiti yaḥ tu sāmānya pratibhāsa ulīkaḥ iti manyate tasya katham dūṣaṇam alīka tvam ca utpitsu dravyam na yāti na ca tatra āsīt na ca utpannam ityādinā granthena sāmānya abhāvepi sāmānya avabhāsinaḥ jñānasya utpatteḥ pratipāditamā cā rye ṇa na ca pratibhāsanāt eva satya tvam dvi candra ādeḥ api satya tva prasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_303,4	 na api pratyakṣa bādha ekā bādhā anumāna bādhāyāḥ api bādhā tvāt yadi tad aṃśa vat syāt tadā ekena aṃśena pūrvambhin= a ādhāre sthitam aṃśa antareṇa utpitsu dravyam vyāpnuyāt anaṃśam vā pūrvam ādhāram hitvā dvayam api etat na asti iti āha na ca ityādi pūrvam ādhāram iti sū tra bhāgam utpitsu deśāt bhinna deśam iti miśrakeṇa spaṣṭayati tayoḥ ca iti pūrva paścāt utpannayoḥ dravyayoḥ 
PVVṬ_303,5	 bhinna ityādinā vyācaṣṭe dvidhā bhavet iti nānā avayava ātma tayā pūrva ādhāra tyāgena vā prathamantā vat pakṣam āha nānā ityādi etat ca para prasiddhyā ucyate na tu ekam aneka avayava ātmakam iṣi ate iti uktam anya anyobhyām avayavābhyām paraspara bhinnābhyām aṃśa ākhyā an tad sambandhāt tābhyām bhinna deśābhyām sambandhāt ālokaḥ hi sāvayava tvāt anyena avayavena ghaṭena sambadhyate anyena ghaṭa ādibhiḥ evam rajju vaṃśa daṇḍa ādau= api sva sambandhibhiḥ 
PVVṬ_304,1^1	 na hi ityādyasya eva samarthanam atha sāvayava tvena sāmānyam aneka vṛttīṣyeta tathā api katham ekam anekatra vartteta yasmāt eka deśāḥ sāmānyasya varttante iti ye ca tadā eka deśāḥ sāmānyasya pratyekampiṇḍeṣu varttante te kim sāmānya ātmakāḥ uta na iti yadi sāmānya ātmakāḥ ekam ekatra varttate iti prāptam na ca ekam ekatra varttamānam sāmānyam iti yuktam vaktum atha na sāmānya ātmakāḥ te katham sāmānyam anekatra varttate iti ucyate eka deśeṣu ca sāmānyasya yadi eka deśa antareṇa vṛttiḥ tadā anavasthā syāt na ca sāvayava tvam antareṇa ekasya anekatra vṛttiḥ yuktā atha anavayavam pratipiṇḍam parisamāptyā piṇḍa vadasā dhāraṇa tvāt na sāmānyambhavitum arhati kim kāraṇantasya anavayavasya sāmānyasya ekena dravyeṇa sambandhaḥ yaḥ ātmā tad vyatirekeṇa ditīya ātma abhāvāt eka ātmanaḥ catasya sāmānyasya tad pradeśa vartti sambandha rūpa tvāt utpitsu ghaṭa deśāt 
PVVṬ_304,1^2	 pūrva deśa vartti yat ghaṭa dravyantad sambandhi rūpa tvāt na asti bhinna deśena yugapad yogaḥ anyathā iti utpitsu deśa dravya sambandha rūpa tve tad sambadhā yogāt tena pūrva dravyeṇa sambandha ayogāt tasmāt eka vyakti niyata ātmanaḥ sāmānyasya na asti tasmin= eva kāle bhinna deśena dravyeṇa sambandhaḥ sambandhe vā pūrva vyakti niyata eka ātmaka tvena sāmānyasya pūrva vyaktau sthitiḥ tasmin= eva kāle bhinna deśa vyakti sambandhena āsthitiḥ etat caviruddham iti āha ekasya ādheyasya ityādi tatra sthānam iti pūrva vyaktau tadā eva tasmin= eva kāle vyakti antare tvayā abhyapagamāt pūrva vyakti tyāgamantareṇa ekasya ca anyatra anvayā yogāt tatra pūrvasyām vyaktau tena eva pūrva vyakti niyatena ātmanā tasya sāmānyasya āsthānam iti ayuktam etat kiṅkāraṇam tad sthita ityādi tasyām eva vyaktau sthita asthita ātmanoḥ svabhāvayoḥ ekasya sāmānyasyayugapad virodhāt 
PVVṬ_305,1–305,2	 nanu yathā eka tyāgena aparatra vṛttiḥ evam apara apara avayavaiḥ bahuṣu ca vṛttiḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt iti dvividha abhyupagamyate tathā sāmānyam yadā yena eva rūpeṇa ekatra vṛttantadā eva tena eva rūpeṇa anyatra varttate dṛṣṭa tvāt iti sā api tṛtīyā vṛttiḥ kinnābhyupagamyate tad uktambha ṭṭena na hi dvaividhyam eva iti vṛtteḥ asti niyāmakam trividhā api hi dṛṣṭa tvāt sambhavet dvividhāḥ yathā iti 
PVVṬ_305,3	 u dyaḥ te kaḥ raḥ pyāha na go tvam avayavī na ca samudāyaḥ tasmāt na tatra kṛtsna eka deśa śabdau staḥ na ced tatra etau śabdau staḥ tasmāt go tvam kim kṛtsnam varttate uta eka deśena iti na yuktaḥ praśnaḥ kathantarhi go tvam goṣu varttate āśraya āśrayi bhāvena kaḥ punar āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ samavāyaḥ tatra vṛttimat go tvam vattiḥ samavāyaḥ iha pratyaya hetu tvāt tena sarvatra pūrva dravyaḥ utpitsu dravye ca samavāyaḥ eva vṛttiḥ atas katham ucyate sthita asthita ātmanā uḥ ekatra virodhāt ayuktam etadi ti 
PVVṬ_305,4^1	 etat eva āha sarvatra ityādi sarvatra pūrva vyaktau= utpitsu dravye ca sarva devotyat sudravya utpādepi yadā varttate tadā api dravyan na jahāti tena sthita asthita ātmanoḥ na ekatra virodhaḥ sthita ātmanaḥ abhāvāt iti tat ayuktam na hi eka samaveta tvam eva anya vyakti samaveta tvam anyasyāḥ tatra pratibhāsana prasaṅgāt tasmāt eka samaveta tva ani a samaveta tvayoḥ parasparam bhedaḥ eva tat ca abhinnam sāmānyāt eka samaveta tvāt ananugama vat anī atra sāmānyasya api ananugama prasaṅgaḥ yat vā eka vyakti kāla ādi sambandhena jñāna janana śaktiḥ yāsām anyasya 
PVVṬ_305,4^2	 na sā anya vyakti ādi sambandha tvena tena ekasyām vyaktau sāmānyasya jñāna janana śaktiḥ anyasyām jñāna janana śakti virodhinī śaktiḥ ca śaktimataḥ abhinnāḥ śakti lakṣaṇa tvāt ca vastunaḥ tena yat vastu ekantat eka vṛtti eva iti vyāpti siddhiḥ vastu ca ekam sāmānyam yadi katham anyatra api vartteta tathābhūtasya pratibhāsāt iti ced na pratibhāsaḥ hi apratibhāsasya bādhakaḥ na avastunaḥ tasya api pratibhāsanāt asya tu vastu pratibhāsaḥ bādhakaḥ na ca anugatam vastu asti iti uktam atas eva na pratijñāyāḥ pratyakṣa bādhāḥ sāmānya jñānasya pratyakṣa tva ābhāsāt ca 
PVVṬ_305,5	 nanu yāvat asya aprāmāṇyam na tāvat anumānasya prabṛttiḥ yāvat ca na anumānasya pravṛttiḥ tāvat na asya pratyakṣa abhāsa tā iti anyonya āśraya tvam syāt iti ced na yatonumānam pratibhāsamānasya vastu tva sandeha mātreṇa eva pravarttate na api asya aprāmāṇya nimittam anumānampravarttatepi tu sva sādhya pratibaddha liṅga nimittam atas sāmānya jñānasya bādha kantasmāt na asti paramārthataḥ ekam vastu ekadā aneka vṛttiḥ vṛttau tu tad sthita asthita ātmanoḥ virodhaḥ eva ā cā ryaḥ stu abhyupagamya api doṣam āha tad svabhāva ityādi sāmānya svabhāvasya darśanam āśrayaḥ yasya pratyayasya sa sarvatra bhinna jātīya īpi dravye sarva ākārasyāt tathā ca sati gām api aśvaḥ ityādi kiṅkāraṇam iti āha aśve ātmā yasya dravya tvasya iti vigrahaḥ gamaka tvāt vyadhikaraṇasya api bahu brīhiḥ aśve sthitaḥ iti vā sādhanam kṛtā iti samāsaḥ paścāt ātma śabdena dvipadaḥ bahu brīhiḥ tad svabhāva pratipattyā ca aśva sthita svabhāva dravya tva pratipattyā ca tathā niścayāt gauḥ dravyam iti niścayāt 
PVVṬ_306,1	 syāt etat na aśva samaveta dravya tva pratipattyā dravyam iti pratītiḥ kintarhi dravya tva mātra pratipattyā iti atas āha tasya ca ityādi tasya ca aśve dravya tvasya ekasya adṛṣṭasya apratipannasya aśva samaveta tva vyatirekeṇa ākāra antarasya āśvāsaḥ sa maveta tva lakṣaṇasya abhāvāt tasmāt aśva samavetena eva dravya tvena viśiṣṭām gām dravyam iti pratipadyamāna uśvaḥ iti pratīyāt yasya tu aśva vyatiriktam eva dravya tva sāmānyantena ca viśiṣṭam asau gām pratipadyamānaḥ niyamena aśvaḥ iti pratīyāt 
PVVṬ_306,2–306,4	 tasmāt iti upasaṃhāraḥ anavayavam sāmānyam aneka deśe anekaḥ deśaḥ asya iti tasmin ghaṭa ādau yugapad na ādhīyate na ādheyatām pratipadyate iyatā ca na ca aṃśa vat iti etat vyākhyātam jahāti pūrvanna ādhāram iti etat pūrva ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sa ca iti pūrva ādhāra tyāgaḥ sāmānyasya nābhimataḥ anyatra iti pūrva vyaktau varttamānasya sāmānyasya svasmāt pūrva ādhāra deśāt acalataḥ tatas pūrva ādhāra deśāt anyatra sthāne janma yasya dravyasya tasmin vṛttiḥ iti atiyuktimat iti upahasati 
PVVṬ_307,1	 pūrva vyakti deśāt avicalat api sāmānyanta tonyadeśan dravyam vyāpnoti iti ced āha yatra ityādi yatra deśe asau paścāt kāla bhāvī bhāvaḥ varttate tena deśena sāmānyam na sambadhyate sva vyakti sarva gata tva abhyupagamāt yatra deśe sāmānyam na varttate tad deśinam ca paścāt kāla bhāvinambhāvam vyāpnoti iti nyāya atikrānta tvāt kim api etat mahā adbhutam iti prakāra antareṇa upahasati na hi yaḥ yatra deśe na varttate sa tad deśam vyāpnoti iti nyāya anusāriṇā śakyam avasātum 
PVVṬ_307,2	 sarva gata tva kalpanām api nirācikīrṣan= āha yasya ityādi tasya api sarva gata sāmānya vādinaḥ sarvatragā yadi jātiḥ tadā ekatra śāvaleya ādau yā tasya avyaktiḥ abhivyaktiḥ tayā karaṇa bhūtayā sā jātiḥ sarvatra vyakti śūnyepi deśe vijātīya vyakti bhede ca vyaktā eva prakāśitā eva abhedāt eka tvāt sarvatra vyakti śūnyepi deśe dṛśyeta 
PVVṬ_307,3	 etat uktam bhavati yadi api vyakti śūnye pradeśe vijātīya vyaktau ca sva vyakteḥ vyañjikāyāḥ abhāvaḥ tathā api sva vyakti abhivyaktena eva rūpeṇa tatra avasthānāt jāteḥ upalambhaḥ syāt no ced svabhāva nānātvam prāpnoti iti eka rūpā ca iṣyate iti bhāvaḥ na jāteḥ nityāyāḥ anādheya atiśaya tvena kadācid abhivyaktiḥ iti niṣiddham etat vṛttiḥ ādheya tā vyaktiḥ iti tasmin na yujyata iti atra antare yatas evantasmāt sā jātiḥ nityam anapekṣita para upaskāra anādheya atiśayāḥ evambhūtāḥ yadi svabhāvena sva vijñāna janana yogyā tadā nityandṛśyeta vyakteḥ prāk paścāt ca atha na yogyā tadā kadācid daśyeta kim kāraṇam tasmin vijñāna janana yogya svabhāve tad viparīte ca avasthānāt sarva kālam eka rūpa tvāt iti arthaḥ asamarthāḥ vyakti asannidhāne tad sannidhāne tu samarthā bhavati tatas na nityandarśanam adarśanam vā jāteḥ iti atas āha svabhāve tyādi nitya tvena anādheya atiśaya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_308,1	 yadi jāteḥ na asti vyaktiḥ tat kim vyaktyā eva ekatra sā vyakta ityādi ucyate iti atas āha abhyupagamya api ityādi vyāpinī api jātiḥ ekatra āśraye vyaktā bheda abhāvāt eka tvāt jāteḥ vyaktā eva prakāśitā eva sarvatra vyakti śūnye deśe vijātīye ca vyakti bhede vyakti śūnyeṣu api iti api śabdāt vijātīya ipi vyakti bhede api ca na ca sā jātiḥ vyakti apekṣiṇī vyañjikā vyaktiḥ nnāpekṣyeta vyakteḥ jāti vyañjaka tva abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ yadi hi vyañjikām vyaktim apekṣeta tadā vyañjaka apratipattau na vyaṅgyasya pratītiḥ syāt na hi pradīpa ādi apratītau ghaṭa ādeḥ pratītiḥ bhavati tathā iha api vyakti apratītau na jāti pratītiḥ syāt sāmānya tadvatoḥ tu vyaṅgya vyañjakayoḥ viparyayaḥ punar kasmāt iṣṭaḥ tathā hi na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhiḥ varttate iti niyamāt prāk eva sāmānya grahaṇam iṣṭantad dvāreṇa tu vyakteḥ tatas vyañjikāyāḥ vyakteḥ grahaṇam antareṇa api vyaṅgya abhimatasya sāmānyasya pratipattiḥ iṣṭa iti viparyayaḥ 
PVVṬ_308,2	 yaḥ hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sva āśrayaḥ yatra samavetam sāmānyam sāmānya grāhakam indriyam ca tayossaṃyogaḥ tad apekṣā pratītiḥ yasya sāmānyasya tat tathā uktam āśraya śūnyāḥ pradeśāḥ vijātīya vyakti adhyāsitāḥ vyakti śūnyāḥ ca teṣu na dṛśyate yathā ukta saṃyoga abhāvāt tasya api evam vādinaḥ kvacid vyaktiḥ darśane sati asti eva āśraya indriya saṃyogaḥ jāteḥ sarvatra sthitāyāḥ upakārakaḥ iti tatas āśraya indriya saṃyogāt hetoḥ tad darśī kvacid vyakti bhede jāti darśī yathā sthitām sarva deśa vyāpinīñjātimpaśyet yatra eva vyañjikā vyaktiḥ tatra eva jāteḥ svarūpam dṛśyam na anyatra iti ced āha na hi ityādi tasyām iti jātau kvacid vyaktau dṛśyamānāya antadīyām iti sāmānya sambandhi ekasya dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa virodhāt evantā vat vyakteḥ vyañjikā tvam abhyupagamya ca śabda upāttorthaḥ vyākhyātaḥ 
PVVṬ_309,1	 adhunā na sā vyakti apekṣiṇī ityādi vyākhyātum āha vyakti vyaṅgya tvāt ityādi tasya ca mithyātvam anantara uktena eva pratipāditam na hi ekasya dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa masti atas apūrva pakṣaḥ eva ayam kevalan doṣa antara abhidhāna artham gaja nimīlanam kṛtvā upanyastam tathābhūtasya iti nyāyyasya tatra iti jāti tadvati nyāyyasya vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāvasya abhāvāt kiṅkāraṇam sva ityādi hi yasmāt sva rūpa śūnye deśe pradīpa ādi rahite deśe su a vyaṅgyam ghaṭa ādikam na evam yathā uktena nyāyena vyaktiḥ vyañjikā sāmānyasya kiṅkāraṇam viparyayāt yasmāt agṛhītvā api vyaktim sāmānyam ādau gṛhyate iti iṣyate pareṇa sāmānya grahaṇa dvāreṇa eva vyakteḥ grahaṇa abhyupagamāt atas ca vyañjaka apratipattyā api vyaṅgyasya grahaṇāt vyañjaka dharma atikramaḥ vyakteḥ 
PVVṬ_309,2	 etat eva āha katham hi ityādi sā iti vyaktiḥ sāmānyasya vyañjikā ca syāt iti sambandhaḥ tad pratipatti dvāreṇa iti sāmānya pratipatti dvāreṇa sā vyaktiḥ dṛśyā syāt iti viruddham etat evam iti sāmānya darśana balena vyakteḥ darśanebhyupagamyamāne vyaṅgyā sā vyaktiḥ prasajyate sāmānyañca iti adhyāhāraḥ pradīpena ghaṭa vat iti tṛtīyā iti yoga vibhāgāt samāsaḥ supsupa iti vā samāsaḥ yathā pradīpena ghaṭaḥ vyaṅgyaḥ tadvat sāmānyena vyaktiḥ vyaṅgyā prāpterthaḥ tad pratipattim antareṇa sāmānya pratipattimvinā vyakteḥ adṛśya rūpa tvāt anye tu āhuḥ vyaṅgyā ca sā evam prasajyate iti atra caśabdena sāmānya vyañjakam iti etat upāttam tatas pradīpa ghaṭābhyām tulyam iti dvandvāt eva vatiḥ draṣṭavyaḥ pūrva nipāta lakṣaṇasya vyabhicāri tvāt ghaṭa śabdasya apūrva nipātaḥ pradīpa vat sāmānyam vyañjakam ghaṭa vat ca vyaktiḥ vyaṅgyā prasajyate iti vākya arthaḥ iti anena iti sāmānya vādinā sāmānyamvinā kim asambhavat kāryam abhisamīkṣya evam iti ukta vidhinā bahu āyāsaḥ aśakya sādhana tayā bahu duḥkha hetuḥ 
PVVṬ_309,3–310,1	 paraspara ityādi paraḥ bhedāt vilakṣaṇa tvāt hetoḥ vyatirekiṇīṣu ananvayinīṣu anvayinaḥ eka ākārasya pratyayasya pratyaya grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam evam śabdasya sāmānyam antareṇa ayogāt sāmānya vādaḥ āśritaḥ iti sambandhaḥ katham ityācāḥ ryaḥ ye pācaka ādi śabdāḥ na kriyā nimittān icchanti tān pratyetat uktam abhinnena sāmānya ākhyena arthena vinā pācaka ādiṣu katham ekaḥ śabdaḥ vācakaḥ vācaka grahaṇena pratyaya unvayī gṛhītaḥ eva tena vinā śabdasya apravṛtteḥ atas eva vṛ ttau śabda pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ asti iti āha u dyaḥ te kaḥ re ṇa api gavā ādiṣu anuvṛtti pratyayaḥ piṇḍa ādi vyatirikta nimittāt bhavati viśeṣa pratyayānām anākasmika tvāt nīla ādi pratyaya vat yat tat nimittantad sāmānyam iti sāmānya siddhau pramāṇe kṛte svayam eva āśaṃkitam 
PVVṬ_310,2	 atha manyase yathā pācaka ādi śabdāḥ anuvṛttāḥ ca bhavanti na ca pācaka tvad nāma sāmānyam asti yadi syāt bhāva utpatti kāle eva abhivyaktam syāt tathā gavā ādiṣu anuvṛtti pratyayāḥ iti na hetu artha aparijñānāt viśeṣa pratyayānām anākasmika tva ādityasya hetoḥ piṇḍa pratyaya vyatiriktasya pratyayasya nimitta antarāt utpādaḥ iti ayam arthaḥ na punar sarva anuvṛtti pratyayaḥ sāmānyāt eva bhavati iti evañca sati pacana kriyāyāḥ yat pradhānam sādhanantat pācaka śabdena ucyate tat ca prādhānyam pācaka antareṣu api asti iti na doṣaḥ iti vadatā pācaka tva ādi sāmānyamvinā pācaka ādi śabdānām vṛttiḥ iṣṭā evaḥ dyaḥ te kaḥ re ṇa iti anena abhiprāyeṇā cā rye ṇa api uktam katham ityādi 
PVVṬ_310,3	 na ca pacana kriyāyām prādhānya nimittāyām pācaka ādi śabda pravṛttiḥ yuktā te t nimitta tve hi pradhānam pradhānam iti anugāmī śabdaḥ syāt na pācakaḥ iti atas eva āha na hi ityādi teṣu iti pācaka ādiṣu anyat iti dravyāt vyatiriktam evam sarva śaktiṣu abhinnam yena ekena te pācaka ādayaḥ bhinnāssantopi tathā iti abhedena pratīyeran jñānena upalakṣaṇam etat tathā abhidhīyeran pācakeṣu adhiśrayaṇa ādi lakṣaṇam pāṭhakeṣu adhyayana ātmakam evam anyeṣu api yathāyogyam karma eka pratyaya ādi nimittam asti iti ced saḥ iti anvayī pratyaya grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam evam śabdopi anyena vā iti karmaṇaḥ hetunā prayatna ādinā bhinnam ityādina etat eva samarthayate tat iti bāhya upanyāse tad karma itivā sambandhanīyam pratipācakam karmaṇaḥ bhedāt yena aparādhena tāḥ vyaktayaḥ tathā iti abhinna pratyaya hetu tvena 
PVVṬ_311,1	 sattyam na kaścid aparādhaḥ kintu tāsām vyaktīnām eka rūpa tvāt tathā hi dravyam eka rūpam anaṃśa tvāt etat eva ced abhinna pratyaya nibandhanam na tu tatas vyatiriktam dharma antarantadā pācakasya pācaka tvam iti vyatireka pratītiḥ na syāt na hi tasya eva tatas vyatirekaḥ yuktaḥ tasya avyakteḥ ākāraḥ tad ākāraḥ tasmāt anyaḥ abheda ākāraḥ tasya viśeṣaḥ sosti yasyām sā atadākāra viśeṣavatī dravya ākārāt anya ākāra iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_311,2	 etat uktam bhavati dravyebhyaḥ eva pratyayaḥ dravyam iti evam ākāraḥ tatonyena eva ākāreṇa pācaka pratyayaḥ pratiṣedha pratyayaḥ sa yadi dravya nimittam eva syāt tadā dravya mātra pratyaya aviśiṣṭaḥ syāt atha kimartham atat ākāra viśeṣavatī iti ubhayam uktam atat ākāra iti eva vaktavyam viśeṣavatī iti eva vā ucyate abheda ākāra iti ukte dravyasya abhāvaḥ iti pratiṣedha pratyaya upyatat ākāra iti śakyeta vyapadeṣṭum na ca asau vastu antara nibaṃndhanaḥ pareṇa iṣṭaḥ viśeṣa pratyayānām eva dharma antara nibandhana tvāt viśeṣa grahaṇe ca kevale kriyamāṇe caitra pratyayaḥ maitra apekṣayā bhavati viśeṣavān na tu atad ākāraḥ caitra ādi abhidhānena dravyasya eva pratipādanāt ubhaya upādānāt tu ayam arthaḥ bhavati adravya ākāraḥ ca asau pratyayaḥ vastu sparśāt viśeṣavān= ca iti tasmāt tatra dravya vyatirikte na nimitta antareṇa bhāvyam iti 
PVVṬ_311,3	 uktam ityā cā ryaḥ yathā vyatirekaḥ goḥ go tvam pācakasya pācaka tvam iti ādikaḥ yathā ca viśeṣa pratyayāḥ anantara uktāḥ tathā uktam iti sambandhaḥ katham uktam iti āha yathāsvam ityādi artha antara viveka ūrtha antara vyavacchedaḥ yathāsvam iti yasya śabdasyayathā saṃketam yaḥ vyavacchedaḥ tasmāt iti arthaḥ tathā hi pācaka śabdaḥ apācaka vyavacchinnam apratikṣipta bheda antaram pratipādayan dharmi vacanaḥ pācaka tva śabdaḥ tu tam eva vyavacchinnam pratikṣipta bheda antaram āha iti dharma vacanaḥ tatas dharma dharmi bheda kalpanayā pācakasya pācaka tvam iti vyatireka vibhaktiḥ prayujyate evam dravya śabdasya api adravya vyavacchinne svabhāve saṃketita tvāt tad anusāreṇa adravya avyavaccheda anusāreṇa adravya vyavaccheda anukāriṇī buddhiḥ utpadyate pācaka śabdāt tu apācaka vyavacchinna anukāriṇī eva buddhiḥ atas yathāvyavacchedam saṃketa anusāreṇa viśeṣavatī buddhiḥ ekatra api aviruddhāḥ etat ca bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepa ityādiṣu pratipāditam 
PVVṬ_312,1	 tasmāt ityādinā upasaṃhāraḥ yathā vyaktīnām bhedaḥ tadvat karmaṇā upi bhedāt hetoḥ asya pācaka ādi abheda pratyayasya na hetuḥ karma iti sambandhaḥ teṣām pācakānām yāni karmāṇi pāka ākhyāni teṣu karmasu yā pācaka tva jātiḥ samavetā sā eva abhedāt hetuḥ pācaka abheda pratyayasya na ityādinā pratiṣedhati na jātiḥ hetuḥ iti prakṛtam kiṅkāraṇam karma saṃśrayāt karmaṇi samaveta tvāt dravyāt artha antaram karma tad sambandhinī artha antaraḥ iti dravye go tvam iva iti nidarśanam na hi go tvam śābaleya ādi sambandhi karkka ādiṣu aśva bhedeṣu go pratyaya hetuḥ pācaka karmasu pāka ākhyeṣu karma jātissamavetāḥ na ca tāni karmāṇi iti pāka ākhyāni śabda grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam tathā pācaka pratyayena pari cchidyante tasya pāka ākhyasya karmaṇaḥ āśrayaḥ dravyam pācaka śabdena ucyate na ca tatra dravye karma jātissamavetāḥ 
PVVṬ_312,2–312,5	 evantā vat artha antara sambandhi tvam karma jāteḥ āśritya dravya viṣayam pācaka abhidhāna pratyayam pratyaya nimitta tvam uktam adhunā prakāra antareṇa āha tasya ityādi pācaka śrateḥ anyā śrutiḥ śruti antaram śruti grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam evam jñāna antara nimitta tvāt śruti antaram eva āha pākaḥ ityādi tatas iti karma jāteḥ karma viṣayasya abhidhānasya pratyayasya ca hetu tvāt karma jāteḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ syāt matam na karma jātiḥ pācaka pratyayam janayati kintu karma jāti samāśrayāt karma eva iti atas āha tasya ityādi tasya iti pācaka ādi abheda pratyayasya karma nimittam yasya iti vigrahaḥ proktam vyakti vat bhedāt na hetuḥ karma asya ityādi nanu uktam jāti samāśrayāt bhinnam api karma abhinna pratyaya hetuḥ iti 
PVVṬ_313,1	 uktam idam ayuj tantu uktam jāti sambandha ipi karmaṇaḥ tathā eva bhinna tvāt kiñca ityādinā upacaya hetum āha tasya pācaka ādi abheda pratyayasya karma nimitta tve abhyupagamyamāne niruddhe karmaṇi puruṣaḥ pācakaḥ iti na ucyeta ucyate ca yogyatā mātreṇa tatas na vastu bhūta kriyā nimittoyam vyapadeśaḥ atītasya api karmaṇā ustitvāt adoṣaḥ iti ced āhapacataḥ eva ityādi yadi atītasya sattvam syāt varttamāna vat upalabhyeta upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam ca karma iṣyate 
PVVṬ_313,2	 syāt matam karma jātiḥ karmaṇi samavetā karma api dravye samavetantataḥ sambaddha sambandhāt karma jātiḥ dravya viṣayasya pācaka pratyayasya hetuḥ iti ced āha tatas eva ityādi tatas eva iti karmaṇaḥ vinaṣṭa tvāt eva na sāmānyasya karmaṇā sambandhaḥ sākṣāt na api karma dvāreṇa pāramparyeṇa dravya sambandha usya asambandhāt kāraṇāt na sāmānyam pācaka ādi abhidhāna pratyayasya hetuḥ asambaddham api hetuḥ iti ced āha na ityādi ayuktam iti asambaddham śabda grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam asambaddham sāmānyam na jñāna śabda kāraṇam iti arthaḥ kutas atiprasaṅgāt go tvam api aśva jñānasya hetuḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_313,3	 vinaṣṭe hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe tat sāmānyam iti karma sāmānyat na karmaṇi samavetantasya asattvāt karma abhāvāt eva karttari pācake pāramparyeṇa api samavetam atas sambaddha sambandha upyasya sāmānyasya dravyeṇa saha na asti anyathā iti asambaddhasya api jñāna ādi hetu tve sthiti abhāvāt ca karmaṇaḥ ityādi yat uktam tat atīta ityādinā pakṣa antaram āśaṃkate atītam yat vinaṣṭam anāgatam yat bhaviṣyati karma tayoḥ iti śabda jñānayoḥ karma api atīta anāgatam asat jñāna abhidhānayoḥ nimittamiti sambandhaḥ kim kāraṇam tayoḥ ityādi tayoḥ jñāna abhidhānayoḥ 
PVVṬ_314,1–314,2	 asatī ityādinā vyācaṣṭe upākhyāyate prakāśyate vastu anayā iti upākhya artha kriyā śaktiḥ sā nirgatāḥ yasmāt asataḥ tat tathā uktam asat yasmāt artha kriyā śakti vikalam tat evaṃbhūtam katham śabda jñānayoḥ nimittam syāt iti arthaḥ atha asatā upi hetu tvam iṣyate tadā tasya vastu tvam eva syāt na asattvam kiṅkāraṇam iti āha kāryā ityādi lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ svabhāva vacanaḥ tat iti tasmāt atītam pracyuta rūpam anāgatamasaṃprāpta rūpam karmaṇaḥ sakāśāt anyat ca vyakti ādikam jñāna abhidhānayoḥ nimitta tvena na iṣṭam sāmānya vādinā 
PVVṬ_314,3–314,4	 vyaktiḥ karma āśrayaḥ dravyam ādi śabdāt saṃketa vāsanā tad paripākayoḥ grahaṇam te iti śabda jñāne tathā ca iti anvayinoḥ pācaka ādi śabda jñānayoḥ a nimitta tve sati na jāti siddhiḥ caśabdāt nityam sattvam asat tvam vā śabda jñānayoḥ syāt kasmāt na jāti siddhiḥ iti āha tasyāḥ ityādi tasyāḥ jāteḥ abhinnasya jñānasya abhidhānasya ca nimitta tvena iṣṭa tvāt yathā ca pācaka ādi viṣaye te animitte pravarttete tathā gavādau= api iti kena nibandhanena jātiḥ kalpyeta 
PVVṬ_314,5	 śaktiḥ ityādinā pakṣa antaram āśaṃkate karma āśrayasya dravyasya śaktiḥ śabda grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam pācaka ādi jñānasya api śaktiḥ nimittam na ityādinā pratiṣedhati na pācaka ādi śaktiḥ pācaka ādi śabda nimittam kiṅkāraṇam śakteḥ dravya avyatirekeṇa dravya vadeva ananvayāt ananvayinaḥ ca arthasya anvayi jñāna abhidhānam prati nimitta tva anabhyupagamāt abhyupagame vā jāti kalpanāyāḥ nirnibandhana tva prasaṅgāt bhinnā eva śaktiḥ iti ced āha na hi ityādi na hi dravyāt anyā eva śaktiḥ yadi syāt tadā tasyāḥ eka śakteḥ pāka ādi artha kriyā su upayogena kāraṇena dravyasya śakti ādhārasya anupayogi tva prasaṅgāt tasyām pāka ādi nirvarttikāyām śaktau tasya dravyasya upayogaḥ evam api pāramparyeṇa pāka ādau dravyam upayuktam syāt iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_315,1	 kim ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī artha antara bhūtayā śaktyā na kiñcid prayojanam tathā hi pāka ādi nirvarttikāyām prathamāyām śaktau dravyam yayā śaktyā upayujyeta sā api śaktiḥ yadi vyatiriktā abhyupagamyeta tadā pāka ādi nirvarttikāyām śaktau dravyasya upayogāya śakti antarasya dravyāt vyatirekiṇaḥ abhyupagame ati prasaṅgāt tasyām api śaktau= upayogāya aparā vyatiriktā śaktiḥ kalpanīyā tatra api aparā iti anavasthā syāt iti arthaḥ tasmāt antareṇa vyatiriktam śaktim dravyam eva prathamāyām pāka ādi nirvirttikāyām śaktau= upayujyate iti vācyam evam ca dravyasya upayoge śakta āviṣyamāṇe tat dravyam artha kriyāyāṃpāka ādi lakṣaṇāyām eva upayujyate iti kinneṣyate dravyasya artha kriyāyāḥ ca antarāle kim anarthikayā śaktyā kalpitayā 
PVVṬ_315,2–315,3	 yatas evantasmāt pāka ādi artha kriyā śaktiḥ iti anena dravyam eva ucyate kimbhūtantat kāryam tad pāka ādi kāryam yasya tat ca dravyam vyakti antaram na anveti iti kṛtvā tatas dravyāt pācakaḥ pācakaḥ iti anvayī śabdaḥ na syāt jñānañca śabda grahaṇam tu upalakṣaṇam pācaka ādiṣu dravyeṣu pācaka tva ādi sāmānyam asti tad anvayi śabda jñāna nibandhanam iti ced āha sāmānyam ityādi sāmānyam pācaka tva ādi yadi iṣyate tadā pāka ādi nirvarttana śakti avasthāyāḥ prāk eva dravyasya utpatti sama kālaḥ eva dravya samavetan tat bhavet iti arthaḥ tathā ca tat ahar jāta upi bālaḥ pācaka ādi jñāna abhidhāna viṣayaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ no ced prāk eva bhavet tadā paścāt api na bhavet tasya dravyasya aviśeṣāt asti eva sarva kālaṃdravye pācaka tva ādi kintu prāc anabhivyaktam atas na śabda jñānayoḥ nimittam iti atas āha vyaktam iti prāk eva abhivyaktambhavet iti arthaḥ sattā ādi vat yathā sattā dravya tva ādi yāvat dravya bhāvi artha kriyāyāḥ ca prāk eva yogya deśa avasthitam dravyam 
PVVṬ_316,1	 atha api ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sati arthe jāti āśraye tad samavāyasya sāmānya samavāyasya akādācitka tvāt sarva kāla bhāvi tvāt etat eva draḍhayan= āha yāvanti hi ityādi arthe jāti āśraye samavāya dharmāṇi sambandha yogyāni tāni sāmānyāni asya arthasya yaḥ utpādaḥ tena saha samavayanti asmin sāmānya āśrayaḥ iti vibhakti vipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ utpāda sama kālam eva dravyeṇa saha sambadhyate iti yāvat iti samayaḥ sā mā nya vā di naḥ siddhāntaḥ yadā aho dyaḥ te kaḥ raḥ prāk go tvāt na asau gauḥ nāpya gauḥ iti kiṅkāraṇam abhāve tau viśeṣaṇa pratyayau na ca viśeṣaṇa pratyayau viśeṣya sambandham antareṇa bhavataḥ na ca prāk go tva yogāt vastu vidyate na ca avidyamānam gauḥ iti vā agauḥ iti vā śakyate vyapadeṣṭum yadā eva vastu utpadyate tadā eva go tvena abhisambadhyate iti tathā na satassattā sambandhaḥ na asataḥ yadā eva ca vastu tadā eva sat tayā sambadhyate iti 
PVVṬ_316,2–316,3	 atha siddhāntam atikramya paścāt bhāvi tvam sāmānyasya kalpyate tadā tad vyatikramesiddhānta vyatikrame tasya sāmānyasya āśrayasya dravyasya paścāt api aviśeṣāt na tad samavāyaḥ syāt tena sāmānyena samavāyaḥ na syāt yathā phala eka svabhāvasya api rakta tā prāk na bhavati paścāt ca bhavati tadvat puruṣasya pācaka tva ādi sāmānyam iti atas āha tad sambandhī ityādi tad sambandhi svabhāva vaiguṇyāt pācaka tva ādi sāmānya sambandhi svabhāva vaiguṇyāt saḥ iti sāmānya samavāyaḥ tasya iti puṃsaḥ na hi aviguṇe svabhāve sthitasya tad sambandhaḥ na bhavet tatra eva ca sāmānya samavāya viguṇe svabhāve sthitasya dravyasya paścāt sāmānya samavāyaḥ bhaviṣyati iti duranvayan durbodham etat phalasya api āmra ādeḥ pūrvam paścāt ca yadi eka svabhāva tā tatra api tulyam ca udyam sāmānya sambaddham eva tadā dravyam kriyā upakāra apekṣantu sāmānyam vyanakti 
PVVṬ_317,1–317,2	 sā ca prāk nā asti iti na prāk sāmānya abhivyaktiḥ iti atas āha kriyā upakāra ityādi pāka ādi lakṣaṇā kriyā tad kṛtaḥ yaḥ upakāraḥ tad apekṣasya sāmānyam prativyañjaka tve abhyupagamyamāne tasya dravyasya akṣaṇika tvāt avikāriṇaḥ napekṣā sahakāriṇam prati atha vikriyeta tadā api atiśayesya dravyasya kṣaṇika tvam āpadyate kṣaṇika tvāt ca utpāda anantaram dhvaṃsinaḥ kutas kriyā yena tad upakāra apekṣam jāteḥ vyañjakam syāt 
PVVṬ_317,3	 karma upakāra ityādinā vyācaṣṭe adhiśrayaṇa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ karma tad kṛtaḥ upakārotiśayaḥ tam apekṣya sthira svabhāvasya pūrva svabhāvāt acalatonatiśayāt svabhāva antara anupādānāt aviśeṣa ādhāyini karmaṇi kāpekṣā na eva atiśaye vā adravyasya kriyā kṛtebhyupagamyamāne atiśaya ādhāyakasya karmaṇaḥ kṣaṇika tvāt tasya api upakāryasya dravyasya svabhāva bhūtena anyena atiśayena utpattavyam 
PVVṬ_317,4	 yadi kriyā kṛtaḥ atiśayaḥ na svabhāva bhūtaḥ dravyasya tad artha antarasya karaṇāt dravyam na eva upakṛtam syāt tasmāt yathā akriyā akṣaṇam pratikṣaṇam svabhāva bhūtasya anyāni asya atiśaya utpatteḥ tat api dravyam devadatta ādi kṣaṇikam syāt tatas iti kṣaṇika tvāt sva utpatti sthāna vināśinaḥ svasmin= eva utpatti deśe vināśinaḥ puṃsaḥ kṛtaḥ pāka lakṣaṇa akriyā yat apekṣantat kriyāsāpekṣam pācaka ādi dravya sāmānyasya vyañjakam syāta 
PVVṬ_317,5–318,1	 nanu ca prathama ādi kriyā akṣaṇa dvāreṇa dravyasya kṣaṇika tvam kriyā abhāve ca katham kṣaṇika tvam iti ced na yatas kriyā sambandha utpannānām kṣaṇānām anyasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sāmānya abhivyañjikāyāḥ abhāvāt iti arthaḥ tasmāt sthitam etat yathā vastu bhūtā jātiḥ na asti iti kathantarhi ityādi paraḥ yathā ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī yathā pācaka ādiṣu pācaka tva ādi sāmānyat na asti tathā prasādhitam atha ca tatra pravarttete anvayinau jñāna śabdau tathā anyatra api antareṇa sāmānyantau bhivaṣyataḥ tadvat ityādi paraḥ teṣu iti pācaka ādiṣu sāmānyamvinā katham anvayinoḥ jñāna śabdayoḥ vṛttiḥ iti tatas nvaya jñāna śabda vṛtteḥ pācaka ādiṣu api pācaka tva ādi sāmānyam asti iti cintitam etat anantaram tathā teṣu pācaka tva ādi sāmānyam sa na sambhavati iti 
PVVṬ_318,2	 yadi anvayi rūpat na asti tad kim idānīm animitte te śabda jñāne syātām na ityādisi ddhā nta vā dī asti eva tayoḥ nimittam yat pareṇa iṣyate tasya pratikṣepaḥ tat eva āha kintarhi ityādi vastu bhūtam sāmāni ambāhyata tvam nimitte te na bhavataḥ kintarhi tayoḥ nimittam iti atas āha yathāsvam ityādi yaḥ yaḥ ātmīyaḥ vāsanā prabodhaḥ tasmāt anvayinaḥ vikalpasya utpattiḥ tatas vikalpa utpatteḥ sakāśāt yathā vikalpaṃśabdāḥ bhavanti na punar vikalpa abhidhānayoḥ vastu sattā anvayi padārtha sattā samāśrayaḥ iti ukta prāyam etata avaśyam ca etat ā iṣṭavyam tathā hi yathāsvam samavāyavāsanā vaśāt siddhānta āśrayeṇa jñāna vāsanā anurodhāt virodhi rūpa samāveśena paraspara viruddha rūpa adhyāropeṇa pra dhā na kāryamī śva ra kāryam ahetukam samvṛtti mātram jagat iti evam sarva bhedeṣu anvayinoḥ tayoḥ iti jñāna abhidhānayoḥ aparāpara darśanepi iti paraspara bhinnānām arthānān darśanepi na ca tatra iti pradhāna ādi kārya tvena paraspara viruddhena rūpeṇa kalpiteṣu artheṣu tad nibandhanaḥ śabda jñānayoḥ nibandhanaḥ kasmāt na asti iti āha paraspara virodhinoḥ ityādi 
PVVṬ_318,3–318,5	 aniyamena ityādi paraḥ sarvam sarvatra anvayi jñānam abhidhānam ca syāt etat eva sādhayan= āha na hi animittam ityādi nanu yathāsvam vāsanā prabodhāt vikalpa utpatteḥ ityādinā tayoḥ animitta tvam pratiṣiddham iti anavakāśam eva codyam evam manyate āntaram eva nimittantayoḥ iṣyate tasya ca nimittasya kenacid āsatti viprakarṣa abhāvāt sarvatra sarva vikalpa hetu tvam syāt iti na hi animitte bhavat iti atra bāhya nimitta abhāvāt animittam iti draṣṭavyam 
PVVṬ_319,1	 na animitte iti si ddhā nta vā dī aviśiṣṭa nimitte na bhavataḥ iti arthaḥ atas eva āha vāsanā viśeṣa nimitta tvāt iti yathābhūta darśana dvāra āyātā vāsanā sā tatra eva adhyavasita tad bhāvam vikalpam janayati na sarvatra iti samudāya arthaḥ tathābhūtam iti anvayi rūpam na ca asati tasmin= anvayini bāhye nimitte vikalpena na bhavitavyambhavitavyam eva 
PVVṬ_319,2^1	 tat eva supta ityādinā sādhayati suptaḥ ca taimirikaḥ ca tābhyām upalabdheṣu artheṣu gavā ādiṣu keśa makṣikā ādiṣu ca yathākramam abhāveṣu śaśa viṣāṇa ādiṣu samavāya vāsanā yathā svam siddhāntam saṃketa vāsanā tad balena āropita rūpa viśeṣe pradhāna kārya ādiṣu tathā vikalpa utpatteḥ anvayinaḥ vikalpasya utpatteḥ na hi eteṣu yathā ukteṣu bāhyam anvayi rūpam asti svapna timira upalabdhānām eva asattvāt teṣām ca asattvam tṛtīye paricchede pratipādayiṣyate siddhānta samāropitasya tu paraspara virodhinoḥ yugapad ekatra ityādinā pratipāditam eva asattvam 
PVVṬ_319,2^2	 na ca te vikalpāḥ svapna ādi upalabdheṣu asatsu vastu bhūtānvayi rūpam antareṇa api utpadyaṃta iti sarvatra arthāḥ sarva ākārāḥ bhavanti api tu pratiniyatāḥ eva niyama hetum ca āha vibhāgena eva ityādi tathā eva upalabdhānām iti vibhāgena upalabdhānām vibhāgena eva vikalpanāt supta timira avasthāya antāvat bhrānta jñāna ārūḍhānām arthānām vibhāgena upalambhaḥ siddhānta āropitānām api yathāsvam siddhānta śravaṇa kāle śaśa viṣāṇam ityādiṣu api śaśa viṣāṇam bandhyā sutaḥ iti vyavahāra vyutpatti kāle anādi tvāt vyavahāra vāsanāyāḥ uktam ca atra ityādi eka pratyamarśa artha jñāna ādi eka artha sādhana iti atra 
PVVṬ_319,3	 api ca yathā dhava khadira ādayaḥ paraspara bhinnāḥ tathā gavā ādayaḥ tatra tulye bhedekasmāt vṛkṣa tvam dhava ādiṣu eva varttate na gavā ādiṣu iti pṛṣṭena pareṇa etat eva vaktavyam bhāva śaktiḥ eva sā dhava ādīnām yena te eva vṛkṣa tvam prati pratyāsannāḥ na gavā ādayaḥ iti tadā tulye bhedye yayā pratyāsattyā bhāva śakti lakṣaṇayā jātiḥ kvacid sva āśraya abhimate artha rāśau prasarppati vyāpya varttate sā eva bhāva śaktiḥ anvayi śabda jñāna nibandha nam aḥ tu kim sāmānyena kalpitena 
PVVṬ_320,1–320,5	 tena yat ucyate viṣayeṇa hi buddhīnām vinā na utpattiḥ iṣyate viśeṣāt anyat icchanti sāmānyantena tat dhruvam tāḥ hi tena vinā utpannā mithyā syuḥ viṣayāt ṛte na tu anyena vinā vṛttissāmānyasya iha duṣyati iti tad apāstam na hi yathā sāmānyam antareṇa keṣucid sāmānya vṛttiḥ iṣyate tathā sāmānyamvinā sāmānya buddhiḥ iṣyatām iti parobhyupagamam kāryate yena tāḥ hi tena vinā utpannā mithyā syuḥ iti parasya uttaram syāt kevalam yathā parasya sāmānyam antareṇa keṣucid padārthaṣu yayā pratyāsattyā sāmānya vṛttiḥ sā eva bhrānta anvayi jñāna śabda nimittam astu kim sāmānyena iti ayam arthotra vivakṣitaḥ iti na kaścid doṣaḥ tasmāt sthitam etat vyāvṛtteḥ eva eka tva adhyavasāyāt bhāveṣu anvayaḥ na anyasya iti atra sām khyaḥ prāha na nivṛttim ityādi bhāva anvayaḥ bhāvānām eka rūpa tvam aparaḥ iti vastu bhūtaḥ tat ekasya bījasya yat kāryantat anyasya pṛthivī ādeḥ na syāt kasmāt tayoḥ bīja pṛthivyoḥ atyanta bhedataḥ 
PVVṬ_320,6	 yadi ete ityādinā vyācaṣṭe eṣām iti bhāvānām yathā bījāt eka ādīnām ekam aṃkura ākhyam kāryam yaḥ hi ityādinā tat eva sādhayati yaḥ hi tasya bījasya aṃkura janana svabhāvaḥ na hi sonyasya pṛthivī ādeḥ asti yosti buddhi āropitaḥ vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ na kasmāt vyatirekasya anya vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇasya niḥsvabhāva tvāt tasmāt bīja sva lakṣaṇam eva janakam yat ca janaka rūpantadeva vastu tad janakam ca iti aṅkura janakam sva lakṣaṇam aparava iti pṛthivī ādau aparam pṛthivī ādikam aṃkuram janayet sa hi ityādi hi śabdaḥ eva kāra arthaḥ tasya iti bījasya anyasya pṛthivī ādeḥ sa pṛthivī ādiḥ tena aṃkura jananena bīja svabhāvena tatas bīja āt abhinnaḥ syāt iti asti svabhāva anvayaḥ tena kecid svabhāva bhedepi prakṛtyā eka kārya kāriṇaḥ indriyāt i vat iti ayuktam uktam iti 
PVVṬ_321,1–321,3	 yadi ityādinā si ddhā nta vā dī ātmā ekatrāpi iti kāraṇa kalāpasya yena abhinnena ātmanā janaka tvam iṣyate saḥ ātmā teṣām kāraṇānām madhye ekatra api kāraṇesti iti tena ekena kāryam kṛtam iti kṛtvā vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ nanu vyāvṛtti vādinā upyantyā avasthāyām sarveṣām janaka tvāt kāraṇa antara vaiyarthyam na etat asti samuditānām eva teṣa anta adṛśam sāmarthyam kṣaṇikānām hetu pratyaya āyatta sannidhi tvāt parasya tu nitya vādinaḥ sadā tat rūpam asti iti bhavet kāraṇa antarāṇām ānarthakyam atas eva uktam ekatra api sosti iti kāraṇa antara vikala avasthāyām api iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_321,4–321,5	 yadi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe anekaḥ padārthaḥ yadi eka svabhāva tvāt ekasya kāryasya kārakaḥjanakaḥ sa teṣām kāraṇa abhimatānām abhinnaḥ janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ eka kāraṇa sannidhāna īpyastim tatas ca sarvasyām avasthāya arma vaikalyāt kāraṇasya yatra tatra avasthitiḥ ekopi janakaḥ syāt etat eva draḍhayan= āha yasmāt ityādi ekasmin= api bīja ādau sannihite na apaiti abhinnam tat kārya jananam sāmānya rūpam viśeṣāḥ vyakti bhedāḥ apāyinaḥ na hi tasyāḥ kārya janana svabhāvasya bījāt artha antarepi pṛthivī ādau viśeṣa usti kiṅkāraṇam viśeṣe satyabheda hāneḥ sa hi abhinnaḥ janaka abhimataḥ svabhāvaḥ tatra api bījepi kevalesti iti na ekasya sthitau= api tasya iti abhinnasya rūpasya janaka abhimatasya apāyaḥ vināśa usti traiguṇyasya sarva ātmanā sarvatra sarvadā sattvāt ye viśeṣāḥ avasthā bhedāḥ teṣām saha sthiti niyama abhāvāt syāt apāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_322,1	 etat ca abhyupagamya uktam anyathā nityāt avasthā antara vyatiriktānām viśeṣāṇām api katham apāyaḥ na ca te janakāḥ iti viśeṣāḥ kasmāt na iṣṭā iti āha sahakāriṇām ityādi tasmāt ekasmin= api bīja ādau sthite janakasya ātmanaḥ sthānāt asthāyinaḥ iti viśeṣasya eka sthitau= apī iti bīja ādeḥ anyatamasya sthitau= api kārya utpattiḥ syāt na ca bhavati kārya utpattiḥ tatas sāmānya sthitepi saha kāriṇāmma dhye ekasya viśeṣasya apāye phala abhāvāt viśeṣebhyaḥ tad udbhavaḥ kārya udbhavaḥ na sāmānyāt tat kāryam aṅkura ādikam kim bhūtam anekam ityādi anekasya sahakāriṇaḥ sādhāraṇam aneka sahakāri janyam iti arthaḥ eka viśeṣa apāyepī iti sahakāriṇām anyatama bheda apāyepi anena vyatirekam āha 
PVVṬ_322,2	 punar ityādinā anvayam tasmāt viśeṣeṣu eva anvaya vyatirekau kāryasya na tu sāmānye tat āha nanu avikalaḥ iti eka viśeṣa sthitau= avikalepya bhinne rūpe tat kāryat na bhavati kāryam hi ityādina etat eva vibhajate kutaścid bhāvaḥ utpādaḥ saḥ eva dharmaḥ sa yasya asti tat tad bhāva dharmi kadācid yatra bhavati tat tasya janakasya vaikalyāt na ca abhinnasya rūpasya janaka abhimatasya sahakāriṇām madhye ekasya sthitau= api vaikalyam asti avikale tasmin sāmānya rūpe kāryam abhavat tasya sāmānyasya ājanaka ātma tām sacayati 
PVVṬ_323,1	 nanu na sāmānyam eva janakam iṣyate yena āyan doṣaḥ syāt api tu aneka ātma tayā janakaḥ iti uktam iti atra āha yat sākalya ityādi yeṣām ca viśeṣāṇām sākalya vaikalyābhyām kāryambhāva abhāva vat tatas eva viśeṣebhyaḥ kāryasya utpattiḥ tasmin sati iti hetu bhāva yogye viśeṣe sati bhavataḥ kāryasya tad anyasmāt iti viśeṣāt anyasmāt sāmānyāt ati prasaṃgāt sarvaḥ sarvasya kāraṇam syāt yatas evam tasmāt viśeṣāḥ eva janakāḥ na sāmānyam janakam tatas ajanaka tvāt te eva viśeṣāḥ vastu parama artha santaḥ iti arthaḥ kim kāraṇam yasmāt pāramārthikaḥ bhāvaḥ paramārtha san= iti arthaḥ saḥ eva artha kriyā kṣamaḥ 
PVVṬ_323,2–323,3	 idam eva hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe artha kriyā yogya tā vastunaḥ lakṣaṇam ayogya tā tva vastunaḥ lakṣaṇam vakṣyāmaḥ iti sambandhaḥ artha kriyā kṣamam yat tat atra parama artha sadi tyādinā sarva artha kriyā yogyorthaḥ viśeṣa ātmakaḥ na anveti viśeṣasya vyakti antarān anuyāyi tvāt yonvā itisāmānya ātmā tasmāt sāmānya ātmanaḥ na kāryasya sambhavaḥ 
PVVṬ_323,4–323,6	 tasmāt ityādinā upasaṃhāraḥ anartha kriyā yogya tvāt iti artha kriyā āyām ayogya tvāt iti arthaḥ tatas eva iti viśeṣāt eva tat niṣpatteḥ artha kriyāyāḥ niṣpatteḥ tat evamparaiḥ kalpitasya ājanaka tvam pratipāditam adhunā yat pareṇa uktam ekasya kāryam anyasya na syāt atyanta bhedate iti tat pariharttum tat eva codyam a avarttayati svabhāvān anvayāt tarhi ityādinā 
PVVṬ_323,7–324,1	 jvara ādi śamane kaścid saha pratyekam eva vā ityādinā prāk api etat parihṛtantathā api adhika vidhāna arthaḥ punar upanyāsaḥ ekasya vīja ādeḥ yat janakam rūpantadanyasya pṛthivī ādeḥ na asti iti kṛtvā anyaḥ sahakārīa janakaḥ syāt janaka svabhāvāt bhinna svabhāvasya janaka tve ca abhyupagamyamānā ibheda aviśeṣāt sarvaḥ yava bīja ādiḥ api śāli aṅkurasya janakaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_324,2	 na etat ityādinā pariharati śāli bījasya ekasya janakasya yaḥ ātmā tena ātmanā pṛthivī ādeḥ yava bīja ādeḥ ca atyanta bhedepi hetuḥ kaścid pṛthivī ādiḥ śāli aṃkurasyana aparaḥ yava bīja ādiḥ caśabdaḥ śloka pūraṇa arthaḥ eva kāra arthaḥ vā kiṅkāraṇam svabhāvoyam bhāvānām ekasya yaḥ janakaḥ ātmā tasmāt ātmanaḥ svabhāvāt bhidyamānāḥ sarve sa mantulyam janakāḥ prāpnuvanti bheda aviśeṣāt na vā kaścid janakaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_324,3	 syāt etat ca udyam yadi eṣām ekasmāt janakāt ātmanaḥ bhinnānānta da tatkārya jananam prati niyama lakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ na sambhavet kintu sambhavet eva tatas iti viśeṣa sambhavātaḥ bheda aviśeṣepi kutaścid ātmā atiśayāt viśiṣṭa kārya pratiniyata lakṣaṇāt kaścid janakaḥ pṛthivī ādiḥ śāli aṃkurasya na aparaḥ yava bīja ādiḥ kasmāt śālī aṅkura jananā viśeṣaḥ tasya pṛthivī ādeḥ sahakāriṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ na aparasya yava bīja ādeḥ ayam eva vibhāgaḥ kiṃkṛtaḥ iti ced āha na hi ityādi kim agniḥ dahati uṣṇaḥ vā na uda kanda hati uṣṇam ca iti na paryanuyogam arhati pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddha tvāt etāvat tu praṣṭum yuktam syāt kutas hetoḥ ayam yathā ukta svabhāvaḥ iti avaśyam hi svabhāva bhedasya hetunā bhāvyam yatas nirhetuka tve anapekṣiṇaḥ deśa ādi niyamena atiprasaṃgāt sarvatra sarvadā sarva ātmanā bhāva prasaṃgāt tasmāt svabhāvosya kāraṇa abhimatasya sva hetoḥ sakāśāt bhavati iti ucyate tasya api sva hetoḥ tad janana ātma tā tathābhūta kāraṇa svabhāva janana ātma tā tat anyasmāt sva hetoḥ iti anādiḥ hetu paramparā 
PVVṬ_325,1–325,2^1	 na hi bhinnānāmbhāvānām hetu pravibhāge bādhakam pramāṇam asti tat eva āha bhinna ityādi svabhāvāt iti vastu sthiteḥ ekatve tu bādhakam asti iti āha abhede tu ityādi parasparam abhedāt ekasya nāśe sarvasya yugapad nāśaḥ utpāde sarvasya utpādaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ abhedāt ityādinā vyācaṣṭe viśvasya sarvasya padārtha rāśeḥ svabhāvena abhedāt vibhāga utpatti ityādi ekasya utpattiḥ anyasya anutpattiḥ ekasya sthitiḥ anyasya nirodha eti evam vibhāgena utpatti ādayaḥ na syuḥ sva ātma vat iti yathā ekasya avasthā viśeṣasya vibhāgena na utpatti ādayaḥ tadvat iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_325,1–325,2^2	 ādi śabdāt ekasya grahaṇam anyasya agrahaṇam ityādi sūtre tu nāśa utpāda grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham tathā tena eva vibhāga utpatti ādinā upalakṣaṇāt niścayāt abhedasya anyathā bheda abhedau kena lakṣyete eka ākārasya api iti tulya ākārasya api vyatirekaḥ vibhāgaḥ pṛthak utpatti ādimat tvam tat bhedasya lakṣaṇam avyatirekaḥ avibhāgaḥ pṛthak utpatti ādimattva abhāvaḥ tad abhedasya lakṣaṇam sati api vibhāga utpatti ādimattve kasmāt bhedaḥ iti āha virodhinoḥ ityādi virodhinoḥ utpāda anutpāda prabhṛtikayoḥ yugapad eka ātmani virodhāt nābhedaḥ eva arthānām kintu bheda upyasti tat uktam 
PVVṬ_325,3–325,4	 sarvam hi vastu rūpeṇa bhidyate na parasparam sva rūpa apekṣayā ca eṣām paraspara vibhinna tā iti tena kāraṇena na evam na sakṛt utpāda ādi prasaṃgaḥ iti ced āha na ityādyasya eva vyākhyānam na vai sarveṇa ākāreṇa avyatirekam abhedam brūmaḥ yena evam syāt sakṛt nāśa utpāda ādi syāt kintvasya bāhya ādhyātmikasya bhedasya kaścid ātmā ghaṭa ādi avasthā viśeṣa lakṣaṇaḥ bhinnaḥ na anyaḥ traiguṇya ātmakaḥ sukha duḥkha moha ātma tāyāḥ vastu rūpa tāyāḥ dravya rūpa tāyāḥ sattā rūpa tāyāḥ ca sarvatra anugamāt tena ayam arthovasthā tadvatoḥ parasparam abheda upyavasthāna antu parasparambhedaḥ eva iti yathā uktāt avasthā ādi lakṣaṇāt bhedāt 
PVVṬ_326,1	 evam tarhi sāmānyasya nitya tvāt sarvatra sthānam viśeṣāṇān tu vināśaḥ iti etat aṅgīkṛtam tatas ca ekasmin viśeṣe vinaśyati sati yaḥ tiṣṭhati sāmānya ātmā na sa tasya viśeṣasya sambhavaḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsāt sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ bhedaḥ eva syāt anyathā sthāna āsthānayoḥ eka ātma āśraya tvebhyupagamyamāne viruddhau= api dharmau= eka ātmani aṅgīkṛtau bhavataḥ ca konyaḥ dharmaḥ bhedakaḥ na eva kaścid na eva viruddhau dharmau= ekatra aṅgīkriyete tayoḥ lakṣaṇa bhedāt bhinna tvāt tathā hi viśeṣāḥ pṛthak utpāda ādinā sarva ākāra vivekinaḥ sāmānyantu pṛthak utpatti ādi abhāvāt sarvatra avivekī iti atas āha sarva ākāra ityādi sarva ākāra viveka avivekinoḥ yathā kramambheda sāmānyayoḥ arthayoḥ abhyupagamāt nāma kevalam iti bheda sāmānye bhinne iti etat abhidhāna mātram na iṣṭam syāt na tu vastu vastu tu bheda sāmānya ātma kamparasparambhinnam eva iṣṭam etat ca uktam prāk nāma antaram vā artha bhedam abhyupagamya tathā abhidhānāt ityādinā 
PVVṬ_326,2	 tat iti tasmāt ime bhāvāḥ iti viśeṣāḥ sāmānyam vā parasparaṃbhinnāḥ eva kiṃbhūtā na eka yogakṣemāḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsitāḥ iti yāvat atas kāraṇāt na syāt sāmānya bheda dhīḥ sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ parasparam asambadhnantī buddhiḥ na syāt iti arthaḥ buddhi abhāvāt ca vyapadeśa upi pratikṣiptaḥ eva buddhi nibandhana tvāt tasya tena 
PVVṬ_326,3–327,1	 anyonya apekṣitā nityam syāt sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ viśeṣāṇān tu sāmānyante ca tasya bhavanti hi ākṛ iti nirastam tat iti tasmāt idam sāmānyambhedebhyortha antaram bhedeṣu anāyattam kasmāt taiḥ bhedaiḥ tasya sāmānyasya ajanya tvāt dvitīyorthaḥ tat idam bheda ātmakam vastu sāmānyāt artha antarantasmin sāmānyeanāyat tantena ajanya tvāt nityasya artha kriyā asāmarthyāt asya bhedasya idam sāmānyam iti vyapadeśam na arhati bhedaḥ vā asya sāmānyasya iti 
PVVṬ_327,2–327,4	 anya apohepi sāmānye eṣa prasaṃgaḥ iti yaḥ ekasmin vinaśyati tiṣṭhati ātmā iti ādikaḥ tathā hi dhave khadire vā vinaśyati avṛkṣa vyāvṛttiḥ tiṣṭhati eva vṛkṣa antare na ityādinā pariharati ayam atra arthaḥ dvividha unya apohaḥ ekaḥ vijātīya vyāvṛttau bāhyaḥ su a ākāra bhedena adhyastaḥ vikalpa buddhyā yaḥ viṣayīkriyate śabdena ca tasya eva artha kriyā kāri tvena ca pravṛtti viṣaya tvāt na buddhi pratibhāsa mātrasya artha kāritva abhāvāt aparorthāt yat pratīyate anya nivṛtti mātram yat ca etat anya nivṛtti m ātrantasya niḥsvabhāva tvāt na etat ca udyam ā cā rye ṇa vā yat abhimatantasya niḥsvabhāva tvāt abhāvāt iti arthaḥ tat āha nivṛtteḥ niḥsvabhāva tvāt iti na sthāna āsthāna kalpanā 
PVVṬ_327,5–327,6	 viśeṣe vinaśyati kim anya apohaḥ tiṣṭhati kim vā nivarttate iti iyam sthāna āsthāna kalpanā yuktāḥ tasya iti anya apohasya svabhāva anuṣaṅgiṇyaḥ vastu anupātinyaḥ vikalpa buddhi āropitam yat sāmāni antatra tarhi sva rūpa sthiti pracyuti kalpanā bhaviṣyati iti atas āha upaplavaḥ ca ityādi yaḥ sāmānya ākāraḥ aneka padārtha abhinnaḥ pratibhāsate sāmānya dhiyaḥ upaplavaḥ bhrāntaḥ atas sā upi bahis na asti eva yatas evantena api viplava tvena kāraṇena sāmānya dhīḥ adūṣaṇā na asyām yathoktam dūṣaṇam asti iti vigrahaḥ idam eka ākāram vikalpa vijñānam nirviṣayam yasmāt mithyā jñānam mithyā artham eva katham iti ced āha yat ityādi yasmāt anekatra eka ākāram tad viṣayasya vikalpa vijñāna viṣayasya sāmānyasya na sthitiḥ asthitiḥ vā kasmāt tasya mithyājñāna viṣayasya abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_328,1^1	 samāna doṣatām apanīya punar prakāra antareṇa prakrāntañca udyam pariharttum āha yat punar ityādi tad janakaḥ hi tasya śāli aṅkurasya janakaḥ hi sa tasya śāli bījasya svabhāvaḥ yat ca tasya śālibījasya śāli aṅkura janakam rūpam tatas janakāt rūpāt anyaḥ pṛthivī ādiḥ janakaḥ katham iti tatra iti upanyāse tatra vā codye pratividhīyate śālibījāt anyasya pṛthivī ādeḥ tad janakam aṅkura janakam rūpam na asti iti na brūmaḥ kintarhi yat ekasya śālibījasya janakam rūpantat anyasya pṛthivī ādeḥ na iti brūmaḥ bhāvānām parasparam ananvayāt anyopīti pṛthivī ādiḥ na para rūpeṇa iti na śāli bīja rūpeṇa kim kāraṇam ata tvāt a tad svabhāva tvāt 
PVVṬ_328,1^2	 na ca atra bādhakam pramāṇam asti iti āha te pṛthivī ādayaḥ yathāsvam iti yasya yat sva lakṣaṇam tena bhinnāḥ ca parasparam ekasya kāryasya janakāḥ ca svabhāvena iti kotra virodhaḥ na kaścid bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt na tu śāli aṅkura janaka abhimatena śāli bīja rūpeṇa vikalasya pṛthivī ādeḥ śāli aṅkura kārya tvam viruddham iti atas āha eka rūpa ityādi ekasyaśāli bījasyam janakam yat rūpantena vikalaḥ pṛthivī ādiḥ tad rūpaḥ śāli bīja ādi svabhāvona syāt na atad kāryaḥ kintu tad kāryaḥ eva sa śāli aṅkuraḥ kāryam asya iti vigrahaḥ yadi tu bījasya eva aṅkura janaka tvam syāt syāt virodhaḥ tat ca na asti tat āha tena eva ityādi śāli bījena eva tat kāryam aṅkura ākhyam 
PVVṬ_328,2–328,3	 api ca ityādinā pūrva uktam smārayati eka apāye phala abhāvāt viśeṣebhyaḥ tad udbhavaḥ iti pramāṇa balena viśeṣāḥ janakāḥ iti uktam prāk tena ātmanā iti tena janaka rūpeṇa yat ekasya bījasya janakaṃmanyasya pṛthivī ādeḥ tat na asti na tāvatā iti śāli bīja rūpa vaikalya mātreṇā janakaḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ api abhedaḥ ityādi teṣu bhedeṣu abheda upyasti iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_329,1–329,3	 syāt etat ityādinā vyācaṣṭe tat eva abhinnam rūpam ekā śaktiḥ tayā yogāt tena ityā cā ryaḥ tena abhinnena rūpeṇa te viśeṣāḥ ajanakāḥ proktaḥ sati api iti ādinā vyācaṣṭe tena sāmānya rūpeṇa te viśeṣāḥ ajanakāḥ kiṅkāraṇam tasya sāmānya rūpasya nitya tvena anapāyāt etat ca na apaiti abhinnantad rūpam viśeṣāḥ khalu a pāyinaḥ ityādinā prāk uktam 
PVVṬ_329,4–329,6	 syātām nāśa udbhavau sakṛdi tyādinā viruddha dharma adhyāsāt bhedam prasādhya pratibhāsa bhedena api sādhayitum āha kim ca ityādi kim viśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsa bhedaḥ ananya bhāj prativyakti bhinnaḥ api śabdāt utpatti ādi bhedaḥ ca bhedakaḥ etat ca pūrva uktam eva samuccīyate yopi ve dāḥ nta vā dyāha abhāva grahaṇa nimittakaḥ hi bheda grahaḥ na ca abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ tena pratyakṣeṇa sattāmātraṅgṛhyate na bhedaḥ tat uktam gavya śve vā upajātantu pratyakṣam na viśiṣyate 
PVVṬ_329,7	 iti atas āha nyāyam ityādi tasya iti abheda vādinaḥ buddhi pratibhāsa bhedaḥ buddheḥ ākāra bhedaḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ ca iti pṛthak utpatti vināśa ādikaḥ sati vā tasmin pratibhāsa ādi bhede bhāvānām abhedebhyupagamyamāne na kvacid bhedaḥ syāt loka pratītaḥ ca bhedaḥ tathā ca iti abhede sati ayam pravibhāgaḥ iti pratibhāsa ādi pravibhāgaḥ eka ātma vat yathā ekasmin sukha ātmani na pratibhāsa ādi bhedaḥ tadvat tasmāt ayam bāhya ādhyātmikaḥ bhedaḥ viśeṣaḥ eva paraspara vilakṣaṇaḥ eva kiṃbhūtaḥ bhinna pratibhā bhinnaḥ pratibhāsādiḥ yasya iti vigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_330,1–330,3	 nirvikalpaka bodhena dvi ātmakasya api vastunaḥ grahaṇāt abheda upīti ced āha na ca atra ityādi atra iti bhedeṣu aparam iti dvitīyam yad valena abhinna pratibhāsavalena tatas viśeṣaḥ eva bhedaḥ eva na tu abheda usti saḥ eva viśeṣaḥ vastu ye tu apare sāmānya dharmāḥ vastu tva ādayaḥ tasya eva vyāvṛttayaḥ kalpitāḥ tat kāryam ityādi kārya ādi pada sāmāna adhikaraṇyāt napumakaḥ anyathā viśeśasya prakrānta tvāt saḥ iti syāt tat eva viśeṣa rūpam kāryam kāraṇam ca uktantadeva sva lakṣaṇam ucyate tad tyāgāpti phalāḥ iti tasya eva viśeṣasya heyasyo pādeyasya vā yathākramam tyāgaḥ āptiḥ ca phalam yāsāmpravṛttīn a antāḥ tathā uktāḥ sa ca artha kriyā kārī viśeṣaḥ eva tasya eva iti viśeṣasya aparasmāt vijātīyāt bhedaḥ vyāvṛti mātram na tu vastu bhūtam kiñcid sāmānyam nāma 
PVVṬ_330,4	 yadi hi syāt tad upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptambheda vyatirekiṇa upalabhyeta hi yasmai t na hi tasya sāmānyasya artha tve vastu tve sati dṛśyasya sataḥ rūpa anupalakṣaṇaṃsvarūpa agrahaṇam yuktam kasmāt tad upalakṣaṇa kṛta tvāt sāmānya upalakṣaṇa kṛta tvāt bhedeṣu bheda pratyayasya na hi svayam agṛhītamparatra jñāna hetuḥ 
PVVṬ_330,5–331,2	 evantā vat mī mām sa kā dimatena prātibhāsikam sāmānyam nirākṛtya anumānikam api pūrva uktam sām khya matena nirākarttum āha api ca ityādi yathā sāṃkhyasya bheda aviśeṣepi na sarva sarva sādhanam tathā bau ddhasya bheda aviśeṣepi na sarva sarva sādhanam kasya punar ca udyasya ayam samādhiḥ iti āha yat uktam ityādi tad janaka svabhāvāt iti śāli aṅkura janana svabhāvāt bhinnaḥ pṛthivī ādiḥ asya iti aṅkurasya janaka tve vā abhyupagamyamāne bhedasya aviśeṣāt sarvaḥ janakaḥ syāt iti atra codye uktam eva uttaram idantu dvitīyam ucyate kim punar uktam iti āha yadi ityādim pratiniyata kārya janakā janaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ na syāt syāt etat ca udyam iti yathā ityādinā śloka artham āha tathā viśeṣepi bhaviṣyati na sarvaḥ sarva janaka eti sambandhaḥ vastu dharmatayā iti vastu śaktyā bhāvānām abhede tu abhyupagamyamāne tasya sarvatra abhinna tvena abhyupagatasya ekatra kriyā akriye virudhyete 
PVVṬ_331,3	 bheda mātrā ityādinā vyācaṣṭe hetuḥ upādāna kāraṇam pratyaya āssahakāriṇaḥ svehetu pratyayāḥ sva hetu pratyayāḥ tainiṃyamitaḥ viśiṣṭa kārya nirvarttana samarthaḥ kṛtaḥ svabhāvaḥ yeṣa ante tathā uktāḥ tad bhāvaḥ tasmāt na anyaḥ iti akāraka abhimatā na kārakā syuḥ kiṅkāraṇam atad svabhāva tvāt atad kārya janana svabhāva tvāt tasya iti ekasya traiguṇyasya tatra eva iti ekasmin= eva kārye tathā iti tena eva abhinnena prakāreṇa tathā api yadā śālibījam śāli aṅkuram janayati tadā eva na yavavījam śāli aṅkuram janayati yaḥ ca śāli bījasya ātmā saḥ eva yava bījasya iti ekatra ekasya kriyā akriye prasajyete traiguṇyasya tena tena śāli vīja ādi sanniveśena bheda upyasti atas bhedāt kasyacid kriyā ced bhedaḥ ced akriyā hetuḥ na kuryuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ teṣām api parasparam bhedāt 
PVVṬ_332,1–332,2	 na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sarva ākārāḥ dhiyaḥ kintasya eva ekasya vastunaḥ na eva iti arthaḥ bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt paryāyasya iti bhāvaḥ atha ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sarveṣa ambhedānām sarvatra kārye paryāyeṇa krameṇa upayogāt etat ca yadā pra dhā na śaktyā adhiṣṭhitānām eva bhedānām apara apara pariṇāmena kārya karttṛ tvam iti darśanantada uktam yadā tu idam darśanampradhāna śaktiḥ eva apara apara rūpeṇa pariṇāma artha kriyāyām upayujyate tadā idam ucyate śakteḥ vā ityādi traiguṇya lakṣaṇāyāḥ tad niveśinyāḥ pūrvam akāraka abhimata padārtha niveśinyāḥ paścāt rūpa antareṇa kāraka abhimata rūpeṇa pariṇatāyāḥ upayogāt na eva kaścid akārakosti iti anena sambandhaḥ bhedaḥ nānā tvam āśrayaḥ yasya paryāyasya sa tathā uktaḥ ekasya abhedasya kathat na eva śālibījasya ekasyayava bīja ādi rūpa tayā pariṇāmaḥ na yuktaḥ iti artha 
PVVṬ_332,3–332,5	 etena sa kintasya eva vastunaḥ iti etat vivṛtam śakteḥ vā iti yat uktantatrāha pariṇāmaḥ vā iti avyatirekiṇyāḥ iti nirvibhāgāyāḥ śakteḥ pariṇāmaḥ vā avasthāna antara prāptiḥ vā katham atha iṣyate avasthā antarāṇām prāptiḥ ātma bhūtā eva traiguṇyasya tatas viśeṣe vā kathaṃcid abhyupagamyate pradhānasya ekatva hāniḥ iti evantā vat pariṇāma pakṣam nirākṛtya adhunā abhinnam vā bhinna abhinnamvā bhinnam vā sarvāsu ca uttarottara avasthāsu anuyāyi tvāt ūrdhva vṛtti vā samam sarvāsu vyaktiṣu anuyāyi tvāt tiryak vṛtti vā sāmānyam abhyupagamya sām khya mī mām sa kaḥ nai yā yi ka ādi abhimatam dūṣayitum āha kiṃca ityādi 
PVVṬ_332,6	 tena yopi di ga mba raḥ manyate na asti ābhiḥ ghaṭa paṭa ādiṣu ekam sāmānyam iṣyate teṣām ekānta bhedāt kintu a para apareṇa paryāyeṇa avasthā saṃjñitena pariṇāmi dravyam etat eva ca sarva paryāya anuyāyi tvāt sāmānyam ucyate tathā hi suvarṇṇa ātmakam ghaṭam bhaṅkttvā mauli nirvarttane tat eva suvarṇṇa dravyam ghaṭa rūpa tayā vinaśya mauli rūpatayā utpadyamānam suvarṇa svabhāvena tiṣṭhati iti apara apara avasthāyāḥ pariṇāmi tad sāmānyam iti ucyate pariṇāmi tvāt eva ca avasthā tadvatora bheda unyathā avasthātuḥ sakāśāt avasthāyāḥ bhede pariṇāma ayogāt ghaṭa ātma tayā ca suvarṇṇa dravyasya vinā āśu paṭa arthī śokam pratipadyate mauli rūpatayā utpāde tad arthī prāmodyam pratipadyate suvarṇṇa tayā ca vināśa utpāda abhāve suvarṇṇa arthī mādhyasthyam pratipadyate tena yugapad utpāda vyaya dhrauvya yuktam sat iti vastunaḥ lakṣaṇam iti tat āha 
PVVṬ_333,1	 ghaṭa mauli suvarṇṇa arthī vināśa utpāda sthitiṣu ayam śoka pramoda mādhya stham janaḥ yāti sa hetukam na nāśena vinā śokaḥ na utpādena vinā sukham sthityā vinā na mādhyasthantasmāt vastu traya ātmakam payaḥ vrataḥ na dadhyatti na payotti dadhi vrataḥ agorasa vrataḥ na ubhe tasmāt vastu traya ātmakam na sāmānya ātmanā udeti na vyeti vyaktam anvayāt ve vyeti udeti viśeṣeṇa saha ekatra udaya ādi sat iti 
PVVṬ_333,2	 sā upyatra nirākṛtaḥ eva draṣṭavyaḥ tadvati sāmānya viśeṣavati vastuni abhyupagamyamāne atyantam abheda abhedau syātām viśeṣebhyaḥ ghaṭa paṭa ādibhyaḥ sāmānyasya traiguṇya ādi lakṣaṇasya avyatirekāt sāmānyam api viśeṣa ātmakam iti atyanta bhedaḥ syāt sāmānyasya abhāvāt sāmānyāt viśeṣāṇām avyaktiḥ ekādaikyam iti antā bhedaḥ viśeṣāṇām abhāvāt ekambheda sāmānya ātmakam na asti iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_333,3^1	 atha sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ kathaṃcid bhedaḥ iṣyate atra api āha anyonyam ityādi sadṛśa asadṛśa ātmanossāmānya viśeṣayoḥ yadi kathaṃcid anyonyamparasparambhedaḥ tadā ekāntena tayoḥ bhedaḥ eva syāt ghaṭa paṭa vat na ca artha antaram sāmānyam pratīyate tasmāt na ekam sāmānya viśeṣa ātmakam vastu vidyate di ga mba ra syā api tadvati vastuni abhyupagamyamāne atyanta bheda abhedau syātām yadā ghaṭa ādi avasthā bhedebhyaḥ suvarṇṇa tva sāmānyasya abhedaḥ tadā atyantam ekāntena bhedaḥ syāt ghaṭa maulya ādeḥ suvarṇṇa tva sāmāmānyasya abhāvāt atha suvarṇṇa tva sāmānyāt ghaṭa maulya ādi avasthā bhedānām abhedaḥ tadā atyantam abheda ekāntena ekatvam suvarṇṇa rūpa tā eva syāt iti arthaḥ atha avasthā tadvatoḥ svabhāva abhede sati api lakṣaṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ iṣyate tathā hi suvarṇṇa tva sāmānyasya svarūpam sarva avasthā anuyāyi pratīyate 
PVVṬ_333,3^2	 ghaṭa ādi avasthānām svarūpam vyāvṛttam pratīyate tena avasthā tadvatoḥ lakṣaṇa bhedāt bheda usti eva iti atra āha anyonyam ityādi sadṛśa asadṛśa ātmanoḥ iti avasthā tadvatoḥ yadi bhedaḥ tadā tayoḥ anyonyambhedaḥ parasparam ekāntena bhedaḥ syāt anugata vyāvṛtti rūpayoḥ paraspara asaṃśleṣāt na ca aparaḥ svabhāva usvi yena tayoḥ abhedaḥ syāt ananta dharma ātmakasya dharmiṇaḥ apratīte ḥ bhāvāḥ ced bhedinaḥ iti sambandhaḥ abhinnena ātmanā pradhāna ākhyena anyena vā vastutva ādinā suvarṇṇa tvena vā teṣām eva ghaṭa ādīna ambhedānām sva ātma bhūtena avyatiriktena tadvantaḥ syuḥ abhinna svabhāvavantaḥ syuḥ teṣām pradhāna ādīnām abhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ tad abhinna svabhāvaḥ ātmā rūpam yasya bhedasya ghaṭa ādi lakṣaṇasya sa tad abhinna svabhāva ātmā tad bhāvaḥ tasmāt bhedasya api kutas bhedaḥ parasparam na eva anena atyanta abhedaḥ vyākhyātaḥ 
PVVṬ_334,1	 atha tasya bhedasya ghaṭa ādi lakṣaṇasya samānaḥ ekaḥ ātmā na bhavati bhedasya ghaṭa ādi rūpeṇa aneka ātmaka tvāt tathā sati tad ātmanā bheda svabhāvena tena api sāmānya padārthena traiguṇya ādinā tathā iti sāmānya ātmanā bhavitun na yuktam bhedāt avyatirikta tvāt sāmānyasya samāna tā na prāpnoti iti arthaḥ etena atyanta bhedaḥ vyākhyātaḥ
