PVVṬ_334,2	 tathā abhāve hi iti sāmānya ātmaka tve pradhānādeḥ iṣyamāṇe pradhāna ādyātmā atad dharma abheda dharmā na syāt avyatirekiṇā avasthā ākhyena dharmeṇa tadvān na syāt iti arthaḥ avasthā tadvatoḥ parasparataḥ bhedaḥ syāt iti yāvat tam eva sādhayan= āha na hi ayam ityādi ayam ekaḥ svabhāvaḥ pravṛtti nivṛttimān na yuktaḥ iti sambandhaḥ sthānam pravṛttiḥ vigamaḥ nivṛttiḥ tathā hi pradhāna śaktau sthitāyām suvarṇṇa dravya tva ādau ca sthite avasthānāt nivṛttiḥ iṣyate etena anyonyam vā tayoḥ bhedaḥ ityādi vyākhyātam 
PVVṬ_334,3–335,1	 na ityādinā para abhiprāyam āśaṃkate na sarva ātmanā sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ abhedaḥ eva kintu tayoḥ api bheda sāmānyayoḥ bhedaḥ bhavet yadi na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe kvacid dravye sāmānya viśeṣasya parasparambhedaḥ abhedaḥ vaikāntikaḥ na hi iti sambandhaḥ kiṅkāraṇam vivekinā ityādi sāmānyam śaktiḥ suvarṇṇa tvan dravya tvañcā viśeṣaḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ iti evaṃbhedena vyavasthāpanāt yena ityā cā ryaḥ tayoḥ bheda sāmānyayoḥ ayam bhedaḥ idam sāmānyam iti etat yena ātmanā vyāvṛttena anugatena ca svabhāvena bhedaḥ vyavasthāpyate yadi tena ātmanā sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ bhedaḥ tadā bhedaḥ eva atyantam 
PVVṬ_335,2	 yadi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yam a ātmānam iti anugatam vyāvṛt tañca tena ātmanā sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ yadi bhedaḥ iti sambandhaḥ etat eva sphuṭayan= āha yasmāt ityādi tau bheda vyavasthāpakau= a ātmānau tayoḥ iti sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ sva ātma svabhāva bhūtau tau ced anugata vyāvṛttau= ātmānau vyatirekiṇau paraspara vyāvṛttau tadā vyatirekaḥ eva bhedaḥ eva kiṅkāraṇam svabhāva bhedāt 
PVVṬ_335,3	 syāt matam avasthā avasthā troḥ bheda vyavasthāpakaḥ hi svabhāvaḥ eva bhidyate na bhāvaḥ iti āha svabhāvaḥ hi ityādi svabhāvaḥ eva bhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ tathā ca iti bheda sāmānyayoḥ atyanta bhede sati bhedasya nissāmānya tā sāmānyasya ca nirviśeṣa tā syāt iti sambandhaḥ sāmānyasya bhedavat tvam bhedānām ca sāmānyavat tvam na syāt sambandha abhāvāt iti yāvat yadvat ghaṭa ādīnām bhedānām sambandha abhāvāt parasparantadvattā na asti 
PVVṬ_335,4–336,1	 vyatireke ca ityādinā artham āha bheda sāmānyayoḥ ajanya janaka tvena sambandha abhāvāt bhavati ca tayossambandhi tayā pratītiḥ tasmāt bhrānta tvam uktam iti na syāt sāmānya bheda dhīriti atra antare evam ūrdhva sāmānya vādam di ga mva rāḥ dyabhi matam tiryak sāmānya vādañca sām khyā dyabhimatam sādhāraṇa dūṣaṇena nirākṛtya punar tiryak sāmānya vādam eva dūṣayitum āha api ca ityādi 
PVVṬ_336,2	 etat uktam bhavati artha kriyā arthinaḥ sāmānya viṣaya bheda abheda cintayā na kiñcid prayojanam artha kriyā rahita tvāt kintu yam a ātmānam artha kriyā yogyam puraskṛti a ālambanīkṛtya tad sādhya phala vān chāvān tena ātmanā yat sādhyamphalantad abhilāṣāvān ayam puruṣaḥ pravarttate tad āśrayau= artha kriyā samartha adhiṣṭhānau bheda abhedau ciṃti ete tasya ca artha kriyā yogyasya sva ātmanā svena rūpeṇa bhedaḥ ātyantika usti eva vyāvṛttyā ca vijātīya vyāvṛttena rūpeṇa samāna tā asti eva adhya vasita eka tva rūpayā iyatā eva artha kriyā arthinaḥ bheda abheda cintā samāptāḥ tatonartha kriyā kāriṇaḥ sāmānyasya kim sva lakṣaṇe bheda abheda cintayā iti 
PVVṬ_336,3–336,5	 nanu ca artha kriyā arthinaḥ puruṣasya vyāvṛttyā api samāna tāyāḥ kimprayojanam artha kriyā rahita tvāt sattyam sva lakṣaṇāni eva vyāvṛttyā sāmānyam ucyate śabdāt tatra ekatva adhyavasāyena pravṛttiḥ yathā asya āditya doṣaḥ atha syāt sva lakṣaṇam eva sva lakṣaṇa antara anuyāyi iti kim parikalpitayā vyāvṛ ttyeti āha sva lakṣaṇānāmparasparambhedāt yadi ghaṭa rūpampaṭe syāt udaka āharaṇa arthī paṭepi pravartteta tat āha pravṛtti ādi ityādi ādi śabdāt tulya utpatti nirodha ādi prasaṅgaḥ 
PVVṬ_336,6	 sarve eva ityādinā vyācaṣṭe viśeṣam eva artha kriyā yogyam svabhāva ākhyam ātma bhūtam iti arthaḥ kasya bhāvasya vastunodhikṛtya pravarttate saḥ eva hi iti artha kriyā kārī viśeṣaḥ tathā iti gauḥ iti ādi śabdaiḥ artha kriyā arthī hi sva lakṣaṇa pratipādana abhiprāyaḥ eva śabdam prayuṅkte dṛśya vikalpyayoḥ ekīkṛtya pratipattā api tathā eva pratipadyate tatas vyavaharttṛṇā madhyavasāya vaśāt śabda vyāpāra apekṣayā etat uktam śabde tu jñāna sva lakṣaṇa pratibhāsaḥ na asti iti sva lakṣaṇam avācyam uktam iti adoṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_337,1–337,2	 dravya ādayaḥ tu na tatra iti gauḥ iti ādi śabdaiḥ gaṃu ādi codanāyām kasmāt yathāsvam dravya tva ādi śabdaiḥ teṣa aṅga vādeḥ pṛthak abhidhānāt go dravyam ityādinā kathantarhi gauḥ iti ādi pada prayoge sattā dravya tva ādayaḥ pratīyante iti āha arthasya ityādi arthasya gavā ādeḥ tena sattva dravya tva ādinā avyabhicārāt tata ūrthāt gatiḥ sāmānyānām syāt na tu viśeṣa śabdaḥ sāmānye vyāpriyate nirloṭhitam ca etat ācārya di ṅ nā ge na sā mā nyaḥ paḥ rī kṣā dau yathā na viśeṣa śabdānām sāmānye vṛttiḥ iti atra codyate kasya punar sāmānyasya viśeṣeṇa avyabhicāraḥ yat tāvat para parikalpitat na asti eva yat ca anya vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam prasajya mātrantat api na asti eva na api vikalpa buddhi pratibhāsinaḥ bāhyena avyabhicāra usti tasya svatantra tvāt 
PVVṬ_337,3^1	 ucyate sva lakṣaṇam eva sajātīya vyāvṛttam viśeṣaḥ tat eva vijātīya vyāvṛttim apekṣya abhedena upāttam sāmānyam iti ucyate tatas sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ vastutas eka tvāt kṛtaka tva anitya tvayoḥ iva avyabhicāraḥ śabda vyāpāra bhedāt tu kevalam kvacid śābdī pratipattiḥ kvacid ārthī iti ucyate tat iti tasmāt eyam puruṣaḥ gavā ādi śabda pratyupasthāpitaṅ gavā ādi śabda sannidhāpitam artham artha kriyā āśrayam artha antarasya sāmānyasya upanyāsena bheda sāmāni a ākāra tayā dvi mukhāḥ buddhiḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ yosya gavā ādeḥ ātma asvabhāvaḥ ananya bhāva sādhāraṇasya eva svabhāvaḥ śabda coditaḥ iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ yam artham sāsnādimanttam puraskṛti a ālambanīkṛtya viśiṣṭa artha kriyā arthī tam eva āha yathā ityādi yathā gorvāha doha ādau= arthī gām adhikṛtya pravarttate anya sambhavinaḥ iti goḥ anyasmin= aśve sambhavinorthasya arthī gām puraskṛtya na pravarttate iti vākya arthaḥ samarthanīyaḥ 
PVVṬ_337,3^2	 korthonya sambhavi iti āha yathā yuddha praveśaḥ iti yathāsvam iti yasya yaḥ śabdaḥ vācakaḥ na davya tva ādi sāmānyam coditam iti liṅga vipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ tat codanayā gavā ādīnām gavā ādi śabdaiḥ codanayā tadā iti artha kriyā arthinaḥ pravṛtti kāle prāptum anabhipreta tvāt dravya tva ādi sāmānyasya iti vibhakti vipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ kasmāt punar gavā ādi śabdena dravya tva ādi sāmānyam codayitum nābhi pretam iti āha gavā ādi samāveśāt gavā ādi śabdasya gavā ādau loke saṃketita tvāt gavā ādi svabhāva tvāt dravya tva ādi sāmānyasya gavā ādi codanayā abhidhānam iti ced āha tad ātma bhūtānām ca iti gavā ādi svabhāvānām dravya tva ādi sāmānyānām gavāt iva devān anvayena hetunā atatra iti tasya gavā ādi bhedasya anubhaya rūpa tvāt asāmānya viśeṣa rūpa tvāt eva iti yāvat tatas ca viśeṣaḥ eva codyate 
PVVṬ_338,1	 tat eva āha tam eva ityādi tam eva ca ananya sādhāraṇambhāvam artha kriyā arthī puruṣaḥ bheda abheda prakāraiḥ paryanuyuṅkte a nyā paḥ ha vā di na upi vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ dravya tva ādi abhedaḥ sva lakṣaṇānām iṣṭaḥ tatas atyanta bhedaḥ viśeṣāṇām viruddhaḥ iti atas āha tasya ityādi tasya artha kriyā kāriṇorthasya bhede prakṛtyā sthite sati vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇa udravya tva ādyabheda usya viśeṣasya ābādhakaḥ eva tasya kalpita tvāt tasmāt pāramārthikaḥ bhedaḥ sva lakṣaṇānām upakalpitam eka tvam anena ca prakāreṇa bheda abheda aviśiṣṭau= asmākam tat eva darśayan= āha sarvatra ityādi svabhāvena bhedaḥ sva jātīya vijātīyāt sāmānyasya ca vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇasya abhyupagamāt iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_338,2	 na vyāvṛtti rūpeṇa sāmānyena abhedaḥ kintu vastu bhūtena eva iti ced āha svabhāva bhūtasya ityādi vastu bhūtasya sāmānyasya abhedaḥ iti vyaktibhyaḥ nartha antara tve uktam iti sāmānyāt avyatirekāt bhedānām aikyam bheda vat eva vā sāmānyasya api aneka tvam iti uktam prāk na sāmānya dvāreṇa bhedānām aikyam iti ucyate kintu yosau viśeṣaḥ tena eva abhedaḥ iti āha sva ātmanā eva ityādi svena eva viśeṣa rūpeṇa gavāśu ādīnām abhedetat go dravyam nibandhanam yasyāḥ artha kriyāyāḥ vāha doha ādi lakṣaṇāyāḥ tayā arthī puruṣaḥ samam iti ubhaya trāpi avasita gava ādi bhāvaḥ dvayoḥ api iti gavi ca aśve ca eva yasmāt ekopi hi kāraṇa tvena abhimataḥ go padārthaḥ tām artha kriyām vāha doha ādi svabhāvām tad svabhāva tvāt tad artha kriyā karaṇa svabhāva tvāt eva karoti tad anyasya api tasmāt go dravyāt anyasya api aśvasya tad vāha doha ādi karaṇa svabhāva tvan tulyam iti sa upyaśvaḥ go sādhyām artha kriyām kin na karoti 
PVVṬ_339,1–339,3	 etena eva iti sarvasya arthasya bheda sādhanena ahrīkāḥ nagna tayā nirlajjāḥ kṣa paḥ ṇa kāḥ ayukta abhidhānasya kutsita tvāt kim api iti āha aślī laṅgrāmyam sarvaḥ sarva svabhāvaḥ na ca sarvaḥ sarva svabhāvaḥ iti yat pralapanti pratikṣiptantat api tasmāt ekānta sambhavāt ekasya eva antasya atyanta bheda prakārasya sambhavāt nanu di ga mva rā ṇām sarvam sarva ātmakam na sarvam sarva ātmakam iti na etat darśanan tat kim artham idamā cā rye ṇaḥ cyate sattyam yathā darśanantvam tyanta bheda abhedau ca syātāmi tyādinā pūrvam eva dūṣitam 
PVVṬ_339,4	 yat pura naretat uktam tat yathā kaṭakeyūra ādiṣu suvarṇṇa pratyayasya anuyāyina ḥ sadbhāvāssuvarṇṇa tva sāmānyam kalpyate tathā ghaṭa paṭa ādiṣu dravya tva ādi pratyayasya anvayinaḥ sadbhāvāt dravya tva sāmānyam ekam kinneṣyate na ca iṣyate abhinna pratyaya sadbhāvepi tathā kaṭaka keyūra ādiṣu sāmānya kalpanā mābhūt iti evamparam etat 
PVVṬ_339,5–340,1	 syāt uṣṭraḥ dadhi dravya ādi rūpa tayā eka tvāt syāt na dadhi uṣṭra avasthātaḥ dadhi avasthāyāḥ bhinna tvāt aślīlam iti asya vyākhyānam ayuktam iti tasya ayukta tvāt vidvat jana ayogya tayā grāmyam iti bhāvaḥ aślīlam iti asya grāmya paryāya tvāt aheya upādeyam iti atyājyam agrāhyañca kasmāt apariniṣṭhānāt yadi hi kiṃcid sukha sādhana tvena niścitam anyat ca duḥkha sādhana tvena tadā yathākramam heyam upādeyam vā syāt tat ca na asti yatas sarvasya sarva svabhāva tvam na ca sarvasya sarva svabhāva tvam atas eva ākulam ekasya api svabhāva bhedasya gṛhītum aśakyatvāt etat uktam bhavati yadā avasthā tadvatoḥ sarva ātmanā abhedaḥ vasthānāt tu parasparambhedaḥ tadāyan doṣaḥ tat āha tad anvaye vā iti tasya svabhāva bhedasya paraspara anvaye vā dadhi ādi svabhāvasya dravyasya uṣṭra ādiṣu tādātmyena anugamāt iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_340,2	 sarvasya ubhaya rūpa tvam ubhaya grahaṇam aneka tva upalakṣaṇa arthantasmin sati tad viśaṣasya uṣṭraḥ uṣṭraḥ eva na dadhi dadhi dadhyeva na uṣṭraḥ iti evam lakṣaṇasya nirākṛteḥ dadhi khāda iti evam coditaḥ puruṣaḥ kim uṣṭram khāditum na abhidhāvati uṣṭropi dadhi abhinnāt dravya tvāt avyatirekāt syāt dadhi na api saḥ eva iti uṣṭraḥ eva uṣṭraḥ iti ekānta vādaḥ yena anyopi dadhi ādikaḥ syāt uṣṭraḥ tathā dadhi api syāt uṣṭraḥ uṣṭra abhinnena dravya tvena dadhnaḥ tādātmyena abhisambandhāt na api tat eva iti dadhyeva dadhi yena anyat api uṣṭra ādikam syāt dadhi etena sarvasya ubhaya rūpa tvam vyākhyātam 
PVVṬ_340,3–340,4	 tad viśeṣa nirākṛteḥ iti etat anayoḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe ubhayathā api dadhi uṣṭra viśeṣaḥ syāt dadhi rūpa abhāvaḥ vā uṣṭre syāt uṣṭra rūpam vā dadhi asambhavi yadi uṣṭra svarūpaḥ eva niyatam bhavet evam dadhnopi vācyam ādyasya tāvat asambhavaḥ tat ityādinā kathyate tat evam anekayoḥ dadhi uṣṭrayoḥ na kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti sambandhaḥ ekasya api iti dadhnaḥ uṣṭrasya vā kasyacid tad rupābhāvasya iti uṣṭra rūpa abhāvasya dadhi rūpa abhāvasya ca abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_340,5–340,6	 dvitīyasya api prakāra abhāvam āha svarūpasya itya api atadbhāvinaḥ dadhi abhāvinaḥ uṣṭra svarūpasya uṣṭra abhāvinaḥ vā dadhi svarūpasya sva niyatasya uṣṭra svabhāva niyatasya dadhi svabhāva niyatasya ca abhāvāt atha asti dadhi uṣṭrayoḥ atiśayaḥ kaścid yena atiśayena dadhi khāda iti coditaḥ puruṣaḥ bhedena varttate uṣṭra parihāreṇa dadhni eva pravartatte 
PVVṬ_340,7	 etat uktam bhavati yathā dadhi uṣṭrayoḥ parasparam svarupambhinnantathā dravya paryāyayoḥ lakṣaṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ yadi iṣyate tadā saḥ eva svarūpa atiśayaḥ dadhi sa ca anyatra uṣṭre na asti na api dravya tvam dadhi ādivyatirikta pratibhāsate iti anena dvāreṇa anubhayam sāmānya viśeṣa rahitam sarvam vastu param kevalam ekatvantu kalpita anayoḥ iti dadhi uṣṭrayoḥ tathā coditaḥ iti dadhi khāda iti coditaḥ kṣīra vikāraḥ dadhi na anyatra iti uṣṭre saḥ eva atiśayaḥ dadhi kimbhūtaḥ artha kiyāḥ vipravṛtti viyayaḥ dadhi sādhya artha kriyā tayā yorthī puruṣaḥ tasya pravṛtti vipayaḥ kiṅkāraṇam tad phala ityādi dadhi sādhyam phalam tat eva viśivyatenyasmāt iti viśeṣaḥ tasya upādāna bhāvaḥ hetu bhāvaḥ tena lakṣitaḥ svabhāvaḥ yasya vastunaḥ tat eva dadhi iti kṛtvā sa ca tādṛśaḥ iti anantara uktaḥ dadhi svabhāvaḥ anyatra iti uṣṭre kasmāt dadhi arthinaḥ tatra uṣṭre pravṛtti abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_341,1–341,2	 sarva ātma tvaḥ iti eka rūpa tve sati iti arthaḥ bhinnaḥ niyata artham dhīṣvanī jñānam śabdaḥ ca tad abhāvāt bhinna vuddhi śabda abhāvāt bhedānām sahāra vādasya ekīkaraṇa vādasya asambhavaḥ bhedena gṛhītayoḥ śrutayoḥ vā eka tvena upasaṃhāraḥ nirdeśaḥ syāt uṣṭraḥ dadhi ityādi soyam ityādinā vyācaṣṭe kvacid api dadhni uṣṭre vā pratiniyatam ekam ākāram apṛśyan katham buddhyā adhi mucyeta arthān iti samvandhaḥ kimviśiṣṭayā buddhayā iti āha asaṃsṛṣṭa ityādi asaṃsṛṣṭa unyākāraḥ yasmin= arthe sa tathā uktaḥ sa yasyāḥ buddheḥ asti sā saṃsṛṣṭāni ākāravatī vibhakta artha grāhiṇī eva iti yāvat abhilapet vā kathaḥ pratyartha pratiniyata saṃketena dhvaninā iti ākūtam kasmāt na adhimucyeta iti āha vibhāga abhāvāt bhāvānām iti tad saṃhāra vādaḥ iti bheda saṃhāra vādaḥ na syāt syāt uṣṭraḥ syāt dadhīti ādikaḥ 
PVVṬ_342,1	 atha punar asaṃsṛṣṭau dadhi uṣṭrau pratipadya saṃharet syāt uṣṭraḥ syāt dadhi iti tadā api eka rūpa saṃsargiṇyā uṣṭra rūpeṇa eva dadhi rūpeṇa eva vā saṃsargiṇyā buddheḥ asaṃsṛṣṭa ākāra grāhiṇyā kvacid uṣṭre dadhani ca pratiniyamāt tad pratibhāsa bheda kṛtaḥ eva tayoḥ dadhi uṣṭrayoḥ svabhāva bheda upi ekāneka ityādi pratibhāsa bhedasya aneka vyavasthitiḥ viṣayaḥ eka vyavasthitiḥ pratibhāsa bhedasya iti yojyam bhinna pratibhāsa viṣayau ca dadhi uṣṭrau tathā ca sati na ekaḥ uṣṭraḥ dadhi vā tad ubhaya rūpaḥ tat ubhayanda dhi uṣṭra ātmakam rūpam yasya iti vigrahaḥ mithyāvādaḥ eva syāḥ dvā daḥ 
PVVṬ_342,2–342,3	 bheda lakṣaṇam iti vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam vijātīya vyāvṛttāni eva sva lakṣaṇāni sāmānyam iti ucyante prakṛtyā svabhāvena ādi śabdāt udaka ādi āharaṇa ādi eka phalāḥ bhavatu nāma ityādinā cā cā ryaḥ para abhiprāyam āśaṃkate bhāvānām vastūnām svabhāva bhedaḥ svabhāve na eva anyasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ tatra iti nirupākhyeṣu katham svabhāva bheda viṣayāḥ vyāvṛtti viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ 
PVVṬ_342,4	 nanu nirupākhyeṣu śabdānām pravṛttiḥ eva na asti tat kim artham idam āśaṃkitam iti kadācid paraḥ brūte tad nirākaraṇa artham ācāryaḥ prāha teṣu avaśyam śabda pravṛtyā bhāvyam ye tu na ca anya apoha vādinā śakyam vaktunna eva nirupākhyeṣu śabdānām pravṛttiḥ iti yatas teṣu avaśyam śabda pravṛttyā bhāvyam iti ca udakaḥ brūtaḥ iti vyācakṣate teṣām anena krameṇa deśa kāla niṣedhaḥ eva sarva bhāveṣu kriyate tathā sambandhasya sva rūpaṇa anabhidhānam uktam evam yat punar etat tad artha niṣedhe anarthaka śabda aprayogāt nirviṣayasya nañaḥ aprayogaḥ iti atra uttaram vakṣyate ityādi granthaḥ vakṣyamāṇaḥ ca udaka abhiprāyeṇa āvācakaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_343,1	 tasmādā cā ryaḥ eva nirupākhyeṣu śabda pravṛttim samarthayate teṣu avaśyam śabda pravṛttyā bhāvyamityā dināḥ granthena kasmāt kathaṃcid jñāna śabda viṣaya tvena avyavasthāpiteṣu nirupākhyeṣu sarvatra arthe vidhi pratiṣedhe vā yogāt yadi kvacid asataḥ ākārasya niṣedhe jñāna abhidhāne syātām tadā niṣiddha ākāra parihṛterthe vidhiḥ syāt tathā ca iti vidhi pratiṣedha abhāve anvaya vyatirekau vidhi pratiṣedhau āśrayaḥ yasya vyavahārasya sa tathā uktaḥ tam eva vyavahāra bhāvam uṣṇa ityādinā aha uṣṇa svabhāva ugniḥ iti anvaya āśrayaḥ vyavahāraḥ na anuṣṇaḥ iti vyatireka āśrayaḥ ayam api atiprasiddhaḥ loka vyavahāraḥ na syāt iti api śabdena āha uṣṇa vyavasthā hi anuṣṇa vyavacchedena 
PVVṬ_343,2–343,4	 tasya ca anuṣṇasya uṣṇābhāva lakṣaṇasya kathañcid vyavasthānāt kathantad vyavacchedena uṣṇam vyavasthāpyeta tat āha svabhāva antara ityādi uṣṇa abhāvaḥ eva uṣṇa svabhāvāt antaram vilakṣaṇantad viraha rūpeṇa iti svabhāva antaram uktam atas eva asataḥ iti etat ghaṭate nanu svabhāva viśeṣaḥ svabhāva antarantasya kathaṃcid api vikalpa buddheḥ śabdasya ca viṣaya tvena avyavasthāpanāt sarvathā anuṣṇasya apratipatteḥ aniścayāt tad vyavaccheda lakṣaṇasya agni svabhāvasya apratipattiḥ aniścayaḥ yathā agni svabhāvasya evam sarvasya padārthasya tatas vyāmūḍham aniścita rūpam jagat syāt syāt etat na tatra vahni ādau kasyacid asataḥ niṣedhaḥ yena abhāvepi avaśyam pravṛttyā bhāvyam iti codyate kintu anuṣṇam sparśa ākhyam sat eva vastu eva agneḥ ca artha antaram niṣidhyate iti 
PVVṬ_343,5	 katham iti ādyā cā ryaḥ sat eva iti vacanāt sattvam iṣṭam niṣidhyate iti vacanāt asattvam ekam ca katham sadasat nāma na ityādinā paraḥ pariharati tatra agnau= anuṣṇam na asti iti anena sarvatra anuṣṇam asat iti brūmaḥ evam hi ucyamāne sattvam pratijñāya punar sarvatra sattva niṣedha īsat asattvam ekatra pratijñātam bhavet kevalantatra tu agnau= anuṣṇat nā asti iti brūmaḥ tatas ca anyatra sa tonyatra asattvam aviruddham ayam eva ca deśa ha eti āha iha na asti iti deśasya niṣedhaḥ idānīt na asti iti kālasya anena prakāreṇa na asti iti dharmasya dharmiṇaḥ niṣedhaḥ kasmāt tad niṣedhe dharmiṇaḥ niṣedhe tad viṣayasya dharmi viṣayasya śabdasya nirviṣaya tayā pravṛtti abhāvāt tatas ca dharmi śabda apravṛtteḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ viṣayaḥ yasya nañaḥ tasya aprayogāt idam iha na asti iti avaśyam idam ādi padaiḥ viṣayaḥ pratiṣedhasya upasthāpya unyathā kimviṣa yoyam pratiṣedhaḥ iti evam sa na jñāyate etat ca sarva mu dyaḥ te kaḥ rā ādīnām matam upanyastam 
PVVṬ_344,1–344,2	 sa upītyā cā ryaḥ tatra ātatra api ityādi deśa kāla dharma niṣedhena deśa ādīnām niṣedhaḥ sattvāt ādi śabdāt kālasya parigrahaḥ vyakti bhedāt bahuvacanam na arthasya iti dharmasya kvacid sattvāt eva na tu artha śabdena dharmiṇaḥ nirdeśaḥ pareṇa api dharmi niṣedhasya aniṣṭa tvāt syāt etat na deśa ādi niṣedhaḥ kriyate na api uṣṇasya niṣedhaḥ kintu anuṣṇena saha agneḥ yaḥ sambandhaḥ sa niṣidhyate 
PVVṬ_344,3	 natu iti ādyā cā ryaḥ tat niṣedha ipi iti sambandha niṣedha ipi tulyaḥ doṣaḥ dharmmi vat sambandhasya api aniṣedhāt tat eva āsa satī ityādinā sādhayati asati sambandhe śabda apravṛttiḥ ādi śabdāt anirdiṣṭa viṣayasya nañaḥ aprayogāt athavā tulyaḥ doṣaḥ katham niṣedhāt asati yaḥ niṣedhaḥ tasya tvayā eva niṣedhāt iti vyākhyeyam katham niṣedhaḥ iti āha asatī ityādi asataḥ vā asya iti sambandhasya niṣedhe tadvat sambandha vat dharmiṇopi niṣedhaḥ 
PVVṬ_344,4–344,6	 na ityādi paraḥ sambandhaḥ na asti iti eva sva śabdena na vai sambandhasya niṣedhaḥ etat uktam bhavati yathā sambandhasya sva śabdena sva rūpeṇa abhidhānan na asti tathā niṣedha ipi tat eva āha kintarhi na iha pradeśe ghaṭaḥ na idānīm kālaḥ iti evam pratiṣedha uktau satyām na anena deśena kālena vā asya ghaṭasya sambandha usti iti pratītiḥ tathā naivannā anena prakāreṇa ghaṭosti iti uktau na etat dharmā ghaṭaḥ iti pratītiḥ tathā iti evam pratītau satyām tathā apītyā ca āryaḥ na idānīm ityādinā api katham sambandhaḥ niṣiddhaḥ yāvat asya puṃsaḥ sambandhaḥ dharmaḥ vā na asti iti matiḥ bhavati na iha na idānīm iti pratiṣedhe sambandhaḥ na asti iti matiḥ na evam iti pratiṣedhe dharmaḥ na asti iti matiḥ 
PVVṬ_344,7^1	 nanu dharma niṣedhaḥ api sambandha niṣedhaḥ eva dharma dharmiṇoḥ sambandha niṣedhāt sattyam saṃyoga samavāya lakṣaṇa sambandha bhedāt tu sambandhaḥ dharmaḥ vā iti bhedena uktam na ca asya āssambandhaḥ na asti iti mateḥ kathaṃcid bhāve sambandha ādi sattāyām sambhavaḥ kasmāt abhāveṣu ityādi tathā śabdaḥ yathāśabda artham ākṣipati yat tadoḥ nitya abhisambandhāt satsu deśa ādiṣu yathā na asti iti buddheḥ abhāvaḥ sat svabhāva buddheḥ virodhāt tadvat abhāveṣu asati buddhi pravṛtteḥ anabhyupagamāt tasmāt sambandha abhāva pratīteḥ sakāśāt na ayam iha ityādyā pratītiḥ 
PVVṬ_344,7^2	 sā tad abhāve sambandha abhāva pratīti abhāve na syāti advā sā iti sambandha abhāva pratītiḥ tad abhāvaḥ iti sambandha abhāve pratītau vāta da bhāvasya sambandha abhāvasya tādṛśī sambandha abhāva pratītissā vidyate yasya puṃsaḥ tasya yathāpratītimataḥ tad prabhava āssambandha abhāva pratīti janmānassambandha abhāva viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ kena vāryante vikalpānām viṣayaḥ sambandha abhāvaḥ na śabdānām iti ced āha saḥ eva hi ityādi yaḥ na vitarkāṇām viṣayaḥ saḥ eva na śabdānām viṣayaḥ vikalpa viṣayaḥ tu avaśyam śabda viṣayaḥ iti arthaḥ te ced pravṛttāḥ iti vitarkāḥ 
PVVṬ_345,1	 nanu purovasthite nīla ādau nīlam ityādi vikalpaḥ sva lakṣaṇa viṣayaḥ na ca sva lakṣaṇam śabda vācyam iti āha na hi ityādi avācyam artham iti sva lakṣaṇam vikalpa adhikārāt vikalpa buddhayaḥ gṛhyante samīhante iti ālambante sāmānya ākāra eva sadā vikalpa buddhiḥ yā api sannihite sva lakṣaṇe sa vikalpa nirvikalpayoḥ tu yaugapadyāt abhimānaḥ eṣa manda matīnām vikalpaḥ sva lakṣaṇa ākāraḥ iti vicāritam ca etad pramāṇa viniścaye śāstra kāreṇa iti na iha pratanyate 
PVVṬ_345,2^1	 nanu yadi vikalpa buddhyā viṣayīkṛta tvāt sambandha abhāvaḥ vācyaḥ evantarhi sambandha upi vācyaḥ syāt vikalpa buddhyā viṣayīkṛta tvāt atha iṣyate eva kathantarhi ācārya di ṅ nā ge na tasya avācya tvam uktam iti āha sambandhasya ityādi svena rūpeṇa iti sambandha rūpeṇa sambandhinam sambandhaḥ iti paraspara apekṣā lakṣaṇambhāva mātram adravya bhūtaḥ sambandhasya svabhāvaḥ tena ca rūpeṇa tasya abhidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ na asti sambandha śabdaḥ hi tasya abhidhāyakaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ sa ca prayuktaḥ kayoḥ iti ākṣipati tatra rāja puruṣayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti ucyamāne rāja puruṣayoḥ iti asya vyatirekasya hetuḥ sambandhaḥ tadā sa sambandhaḥ sambandhi rūpeṇa pratīyate tat āha abhidhānena sambandhi tvena ityādi 
PVVṬ_345,2^2	 rāja puruṣayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti abhidhāne rāja puruṣābhyām paraspara sa apekṣābhyām niṣkṛṣṭa rūpasya eva sambandhasya sambandhi tvena buddhau= upasthānāt yathā abhiprāyam apratītaḥ rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti paraspara apekṣā lakṣaṇa ssambandhaḥ yathā jñātum iṣṭaḥ tena rūpeṇa apratītiḥ tat iti tasmāt ayam sambandhaḥ pratīyamānopi sambandha śabdāt yathā ukta vidhinā sambandhi rūpaḥ eva iti na sambandhena abhidhīyate tasmāt na abhāva vat sambandha ipi prasaṃgaḥ iti sambandha abhāvaḥ yathā buddhyā viṣayīkriyate iti vācyaḥ prasaktaḥ na evam sambandha ipi vācya tvam iti arthaḥ sambandha abhāvaḥ hi svena rūpeṇa buddhyā viṣayīkriyate śabdena api tathā eva abhidhīyate sambandhaḥ tu svarūpeṇa gṛhyate na api abhidhīyate sambandhi rūpa āpannasya eva viṣayīkaraṇāt abhidhānāt ca tathā ca āha 
PVVṬ_345,3–346,3	 asattva bhūta ssambandhaḥ rūpantasya na gṛhyate na abhidhānam svarūpeṇa sambandhasya kathañcanā iti tasmāt sthitam etat vikalpa viṣayaḥ vaśyam vācyaḥ iti tatas ca yadi na asti sambandhaḥ iti matiḥ tadā tad prabhavopi śabdaḥ pravarttate eva tathā ca abhāva viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ āpatitaḥ eva atha mābhūt ayan doṣaḥ iti sambandhasya na asti iti buddhyā viṣayīkaraṇam na iṣyate na iha ghaṭaḥ iti atra kasya niṣedhaḥ na tāvat deśa ādeḥ tasya sattvāt na sambandhasya tad bhāvasya agrahaṇāt iti yat kiñcid etat 
PVVṬ_346,4–346,5	 api ca abhāvam abhidheyam yaḥ brūte tam bruvāṇam prati ayam abhāvānabhidhāna vādī abhāvaḥ na vācyaḥ iti pratividadhan pratikṣipan= abruvāṇaḥ katham pratividadhyāt na hi abhāva śabdam uccārayatā abhāvasya vācya tvam śakyam pratipādayitum atha icchati abhāvasya vacanantadāḥ vacane vā asya abhāvasya abhyupagamyamāne katham abhāva unuktaḥ uktaḥ eva abhāvaḥ na vācyaḥ iti anena eva abhāva śabdena tasya ukteḥ atha pareṇa abhāvasya vācya tvam yat ucyate tad anuvādena niṣedhaḥ kriyate na abhāvaḥ vācyaḥ tena adoṣaḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_346,6	 nanu anuvāda īpi kim abhāvasya vācya tā na bhavati yena evam ucyate tasmāt iṣṭasya eva abhāvasya vācya tā svabhāvaḥ na eva asti tena asat tvāt avacanam abhāvasya iti ced āha atha abhāvam eva ityādi tena iti abhāvasya asattvena idānīm iti abhāvasya asattve tat eva abhāvaḥ na asti iti vacanam katham abhāvaḥ na asti iti asya eva abhāva śabdasya prayogaḥ na syāt kathañca na syāt abhāvasya eva anabhyupagamāt abhāvaḥ hi asya vācyaḥ sa ca na abhyupagamyate para parikalpitasya abhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti ced iṣṭaḥ tāvat abhāva viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ tasmāt kathaṃcid abhāva vyavahāram pravarttayatā avaśyam abhāva viṣayāḥ jñāna śabdāḥ eṣṭavyāḥ 
PVVṬ_346,7–346,10	 yat punar etat uktam artha niṣedhe sati anarthaka śabda aprayogāt kāraṇāt nirviṣayasya naña uprayogaḥ iti atra uttaram vakṣyatem anādi vāsanā udbhūta vikalpa pariniṣṭhata ityādinā tasmāt iti upasaṃhāraḥ iyatā ca granthena yat uktanteṣu avaśyam śabda pravṛttyā bhāvyam iti tat eva ācā rye ṇa samarthitam atra paraḥ prāha yadi abhāveṣu api śabdāḥ santi teṣu abhāveṣu katham svabhāva bhedaḥ śabda pravatti hetuḥ yena apoha viṣaya tvam abhāva pratipādakānām syāt atra uttara māhā cā ryaḥ tatra api ityādi rūpa abhāvāt iti sva rūpa abhāvāt abhāvasya rūpa abhidhāyinaḥ svabhāva grāhakāḥ śabdāḥ na aśaṃkyāḥ eva yatas te śabdāḥ abhāva viṣaya avyavacchedasya anya apohasya vācakāḥ siddhāḥ eva 
PVVṬ_347,1^1	 etat uktam bhavati abhāva viṣayāṇām śabdānām bhāva svarūpa āgrāhaka tvāt apoha viṣaya tvan tathā bhāva viṣayāṇām api śabdānāmbhāva svarūpa āgrāhaka tvāt apoha viṣaya tvam eva kevalam kecid śabdāḥ bhāva adhyavasāyāt bhāva viṣayāḥ kecid abhāva adhyavasāyāt abhāva viṣayāḥ ucyante vastuni vṛttiḥ vyāpāraḥ yeṣām śabdānānteṣām kim rūpam abhidheyam vidhi rūpeṇa vastu grāhyam āhosvit bhedaḥ anya vyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvodhyavasīyate iti śaṅkā syāt abhāvaḥ tu viveka lakṣaṇaḥ iti svabhāva viraha lakṣaṇaḥ kasmāt nimittīkarttavyasya rūpasya vastu svabhāvasya tad bhāve tasya rūpasya sat tayā hi abhāva ayogāt tasya rūpasya bhāvaḥ tad bhāvaḥ saḥ eva lakṣaṇam yasya bhāvasya sa tathā uktaḥ ayam eva sa mukhyaḥ viveka unya apohaḥ anyaḥ tu gavā ādi śabda viṣaya upoha nimitta tvāt apohaḥ iti upacaritaḥ sarva bhāva viraha lakṣaṇaḥ tasya vivekasya tathā abhāva khyāpinaḥ iti viveka rūpa abhidhāyinaḥ 
PVVṬ_347,1^2	 viveka viṣayāḥ iti anya apoha viṣayā vikalpāḥ ca viveka viṣayāḥ iti sambandhaḥ te śabdāḥ vikalpāḥ ca ekam vyāvṛtti samāśraya bhūtam vastu pratiśaraṇam adhiṣṭhānam yeṣām śabdānām vikalpa anāñca te tathā uktāḥ tathā hi akṛtakavya vacchedena yat eva vastu kṛtaka śabdasya vikalpasya vā adhiṣṭhā ananta deva anitya an ātma ādi śabdānām vikalpānām ca te tathābhūtāḥ api bhinna viṣayāḥ eva iti sambandhaḥ kasmāt yathāsvam ityādi yā vyāvṛttiḥ yatas vyavasthāpyate sā tasyāḥ avadhiḥ yathā kṛtaka ākhyasya vyavacchedasya akṛtakaḥ evam anitya tva lakṣaṇasya vyavacchedasya nityaḥ ityādi teṣāṃyathā svam avadhīnām bhedāḥ taiḥ bhedaiḥ upakalpitāḥ racitāḥ anitya tva ādīnām vivekinām bhedāḥ parasparam viśeṣāḥ taiḥ bhedaiḥ bhinneṣu iva vikalpa buddhau pratibhātsu pratibhāsamāneṣu dharmiṣu teṣām śabdānām vivekeṣu bhedeṣu vikalpānām ca upasthāpanāt yathākramam vācaka tvena grāhaka tvena ca upaśleṣāt 
PVVṬ_348,1–348,2	 nanu ca kṛtaka anitya tvayoḥ na eva avadhi bheda ustya kṛtakasya iva nitya rūpa tvāt tatas ca pratijñā artha eka deśaḥ eva hetuḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ yasmāt akṛtakasya api prāgbhāvasya anitya tvāt kṛtakasya api pradhvaṃsa abhāvasya nitya tvāt asti eva avadhi bhedaḥ yat vā kāraṇena kṛtaḥ śabdaḥ na bhavati iti asya samāropasya vyavacchedena kṛtakaḥ dvitīya ādi kṣaṇe sthāyi tva samāra upa vyavacchedena anityaḥ iti ucyate iti asti eva avadhi bhedaḥ tena iti yathā uktena vyāvṛtti bhedena svabhāva hetausvabhāvasya eva sādhya sādhana bhāvepi na sādhya asādhanayoḥ saṃsargaḥ ekatvam tatas ca yat uktam svabhāve sādhye pratijñā artha eka deśaḥ hetuḥ syāt iti sa doṣaḥ na asti iti āha 
PVVṬ_348,3	 tat na iti tat iti tasmāt sa ca ayam svabhāvaḥ iti sambandhaḥ svabhāvaḥ iti avyatiriktaḥ dharmaḥ sa kadācid sattvam anyaḥ vā yadi api kṛtake sattvam asti satsu ca kṛtaka tvantathā api hetu kṛtoyam svabhāvaḥ iti etāvat mātra viva akṣāyām kṛtakaḥ hetuḥ ucyate na tu sāmarthya vivakṣāyām prameya tva ādi vat sāmarthyam asti etāvat mātra vivakṣā yāñca sattvam hetuḥ ucyate tena tu hetu kṛta tva vivakṣāyām 
PVVṬ_348,4	 tena yat ucyate kṛtake sattvam vidyate na ca tasya anitya tve vyabhicāra usti tat kim iti upādhi bhedena viśeṣyate iti tad apāstam kṛtaka tva ādau sāmarthyasya avivakṣita tvāt iti hetu tvena apadiśyamānaḥ ucyamānaḥ upādhi bheda apekṣaḥ viśeṣaṇa bheda apekṣaḥ kevalaḥ vā iti upādhi anapekṣaḥ sādhya siddhi artham ucyate anitya tve sādhye kṛtaka tvam upādhi bheda apekṣantat ana pekṣantu sattvam apekṣita ityādinā upādhi bheda apekṣa tvam kṛta katvasi a āha parasya ahetu abhimatasya janana śaktiḥ eva vyāpāraḥ anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam eva ca apekṣā svabhāva niṣpattau svabhāva niṣpatti nimittam apekṣitaḥ para vyāpāroyena bhāvena sa kṛtakaḥ saṃjñāyām kanaḥ vidhānāt saṃjñā śabdoyam kṛtakaḥ iti yataevantena iyam kṛtaka śrutiḥ svabhāva abhidhāyinī api satī para upādhim atyanta viśeṣaṇam enam svabhāvam ākṣipati etena iti kṛtaka tvasya upādhi bheda apekṣa tva pratipādanena pratyayānāṃkāraṇa na ambhedaḥ tena bhettum śīlam yasya sa tathā uktaḥ tad bhāvaḥ tattvam sthāna karaṇa ādi bhedāt bhidyate śabdaḥ ādi śabdāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tva ādayaḥ vyākhyātāḥ 
PVVṬ_349,1	 evam ityādinā upasaṃhāraḥ kvacid prayoge upādhi bhedaṃpratyanapekṣaḥ ataeva āha sāmānyena anityaḥ eva sādhye yathā sattvam svabhāva bhūtaḥ ca asau dharmaḥ ca tasya parigraheṇa kvacid svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ ucyate iti prakṛtam yathā tatra eva iti anitya tve sādhyaḥ utpattiḥ na ca utpattiḥ utpattimatonya abhāvasya ajanya tvena utpatti abhāva prasaṅgāt kevalam artha antara bhūtā iva kalpita aviśeṣaṇa tvena tena utpatteḥ iti utpattimatvāt iti arthaḥ ayam upādhi apekṣaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ kṛtaka tva ādau para bhūtaḥ upādhi rahita tva ātma bhūtaḥ eva dharma viśeṣaḥ iti etāvān viśeṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_349,2–349,3	 anayā diśā iti upādhi apekṣā anapekṣa hetu pravibhāga diśā yadi satta ākhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ sattvam iti yāvat pradhāna ādi sattā katham na sādhyate atha sattā sāmānye sādhye siddha sādhyatā syāt atas sattā viśeṣa ssādhyaḥ tasmin= ca sādhye viśeṣasya ananvayāt sādhya śūnyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt atas na sattā sādhyate tadā hetau= api sattve viśeṣasya ananvayāt sādhana śūnyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt tat āha ananvayaḥ hi ityādi bhedānām viśeṣāṇām vyāhataḥ duṣṭaḥ hetu sādhyayoḥ hetau sādhye ca iti arthaḥ anyatra ca iti anātma ādau tat iti sattvam kila śabdaḥ nabhimata arthe eva prasādhyamānam iti 
PVVṬ_349,4	 asti pradhānam ityādinā pradhāna lakṣaṇa yogena viśeṣībhavati na ca viśeṣaḥti ācārya di gnāḥ gaḥ asti pradhānam iti anena pradhāna sva lakṣaṇam eva sādhyate iti yat sām khye na uktam tad pramāṇasya anumānasya viṣaya ajñānāt sāmānya viṣayam hi anumānam sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam vyāhanyate duṣyati kintarhi hetau= api tulya doṣa tvāt tat eva āha na hi hetuḥ ityādi na vidyate anvayosya iti ananvayaḥ siddheḥ sādhya sādhanasya na aṅgam kutas iti asādhāraṇāt hetoḥ bhāvaḥ sattā sāupādānam viśeṣaṇam yasya dharmiṇaḥ tanmātre tanmātra tvāt eva sāmānya rūpe dharmiṇi sādhye sām khya sya na kaścid arthaḥ siddhaḥ syāt traiguṇya ādi lakṣaṇasya asiddheḥ aniṣiddhañca tādṛśam tādṛśam iti sāmānya mātram anena siddhasā dhyatām āha 
PVVṬ_350,1	 na sarvathā iti ādinā vyācaṣṭe sattā sādhanaḥ iti sattā siddhau bhāva mātra viśeṣaṇaḥ iti sattā mātra viśeṣaṇaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ svabhāva viśeṣaḥ yasya iti vigrahaḥ na īha iti vastu mātra sādhane sattā sādhana pratiṣedhaḥ kintu sa vādī tathā sāmānye na asti kaścid iti kañcana asya dharmiṇaḥ bhedam viśeṣam nitya tva ādikam aparāmṛśan= a saṃspṛśan anena iti vādinā upātta bhedaḥ iti upātta viśeṣaḥ triguṇa ātmakaḥ nityaḥ ityādi na upātta bhede sādhyesmin pradhāna ādike dharmiṇi bhavet hetuḥ ananvayaḥ na asya sādhya dharma viśeṣaṇa dṛṣṭāntenvayoḥ ti iti ananvayaḥ yatas evam 
PVVṬ_350,2–351,1	 sattāya antena sādhyāyām viśeṣaḥ sādhitaḥ bhavet anye tu sattāyām ityādi paścāt dharma ādau vyākhyāya pūrva arddham upātta bhedam ityādi paścāt vyācakṣate sa hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe ekaḥ mūlaprakṛteḥ bheda abhāvāt nityaḥ niranvaya vināśa abhāvāt triguṇa tva ātmaka tvāt sukha duḥkha moha ātmakaḥ anyaḥ vā iti karttṛ tva ādi yuktaḥ yathākathaṃcid api iti yathā uktaiḥ ddharmaiḥ samastaiḥ vyastaiḥ vā viśeṣitaḥ tad svabhāvaḥ iti yathā ukta viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmī tathā iti viśiṣṭena svabhāvena na anveti sa pakṣe tathā bhūtasya dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇā usiddheḥ na tena siddhena iti sattā mātreṇa sattā mātre vivāda abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_351,2–351,4	 nanu ityādi paraḥ evam prasaṅgaḥ iti yaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa vikalpena sattāya amuktaḥ tat uktam viśeṣa anugama abhāvaḥ sāmānye siddha sādhyatā iti yasmāt tatra api agni ādiṣu sādhyeṣu na agni sāttāyām kaścid vivāda usti agni mātrasya siddha tvāt na ca tena siddhena kiñcid tasya apravṛtti aṅga tvāt deśa ādi viśiṣṭaḥ hi agniḥ pravṛtti aṅgam na agni mātram saḥ eva tarhi sādhyaḥ iti āha viśiṣṭaḥ ādhāraḥ yatra agni ādikam sādhyate sa viśeṣaṇam yasya agni ādikasya sa viśiṣṭa ādhāra viśeṣaṇam tasya sādhya tvena abhimatasya sa pakṣe ananvayāt asiddhiḥ 
PVVṬ_351,5–351,6	 na ityā cā ryaḥ na vai saḥ ādhāraḥ viśeṣaṇa bhāvena gṛhītā upi tam agnim viśeṣīkaroti yena anvayaḥ syāt kim kāraṇam tad ayogaḥ ityādi tasya dharmasya tasmin dharmiṇyayogaḥ yaḥ āśaṃkitaḥ tasya vyavacchadena viśeṣaṇāt etat ca pakṣa dharmaḥ iti atra uktam vakṣyate ca caturthe paricchede nanu ca vyāpti grahaṇa kāle pradeśa ayoga vyavacchinnaḥ vahniḥ asiddhaḥ tad siddhau vā kim arthaḥ nvaya anugamaḥ katham asiddhaḥ yasmāt yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra agniḥ iti vyāptim pratiyatā sāmānyena abhimata deśa ayoga vyavacchinna upi bahniḥ ākṣiptaḥ eva kevalam idānīm asmin deśe vahniḥ iti evam viśeṣa pratīti artham anvaya anugamanam iṣyate 
PVVṬ_352,1	 tasmāt iti upasaṃhāraḥ tatra iti pradeśa ādau tad ayoga vyavacchedena iti tasmin pradeśa ādau dharmiṇi sādhya dharmasya ayoga vyavacchedena sāmānyasya agni mātrasya sādhanāt na asti anvaya doṣaḥ na api siddha sādhya tā pradeśa ayoga vyavacchedasya asiddha tvāt pradhāna ādike dharmiṇyayoga vyavacchedena sattā mātram sādhyam iti ced āha na tathā ityādi kvacid iti pradhāna ādike dharmiṇi kasmāt pradhāna ādi śabda vācyasya eva arthasya traiguṇya ādi lakṣaṇasya eva abhāvāt nirviśeṣeṇa eva sā sattā viśeṣaṇa bhūtasya ādhārasya abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_352,2–352,3	 katham ityādi paraḥ sā upi dharmī katham vijñātavyaḥ jñātvā ca śabdena abhidhātavyaḥ abhihitaḥ pramāṇena niścetavyaḥ tasmāt jñeya tva ādibhiḥ sa upi siddhaā iva tasmin sattā sāmānyam sādhyate tat kim idānīm jñeyat nirviśeṣaṇam asti iti etāvatā pra dhā na sya siddhiḥ astu jñeya ādi arthaḥ hi pradhāna arthaḥ śabda artha rūpaḥ syāt na nitya ādi guṇa upetaḥ pradhānantāvat siddham bhavati anye ca dharmāḥ anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ setsyaṃte iti ced āha tathā api jñeya tva ādinā kim siddham syāt na eva abhimatasya pradhānasya sva lakṣaṇasya siddhiḥ syāt asya śabda artha rūpa tvāt agni anumānepi tarhi agni mātram siddham iti asādhyam syāt iti āha anyatra tu tat eva agni sāmānya niyata ādhāram asiddhantatra deśe na siddham iti sādhyate nanu tatra api tad ayoga virahiṇa iti tena pradeśena ayogaḥ tad ayogaḥ tena virahaḥ pradeśena yogaḥ iti arthaḥ sosti yasya sāmānyasya tat tathā uktam tena anvayaḥ na siddhaḥ 
PVVṬ_352,4	 na ityādinā pariharati na vai kaścid nyāya jñaḥ tathābhūtena pradeśa sambandhinā agni sāmānyena vyāptim karoti tasmāt param prativādinam pratipādayatā dhūma ugninā antarīya kogni avinābhāvī darśanīyaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti evam sa dhūmaḥ tathā iti sarva upasaṃhāra vyāpti pradarśanena agni mātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddhaḥ yatra eva pradeśa īdharmiṇi svayam svena rūpeṇa dṛśyate tatra eva agni buddhin janayati tatra etasyām sāmarthyāt anumeya pratītau sādhya nirdeśena na kiñcid prayojanantena vinā api sādhya siddheḥ etat eva āha tatra ityādi tatra sādhya dharmiṇi liṅgasya darśanāt sambandha ākhyāna mātrāt ceṣṭasya sādhyasya siddheḥ yatas ca na sādhyasya dharma dharmi samudāyasya nirdeśaḥ tadā atad anirdeśe ca kathantad viśiṣṭe sādhya dharmeṇa anvayaḥ na eva yatonanvaya doṣaḥ syāt tat iti tasmāt ayandhūma ugnya vinābhāvitayā siddhaḥ sāmarthyāt eva tena pradeśena ayogam vyavacchinatti tasmāt samudāyaḥ sādhyaḥ ucyate 
PVVṬ_353,1	 yadi hi tatra na agniḥ syāt na eva dhūmaḥ bhavet iti sāmarthyam anvayaḥ tu kevalena eva sādhya dharmeṇa darśanīyaḥ na sādhya dharma dharmi samudāyena tasya dṛṣṭānte asiddha tvāt samudāyena ca vyāpti pradarśane prayojana abhāvāt atas eva āha na punar asyāḥ tathā iti pradeśa viśiṣṭasya upanyāsa pūrva konvayaḥ kim kāraṇam sādhya ukte riha anvaya pradarśana kāle anaṅga tvāt sādhya nirdeśa pūrva kāle vā anvayasyeṣyamāṇe na eva sādhana vākyāt kaścid pratijñā vākyam apanayet 
PVVṬ_353,2–353,3	 tasmāt sthitam etat pakṣam anupradarśya eva sādhya dharmeṇa liṅgasya vyāptiḥ kathanīyā iti tathā ca āha ācārya di gnāḥ gaḥ liṃgasya dhūma ādeḥ sādhyena avyabhicāra uni atra sāmānye na dharmi mātre darśayitavyaḥ niścita avyabhicāram ca liṅgantatra iti sādhya dharmiṇi prasiddham sat tena vyāpaka dharmeṇa yuktam sādhya dharmiṇam gamayiṣyati tasmāt ityādinā upasaṃhāraḥ yathā agni sādhanam viśeṣa parigrahāt anavadyam na eva sattā sādhanam anavadyam viśeṣa asiddhaiḥ tat evam siddha sādhya tā prasaṃgāt ananvayāt ca na pra dhā nā deḥ sattā sādhyāḥ 
PVVṬ_354,1–354,2	 sādhanam punar sarvam atram anuddiṣṭam iti pratipādayitum āha aparāmṛṣṭā ityādi aparāmṛṣṭa unupāttaḥ tad bhedaḥ yasmin vastu mātre sattā mātre tasmin sādhanekriyamāṇenvayaḥ na vihanyate kasya tanmātra vyāpinaḥ sattā mātra vyāpina ssādhyasya tat eva vivṛṇvan= āha vastu mātra vyāpini sādhya dharme svabhāva viśeṣa aparigraheṇa punar sattve kriyamāṇe na anvaya vyāghātaḥ na sādhya śūnyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti arthaḥ na hi tatra iti sattve sādhane kasmāt sat mātra āśrayepi sattva mātrasya hetu tvena āśrayaṇepi iti arthaḥ na punar sādhya tve sattāyāḥ viśeṣān āśrayaḥ kasmāt vaiphalyāt 
PVVṬ_354,3	 sattāyām sādhyāyām punar doṣa antarandātum āha api ca iti asiddhe pradhāna ādau dharmiṇi na bhāva dharma uḥ tītyasiddhaḥ hetuḥ yaḥ tu bhāva abhāva ubhayāśrayaḥ dharmaḥ sa sattve sādhye vyabhicāryanaikānti kaḥ yopya bhāvasya dharmaḥ sa sattve sādhye viruddhaḥ sattvasya eva sādhanāt yasyām pradhāna ādi sattāyām sādhyāyām hetuḥ yaḥ kaścid upādīyate sa sarvaḥ doṣatrayam na ativarttate sā sattā sādhyate katham iha ca hetoḥ siddha tvam abhyupagamya viruddha anaikānti ka antika tve ukte hetu asiddhau= anayoḥ asambhavāt 
PVVṬ_354,4–354,5	 nanu sarvajña ādi sattāyām api sādhyāyām hetoḥ asiddha tā ādi doṣasya tulya tvāt kathantad sattā siddhiḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ yat yat upadiśyate tat jñāna pūrvakam eva yathā anyat kiñcid upadiśyate ca catur ārya satyam tasmāt tat api jñāna pūrvakam eva yasya tat jñānam sosmābhiḥ sarva jñobhyupagamyate iti na kācid kṣatiḥ tad hetuḥ iti sattā hetuḥ trayīm iti tri avayavān doṣa jātindoṣa prakārāt na abhivarttate tām āha asiddham ityādi virodham iti viruddha tām tatra bhāva dharmaḥ hetuḥ asiddha sattāke katham sidhyet 
PVVṬ_355,1	 syāt etat bhāva dharmaḥ pra dhā nā dessiddhaḥ na tu bhāvaḥ iti āha yaḥ hi ityādi yaḥ hi pradhāna ādi bhāva dharmma hetuntatra pradhāna ādau= icchati sa katham vādī pradhāna ādi kambhāvam siddham na icchet tasmāt bhāvaḥ eva dharmaḥ kathantarhi bhāvasya ayam dharmaḥ iti kathyate iti ced āha kadācid apekṣayā iti bheda antara pratikṣepa lakṣaṇayā vyatirekī iva bhinna rūpaḥ iva dharmiṇaḥ sakāśāt dharmaḥ nirdiśyate yathā kṛtaka tvam asya iti akṛta ka vyāvṛttaḥ eva bhāvaḥ ucyate na tu anyaḥ eva dharmaḥ dharma śabdena ucyate anyaḥ ca dharmī dharmi śabdena iti āha na hi ityādi yasmāt anya vyāvṛtti nirapekṣaḥ pumān yadā śabdasya akṛtakāt eva ekasmāt vyāvṛttim jijñāsate tadā kṛtaka tvam asya iti ucyate yadā anya vyāvṛtti sāka aṃkṣaḥ akṛtaka tvāt eva ekasmāt vyāvṛttim jijñāsate tadā kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti ucyate iti etat ca prāk eva uktam bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepa ityādinā 
PVVṬ_355,2	 atha punar ubhayoḥ bhāva abhāvayorddharmam hetumbūyāt katham punar ekaḥ dharmaḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ bhavati dharmaḥ hi svabhāvaḥ yaḥ ca bhāvasya svabhāvaḥ katham abhāvasya syāt iti āha anāśritā ityādi anāśritam vastu yasmin vyatireka mātre tasya vyatireka mātrasya pratiṣedha mātrasya dharma tvena kalpitasya abhāvepya virodhāt vyatireka mātram eva kathambhavati iti āha aparyudāsena prasajya pratiṣedhena prasajya upasarjanaḥ vidhiḥ paryudāsaḥ sa ca iha na āśritaḥ yathā na bhavati mūrttaḥ iti amūrtta tvam mūrtta tva nivṛtti mātram bhāvepi vijñāne nirūpa ākhyepya bhāvepi syāt 
PVVṬ_355,3^1	 paraḥ pratibaddhum āha nirupākhya abhāvāt na pratiṣedha viṣaya tvam yad adhikaraṇa ādi śakti yuktantatkasyacit viṣayaḥ syāt nirupākhyam ca sarva śakti rahi tantat katham viṣayaḥ syāt saṃprati pratiṣedha viṣaya tve pratiṣiddhe kim vidhi viṣaya usti nirupākhyam tad api vidhi viṣaya tvat nirupākhyasya na iti ced katham idānīm abhāvaḥ na pratiṣedha viṣayaḥ vidhi viṣaya tva niṣedhāt eva hi pratiṣedha viṣaya tvam kim kāraṇam vidhi ni vṛtti rūpa tvāt pratiṣedhasya tat iti tasmāt etat anantara uktam avyavaccheda mātram dvayoḥ api bhāva abhāvayoḥ sambhavat sattve sādhye gamaka tvam katham ātmasāt kuryāt 
PVVṬ_355,3^2	 kimbi śiṣṭam gamaka tvam vipakṣa ityādi vipakṣe prayoge vṛttiḥ hetoḥ tasya śaṅkā tasyāḥ api vyavacchedena na labhyat naca ubhaya dharmasya vyavaccheda mātrasya vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ asti iti kathantat gamaka tvam ātmasāt kuryāt sa ca vādī sva vācā anya vacanena sattā sādhanasya hetoḥ ubhaya dharma tām bruvāṇassataḥ sādhyāt anyatra api asati asya ubhaya dharmasya hetoḥ vṛttimbhāṣate saḥ eva ca sattāyām sādhyāyāma vyabhicāra nibandhana tvāt gamaka tvasya iti avyabhicārambhāeta iti hetoḥ katham na unmattaḥ 
PVVṬ_356,1^1	 abhāva dharmantu hetum sattāyāmvadatosya vādinaḥ viruddhaḥ syāt sattva viparītasya asattvasya sādhanāt kaḥ punar asya eva abhāvasya eva dharmaḥ iti āha vyavacchedam kīdṛśambhāva mātra vyāpī sāmarthya lakṣaṇaḥ tasya vyavacchedaḥ niyamena abhāvasya eva bhavati na tu mūrtta tva ādeḥ vyavacchedaḥ tasya eva ubhaya dharma tvāt kasmāt viruddhaḥ iti āha tasya bhāva mātra vyāpi artha vyavacchedasya bhāve kvacid abhāvāt abhāve ca sarvatra bhāvāt viruddha tvam tasmāt ayam tri prakāropi bhāva abhāva ubhaya sambandhī dharmaḥ sattāya assādhra nena hetu lakṣaṇa muktaḥ na ca tri prakārāt adharmāt anyāḥ gatiḥ anyaḥ prakāra usti yatas tasmāt na sattā sādhyate sādhana tve liṅga tve asya āḥ sattāyāḥ sāmānyena anupātta viśeṣaṇa tvena 
PVVṬ_356,1^2	 siddha sattāke dharmiṇi na asiddhiḥ anitya tva ādike vastu dharmesādhye kim viśiṣṭe tanmātra vyāpini tena ca sādhya dharmeṇa liṃgasya vyāptiḥ kathaṃcid iti anvaya mukhena vyatireka mukhenavā yadi niścīyate na virodha vyabhicārau na viruddha tvam anaikāntika tvam vā iti hetoḥ na ayam prasaṃgosiddha viruddha anaikāntika lakṣaṇaḥ aniścita āyāntu sādhya dharmeṇa liṅgasya avyāptau dharmi samāśraye vā pakṣa dharma tvevā aniścite sati tad svabhāvatayā niścita trairūpya svabhāva tayā yaḥ gamakaḥ abhimataḥ hetuḥ na sa kaścid gamakaḥ atas eva kāraṇāt svadharmeṇa svena sādhya rūpeṇa vyāptaḥ sādhya dharmiṇi siddhaḥ niścitaḥ hetu svabhāvaḥ vācyaḥ 
PVVṬ_357,1–357,2	 etat eva draḍhayan= āha na hi ityādi prakāśa tayā prabhāsvaratayā ghaṭa ādīn prakāśayan yadā kadācid ghaṭādi udara antar varttī bhavati tadā tad rūpa apratipattau prabhāsvaratā apratipattau satyām svām artha kriyām ghaṭa ādi prakāśana lakṣaṇām na hi karoti gamaka svarūpam abhidhāya adhunā gamya svarūpam āha vyāpakaḥ tasya iti yosau gamakaḥ vyāpyaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya vyāpakaḥ svabhāvaḥ niścitaḥ gamyaḥ 
PVVṬ_357,3–357,5	 tad dharma ityādinā vyācaṣṭe dharmiṇaḥ dharmaḥ gamyaḥ kīdṛśaḥ tasya gamaka tvena abhimatasya vyāpaka tvena niścitaḥ katham punar vyāpaka tvena niścitaḥ iti āha tad dharma niścayāt eva vyāpya dharma niścayāt eva iyatā gamya gamakayoḥ svarūpandarśitam nivartti a nivarttakayoḥ api svarūpam āha tasya ityādi ayam iti vyāpakaḥ dharmaḥ svayam nivṛttau satyām tasya vyāpyasya nivarttakaḥ 
PVVṬ_357,6–358,2	 tasya ityādinā vyācaṣṭe ayam vyāpakaḥ dharmaḥ svayat nivarttamānaḥ tasya vyāpyasya nivarttakaḥ iti sambandhaḥ kiṅkāraṇam yasmāt evam hi asya ayam sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ vyāpakaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati yadi asya vyāpakasya abhāve vyāpyaḥ na bhavet tat iti vākya upanyāse anena anantara uktena anuvarttyā anuvarttaka bhāvasya nivartti a nivarttaka bhāvasya ca pradarśanenadvividhasya api sādharmyavataḥ vaidharmyavataḥ ca sādhana prayogasya gamaka lakṣaṇam sādhya sādhaka tva lakṣaṇam uktam veditavyam tat vyācaṣṭe dvividhaḥ hi ityādi yathā āhuḥ eke iti nai yā yi kāḥ sādharmyavān evahi prayoga unvayī vaidharmyavān eva ca vyatirekī 
PVVṬ_358,3–358,4	 nanu sādharmya prayoge pakṣa dharma tvam anvayaḥ ca iti tathā vaidharmya prayogepi pakṣa dharma tvam vyatirekaḥ ca iti dvi rūpantarhi liṅgam prāptam iti āha na anayoḥ ityādi anayoḥ iti anvaya vyatirekiṇoḥ hetvā uḥ vastutaḥ paramārthataḥ na kaścid bhedaḥ dvayoḥ api anvaya vyatirekavat tvāt anyatra saṃyoga bhedāt tasmāt tau= eva anvaya vyatirekau kadācid sādharmya prayogeṇa pratipādyete kadācid vaidharmya prayogeṇa iti prayoga mātrambhidyate na tu arthaḥ kim kāraṇam yasmāt sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthāt sāmarthyāt sādhya vipakṣāt hetoḥ vyāvṛttiḥ vaidharmi antasya gatiḥ tat eva sāmarthyam āha asatī ityādi tasmin= iti vaidharmye evam hi sādhyena anvitaḥ hetuḥ syāt yadi sādhya abhāve na bhavet tathā vaidharmyaḥ iti vaidharmya prayoge tasmin= iti anvaye yadi hi sādhyena hetoḥ anvayaḥ syāt tadā ayam sādhya nivṛttau nivartteta etat ca vyaḥ ti re ka ci ntā yām vakṣyāmaḥ 
PVVṬ_358,5	 anitya tve yathā kāryam anityaḥ eva kṛtaka tvam etat ca anvayinaḥ udāharaṇam akāryam vā avināśinī iti vyatirekiṇaḥ udāharaṇam tena ayam arthaḥ bhavati avināśini vināśa abhāve sati akāryam kṛtaka tvat na bhavati tat eva āha anena ityādi anayoḥ iti anvaya vyatirekiṇoḥ yat kiñcid iti sarva upasaṃhāreṇa vyāpti kathanena arthāt nityāt vyāvṛttiḥ kṛtaka tvasya uktā iti vyatireka matiḥ śabdaḥ ca kṛtakaḥ iti pakṣa dharma kathanam pakṣaḥ kasmāt na ucyate iti āha kṛtakasya ityādi anitya tvena vyāptam kṛtaka tvam yadā śabdena kathitanta dā niyamena svam vyāpakam sannidhāpayati iti sāmarthyāt eva anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti bhavati tasmāt na avaśyam ityādi iha iti sādharmya prayoge 
PVVṬ_359,1	 vaidharmyavantam prayogam āha vyatirekepi ityādi etat ca akāryam vā avināśi iti etasya vivaraṇam iha api na pratijñā vacanam yasmāt siddha svabhāva tayā niścitayā nitya svabhāvatayā hetu bhūtayā tad abhāvaḥ iti anitya tva abhāve sati na bhavataḥ kṛtaka tvasya śabde ca bhāva khyātau sadbhāva kathane kṛte sati tadā ātmanaḥ sataḥ iti anitya svabhāvasya sataḥ kṛtaka tvasya śabde bhāvaḥ iti sāmarthyāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti siddheḥ pūrvavat iti sādharmya prayoga vat 
PVVṬ_359,2–359,3	 nanu atra vaidharmya prayoge anvayaḥ na uktaḥ iti āha anvayaḥ tu ityādi anvayam antareṇa vaidharmyasya anupapattiḥ arthāpattiḥ kiṅkāraṇam na hi ityādi yasmāt atad ātma niyatasya anitya svabhāve apratibaddhasya tad nivṛttau= anitya tva nivṛttau nivṛttiḥ yuktā yatas evantasmāt svayantādātmya tad utpattibhyām hetoḥ sādhye niyamam pramāṇena prasādhya sādhya nivṛttyā mūḍham prati hetoḥ nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā tena yat ucyate pramāṇena ced niyamaḥ prasādhitaḥ kinniṣphalena nivṛtti vacanena katham vā niyamam na pratipadyate na tu tad nivṛttau nivṛttim iti tad apāstam 
PVVṬ_359,4	 anye tu anyathā vyācakṣate prasādhya śabda arthāt ākṣepa vacanaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ niyamam prasādhya niyamam arthāt ākṣipya nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā iti tathābhūtena vacanena nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā nivṛtti uktiḥ sāmarthyāt niyamam ākṣipati iti atas eva āha sā ca ityādi sā iti niyamasya ākṣepikā nivṛttiḥ sidhyati paramprati yadi tathā bhūtena vacanena prakāśate tadā sādhyātma niyamam arthāt ukti sāmarthyāt ākṣipati iti hetoḥ siddhonvayaḥ 
PVVṬ_360,1	 katham ityādi paraḥ idānīm iti niścite vyāpya vyāpaka bhāve gamakaḥ hetuḥ iti abhyupagame sati iti arthaḥ katham kena pramāṇena kṛtakovaśyam anityaḥ iti pratyetavyaḥ niścetavyaḥ yena tvayā evam ucyate kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ yat kṛta kantada nityam iti evam pṛṣṭaḥ vyāpti viṣayam bādhakam pramāṇan darśayitum āha yasmāt ityādi yasmāt vināśasya nivṛtti dharmaka tva lakṣaṇasya svabhāvāt sva rūpa mātrāt anubandhitā yat vā bhavati asmāt iti bhāvaḥ svaḥ bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ sva hetuḥ iti arthaḥ tasmāt eva anubandhitāḥ vināśasya vastuni sadbhāvaḥ tasmāt kṛtakaḥ anityaḥ kutas eva tat ahetu tvāt yatas na janakāt hetoḥ anyaḥ vināśasya hetuḥ tasmāt svabhāvāt anabandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_360,2	 tat ayam atra samudāya arthaḥ mudgara vyāpāra anantaram dvayam pratīyate ghaṭa nivṛttiḥ kapālam ca tathā ete vināśa rūpa tayā pratīyete tatra ghaṭa nivṛtteḥ nī rūpa tvena akārya tvāt iti vakṣyati tad kārya tvena tu pratīti bhrāntiḥ eva kāryatve vā asyāḥ na ghaṭa nivṛtti rūpa tvam syāt ghaṭa sambandhi tvena kṛtaka tvāt vināśa rūpa tayā ca na pratītiḥ syāt ghaṭasya sattvāt kapālasya api mudgara kārya tve sati api vināśa rūpa tā ghaṭasya anivṛtta tvāt iti ca vakṣyati tatas ca katham asya vināśa rūpa tayā pratītiḥ nirhetuke tu vināśe svarasataḥ nivarttamānaḥ eva ghaṭaḥ mudgara ādi sahakārī kapāla janaka tvena sadṛśa kṣaṇa anārambhaka tvāt mudgara vyāpāra anantaram ghaṭa nivṛtteḥ kapālasya ca sadbhāvāt tayoḥ vināśa rūpa tayā vināśasya ca sa hetuka tvena manda matīnām avasāyaḥ yujyate eva 
PVVṬ_360,3	 mudgara vyāpāra anantaram santāna vicchedāt tat katham nirhetuka vināśa abhyupagama vādinām pratīti bādhā codyate iti etam eva artham āha na hi ityādi naśyante iti yeṣāntāvat kṛtakānām nāśaḥ dṛśyate te vinaśyantaḥ tad bhāve vinaśvara svabhāva īsvarūpa janakāt anyatra hetum apekṣate kutas sva hetoḥ eva vinaśvarāṇām nivṛtti dharmāṇāṃbhāvāt yatas ca naśvara svabhāvam pratyanapekṣatā bhāvān āntasmāt yaḥ kaścid kṛtakaḥ sa svabhāvena eva naśvaraḥ 
PVVṬ_361,1	 yadi sa hetukaḥ vināśaḥ tadā avaśyaṃbhāvī na syāt iti āha sa apekṣāṇām ityādi hi iti yasmāt sa apekṣāṇa ambhāvānām na avaśyam bhāvitā tasmāt nirapekṣaḥ bhāvaḥ vināśe vinaśvare svabhāvaḥ hetu sāpekṣa tve hi ghaṭa ādīnām madhye keṣāñcit nityatā api syāt yeṣām nāśa kāraṇam asat nihitam vā āhulyāt vināśa kāraṇānām na kvacid asannidhānam iti ced āha yena ityādi tad hetoḥ iti vināśa hetoḥ teṣām api vināśa kāraṇānām na avaśyam sannidhānam iti sambandhaḥ kasmāt sva pratyaya adhīna sannidhi tvāt sva kāraṇa āyata sannidhi tvāt na ca vināśa kāraṇa antam kāraṇāni sarvatra sannihitāni tatas ca vināśa hetoḥ amad nidhānāt kaścid na naśyet api sati api vināśa hetu sannidhānam na niyataḥ vināśaḥ yatas na hi avaśyam hetavaḥ phalavantaḥ vināśa ākhya kāryavantaḥ kasmāt saha kārya sannidhānam vaikalyam viruddha upanipātaḥ pratibandhaḥ etena sa apekṣasya na avaśī ambhāvi tvena vyabhicāri tvam uktam 
PVVṬ_361,2	 sarveṣām nāśa hetūnām nāśasya liṅga tvena ye hetavaḥ upādīyante teṣām kasmāt kārya avyavasthiteḥ nāśa lakṣaṇa kārya utpatti niyama abhāvāt hetumat nāśa vādināṃhetum antad nāśam ye vadanti teṣām yatas ca ahetukaḥ vināśaḥ tat tasmāt ayambhāvaḥ kṛta konapekṣaḥ tad bhāvam prati vinaśvara svabhāvam prati tad bhāva niyataḥ nivṛtti dharmaka tāyām niyataḥ dṛṣṭāntam āha asambhava ityādi na sambhavati pratibaddhaḥ yasyām sā kāraṇa sāmagrī sakala iti sahakāri pratyayena santāna pariṇāmena ca paripūrṇṇa iti arthaḥ prayogaḥ tu ye yad bhāvam pratyanapekṣāḥ te tad abhāva niyatāḥ tat yathā anya anapekṣaḥ ca kṛtakaḥ bhāvaḥ vināśaḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ 
PVVṬ_362,1–362,2	 nanu iti ādinā na aikāntika tvam āśaṃkate kvacid kārye anapekṣāṇām api keṣāṃcid kāraṇānām na avaśyan tadbhāvaḥ iti āha bhūmi ityādi sā hi kārya janane apekṣā sāmagrī tasyām asatyām api kadācid pratibandha kāle aṅkura anutpatteḥ etat ca santānasya ekatva madhyavasāya uktam na ityādinā pariharati tatra yathā uktāyām sāmagryām santānasya pariṇāmaḥ svabhāva antara utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ tatra sa apekṣa tvāt tatas anapekṣa tva āditi asya hetoḥ tatra āvṛttiḥ kṛtakasya api asti vināśam prati kāla antara apekṣā tatas hetuḥ asiddhaḥ iti āha na evam ityādi kṛtakasya bhāvasya nāśe kācid kāla antara apekṣā iti vakṣyati 
PVVṬ_362,3–362,4	 syāt etat eka svabhāvāḥ eva bhūmi bīja ādayaḥ kutas teṣām santāna pariṇāma apekṣa tvam atas vyabhicāraḥ eva hetoḥ iti āha tatra api ityādi etat uktam bhavati na bhūmi bīja ādayaḥ eka svabhāvāḥ paścāt iva prāk api kārya utpādana prasaṅgāt kintu uttarottara pariṇāmena bhinnāḥ tatra iti tasyām santāna pariṇāmena bhinnāyām sāmagryām antyā yā sāmagrī kārya utpādane lakṣaṇa antareṇa avyavahitā sāphalavati eva iti kutas hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam 
PVVṬ_362,5	 syāt etat pūrvā sāmagrī janikā api satī na niyata iti āha sā eva iti antyā sāmagrī tatra tāsu madhye aṅkura hetuḥ na anyā kācid kimarthantarhi aṅkura arthibhiḥ pūrvā sāmagrī upādīyate iti āha anyāḥ tu ityādi pūrvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ pūrvovasthā viśeṣaḥ tad arthaā iva aṅkura janana samartha antya sāmagrī arthaḥ eva tena arthibhiḥ upādīyate sāmagrī rūpa tayā ca adhyavasīyate 
PVVṬ_362,6	 syāt etat antyāyāḥ api sāmagryāḥ pratibandhaḥ sambhavati tena kārya utpāda niyama abhāvāt sādhya śūnyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti āha na ca ityādi tāmantyāṃsām agrīn tatra kārye janye ekatra bhāvaḥ iti antye kṣaṇe vikārasya utpattau vā tasya antyasya kṣaṇasya ekatva hāneḥ pūrvasya pracyuteḥ vikāra ākhyasya ca dvitīyasya utpatteḥ tatas ca na asā ā= antyaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_363,1–363,2	 atha na tasya antyasya janaka svabhāvāt pracyutiḥ iṣyate tadā tadā ātmanaḥ janakātmanaḥ svabhāvāt apracyutasya tad utpādanam kārya utpādanam prati vaiguṇyam akurvāṇasya pratibandha hetoḥ apratibandhaka tvāt vighāta karaṇāt punar api vyabhicāram āśaṃkate yava bīja ādayaḥ na sa apekṣāḥ kasmin śāli aṅkure kārye janye kasmāt tad utpatti pratyayānām kadācid tatra api yava bīja ādau sannidhānāt te nirapekṣāḥ api na śālya kuram janayanti iti anaikāntikaḥ eva iti 
PVVṬ_363,3–363,4	 katham iti si ddhā nta vā dī sa apekṣā eva iti arthaḥ eṣām iti yava bīja ādīnānśa ali bījasya yaḥ tad utpādanaḥ śāli aṅkura utpādanaḥ svabhāvaḥ saḥ eva eṣām na asti iti sambandhaḥ tad svabhāva apekṣāḥ iti śāli aṃkura utpādana svabhāva apekṣāḥ kadā ca katham nirapekṣa tvam syāt evantarhi iti paraḥ kṛtakānām ca keṣāṃcid satām vākeṣāṃcid saḥ eva svabhāvaḥ na asti yaḥ naśvaraḥ tasmāt tad svabhāva apekṣa tvāt vinaśvara svabhāva apekṣa tvāt na vinaśvarāḥ iti asiddha tvam hetoḥ iti 
PVVṬ_363,5–363,6	 etat nirākarttum prakramate śāli bīja ityādi ādi śabdāt yava bīja ādīnām sa svabhāvaḥ iti abhimata itara kārya janana ajanana svabhāvaḥ sva hetoḥ iti kṛtvā yaḥ yava bīja ādiḥ na tad hetuḥ sa śāli bīja hetuḥ yasya hetuḥ nabhavati iti arthaḥ saḥ atad svabhāvaḥ iti aśāli aṃkura janana svabhāvaḥ nanu atat hetuḥ ca syāt tad svabhāvaḥ ca iti āha niyata śaktiḥ ca ityādi niyatā pratiniyatā śaktiḥ yasya sa tathā sa hetuḥ iti śāli yava bīja janana svabhāvaḥ sva rūpeṇa vibhaktena eva svabhāvena pratītaḥ pratyakṣataḥ 
PVVṬ_364,1–364,2	 syāt etat na hetu kṛtaḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ bhāvānām kintu svabhāvaḥ eva kasyacid tādṛśa svabhāva unyasya ca anyādṛśaḥ iti āha na ca ityādi ākasmikā eti nirhetukaḥ anapekṣasya ahetoḥ kvacid deśe kvacid kāle kvacid ca śāli bīja ādau dravye śāli aṃkura utpādanasya svabhāvasya niyamaḥ na syāt kintu saru u asya sarvadā sarvatra bhavet apekṣā bhāvāt tasmāt deśa ādikam apekṣya bhavat niyamaḥ hetumān iti gamyate yathā śāli bīja ādīnām svabhāva niyamaḥ tathā atra api kṛtakeṣu satsu vā aniyama hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ yatas niyāmakāt hetoḥ kṛta kāssantaḥ vā kecid naśvara ātmānaḥ jātāḥ na anye syāt etat yadi nāma niyāmakaḥ hetuḥ na śakyate darśayituntathā api sambhāvyate iti āha na ca atra loke naśvarasya svabhāvasya niyāmakaḥ hetuḥ asti na sambhāvyatas eva iti yāvat sarveṣām janmavatām nāśasya siddheḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt aniyata hetukaḥ vināśaḥ iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_364,3^1	 yadi sarva janminām vināśa siddhiḥ evantarhi sattvāt iti hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ syāt tat āha janmi ityādi janmavatām eva svabhāvaḥ nāśī na ajanmavatām na ākāśa ādīnām satām api iti paraḥ manyate ā cā ryaḥ āha na vai janma iti na hi janma vaśāt bhāvasya svabhāvaḥ utpadyate tasmāt na janma nāśasya hetuḥ na api ākāśa ādau sattvam asti iti āha na ca ityādi ahetoḥ ākāśa ādeḥ svabhāva niyamaḥ svarūpa niyamaḥ ahetoḥ deśa kāla prakṛti niyama ayogāt yatas ca sarva janminām vināśa siddhiḥ ākāśa ādīnām ca asattvam tasmāt na atra kṛtakeṣu satsu vā hetoḥ naśvarān aśvara janaka tvena svabhāva pravibhāgaḥ 
PVVṬ_364,3^2	 tad bhāvāt hetu pravibhāga abhāvāt phalasya kṛtakasya sataḥ vā naśvara anaśvara pravibhāga unā asti iti asamānam yava bīja ādinā sā iyam vināśasya nirapekṣatā kvacid vastuni kadācid kāle vināśasya yaḥ bhāvaḥ tena virodhinī karoti tad abhāvam tasya kvacita vināśasya abhāvam svabhāvena sat tayā sādhayati sarvatra sarva kālambhāvam sādhayati iti yāvat kim kāraṇam yaḥ hi ityādi tad kāla dravya apekṣaḥ iti yasmin kāle bhavati yatra vā dravye tam kālam dravyañca apekṣate iti nirapekṣaḥ eva na syāt iti uktaṃprāc 
PVVṬ_365,1–365,2	 nanu vināśaka hetu anapekṣa tvena vināśasya anapekṣa tvam na tu kāla ādi anapekṣa tvena tat katham ucyate tad kāla dravya apekṣaḥ iti nirapekṣaḥ eva vināśaḥ na syāt iti yadi ca kāla anapekṣaḥ vināśaḥ dvitīyepi kṣaṇe vināśaḥ na syāt tad kāla apekṣa tvāt dravya anapekṣa tve ca kasya tarhi vināśaḥ syāt evam manyate jātasya tad bhāve anyonapekṣaṇa aditim vacanāt dvitīyaḥ eva kṣaṇe vināśaḥ bhavati na anyasmin kṣaṇe tathā sarvasya jātasya bhavati na dravya viśeṣasya tena dravyā anapekṣa tve kasya tarhi vināśaḥ bhavatu 
PVVṬ_365,3–365,4	 iti nirastam kāla antare dravya viśeṣe ca nāśasya bhāve kāla antarasya dravya viśeṣasya ca vināśaka tvam eva syāt vināśasya tad bhāvaḥ eva bhāvāt tasmāt tad kāla dravya apekṣa tve nirapekṣaḥ eva na syāt iti ucyate tarhi iti paraḥ na ityā cā ryaḥ sattāyāḥ yaḥ hetuḥ bhāvaḥ tasmāt eva tathā utpatteḥ naśvara svabhāvasya utpatteḥ etat eva spaṣṭayati sataḥ hi bhavataḥ iti sattām pratipadyamānasya tādṛśasya eva naśvara svabhāvasya eva abhāvāt na avaśyam sataḥ padārthasyakutaścit kāraṇāt bhāvaḥ utpādanaḥ iti ced kecid hi santopi na utpattimantaḥ yathā ākāśa ādayaḥ iti paraḥ manyate ākasmikīti ahetukā na iyam sattā kasyacid arthasyakadācid kāle kvacid dravyā iviram eta 
PVVṬ_365,5–365,6	 nanu ca ghaṭa ādīnām sva hetutaḥ sattā niyame katham ākāśa ādi sattā prasaṅgaḥ sattyam kintu na kasyacid virameta iti asya ayam arthaḥ na sa kaścid bhāvaḥ yat svabhāva usau= ākāśa ādiḥ na syāt sarva ātmakaḥ prasajyate iti eke tat ayuktam yadi hi ghaṭa ādi rūpam ākāśe syāt ahetukam syāt tasya mṛd piṇḍa ādikam antareṇa bhāvāt tasmāt na iyam ākāśa ādeḥ sattā kasyacid ātma ādeḥ kadācid kāle kvacid deśe virameta deśa kāla dravya niyatā na bhavet iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_366,1	 etat eva draḍhayan= āha tat hi ityādi tat hi vastu kiṃcid upalīyet a āśrayet yasya yatra kiṃcid utpāda ādikam pratibaddham āyattam na ca upalīyeta yasya yatra apratibaddham sā iyam sattā kvacid apratibandhinī ced dravya kāla apekṣayā na niyamavatī syāt tathā ca ākāśasya iyam sattā na ātmanaḥ ātmanaḥ sattā na kālasya ityādi na syāt yatas ca evantasmāt na iyam sattākasmikī kvacid nitya abhimateṣu api 
PVVṬ_366,2–366,5	 yadi sattā hetoḥ eva vinaśvarasya utpādaḥ katham idānīm ahetukaḥ vināśaḥ uktaḥ iti vyāghātam āha jātasya ityādinā pariharati jātasya niṣpannasya tad bhāve vinaśva rata abhāve janakāt hetoḥ anyasya anapekṣaṇāt ahetukaḥ vināśaḥ uktaḥ uktam ca atra prāk yathāna vināśaḥ nāma anyaḥ eva kaścid bhāvāt kintu bhāvaḥ eva hi nāśaḥ nanu ca pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ nāśaḥ sa kathambhāva svabhāvaḥ bhavati iti āha 
PVVṬ_366,6^1	 saḥ eva hi ityādi yasmāt sva hetoḥ eva kṣaṇa sthāyī jātaḥ tasmāt bhāvaḥ eva nāśaḥ uktaḥ yaḥ eva sattā kālaḥ bhāvasya tam eva ekam kṣaṇam sthātum śīlam yasya sa tathā na punar utpadya kṣaṇam api tiṣṭhati yadi tiṣṭhet na kadācid na nivartteta iti vakṣyāmaḥ yadi eka kṣaṇa sthāyī bhāvaḥ vināśaḥ kasmāt pravāha vicchedāt prāk api tathā na niścīyate aniścayāt ca akṣaṇikaḥ saḥ iti āha tam asya ityādi tam nāśa svabhāvam asya ghaṭa ādeḥ āsaṃsāram avidyā anubandhāt mandāḥ urdhvam pravāha viccheda kāle vyavasyanti na prāk sattā kāle darśanepi iti naśvara svabhāvasya sati api darśane na darśana kāle adhyavasāya usti avidyā sāmarthyāt sadṛśa apara utpattyā ca darśana pāṭavasya abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_366,6^2	 yatas ca santāna viccheda kāle nāśa svabhāvasya niścayaḥ tasmāt tad vaśena niścaya vaśena paścāt iti yasmin kāle nāśa svabhāvasya niścayaḥ tad kāla upādhiḥ eva sa bhāvasya vināśa svabhāvaḥ vyavasthāpyate dṛṣṭāntam āha vikāra ityādi yathā viṣa dravyam gṛhītam api bhrānti sadbhāvāt prāk anavadhāritam ajñaiḥ puruṣaiḥ paścāt viṣa kṛtasya vikārasya lālā sruti ādeḥ darśanena viṣam vyavasthāpyate tadvat etāvat mātreṇa ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ na tu māraṇa śaktiḥ gṛhītā paścāt avadhāryate iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ tat iti tasmāt ayam vināśaḥ iti sambandhaḥ vastunaḥ yā sattā tad vyatirekeṇa na kicid vināśa kāraṇam apekṣate iti tad vyāpī sattā vyāpī 
PVVṬ_367,1	 katham ityādi paraḥ asāmarthyāt ca iti prativacanam tad hetoḥ iti nāśa hetoḥ cakārāt a kāraka tvāt ca etat eva vivṛṇvan= āha abhāva kāriṇaḥ iti abhāva kāritayā abhimatasya kriyāyāḥ kāraka tvasya pratiṣedhāt ca iti avastu kārī yobhim atas sokārakaḥ eva bhavati asāmarthyan darśayitum āha siddhe hi ityādi nāśa hetuḥ bhāvāt abhinnam vā vināśam kuryāt tatonyam vā na tāvat ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhe hi bhāve kārakaḥ nāśa hetu stambhāvam na karoti siddha tvāt eva na api dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ yatas na api anya bhāvasya na kiñcid tad avastha tvāt tat atad rūpa ityādi bhāva rūpasya tatonyasya ca vināśasya kāraṇāt ca akiñcitkaraḥ vināśa hetuḥ atas na apekṣyate iti siddham asāmarthya 
PVVṬ_367,2^1	 kriyā pratiṣedhaḥ tu katham iti āha vināśaḥ iti hi bhāvasya abhāvante hetumat nāśa vādinaḥ manyante asmābhiḥ bhāva svabhāvaḥ eva vināśaḥ iti uktam tat iti tasmāt ayam vināśa hetuḥ vināśam karoti abhāvam karoti iti prāptam tatra etasmin prāpte sati yadi abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid svabhāvaḥ kāryaḥ syāt tadā kārya tvāt aṃkura ādi vat saḥ eva bhāvaḥ iti na abhāvaḥ syāt atha yathā ghaṭaḥ ghaṭa rūpeṇa kāryaḥ paṭaḥ ca paṭa rūpeṇa kāryaḥ na tu kāryatvāt ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ bhavati tathā bhāvaḥ bhāva rūpeṇa kāryaḥ abhāva upya bhāva rūpeṇa kāryaḥ syāt na tu bhāvaḥ eva bhavati iti 
PVVṬ_367,2^2–368,1	 tat ayuktam bhavati iti hi bhāvaḥ na bhavati itica abhāvaḥ tena abhāvaḥ bhāva virodhī na ca abhāva rūpa tayā tasya pratibhāsanāt abhāva rūpa tā bhavana dharma tvena abhāva rūpa tayā pratibhāsaḥ eva na syāt iti idam eva codyate na ca paraspara vivikta rūpa tayā abhāvānām pratibhāsaḥ yatas ca abhāvasya nīrūpa tvāt akāryatvantasmāt abhāvam karoti iti bhāvam na karoti iti vākya arthaḥ syāt tena kriyā pratiṣedhosya nāśa hetoḥ kṛtaḥ syāt tathā api kriyā pratiṣedha ipyayam vināśa hetuḥ akiñcitkaraḥ kim iti nāśe apekṣyate bhāvena iti siddhāḥ vināśam pratyanapekṣāḥ bhāvasya nanu nirhetukepi vināśe katham vināśam pratyanapekṣāḥ bhāvasya svabhāvaḥ hi sa tasya ittham yena apekṣya nivarttate virodhinam yathā anyeṣām pravāhaḥ mudgara ādikam tena pūrvam virodhinaḥ abhāve na anivṛtteḥ katham kṣaṇika tvam iti 
PVVṬ_368,2^1	 tat ayuktam yatas virodhi apekṣa svabhāva tvam yadi vastunaḥ na pūrvam api tadā asya pūrva uttara rūpayoḥ bhedāt nitya tvam eva atha pūrvam api sa svabhāvosti tadā pūrvam api asya nivṛttiḥ syāt atha tadā virodhi abhāvāt na nivarttate kathantarhi virodhi apekṣa svabhāva tvam sati eva virodhini virodhi apekṣa svabhāva tvasya bhāvāt na anyadā yadi virodhī vastunaḥ na upakārakaḥ kathantantat apekṣate upakāre vā virodhi sannidhāna īpya parasya bhāvasya utpattiḥ iti pūrvakaḥ bhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ dṛśyeta virodhe sannidhāna abhāvena anivṛtteḥ atha nivarttate na tarhi virodhi apekṣayā bhāvasya nivṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_368,2^2	 yadi ca na bhāvam vināśayati katham virodhī na ca kṣaṇika vādinām virodhi sannidhāne sattā naḥ nivarttate kintarhi na utpadyate tathā hi nirodham upagacchan= eva ghaṭaḥ mudgara ādi sahakāryapekṣaḥ kapāla janaka tvena sadṛśa kṣaṇa anārambhakaḥ bhavati iti santāna anutpattiḥ na tu virodhinam apekṣya pravāhaḥ nivarttate yatas ca pūrvaṃsanta anena utpitsoḥ bhāvasya virodhi sannidhāne santānān utpattiḥ atas eva manda matīnām sa hetuka nāśa adhyavasāyaḥ mudgara ādau ca virodhi tvā avasāyaḥ iti sarvam sustham tasmāt nirapekṣa tvāt eva yatra nāma kvacid bhavat dṛṣṭaḥ vināśaḥ tatra eṣa svabhāvataḥ eva bhavati 
PVVṬ_368,3–369,1	 nanu ahetukepi nāśe yadā eva ghaṭa ādeḥ nāśaḥ pratīyate tadā eva ahetukaḥ syāt na pūrvam apratīteḥ artha ekakṣaṇa sthāyi tvena ghaṭa ādeḥ utpatteḥ pūrvam api nāśaḥ nanu yathā ekakṣaṇa sthāyi tve na utpattiḥ sva hetubhyaḥ tathā aneka kṣaṇa sthāyi tvena api utpattiḥ syāt vicitra śaktayaḥ hi sāmagryaḥ dṛśyante tatra kācid syāt api yā anaśvara ātmānam janayet iti āha asmāt ityādi asmāt ca svabhāva mātra bhāvāt anyatra api deśa ādi vyavadhānena adṛṣṭe tathā dṛṣṭe virodhi sannidhānāt pūrvam api svabhāvataḥ eva vināśaḥ bhavati 
PVVṬ_369,2	 evam manyate yeṣa antāvat vināśaḥ dṛśyate teṣām yadi na pratikṣaṇam vināśaḥ syāt tadā vināśa pratītiḥ eva na syāt tathā hi yadi dvitīye kṣaṇe bhāvasya sthitiḥ tadā asau sarvadā eva tiṣṭhet dvitīyepi kṣaṇe kṣaṇa dvaya sthāyī svabhāva tvāt tadā ca tena aparakṣaṇa dvayam sthātavyam aparasmin= api kṣaṇe kṣaṇa dvaya sthāyi svabhāva tvāt aparasmin kṣaṇe avasthānam syāt evam uttarottare kṣaṇe draṣṭavyam iti āsaṃsārambhāvasya sthitiḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_369,3–369,4	 atha prathame kṣaṇe bhāvasya kṣaṇa dvaya sthāyī svabhāvaḥ dvitīye kṣaṇaḥ eka kṣaṇa sthāyī tathā api tayoḥ svabhāvayoḥ bhedāt kṣaṇika tvam syāt na tu evam api prathame kṣaṇe bhāvasya aneka kṣaṇa avasthāyi svabhāvāt akṣaṇika tvam syāt na asaṃsāram sthiti prasaṅgāt iti ukta tvāt nanu dvitīyepi kṣaṇe bhāvasya uttara kṣaṇa anavasthānepi pūrvakṣaṇa sthāyī rūpa abhedena pūrvam api sthānāt kṣaṇa dvaya sthāyi tvam asti eva iti ced 
PVVṬ_369,5–369,6	 na pūrvambhāvasya hi eṣa svabhāvaḥ yat ekasmin kṣaṇe tiṣṭhati anyasmin kṣaṇe sthāsyati saḥ eva ced svabhāvaḥ dvitīye kṣaṇe tadā api ekasmin kṣaṇe tiṣṭhati anyasmin kṣaṇe dvayam sthāsyati iti evam uttarottara kṣaṇepi draṣṭavyam iti na vināśaḥ bhāvasya syāt dṛśyate ca tasmāt vināśa prati iti anyathā anupapattyā pratikṣaṇa vināśa anumānam adṛṣṭeṣu tarhi kṛtakeṣu katham pratikṣaṇa vināśi tva anumānam vināśasya eva adarśanāt 
PVVṬ_369,7	 na eṣa doṣaḥ yasmāt teṣām api prathame kṣaṇe yaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ saḥ eva ced dvitīya ādi kṣaṇe tadā abhūtvā bhavanam eva prathama kṣaṇa vat atha prathame kṣaṇe tasya janma eva na sthitiḥ dvitīye ca kṣaṇe sthitiḥ eva na janma evam api kṣaṇika tvam syāt janma janminoḥ sthiti sthitimatoḥ ca abhedāt na ca dvitīye kṣaṇe janma vinā sthitiḥ yuktā janma ced na tad āsthitiḥ tasyāḥ dvitīya ādi kṣaṇa bhāvi tvāt dvitīya ādau kṣaṇepi evam iti sarvatra utpattiḥ eva na sthitiḥ iti kṣaṇika tvam kim ca paraspara bhinnasya apara apara kāla sambandhi tvasya kṛtakāt bhāvāt abhinna tvāt kṣaṇika tvam eva 
PVVṬ_369,8–370,1	 soyam ityādinā kā ri kā rtham āha ayam iti vināśaḥ kvacid ghaṭa ādau mudgara ādi sannidhānetathā anyatra api iti mudga ra sannidhānāt pūrvam api evandeśa ādi vya vadhān epi yat pūrvam upanyastantatra dvau vastu sādhanau= iti tad upasaṃharan= āha tatas iti tasmāt yā kācid bhāva viṣayā kārya svabhāvābhyām liṅgābhyām dvidhā eva anumitiḥ kasmāt tayoḥ kārya svabhāvayoḥ eva sva sādhye sambandha niyamāt kāryam liṅgam yasyāḥ anumiteḥ evaṃsvabhāvaḥ liṅgam yasyāḥ iti vigrahaḥ yathāsvam vyāpini sādhyaḥ iti kāryasya kāraṇam vyāpakam sādhyam svabhāvasya api svabhāvaḥ vyāpakaḥ sādhyaḥ tasmin sādhye liṅgini tayoḥ eva kārya svabhāvayoḥ liṅgayoḥ pratibandhāt 
PVVṬ_370,2–370,3	 anupalabdhim adhikṛtya āha pravṛtteḥ ityādi pravṛtteḥ sanniścaya śabda vyavahāra lakṣaṇayoḥ buddhi pūrva tvāt pramāṇa pūrva tvāt tad bhāva anupalambhane tasya pravṛtti viṣayasya bhāvasya pratyakṣa anumānābhyām anupalambhane prekṣāvatā pravarttitavyam na itīyatā leśena adṛśya viṣayāyāḥ api anupalabdheḥ uktā pramāṇatā tṛtīyaḥ tu hetuḥ anupalabdhiḥ gamakaḥ iti ucyatā eti sambandhaḥ aviśeṣeṇa iti dṛśya viṣaya iti amum viśeṣantyaktvā sāmānyena kvacid arthesādhye sat niścaya ityādinā tam eva arthan darśayati pramāṇa pṛṣṭha bhāvī sat iti vikalpaḥ sanniścayaḥ tad pṛṣṭha bhāvi eva sat iti dhvaniḥ sat śabdaḥ tathā eva sat iti anuṣṭhānaṃsa dvi avahāraḥ teṣām pratiṣedhe hi sarvā eva dṛśya viṣayā adṛśya viṣayā ca nanu kā ri kā yām pravṛttiḥ iti uktantat katham vṛttau sat niścaya ityādi vyākhyāyate iti āha sanniścayāt hi ityādi yasmāt satām vidyamānānām niścayāt śabda vyavahārāḥ sanniścaya śabda vyavahārāḥ trayopi pravṛtti aṅga tvāt puruṣa pravṛtteḥ nimitta tvāt pravṛttiḥ iti uktaḥ tasmāt na sū tra vṛ ttyoḥ vyāghātaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_371,1	 kimpunaḥ kāraṇam upalambha nivṛttau sat vyavahāraḥ nivarttate tathā hi anupalabdhiḥ eva dvi prakāra api aviśeṣeṇa asattvam iti uktam prāk tat ca asattvam viprakṛṣṭāyām anupalabdha aupratipattṛ vaśāt uktam pratipattā hi anupalabhyamānat na asti iti adhyavasyati na vastu vaśāt tathā hi viprakṛṣṭerthe sattvam asat tvañca sandigdham tasmāt tāvat hi sa viprakṛṣṭaḥ bhāvosya pratipattuḥ na asti yāvat atra apratipattiḥ kasmāt satā api tena viprakṛṣṭena arthena anupalabdhena tad artha akaraṇāt tasya puṃsā urtha ākaraṇāt san= api asat kalpaḥ vastutas tu anupalabhyamānaḥ na san= a āsan kasmāt satām api kadācid svabhāva ādi viprakarṣāt anupalambha at na asattā niścayaḥ kvāpi sattā niścayaḥ tasya asya anupalambhasya asatsu api tulya tvāt tat iti tasmāt etat sattvam iti sambandhaḥ kimbhūtam anupalabdhi lakṣaṇandeśa ādi viprakṛṣṭam pratipattuḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt pratyakṣa anumāna abhāvāt nivṛttat na vastu vaśāt kim karoti sva nimittān śabdavyavahāḥ 
PVVṬ_371,2–371,4	 upalabdhi lakṣaṇam iti anye paṭhanti upalabdhiḥ eva sattvam upacārāt tathābhūtam sattvam nivṛttam iti arthaḥ yena evantena kāraṇena yāpīyam anupalabdhiḥ keṣām anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptānām yā vastu topya sattva rūpāḥ api śabdāt pratipattṛ vaśāt api kim kāraṇam apravṛtti yogya tvāt asat vyavahāra yogya tvāt tasyāḥ api anupalabdheḥ etat sat vyavahāra pratiṣedhaka tvena tulyam prāmāṇyam atra viṣaye sat vyavahāra pratiṣedhe yā iyam anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ asanniścaya phalā api sā asanniścayaḥ phalam yasyāḥ iti vigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_372,1	 asattāyām ityādinā vyācaṣṭe asattāyām api aniścaya ipi yasmāt na hi asti sambhavaḥ yat upalabdhi yogyaḥ bhāvaḥ sakaleṣu anyeṣu upalambha kāraṇeṣu san vidyamānaḥ na upalabhyeta na punar pūrvā viprakṛṣṭa viṣaya anupalabdhiḥ asattā sādhanī tathā hi pratyakṣa anumāna āgama nivṛtti lakṣaṇā eva anupalabdhiḥ tatra śāstrasya adhikārosmin prakaraṇe tatra asambaddhā anāntarīyakā bahava ūrthāḥ svabhāva ādi viprakarṣiṇaḥ śāstre na adhikriyante iti yāvat pratyakṣasya api na te viṣayāḥ iti āha atīndriyāḥ na api anumānasya yasmāt aliṅgāḥ na eṣām liṅgam asti iti aliṅgāḥ teṣām atīndriyāṇām arthānām pramāṇa traya anivṛtti lakṣaṇāyāḥ anupalabdhitaḥ katham abhāvaḥ na eva 
PVVṬ_372,2	 soyam iti vādī sarva arthānām iti deśa kāla svabhāva viprakarṣiṇām pramāṇa traya nivṛttyā iti pratyakṣa anumāna āgama nivṛttyā tasya iti śāstrasya kvacid puruṣa artha anupayogini arthe anadhikāre viniyoga abhāve pravṛtteḥ yasmāt śāstram hi ityādi anyathā iti puruṣa artha anupayoginam artham āśritya śāstra pravṛttau abaddha pralāpasya asambaddha abhidhāyinaḥ śāstrasya aprāmāṇyāt 
PVVṬ_372,3	 syāt etat sarve eva arthāḥ puruṣa artha upayoginaḥ iti atra āha tatra ityādi tatra prakaraṇaḥ iti puruṣa artha cintā prastāve pratyātma niyatāḥ iti prati puruṣa niyatāḥ etena puruṣāṇām ānantyāt ānantyam cetaḥ vṛttīnām āha aniyatāt nimittāt bhavitum śīlam yāsām iti vigrahaḥ anena ekasmin= api puṃsi nimitta bhedāt bahu tvam evaṃbhūtāḥ cetaḥ vṛttayaḥ na avaśyam sākalyena pratipadam nirdeśyai aśakya tvāt kāla deśa vyavahitāḥ vā puruṣa artha anupayoginaḥ dravya viśeṣāḥ na avaśyam nirdeśyāḥ tatas na tad chā tāḥ ca cetaḥ vṛttayaḥ te ca viśeṣāḥ tān iti puliṃgena uktāḥ pumān striye ti puṃsaḥ śeṣam kṛtvā 
PVVṬ_373,1–373,2	 na api pratyakṣasya viṣayāḥ iti āha na ca ityādi tathā viprakṛṣṭeṣu iti deśa ādi viprakṛṣṭeṣu sva sāmarthya upadhānāt svarūpa sannidhānāt jñāna utpādana śaktiḥ na asti etena atīndriyāḥ iti etat vyākhyātam anumānasya api na te viṣayāḥ iti āha sa ca avaśyam ityādi eṣām iti deśa ādi vyavahitānām yena iti kārya upalambhena na ca te iti viprakarṣiṇaḥ sarvā iti adṛśya anupalabdhiḥ api nivṛtti niścayasya abhāva niścayasya yatas evantat ititasmāt iyam iti adṛśya anupalabdhiḥ sat asat niścaya phalā na iti sanniścaya phalā nabhavati sat vyavahāra nimittāḥ na ca api asanniścaya phalā sandehāt iti hetoḥsyādvā anupalabdheḥ apramāṇa tā vyavasāya phala tvāt iti niścaya phala tvāt pramāṇānām pratyakṣam api hi pramāṇam sarva ākāra grahepi yeṣu ākāreṣu niścayam āvahati teṣu eva 
PVVṬ_373,3	 nanu pravṛtti niṣedha pramāṇam syāt iti āha na hi ityādi iyam iti anupalabdhiḥ niḥśaṃka paricchedam iti niḥśaṃkaḥ paricchedaḥ yasya cetasaḥ iti vigrahaḥ saṃśaye sati na pravarttitavyama vaśyam iti evam niścitam cetaḥ na karotiti arthaḥ saṃśayāt api kvacid kṛṣīvala ādeḥ lokasya pravṛtteḥ kathantarhi apravṛtti phala tvena asyāḥ prāmāṇyam uktam iti atas āha tathā tu etat ityādi tathā tena rūpeṇa etat apravṛtti kāraṇam anupalambha ākhyam niravadyaṃniḥ doṣam yadi niścaya pūrvam vyavaharet kaścid pramāṇa pūrvam sat vyavahāra ādi pravartayet iti anena dvāreṇa sā iyam adṛśya anupalabdhiḥ apravṛtti phalā proktā niścita sat vyavahāra ādi pratiṣedha phalā proktā sandigdhaḥ tu sat vyavahāra ādiḥ na niṣidhyate iti puruṣasya pravṛttiḥ bhavati api 
PVVṬ_373,4–374,2	 liṅga atiśaya bhāvinī iti liṅgam anupalabdhiḥ tasyāḥ atiśayaḥ viśeṣa upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvantasya bhāva ssadbhāvaḥ sa yasyām asti sā tathā uktā liṅga viśeṣati arthaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ iti yāvat atra ityādinā vyācaṣṭe atra iti nivṛtti niścaye yathā udāhṛtā prāk iti asat jñāna phalā kācid hetu bheda vyapekṣayā ityādinā 
PVVṬ_374,3–374,6	 yat punaruktam apramāṇam anupalabdhiḥ iti tat na aviśeṣeṇa boddhavyam kintu svabhāva ityādi deśa ādi viprakṛṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ jñāpakam liṅgam tayoḥ ajñānam svabhāva jñāpakāt jñānasya ayam nyāya udāhṛtaḥ asattve sādhye na asti prāmāṇyam iti svabhāva ajñānam pratyakṣa nivṛttiḥ jñāpakā jñānam anumāna nivṛttiḥ adṛśya viṣayāyāḥ pratyakṣa anumāna nivṛtteḥ ayam nyāya udāhṛtaḥ iti samudāya arthaḥ yasya ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yasya kasyacid piśāca ādeḥ saḥ iti svabhāvaḥ tad anupalambha mātreṇa iti tena tad viṣaya anupalambha mātreṇa pratyakṣa nivṛtti rūpeṇa asat nāma yathā uktam prāk iti satām api kadācid anupalambha ādi tyādinā svabhāvrā jñānam anena vyākhyātam 
PVVṬ_374,7–375,1	 jñāpakā jñānam vyākhyātum āha yopī ityādi jñāpakasya iti asya vivaraṇam liṅgasya iti atīndriyaḥ pratikṣipyate arthaḥ yathā na asti viraktam cetaḥ ityādi tathā jñāpakasya liṅgasya abhāvāt svabhāva viśeṣaḥ vā pratikṣipyate atra viśeṣaḥ pratikṣipyate na dhārmimātram yathā na asti dāna ityādi dānam ca hiṃsā viratiḥ ca iti dvandvaḥ tad viṣayāḥ cetanāḥ dāna cetanānām hiṃsā virati cetanānām ca iti arthaḥ abhyudaya hetu tā svarga ādi phala hetunā atra cetanānām na svarūpam pratikṣipyate tāsām pratyakṣa tvāt kintu abhyudaya hetu tvam svabhāvaḥ viśeṣaḥ na asti iti ucyate nanu cetanānām pratyakṣa tvāt abhyudaya hetu tā api tad ātma bhūta tvāt pratyakṣasya eva iti kutas bhrāntiḥ ityādi 
PVVṬ_375,2	 pratyakṣepi arthe viparyastaḥ apavat etāpi iti sambandhaḥ katham viparyaste iti āha atat phala ityādi atad phalāḥ anabhyudaya phalāḥ ye dṛṣṭāḥ cetanāḥ viśeṣāḥ avyākṛtāḥ taiḥ sādharmyāt sādharmyam eva katham iti āha phalasya anantarya abhāvāt iti yāḥ anyāḥ atad phalāḥ cetanāḥ yāḥ ca tad phalāḥ ubhayatra tad phalasya anantaryat na dṛśyate na tāvatā iti phalasya anantarya adarśana mātreṇa tad abhāvaḥ phala abhāvaḥ kasmāt vyavahitānām ityādi hetoḥ sakāśāt kāla antareṇa uttarottara avasthā pariṇāma lakṣaṇena vyavahitānām phalānān darśanāt mūṣikasya ālarkkasya ca unmatta kukkurasya viṣa vikāraḥ iva sa hi na viṣa saṃcāra kāla eva bhavati kintu sahakāriṇaḥ kāla viśeṣasya sannidhauniṣpadyate na tu hetu antaram eva tadvat 
PVVṬ_375,3–375,4	 syāt etat mūṣikā ādi viṣa vikārasya kāla antare dṛṣṭa tvāt sadbhāvaḥ yuktaḥ eva dāna ādi phalantu na kadācana api dṛṣṭam iti kathantasya sadbhāvaḥ iti āha tat ityādi tad bhāvaḥ iti tayoḥ dāna ādi phalā atīndriya vastunoḥ bhāve virodha abhāvāt atra dāna ādi phale atīndriya bhāve vā anupalabdhi mātram apramāṇam yadi bādhakam pramāṇam na asti iti apratikṣepaḥ bhāve astitve kim pramāṇat = a eva asti pramāṇam atas sattā niścayaḥ na yuktaḥ iti paraḥ 
PVVṬ_375,5	 atas eva ityā cā ryaḥ atyantam atīndriyasya arthasya sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt prekṣāvataḥ saṃśayaḥ yuktaḥ yadi vā yat vastu nirākarttut na śakyate na ca tasya sādhakam pramāṇam pratibhāti tasya evam sambhāvanā yuktā bhavet asya kadācid sādhakam pramāṇaṃkasyacid pratibhāvataḥ tasmāt artha saṃśayāt pramāṇa saṃśayāt vā apratikṣepaḥ 
PVVṬ_376,1–376,2	 anye tu virakta citte abhyudaya hetu tve ca atas eva iti sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt saṃśayoḥ tu iti vyākhyāya viraktam cittam sarvajña tve bhavet vā pramāṇam iti apratikṣepaḥ tat ca pramāṇam dvitīye paricchede abhidhā asyate iti vyācakṣate yatas eva vyavahitasya api kārya utpattiḥ tat tasmāt atra eva atīndriyeṣu madhye keṣāṃcid arthānām svabhāvānām ca iti yadi api pāṭha kramaḥ tathā api yathāyogam sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_376,3–376,5	 keṣāṃcid svabhāvanām abhyudaya hetu ādīnām bhavet jñāpakā siddhiḥ katham darśana pāṭava abhāvāt tad viṣayasya anubhavasya yathā gṛhīta svarūpa niścaya utpādane sāmarthya abhāvāt keṣāṃcid arthānām virakta citta tva ādīnām pratyakṣa anumāna lakṣaṇam kāryam jñāpakantasya abhāvāt tathābhūtasya kāryasya kasmāt abhāvaḥ iti āha kāraṇānām ityādi na hi kāraṇaiḥ avaśyam ātma jñāpa kaṅkāryam sarva puruṣa grāhyam ārabdhavyam iti niyamaḥ anye tu anyathā vyācakṣate keṣām cit svabhāvānām abhyudaya hetu vādinām arthānām ca virakta citta ādīnām bhavet jñāpakasya niścāyakasya pramāṇasya asiddhiḥ kutas darśana pāṭava abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_376,6	 etat uktam bhavati darśanam eva jñāpakam kasyacid arthasya tat ca āpaṭu tvāt sarva ākāra niścayat na utpādayati kāraṇānām ca kārya utpādana niyama abhāvaḥ tena anantara kārya adarśanāt kārya dvāreṇa api abhyudaya hetu tvat na śakyam niṣeddhum tathā atīndriyāṇām arthānām darśanasya manaḥ vijñāna lakṣaṇasya apāṭavāt pratyakṣeṇa agrahaṇam na hi kārya dvāreṇa eṣām niścayaḥ kāraṇānām ca kārya utpādana niyama abhāvāt na hi kāraṇaiḥ avaśyam ātma jñāpakam kāryam santāna antare janayitavyam iti niyamaḥ tasmāt na pratyakṣam na anumānam teṣām asti 
PVVṬ_376,7	 neyata iti yathā ukta jñāpaka abhāva mātreṇa tad abhāva uti indriyāṇām abhāvaḥ yasmāt pratyakṣa anumānābhyām anupalabdhānām api keṣāṃcid arthānām punar api paryāyeṇa krameṇa kuḍya vivara avasthitānām arthānām pratyakṣeṇa anumānena abhivyakteḥ pratīteḥ tat evam viprakṛṣṭe svabhāva anupalambhaḥ na asattā sādhanam na api kārya anupalambhaḥ 
PVVṬ_377,1–377,3	 kāraṇa anupalambhaḥ tu tatra api abhāva sādhanam iti āha kārye tu ityādi kārye tu svabhāva ādi viprakarṣiṇī api kāraka ajñānam kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ abhāvasya sādhanam eva svabhāva ityādinā vyācaṣṭe viprakṛṣṭa viṣayasya svabhāvasya abhāve sādhya īsvabhāva anupalambhaḥ eva apramāṇam ucyate kāraṇa anupalambhaḥ tu pramāṇam eva nanu viprakṛṣṭa viṣaye kāraṇa anupalambhaḥ eva niścetum aśakyaḥ tat katham kārya abhāvam sādhayet sattyam etāvat vaktum śakyate kāraṇam antareṇa anuddiṣṭa viṣaye kāryam avaśyam na bhavati itīyatā leśena asya upanyāsaḥ atas eva sāmānyena āha na hi asti ityādi 
PVVṬ_377,4	 nanu ityādi paraḥ agneḥ vināśepi vāsa grṛha ādau dhūmasya darśanāt tathā ca asati api kāraṇe kāryam dṛṣṭam iti vyabhicāraḥ asati kāraṇe kāryat na syāt iti anena vākyena kāraṇa sthiti kāla bhāvi kāryam yāvat kāraṇa sattā tāvat kārya sattā iti evat na brūmaḥ yena kāraṇa nāśepī iti ādikaḥ prasaṃgaḥ syāt kintarhi anena vākyena ucyate iti āha hetuḥ ahita ityādi 
PVVṬ_377,5	 evantā vat sthira tām abhyupagamya uktam kṣaṇika tve tu kāraṇe vinaṣṭe kāryaṃsthānam eva na asti iti kutas vyabhicāra āśaṃkā tathā hi yogni janyaḥ dhūma kṣaṇaḥ tasya agni vināśe na asti eva avasthānam kṣaṇika tvena vināśāt yaḥ ca paścāt sthāyī dhūmaḥ sa dhūma hetukaḥ eva na agni hetukaḥ tat eva darśayan= āha na ca tathā ityādi tathā sthāyī iti naṣṭepya ādye kāraṇe kāla antara sthāyī tad upādānaḥ pūrva niruddha hetu upādānaḥ 
PVVṬ_377,6	 kathantarhi pāścātyā upi dhūma ugni hetukaḥ iti ucyate iti āha pāramparya ityādi ādi antā vat dhūma kṣaṇam vahniḥ eva janayati sa dhūma kṣaṇaḥ aparam sopya param iti evam pāramparyeṇa etat eva sphuṭayan= āha santāna upakārāt iti prabandhasya prathamatas jananāt tad kārya vyapadeśaḥ tasmāt yasya kāraṇasya pāścātyam api kāryam iti evam vyapadeśaḥ yadi asya hetoḥ kathaṃcid pramāṇena abhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā tad phalantasya hetoḥ phalat na asti iti niścīyate 
PVVṬ_378,1–378,3	 etat ca uddiṣṭa viṣayasya abhāvasya sādhanam abhipretya uktam anuddiṣṭa viṣaye tu na etat pramāṇam pratibandha phala tvāt svabhāva ityādi arthasya iti vyāpakasya svabhāve avyatirikte liṅginya sattvena sādhye svabhāva anupalambhaḥ ca vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ ca abhāvasya sādhanam iti prakṛtam svabhāva abhāva ityādinā vyācaṣṭe kaścid iti vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ yadi anupalabhyamānaḥ vyāpakaḥ svabhāvosya vyāpyasya siddhaḥ syāt tadā bhavet pramāṇam kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ ca bhavet pramāṇam yadi tad abhāvaḥ tayoḥ kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ abhāvaḥ pratīyeta hetunā kenacid svabhāva anupalambha ākhyena 
PVVṬ_378,4–379,1	 yadi ityādinā kā ri kā rtha mā āha yadi asya kārakasya abhāvaḥ siddhyet iti sambandhaḥ vyāpakasya ca svabhāvasya abhāvaḥ kutaścid gamakāt hetoḥ iti upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalambhāt soyam kārakaḥ vyāpakaḥ vā asan= eva siddhaḥ yathākramam kāryam vyāpyañca nivarttayati tad abhāva asiddhau kāraka vyāpakayoḥ abhāva asiddhau nivarttyepi kārye vyāpye ca saṃśayāt yadi svabhāva abhāve sādhye tad anupalambhaḥ eva apramāṇam ucyate katham idānīmbhāvasya ghaṭa ādeḥ svayam anupalabdheḥ abhāva siddhiḥ
