PVVṬ_379,2	 uttaram āha dṛśyasya ityādi viprakṛṣṭe viṣaye svabhāva anupalambhe pramāṇam uktam na tu dṛśya viṣayaḥ iti arthaḥ dṛśyasya iti svabhāva ādya viprakṛṣṭasya bhāvasya anupalabdhasyasataḥ bhāvasya sattāyāḥ abhāvaḥ pratīyate kadā darśana abhāva kāraṇā sambhave sati darśana abhāvasya kāraṇam kāraṇa antarāṇām vaikalyantasya asambhave sati upalambha pratyaya antarasākalye sati iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_379,3–379,5	 bhāvaḥ hi ityādi viraṇam svabhāva ādya viprakṛṣṭaḥ bhāvaḥ yadi bhavet yathāsva grāhakeṇa karaṇena iti yasya yat grāhakam indriyantena upalabhyaḥ eva bhavet saḥ iti yathā uktaḥ bhāvaḥ darśana prapibandhiṣu vyavadhāna ādiṣu ādi śabdāt vaikalya pratibandha ādiṣu asatsu upalambha pratyayeṣu satsu iti yāvat tathā bhūta unupalabdhaḥ tvasan= iti niścīyate kiṅkāraṇam tādṛśaḥ sataḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya sataḥ upalambha avi abhicārāt yaḥ eva ayam svabhāvasya abhāva niścaye dṛśyasya darśana ityādinā uktaḥ ayam eva hetuḥ veditavyaḥ kasmin sādhye hetu vyāpakayoḥ abhāvepi sādhye viruddhasya ca ityādi yasya abhāva ssādhyaḥ tena yaḥ viruddhaḥ tasya upalabdhau casyāt asattāyāḥ pratiṣedhya abhāvasya niścayaḥ kiṅkāraṇam viruddhasya bhāvasya bhāve sattāya antat bhāva bādhanāt tasya niṣedhya abhimatasya sattā bādhanāt 
PVVṬ_379,6	 yaḥ hi ityādi vivaraṇam kasmāt na avatiṣṭhate iti āha tat ityādi tayoḥ viruddhayoḥ ye upādāne tayoḥ anyonyam parasparam yat vaiguṇyantasya āśraya tvena yathā śīta upādānam uṣṇa upādāna vaiguṇyasya āśrayaḥ itaraḥ ca itarasya iti arthaḥ tena kāraṇena viruddhayoḥ ekatra yugapad ārambha virodhāt tayoḥ viruddhayoḥ ekasya bhāvepi anyābhāva gatiḥ bhavati yathā uktam prāc anupalabdhi prabhede na śīta sparśotra agneḥ ityādi yadi api atrānupalabdhiḥ iti na śrūyate tathā api idam svabhāvaviruddha ākhyam liṅgam anupalabdhessakāśāt na pṛthak ucyate kiṃṅkāraṇam tatas eva anupalambhāt virodha gateḥ virodhāt ca abhāva sādhanāt iti uktam 
PVVṬ_380,1–380,4	 bhavatu nāma evamvidhāyāḥ dṛśya anupalabdheḥ sakāśāt bhāva gatiḥ sā punar katham anumānam na eva anumānam kintu pramāṇa antaram eva iti bhāvaḥ kathat na syāt ityā cā ryaḥ dṛṣṭānta ityādi paraḥ dṛṣṭānta apekṣam hi anumānam anvaya vyatirekavat tvāt dṛṣṭānta apekṣaṇam eva āha na hi iti asyām iti anupalabdhau kinnetyācā ryaḥ 
PVVṬ_380,5	 tat ityādi paraḥ tat vyoma kusuma ādi asat iti katham kena pramāṇena avagantavyam yena evam syāt dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt anapalabdheḥ eva liṅgāt vyoma kusuma ādi asat avagantavyam iti ced tatra iti vyoma kusuma ādau katham adṛṣṭāntikā dṛṣṭānta ra hitā asattā siddhiḥ sa dṛṣṭānta tve vā anavasthā prasaṃgaḥ iti tatra api aparopī iti kṛtvā tathā ca iti anavasthāyām satyām sādhyasya apratipattiḥ yatas ca dṛṣṭānta tvena vasthā doṣaḥ tasmāt nirupākhya abhāva siddhiḥ adṛṣṭāntikā karttavyā tadvat anyatra api na iha ghaṭonupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdheḥ iti ādau= api prayoge dṛṣṭānta anapekṣaṇāt ananumānam anupalabdhiḥ 
PVVṬ_380,6^1	 śrṛṇvan= apītyā cā ryaḥ asakṛt uktam etat yathā svabhāva anupalabdhau na abhāvaḥ sādhyate kintva bhāva vyavahāraḥ iti śrṛṇvan= api devānām mūrkhāṇām priyaḥ na avadhāraṇa sati api dṛṣṭānte tat asiddhiḥ codyate dṛṣṭāntam eva darśayitum upakramate nimittam hi ityādi upalabhya anupalabdhiḥ dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ yā nimittam kāraṇam asa dvaya vahārāṇām sā iti anupalabdhiḥ sva sannidhānāt ātma sannidhānāt sva nimittān svam anupalabdhi rūpam nimittam yeṣa antān etān asat vyavahārān sādhayati iti kṛtvā sarvotra dṛṣṭāntaḥ kiṃbhūtaḥ sva nimitta sāmagrī yogya sannidhānaḥ sva kāraṇānām sāmagrī tasyām yogyam sannidhānam yasya aṅkura ādeḥ sa tathā uktaḥ prayogaḥ punar 
PVVṬ_380,6^2	 yasya yatra nimittam sakalam apratibadvam asti tatra tena bhavitavyantat yathā aṅkura ādi asti ca upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhau= asat vyavahārāṇām nimitta tvam iti svabhāva hetuḥ kasmāt atra abhāva vyavahāraḥ eva sādhyate na punar abhāvaḥ eva iti āha asatta ityādi atra dṛśya anupalabdhau= anupalabdhiḥ eva asattā yathā uktam prāk tasmāt abhāvaḥ na sādhyate yatas eva atra abhāva vyavahāraḥ sādhyate atas eva iyam anupalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetau= antarbhavati iti sambandhaḥ kāraṇāt dṛśya anupalambhāt kāryasya asat vyavahārasya anumānam tat eva lakṣaṇam yasya iti sāmānyena anya padārtham upadarśya paścāt bhāva pratyayaḥ samagrāt kāraṇāt kārya anumāne ca yogyatā anumānam iti svabhāva hetau= antarbhāvaḥ vakṣyāmaḥ caturthe paricchede 
PVVṬ_381,1	 dṛśya anupalabdhau bhavatu dṛṣṭāntaḥ adṛśya anupalabdhau tum katham iti āha sat śabdā ityādi deśa ādi viprakṛṣṭa iṣu pramāṇa nivṛttyā sat vyavahāra niṣedhe sādhye kāraṇa abhāvāt kāryasya abhāvaḥ sādhyaḥ tena atra na kevalat nirupākhyam dṛṣṭāntaḥ kintu nimittasya kāraṇasya vaikalyena ābhāvinā uṅkurāt ayopi dṛṣṭāntaḥ prayogaḥ tu yat vikala kāraṇantan na bhavati yathā bīja rahita uṅkuraḥ vikala kāraṇaḥ ca adṛśya anupalabdhau sat vyavahāraḥ iti kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ 
PVVṬ_381,2	 yat punaruktam tat asannirupākhyam katham pratipattavyam iti tatra api nirupākhyedṛṣṭānte iyam evam ajñāna vyavahāra lakṣaṇā pravṛttiḥ niṣidhyate anupalabdhitaḥ na tu abhāvaḥ sādhyate kiṅkāraṇam anupalabdhi ityādi viṣāṇa ādi vivikta śaśa mastaka ādi upalabdhiḥ eva anupalabdhiḥ paryudāsa vṛttyā sā eva lakṣaṇam yasyāḥ śaśa viṣāṇa asattāyāḥ sā siddhā eva 
PVVṬ_382,1–382,2	 syāt etat adṛśya anupalabdhau= asattve viṣaya bhūte siddhe tad nimitta upya sat vyavahāraḥ siddhaḥ eva iti kintena asat vyavahāreṇa adṛśya anupalabdhau= api sat vyavahāra nimittasya abhāvāt vyavahāra apravṛttiḥ siddhā eva iti sat vyavahāra niṣedhena api sādhitena kim tathā pūrva prasiddha viṣaya upadarśana lakṣaṇena dṛṣṭāntena api anupalabdhau na kiṃcid prayojanam iti atas āha soyam ityādi mūḍham pratyetat sādhyate iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_382,3	 kvacid api asat vyavahāra nimittam dṛśya anupalambham abhyupagamya asat vyavahāra pravṛttim vilomayan= akurvan adṛśya anupalabdhau tad abhāvam ca sat vyavahāra nimittasya pramāṇasya abhāvam ca abhyupagamya sat vyavahāra nivṛttim ca vilomayan= akurvan yathā abhyupagamam pratipādyate iti dṛśyānupalambhena nimittena tvayā asat vyavahāra unyatra kṛtaḥ tat iha api asti tasmāt asat vyavahāraṅ kuru iti pratipādyate tathā pramāṇena nimittena tvayā kvacid sat vyavahāraḥ kṛtaḥ tat iha api anirupākhye na asti tasmāt sat vyavāhāram mā kuru iti pratipādyate kim iva nirupākhya vat yathā śaśa viṣāṇa ādau= asat vyavahāra nimittasya dṛśya anupalambhasya bhāvāt asat vyavahāraḥ tathā iha api iti 
PVVṬ_382,4–382,5	 anyat vā iti yathā sannihita nimittasyā aṅkura ādeḥ pratipattiḥ eva sat vyavahārasya api iti yathā ca nirupākhye pramāṇa abhāvāt sat vyavahārasya nivṛttiḥ anyasmin vā kāraṇa vikale kārye nivṛttiḥ tadvat viprakṛṣṭeṣu sat vyavahārasya nivṛttiḥ iti pratipādyate saḥ eva tāvat upalabdhi abhāva unupalabdhi ākhyaḥ katham kena pramāṇena siddhaḥ na pratyakṣeṇa abhāva viṣaya tva virodhāt na api anumānena pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt asya na api pradeśa sambandhī anupalambhaḥ abhāvasya nīrūpa tvena sambandhi tva ayogāt pradeśasya anupalambhe ca dharmma siddheḥ āśraya asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti anupalabdheḥ na pakṣa dharma tvam iti udyaḥ ta kaḥ ra prabhṛtayaḥ 
PVVṬ_382,6–383,1	 atra āha etat uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ tad viśiṣṭa upalambhaḥ atas tasya api anupalambhanantasmāt anupalambhoyam pratyakṣeṇa eva siṃdhyati iti yat punaruktam anupalabdhau kindṛṣṭa anta upadarśanena iti āha anyatra api ityādi vidhi sādhanepyanumāne sādhya dharmeṇa vyāpakena vyāpya dharmam kṛtaka tva ādikam sādhanam icchan pratipādyaḥ kim iti dṛṣṭāntena pratyāyyaḥ kiṅkāraṇam yathāsvam sādhyena vyāpyasya hetoḥ nirdeśāt eva vyāpnuvataḥ sādhya dharmasya siddheḥ niścita artha ssambandha lakṣaṇaḥ yena tasya vyāmūḍham prati smṛti arthaḥ tat etat dṛṣṭāntena mūḍham prati smṛti jananam atra anupalabdhau etat eva āha soyam ityādi anyatra api iti śaśaviṣāṇa ādau atha yat idam ācārya di gnāḥ ga prabhṛtibhiḥ uktam na santi pradhānāt ayonupalabdheḥ iti tatra prayoge ā cā ryaḥ āha katham ca na syāt iti 
PVVṬ_383,2	 ca udakaḥ sva abhiprāyeṇa āha tad artha ityādi tad arthasya pradhāna arthasya niṣedhe sati pradhāna ādi dharmi vācinā ubhidhānasya aprayogāt na hi vācyam antareṇa vācakasya prayoga usti yadā ca pradhāna ādi śabdānāmaprayogaḥ tadā na santi iti pratiṣedha vāci ā iva śabdaḥ vaśiṣyate tasya ca pratiṣedhya asaṃkīrttane nirviṣayasya pratiṣedhasya iti pratiṣedha vācinaḥ śabdasya aprayogāt tathā ca na santi pradhāna ādayaḥ iti dvayoḥ api pratijñāpadayoḥ aprayogāt kutra kim sādhyate iti vyartha anupalabdheḥ sādhana yogaḥ pradhāna ādīnām ca pakṣa bhūtānām abhāvāt pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ syāt pratijñāpadayoḥ vā parasparam virodhaḥ tathā hi pradhāna ādayaḥ iti prayogāt tad artha sannidhānam punar na santi iti vacanāt teṣām asannidhānam ete ca sannidhāna āsat nidhāne yugapad ekatra virudhyete 
PVVṬ_384,1	 na eṣa doṣaḥ iti parihāraḥ yasmāt anādeḥ vāsanāyāḥ samudbhūte vikalpe pariniṣṭhitassamāruḍhaḥ śabda arthaḥ sa ca bhāva abhāva ubhayāśrita tvāt trividhaḥ dharmmaḥ tasmin śabderthe bāhya pradhāna ādikaḥ bhāvonupādānam asya iti tasmin bhāvānupādāne sādhye asya iti buddhi parivarttinaḥ pradhāna ādi dharmiṇaḥ tathā iti bāhya pradhāna ādi upādāna tvena anupalambhanam hetuḥ vāsanā upādāna tvena upalambhanam eva atra anupalambhanam na tasya eva vikalpa pratiniṣṭhitasya dharmiṇaḥ abhāvassādhyate kasmāt pradhāna ādi śabdānāṃprayogataḥ tad niṣedhe hi nirviṣaya tvāt śabda prayogaḥ eva na syāt 
PVVṬ_384,2	 niveditam ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yadi hi sva lakṣaṇam abhidheyam syāt tadā sva lakṣaṇa pratiṣedhe śabda arthasya pratiṣedhāt tad vācinaḥ śabdasya aprayogaḥ syāt yāvatā niveditam etat yathā ete śabdāḥ na sva lakṣaṇa viṣayāḥ iti kintu ana ādi va āsanāyāḥ prabhava autpādaḥ yasya vikalpasya tasmin pratibhāsī yortha ḥ tam viṣaya tvena ātmasāt kurvanti 
PVVṬ_384,3–384,4	 kutas etat vikalpa viṣayam eva artham viṣayīkurvanti iti āha vaktuḥ tad vikalpa bhājā eti bhāva abhāva ubhayāśraya sāmānya ākāra vikalpa bhājaḥ kāraṇam āha yathā ityādi yathā pratibhāsi vastu pratibhāsivaḥ tu anatikrameṇa yā pratipādana samīhā tayā śabda prayogāt tasmāt vikalpa pratibhāsinaḥ eva arthān śabdāḥ viṣayīkurvanti tathā śrotuḥ ca tad vikalpa bhājaḥ iti sambandhaḥ kim kāraṇam tad ākāra vikalpa jananāt bhāva abhāva ubhayāśraya sāmānya ākāra vikalpa jananāt ca vikalpa pratibhāsinaḥ eva arthān śabdāḥ viṣayīkurvanti 
PVVṬ_384,5	 syāt etat yadi nāma evantathā api kathat na sva lakṣaṇa viṣayā śabdāḥ sva lakṣaṇa pratīteḥ iti āha na ca ityādi upādānam ca kāryam ca te eva pratyayaḥ jñānantatra apratibhāsi yad rūpantad viṣaya tvena tat na śakyat niścetum tatra upādāna pratyayaḥ vaktuḥ pratipādana samīhā rūpaḥ vikalpaḥ śabdasya kāraṇa tvāt kārya pratyayaḥ śabda utthaḥ śrotuḥ vikalpaḥ na hi sa śabda arthaḥ yaḥ śabde pratyaye na pratibhāsate na ca tatra sva lakṣaṇam pratibhāsate spaṣṭa ākāra vivekāt 
PVVṬ_385,1–385,2	 nanu katham vikalpa abhā= a āśrayaḥ artha janya tvena avikalpaka tva prasaṃgāt kathañca abhāva āśrayaḥ abhāvasya akāraṇa tvāt kathañca ekaḥ ubhaya āśrayaḥ ahetuka tva prasaṅgāt iti atas āha sa tu ityādi sat asat ubhaya ākāraḥ vikalpaḥ sat asat ubhaya pratyayaḥ tena āhitāḥ vāsanā tatas prabhavaḥ utpādaḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ iti hetoḥ bhāva abhāva ubhaya dharmaḥ iti ucyate dvitīyam kāraṇam āha tat ityādi tasmin= eva vikalpe pratibhāsī yaḥ ākāraḥ tasya sat asat ubhaya rūpa tayā adhyavasāyaḥ tad vaśena ca bhāva abhāva ubhaya dharmaḥ iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_385,3	 etat uktam bhavati sat pratyaya ahita vāsanā prabhava ssat ākāra adhyavasāyī iva bhāva dharmaḥ iti ucyate evam abhāva ubhaya dharmayoḥ api draṣṭavyam pūrva pūrva sat ādi pratyaya āhita vāsanā prabhava tvāt eva sat ādi vikalpānām anādi tvam atas na bhāva ādi janya tvam yatas ca śabda arthaḥ trividhaḥ tat tasmāt atra śabda arthe dharmiṇi vyavasthitāḥ vivāda āśraya tvena sthitāḥ puruṣāssat asattvam pradhāna ādeḥ cintayanti katham cintayanti iti āha kim ayam pradhāna śabdāt uccaritāt vikalpa pratibhāsamāna ūrthaḥ bāhya pradhāna nibandhanaḥ bhavati na vā iti tasya pradhāna ādi vikalpa pratibhāsasya bhāvānupādāna tve dharme sādhye vikalpa pratibhāsaḥ buddhi svabhāva tayā pratyātma vedya tvāt sva samvedana pratyakṣa siddha tvāt apratikṣepa arha ūrthaḥ dharmī 
PVVṬ_385,4	 nanu ca saḥ eva vikalpa grāhya arthaḥ sva lakṣaṇam sva lakṣaṇa rūpa tayā adhyavasāyāt tatas ca pratyakṣa siddhaḥ eva pradhāna ādiḥ śabdaḥ ca sva lakṣaṇa viṣayaḥ iti āha na ca saḥ eva ityādi saḥ eva vikalpa pratibhāsi arthaḥ bāhyam sva lakṣaṇam iti śakyam vaktum kiṃkāraṇam asaṃprāpte anutpanne sva lakṣaṇe niruddhe ca tasya vikalpa pratibhāsasya anapāyāt kim ca vastuni ghaṭa ādau viparīta ākāraḥ paraspara virodhinaḥ nityān ityādayaḥ tān abhiniveṣṭum śīlam yeṣān tīrtha antarīya pratyayānānteṣa bhāvāt śavda artha pratibhāsasya na ca saḥ eva arthaḥ sva lakṣaṇam iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_386,1	 amum eva artham saṃgrahītum āha parama arthaḥ sva lakṣaṇantasmin= eka sthānaḥ pravṛttiḥ yeṣān tadbhāvaḥ tattvantasmin sati śabdānām anibandhanā parama artha nibandhana rahitā pravṛttiḥ na syāt darśana antara bhinneṣu artheṣu siddhānta bheda bhinneṣu atīta ajātayoḥ vā api iti atītāna gate ca arthe śabdānām pravṛttiḥ na syāt tathā kasyāścid vācaḥ mṛṣārtha tā na syāt iti yathā uktāt hetoḥ eṣā vāc bauddha artha viṣayāḥ vikalpa pratibhāsi artha viṣayā matā 
PVVṬ_386,2–386,3	 tasya ca iti pradhāna ādi vikalpa pratibhāsasya yathāsamīhitam rūpam yathā parikalpitambāhya pradhāna ādi rūpantad anupādāna tve sādhye tathā anupalambhaḥ iti yathā samīhita rūpa upādāna tvena anupalambha uḥ ti iti kṛtvā na sādhana dharma asiddhiḥ na apakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti arthaḥ na punar atra prayoge ayam eva śabda ityādi śabdāt utpadyate yaḥ vikalpaḥ tad pratibhāsi artha upahanūyate kim kāraṇam tasya vikalpa pratibhāsi arthasya śrotṛ buddhau= upasthāpanāya śabda prayogāt tad abhāve vikalpa pratibhāsi artha abhāve tad ayogāt śabda prayoga ayogāt 
PVVṬ_387,1–387,2	 api ca yadi śabta arthasya vā apahnavaḥ sādhyate tadā śabda artha apahnave sādhye tasya sādhya dharmasya nāstitvasya yaḥ ādhāraḥ dharmī śabda artha lakṣaṇaḥ tasya nirākṛteḥ na sādhyaḥ dharmi dharma ātmakaḥ samudāyaḥ syāt kevalaḥ ca sādhya dharma ssiddhaḥ eva nāstitva mātrasya kvacid siddha tvāt yadi ityādi vivaraṇam tat iti tasmāt ayam sādhya dharmaḥ ādhāreṇa yaḥ vyavacchedaḥ viśeṣaṇam asya idam na astitvantat anapekṣaḥ iti hetoḥ na upanyasanīyaḥ eva vivāda kāle 
PVVṬ_387,3–387,4	 sat asat pakṣa bhedena iti sat asat pratijñā bhedena vastu eva cintyate śabda arthānapavādibhiḥ athaṃkriyā arthibhiḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ yasmāt atra vastuni pratibaddhaḥ phala udayaḥ yadi nāma evantathā api kinna śabda arthaḥ vicāraṇīyaḥ iti āha artha ityādi artha kriyām pratyasamarthasya śabda arthasya vicāraiḥ sat asattva vicāraiḥ kinta dadarthinām artha kriyā arthinām nidarśanam āha ṣaṇḍhasya ityādi puṃstva rahitasya yat rūpa vairūpyantasmin viṣaye kāminyāḥ maithuna abhilāṣiṇyāḥ kimparīkṣayā 
PVVṬ_387,5–388,1	 na hi ityādi vivaraṇam na hi śabda arthaḥ asan kaṃcid puruṣa artham uparuṇaddhi nivarttayati san vā samādadhāti karoti iti yathāyogam sambandhanīyam kim kāraṇam yathā abhiniveśam puruṣaḥ tam śabda arthambāhyatayā abhiniviśate adhyavasyati tathā tasya avidyamāna tvāt yathātattvam vā samīhita tvāt yathārtha sva lakṣaṇam jñāna sva lakṣaṇam vā sthitan tathā śabdena aviṣayīkṛta tvāt yatas evantasmāt ayam puruṣa ssat asat cintāyām pravarttamānaḥ sarvadā avadhīrita vikalpa pratibhāsaḥ a napa īkṣita vikalpa pratibhāsaḥ vastu eva adhiṣṭhānīkaroti viṣayīkaroti yatravastunī ayam puruṣa arthaḥ pratibaddhaḥ agnau= iti agni sva lakṣaṇe ādi grahaṇāt dāha pāka ādi 
PVVṬ_388,2	 syāt etat īdṛśorthaḥ śabda arthena api sādhyate iti āha na hi ityādi atra iti śīta pratighāta ādau kasmāt tad anubhava āptau= api tasya śabda arthasya anubhava āptau= api tad abhāvāt tasya śīta pratīkāra ādeḥ abhāvāt tat tasmāt ayam artha kriyā arthī puruṣaḥ tat asamarthantasyām artha kriyā āyām asamartham śabda artham prati datta anuyogaḥ datta avadhānaḥ bhavitun na yuktaḥ na hi vṛṣasyantī maithunam icchantī ṣaṇḍhasya paricaritum aśaktasya rūpa vairūpya parīkṣāyām avadhat te avadhānavatī bhavati 
PVVṬ_388,3–388,4	 u dyaḥ te kaḥ rā dyukta dūṣaṇa nirāsa artham pṛcchati yat punar etat uktam ācārya di gnāḥ gena kalpitasya ityādi tasya korthaḥ uttaram āha śabda arthaḥ ityādi kalpanā jñāna viṣaya tvāt śabda arthaḥ pradhāna ādi śabda arthaḥ kalpitaḥ vastunaḥ bāhyasya pradhāna lakṣaṇasya āśraya ṇantena asiddhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ asya pradhāna ādi śabda arthasya dharmaḥ uktaḥ liṅga bhūtaḥ bhāvān upādāna tve sādhye nyāya vādinā ācārya di gnāḥ ge na 
PVVṬ_389,1–389,2	 tena yat ucyate u dyaḥ te kaḥ rā dibhiḥ yadi pramāṇena pradhānam sattvena kalpitam katham asya anupalabdhiḥ ddharmaḥ pratīyate atha asattvena kalpitam pradhānantathā api katham asya anupalabdhiḥ dharmaḥ asattvāt iti tad apāstam yasmāt kalpanā jñāna viṣaya tvāt śabda arthaḥ eva kalpitaḥ na tu pramāṇena bāhyam pradhānam sattvena kalpitam tasya iti pradhāna śabda arthasya bāhya pradhāna vastu āśrayaṇa anulambhaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ ācārya di gnāḥ ga sya 
PVVṬ_389,3–389,4	 yat uktam ityādi paraḥ pramāṇa trayam pratyakṣa anumāna āgama lakṣaṇam anya pramāṇa nivṛttau= iti pratyakṣa anumāna nivṛttau nivṛttiḥ deśa ādi viprakṛṣṭānām tayoḥ iti pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ na kiñcada vyāpnoti sarvam eva viṣayīkaroti tad ninivṛttiḥ āgama nivṛttiḥ uktam atra iti si ddhā nta vā dī aprakaraṇa āpanna tvāt iti puruṣa artha cintā praprastāva anupayogi tvāt śāstra adhikāra asambandhāḥ bahava ūrthāḥ iti atra antare ukta tvāt 
PVVṬ_389,5–389,7	 etat ca bāhyeṣu āgamasya prāmāṇyam abhyupagamya uktam adhunā na eva bāhyerthasya prāmāṇyam iti āha api ca ityādi vastubhissva lakṣaṇaiḥ saha śabdān āntarīyaka tāyāḥ avinā abhāvasya abhāvāt tebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ na artha siddhiḥ na bāhya vastu niścayaḥ yasmāt te hi vaktrabhiprāya sūcakāḥ yadi api ghaṭa vivakṣātaḥ paṭa śabdasya utpattiḥ tathā api sthāna karaṇa abhighāta ādeḥ eva sākṣāt karaṇāt tat utpatteḥ vyabhicāra abhāva anna ahetuka tvam yaḥ ca ghaṭa vivakṣā janyam ghaṭa śabdam avadhārayati tasya paṭa śabdāt paṭa vivakṣa anumā anantadava dhāraṇam ca prakaraṇa ādinā lokasya vidyate eva iti vivakṣā anumāne avyabhicāraḥ eva 
PVVṬ_390,1	 yathābhāvam yathāsva lakṣaṇam yatas iti yathābhāvam pravṛtteḥ śabdebhyortha prakṛtiḥ artha svabhāvaḥ niścīyeta te hi iti śabdāḥ vivakṣayā vṛttiḥ yeṣa ante tathā uktāḥ tatra āntarīyakāḥ vivakṣānāntarīyakāḥ tām eva vivakṣām sā eva vivakṣā sva lakṣaṇam antareṇa na bhavati atosti eva śabdānām artha avyabhicāraḥ iti āha na ca ityādi yathārtham yathāvastu bhavitum śīlam yāsa antāḥ tathā uktāḥ kṣīṇa doṣasya kṛpāloḥ yatha artha bhāvinī sarvāḥ iti āha arthe apratibaddhopi śabda artham gamayiṣyati iti ced āha na ca ityādi tasmin vastuni apratibaddhaḥ svabhāvaḥ yasya śabda lakṣaṇasya anyam yatra asau na pratibaddhaḥ 
PVVṬ_390,2	 yadi bāhye vastuni śabdasya na asti prāmāṇyam yat tarhi idam āpta vāda avisamvāda sāmānyāt yaḥ yaḥ āpta vādaḥ saḥ avisamvādī yathā kṣaṇikāḥ sarve saṃskārāḥ iti ādikaḥ āptavādaḥ ca ayam atyanta parokṣepi arthe tasmāt ayam api avisamvādī iti evam āpta vādasya avisamvāda sāmānyāt avisamvādi tvāt anumāna tā iti āgamasya bāhyerthenu māna tvam uktam ācārya di gnāḥ ge na 
PVVṬ_390,3	 tat katham iti anena abhyupeta bādhām āha na ayam ityādinā pariharati etat kathayati na ācāryeṇa bhāvikam prāmāṇyam kathayatā anumāna tvam āgamasya uktam api tu puruṣa pravṛttim apekṣya yasmāt na ayampuruṣaḥ pravṛtti kāmaḥāgama prāmāṇyam anāśritya asitum samarthaḥ kiṅkāraṇam pratyakṣam parokṣam phalam yeṣa anteṣām keṣāṃcid pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ iti yathāyogam sambandhaḥ hiṃsā ādi cetanā viṣayāṇām nivṛtteḥ svarga ādi phala tvena mahā anuśaṃsā śravaṇāt hiṃsā cetanā viśeṣāṇām pravṛtteḥ naraka ādi phala tvena mahā pāpa śravaṇa tvāt na ca atra vastu bala pravṛttam anyat pramāṇam sādhakam asti yena āgamam anapekṣyāni atas pramāṇampravartteta 
PVVṬ_390,4–391,1	 na api bādhakam asti yatas nivartteta bādhaka abhāvam eva āha tad bhāvaḥ iti yathā uktābhyām pravṛtti nivṛttibhyām iṣṭa aniṣṭasya phalasya bhāve virodha adarśanāt ca icchati ca ayam āgama vaśena pravarttitum tat sati pravarttitavye  varam evam āgamamparīkṣya pravṛttaḥ iti āgamasya parīkṣayā prāmāṇya māhā cā ryaḥ na ca sarvam śāstram parīkṣayā adhikṛtam kintu tat ca ityādi śāstram padārthānāmparaspara sambandhāt sambaddham anuguṇaḥ sādhayitum śakyaḥ phala sādhana upāyaḥ yasmin= tad anuguṇa upāyam sambaddham ca tad anuguṇa upāyam ca iti viśeṣaṇa samāsaḥ evam bhūtam api yadi puruṣa artha abhidhāya kanta dā parīkṣā adhikṛtam vākyam atas yathā ukta svabhāvāt aparam anyat vākyam anadhikṛtam parīkṣāyām 
PVVṬ_391,2	 sambandhaḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe vākyānām aṅga aṅgi bhāvena ekasmin= arthe vidheya pratiṣedhya lakṣaṇe upasaṃhāraḥ mīlanantena upakāraḥ parasparam vākyānām sambandhaḥ anupakārakaḥ punar keṣām iti āha daśa dāḍima ityādi daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṣ apūpāḥ kuṇḍamaja ajinam palalam iti evamādīni vākyāni na hi eṣām ekārtha upasaṃhāra usti parasparam asambandhāt anayathā iti asambaddha tve vaktuḥ śāstra kārasya vaiguṇyam asambaddha abhidhāyi tvam udbhāvayet aśakya upāyaḥ yeṣām phala anantāni aśakya upāyāni evam bhūtāni phalāni yeṣām śāstrāṇa antāni phala arthī pumān na ādriyeta vicārayitum etat ca anuguṇa upāyam iti etasya vaidharmyeṇa vivaraṇam 
PVVṬ_391,3–391,5	 puruṣa arthaḥ phalam yeṣām śāstrāṇām tāni tathā uktāni tatonyāni apuruṣa artha phalāni tāni ca na ādriyeta vicārayitum aśakya upāya phalasya udāharaṇam viṣa ityādi evam hi asya viṣam śāmyati yadi takṣaka nāga rājasya karṇa avasthitena ratnena alaṅkāraḥ kriyate iti etat ca aśakya sādhanam apuruṣa artha phalasya udāharaṇam kāka danta parīkṣā vat ca iti 
PVVṬ_391,6	 tad viparyayeṇa teṣām yathā uktānān trayāṇām viparyeyeṇa upasaṃhāra vat etena sambaddham iti etat vyākhyātam śakya upāyam iti anena anuguṇa upāyam iti anyatra iti sambandha ādi traya rahite avadhānasya eva iti ādarasya tat iti yathā ukta guṇatraya yuktam śāstraṃparīkṣāyām satyām na visamvāda bhāj bhavati tasmin= avisamvāda bhāji śāstre pravarttamānaḥ puruṣaḥ śobhate 
PVVṬ_392,1–392,2	 kaḥ punar asya śāstrasya avisamvādaḥ iti āha pratyakṣeṇa ityādi prathama urthaḥ śabdaḥ vastu vacanaḥ dvitīyaḥ viṣaya vacanaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭayoḥ vastunoḥ tad arthayoḥ pratyakṣa anumāna viṣayayoḥ yathākramam pratyakṣeṇa anumānena ca dvividhena vastu bala pravṛttena āgama āśritena ca ābādhanam asya śāstrasya avisamvādaḥ pratyakṣa ityādinā vyācaṣṭe śāstre pratyakṣa abhimatānām pratyakṣa tvena upagatānām arthānān tathā bhāvaḥ pratyakṣa bhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa ābādhanam 
PVVṬ_392,3	 yathā ityādinā sva siddhānte pratyakṣa abhimatam artham pañca skandha saṃgṛhītan darśayati nīla ādi iti anena rūpa ādīn pañca viṣayān āha anena ca rūpa skandhaḥ uktaḥ sukha duḥkhe iti ve da nā skandhaḥ nimittasya strī puruṣa ādi cihnasya upalakṣaṇam nimitta upalakṣaṇam anena sam jñā skandhaḥ rāga ādi grahaṇena sam skāḥ ra skandhaḥ ādi śabdāt dveṣa moha ādi parigrahaḥ buddhi grahaṇena vi jñāḥ na skandhaḥ nīla ādi ca sukha duḥkhe ca nimitta upalakṣaṇam ca rāga ādi ca buddhiḥ ca iti dvandvaḥ evam śāstre pratyakṣa abhimatānām pratyakṣa tvam eva nīla ādīnām cakṣuḥ vijñāna ādi pratyakṣa tvāt sukha ādīnām sva samvedana pratyakṣa tvāt atatha abhimatānām ca apratyakṣa abhimatānām ca arthānām apratyakṣatā pratyakṣeṇa avadhānam iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ yathā iti viṣaya upadarśanam śabda ādi rūpeṇa san= iveṣṭum śīlam yeṣām sukha ādīn ā an teṣām apratyakṣatā śabda ādi svabhāvānām sukha duḥkha mohānām pratyakṣeṇa apratīteḥ 
PVVṬ_392,4–393,1	 etat sām khya darśana pratikṣepeṇa uktam vai śe ṣi kā di darśana pratikṣepeṇa āha dravyam dvividham adravyam dravyam yathā ākāśa ādi aneka dravyam ca dravyam yathāvayavi dravyam karma utkṣepaṇa ādikam sāmānyaṃsattā go tva ādikam ādi śabdāt vibhāga ādi parigrahaḥ na hi nīla ādi viṣayam paṃca vyatirekeṇa anyasya pratyakṣatā asti tad vyatirekeṇa anupalabdheḥ vastu bala pravṛttam anumānam anāgama apekṣa anumānam tasya viṣaya tvena abhimatānān tathā bhāva unumāna viṣaya bhāva unumānena ābādhakam catvāri cā rya satyāni uttaratra pratipādayiṣyate ananumeyānān tathā bhāvaḥ ananumeya tvam anumānena ābādhanam yathā ātma ādīnām ādi śabdāt pradhāna īśvara ādi parigrahaḥ na hi eṣām kiñcid liṅgam asti yena anumeyāḥ syuḥ etat api pratipādayiṣyati viśuddhe viṣaya dvaye atyanta parokṣe ca āgama viṣaye paurvāparya virodhena yasmin cintām pravarttayati tasmin= āgama apekṣam anumānam api abādhanam iti prakṛtam 
PVVṬ_393,2	 kīdṛśan tada bādhanam iti āha rāga ādi rūpam rāga dveṣa moha svabhāvam adharmam abhyupagamya tat prabhavam rāga ādi samutthāpitam kāya vākkarma ca adharmam abhyupagapya tad prahāṇāya tasya adharmasya apagamāya snāna agnihotra ādeḥ tīrtha snānena pāpa kṣayaḥ bhavati yam uddiśya agnau ghṛta ādikam hūyate tasya pāpa kṣayaḥ bhavati iti evamādeḥ anupadeśaḥ ādi śabdāt upavāsa ādi parigrahaḥ tathā hi na snāna ādi pāpam apanayati pāpa nidānena rāga ādinā virodha abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_393,3–393,4	 sā iyam anantara ukta apratyakṣeṇa anumānena dvividhena śakya paricchedasya śakya niścayasya aśeṣasya viṣayasya bādhā lakṣaṇāḥ tasyāḥ tāvat asyāḥ visamvādāt sāmānyāt yathā śakya paricchederthe āpta vādasya avisamvādaḥ tathā atyanta parokṣepi āpta vāda tvāt eva tatas ca āpta vāda lakṣaṇāt liṅgāt utpannāyāḥ avisamvāda buddheḥ anumānatā ācārya di gnāge nā bhihitā parokṣepi arthasya gocaraḥ iti atyanta parokṣepyasya śāstrasya gocare viṣaye sāca āgatya abhihita anyena prakāreṇa atyanta parokṣe pravṛtti asambhavāt satyām pravṛttau varam evaṃpravṛttaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_394,1	 tasya ityādi vivaraṇam tasya āgamasya ācārya di gnāḥ ge na nirdiṣṭa anumāna bhāvasya asya iti asma abhissambandhāt anuguṇa upāyam ityādinā vicāritasya atas eva āha evaṃbhūtasya iti sambandha ādi guṇa yuktasya iti arthaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna gamye tasmin vastuni avisamvāda sāmānyāt avisamvāda tvāt kāraṇāt dṛṣṭa vyabhicārasya apavādasya pratyakṣa anumāna āgamyerthe viṣaye āpta vādāt anutpannāyāḥ pratipatteḥ buddheḥ avisamvāda unumīyate kasmāt tad āśraya tvāt āptavāt a āśraya tvam ca ācārya pāramparya upadeśāt siddham tad anya pratipatti vat atyanta parokṣāt anyasmin viṣaye pratyakṣa anumāna viṣaye pratipatti vat tatas yathā uktāt āpta vādāt atyanta parokṣerthe yathā ukta āgama āśritā buddhiḥ śabda prabhavā api satī śabdāt utpannā api śābda vat iti yathā anyaḥ śābdaḥ pratyaya ubhiprāya mātram nivedayati tathā na iyam buddhiḥ abhiprāyam eva nivedayati eva kārasya bhinna krama tvāt 
PVVṬ_394,2–394,3	 kintarhi iṣṭasya pratyakṣa anumāna agamyasya arthasya anantara uktena nyāyena avisamvādāt anumānam api pravṛtti kāmasya puṃsobhi prāya vaśāt vastu tas tu ananumānam śabdānām arthaiḥ saha sambandha abhāvāt asya eva arthasya khyāpana arthaḥ api śabdaḥ prakāra antareṇa āptavāda avisamvādam darśayan= āha athavā ityādi heyam sarvanduḥkham upādeyam sarvaṃkleśa prahāṇat nirvāṇam tayoḥ tattvam aviparītam rūpanduḥkha satyasya nirodha satyasya ca saha upāyena yat varttate heya upādeya tattvantasya upāyam heyasya upāyaḥ sa mu da yaḥ sattyam upādeyasya upādeyaḥ mārga satyam asya heya upādeya tattvasya sa upāyasya bha ga vaḥ ddarśitasya vastu bala āyātena pramāṇena prasiddhitaḥ niścayataḥ kāraṇāt bhagavat vacane sattya catuṣṭaya lakṣaṇasya pradhānasya arthasya avisamvādaḥ sattya catuṣṭaya lakṣaṇa ūrthaḥ pradhānanta dadhigamena nirvāṇa prāpteḥ tasmāt pradhāna artha avisamvādāt bhagavat vacanāt utpannam jñānam paratra api atyanta parokṣa īpī arthenumānam vā śabdaḥ pūrva prakāra apekṣa yā vikalpa arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_395,1	 tayoḥ heya upādeyayoḥ upāyau tad upāyau heyam ca upādeyam ca tad upāyau ca iti dvandvaḥ teṣa an tad upadiṣṭānāntena āptena upadiṣṭānām avaiparītyam anumānena nirūpyamāṇānām avitatha tvam aviṃsam vādaḥ yathā caturṇṇān duḥkha ādīnām ārya satyānām dvitīye paricchede vakṣyamāṇayā nītyā vicāreṇa tasya asya iti bhagavatā pūrva nirddiṣṭasya adhunā vibhakta tvāt asya sa ttya ca tu ṣṭaya lakṣaṇasya kiṃbhūtasya puruṣa artha upayoginaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ nirvāṇam tatra upayogaḥ kāraṇa tvam sa yasya asti tathā atas eva abhiyoga arhasya abhyāsa arhasya avisamvādāt viṣaya antarepi pratyakṣa anumāna agamye tathā tva upagamaḥ iti avisamvāda upagamaḥ na vipralambhāya na visamvādāya bhavati kim kāraṇam anuparodhāt pramāṇena ābādhanāt pradhāne ca sattya catuṣṭaya lakṣaṇerthe puruṣam avisamvādya punar tṛtīye sthāne vaktuḥ niṣprayojanam yat vitathā abhidhā anantasya vaiphalyāt 
PVVṬ_395,2	 kadācid tatra ajñānāt api tathā abhidhānam syāt iti ced āha tat ityādi ubhayathā api iti śloka dvaya nirdiṣṭena prakāreṇa tat etat āgamasya anumāna tvam agatya upavarṇṇitam iti sambandhaḥ anumāna kāraṇa tvāt anumānam iti draṣṭavyam āgamāt pravṛttausatyāmvaram evaṃyuktāt āgamāt pravṛttaḥ na tu pramāṇa gamyaḥ eva arthe visamvādakāt iti 
PVVṬ_395,3–396,1	 na khalu evam uktena api prakāreṇa āgama āśraye jñānam anumānam anapāyam nirdoṣam kasmāt anāntarīyaka tvāt asamvāda tvāt artheṣu śabdānām iti niveditam etat na antarī yaka tā bhāvāt śabdānām vastubhiḥ sahe tyādinā puruṣasya atiśayāḥ kṣīṇa doṣa ādikatvantam apekṣyate yat vacanantat yathārtham apare vādinaḥ viduḥ jānīyuḥ yathārthaṃyathā vastu vyavasthitan tathā eva darśanam jñānam yathārtha darśanam tad ādiḥ yasya kṛpā vairāgya ādeḥ tat yathā artha darśana ādi saḥ eva guṇaḥ tena yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ āptaḥ tena praṇaya nantena āpta vaca nama āgamasya avisamvādaḥ iti anye iṣṭaḥ ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī yoyam anantara ukta ūrthaḥ saḥ iṣṭosmākam kintuśakyeta jñātum puruṣa naiyamyena yotiśayaḥ yathā darśana ādi lakṣaṇasya tu śakyaḥ 
PVVṬ_396,2	 sarve eva ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sarve eva prekṣā pūrva kārī āgamam anāgamamvān veṣateni rūpayati anāgamantyaktvā āgama dvāreṇa pravṛtti kāmaḥ na vyasanena āsakti mātreṇa pravṛtti kāma tām api na ityādinā āha apināmā iti kathat nāma atas iti āgamāt anuṣṭheyam sākṣāt karttavyam artham jñātvā pravṛtta san= arthavān phalavān syāmbhaveyam iti sonu eṣamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ śakyam darśanam niścayaḥ yasmin= arthe pratyakṣa anumāna gamye tasya avisamvādaḥ pratyakṣa anumānābhyām avadhānam saḥ eva pratyaya uvalambanantena anyatra api pratyakṣa anumāna āgamyepi arthe pravartteta kim kāraṇam evaṃprāya tvāt loka vyavahārasya evam iti eka deśa avisamvāda darśanena anyatra pravarttanam prāyas bāhulyena yasmin loka vyavahāre sa tathā uktaḥ 
PVVṬ_396,3	 puruṣa parīkṣayā punar pravṛttau= abhyupagamyamānāyām pravṛttiḥ eva na syāt kim kāraṇam tasya puṃsaḥ tathābhūtasya yathā artha darśanāḥ diguṇa yuktasya na aniṣṭeḥ apravṛttiḥ eva syāt iti sambadhyate tena ayam arthaḥ na punar yathārtha darśana ādi guṇa yuktānām puṃsām avitathā abhidhāyi tvena aniṣṭeḥ apravṛttiḥ eva syāt kim kāraṇam tādṛśām yathā artha darśana ādi guṇa yuktānām avitatha abhidhānāt yathā avasthita vastu prakāśa kavāt 
PVVṬ_396,4	 kim puna kāraṇan tathā bhūtaḥ pumān jñātum aśakyaḥ iti āha tathā hi ityādi ayaṃpumān evan doṣavān na vā evandoṣavān kintu nirdoṣaḥ iti evam anya doṣa anirdoṣa tā api nirdoṣa tā iti etad apekṣayā durbodha iti eka vacanena strī liṃgena ca nirdeśaḥ anya doṣāḥ iti etad apekṣayā tu durbodhāḥ iti pulliṅga bahuvacanābhyām vipariṇāmaḥ karttavyaḥ kasmāt durbodha tvāt duḥprāpya tvāt anya guṇa doṣa niścāya kānāṃpramāṇānām 
PVVṬ_397,1	 caitasebhyaḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe samyak mithyā ca pravṛttiḥ kāya vāc karma lakṣaṇā yeṣām puṃsā ante tathā cetasi bhavāḥ caitasā guṇa doṣāḥ caitasebhyaḥ guṇebhyaḥ kṛpā vairāgya bodha ādibhyaḥ hetubhyaḥ samyak pravṛttayaḥ yathārtha pravṛttayaḥ caitasebhyaḥ doṣebhyaḥ rāga ādibhyaḥ mithyā pravṛttayaḥ viparīta pravṛtta yaḥ bhavanti te ca iti pareṣām caitasā guṇa doṣāḥ cetaḥ dharma tvena atīndriyāḥ tatas na pratyakṣa gamyāḥ na api anumāna gamyā atīndriya tvāt eva svabhāva liṅgasya asiddheḥ kintu svasmāt guṇa doṣa rūpāt prabhava autpādaḥ yasya kāya vāc karmaṇaḥ tena kārya liṅgena anumeyāḥ tat ca na asti yasmāt vyavahārāḥ ca kāya vāc karma lakṣaṇāḥ prāyaśas vā bahulyena buddhi pūrvam iti kṛtvā pratisaṃkhyānena ani athā api karttum śakyante tathā hi sa rāgāḥ api vīta rāga vat ātmānandarśayanti vīta rāgāḥ ca sa rāga vat kim kāraṇam puruṣa icchā vṛtti tvāt vyavahārāṇām puruṣa icchayā vṛttiḥ pravṛttiḥ yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_397,2	 yadi nāma puruṣa icchā vṛttayaḥ vyavahārāḥ tathā api kim iti anyathā kriyante iti āha teṣām ca iti puṃsām citra abhisandhi tvāt citra abhiprāya tvāt tatas yatheṣṭam vyavahārāḥ pravarttante iti na asti guṇa doṣa prabhavāṇām vyavahārāṇām viveka niścayaḥ tat iti tasmāt ayam anumātā pumān liṅga saṃkarāt liṅga vyabhicārāt aniścinvan kṣīṇa doṣaḥ katham āgamasya karttāram pratipadyeta na eva iti nigamanīyam 
PVVṬ_397,3	 atha kim ityādi yaḥ nirdoṣaḥ rāga ādi doṣa rahitaḥ tādṛśaḥ puruṣaḥ kinna eva asti asti iti pratipādayan= āha sarveṣām ityādi pratipakṣa sammukhībhāve nirhrāsam apacayaṃpratipakṣā sammukhībhāve ca atiśayam upacayam śrayante ye rāga ādayaḥ te nirhrāsa atiśaya āśritāḥ teṣām sarveṣām vipakṣa tvāt yasya ca sammukhībhāvāsam mukhībhāvābhyām nirhrāsa atiśayam bhajante saḥ eva teṣām vipakṣaḥ bādhakaḥ tena saha varttate iti sa vipakṣaḥ tad bhāvaḥ tat tvantasmāt sa bādhaka tvāt iti yāvat yena ca bādhakena doṣāṇām sa vipakṣa tvantasya bādhakasya abhyāsāt punar punar naiḥ antaryeṇa utpādanāt ye sā ātmībhāvaḥ tadaurjjiti antat maya tā tasmāt bādhaka sātmībhāvāt dhīyeran kṣīyaret āsravāḥ rāgāga dayaḥ kvacid santāne sa ātmībhūta doṣa pratipakṣe doṣāṇām ca bādhakam nairātmya jñānam iti pratipādayiṣyati tasmāt na tathābhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ na iṣyate etāvat tu brūmaḥ sa tu kṣīṇa āsravaḥ durjñānaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_398,1	 doṣaḥ hi ityādi vivaraṇam doṣāḥ hi rāga ādayaḥ kiṃbhūtā nirhrāsa atiśaya dharmāṇaḥ apakarṣa utkarṣa svabhāvāḥ santaḥ vipakṣa abhibhava utkarṣa vipakṣa kṛtaḥ yobhi bhavaḥ tiraskāraḥ tasya utkarṣa apakarṣam sādhayanti gamayanti tena ayam arthaḥ nirhrāsa dharmāṇaḥ vipakṣa abhibhava utkarṣam sādhayanti bādhaka abhibhava utkarṣeṇa doṣāṇām nirhrāsāt atiśaya dharmāṇaḥ bādhaka abhibhava apakarṣam sādhayanti bādhaka abhibhava māndyena teṣām atiśaya dharma tvāt jvālā ādi vat ādi śabdāt śīta uṣṇa sparśa ādi parigrahaḥ yathā jvālā ādayaḥ bādhakasya udaka ādeḥ utkarṣa apakarṣe sati nirhrāsa atiśaya dharmāṇaḥ yathākramam udaka ādi abhibhava utkarṣam sādhayanti tadvat 
PVVṬ_398,2	 nanu ca bāhya artha pratibaddhā rāga ādayaḥ bāhyam ca vastu nityam sannihitam eva tat katham rāga ādīnām ucchedaḥ iti atas āha te hi ityādi hi śabdaḥ yasmāt arthaḥ te rāga ādayaḥ vikalpa prabhavāḥ vikalpāt ayoni śoma naskāra lakṣaṇāt prabhavaḥ utpādaḥ eṣām iti vigrahaḥ tathā hi ayoni śomanaskāram antareṇa sati api bāhyerthe na utpadyante rāga ādayaḥ tad sammukhībhāve ca vinā api arthena utpadyante iti vikalpa prabhavā rāga ādayaḥ tatas sati api upādāne yathā ukta lakṣaṇe anādara vivakṣāyām ca iyam saptamī kasyacid manaḥ guṇasya nairātmya darśana lakṣaṇasya abhyāsāt apakarṣiṇaḥ apacayavantaḥ bhavanti iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_398,3	 etat uktam bhavati yadi api tāvat doṣa nidānasya sarvadā na ucchedaḥ pratipakṣasya atyanta pāṭava abhāvāt tathā api pratipakṣa abhyāsāt mandīkṛta sāmarthyāt upādānāt apakarṣiṇaḥ kṣāma kṣāmatarāḥ doṣāḥ bhavanti iti anena ca hetuḥ uktaḥ yadā tu yathā uktasya manaḥ guṇasya bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta vartti tayā pāṭavam jātantadā tad pāṭave tasya manaḥ guṇasya pāṭave sati anvayaḥ kleśa bījam anveti utpadyate asmāt doṣaḥ iti kṛtvā nirgata unvayaḥ yasmin vināśe sa niranvaya vināśaḥ sa dharmaḥ yeṣān doṣāṇānteniḥ anvaya vināśa dharmāṇaḥ vāsanayā saha vināśa dharmāṇaḥ iti arthaḥ jvālā ādi vat yathā jvālā ādayaḥ pratipakṣasya udaka ādeḥ utkarṣe sati atyanta vināśa dharmāṇaḥ tadvat prayogaḥ punar ye yat upadhānāt apakarṣiṇaḥ te tad atyanta vṛddhau tad abhibhavāt niranvaya vināśa dharmāṇaḥ tat yathā jvālā ādayaḥ salila abhibhava vṛddhau nairātmya darśana upadhānāt ca apakarṣa dharmāṇaḥ doṣāḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ 
PVVṬ_399,1	 yatas evantena kāraṇena syāt api kaścid nirdoṣaḥ katham ityādi paraḥ yāvatā ityayat nipātaḥ yadā iti asmin= arthe varttate doṣa sātmanaḥ vipakṣa utpatti vat iti ca anādi kāla abhyāsāt doṣa sātmanaḥ puṃsaḥ vipakṣa utpattiḥ nairātmya darśana utpatiḥ evan doṣa vipakṣasya nairātmya darśanasya sa ātma tvepi yathāpratyayam yathā kāraṇa sannidhānandoṣa utpattiḥ api syāt 
PVVṬ_399,2	 na ayam ityā cā ryaḥ sarva sāṃsārika upa drava rahita tvāt nirupadravaḥ bhūta viparītam anitya ādi sva lakṣaṇam arthaḥ viṣayosya iti bhūta arthaḥ bhūta artha grahaṇāt eva ca mārgaḥ citta svabhāvaḥ nirupadravaḥ ca asau bhūta arthaḥ ca iti nirupadrava bhūta arthaḥ ta bhūtaḥ ca asausvabhāvaḥ ca iti karma dhāraya garbha eva karma dhāraya samāsaḥ nirupadravasya bhūta arthasya bhūta artha tvena abhyāsāt sā ātmībhāva gate anena ca citta svabhāvasya doṣa pratipakṣasya viparyayaiḥ yathā uktāt trayād vilakṣaṇaiḥ sa upadravaiḥ abhūta arthaiḥ asvabhāvaiḥ ca doṣaiḥ na bādhanam sā ātmībhūtam mārgam abhibhūya na doṣāṇām utpattiḥ iti arthaḥ kiṅkāraṇam yatnavat tve pītyādi etat āha sā ātmībhūtasya mārgasya doṣa utpādanāya yatnaḥ eva na sambhavati 
PVVṬ_399,3–400,1	 tathā api abhyupagamya ucyate doṣa utpādane yatnavat tve buddheḥ tad pakṣa pātataḥ tasmin doṣa pratipakṣa bhūte guṇavati nairātmya mārge pakṣapātena bahu mānataḥ doṣa utpādane yatnat nivarttya guṇa pakṣapātena doṣa pratipakṣaḥ eva yatna ādhānāt iti yāvat svabhāva padam eva tāvat ādau vyācaṣṭe na hi svabhāvaḥ nairāpmya darśana lakṣaṇaḥ pratipakṣasa ātmani vyavasthitena puruṣeṇa ayantena prayatnena vinā nivarttayitum śakyaḥ śrotriya kāpālika ghṛṇā vat iti yaḥ śrotriyaḥ san kāpālikaḥ bhavati tasya śrotriya avasthāyām yā ghṛṇā sā yathā yatnam antareṇa na śakyate nivarttayituntadvat mārga svabhāva nivarttanāya yatnaḥ ca kriyamāṇaḥ prāpyasya rāga ādi svabhāvasya guṇa darśanena nivartti asya vipaśyana asvabhāvasya doṣa darśanena kriyeta tat ca doṣa darśanam vipakṣa sa ātmanaḥ doṣa pratipakṣasa ātmanaḥ puṃsaḥ doṣa pratipakṣena sambhavati tathā tat ca guṇa darśanam vipakṣasa ātmanaḥ doṣeṣu na sambhavati 
PVVṬ_400,2	 kasmāt punar pratipakṣe doṣa darśanat na sambhavati iti āha tasya ityādi tasya pratipakṣasya nirupadrava tvāt trividhaḥ hi upadravaḥ yasya abhāvāt nirupradravaḥ mārgaḥ tathā hi cittam vibaddhum hetuḥ doṣa upadravaḥ yaiḥ cittam vivat hambhūta artha darśane na pravarttate kāya citta vyathā hetuḥ duḥkha daurmanasya upadravaḥ sa āsrava sukhasya apraśānta tayā tad upabhoge vairasya udvegaḥ ca 
PVVṬ_400,3–400,5	 tatra prathamasya upadravasya abhāvam āha sarva doṣa hāneḥ iti sarvasya rāga ādi doṣasya hāneḥ vigamāt paryavasthāna ityādinā dvitīyasya abhāvam āha rāga ādi sammukhībhāvaḥ paryavasthānam ca janma ca paryavasthāna janmanī tayoḥ yat prativat dhanduḥ khantasya vivekāt rāga ādi utpatti kāle yat duḥkham kāya citta paridāha lakṣaṇan tad paryavasthāna pratibaddha jāti jarā vyādhi ādi duḥkhantu janma pratibaddham tatīyasya upadravasya abhāvam āha praśama ityādi praśamaḥ rāga ādi viraha lakṣaṇam nirvāṇam tasmin yat sukham anāsravantasya rasa asvādaḥ tasya anudvejanāt avaimukhya karaṇāt abhūta artham abhata viṣayam khalu api rāga ādi na syāt iti sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_400,6	 yadi abhūta artham kathantarhi tasya utpattiḥ iti āha upādāna bala bhāvi iti vitatha vikalpa vāsanā bala bhāvi tat evaṃbhūta rāga ādi bīja āśrayasya vijñāna santānasya viparyaya upādānāt rāga ādi viparyaya lakṣaṇasya pratipakṣasya parigrahāt na syāt na utpadyeta na tubhūta artham aviparīta viṣayam na bhavet kintu bhavet eva kim kāraṇam vastu bala pravṛtteḥ yathā avasthita vastu sāmarthyena utpatteḥ doṣa sātmya īpi tāvat sthitasya pramāṇa ani anitya ādi bhata ākāra grāhīṇi pratipakṣa mārgam āvahanti 
PVVṬ_401,1	 kim punar vipaśyanā sa ātmani sthitasya abhūta arthaḥ ca doṣāḥ rāga ādayaḥ ātma ātmīya adhyāropiterthe pravṛtteḥ te pratipakṣasya bhūta arthasya yat sātmyam svabhāva tvantasya vācinaḥ na bhavanti yatas evantasmāt na punar prahīṇa doṣāṇām doṣa utpattiḥ doṣa utpādana yatnepi buddheḥ guṇa pakṣapātena kāraṇena rāga ādi pratipakṣaḥ eva yatna ādhānāt prayatnasya karaṇāt kasya parīkṣāvataḥ yuktyā vicārakasya doṣa sātmya īpi tāvat sthitasya viśeṣeṇa atiśayena guṇeṣu eva yatna ādhānam aduṣṭa ātmanaḥ pratipakṣasa ātmani sthitasya 
PVVṬ_401,2–401,4	 kaḥ punar eṣān doṣāṇām prabhavaḥ utpatti kāraṇam prabhavati utpadyatesmāt iti kṛtvā yasya doṣa hetoḥ pratipakṣa abhyāsena prahīyaṃte uttaram āha sarvāsām ityādi doṣa jātīnān doṣa prakārāṇām jātiḥ utpattiḥ sat kāya darśanāt ātma ātmīya abhiniveśāt nanu ca avidyā hetukāḥ kleśāḥ āgame uktāḥ tat katham na vyāghātaḥ iti āha sā avidyā iti saiva sat kāya dṛṣṭiḥ avidyā tatas na asti virodhaḥ kena punar krameṇa doṣāṇām sat kāya darśanāt utpattiḥ iti āha tatra ityādi tatra ātma ātmīya tvena abhiniviṣṭe viṣaye tat snehaḥ ātma ātmīya snehaḥ tasmāt ātma ātmīya snehāt dveṣa ādi sambhava eti kramaḥ 
PVVṬ_401,5	 na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na aham iti ātma ākāra pratiṣedhaḥ na mama iti ātmīya ākārasya anātma ākāreṇa na ātmīya ākāreṇa ca paśyataḥ puruṣasya parigraham antareṇa iti ātma ātmīya tvena tad anugrāhaka tvena parikalpya grahaḥ tena vinā na kvacid viṣayesnehaḥ na ca ananurāgiṇaḥ ātma ātmīya ādi sneha rahitasya kvacid dveṣaḥ anunaya mantareṇa tasya abhāvāt kiṅkāraṇam ātma ātmīya ityādi ātma ātmīyayoḥ anuparodhinya pratikūla varttini udāsīna pakṣe tad abhāvāt tasya dveṣasya abhāvāt uparodha pratighātini ca iti ātma ātmīya tvena gṛhītasya yaḥ uparodhaḥ pīḍā tad pratighātini tat pratiṣedham kurvati mitra pakṣe tad abhāvāt dveṣa abhāvāt kiṃtu ātma ātmīya sneha viṣaya bhūta virodhena yaḥ sthitaḥ pratikūla varttī tatra eva dveṣaḥ tasmāt na ātma ātmīya sneham antareṇa dveṣaḥ iti tasmāt ityādinā nigamanam yatas evantasmāt tau ca iti ātma darśana ātmīya grahau sneham prasuvāte iti vacana vipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ sa ca snehaḥ dveṣa ādīn prasūte janayati 
PVVṬ_402,1–402,2	 tayoḥ tarhi ātma darśana ātmīya grahayoḥ kaḥ hetuḥ iti āha samāna ityādi samāna jātīyanta deva ātma darśanantasya abhyāsaḥ paunaḥpunyena ādi kālam utpattiḥ tad vāsanā ca tasmāt jātam ātma darśanam ātmīya graham prasūte tasmāt sat kāya darśana jāḥ sarve kleśāḥ tat eva ca satkāya darśanam ajñānam avidyā iti ucyate siddhānte 
PVVṬ_402,3	 yena eva sat kāya darśanam evā avidyā atas eva kāraṇāt mohaḥ nidānam pradhāna kāraṇandoṣāṇām rāga ādīnām abhidhīyate sū trā nta re avidyā hetukāḥ sarva kleśa aiti sat kāya dṛṣṭiḥ doṣāṇām nidānam anyatra sūtra antarebhi dhīyate kasmāt tad prahāṇa īsat kāya dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇe doṣāṇām prahāṇataḥ mohan doṣa nidānam doṣa kāraṇam āhuḥ buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ kasmāt amūḍhasya ajñāna rahitatya doṣān utpatteḥ punar anyatra pradeśa īsat kāya dṛṣṭin doṣa nidānam āhuḥ tat ca etad kāraṇa tvam mohasya satkāya dṛṣṭeḥ ca pradhāna hetu nirdeśe sati sya at na hetu mātra nirdeśe kim kāraṇam anekasmāt indriya viṣayaḥ ayoni śoma naskāra kalāpāt janma yeṣān doṣāṇānteṣām ekasmāt mohāt satkāya dṛṣṭeḥ ca utpati virodhāt tasmāt anya kāraṇa sambhavepi prādhānyam gṛhītvā moha sat kāya dṛṣṭyoḥ kāraṇa tvam uktam iti gamyate 
PVVṬ_403,1	 yadi ca anyaḥ moha unyā ca sat kāya dṛṣṭiḥ tayoḥ ca prādhānyantadā na ca dvayoḥ moha sat kāya dṛṣṭyoḥ prādhānye sati ekaika nirdeśaḥ kvacid mohasya eva nirdeśaḥ kvacid satkāya dṛṣṭeḥ eva iti arthaḥ na para bhāga bhāj śobhā bhāj vaktuḥ akauśalam eva avahati iti yāvat yadā punar anayoḥ na svabhāva bhedaḥ tadā moha śabdena sat kāya dṛṣṭi śabdena cobha yathā api ekasya arthasya paryāyeṇa nirdeśena na virodhaḥ prādhānyasya prādhānyam punar sat kārya darśanasya tad upādāna tvena doṣāṇām upādāna tvena tat ca anantaram eva pratipāditam pratipādayiṣyate ca dvitīye paricchede 
PVVṬ_403,2–403,3	 tasya ca sat kāya darśanasya prahāṇe sati doṣāṇām prahāṇataḥ prādhānyam yatas evantasmāt sambhavati sat kāya darśanāt janma yeṣān doṣāṇāntteṣām tasya sat kāya darśanasya pratipakṣaḥ nairātmya darśanantasya abhyāsāt prahāṇam sa ca kṣīṇa doṣaḥ pumān auddeśikaḥ duranvayaḥ durbodhaḥ yat upadeśāt yasya kṣīṇa doṣasya upadeśādayam pravṛtti kāmaḥ pratipadyeta tena upadiṣṭam artham anutiṣṭhet 
PVVṬ_403,4–403,5	 mā bhūt puruṣa āśrayam puruṣa hetukamvacanam āgamaḥ kim kāraṇamaḥ anantara uktena nyāyena āgama praṇetuḥ duranvaya tvāt durbodha tvāt girām vacasām mithyātvasya mṛṣārtha tvasya ye hetavaḥ doṣāḥ rāga ādayaḥ teṣām karttari ca iyam ṣaṣṭhī āśrayaṇam āśrayaḥ puruṣasya āśrayaḥ iti samāsaḥ puruṣa śabdāt ca karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī na ca ubhaya prāptau karmaṇi iti niyamaḥ śeṣa vibhāṣā iti vikalpanāt tena ayam arthaḥ mithyā hetubhiḥ doṣaiḥ puruṣa parigṛhīta tvāt iti 
PVVṬ_404,1–404,3	 athavā doṣāṇām iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī doṣāṇām puruṣeṇa āśrayāt parigrahāt apauruṣeyam vacassatya artham mithyā tva hetoḥ doṣasya abhāvāt iti kecid mī mām sa kāācakṣate etat uktam bhavati trividham api aprāmāṇyam mithyā tva ajñāna saṅśaya lakṣaṇe vāde na asti eva yatas śabdānām dvividhaḥ svabhāvaḥ nisarga siddhaḥ aupādhikaḥ ca tatra nisarga siddhaḥ yaḥ yathārtha pratipādaka tvam ayathārtha pratipādaka tvam punar aupādhikaḥ svabhāvaḥ puruṣa adhīna tvāt tat āha 
PVVṬ_404,4–404,5	 śabda doṣa udbhavaḥ tāvat vaktri adhīnaḥ iti sthitam tad abhāvaḥ kvacid tāvat guṇavat vaktrṛkatvataḥ tad guṇaiḥ apakṛṣṭānām śabde saṃkrānti asambhavāt yat vā vaktuḥ abhāvena na syuḥ doṣāḥ nirāśrayāḥ iti tena ve de puruṣa nivṛttau mithyātva nivṛttiḥ na api anutpati lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam vedāt artha avagateḥ na api saṃśaya lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam vedāt artha gatau saṃśayasya apratibhāsanāt tat āha 
PVVṬ_404,6–404,7	 evaṃbhūtasya vedasya jñāna utpattim ca kurvataḥ sva rūpa viparīta tva saṃśayau bhāṣya vāritau= iti yatas ca aprāmāṇyam trayat nivṛttam nisarga siddhaḥ ca yayā artha pratipādana lakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ vedasya asti tasmāt svatas eva asya prāmāṇyam artha pratipādaka tvātaḥ yatas ca śabde vaktṛ doṣeṇa bādha duṣṭa kāraṇatva lakṣaṇasya doṣasya sambhavaḥ tena vede puruṣa nivṛttau doṣa nivṛtteḥ svatas prāmāṇya apavāda kayoḥ bādha kāraṇa duṣṭa tva jñānayoḥ nivṛtteḥ na aprāmāṇya āśaṅkā tat āha 
PVVṬ_404,8	 tatra apavāda nirmuktiḥ vaktrya bhāvāt laghīyasī vede tena apramāṇa tvam na āśaṅkām api gacchati prāmāṇyam pauruṣeye tu pramāṇa antara bhāvataḥ tad abhāve tu tat duṣyet vaidikam na kadācana tena itara pramāṇaiḥ yā codanānām asaṃgatiḥ tayā eva syāt pramāṇa tvam anuvāda tvam anyathā codanā arthān yathā bhāvam kurvataḥ ca anumānataḥ tad jñānena eva yaḥ bādhaḥ sa katham vinivāryate tad mithyā tvāt abādhaḥ ced prāptam anyonya saṃśrayam na anumānāt atonyat hi bādhakam kiṃcad asti te 
PVVṬ_405,1–405,2	 na ca anya apramāṇaiḥ veda arthasya agrahe abhāvaḥ rasa ādi vat atha rasa ādeḥ aparayā rasa buddhayā grahāt pūrvikāyāḥ rasa buddheḥ prāmāṇyam veda arthepi evam bhaviṣyati tat āha na ca anyaiḥ agraherthasya syāt abhāvaḥ rasa ādi vat tat hiyā eva artha bodhaḥ ced tādṛś dharme bhaviṣyati mama asiddham iti idam ced vedāt jāte avabodhane vaktun na dveṣa mātreṇa yujyate satya vādinā iti  
PVVṬ_405,3–405,4	 na khalu iti ādinā kārikā artham ācaṣṭe sarve eva iti pauruṣeyaḥ a pauruṣeyaḥ ca sambhāvya vipralambhaḥ sambhāvya aśaṃkanīyaḥ vipralambhaḥ visamvādosya iti kintu pauruṣeyaḥ eva sambhāvya vipralambhaḥ vipralambha hetūnām visamvāda hetūnān doṣāṇām puruṣa āśrayāt yat punar apauruṣeyantat satya artham iti eke yasmāt vedeṣu mithyātva kāraṇānām puruṣāṇām abhāvaḥ kāryasya mithyātvasya abhāvam sādhayati iti apauruṣeyam satya artham iti 
PVVṬ_405,5–405,6	 yaḥ evamvādinaḥ tān eva mī mām sa kā n pratyanye pracakṣate para mukhena śāstra kāraḥ eva āha girām sattya tvasya ye hetavaḥ guṇāḥ teṣām puruṣa āśrayāt apauruṣeyeṣu vākyeṣu puruṣa nivṛttyā sattya tva kāraṇasya guṇasya nivṛtteḥ kāryasya api sattya tvasya nivṛttiḥ iti apauruṣeyam vākyam mithyātvam kin na bhavati etat uktam bhavati śabde satyat tva mithyā tvayoḥ puruṣa āyatta tvāt yadi puruṣa nivṛttau sattya artha tvam iṣyate mithyā artha tvam kinneṣyate iti ucyate paramārthataḥ tu puruṣa nivṛttyā sattya artha tva mithyā arthayoḥ nivṛtteḥ ānarthakyāt anutpatti lakṣaṇam eva aprāmāṇyam tena 
PVVṬ_406,1–406,4	 mama asiddham iti idam ced vedāt jāteva bodhane vaktun na dveṣa mātreṇa yujyate sattya vādinā iti  nirastam vedāt svabhāvatortha avabodhasya anutpatteḥ kiñca varṇṇānām avācaka rūpa tvam pratyeka samastānām ca avācaka tvāt varṇṇa rūpaḥ ca vedaḥ iti katham atortha jñānam nanu agṛhīta samayasya api vākyāt uccāritāt kopī artha ūnena uktaḥ iti sandehaḥ dṛśyate 
PVVṬ_406,5–406,6	 sa ca evam syāda yadi artha pratipādane śabdasya svabhāvena śaktiḥ syāt evantarhi sandeha lakṣaṇam asya aprāmāṇyam syāt iṣṭeniṣṭeca arthe prakāśana śakti sambhavāt yadi ca asya svabhāva te eva sā śaktiḥ kim saṃketena yathā dīpasya artha prakāśane śaktasya indriya apekṣā tathā śabdasya api saṃketa apekṣā iti ced na pradīpa indriyayoḥ pratyekam abhāvepi artha prakāśaka tva abhāvāt tatra anyonya apekṣa tvam yuktam na evam śabda śakti saṃketayoḥ saṃketa mātreṇa eva artha pratīteḥ utpatteḥ tasmāt na svabhāvataḥ śabda urtha pratipādana samarthaḥ iti utpatti lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam nanu agni hotrañju huyāt svarga kāmaḥ ityādi vākyeṣu agnihotra ādeḥ svarga ādi sādhana upāya tvam pratīyate eva iti katham anutpatti lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam 
PVVṬ_406,7	 sattyam etat kevalam pratītiḥ hi apratīteḥ bādhikāḥ na tu mithyātvasya tasya api pratīteḥ tena kim ebhiḥ vākyaiḥ agnihotra ādiḥ svarga sādhanānupāyaḥ eva upāya tayā pradarśyate atha upāyaḥ eva iti mithyātva aśaṃkā na nivarttate eva bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt apauruṣeya tvasya mithyā artha tvena saha virodha abhāvat ca dṛṣṭaḥ ca apauruṣeyāṇām vitatha jñāna hetu tvam tat yathā jyotsnā ādīnām śukla vastra ādau pīta jñāna hetu tvam tena codanā arthān yatha abhāva unumānataḥ kriyate iti kathantad jñānena bādhā rasa ādi jñānānāntu tṛpti ādi kārya avisamvādāt eva prathamam prāmāṇya niścayāt anyadā tu abhyāsa ādinā svatas eva prāmāṇya niścayaḥ yuktaḥ iti na mithyātva āśaṅkā vede tu na eva kadācid api avisamvādaḥ pratipannaḥ iti katham anyadā api svatas prāmāṇya niścayaḥ tena sati api vijñāne pratibhā ādeḥ yathā eva hi svātantryāt na pramāṇa tvam tathā vedepi dṛśyatām 
PVVṬ_406,8	 kiṃca codanā artha jñānasya avidyamāna upalambhana rūpa tvāt mithyātvam tathā hi kāryā irthe vedasya prāmāṇyam iṣyate kāryaḥ ca artha anuṣṭheyaḥ eva sa ca bhāvi tvena avidyamāna tvāt na codanā jñāna kāla bhāvi iti tat katham avidyamāna viṣaya tvāt codanā jñānasya na mithyātvam sarva vikalpānām ca pūrvam avastu viṣaya tvasya pratipādita tvāt tena api codanā jñānasya mithyātvam eva kim ca loka vedayoḥ varṇṇāḥ padāni ca abhinnāni eva vākya bhedaḥ tu kevalam iṣyate loke ca padānām arthaḥ saṃketa vaśāt laukika padārthaḥ ca vaidikānām padāna antena pauruṣeyaḥ eva artha sambandhaḥ laukika padārtha dvāreṇa ca vaidika vākya artha avagamaḥ bhavati iti pauruṣeyaḥ eva asau laukika vākyaḥ iva loke ca padāni aneka arthāni iti vaidika vākyasya api aneka artha tā sambhavāt viparīta arthā śaṃkā na nivarttate iti saṃśaya lakṣaṇam apramāṇyam vedasya iti 
PVVṬ_407,1–407,2	 yathā ityādinā kārikā artham vyācaṣṭe rāga ādi parītaḥ rāga ādi yuktaḥ dayā iti karuṇā sā eva sā ātmībhūtā dharmatā ādi śabdāt prajñā śraddhā ādi taiḥ yuktaḥ tat tasmāt yathā vacanasya puruṣa āśrayāt mithyārtha tā tathā sattya artha tā api saḥ iti puruṣaḥ tām apisattya artha tān nivarttayati na kevalam mithyā artha tām iti puruṣa nivṛttau tad dharmayoḥ sattya artha tva mithyā artha tvayoḥ nivṛttau= ānarthakyam vede syāt atha puruṣa nivṛttau= api sattyā arthatā iṣyate tadā sattya artha tā viparyayaḥ mithyā artha tāvā syāt 
PVVṬ_407,3	 syāt matam na puruṣa apekṣayā śabdānām arthavat tā kintu svabhāvataḥ eva iti āha na hi ityādi prakṛtyā svabhāvena arthavantaḥ kim kāraṇam samayāt sam ketāt tatas śabda ibhyortha khyāteḥ artha pratīteḥ kāya saṃjñā ādi vat hasta vikāra akṣi nikoca ādayaḥ kāya saṃjñā yathā tatra samayāt kvacid artha pratipattiḥ tadvat yadi punar svabhāvataḥ eva śavdāḥ artha prakāśakāḥ syuḥ tadā na saṃketam apekṣeran tasmāt na svatortha prakāśana yogya tā śavdānām kintarhi aprātikūlyantu yathā saṃketam pravṛttiḥ eva śabdānām yogya tā kim kāraṇam samaye saṃketa kāle tasya saṃketakarttuḥ yatra niyoktum icchā tayā yatheṣṭam śavdānām praṇayanāt pravṛtteḥ yadi punar nisarga siddhāḥ svabhāva siddhāḥ kvacid arthe śabdāḥ syuḥ tadā nisarga siddheṣu puruṣa icchā vaśāt yatheṣṭaṃsaṃketena artha pratipādana ayogāt 
PVVṬ_408,1	 tasmāt anarthakāḥ svatas śabdāḥ tenartha kāssantaḥ puruṣa saṃskārāt puruṣa saṃketāt arthavantaḥ atha mā abhūt anarthaka tvam iti puruṣa saṃskāra apekṣayā arthavat tu anteṣām iṣyate tadā pauruṣeya tayā eva syāt yasmāt tad saṃskārya tā eva puruṣa saṃskārya tā eva ca eṣā aṃśabdānām pauruṣeya tā yuktāḥ na puruṣāt utpattiḥ kim kāraṇam tatas eva puruṣa samayāt eva artha vipralambhāt visamvādāt na puruṣāt utpatteḥ vipralambhaḥ yasmāt utpannopi puruṣāt śabdonyathā samitaḥ iti mithyārtha tā virodhena yathābhāvam samitaḥ saṃketitaḥ na uparodhī na vipralambhakaḥ tad anyaḥ iti śabdāt anyaḥ puruṣa dharmaḥ unmeṣa nimeṣa ādiḥ svatas nartha kopi yathābhāvam puruṣeṇa samitaḥ na vipralambhakaḥ tadvat 
PVVṬ_408,2–408,3	 upasaṃharan= āha tat iti tasmāt ayam puruṣaḥ nivarttamānaḥ sva kṛta samayāt sambhavaḥ utpādaḥ yasyāḥ artha pratibhāyāḥ artha buddheḥ tām api nivarttayati tat iti tasmāt kutas tad nivṛttyā tasya puruṣasya nivṛttyā sattyā artha tā kintvā anarthakyam eva syāt etena yat ucyate yat pūrva aparayoḥ koṭyoḥ paraiḥ sādhanam ucyate tad nirākaraṇam kṛtvā kṛtārthāḥ veda vādinaḥ pūrvā vedasya yā koṭiḥ pauruṣeya tva lakṣaṇā parā vināśa rūpā ca tad abhāvaḥ hi nityatā iti 
PVVṬ_408,4–408,5	 tad apāstam satya pauruṣeya tve nitya tve ca vedasya anarthakyena akṛtārtha tvāt atha punar utpattiḥ eva pauruṣeya tā na samaya ākhyānan na saṃketa karaṇam pauruṣeya tā tena apauruṣeya tvāt eva yathārthaḥ vedaḥ iti bhāvaḥ evam api artha jñāpana hetuḥ artha abhivyakti hetuḥ saṃketaḥ puruṣa āśraya puruṣa icchā anurodhīna yathārtham avaśyam varttate iti girā ām apauruṣeya tvebhyupagamyamāne atas puruṣa icchā anurodhinaḥ saṃketāt mithyātva sambhavaḥ 
PVVṬ_409,1	 kim ityādi vivaraṇam asya iti vedasya yatas hi samayāt saṃketāt artha pratītiḥ artha prakāśanam sa samayaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ tatas vitatha upyalīkopi syāt svātantryāt tatas ca śīlam sādhanam hetuḥ yasya svargasya tathābhūtaḥ ca asau svargaḥ ca sumeru pṛṣṭha lakṣaṇaḥ tasya yat vede vacanantat anyathā samaye na viparyāsayet niratiśayā prītiḥ svargaḥ itye vamvi parīta artham kuryāt agnihotra ādi sādhanena ca viparīta artham kuryāt tena kāraṇena ayathārtham api prakāśana sambhavāt 
PVVṬ_409,2–409,4	 saḥ eva doṣaḥ yaḥ pauruṣeyeṣu uktaḥ puruṣa doṣāt sambhāvya vipralambhaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ iti nanu apauruṣeyaḥ eva śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ tathā hi yathā idāni intanāḥ vṛddhāḥ pūrva prasiddham eva śabda artha sambandham upadiśanti tathā pūrva pūrva vṛddhāḥ api iti anādi tvāt apauruṣeyaḥ eva sambandhaḥ tat uktam śabda artha anāditām muktvā sambandhānādi kāraṇam asti na anyat atas vede sambandha ādiḥ na vidyate iti 
PVVṬ_409,5–409,6	 sa ca sambandhaḥ tri pramāṇakaḥ tathā hi śrotuḥ artha pratipattaye kenacid vṛddhena śabde prayukte anyaḥ pārśva sthaḥ pratipattā prayoktāram vācyam vācakam pratyakṣe ṇa pratipadyate śrotuḥ ca pratipanna tvam pravṛtti dvāreṇa avagacchati artha pratipatti anyathā anupapattyā ca śavda artha āśritā vācya vācaka śaktim ca avagacchati iti tri pramāṇakaḥ eva sambandhaḥ tat uktam śabdān vṛddhāmidheyān= ca pratyakṣeṇa atra paśyati śrotuḥ ca pratipanna tvam anumānena ceṣṭayā anyathā anupapattyā ca buddhyet śaktim dvaya āśritāṃartha āpattyā ca budhyante sambandhantri pramāṇakam iti 
PVVṬ_410,1	 tatra āha sambandha apauruṣeyatvaḥ ityādi śabda arthayossambandha apauruṣaya tvebhi upagamyamāne syāt pratītiḥ artha pratipattiḥ asam vidaḥ saṃketa jñānam samvid sā na vidyate yasya tasya akāryaḥ puruṣaiḥ ajanyaḥ sambandhaḥ yeṣa ante tathā te śabdāḥ artha iṣu vācyeṣu puruṣaiḥ yathārtha prakāśaka tvāt svabhāvāt anyathā viparyasyante vitatha jñāna hetavaḥ na kriyante tena aviparyāsena adoṣaḥ visamvāda lakṣaṇaḥ doṣaḥ na asti idānīmiti sambandha apauruṣeya tve kim saṃketena prayojanam yasmāt sa hi śabda arthayossambandhaḥ sa ced artha pratīti hetuḥ sambandha upauruṣeyaḥ tadā na ayam puruṣaḥ nisarga siddha sambandha tvāt śabdāt artham pratipadyamānaḥ samayam apekṣeta pradīpa ādi vat apekṣate ca saṃketantasmāt na śabdānām arthena saha apauruṣeyaḥ sambandhaḥ rāja cihna ādi vat 
PVVṬ_410,2–410,3	 syāt matam apauruṣeyaḥ eva sambandhaḥ sa tu saṃketa nirapekṣaḥ prati iti āśrayaḥ iti āha apratītya āśraya urtha pratīteḥ eva āśrayaḥ vā katham sambandhaḥ na eva prati iti anyathā anupapattyā sambandha kalpanāt prati iti abhāve katham sambandhaḥ atha jñāpaka tvāt hi sambandhaḥ sva ātma jñānam apekṣate tena asau vidyamānopi na agṛhītaḥ prakāśakaḥ sarveṣām anabhivyaktānām pūrva pūrva prayoktrṛtaḥ siddhaḥ sambandhaḥ iti evam sambandha ādiḥ na vidyate iti 
PVVṬ_410,4–410,6	 tatra āha saṃketa ityādi saṃketena tasya sambandhasya abhivyaktau asamarthā niṣphalā saṃketāt anyasya sambandhasya kalpanā etat uktam bhavati saṃkete satyartha pratīteḥ utpattiḥ asati ca anutpattiḥ iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām saṃketaḥ eva artha pratīteḥ kāraṇam iti kim sambandhena anyena na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe anabhivyaktaḥ prakāśita urtha pratīti hetuḥ enam iti sambandhaṃsa tarhi iti sambandhaḥ saṃketāt eva artha pratipādane siddhe sati upasthātum śīlam yasya sa sambandhaḥ kim akāraṇam kasmāt niṣphalam poṣyate 
PVVṬ_411,1	 naiṣphalyam eva āha nanu ityādi iyān etāvat mātraḥ eva yad arthe vācye pratīteḥ jñānasya jananam tad pratīti jananam samayena kṛtam iti niṣphala ssambandhaḥ na ayogye samayassamarthaḥ kintarhi yaḥ eva artha pratipati anyathā anupapatyā pratipādakena samarthaḥ pratipannaḥ śabdaḥ tatra eva saṃketaḥ samarthaḥ iti yogyatā sambandhaḥ ced tat uktam 
PVVṬ_411,2–411,5	 śaktiḥ eva hi sambandhaḥ bhedaḥ ca asyāḥ na dṛśyate sā hi kārya anumeya tvāt tad bhedam anuvarttate iti saṃbam atra āha tat kim ityādi evam manyate na ekā śaktiḥ śabda arthayoḥ sthitā kintu śabda sthāḥ hi vācaka śaktiḥ anya arthe sthātum vācya śaktiḥ anyā eva yadā tu śabda śaktiḥ sambandhaḥ tadā yaḥ eva sambandhassaḥ eva sambandhī prāptaḥ iti pṛcchati tat kimvai śabdaḥ sambandhoḥ tu nanu anyā hi yogya tā anyaḥ ca śabdaḥ tat katham śabda ssambandhaḥ iti atas āha 
PVVṬ_411,6^1	 yasmāt samartham hi rūpam śabdasya artha pratipādanam prati yogyatā kārya kāraṇa yogya tāvat kārya karaṇāya yogyatā kārya karaṇa yogya tā yathā kāraṇasya ātmabhatā tadvat sā ced iti yogyatā tatas śabdāt artha antaram tadā kim śabdasya bhavati iti śabda yogyatayossambandhaḥ vācyaḥ anyathā śabdasya iyam yogyatā iti na sidhyet yārtha antara bhūta ayogya tā tasyām śabdasya upakāraḥ iti ced śabdena yogyatāyāḥ upakāraḥ kriyate iti yāvat tena śabda janya tvāt śabdasya yogyatā iti ucyate iti bhāvaḥ na śabdena upakāraḥ yogyatāyāḥ kutas nityāyāḥ yogyatāyāḥ niratiśaya tvāt atha yogyatāyāḥ api śabdena vyatiriktaḥ eva upakāraḥ kriyate 
PVVṬ_411,6^2	 tadā tasya śabda kṛtasya upakārasya yogyatayā kaḥ sambandhaḥ iti vācyam atham tatra api upakāre yogyatayā anyaḥ upakāraḥ kriyate tadā tatra api upakāre yathā ukta vidhinā aparāparasya upakārasya kalpanāyām atiprasaṅgāt tatas navasthāyām upakāra asiddheḥ sā eva yogyatayā saha śabdasya sambandha asiddhiḥ kiñca vyatiriktām yogyatām upakurvāṇaḥ śabdaḥ sva rūpeṇa eva upakaroti na para rūpeṇa śabdasya anupakāraka tva prasaṃgāt tadā yogyatāyām ca svatas svarūpeṇa śabdasya yogya tve arthaḥ eva śabda svabhāvaḥ pratīti janana yogyaḥ kinneṣyate kim pāramparyeṇa iti yāvat tasmāt na yogyatā sambandhaḥ na ca sārtha pratīti hetuḥ samavāyāt eva artha pratīteḥ 
PVVṬ_412,1–412,2	 bauddhasya api tarhi samayaḥ katham śabda arthayossambandhaḥ katham ca na syāt puruṣeṣu vṛtteḥ asya arthasya ayam vācakaḥ iti artha kathanam sa me yaḥ sa ca puruṣeṣu varttate na śabda arthayoḥ na ca anya dharmonyasya dharmaḥ aśva dharmaḥ iva goḥ ā cā ryaḥ stu na kevalam samayaḥ na sambandhonyopi bhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ na asti iti āha na ityādi tathā hi bhāvānām rūpa śleṣaḥ vā sambandhaḥ syāt pāratantryam vā paraspara apekṣaṇam vā tatra amiśrāṇām paraspara bhinnānām na kaścid rūpa śleṣa lakṣaṇa ssambandhaḥ teṣām abheda prasaṅgāt ekatva āpatteḥ tathā siddhānāṃniṣpannānām rūpāṇām na kaścid pāratantrya lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ siddhe pāratantryāḥ yogāt paraspara apekṣā lakṣaṇa upi sambandhaḥ na asti iti āha anapekṣaṇāt ca iti siddhasya sarva nirapekṣa tvāt 
PVVṬ_412,3–412,4	 kaḥ yadi tarhi śabda arthayoḥ na asti sambandhaḥ kathantarhi śabda artha pratītiḥ katham ca śābdam jñānam anumāne antar bhāvyate samayaḥ vā tadā kiṃprayojanaḥ iti āha artha viśeṣa ityādi artha viśeṣaḥ yaḥ pratipādana abhiprāyeṇa viṣayīkṛtaḥ tasya samīhā pratipādana icchā tayā apreritāḥ janitā vāc sūcayati prakāśayati sva nidāna pratibhāsanam artham vācaḥ sva nidānam pratipādana abhiprāyaḥ tad prakāśinam kasyasūcayati atas idam iti viduṣaḥ atas pratipādana abhiprāyāt sakāśāt idamvacanam āgatam iti yaḥ vidvān tasya iti evam buddhi rūpasya abhiprāya lakṣaṇasya vāc vijñapteḥ ca janya janaka lakṣaṇa ssambandhaḥ tatas śabdāt pratipattiḥ avinā abhāvāt iti tatas janya janaka bhāvāt vākyāt artha pratipattiḥ 
PVVṬ_412,5–413,3	 tena yat uktam padāt artham atiḥ yadi api anumānam vākyāt tu artha pratītiḥ pramāṇa antaraṃsambandha agrahāt na ca atra avinābhāvaḥ upayogi iti tad apāstam avinā abhāvam antareṇa vācya vācaka bhāvasya abhāvāt yat api uktam katham śabdāt artha pratipattiḥ katham ca śābdam jñānam anumānentarbhavati iti tat parihṛtam khe idānīm samaya prayojanam āha tat ākhyānam ityādi tad ākhyānam avinābhā= a ākhyānam samayaḥ ākhyāyatena ina iti kṛtvā tatas iti saṃmayāt pratyāyakasya artha pratipādana aṅgasya avinābhāva lakṣaṇasya siddheḥ pratīteḥ upacāreṇa samayasya sambandha ākhyānāt sambandha vyapadeśaḥ na tu punar saḥ eva samayaḥ mukhyaḥ sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_413,4–413,5	 tena yat ucyate samayaḥ pratimartti am vā pratyuccāraṇam eva vā kriyate jagat ādau vā sakṛt ekena kenacid iti nirastam ga nanu yadi avinā bhāvena śabda artha pratītiḥ tadā śabdasya artha pratipādanam vācaka tvena na syāt dhūmasya iva agni pratipādanam yadi ca śabda arthayoḥ samayena vinā bhāva ākhyānāt samaya ssambandhaḥ ucyate agni dhūmayoḥ api samayaḥ syāt iti 
PVVṬ_413,6–413,7	 na eṣa doṣaḥ yasmāt imam artham akṛta samayena api śabdena pratipādayāmi iti evam arthasya vācya tvam śabdasya ca vācaka tvam āropya artha pratipādana abhiprāye sati yadā śabdam prayuṅkte tadā śabdasya vācaka rūpasya eva utpattiḥ gha nanu artha pratipādana abhiprāyeṇa varṇṇāḥ eva janyante na ca vācakā varṇṇāḥ iṣyante tat katham ucyate abhiprāyāt vācakasya śabdasya utpattiḥ iti 
PVVṬ_413,8	 sattyam kevalam vaktṛ śrotroḥ varṇṇeṣu eva vācaka abhimānāt vācakasya eva utpattiḥ ucyate tasmāt asya eva vācya vācaka bhāva lakṣaṇasya avinābhāvasya śabda artha sambandhasya mūḍham prati ākhyānam samaya ssambandhaḥ ucyate na tu sarvam eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva ākhyānam samayaḥ tena na dhūma ādau sambandhaḥ samayaḥ ucyate yadi api saṃketa vyavahāra kālayoḥ śabda artha sambandhasya bhedaḥ tathā api sādṛśyāt eka tva adhyavasāyena lokasya pravṛttiḥ atas eva ca yam eva śabda artha sambandham pūrva pratipannam vaktā kathayati tam eva śrotā pratipadyate tena yat ucyate 
PVVṬ_413,9–414,1	 pratyekam sa ca sambandhaḥ bhidyeta ekaḥ athavā bhavet eka tve kṛtakaḥ na syāt bhinnaḥ ced bhedadhīḥ bhavet saṃbaṃdha vaktṛ śrotṛdhiyaḥ bhedāt vyavahāraḥ ca na duṣyati vaktuḥ anyaḥ hi sambandhaḥ buddhau śrotuḥ tathā aparaḥ śrotuḥ kartuñca sambandham vaktā kam pratipadyate pūrva dṛṣṭaḥ hi yaḥ tena tam śrotuḥ na karoti asau yam karoti navam sā upi na dṛṣṭaḥ pratipādakaḥ iti tad apāstam sarvatra vācya vācaka sambandhānām bhinnānām api ekatva adhyavasāyena lokasya pravṛtteḥ na ca api anāditā teṣām pratyabhijñāyai apramāṇa tvāt iti 
PVVṬ_414,2	 ṅa astu vā avina abhāva sambandhāt anyaḥ eva nityaḥ śabda arthayossambandhaḥ tena sambandhena girām śabdānām ekārtha niyame sati punar samaya vaśān na syāt artha antare yatra asau śabdaḥ na niyamitaḥ tatra gatiḥ pratipattiḥ kim kāraṇam na hi tena eka artha niyatena sambandhena asambaddherthe pratītiḥ yuktā kasmāt tasya sambandhasya vaiphalya prasaṅgāt na bhavati eva tatra pratītiḥ iti 
PVVṬ_414,3–414,5	 āha dṛṣṭaḥ ca ityādi puruṣa icchā vaśāt kṛtaḥ samayosya iti dīpakaḥ prakāśakaḥ aneka ityādi aneka arthena śabdasya abhisambandhebhyupagamyamāne yadi eka artha niyamena samaya kāra ubhivyaktim karoti tadā abhimataḥ eva arthe karoti na tu anyasmin= eva viruddhe iti na asti niyamaḥ tatas viruddha vyakti sambhavaḥ abhīṣṭāt viruddhasya api arthasya abhivyaktiḥ sambhāvyate atha ityādinā vyācaṣṭe eka artha pratiniyame samaya vaśāt aneka artha pratipādanam dṛṣṭam virudhyate tasmāt tasya dṛṣṭasya virodhaḥ mā bhūt iti sarve śabdāḥ sarvasya arthasya vācakāḥ 
PVVṬ_414,6–415,1	 ca tathā ityādinā viruddha vyakti pratipādanam yathā sarve sarvasya vācakāḥ iṣyantetathā idam api avaśyameṣṭavyam na ca sarva arthaḥ sarvasya kāryasya sādhakaḥ iti nyāya prāpta tvāt nyāyam ca āha saṃkarāt iti pratiniyata tvāt kārya kāraṇa tāyāḥ tatra etasmin nyāye sati pratiniyatam viśiṣṭam eva vastu sādhanam kāraṇam yasya abhimatasya arthasya sādhyasya svarga ādeḥ tasmin viṣaya bhūte śabdasya kimviśiṣṭasya sarva ityādi sarveṣām sādhyānām kāryāṇām yathāsvam yāni sādhanāni kāraṇāni teṣām vācaka tvena sādhāraṇasya tasya śabdasya iṣṭa vyaktim eva viśiṣṭa sādhya sādhyaka tvena abhimataḥ eva arthebhivyaktim samaya kāraḥ karoti iti kutas etat etat uktam bhavati yaḥ eva arthaḥ vastu sthityā svarga sādhanaḥ kintatra eva samaya kāreṇa agnihotra ādi śabda ubhivyaktaḥ kim va anyasmin= eva svarga sādhana viruddherthe buddhi māndyāt iti sandehaḥ eva 
PVVṬ_415,2^1	 saḥ iti śabdaḥ sarvasmin vācaka tvena aniyataḥ niyamam kvacid arthe puruṣāt puruṣa saṃketāt pratipadyate sa ca puruṣaḥ aviruddha īpi arthe saṃketam kuryāt tathā ca na kevalam viruddha vyakti sambhavaḥ yā api iyam apauruṣeya tā vedasya iṣṭā tasyāḥ vyarthā syāt parikalpanā api nāma iti kathat nāma asaṃkīrṇṇam aniṣṭena asaṃsṛṣṭam iṣṭam eva artham apauruṣeyebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ jānīyām iti kṛtvā saṃkarasya iṣṭā niṣṭa vyatikarasya hetuḥ puruṣa upākīrṇṇaḥ vahiṣkṛtaḥ vaidikebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tatra evam avasthiteya adṛśāḥ śabdāḥ pauruṣeya abhimatāḥ puruṣaiḥ kvacid vivakṣiterthe prayuktāssaṃkīryante aniṣṭa abhidhāyaka tva sambhauvanayā tādṛśāḥ eva apauruṣeya abhimatāḥ api śabdāḥ sarva artha sādhāraṇā ssantaḥ kvacid arthe taiḥ puruṣaiḥ samayena yatheṣṭam viniyamitāḥ 
PVVṬ_415,2^2	 kim kāraṇam teṣām puṃsān tattva aparijñānāt prakṛtyā eva svabhāvena eva vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ niyata aabhimaterthe tatas na puruṣa saṃskāra kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced evam satyartha prakāśanena upadeśam apekṣeran apekṣante ca svatas tebhyortha pratīteḥ abhāvāt yadi ca te svabhāvataḥ eva pratiniyatāḥ syuḥ tadā yatra kvacid arthe ekadā samitāḥ punar kathaṃcid tatonyathā saṃketena artha antaram na prakāśayeyuḥ prakāśayanti ca tatas na prakṛtyā eka artha niyatāḥ iti svabhāvataḥ ca eka artha niyame yoyam vaidikeṣu vākyeṣu vyākhyātṝṇāṃ vyākhyā vikalpaḥ ca apara apara vyākhyā bhedaḥ ca na syāt eka artha pratiniyamāt bhavati ca tasmāt pauruṣeya vākya vat na eka artha niyatāḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ iti 
PVVṬ_416,1	 cha atha syāt niyataḥ eva arthe teṣām upadeśaḥ iti atas āha upadeśasya ityādi vyākhyā bhedena śakya ūrtha nānātva vikalpaḥ yasmin vaidike vākye tat tathā uktantasmin śakya vikalpe vaidike vākye vyākhyātṝṇām ye upadeśaḥ tasya iṣṭa samvādaḥ na asti ayam api kadācid syāt asya artha uyam anyaḥ vā iti niyama abhāvāt iti hetaḥ vyartha eva apauruṣeya tā tām api kalpayitvā vyabhicāra aśaṃkāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ 
PVVṬ_416,2	 ja yaḥ ca śabda arthayoḥ sambandham icchati tena vācyaḥ ca hetuḥ sambandhasya vyavasthiteḥ sambandha vyavasthāyāḥ keṣām bhinnānām paraspara bhinnānām śabda arthānām na tāvat śabda arthayoḥ tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ yasmāt arthāḥ hibāhyāḥ ghaṭa paṭa ādayaḥ śabdasya na rūpam na svabhāvaḥ śabda rūpa tve hi ghaṭa ādīnām abhāvaḥ syāt na api śavdorthānām rūpam artha rūpa tve hi śabda rūpa tā hā ni prasaṅgāt yena abhinna ātma tayā antarīyaka tā syāt avinā bhāvitā syāt vyavasthā bhedepi iti vyāvṛtti bheda samāśrayeṇa sādhya sādhana bhedepi kim iva kṛtaka tvā anitya tva vat yathā kṛta ka tva anitya tvayoḥ vyāvṛtti bhedepi eka ātma tayā na antarīyaka tā tadvat 
PVVṬ_416,3–416,5	 tad utpatti lakṣaṇopi sambandhaḥ na asti iti āha na api ityādi etat āha tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ hi śabdānām sambandhaḥ bhavan vivakṣā pratiṣṭhitena ca arthena syāt bāhyena vā na tāvat ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ yasmāt na api ete vaidikāḥ dhvanayaḥ vivakṣā janmānaḥ iṣyante vivakṣātaḥ janma yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ nitya tva aṃbhyupagamāt ajanmānaḥ vā anutpannāḥ vā santaḥ na api vivakṣā vyaṅgyāḥ nitya tva hāni prasaṃgāt vyaṅgyānām utpādya tvāt iti uktam prāk na api dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ iti āha na artha āyattā iti na api bāhya artha āyattāḥ nitya tvāt eva 
PVVṬ_416,6	 anye tu ekam eva grantham kṛtvā vyācakṣate yasmāt na vivakṣā janmānaḥ nāpita dvi aṅgyāḥ tasmāt ubhayathā api na artha āyattā na bāhye vastuni pratibaddhāḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ yatas ca na artha āyattāḥ tatas tasmāt idānīm iti sambandha abhāve tad anvayam tasya arthasya anvayam sadbhāvam te śabdāḥ katham sādhayeyuḥ na eva sādhayeyuḥ kimbhūtam tad pratiniyama saṃsādhyam tasmin bāhyerthe tādātmya tad utpattibhyām yaḥ pratiniyamaḥ śabdānām tena saṃsādhyam bāhyerthe apratibandhena niyama abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_417,1^1	 uktam eva artha ślokena saṃgṛhṇāti asaṃskāryatayā ityādi sarvayā iti yadi puruṣaiḥ artha abhiprāyeṇa śabdāḥ na kriyante na api saṃketyante tadā pumbhiḥ asaṃskārya tayā hetu bhūtayā vaidikānām śabdānāt nirarthatā syāt yasmāt puruṣa saṃskāra prabaddhe śabdānām sattya artha tva mithyā artha tve tena tad abhāvāt nirartha tā eva syāt nirarthata aparihāra artha punar puruṣa saṃskāra upagame kriyamāṇe mithyā artha tā api syāt iti mukhyam ga ja snā na midam bhavet gajaḥ hi paṅka apanayanāya snātvā punar paṅkena ātmānam avakirati iti nityaḥ anityaḥ vā syāt iti vastunaḥ gati antara abhāvāt puruṣa icchā vṛttiḥ puruṣa icchā vaśāt utpannaḥ syāt ākuñcana ādi vat 
PVVṬ_417,1^2	 avṛttiḥ vā na asya puruṣa icchayā vṛttiḥ aṅkura ādi vat tatra anityā puruṣa adhīna tva pakṣe deśa ādi parāvṛttyā deśa ādīnām anyathātvena ādi śabdāt kāla avasthā grahaṇam puruṣāṇām yathā abhiprāyam iti yena puruṣeṇa yathā pratipādayitum iṣṭan tathā tena śabdena pratipādanan na syāt iti sambandhaḥ kim kāraṇam puruṣa pratipādana icchāyām satyām api anāyattasya śabdasya kadācid ayogāt puruṣeṇa niyoktuṅ kadācid api aśakya tvāt iti arthaḥ parvata ādi vat yathā parvata ādayaḥ puruṣān āyattāḥ satyām api icchāyām na yatheṣṭam niyoktumpāryante tadvat dṛṣṭaḥ ca deśa ādi parāvṛtyāḥ yathā abhiprāyam pratipādanam tasmāt puruṣeṣu anāyattaḥ sambandhaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_418,1–418,2	 anityasya sambandhasya apuruṣa adhīna tve yoyam anantara uktaḥ doṣaḥ ayam eva sambandhasya anitya tvepi doṣaḥ kim kāraṇam tasya sambandhasya sthira svabhāvasya deśa ādi parāvṛttyā parāvṛttya ayogāt anyathā tu asya ayogāt ākāśa vat  kaḥ atha sarveṣu eva artheṣu sambaddhaḥ śabdaḥ tatra api āha samam ityādi samam eka kālam sarvasmin= arthe sambandhasya avasthānepi kalpyamānaḥ iṣṭaḥ yorthaḥ tasmin pratiniyāma abhāvāt tatas sarva artha sādhāraṇāt artha viśeṣasya abhimatasya pratītiḥ na kṛtvā aneka artha sambaddhopi śabdaḥ puruṣa saṃskārāt iṣṭa artha niyamam pratipadyate iti aṅgīkarttavyantatra ca pūrvavat prasaṃgaḥ aneka artha abhisambandhe viruddha vyakti sambhave ityādinā yaḥ uktaḥ evantāvat nitya tve sambandhasya anitya tvepya puruṣa adhīna tve doṣaḥ uktaḥ puruṣa icchā vṛttau ca sambandhasya pauruṣeya tvam iti kṛtvā vipralambhana śaṅkā visamvāda hetoḥ puruṣasya abhyupagamāt 
PVVṬ_418,3^1	 kha api ca ityādi tatra eva dūṣaṇa antaram āha dvividhaḥ hi śabdānām viṣayaḥ sākṣāt jātiḥ tad lakṣitā ca vyaktiḥ iti tatra yadi vyaktyā saha sambandhaḥ tatra āha sambandhinām vācyānām arthānām anitya tvāt teṣu vinaśyatsu sambandhasya api tad āśritasya vināśaḥ iti na sambandha isti nityatā para āśrayaḥ iti para ssambandhī āśrayosya iti kṛtvā sambandhini sambandhasya apratibandhe sati tayoḥ sambandhi nā ussambandhitāyāḥ ayogāt na hi apratibaddhena kenacid kaścid tadvān bhavati gauḥ iva aśvena sa ca āśrayaḥ śabda artha sambandhasya anitya ūrthānām anitya tvāt 
PVVṬ_418,3^2	 apāyevināśesya āśrayasya sambandhasya api āśritasya apāyaḥ pradīpa apāye prabhāyāḥ iva tad āśritāyāḥ anyathā yadi āśrayā apāyepi āśritaḥ na apaiti itīṣyate tad āśraya abhimate sambandhaḥ na āśritaḥ syāt tat āśraya vināśe vināśān na nityaḥ sambandhaḥ tad āśraya arthaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ tasya sambandhasya sambandhinau kena arthena āśrayāt iti āśraya arthaḥ vācyaḥ upakāra arthaḥ hi āśraya arthaḥ sa ca iha na asti kim kāraṇam nityasya sambandhasya anupakārya tvāt anādheya atiśaya tvāt anupakurvāṇaḥ ca āśraya abhimataḥ na āśrayaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_419,1–419,3	 syāt etat yadi vyaktiḥ vācyā tadā syāt anantara uktaḥ doṣaḥ yāvatā nityāyāḥ jāteḥ vācya tvāt adoṣaḥ sambandhinām apāyena sambandhasya anitya tā doṣaḥ na asti iti ced na ityādinā prativacanam tad vacane jāti vacane prayojana abhāvāt iti nirloṭhitam etat anyāpaḥ ha ci ntā yām api pravarttata pumān vijñāya artha kriyā kṣamān iti atra antare sarvatra ca abhidhāne jāteḥ asambhavāt kāraṇāt jāti codanāyāḥ ayogaḥ yathā yādṛt chikeṣu vyakti vāciṣu bāhyam nimittam antareṇa śabda prayoga icchā yadṛcchā tasyām bhavāḥ yādṛcchikāḥ teṣu deva datta ādi śabdeṣu vyakti vāciṣu 
PVVṬ_419,4	 catuṣṭayī śabdānām pravṛttiḥ iti keṣāṃcid darśanam jāti śabdāḥ guṇa śabdāḥ kriyā śabdāḥ yadṛcchā śabdāḥ iti teṣām matena etat uktam atha devadatta ādi śabda upyavasthā bhedena jāti vācakaḥ iṣyate tadā sarvadā jāti codanebhyupagamyamāne viśeṣa antara vyudāsena vyakti antara parityāgena kvacid abhimate vyakti antaram pravṛtyayogāt cana jāti abhidhānam dṛṣṭā ca go svāminā gāmānaya iti ukte anya svāmika go vyudāsena viniyatā eva goḥ a ānayana arthampravṛttiḥ sā ca evam syāt yadi prakaraṇa ādinā go śabdaḥ viśeṣa vṛttiḥ syāt na ca gorthasya ānayanam asti iti vākya artha pratītiḥ api na syāt tasmāt na sarvatra jātiḥ codyate yatas evam vāstavaḥ sambandhaḥ na saṃgacchate prakṛti bhinnānām tasmāt anvaya vi ati rekiṇaḥ iti bhāva abhāvavataḥ bhāvasya kārya ubhimatasya kāraṇa abhimata bhāva abhāva dvāreṇa yau bhāva abhāvau saḥ eva sambandhaḥ janya janaka bhāvaā ivā bhinnānām sambandhaḥ iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_420,1	 yatas evam atas kāraṇāt arthaiḥ kāraṇa bhūtaiḥ saha kārya ātmanām śabdānām sambandhaḥ puruṣaiḥkartṛbhiḥ ddhiyā buddhyā saṃskāryaḥ vyavasthāpyaḥ arthe sati śabdasya prayogāt asati ca aprayogāt atha bhāva abhāva dvāreṇa śabdasya yau bhāva abhāvau tau= āśritya buddhyā śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ vyavasthāpyate iti vākya arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_420,2	 etat eva vyācaṣṭe tau= eva ityādi artha dvāreṇa śabdasya yau bhāva abhāva autau= āśritya svabhāvena asaṃsṛṣṭau= api śabda arthau= asambandhinau saṃsṛṣṭau sambaddhau puruṣasya pratibhātaḥ vikalpa buddhau pratibhāsete kutas vyavahāra bhāvanātaḥ anādika ālīna vyavahāra abhyāsataḥ iti hetoḥ pauruṣeyaḥ bhāvānām śabda arthānām saṃśleṣaḥ sambandhaḥ vyavahāra vāsanā balena avasthāpyamāna tvātaḥ 
PVVṬ_420,3	 vastu bhūta sambandha abhyupagame ayam aparaḥ doṣaḥ iti āha kiṃca ityādi vācya tvena abhimatasya āśrayasya vināśāt avinaṣṭe sambandhe sa tasya vācaka tvena abhimataḥ śābdaḥ sambandhaḥ na asya sambandha usti iti kṛtvā tad abhāvaḥ tasmāt asambandhāt punar apūrveṇa vācyena na yojyeta tatas ca utpanna utpannāḥ ca bhāvāḥ avācyāḥ syuḥ asambandhinaḥ yatas asambandhinaḥ eva kutas sthita sambandha abhāvāt ye yaḥ utpadyante teṣu teṣu na tāvat utpādāt pūrvam sambandhaḥ sthitaḥ dviṣṭhasya tasya sambandhinam antareṇa sthāna ayogāt tatra api ityādi tatra api utpanna utpanneṣu artheṣu taiḥ eva arthaiḥ saha sambandhasya utpāde yosau paścāt arthena sambandhaḥ utpadyate tad sambandhi svabhāva tā pūrvat na asti sambandha abhāvāt paścāt tu bhavati iti svabhāva viparyayaḥ śabdānām syāt sa ca nitya tvāt na yujyate 
PVVṬ_421,1	 atha ityādi vyākhyānam pūrva sambandhi vināśe vinaṣṭaḥ sambandhaḥ yasya śabdasya tasya artha antare paścāt utpanne vaiguṇyam sambandha vaikalyam tasmāt ca arthānāmpaścāt utpannānām avācya tā mā bhūt iti kṛtvā utpanna utpanna ūrthaḥ sambandhavān agṛhīta sambandhaḥ eva yadi utpadyeta tathā api sambandhaḥ utpannopi na śabde syāt śabdaḥ tena sambandhena tadvān na syāt kiṅkāraṇam tasya śabdasya tena paścāt utpannena sambandhena asambandhi svabhāvasya tad bhāva ayogāt tena sambandhena sambandhi svabhāva ayogāt kadā svabhāva viparyayam antareṇa pūrva asambandhi svabhāva tyāgam antareṇa doṣa antaram api āha arthena saha utpannasya ca sambandhasya śabdāt anyatas siddhasya anupakāriṇi śabde tasya asamāśraya tvāt ca tad bhāva ayogaḥ eva 
PVVṬ_421,2	 atha tasya api śabdasya tad utpatti sahakāri tve sambandha utpattim prati sahakāri tve kalpyamāne samarthasya śabdasya nitya utpādana prasaṃgaḥ sarvakālam sambandha janana prasaṃgaḥ kim kāraṇam sahakārī anapekṣa tvāt anapekṣa tvam punar nityasya śabdasya sahakāribhiḥ anupakārāt atha asamarthaḥ saha kāri apekṣayā janayet tadā prāc sambandha jananam pratyasāmarthyepi paścāt api arthe sannidhi kālepya śaktiḥ kim kāraṇam pūrva asamartha svabhāva atyāgāt vastu bhūte sambandhe yaḥ doṣoyam vikalpite buddhi sandarśite sambandhe na asti 
PVVṬ_421,3	 na hi ityādi vyākhyānam tad apekṣā teṣām bhāvānām paraspara apekṣā kutaścid nimittāt buddhi parikalpitāt tad lakṣaṇa ssambandhaḥ puruṣa bhāvanā pratibhāsī puruṣasya bhāvanā abhyāsavatī vikalpa buddhiḥ tatra pratibhāsitum śīlam asya iti kṛtvā sa ca evam pauruṣeya ssambandhaḥ na bhāva śleṣa apekṣī bhāva śleṣaḥ miśratā tad apekṣī na bhavati sarveṣa ambhāvānām prakṛti bhedena sva svarūpa avasthānāt kevalam soyam puruṣaḥ nityānām api svabhāvam ātmīyam aparāvarttayan= a sambandhi svabhāvam sthiram apanīya anyam sambandhi svabhāvam anādadhat kutaścid iti tad bhāve kasyacid bhāva darśanāt antar tathā bhūta vyavahāra vāsanā paripākāt vā svayam utprekṣya idam iha sambandham iti ghaṭayet iti puruṣa vyavahāra abhyāsāt tepi nitya abhimatāḥ tathā syuḥ puruṣa upakalpita sambandhavantaḥ syuḥ na ca tāvatā te pūrva vyavasthitāt asambandhi svabhāvāt cyavana dharmāṇaḥ 
PVVṬ_422,1	 etat uktam bhavati buddhi parikalpitaḥ sambandhaḥ tvad parikalpitaḥ sambandhaḥ tvad parikalpiteṣu api nityeṣu na virudhyate tasmāt saḥ eva āśrayitum yuktaḥ na vāstavaḥ iti yat uktam prāc āśrayasya apāyena kāraṇena āśritasya sambandhasya vināśāt anityaḥ sambandha eti tatra etasmin dūṣaṇe nitya tvāt sambandhasya āśraya apāyepya nāśaḥ yadi jāti vat iti ucyate yathā jāteḥ nitya tvāt āśraya nāśepya nāśaḥ tadvat sambandhasya iti 
PVVṬ_422,2–422,3	 atra api āha nityeṣu āśraya abhimateṣu jāti ādiṣu api kāyaṣu kim āśrayasya sāmarthyat na eva yena iṣṭaḥ sokiñcitkaraḥ āśrayaḥ śrūyate ityādi vivaraṇam śrūyate iti anena prasiddhi mātram etat nirvastukam iti etat āha vyakti āśritā kevalat = ityeṣu jāti ādiṣu āśraya sāmarthyam āśraya kṛtam upakāran na paśyāmaḥ yena asau= āśraya abhimataḥ āśrayaḥ syāt kim kāraṇam kṛtasya siddha svabhāvasya kāraṇa abhāvāt akārakasya ca āśrayasya anapekṣa tvāt āśrayāt sakāśāt jāteḥ sambandhasya ca vyaktiḥ abhivyakti rūpasya tu yogyatā bhavati sā eva ca āśraya kṛtaḥ upakāraḥ tena kāraṇena padārthaḥ āśrayaḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_422,4	 uttaram āha jñāna ityādi sahakāriṇām jñāna utpādana hetūnām pradīpa ādīnāṃ sambandhāt yogya deśa avasthānāt sakāśāt tad utpādana yogya tvena sva anurūpa jñāna utpādana sāmarthyena ghaṭa ādiṣu api vyaṃgyeṣu yotpattiḥ sā eva yukti jñaiḥ nyāya vidbhiḥ vyaktiḥ iṣyate jāti ādīn āntu vyaṅgyānāt nitya tvāt avikāriṇām vyañjakāt sakāśāt aviśeṣe jñāna utpādana yogya tā anutpattau svaiḥ vyañjakaiḥ teṣām jāti ādīnām korthaḥ kaḥ upakāraḥ kṛtaḥ na eva kaścid yatas te jāti ādayaḥ taiḥ vyañjakaiḥ vyaktāḥ matāḥ 
PVVṬ_423,1–423,2	 sahakāriṇaḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sahakāriṇaḥ pradīpa ādeḥ sakāśāt kimbhūtāt upādāna apekṣāt pūrva kojñāna jananā samarthaḥ ghaṭa ādi lakṣaṇa upādānakāraṇam samarthasya ghaṭa ādi lakṣaṇasya ghaṭa apekṣa tvāt sva viṣaya jñāna jananam prati yogyasya kṣaṇa antarasya utpattiḥ eva ghaṭa ādīnām abhivyaktiḥ anyathā yadi pradīpa ādessakāśāt jñāna utpādana yogya tām na labhante ghaṭa ādayaḥ tadā anapekṣya tad upakāram pradīpa upakāram ghaṭa ādīnām jñāna janana prasaṅgāt atha pradīpa ādiḥ prāc asamarthasya vyaṃgyasya sāmarthyam karoti itīṣyate tadā sāmarthya kāriṇaḥ ca pradīpa ādeḥ ghaṭa ādīn prati janaka tvāt kim kāraṇam tasya sāmarthyasya tad ātmaka tvāt avyaṃgya ātmaka tvāt tasya janane ghaṭa ādiḥ eva janitaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_423,3^1	 atha mā abhūt eṣa doṣaḥ iti pradīpa ādi kṛtasya sāmarthyasya vyaṃgyāt artha antara tvam iṣyate tadā artha antara tve ca sāmarthyasya abhyupagamyamāne bhāvasya ghaṭa ādeḥ pradīpa ādibhiḥ anupakāra prasaṅgāt na hi anyasmin kṛtenyaḥ upakṛtaḥ bhavati atiprasaṃgāt yat ca pradīpa ādi kṛtam sāmarthyam artha antarantasmāt ca ghaṭa ādi jñāna utpatteḥ sāmarthyam eva sarvakālam gṛhyeta iti sva viṣaya jñāna ajananānām ghaṭa ādīnām nityam agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt iṣyate ca ghaṭa ādīnām grahaṇāt tadā api anāloka apekṣa grahaṇa prasaṃgāt ālokam anapekṣya ghaṭa ādīnā aṅgrahaṇam prasajyeta iti arthaḥ ālokān apekṣā eva katham iti ced āha anapekṣa ityādi yā iyam ghaṭa ādīnām āloka anapekṣā prasaktā sā ātma anupakārāt pradīpa ādibhiḥ ghaṭa ādi ātmanā unu pakārāt vyatiriktasya hi sāmarthyasya karaṇena ghaṭa ādīnām kaścid upakāraḥ tat iti tasmāt ime vyaṃgyāḥ sva viṣaya jñāna janane parampradīpa ādikam apekṣamāṇāḥ
