PVVṬ_514,1–514,3	 kaḥ pūrveṇa kāṣṭhena asya vahni kṛtasya vināśasya sambandhaḥ iti saḥ eva prasaṃgaḥ kāṣṭhaḥ iti kaḥ sambandhaḥ iti anantaram eva uktaḥ atha api āśraya āśrayi bhāva ādikam āśrīyate tadā tasya niṣetsyamāna tvāt ityādi sarvam punar āvarttate iti aparyavasānaḥ ca prasaṅgaḥ syāt tat iti tasmāt avaśyam vināśa sambandhasya yogyaṅ kāṣṭhasya uttaram atiśayam pratyupakurvāṇa ugniḥ apūrvam eva kāṣṭhañjanayati iti pūrvam kāṣṭhantat avasthan dṛśyeta iti upasaṃhāraḥ 
PVVṬ_514,4	 kiñca kāṣṭha vināśaḥ iti kāṣṭhābhāvaḥ ucyate na ca abhāvaḥ kāryaḥ vidhinā kāryatva upagame tasya bhāva tva prasaṅgāt tasmāt abhāvam karoti bhāvat na karoti iti kriyā pratiṣedha mātram tathā ca tad kārī ca abhāva kārī vā ākāraḥ eva kriyā pratiṣedha mātra tvāt iti kṛtvā kāṣṭha vināśena vahni ādiḥ anapekṣaṇīyaḥ iti uktam sāmānya tad vatora ādhāra ādheya cintā sthāne 
PVVṬ_514,5	 kiñca svabhāva abhāvasya kāṣṭha ādi svabhāvasya yaḥ abhāvaḥ nāśaḥ tasya tatas kāṣṭha ādi svabhāvāt bhedebhī upagamyamāne tatā ūrtha antarāt abhāvāt kāṣṭhādiḥ bhāvaḥ nivarttate tatas tasmāt abhāvat nivarttamānasya kāṣṭha ādeḥ svabhāvaḥ eva samarthitaḥ syāt asataḥ nivarttamānasya sattvam eva samarthitam syāt iti kṛtvā katham agni ādi kṛtena vināśena kāṣṭhādiḥ abhūtaḥ nāma 
PVVṬ_514,6–514,7	 yatas evantasmāt na anyonyasya vināśaḥ artha antaram artha antarasya na vināśaḥ iti arthaḥ abhyupagamya api brūmaḥ astu anyaḥ vināśaḥ tasmin= artha antare vahni kṛte kāṣṭhantat avastham eva iti kasmāt na dṛśyate etat eva sādhayan= āha koyam virodhaḥ sya yaḥ bhāvaḥ yat ca kāṣṭhasya darśanantayoḥ tathā ca kāṣṭhantadava stham dṛśyeta 
PVVṬ_515,1	 nanuyosa avartha antaram bhāvaḥ vahni kṛtaḥ sa kāṣṭha vināśaḥ vināśa rūpa tayā pratīteḥ vināśaḥ ca abhāvaḥ yaḥ ca kāṣṭhābhāvaḥ sa kāṣṭha virodhi rūpaḥ eva kriyate na ca ayam artha antara tvāt ghaṭa vat virodhi rūpa tayā karttum aśakyaḥ na hi ghaṭa vat artha antara tvāt dhūma ugni kāryaḥ na bhavati tasmāt yathārtha antara bhūta upi dhūma ugninā kriyate tathā virodhi rūpaḥ vināśaḥ kriyate yayoḥ ca paraspara parihāreṇa virodhaḥ tayoḥ eka bhāvaḥ eva aparasya adarśanam iti katham agni kṛtasya artha antarasya vināśa saṃjñitasya virodhinaḥ bhāve kāṣṭhasya darśanam syāt iti ucyate iti śaḥ ṅka raḥ 
PVVṬ_515,2	 tat ayuktam yata ūrtha antarasya agni kārya tvena saha virodha abhāvāt dhūmamya artha antara tvepi agni kārya tvam aviruddham eva vahni kṛtasya tu artha antarasya bhavana dharma tayā bhāva rūpa tā yaḥ ca bhāvaḥ sa katham abhāvaḥ vaḥ virodhāt vināśaḥ ca abhāvaḥ iṣyate tata ūrtha antara bhāvena viruddhaḥ vināśaḥ na ca artha antarasya api vināśa rūpa tayā pratibhāsanāt kāṣṭha ādi vināśa rūpa tā svarasa nirodhaḥ hi nimittam vināśa pratibhāse 
PVVṬ_515,3–515,5	 svarasa nirodha anabhyupagame tu katham artha antarasya api vināśa rūpa tayā pratibhāsaḥ bhāva rūpa tvāt iti ādau= eva uktam tat katham ucyate vināśa ākhyasya artha antarasya virodhinaḥ kṛtaka tvāt kāṣṭhasya adarśanam iti nīrūpa tve tu vināśasya syāt bhāvena sahāyam virodhaḥ kintu tadā api artha antara tvam hetu janya tvam ca asya na syāt nīrūpa tvāt eva tasmāt agninā artha antarasya karaṇe kāṣṭhantat ava stham dṛśyeta tena agni kṛtena artha antareṇa parigrahataḥ svīkārāt kāṣṭham na dṛśyate iti ced eva sati tad artha antaram kāṣṭhasya āvaraṇam iti prāptam tat ca na yuktam yatas na tena artha antareṇa kāṣṭhasya āvaraṇam sambhavati 
PVVṬ_515,6	 yadi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe tena artha antareṇa agninā kṛtena tat iti agni kṛtam artha antaram na ca etat āvaraṇa kalpitam yuktam yasmāt āvaraṇam hi āvriyamāṇertha darśanam vibadhnīyāt na abhighāta āvīni dravya sāmarthyāni vibadhnīyāt andhakāra āvṛtānām ghaṭa ādīnām abhidhāta ādi darśanāt tatra sva deśe parasya utpatti vibandha ubhighātaḥ ādi śabdāt gandha rasa ādi parigrahaḥ atha āvaraṇam sarva sāmarthyam kāṣṭhasya nibadhnīyāt tadā sarva pratibandhe ca abhyupagamyamāne na tu anena eva āvaraṇena kāṣṭhat nāśitam syāt na vahninā kim kāraṇam tena eva asya kāṣṭhasya sarva śakti pracyāvanāt tathā ca sati punar tatra api agni kṛtertha antare nāśa heta a= agnau= iva prasaṃgāt kāṣṭha vināśam prati yognau doṣaḥ vistareṇa uktaḥ sortha antareṇa api agni kṛtena kāṣṭha nāśe kriyamāṇe syāt tathā ca anavasthā tena api artha antareṇa agni kṛtena nāśena aparam artha antarad nāśa ākhyam kartta vyantena api aparam iti anavasthā syāt 
PVVṬ_516,1–516,2	 atha mā bhūt eṣa doṣaḥ iti apracyutāḥ eva kāṣṭhasya abhidhāta ādi sāmarthya ādayaḥ tadā api apracyuteṣu vā asya kāṣṭhasya abhighāta sāmarthya ādiṣu satā vā tena anyena agni janitena kāṣṭhasya kim vināśitam yena tadāvaraṇan tathā ca kāṣṭham dṛśyeta yadi ca ityādi agneḥ samudbhavaḥ yasya iti vigrahaḥ agni samudbhūtena vināśa ākhyena arthena parigrahāt iti arthaḥ tadā vināśasya vināśi tvam syāt kim kāraṇam utpatteḥ utpattima tvāt vināśa upi kāṣṭha vat vināśī syāt iti yāvat tatas vināśa vināśāt punar kāṣṭhasya darśanam syāt 
PVVṬ_516,3–516,4	 avaśyam ityādinā vyācaṣṭe utpattimatā satā kāṣṭha vināśena avaśyam vinaṣṭavyam tasmin kāṣṭha nāśe vinaṣṭe sati punar kāṣṭha ādīnām unmajjanam syāt prādurbhāvaḥ bhavet hantu ghāta ityādinā paramāśaṃkate caitrasya yaḥ hantā tasya hantuḥ ghāte sati yathā hatasya caitrasya apunarbhāvaḥ punar anutpattiḥ atra api kāṣṭha nāśe vinaṣṭepi evam kāṣṭhasya apunarbhāvaḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_517,1–517,2	 hantuḥ iti ādinā pratividhatte na idam samādhānam yuktam kim kāraṇam hantuḥ amaraṇa tvataḥ na hi hantā caitrasya maraṇa svabhāvaḥ kintarhi mārayitā tatas yuktam yat tad nāśe caitrasya apunarbhavanam maraṇe tu anivṛtte avaśyam punar bhavanam syāt vināśa ityādinā vyācaṣṭe vināśasya vināśepi na vastunaḥ pratyāpattiḥ na pūrvarūpa gamanam yasmāt na hi hantari hatepi tadvataḥ tena hantrā puruṣeṇa hataḥ pratyujjīvati na ayamparihāraḥ yuktaḥ kasmāt hantuḥ puruṣasya tad ghāta hetu tvāt tasya caitrasya yat maraṇantad hetu tvāt na tu asau hantā maraṇa svabhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_517,3	 etat eva spaṣṭayan= āha na ityādi nāśa hetoḥ agni daṇḍa ādeḥ nivṛttau satyām vinaṣṭena bhāvena punar bhavativyam iti na brūmaḥ evam abhidhāne bhavet eṣa parihāraḥ kintarhi vah nyādinā kāṣṭhādeḥ bhāvasya abhāvaḥ yaḥ kriyate tasya kimbhūtasya atyanta anupalabdhi lakṣaṇasya karmma sthā ca kriyātra upalabdhiḥ tad pratiṣedhena atyanta anupalabdhiḥ sarva sāmarthya virahaḥ ucyate tasya evaṃbhūtasya abhāvasya nivṛtta ausatyām svabhāva avasthiteḥ sakāśāt bhāvasya kā anyā gatiḥ svabhāva sthitiḥ eva gatiḥ iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_517,4–517,6	 hantari tu vinaṣṭe na yuktam punar bhavanam yasmāt hantā hi caitrasya na nāśa kalpaḥ kintarhi daṇḍa ādi kalpaḥ daṇḍa ādi tulyaḥ nāśa hetu tvāt nāśa kalpam hi asya caitrasya maraṇam tad nivṛttau tasya nāśa kalpasya maraṇasya nivṛttau syāt eva asya caitrasya punarbhāvaḥ evantā vat nāśasya artha antara tve doṣaḥ uktaḥ anartha antara tvam adhikṛtya āha ananya tvepi ityādi vastunaḥ nāśasya ananya tvepi syāt nāśaḥ kāṣṭham eva tu tasya ca kāṣṭhasya sva hetoḥ utpannasya satvāt na vahni ādibhiḥ kiñcid karttavyam iti tad svabhāvasya nāśasya ahetu tvam na atas tattva anyatva vikalpāt nāśasya vastu dharmasya vidyatenyā gatiḥ 
PVVṬ_518,1–518,2	 anartha antaraḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe kāṣṭhāt anartha antara bhūtaḥ yadā vināśaḥ tadā atat eva kāṣṭham eva tat vināśa ākhyam vastu bhavati tat ca kāṣṭha ādi vahni ādi sannidhānāt prāk eva asti iti kim atra kāṣṭha ādau vināśye sāmarthyam vahni ādīnām iti draṣṭavyam kvacid daṇḍa ādīnām iti pāṭhaḥ sa tu ghaṭa ādīn purodhāya vyākhyeyaḥ tasmāt tad anukārāt tatra kāṣṭha ādau vināśa hetūnām anupakārāt tena kāṣṭha ādinā vināśa hetavaḥ na apekṣyante kathaṃcid kena api rūpeṇa na api asya kāṣṭa ādeḥ idam vahni ādikam vināśa hetuḥ iti sambandham arhati kim kāraṇam tasya upakāra nibandhana tvāt anyathā upakāram antareṇa sambandha kalpanāyām ati prasaṃgāt sarvaḥ sarvasya sambandhī syāt syāt etat na sākṣāt vanhi ādiḥ kāṣṭha ādeḥ upakārakaḥ kintu tad sambandhi bhūta upakāra karaṇāt iti 
PVVṬ_518,3	 atas āha pāramparyeṇa ityādi vahni ādinā kāṣṭha ādeḥ sambandhi bhūtaḥ upakāraḥ kriyate na sākṣāt iti evam pāramparyeṇa upakārepi kalpyamāne avaśyam ayam vikalpā unveti anugacchati sa kimpa āramparyeṇa api upakāra ūrtha antaram āhosvit tat eva kāṣṭha ādikam iti tatra tasmāt kāṣṭha ādeḥ artha antara tvepi upakārasya tasya kāṣṭha ādeḥ ayam upakāra eti kassambandhaḥ iti tatra kāṣṭha ādau tasya agni kṛtasya upakārasya upakāraka tvaṃparyanuyojyam tad antareṇa sambandha abhāvāt ādi śabdāt tatra api apara upakāra kalpanā iti anavasthā doṣa ādi parigrahaḥ tathā ananya tvepi upakārasya tad avasthaḥ paryanuyogaḥ syāt nāśaḥ kāṣṭham eva ityādinā yaḥ uktaḥ tasmāt sataḥ vidyamānasya rūpasya tattva anyat tva avyatikramāt kāraṇāt 
PVVṬ_518,4–519,1	 syāt etat sataḥ rūpasya tattva anyat tva avyatikramāt vināśa hetu kṛtam tu upakāra utpāda nam asat evā iti atas āha upakāra ityādi rūpa niṣpādana lakṣaṇa tvāt sat rūpa niṣpādana lakṣaṇa tvāt tatas ca tat vā vastu tena vināśakena karttavyam anyat vā ubhayathā ca uktaḥ doṣaḥ iti tad atad kriyā vikalaḥ nāśa hetuḥ na kartā eva eti na kasyacid hetuḥ ahetuḥ cadaṇḍa ādi na apekṣyate vinaśvareṇa ghaṭa ādinā tasmāt svayam sattā mātreṇa ayambhāvaḥ tad tad svabhāvaḥ vinaśvara svabhāvaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_519,2–519,4	 pradhvaṃsa abhāvat nāśam gṛhītvā parasya ca udyam āśaṃkate ahetu tvepī ityādi ahetuḥ hi bhavat niti ambhavet nitya tvāt ca bhāva kālepi nāśaḥ bhavet iti evambhāva nāśayoḥ sahabhāva prasaṅgaḥ ced na ayan doṣaḥ kim kāraṇam asataḥ pradhvaṃsa lakṣaṇasya nāśasya nitya tā kutas syāt etat ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yadi api nāśaḥ kṣaṇika vādinaḥ ahetukaḥ sa uvaśyam nityaḥ iti kṛtvā bhāvaḥ tad abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ vināśa nivṛtti rūpaḥ vināśaḥ ca tad abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ bhāva nivṛtti rūpaḥ ekasya saha syātām iti 
PVVṬ_519,5–519,6	 na etat evam kasmāt tasya abhāvasya avastu tvena nitya ādi dharma ayogāt na hi asati ayat nitya anitya vikalpa ssambhavati tayoḥ nityayoḥ vastu dharma tvāt vināśasya ca bhāva nivṛtti lakṣaṇasya akiñcit tvāt kim ca bhavataḥ hi utpadyamānasya nityam sattvāt kenacid sahabhāvaḥ syāt na ca vināśaḥ bhavati kevalam eka kṣaṇa sthiti dharmāḥ bhāvaḥ svayam eva na bhavati iti kriyā pratiṣedha mātram etat tasmāt adoṣonantara uktaḥ 
PVVṬ_519,7–520,1	 punar api para abhiprāyam āśaṃkate yadi vināśaḥ sanniṣyate tadā vināśasya asattve satyabhāva nāśi tva prasaṃgaḥ bhāvasya nāśi tvam na syāt iti ayam api prasaṅgaḥ na yujyate yasmāt bhāvasya nāśena artha antareṇa na asmābhiḥ vināśanam iṣyate katham ityādinā vyācaṣṭe katham asan vināśaḥ bhāvam nāśayet asataḥ vyāpāra ayogāt atas kāraṇāt avināśī bhāvaḥ syāt iti aprasaṃgaḥ eva kim kāraṇam vināśāt artha antara bhūtāt bhāvasya nāśa anabhyupagamāt 
PVVṬ_520,2–520,3	 yaḥ hi ityādina etat eva samarthayate yaḥ hi vādī vināśaḥ iti kiṃcid na iti āha sa kathantataḥ niḥsvabhāvāt nāśāt bhāvasya nāśam icchet na icchet katham ityādi paraḥ asatya vidyamāne vināśe kathambhāvaḥ naṣṭaḥ nāma na eva vinaṣṭaḥ syāt tathā hi pratyutpanna avasthāyām asat vināśāḥ asat vināśaḥ yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ te na hi naṣṭāḥ gaṇyante yadā ca bhāvasya nāśaḥ na asti tadā kathantena sa vyapadiśyate nāśavān iti na hi yaḥ yena svabhāvena atadvān asambandhavān sa padārthaḥ tena asambandhinā tathā vyapadiśyate tat vān iti vyapadiśyate śabdena pratīyate vā jñānena 
PVVṬ_520,4–520,7	 na ityādinā pariharati na vai bhāvasya nāśaḥ na asti eva api tu asti eva nāśaḥ kathantarhi na asti iti ucyate sa tu na asti nāśaḥ yaḥ bhāvasya bhavati yadi vināśaḥ na bhavati kathantarhi vināśa usti iti ucyate iti āha bhāvaḥ eva tu kṣaṇa sthiti dharmāḥ eka kṣaṇa sthāyī nāśaḥ yadi bhāvaḥ eva nāśaḥ kathantarhi bhāvasya nāśaḥ bhūtaḥ iti lokaḥ vyapadiśati iti atas āha tam asya ityādi asya bhāvasya tam eka kṣaṇa sthāyi svabhāvam sadṛśa apara utpatti vipralambhāt upalakṣitam uttarakālam santāna ucchittau= anupalambhena āsthiti pratipattyā vibhāvayantaḥ niścinvantaḥ vināśosya bhāvasya bhūtaḥ iti yathā prati iti vyapadiśanti vyavahāriṇaḥ puruṣāḥ iti uktam prāk 
PVVṬ_521,1	 yasmāt na hi bhāvasya niṣpannasya kiñcid rūpa antaram vināśa ākhyam anyat vā kadācid bhavati saḥ eva bhāvaḥ kevalam sva hetubhyaḥ tathābhūta eka kṣaṇa sthāyī bhavati tat iti tasmāt na kenacid vināśa ākhyena bhavatā sa bhāvaḥ naṣṭaḥ nāma kintarhi svabhāvaḥ eva asya bhāvasya saḥ eka kṣaṇa avasthāna śīlaḥ yena sa bhāvaḥ naṣṭaḥ nāma anyathā svayam atad svabhāva tvenyasannidhāna īpya nāśāt 
PVVṬ_521,2–521,4	 yadi nāśaḥ nāma na kiñcid kathantarhi idānīm ahetukaḥ nāśaḥ bhavati iti ucyatebhavadbhiḥ yasya hi svabhāvaḥ eva na asti tasya kim ahetukaḥ sa hetukaḥ vā iti cintayā bhāvasya nāśaḥ iti vyatirekaḥ vā katham naśyan= ityādinā pariharati bhāvaḥ naśyan= apara apekṣaḥ param vināśa hetum na apekṣate iti kṛtvā na jñāpanāya iti apara apekṣa tva jñāpanāya sā nāśa avasthā asmābhiḥ ahetuḥ uktāḥ tasyāḥ nāśa avasthāyāḥ cetasā vikalpa buddhyā bhāvāt bhedam vyatirekam āropya etat uktam bhavati ahetukaḥ bhāvasya vināśaḥ bhavati iti sa hetu kosya vināśaḥ na bhavati iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_521,5	 na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na bhāvaḥ jātaḥ san= a parasmāt vināśa hetoḥ nāśam pratilabhate kim kāraṇam tathābhūtasya eva naśvara svabhāvasya eva svayam sattā hetoḥ eva jāteḥ utpatteḥ iti hetoḥ aparam anyam vināśa hetu tvena kalpitam apekṣate iti apara apekṣaḥ tathābhūtaḥ ca asau dharmaḥ ca vināśa ākhyaḥ apara apekṣa dharmaḥ tasya pratiṣedha artham sa hetuka vināśa pratiṣedha artham iti yāvat tad svabhāva jñāpanena iti bhāvasya vinaśvara svabhāva jñāpanena svabhāvaḥ eva tathā ucyate iti anena sambandhaḥ tathā ucyate iti ahetu kosya vināśaḥ bhavati iti ucyate kadācid tanmātra jijñāsāyām bhāvasya anyasmāt kim vināśaḥ bhavati na ca iti etāvat mātra jijñāsāyām kena prakāreṇa ucyate dharmiṇaḥ sakāśāt artha antaram iva vināśa ākhyam dharmam cetasā buddhyā vibhajya asya bhāvasya vināśaḥ iti vibhāgam kṛtvā tat etat yathā uktena prakāreṇa abhāvāt avyatiriktat nāśitvantatvataḥ vyavasthāpitam api manda matayaḥ nāśam guṇam dharmam samāropya ātmānam ākulayanti iti anena sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_522,1	 kasmāt punar te evam ākulayanti ititi āha kvacid ityādi rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti ādau vyatireka vibhakti prayoge tathā adarśanāt sambandhinoḥ vibhāga darśanāt iha api bhāvasya nāśaḥ bhavati iti anena ghoṣaṇā mātreṇa vipralabdhāḥ bhāvasya vyatiriktaṃnāśam guṇam dharmam samāropya tasya ca yathā kalpitasya guṇasya bhāvam sattām samāropya tam nāśa ākhyam guṇam sa hetukam ahetukam vā darśana bhedena samāropya bhāva cintayā avastu cintayā kiṃbhūtayā apratiṣṭhita tattvayā apratiṣṭhitan tattvam yasyām cintāyām tayā ātmānam ākulayanti 
PVVṬ_522,2–522,3	 svatā upi iti ādinā para abhiprāyam āśaṃkate yasya api svayam eva ahetukaḥ nāśaḥ bhavati tasya api sva topya bhāvasya vināśasya bhāva iṅgīkriyamāṇe ayan tattva anyat tva lakṣaṇaḥ vikalpaḥ cetasaḥ nanu iti ādinā vyācaṣṭe na para bhāvi tvam apara bhāvi tvam ahetuka tvepī iti arthaḥ bhāvasya vastunaḥ yaḥ nāśaḥ tasya svatas eva bhavataḥ ayantattva anyattva vikalpaḥ tulyaḥ 
PVVṬ_522,4–522,5	 kim artha antarat nāśaḥ bhāvāt uta bhāvaḥ eva iti tatra yadi artha antarantadā kimartha antarasya nāśasya bhāve sattāya ambhāvaḥ na dṛśyate atha anartha antaram vināśaḥ tadā anartha antara tvepi tat eva ghaṭa ādikam eva tad nāśakhyambhavati tat tasmāt na kiñci d asya padārthasya jātam iti katham vinaṣṭaḥ nāma nanu iti ādinā pariharati atra prastāve uktam kim uktam na tasya bhāvasya kiṃcid vyatiriktam vā nāśa ākhyam dharma rūpam bhavati kathantarhi vināśī bhāvaḥ iti āha na bhavati eva kevalam iti uktam prāk 
PVVṬ_523,1	 etat eva sphuṭayan= āha na hi ityādi na hi ayamahetuka vināśa vādī bhāvasya sva hetoḥ niṣpannasya kaścid bhāva rūpaḥ a bhāva rūpaḥ vā vinā aśonyaḥ vā sthiti anyathā tva ādikaḥ dharmaḥ bhavati iti āha kintarhi saḥ eva bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti bhāva nivṛtti mātram āha tena ayam arthaḥ prathame kṣaṇe bhāvaḥ abhūtaḥ bhavati dvitīye kṣaṇe tasya na bhāvaḥ bhavati na abhāvaḥ vā na api svarasa hāniḥ vā bhavati kevalam svayam eva nivarttate 
PVVṬ_523,2	 yadi punar nāśa abhidhānena kasyacid dharmasya bhāvam utpādam brūyāt na bhāva ūnena vādinā nivartitaḥ syāt bhāva nivṛttiḥ na kathitā iti yāvat tathā ca bhāva nivṛttau prastutāyām artha antarasya anyasya vidhānāt aprastutam eva uktam syāt kim kāraṇam na hi kasyacid vināśa ākhyasya abhāvasya bhāva nivṛtti rūpasya vā bhāvena utpādena bhāvaḥ padārthaḥ na bhūtaḥ nāma yena tad vidhānena bhāvasya sva nivṛttiḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_523,3–523,4	 etat uktam bhavati yathā bhāvasya vijñāna bhāve bhāvaḥ na nivarttate kevalanta dvijñā anantad sambaṃndhi syāt tathā bhāvasya nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti abhyupagame saḥ eva nivṛtti ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ tad sambandhī syāt na tu bhāvaḥ nivartteta iti katham asya nivṛttiḥ syāt tasmāt tadā sa bhāvaḥ na bhūtaḥ nivṛttaḥ yadi svayam na bhavet tena yat ucyate nanu abhavanam api yadi bhāvasya na bhavati tadā avināśi tvam atha bhavati tat bhid nam vā syāt abhinnamvā anayoḥ ca pakṣayoḥ bhāvasya sarvadā darśanam syāt avināśāt tasmāt na abhāvasya vināśaḥ kathantarhi bhāvaḥ sarvadā na pratīyate pramāṇa abhāvāt iti 
PVVṬ_523,5	 tad apāstam dṛśyasya hi sattāyāḥ pramāṇa viṣaya tvena vyāpta tvāt tad abhāvāt abhāvaḥ bhāve vā avaśyam pramāṇa viṣaya tvam iti katham apratipattiḥ atha adṛśya rūpa tayā asya bhāvaḥ tadā tarhi dṛśya rūpa tāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ sā ca bhāvāt bhinnā abhinnāḥ vā anayoḥ ca pakṣayoḥ bhāvasya darśanam syāt iti doṣaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva tasmāt bhāvasya abhavanam api na bhavati na api avināśi tva doṣaḥ sva rūpeṇa nivṛtteḥ 
PVVṬ_523,6–524,3	 nanu bhāva nivṛtteḥ nī rūpa tvena rūpiṇaḥ bhāvāt anyat tvam iti ced nanu yasya rūpam eva na vidyate tasya katham anyat tvam tat kim eka tvam astu tat api na asti arūpa tvāt tasmāt bhāvena sahāsyāḥ tattva anyat tva niṣedha mātram kriyate śaśa viṣāṇa vat na tu evam api katham dvitīya kṣaṇe bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti iṣyate yatas yadi dvitīya kṣaṇe bhāvaḥ tadā kathantatra na asti iti iṣyate virodhāt atha na asti tadā katham bhāvaḥ na asti iti ucyate asattvāt iti tat ayuktam yatas prathamepi kṣaṇe bhāvaḥ bhavati iti loka ibhidhīyate tatra ca yadi bhāvaḥ kathambhavatī iti ucyate tasmāt sarvatra buddhi stham eva bhāvam kṛtvā vidhi pratiṣedha vyavahāraḥ iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt sthitam etat tadā sa bhāvaḥ na bhūtaḥ yadi svayam na bhavet iti 
PVVṬ_524,4	 nanu svayambhāvaḥ na bhavati iti anena api vākyena svayam eva abhāvaḥ bhāvasya bhavati iti ucyate tadā ca saḥ eva doṣaḥ iti atas āha na bhavati iti ca ityādi caśabdaḥ yasmai darthe yasmāt bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti ca prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ eṣaḥ na paryudāsaḥ yatra prasaktasya nivṛtti mātram eva kriyate na vastu aṃśasya saṃsparśaḥ sa prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ yatra tu eka niṣedhena anya vidhānam sa paryudāsaḥ anyathā iha api prasajya pratiṣedha īpi kasyacid vastunaḥ bhāve vidhāne sati na pratiṣedha paryudāsayaḥ rūpa bhedaḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ syāt prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedha śabdena uktaḥ kim kāraṇam ubhayatra api prasajye paryudāseca vidheḥ prādhānyāt 
PVVṬ_524,5^1	 yadi ca prasajya pratiṣedha ipi vidhiḥ tadā pratiṣedhaḥ eva na asti evam ca apratiṣedhāt kasyacid paryudāsā upi na syāt kvacid kim kāraṇam yadi hi kiṃcid vastu kutaścid nivartteta tadā tad vyatireki nivarttamānāt vastunaḥ vyatireki saṃspṛśyeta tad paryudāsena nivarttyamāna paryudāsena yathā abrāhmaṇam ānayā iti brāhmaṇa paryudāsena kṣatriya ādeḥ saṃsparśāt tat ca kasyacid nivarttanam eva na asti kim kāraṇam sarvatra kasyacid nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti uktā ipi na bhāva vyavacchedaḥ kasyacid pratīyate api tu nivṛtti śabdena api kasyacid bhāvasya eva pratīteḥ na ca anena vādinā bhāvasya nivṛttim bruvāṇena api nivṛttiḥ na eva uktā kintu artha antara bhāvaḥ eva uktaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_524,5^2	 tathā ca yasya paryudāsena yat viviktam ucyate na tayoḥ paraspara vivekaḥ siddhaḥ asati ca viveke na paryudāsaḥ tad anya vivekena anya upādana lakṣaṇa tvāt paryudāsasya tat evaṃyathā uktena prakāreṇa vyatireka abhāvāt anvayopi na syāt anvayaḥ kasyacid arthasya anugamaḥ vidhānantan na syāt iti arthaḥ kim kāraṇam tasya anvayasya eka svabhāva sthiti lakṣaṇa tvāt tat sthitiḥ ca eka svabhāva sthitiḥ ca tasmāt anyasya vyatireke parihāre sati syāt sa ca tad anya vyatirekona asti tvad matena iti evam śabdāt apravṛtti nivṛttikam jagat syāt śābdasya vidhi pratiṣedha vyavahārasya abhāvaḥ syāt na ca evam iti avaśyam kasyacid vyavaccheda mātram śabda vācyam abhyupagantavyam 
PVVṬ_525,1	 yatas ca evantasmāt yasya bhāvasya nāśaḥ bhavati iti ucyate sa svayam eva na bhavati iti uktam syāt na punar asya dharma antaram kiñcid nāśaḥ nāma vidhīyate caitrasya putraḥ iti atra yathā vāstavaḥ bhedaḥ tathā bhāvasya nāśaḥ iti atra api vyatireka vibhakteḥ tulya tvāt iti atas āha na ityādi na vai ghoṣa mātreṇa caitrasya putraḥ iti anena śabdena sāmyāt viṣaya antara dṛṣṭaḥ vidhiḥ caitrasya putraḥ iti atra dṛṣṭaḥ vidhiḥ vāstavaḥ yaḥ sa sarvatra bhāvasya nāśaḥ iti atra api yojanām arhati śabda pravṛtti mātreṇa vastu yojanāyāḥ ayogāt 
PVVṬ_525,2	 etat eva na hi ityādinā prāha kasyacid puruṣasya gardabhaḥ iti nāmakaraṇāt gardabhasya dharmāḥ manuṣya īpi na hi yojyāḥ tathā na caitrasya putraḥ bhavati iti atra vākye dṛṣṭaḥ vidhiḥ artha antarasya putrasya vidhānam dṛṣṭam iti na āśepi yojyaḥ bhāvasya nāśaḥ bhavati iti atra api bhāvāt vyatirekaḥ nāśaḥ vidheyaḥ kim kāraṇam virodhāt nāśasya abhāva rūpa tvāt abhāvasya bhavana virodhāt iti uktam 
PVVṬ_525,3–525,5	 yadi nāśaḥ na artha antaram kasmāt bhāvasya nāśaḥ bhavati iti evam abhidhīyate iti atas āha evam ca ityādi bhāvasya nāśaḥ iti abhidhānepi prayojanam āveditam eva artha antaram iva dharmiṇaḥ dharmam cetasā avibhajya tanmātra jijñāsāyām svabhāvaḥ eva tathā ucyate ityādinā nivedita tvāt tasmāt abhāvasya akiṃcid tvāt tattva anyat tva vikalpaḥ na tulyaḥ atas bhāvevastunaḥ bhavane eṣa tattva anyat tva vikalpaḥ syāt kim kāraṇam bhavanasya vidheḥ vastu anurodhataḥ 
PVVṬ_526,1	 nanu atiśaya utpattau= api saḥ eva tasya atiśayaḥ utpannaḥ iti katham naṣṭaḥ nāma tena na ayam tad avasthaḥ naṣṭaḥ nāma yena svayam na bhavati tena naṣṭaḥ na artha antara utpādāt iti uktam na hi atiśaya utpattyā svayam na bhūtaḥ nāma abhāvasya sarva atiśaya upākhyā nivṛttyā sarva bhāva dharma viveka lakṣaṇa tvāt bhāvasya ca utpatti samāveśa lakṣaṇa tvāt 
PVVṬ_526,2–526,3	 bhāvaḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe bhāvaḥ bhavanam utpādaḥ iti yāvat sovaśyambhavantam apekṣate bhavitāram apekṣate bhavitāram antareṇa bhavanasya abhāvāt sa ca bhāvaḥ vyāpāre svabhāvaḥ eva vastu eva kim kāraṇam niḥsvabhāvasya kvacid bhavati iti ādike samāveśa abhāvāt sambandha abhāvāt na ca vyāpāraḥ nāma artha antaram kintu vyāpāraḥ iti hi yathā bhūta svabhāva utpattiḥ viśiṣṭa svabhāva utpattiḥ sāca utpattiḥ niḥsvabhāvasya nāśasya katham syāt yadi niḥsvabhāvasya na asti vyāpāra samāveśaḥ katham idānīmbhavati abhāvaḥ śaśa viṣāṇam ityādi vyavahāraḥ śaśa viṣāṇam abhāvaḥ bhavati iti bhavana lakṣaṇena vyāpāreṇa vyavahāraḥ iti arthaḥ ādi śabdāt vandhyā sutaḥ abhāvaḥ bhavati iti parigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_526,4	 na ityādinā pariharati na vai śaśa viṣāṇam kiṃcid abhāva unyat vā bhavati iti vidhinā ucyate api tu evam iti śaśa viṣāṇam abhāvaḥ bhavati iti anena vākyena asya iti śaśa viṣāṇasya abhāvaḥ bhavati bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti bhāva pratiṣedhaḥ eva kriyate api ca vyavaharttāraḥ puruṣāḥ etat śaśa viṣāṇa ādikam evam abhāvaḥ bhavati iti vyāpāra vat iva samāropyāt arśayanti kenacid prakaraṇena kim śaśa viṣāṇa ādikam abhāvaḥ bhavati na bhavati iti prastāva samāśrayeṇa na tu tad śaśa viṣāṇa ādikam vyavahāra mātreṇa tathā avyāpāra yuktam bhavati yasmāt sarva artha vivecanam sarva artha svabhāva virahaḥ tatra śaśaviṣāṇa ādau tattvam na tu asataḥ kasyacid bhavana ādeḥ samāveśaḥ 
PVVṬ_527,1–527,2	 sa hetukopi vināśaḥ evam bhaviṣyati iti ced āha na ityādi evam śaśa viṣāṇa vat sarva artha viraha lakṣaṇaḥ vināśaḥ pareṣṭaḥ kim kāraṇam vastuni tasya vināśasya bhāvāt utpatteḥ yaḥ ca bhavati sa katham abhāvaḥ virodhāt yadi punar asau= api vināśaḥ niḥsvabhāvaḥ eva kevalaṃvaktṛbhiḥ evambhavatī iti vyāpāravān iva khyāpyate na tu svayan tathā bhavana dharmā nīrūpa tvāt asya tadā evam iṣyamāṇe abhāvaḥ bhavati iti api bruvāṇena na kiñcid bhavati iti iṣṭam eva kriyā pratiṣedha mātra tvāt asya vākyasya tasmāt svayam anadhyāropitena ākāreṇa kvacid vastunibhavan svabhāvaḥ vikalpa dvayam na ativarttete tattvam anyat tvam ca iti prakāra antara abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_527,3–527,5	 rūpa ādi skandha svabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ na bhavati atha ca rūpa ādibhyaḥ na anyaḥ tasma tattva anyat tvam ativarttate eva svabhāvaḥ iti ced tat na yasmāt atattvam eva atad svabhāva tvam eva svabhāvasya anyat tvam iti yadi pudgalopi na skandha svabhāvaḥ tadā skandhebhyonyaḥ eva yatas na hi prasiddhā an yat tvayoḥ rūpa rasayoḥ api anyat eva parasparam anyat tvam kintva tatsvabhāva tvam eva anyat tvantat ca pudgalepī asti iti sa upi skandhebhyonyaḥ eva iṣṭavyaḥ 
PVVṬ_527,6–527,8	 nanu atatsvabhāva tvepi parasparam svabhāva apratibandha unyat tvam iti ced sa ca pratibandhaḥ pudgalasya skandheṣu asti tatas tad svabhāva tvepi na anyat tvam skandhebhyaḥ pudgalasya iti koyam ityādinā pratiṣedhati koyam pratibandhaḥ nāma pudgalasya skandheṣu yena pratibandhena sa ca na syāt iti skandha svabhāḥ ca pudgalaḥ na syāt na anya svabhāvaḥ ca skandhebhyaḥ anyaḥ svabhāvosya iti vigrahaḥ skandhebhyaḥ pudgalasya janma tat eva janma pratibandhaḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_528,1	 evam sati kāryatvāt skandhebhyaḥ pudgalasya tattva anyat tvena avācya tvam iṣṭam tathā ca sati sarva kāraṇānāmparasparam avācya tā syāt tathā ca iti kārya tvāt avācya tve sarvaḥ sarvasya kathaṃcid iti sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca upayogi iti sarvatra kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt na ca kaścid kutaścid anyaḥ syāt evam ca anantara uktena avācya tā lakṣaṇena avācyatā iti api bruvatā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva śabda antareṇa uktaḥ syāt na artha bhedaḥ kaścid anyat tvantu na niṣiddham eva yasmāt svabhāvayoḥ parasparam ananugamanam amiśrībhavanam anyat tvambrūmaḥ sa ca svabhāvān anugamaḥ svabhāvavatām sarva padārthānām asti eva iti parasparam anyat tvam eva na ca anyaḥ pratibandhaḥ pudgalasya skandheṣu yasmāt na hi janma lakṣaṇāt janma svabhāvāt svabhāva pratibandhāt anyaḥ pratibandhaḥ nāma kim kāraṇam anāyattasya tad utpattyā tatra apratibaddhasya tena saha yaḥ vyabhicāraḥ tasya avirodhāt tata upratibandhāt pudgalasya skandhebhyaḥ nyat tvam dharma bhedāt ca anyat tvam tathā hi avācya tvam pudgalasya dharmaḥ skandhānāntu parasparam vācya tvam iti dharma bhedaḥ 
PVVṬ_528,2–528,3	 yadi api na janma kṛtaḥ pratibandhaḥ tathā api pudgalasya skandheṣu jñāna kṛtaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti ced syāt ityādinā etat eva vyācaṣṭe yasya rūpa ādeḥ pratipattiḥ yat pratipattiḥ tayānāntarīyakam avinābhāvi yat jñānam yasya pudgalasya jñānam tad gatau= iti rūpa ādi gatauniyamena tasya pudgalasya pratibhāsanāt jñāna kṛtaḥ pratibandhaḥ tathā hi rūpa śabda ādi grahaṇena eva pudla grahaṇam iṣyate cakṣuḥ ādi vijñāna vijñeya tvāt pudgalasya iti tena jñāna kṛtāt pratibandhāt tat pudgala ākhyam vastu skandhebhyaḥ nyat tvena avācyam atad rūpam api askandha svabhāvam api 
PVVṬ_528,4–529,1	 na ityādinā pratiṣedhati na pudgalasya rūpa ādi pratipattinā antarīyakam jñānam kiṃkāraṇam tasya pudgalasya rūpa ādi svabhāvam apahāya niḥsvabhāva tvāt svayam yasmāt saḥ eva hi tasya svabhāvaḥ yaḥ rūpa ādi rūpaḥ pratibhāti atha ārūpa ādi svabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ tadā arūpa ādi svabhāva tve asya pudgalasya atadvat rūpa ādi vat pṛthak pratibhāva prasaṅgāt na ca pratibhāsate tatas na asti eva pudgalaḥ yatas dṛśyasya apratibhā samānasya ca abhāvāt atha adṛśyaḥ pudgalaḥ iṣyate tadā aadṛśya tvepi pudgalasya iṣyamāṇe na tad rūpam jñānan na pudgala ākāram jñānam iti kasya kim āyattā pratītiḥ na rūpa ādi jñānanāntarīyakam pudgala jñānam iti arthaḥ tathā ca na jñāna kṛtaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_529,2–529,4	 rūpa ādi āyatta pratīti tvāt eva pṛthak pudgalaḥ na pratibhāsate iti ced āha na ca ityādi yat vastu yat ā āyatta pratītikam yat pratibaddha upalambhanantasya svabhāva pratibhāsaḥ eva na ca naśyati iti sambandhaḥ kim iva iti āha prakāśa ityādi yathā nīla ādīnām āloka pratibaddha jñānānām āloke pratibhāsamānepi sva pratibhāsaḥ na naśyati āloka vyatirekeṇa teṣām pratibhāsanāt tadvat pudgalasya api syāt api ca kā vā tasya pudgalasya pratyāsattiḥ sambandhaḥ tatra skandhe yat iti yena pratyāsatti kāraṇena tasminskandhe anātma rūpe apudgala svabhāve pratibhāsamāne svayam pratyupatiṣṭhate ātmānam grāhayati iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_529,5	 atiprasaṃgaḥ hi evam syāt apratibaddhe pratibhāsamāne yadi niyamena pudgalaḥ pratibhāseta tadā yasya kasyacid pratibhāsanenyopyati anta asambandhaḥ pratīyate iti arthaḥ pratīyamānasya pudgalasya tad upādāna tārūpa ādi upādāna tā pratyāsattiḥ iti ced koyam upādāna arthaḥ na tāvat pudgalasya rūpa ādīn āñca yathā kramaṅkārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tasya anabhyupagamāt kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhyupagame vā na rūpa ādi darśane niyamena pudgalasya darśanam kim kāraṇam yatas na kārya kāraṇe anyonya pratīti pratyupasthāpane yathā kāryāt kāraṇa pratītiḥ tathā na kāraṇāt kārya pratītiḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ na pudgalasya rūpa ādinā antarīyaka tā kintu pudgalasya yā pratītiḥ tasyāḥ tat na antarīyaka tā rūpa ādinā antarīyaka tā 
PVVṬ_530,1–530,4	 sā eva pratyāsattiḥ iti ced nanu sā eva pratīteḥ tat na antarīyaka tā rūpa ādiṣu pudgalasya asati pratibandhe na yuktā iti ucyate akārya kāraṇayoḥ api pudgala rūpa ādyoḥ pratibandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha akārya kāraṇayoḥ na kaścid vāstavaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti asakṛt uktam yat pratipattinā antarīyakam yat jñānam iti api yat ucyate tad jñāne rūpa ādi viveke pudgala jñānesati syāt tat ca na asti yatas yaḥ pudgale vijñāne svarūpeṇa na pratibhāsatenya asaṃsargeṇa iti arthaḥ tasya kiñcid jñānam na hi iti sambandhaḥ tad abhāvāt yathā ukta jñāna abhāvāt artha rūpasya pudgala ākhyasya avācya tā lakṣaṇam na sidhyati 
PVVṬ_530,5	 tat iti tasmāt vastutas paramārthataḥ kvacid bhavatā kenacid arthena tatra tattva anya tva bhājā bhavitavyam vastunaḥ gati antara abhāvāt yasya tu kṣaṇika vādinaḥ vinaśyataḥ bhāvasya na kiñcid bhavati kevalam sa bhāvaḥ svayam eva na bhavati iti matam tena abhāvaḥ bhavati iti api bruvatā na bhāvaḥ bhavati iti pratiṣedha mātram eva uktam na kasyacid vidhānam tatas na abhāvaṃprati kṣaṇika vādinaḥ tattva anyatva vikalpasya avatāra uḥ ti iti manyate 
PVVṬ_530,6–530,7	 yat api ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yat api ayam kṣaṇika vādī bhāvasya abhāvaḥ bhavati iti vidhi saṃsparśinā iva śabdena āha tat api bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti eva uktam bhavati evam hi sa bhāvaḥ nivartitaḥ bhavati yadi kiñcid na vidhīyate kim kāraṇam pratiṣedha ibhāva mātra vyavacchede vidhera sambhavāt yatas ca vinaśyataḥ bhāvasya na kaścid vastu dharmaḥ bhavati tatas eva asya bhāvasya vināśe na kaścid hetuḥ tathā hi vinaśyatāḥ bhāvena apekṣeta paraḥ vināśa hetuḥ yat itena bhāvasya kāryam karttavyam vidyeta kiñcana na tu kiñcid kāryam asti tasmāt akiñcit karam vināśa kāraṇam yat ca akiñcitkaramvastu tat kim kenacid apekṣyate na eva apekṣyate 
PVVṬ_531,1–531,2	 sati ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sati hi karttavye kārakambhavati na ca naśyataḥ bhāvasya kiṃcid kāryam iti uktam tasmāt yaḥ nāma kaścid nāśa hetuḥ sa bhāve na kiñcid karoti iti akiñcitkaraḥ na apekṣaṇīyaḥ vināśa hetuḥ tat katham ityādi paraḥ yadi vinaśyataḥ na atiśayaḥ kaścid utpadyate katham idānīm anutpanna atiśayaḥ anutpannotiśayosya iti vigrahaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva pūrvarūpa avasthaḥ eva bhāvaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ nāma 
PVVṬ_531,3	 nanu ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī vināśa hetoḥ sakāśāt bhāvasya atiśaya utpattau= api aṅgīkriyamāṇāyām saḥ eva tasya atiśayaḥ nāśa ākhyaḥ utpannaḥ iti sa bhāvaḥ katham naṣṭaḥ nāma na hi anya bhāvenyasya nāśaḥ yatas evantena kāraṇena ayambhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ na naṣṭaḥ nāma kintu yena yasmāt svayam na bhavati tena naṣṭaḥ na artha antarasya nāśa ākhyasya utpādāt iti anantaram eva uktam yatas na hi nāśa ākhyasya atiśayasya utpattyā abhāvaḥ svayam na bhūtaḥ nāma kim kāraṇam abhāvasya sarve yetiśayāḥ sāmarthya lakṣaṇāḥ yāḥ ca upākhyāḥ vyapadeśāḥ teṣām nivṛttyā sarva sāmarthya vyapadeśa nivṛttyā iti arthaḥ sarvasya bhāva dharmasya bhavana rūpasya dharmasya yaḥ vivekaḥ virahaḥ tad lakṣaṇa tvāt bhāvasya ca utpatti samāveśa lakṣaṇa tvāt yasmāt bhavati iti bhāvaḥ ucyate tena utpatti yogī bhāvaḥ yatas ca evantasmāt na abhāve bhāvasya vināśe kasyacid anyasya bhāvaḥ bhavanantasya upakṣepaḥ na kasyacid bhavanam iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_532,1–532,2	 etena iti svabhāva pratipādanena ahetuka tvepi nāśasya aṅgīkriyamāṇe sa nāśaḥ prathamam abhūtvā bhavati iti evam abhūtvā nāśasya bhāvataḥ kāraṇāt tasya nāśasya aṃkura ādi vat sattā syāt nāśitvam ca iti sattā nāśi tva doṣasya yat prasañjanan tat pratyākhyātam etena eva yopī ityādinā vyācaṣṭe ahetukepi nāśe asya nāśasya abhūtvā bhāvāt sattā anitya tvam ca durnivāram abhūtvā bhavanna hetukaḥ bhavati iti api viruddham kādācid kasya ahetu tu a virodhāt sā upi doṣa upanyāsaḥ anena eva vināśasya nīrūpa tva pratipādanena pratyākhyātaḥ kim kāraṇam vināśa kāle kasyacid dharmasya bhāva anabhyupagamāt 
PVVṬ_532,3–532,4	 yathā tulye vastu tve keṣāṃcid eva janminām utpattimatām pratighaḥ nāma sva deśe parasya utpatti vivandha lakṣaṇaḥ iṣṭaḥ na sarveṣām tathā bhāvānām utpattimatām eva nāśa svabhāvaḥ bhavatu na tu anutpattimatām ākāśa ādīnām tathā ca yat sat tad kṣaṇikam iti etat vyabhicāri iti atha ityādinā vyācaṣṭe bhavatu nāma svabhāvaḥ eṣa bhāvānām kosau svabhāvaḥ iti āha yaḥ ime kṣaṇa sthiti dharmāṇaḥ kṣaṇa sthitiḥ dharmaḥ yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ sa tu kṣaṇa sthiti dharma svabhāvaḥ utpattimatām eva bhāvānām bhaviṣyati na tu anutpattimatām ākāśa ādīnām 
PVVṬ_532,5–532,6	 yasmāt na hi svabhāvaḥ iti eva kṛtvā sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvaḥ bhavati pratigha ātma tāvat yathā pratigha ātma tā vastu svabhāva tvepi na sarvasya bhavati tadvat iti arthaḥ sattyam ityā cā ryaḥ sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvaḥ na bhavati iti sattyam etat tathā api ayaṃsa pratighasya janakaḥ ayam na iti svabhāva niyamāt hetoḥ svabhāva niyamaḥ phale ayam pratighaḥ ayam na iti na anitye tu na anitya tva viṣaye kṛtakānām rūpa bheda usti yena kasyacid naśvaraḥ svabhāvaḥ syāt na anyasya kim kāraṇam anitya svabhāvasya bheda kānāṃhetūnām abhāvataḥ sarveṣām vinaśvara svabhāvasya jananāt iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_533,1–533,2	 nanu nāśa svabhāvaḥ bhāvānāt na anutpattimatām yadi iti ca udyam prakṛtam na ca tatra anitye rūpa bheda usti bhedakānām abhāvataḥ iti ayamparihāraḥ yuktaḥ na hi ākāśa ādīnām sva hetu kṛtaḥ vinaśvara svabhāva unutpattimat tvāt tat katham sattyam iti ādi uktam iti evam manyate yathā sattvam vyabhicāri uktan tathā kṛta kopi kaścid naśvaraḥ kaścid na iti āśaṃkate tena ādau= eva kṛtaka tvasya vyabhicārantāvat pariharttum sattyam iti ādi uktam iti adoṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_533,3	 na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe anyaḥ iti sa nidarśana ādikaḥ akasmāt iti hetum antareṇa niyamavān kvacid syāt kvacid na iti yādṛśī tu pratiniyata viṣayāḥ pratigha ādi dharmma janakasya hetoḥ śakti sthitiḥ śakti niyamaḥ tādṛśam hetu śakti anurūpam phalambhavati iti kṛtvā hetu svabhāva niyamāt phala svabhāva niyamaḥ iṣṭaḥ ākasmila tve tu nirhetuka tvesya phala svabhāva niyamasya uktaḥ doṣaḥ deśa kāla prakṛti nivamaḥ na yujyate iti tasmāt pratighāta ātma tāyāḥ hetuḥ tasya svabhāvaḥ tasya pratiniyama vat na naśvara janana pratiniyata svabhāvam hetu bhūtambhāvasya paśyāmaḥ kaścid eva naśnaram janayet na sarvam iti evam naśvara janane pratiniyataḥ svabhāvaḥ yasya bhāvasya iti vigrahaḥ yena hetu pratiniyamena tad janmā vinaśvara jananāt hetoḥ janma yasya sa tathā syāt naśvaraḥ syāt na anyaḥ yaḥ tad vilakṣaṇa hetu janma iti kim kāraṇam sarva ākāra janmanām nāśa darśanāt sarva ākārebhyaḥ hetubhyaḥ janma yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_533,4–534,1	 nanu ityādi paraḥ sarva ākārebhyaḥ hetubhyaḥ janma yeṣa ambhāvāna ante naśyanti iti idam api aniśceyam eva kim kāraṇam tāsām hetu sāma grīṇā marvāc darśanaiḥ aniḥśeṣa darśanāt sākalyena adarśanāt kasyāścid sāmagryā naśvarajanikāyāḥ darśanāt adṛṣṭāḥ api tad jātīya tayā tathābhūtāḥ niścīyante iti ced āha vicitra ityādi vicitrā śaktiḥ yāsām iti vigrahaḥ sāmagryaḥ dṛśyante tatra vicitra śaktiṣu sāmagrīṣu madhye kācid sāmagrī syāt api yā bhāvam anaśvara ātmānam janayet 
PVVṬ_534,2–534,3	 na ityādinā pariharati ayam ca parihāraḥ nāśa svabhāvaḥ bhāvānām na anutpattimatām yadi iti atra api codye draṣṭavyaḥ sādhāraṇa tvāt na ayan doṣaḥ kasmāt jñeya adhikārāt etat eva spaṣṭayan= āha ye kadācid kāle kvacid deśe kenacid puruṣeṇa artha ajñātāḥ santaḥ punar na jñāyante teṣām santāna anubandhī nāśaḥ iti brūmaḥ ye ca ajñātāḥ santaḥ jñāyante jñātāḥ vā punar na jñāyante te eva kṛtakāḥ anityāḥ sādhyante anena ca kṛtaka tvasya kṣaṇika tvena vyāptiḥ sattvāt iti anena niścīyate iti uktam bhavati 
PVVṬ_534,4–534,7	 nanu ca yadi api te jñātāssantaḥ na jñāyante tathā api kathanteṣām anitya tvam iti atas āha yasmāt na hi asti sambhavaḥ yat te jñāna janana svabhāvāḥ pūrvampunar anaṣṭāḥ tasmin= eva svabhāve sthitāḥ na janayeyuḥ saha kārya bhāvāt na janayanti iti ced āha apekṣeranna aparam na hi asya sambhavosti iti sambandhaḥ kim kāraṇam tad janana svabhāvasya niṣpanna tvāt 
PVVṬ_534,8–534,10	 atha syāt teṣu anapekṣeṣu api kasyacid kadācid jñānam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha na ca teṣu na eva teṣu jñāna janana svabhāveṣu vyavasthiteṣu sahakāri anapekṣeṣu kasyacid puṃsaḥ kadācid kāle kiṃcid jñānam nivartteta sarvasya sarvadā sva viṣayāṇi jñānāni janayeyuḥ na ca evam kadācid jñāna darśanāt tatas ca jñānam ajanayantaḥ janaka svabhāvāt pracyutāḥ iti gamyate yat tarhi ajñeyam kṛtakam akṛta kam vā tat na evam bhaviṣyati iti 
PVVṬ_534,11	 atas āha rna ityādi na ca evaṃbhūtam ajñeyam kiṃcid asti kim kāraṇam sarvasya arthasya kenacid puruṣeṇa kadācid jñānāt atha tat jñānam api na janayet tadā ajñāna mātra artha kriyāyām api asāmarthye tad sāmarthya rahitam vastu eva na syāt tathā hi martha kriyā sāmarthya lakṣaṇam vastu iti vakṣyāmaḥ tasya ca artha kriyā samarthasya vastunaḥ krameṇa artha kriyām kurvataḥ vināśa avyabhicārāt ahetu tvāt ca vināśasya sattā anubandhī vināśaḥ siddhaḥ atas eva anantara uktāt sarva bhāvānām kṣaṇika tva sādhanāt śabda arthayossambandhasya api niṃtyatā pratyākhyeyāḥ dūṣyāḥ 
PVVṬ_535,1–535,3	 na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe atas eva yathā uktāt vināśasya vastu mātra anu bandhāt śabda vat yathā śabdasya nityatā pratikṣiptā tadvat sambandhasya api nitya tā pratyākhyeyāḥ evantā vat sambandham vyatiriktam abhyupagamya doṣaḥ uktaḥ adhunā avyatiriktaḥ eva sambandhaḥ na yujyate iti āha yā ca śabda śaktiḥ yogya tā ākhyā yogyatā saṃjñita artha pratipatti āśrayaḥ jai mi nī yai rva rṇṇyate sā yogya tā śabda artha antaram eva na bhavati tathā hi bhāvānāṃsvabhāva atiśayaḥ eva vivakṣita artha kriyā samarthaḥ yogyatā iti āveditam prāk samartham hi rūpam śabdasya yogyate tyādinā 
PVVṬ_535,4–536,3	 tena śabdasya anitya tve yogyatāyāḥ api anitya tvam avyatirekāt iti bhāvaḥ astu vā śabdāt artha antaram yogya tā tathā api śabda śaktiḥ ca dūṣitāḥ veditavyā kaiḥ sambandha doṣaiḥ prāk uktaiḥ uktaḥ hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sambandhaḥ sambandhibhyortha antaram iti evamvāde aneka prakāraḥ doṣaḥ uktaḥ sambandhi nām a nitya tvāt na sambandha isti nityatā ityādinā tena eva prāk uktena doṣeṇa śabda śaktiḥ api sambandha rūpeṇa kalpitā dūṣitā iti kṛtvā na punar pṛthak ucyate doṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_536,4–536,5	 tat evam na apauruṣeyaḥ vedaḥ bhavatu nāma apauruṣeyaḥ tathā api na tasya satya artha tā niścetum śakyāḥ yasmāt apauruṣeyam iti eva kṛtvā na vaidikamvacanam yathā artha jñāna sādhanam aviparīta artha jñāna hetuḥ yasmāt puruṣa āgasā puruṣa doṣeṇa aduṣṭaḥ vahni ādinā ādi śabdāt jyotsnā ādiḥ anyathā api dṛṣṭaḥ vitatha jñāna hetuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_536,6^1	 bhavatu ityādinā vyācaṣṭe bhavantu nāma apauruṣeyāḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ tathā api sambhāvyam eva eṣām vaidikānām śabdānām ayathārtha jñāna hetu tvam yatas na hi puruṣa doṣa upadhānāt eva puruṣa doṣe rāga ādibhiḥ upadhānāt saṃskārāt eva artheṣu jñāpyeṣu jñāpakānām śabdānām jñāna vibhramaḥ jñāna viparyāsaḥ prakṛtyā api mithyājñāna jananasya sambhāvya tvāt yasmāt tad rahitānām api puruṣa doṣa upadhāna rahitānām api pradīpa ādīnām vitathā artha jñāna jannāt ādi śabdāt jyotsnā ādīnām kutra nīlotpala ādiṣu tathā hi rātrau pradīpaḥ nīlotpale rakta pratibhāsa jñāna hetuḥ jyotsnā pīte vastre śukla jñāna hetuḥ 
PVVṬ_536,6^2	 tat iti tasmāt ime vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ puruṣa saṃskāra nirapekṣāḥ syuḥ iti sambandhaḥ prakṛtyā ca svabhāvena ca artheṣu pratīti hetavaḥ jñāna hetavaḥ syuḥ kim kāraṇam svabhāva viśeṣāt sva rūpa viśeṣāt kim iva vahni ādi vat syuḥ niyamena vitathāḥ vyaktayortha pratipattayaḥ yebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ iti vigrahaḥ vitatha vyaktayaḥ eva sadā vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ iti asya niyamasya kāraṇam na asti tatas niyama kāraṇa abhāvāt vitatha vyaktayaḥ eva vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ iti etat kalpanam ayuktam iti ced tava api mī mām sa kaḥ syāvitatha jñāna hetavaḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ iti asmin= avitatha vyakti niyame kim kāraṇam na eva kiñcid tasmāt tvad matena yathā artha vyakti niyama tvāt prakṛtyā svabhāvena ayathārtha vyakti niyamaḥ kin na kalpyate 
PVVṬ_537,1	 athavā yathā vahni ādayaḥ ghaṭa ādiṣu nīlotpala ādiṣu ca artheṣu yathāyogam satya asatya jñāna hetavaḥ tathā vaidikānām śabdānām artheṣu mithyā itara jñāna hetu tvena ubhaya jñāna hetu tvam syāt yasmāt na hi apauruṣeyāḥ api vahni ādayaḥ vana dava candra āloka ādi rūpāḥ ekatra ghaṭa ādau divā yathā artha jñāna hetavopi santaḥ sarvatra nīlotpala ādau= api rātrau tathā bhavanti yathā artha jñāna hetavaḥ bhavanti tathā vaidikānām śabdānām api apauruṣeya tvepi u bhayam syāt yathārtha ayatha artha jñāna hetu tvam syāt 
PVVṬ_537,2–537,3	 bhavatu ityādi paraḥ vahni ādīnām kṛtaka tvāt kāraṇāt yathāpratyayam yasya yat bhrānti kāraṇam tad vaśāt anyatra nīlotpala ādau anyathātvam vitatha jñāna hetu tvaṃ na punar nityeṣu śabdeṣu etat sahakāri pratyaya balena mithyājñāna hetu tvam asti nityānām saha kāri balena anyathā pravṛtti asambhavāt nanu ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī evaṃvidhaḥ iti sahakāri balena artheṣi anyathā parivṛtti lakṣaṇa usti eva dharmmaḥ tatra api iti vaidikeṣu api śabdeṣu kim kāraṇam teṣām api vaidikānām saṃketa balāt anyathā vṛtteḥ puruṣa icchā anuvidhāyi saṃketa balena anyathā pratīti jananāt iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_537,4	 atha saṃketa balāt na teṣām artheṣu parāvṛttiḥ iṣyate kintu nitya tvāt svabhāvataḥ eva sva viṣaya jñāna janana svabhāvāḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ tadā kāryasya sva viṣaya jñānasyayaḥ janana svabhāvaḥ tatra sthitau ca eṣām vaidikānām śabdānām samaya ādeḥ ādi śabdāt anyasya api karaṇa vyāpāra ādeḥ apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt kāraṇāt tatas vaidikāt śabdāt pratītiḥ jñānam artheṣu sarvasya puṃsaḥ sarvadā syāt na ca asti sarvasya sarvadā artha pratītiḥ tasmāt na vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ artha pratīti pratiṣṭhita svabhāvāḥ kintu samaya ādikam apekṣyante eva iti tepi mithyājñānasya hetavaḥ iti tad avasthaḥ doṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_538,1–538,2	 api ca tasmin śabde akṛtake mate iṣṭe sati na jñāna hetu tā eva syāt yasmāt na hi nityebhyaḥ vastu sāmarthyāt svarūpa upadhāna sāmarthyena janma asti kasyacid jñānasya anyasya vā yadi akṛtakam ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yadi akṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ vaidikaḥ tatortheṣu pratītiḥ eva na syāt kim kāraṇam pratīti ityādi itarada janma ajanma ca itarat ca iti vigrahaḥ tayoḥ kālaḥ pratīteḥ janma itara kālayoḥ tulya rūpasya nitya tvāt eka rūpasya pratī pratīteḥ ajanma kāle yat tasya janakam rūpantasmin= eva svabhāve sthitasya janakatva virodhāt kim kāraṇam evam anena rūpeṇa ayam nitya abhimataḥ janakaḥ na evam anena rūpeṇa ajanakaḥ iti evam vivecanīyasya pṛthak vyavasthāpyasya rūpa bhedasya svabhāva bhedasya abhāvāt nityasya sarvadā eka rūpa tvāt 
PVVṬ_538,3–538,5	 eka svabhāvopi pūrvam ajanakaḥ paścāt janakaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced āha na ityādi asya nityasya ajanakaḥ yādṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ tādṛśaḥ eva janakona yuktaḥ eka rūpa tvāt sahakāriṇam adhikam prāpya paścāt janayati ityādi mithyā yatonya apekṣā api sahakāri apekṣā api nityasya niṣiddhā eva prāk yatas evantasmāt nityānām śabdānām kvacid artheṣu puruṣe jñāna janana sāmarthyam kim kāraṇam kadācid jñānasya ājanane sati paścāt api tad svabhāva tvāt nityam ajanana prasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_538,6–539,3	 atha mā abhūt eṣa doṣaḥ iti nityam sva kāryam kurvanti eva iti iṣyate tat api na asti sva viṣaya jñāna kāryasya sātatya adarśanāt ca na te śabdāḥ kathaṃcid kenacid prakāreṇa karttāraḥ iti etat ca uktam prāk syāt etat nityebhyopya ākāśa ādibhyaḥ buddhayaḥ bhavanti eva kasyacid kadācid iti atas āha yāḥ api etāḥ nitya abhimateṣu ākāśa ādiṣu pratipattayaḥ buddhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti itīṣyate tāḥ apina tad svabhāva bhāvinyaḥ na ākāśa ādi svabhāva āyatta janmānaḥ nityānām krama yaugapadyābhyām artha kriyā virodhāt 
PVVṬ_539,4–539,5	 kimpunar utpattau tāsām nimittam iti āha na hi ityādi anādiḥ samāna jātīyaḥ yaḥ vikalpaḥ tena āhitā yā vāsanā śaktiḥ tatas udbhūtā utpannā yathāgamam samāropitaḥ yaḥ ākāśa ādi ākāraḥ tad gocarāḥ tad pratibhāsinyaḥ eva kevalam gatāḥ tatra bāhya tvena kalpiteṣu ākāśa ādiṣu jāyante na tu tāḥ buddhayoḥ tha gocarāḥ na ākāśa ādi sva lakṣaṇa viṣayāḥ 
PVVṬ_539,6	 sva lakṣaṇa ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sva lakṣaṇa viṣayā hi buddhiḥ niyamena tasya sva lakṣaṇasya yogyatā sāmarthyantasya upasthānam san= idhānan tat anu vidhāyinī tad bhāvaḥ eva bhāvinī iti kṛtvā asyāḥ buddheḥ yat kāraṇam sva lakṣaṇam yogyam samarthantasmin kāraṇe yogye satisā buddhiḥ bhavati eva tat evam nyāye sthite yadi nityānām padārthānām sva lakṣaṇe kasyacid puṃsaḥ jñānam syāt tadā nityam kāraṇasya saṃnnidhāt sarvasya puṃsaḥ sarvadā syāt 
PVVṬ_539,7	 na api sahakāri apekṣayā nityānām kasyacid kadācid jñāna jana nan tathā hi kārya ujanyaḥ sahakāribhiḥ viśeṣaḥ yāsām vyaktīna antāḥ hi vyaktayaḥ kathaṃcid deśa kāla avasthā niyamena kvacid kārye upayujyamānāḥ hetu tvam pratipadyamānāḥ tasya kāryasya upajana negyaḥ yotiśayaḥ ātma bhūtaḥ tasya pralambhe hetum vastu viśeṣam sahakāriṇam iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_540,1	 tathā iti anitya tva vat nityaḥ bhāvaḥ kārya viśeṣaḥ nādheya atiśayaḥ kenacid puṃsā gṛhyamāṇaḥ tad kāraṇa apekṣaḥ grahaṇa sahakāri kāraṇa apekṣaḥ yadi grahaṇam asya puṃsaḥ janayet yuktam yat tena eva puṃsā gṛhyeta na anyena sahakāri pratiniyamāt tat ca sahakāri apekṣayā jananam nityasya na sambhavati kim kāraṇam sthita svabhāva tvāt nityasya sahakāriṇā na ādheya atiśaya tvāt iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_540,2	 tatas ca nityam janana svabhāve sthita tvāt sarveṇa puṃsā samam eka kālam gṛhyeta atha sarveṇa ajanaka tvāt na gṛhyeta tadā saḥ eva asya svabhāvaḥ iti na vā kenacid puruṣeṇa kadācid gṛhyeta iti hetoḥ san vidyamānaḥ nityaḥ bhāvaḥ yadi kenacid yoginā api dṛṣṭaḥ tadā na kaścid nityaḥ atīndriyaḥ syāt sarveṣām avaśyam kenacid darśanāt tathā ca asau nityam sarva puruṣāṇām indriya grāhyaḥ eva syāt sarva puruṣam prati jñāna janana sāmarthyā viśeṣāt na ca idam sarva puruṣa grāhya tvad nityasya asti tasmāt artha sāmarthya anapekṣāḥ ākāśa ādi sva lakṣaṇa sāmarthya anapekṣakāḥ samāropita gocarāḥ yathā āgamam adhyāropitā akāśa ādi ākāra pratibhāsinyaḥ iti arthaḥ āntaram eva upādāna kāraṇam āśrityaki īdṛśam vikalpa vāsanā prabodham ākāśa ādi vikalpanā nāditā yā āhitāḥ vāsanā tasyāḥ prabodhaḥ kārya utpādanam pratyābhimukhyam yatas eva artha sāmarthya anapekṣāḥ atas eva bāhya artha śūnyāḥ bhrāntayaḥ eva ākāśa ādiṣu sarvasya puṃsaḥ bhavanti 
PVVṬ_540,3–541,1	 sthitam etat na asti nityebhyaḥ kārya utpādaḥ iti śabdāt tu dṛśyate kadācid jñāna kāryantasmāt na apara āvṛtti dharmāṇaḥ śabdāḥ eka rūpa tāyām aparāvṛttiḥ eva dharmaḥ yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ kintu jñānam jñānam pratyarthāḥ bhinna vṛttayaḥ eva atha nityam eka rūpāḥ eva tadā tattve vā eka rūpa tve vā abhyupagamyamāne avitathā artha pratītayaḥ eva vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ iti kutas etat avitathāḥ artha pratītiḥ yebhyaiti vigrahaḥ syāt matam agniḥ himasya bheṣajam iti ādi vaidika vākyasya avitatha tvāt sarvasya avitatha tvam iti 
PVVṬ_541,2	 atas āha na hi ityādi na hi agniḥ himasya bheṣajam pratipakṣaḥ iti evamādiṣu veda vākyeṣu agneḥ śīta pratighāta sāmarthyam veda vākyāt prāk api yathā saṃketam loka prasiddham khyāpyate iti kṛtvā sarvam adṛṣṭa artham api veda vākyan tathā bhavati avitatham bhavati loka prasiddhe hi arthe lokasya saṃketa anusāreṇa vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tatas lokasya sva icchā kṛtaḥ yaḥ saṃketaḥ tena anu paścāt vyavahāra kāle vyavahārāt sandehaḥ eva kim ayam lokaḥ sva saṃketam anuvidadhat anusaran 
PVVṬ_541,3	 agniḥ himasya bheṣajam ityādi vākyāt evampratyeti agneḥ śīta apanoda sāmarthyam iti niścinoti āhosvit śabda svabhāva sthiteḥ śabdasya svabhāvena prakṛtyā sāmarthya niyamāt evam pratyeti iti yadā ca dṛṣṭaḥ eva arthe vaidikasya śabdasya svatortha pratipādana śakti ssandigdhā tadā atyanta parokṣepi arthe nitarām sambhāvyate iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_541,4–541,5	 nanu anādi loka prasiddhi anuvidhānena eva vaidikānām śabdānām arthavat tā na ca tatra sandehaḥ pratibhāsate iti atas āha loka icchayā parāvarttyamānāḥ yathāsamayam artheṣu niveśyamānāḥ punar anyatra deśa ādi parāvṛttau= anyathā iti artha antara niveśena parāvartyamānāḥ śabdāḥ dṛśyante iti hetoḥ loka prasiddhyā anuvidhānepi aṅgīkriyamāṇe sambhavati eva eṣām vaidikānām śabdānām anyathā bhāvaḥ mithyātvam prasiddheḥ eva aniyata tvāt 
PVVṬ_541,6–542,1	 tasmāt kasyacid vaidikasya vākyasyāḥ gniḥ himasya bheṣajam iti ādikasya avaiparītya darśanepi sarveṣām veda vākyānān tathā bhāva ssatya artha tvat na sidhyati akṛtaka tvāt eva satya artha tvam iti ced āha akṛtaka svabhāva tvehi eṣām vaidikānām śabdānām mithyā artha niyatopi kaścid śabdaḥ syāt iti hetoḥ svabhāva parijñānāt ayam satya arthoyam mithyā arthaḥ iti evam vivekena śabda svabhāvā niścayāt sarvatra śabde saṃśayaḥ syāt satya artham vaidikam vākyam akṛtaka tvāt iti prayoge kriyamāṇa invaya abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_542,2	 vyatireki prayogam āha mithyātvam ityādinā mithyātvam kṛtakeṣu eva dṛṣṭa m iti hetoḥ akṛta kamvacaḥ satya artham yadi iti sambandhaḥ kim kāraṇam vyatirekesya virodhi vyāpanāt akṛtakasya hetoḥ yaḥ vyatirekaḥ kṛtaka tvantena satya artha tvam yat sādhyantasya virodhi mithyātvantasya vyāpanāt vyatirekasya iti karttari ṣaṣṭhī hetu vyatirekeṇa kṛtaka tvena satya artha virodhinaḥ mithyā artha tvasya vyāpta tvāt vaidike śabde akṛtaka tvāt kṛtaka tva nivṛttau mithyārtha tva nivṛtteḥ satya artha tvam sidhyati eva 
PVVṬ_542,3^1	 yathā ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yat kiñcit mithyā artham vacaḥ tad akhilat niḥśeṣam kṛtakam iti kṛtvā hetoḥ akṛtaka tvasya vyatirekeṇa kṛtaka tvena sādhya vyatirekasya sādhyam satya artha tvam tasya vyatirekaḥ mithyātvantasya vyāpteḥ anyatra ākṛtake mithyārtha tvasya asambhavāt kāraṇāt akṛtakam satya artham iti syāt vinā api anvayena satya artham vaidikam vacaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti atra prayoge yadi api anvayaḥ na asti tathā api anvayena vinā sidhyati eva iti arthaḥ yasmāt yaḥ hi arthaḥ mithyātva lakṣaṇaḥ yena kṛtaka tvena avyāptaḥ tatra mithyātve tad vyatirekaḥ tasya avyāpakasya kṛtaka tvasya vyatirekaḥ kṛtaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ āśaṃkyeta ayam api mithyātve bhavet iti 
PVVṬ_542,3^2	 tat ca iha na asti kṛtaka tvena mithyā artha tāyāḥ vyāpteḥ na ca viruddhena vyāpte viruddhasya sambhavaḥ yatas na ca viruddhayoḥ kṛtaka tva akṛtaka tvayoḥ ekatra mithyātve sambhavosti tena akṛtake satya artha tvam vijātīyasya mithyārtha tvasya asambhave satya artha mithyā artha tvābhyām na anyā gatiḥ astīta gati antara abhāvāt akṛtaka tvena satya artha eva bhavitavyam iti akṛtaka tva āt iṣṭa asya satya artha tva lakṣaṇasya siddheḥ kim anvayena tad sādhana tvāt ca liṅgasya iṣṭa artha sādhana tvāt ca liṅgasya vyartham anvaya darśanam kasmāt yathā ukta vidhinā vyatireka mātreṇa eva sādhya siddheḥ iti 
PVVṬ_543,1	 sattyam etat ityā cā ryaḥ vipakṣāt hetoḥ vyatireke siddhe sati sādhyam sidhyet iti sattyam etat yadi sattya artha tā akṛtaka tva vipakṣayoḥ mithyātva kṛtaka tvayoḥ vyāpi avyāpaka bhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā kṛtaka tvena vyāptāt mithyā artha tvāt akṛta kat nivarttate sa tuvyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ vipakṣayoḥ na siddhaḥ kim kāraṇam yasmāt mithyātve akṛtaka tvasya asambhave asambhava nimittam bādhake hetau= anukte sati bhāvaḥ sattvantasya api akṛtaka tvasya mithyātve śakyate akṛtakam ca syāt mithyā artham ca iti 
PVVṬ_543,2–543,4	 nanu ca mithyātve kṛtaka tvam dṛṣṭam yatra ca kṛtakatvantatra katham akṛtaka tvam iti atas āha viruddhānām ityādi viruddhānām api padārthānām eka vyāpaka darśanāt yathā prayatna aprayaṃtnanā āntarīyakāṇām anityānām ekena kṛtaka tvena vyāptiḥ yadi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yadi akṛtaka tva ākhyasya hetossādhya vipakṣe mithyā artha tve abhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā sādhyasya satya artha tvasya vyatirekam mithyātvam hetu vyatirekaḥ hetoḥ akṛtaka tvasya vyatirekaḥ kṛtaka tva ākhyaḥ vyāpnuyāt na ca tasya akṛtaka tvasya tatra mithyārtha tā āyām asambhave bādhakam pramāṇam paśyāmaḥ 
PVVṬ_543,5–543,7	 akṛtaka tvāt eva vedasya mithyārtha tā āyāmavṛttiḥ iti ced āha na ca ityādi mithyārtha tvena aviruddhasya akṛta tvasya vidhiḥ mithyārtha tā pratiṣedhasya sādhanaḥ yuktaḥ kasmāt atiprasaṅgāt evam hi yasya kasyacid vidhānena yasya kasyacid abhāvaḥ pratīyeta kṛtake dṛṣṭasya mithyātvasya ākṛtake katham vṛttiḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_543,8–544,3	 āha na ca ekatra kṛtake dṛṣṭasya mithyātvasya punar anyatra ākṛtake asambhavaḥ eva kintu sambhavaḥ eva kim kāraṇam pṛthak viruddha sahabhāvinām pṛthak iti vyakti bhedena viruddha sahabhāvinām viruddhaiḥ arthaiḥ ekatra bhāvinām api darśanāt anitya tva vat prayatna ānantarīyaka itarayoḥ itarada prayatna ānantarīyakam anitya tvam prayatna anantarīyaka tvena saha dṛṣṭam aprayatna ānarīyaka tvena saha dṛśyate yadi evam akṛtake mithyātvasya adarśanāt abhāvaḥ syāt iti atas āha na ca tathāvidhasya iti akṛtakasya sataḥ mithyātvasya adarśanāt asatvam eva yasmāt na vipakṣe hetoḥ asattā siddhiḥ sarvatonupalambhanāt iti uktam prāk tatas ca asiddhāyām vipakṣāt hetoḥ asattāyām sandigdha vipakṣāt vyatirekitā 
PVVṬ_544,4	 na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe ayampuruṣa mātrakaḥ iti arvāk darśī sarvam vastu draṣṭum samarthaḥ yena asya puṃsaḥ darśana nivṛttyā na tathā syāt adṛṣṭaḥ na syāt yasmāt yasya hi puṃsaḥ jñānam jñeya sattām na vyabhicarati sat iti eva kṛtvā yasya sarvasmin jñeye jñānam pravarttate tasya jñānam jñeya vyāpakam nivarttamānam jñeyam api nivarttayati atosau= adarśanāt na asti iti evam vruvāṇaḥ śobheta na sarvam tat iti tasmāt ime bhāvāḥ santopyanupalakṣyāḥ apohyāḥ syuḥ katham svabhāva deśa kāla viprakarṣeṇa svabhāvaḥ ca deśaḥ ca kālaḥ ca taiḥ viprakarṣaḥ vyavadhānam iti vigrahaḥ san= api kaścid deśa kālābhyām svabhāvena ca viprakṛṣṭaḥ piśāca ādi vat 
PVVṬ_544,5–544,6	 nanu kāla vyavahitānām atīta anāgatānām anupalambhāt asatvam yuktam abhāvāt eva satyam kevalam atīta anāgatānām idānīm anupalambhepi kadācid sattvam bhūtam kadācid bhaviṣyati iti anupalambha abhāvaḥ iti tathā hi ityādina etat eva bodhayati kaḥ hi asarva darśī atyanta parokṣerthe vacanasya akṛtakasya samvādanam itarasya kṛtakasya vacanasya atyanta parokṣerthe itara dvetya samvādanaṃbhāvayitum niścetum samarthaḥ na eva pareṇa kṛtakasya asamvādanam iṣṭam iti dvayam uktam syāt etat ekasya veda vākyasya samvāda darśanāt sarvatra vede samvādanam iti 
PVVṬ_545,1	 atas āha pratipāditam ca etat śeṣa vat anumāna cintāyām pūrvam eva kim pratipāditam iti āha kvacid ityādi kvacid deśa kāle vā tathā iti etena prakāreṇa dṛṣṭānām arthānām punar anyathā bhāvaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭa ākārāt vaiparītyam etat eva āha yathā ityādi saṃskāra viśeṣāt kṣīramadhu ādi pariṣkāra ādi lakṣaṇāt āmalakī phalāni ca kvacid deśe madhurāṇi iti sambandhaḥ na ced ānīmatad darśinā madhura nimba phala ādya darśinā tāni madhurāṇi nimba phalāni pratikṣeptavyāni eva tathā veda vākyānām mithyātvam yadi nāma dṛṣṭan tathā api na śakyam pratikṣeptum tasmāt akṛtakam ca syāt mithyā artham ca iti akṛtaka mithyā artha tvayoḥ na virodhampa śyāmaḥ 
PVVṬ_545,2	 nanu mithyārtha tā āyām akṛtaka tvasya anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ iti atas āha na hi iyam anupalabdhiḥ adṛśya ātmasu adṛśya svabhāvertheṣu abhāvasya sādhika iti uktam prāk yatas ca akṛtaka tvasya na mithyātve abhāvaḥ siddhaḥ tena yat kiṃcid mithyātu antat sarvam pauruṣeyam iti evam mithyā artha tvasya kṛtaka tvena avyāptiḥ kiṅkāraṇam aniścayāt akṛtaka tvasya mithyā artha tve vyatireka aniścayāt iti arthaḥ na ca aniścita vyatirekāt hetossakāśāt sādhya siddhiḥ 
PVVṬ_545,3	 tathā hi sva sādhyena hetoḥ anvayaḥ vyāptiḥ vyatirekaḥ vā vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ vā satvam vā hetoḥ sādhya dharmiṇi pakṣa dharmmam iti arthaḥ etāni ca trīṇi rūpāṇi jñānaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ yadi sidhyanti kīdṛśaiḥ tad niścaya phalaiḥ tasya rūpa trayasya niścayaḥ phalam yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ tadā tāni trīṇi rūpāṇi vivakṣitasya sādhyasya sādhanambhavanti yathoktam ācārya di gnāḥ ge na yaḥ eva hi ubhaya niścita vācī vādi prativādibhyām niścitasya hetu lakṣaṇa yuktasya arthasya vācakaḥ sa sādhanandu ūṣaṇam vā asiddha tva ādi lakṣaṇa yuktasya arthasya vācakaḥ śabdaḥ prativādinā dūṣaṇa abhiprāyeṇa prayuktaḥ na anyatara prasiddhaḥ sandigdha vādaḥ vādi prativādibhyām anyatara prasiddhasya sandigdhasya ca ubhayoḥ anyatarasya ca yaḥ vācakaḥ śabdaḥ sa na sādhanaṃna api dūṣaṇam kim kāraṇam punar sādhana apekṣa tvāt aniścitasya niścaya artham punar pramāṇa apekṣa tvāt na ca akṛtaka tvena saha mithyārtha tvasya virodhaḥ niścitaḥ yena akṛtake mithyātvasya vyatirekaḥ siddhaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_546,1–546,2	 atha syāt akṛtaka tvāt eva vede mithyātvam na bhavati iti ced āha kaḥ hi ityādi yasmāt kaḥ hi sa cetāḥ akṛtaka tvena saha adṛṣṭa virodhasya mithyātvasya sambhavam veda vākyeṣu pratyācakṣīta tat iti tasmāt ayam akṛtaka tvasya hetoḥ yathā uktaḥ vyatirekaḥ na sādhanam kim kāraṇam saṃśayāt itas ca vyatirekī hetoḥ na asti iti darśayan= āha 
PVVṬ_546,3–546,5	 api ca ityādi yatra viṣaye sādhya vipakṣasya sādhyam satya artha tvanta d vipakṣasya mithyātvasya varṇṇayate vyatirekitā yat kṛtakam na bhavati tat mithyā arthan na bhavati iti yaḥ eva mithyārtha tva vyavacchedasya viṣayaḥ saḥ eva asya kṛtakasya hetoḥ sa pakṣaḥ syāt atas kāraṇāt sarvaḥ hetuḥ anvayī anvaya vyatirekī vyatirekasya prakṛta tvāt na vyatirekyā iva iti arthaḥ nanu sādhya dharma sāmānyena samānorthaḥ sa pakṣaḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ ucyate na ca ayam iha asti tat katham saḥ eva asya sapakṣaḥ syāt iti ucyate satyam sa pakṣa sādhya tvena anvayaḥ eva sapakṣaḥ ucyate atas eva āha sarvaḥ hetuḥ atonvayi iti 
PVVṬ_546,6	 yat ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yat kiñcit mithyā arthantat sarvam pauruṣeyam iti evaṃhetoḥ akṛtaka tvasya vipakṣeṇa kṛtaka tvena sādhya vipakṣasya mithyātvasya yā vyāptiḥ sā tad abhāve kṛtaka tva abhāve mithyātvasya abhāva siddhau satyām syāt kim kāraṇam kṛtaka tva abhāve bhavataḥ mithyārtha tvasya tena kṛtaka tvena vyāpti ayogāt tasmāt vyāptim icchatā mithyā artha tvasya kṛtaka tva nivṛttyā nivṛttiḥ eṣṭavyāḥ yā eva ca sādhya sādhana vijātīyayoḥ mithyātva kṛtaka tvayoḥ vyāvṛtti siddhiḥ kṛtaka tva nivṛtya āmithyā artha tvat nivarttate iti evaṃrūpāḥ sā eva akṛtakasya hetoḥ satya artha tvena anvaya sthitiḥ anvaya vyavasthitiḥ kim kāraṇam vipakṣa vyavaccheda lakṣaṇa tvāt sādhyasya satya artha tvasya vipakṣaḥ mithyātvantasya kṛtaka tva nivarttanaḥ kṛtake yaḥ vyavacchedaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ tad lakṣaṇa tvāt 
PVVṬ_547,1–547,2	 kiñca satya artha tā pratiṣedhaḥ mithyā artha tvam tasya ca mithyārtha tvasya ākṛtake yadā pratiṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ tadā pratiṣedha dvayan jātam asmāt ca satya artha tāvyavaccheda rūpāt pratiṣedha dvayāt satya artha tā vidhi siddheḥ iti hetoḥ kān anvaya anvaya rahitā sādhana vyatirekeṇa kṛtaka tvena sādhya vyatirekasya mithyātvasya vyāpti siddhiḥ na eva ananvayā vyāpti siddhiḥ tat iti tasmāt na kaścid hetuḥ ananvayaḥ nāma kintu sarva unvaya vyatirekavān eva kim kāraṇam eka vyavacchedasya akṛtake mithyārtha tva vyavacchedasya vijātīya siddhinā antarīyaka tvāt mithyārtha tā vijātīyasya satya artha tvasya yā siddhiḥ tat na āntarīyaka tvāt 
PVVṬ_547,3	 yadi eka vyavacchedaḥ tad vijātīya siddhinā antarīyakaḥ tadā a nitya nirātma ādi vyavacchedepi anitya tāyāḥ nirātmatāyāḥ ādi śabdāt duḥkha tva ādīnāñca yadā kvacid śaśa viṣāṇa ādau vyavacchedaḥ kriyate tadā api tathā syāt mithyā artha tā vyavacchedena satya artha siddhi vat anitya tva ādi vijātīyānāt nitya sātmaka sukha tva ādīnām siddhiḥ syāt na ca etat iṣṭam tathā atra api mābhūt iti paraḥ manyate 
PVVṬ_547,4	 na ityādinā pariharati na ayan doṣaḥ kim kāraṇam vyatireka vyavacchedasya bhāva rūpa tvāt vyatirekaḥ abhāvaḥ abhāvasya ca yaḥ vyavacchedaḥ nivṛttiḥ tasya bhāva rūpa tvāt abhāva nivṛttyā bhāva vyavasthā iti yāvat tad anena bhāva lakṣaṇam uktam asmāt eva vacanāt idam api arthāt uktambhavati bhāva vyavacchedasya abhāva rūpa tvāt iti tat anena bhāva abhāvayoḥ tāvat lakṣaṇam uktam tatra yasmin vyavacchidyamāne na bhāva anuṣaṅgaḥ yasmin= ca vyavacchidyamāne bhāva anuṣaṅgaḥ tat darśayan= āha na bhāva ityādi bhāva svabhāvasya vyavacchede sati na bhāva anuṣaṅgaḥ na bhāvasya ākṣepaḥ bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti tad pratiṣedhasya eva sambhavāt abhāva vyavaccheda svabhāvasya viraha mātrasya tuyaḥ vyavacchedaḥ sa niyamena bhāvasya upasthāpanaḥ bhāvasya ākṣepakaḥ kiṅkāraṇam bhāva abhāvayoḥ anyonyam yaḥ vivekaḥ virahaḥ tad rūpa tvāt tad svabhāva tvāt bhāva vivekasya abhāva rūpa tvāt abhāva vivekasya ca bhāva rūpa tvāt iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_548,1–548,2^1	 evantā vat bhāva abhāva vyavacchedayoḥ bhāvān ākṣepa ākṣepaka tvam uktvā prakṛtam yojayati abhāva rūpaḥ tu ityādinā satya artha tāyāḥ tu yaḥ vyatirekaḥ mithyārtha tā lakṣaṇaḥ sa satya artha tā abhāva rūpā sa vyatiricyamānaḥ kṛtaka tva nivṛtyā nivarttamānaḥ bhāvaṃsatya artha tā lakṣaṇam upasthāpayati akṛtake yadi tu satya artha tva viparīta rūpam mithyā artha tvampareṇa abhyupagamyate tadā vedavā kyeṣu kṛtaka nivṛttau mithyātvam eva na syāt na tu satya artha tvantataḥ ca ānarthakyam syāt iti vakṣyati tasmāt avaśyam satya artha tā bhāva rūpāḥ mithyā artha tā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ 
PVVṬ_548,1–548,2^2	 sa ca vyatiricyamāna ssatya artha tāyāḥ bhāvam upasthāpayati na evam nairātmyāt ayaḥ viraha rūpāḥ kim kāraṇam svabhāva viśeṣāt svabhāva viśeṣaḥ hi nairātmyam tam eva āha kriyā śubha aśubha karaṇam bhogaḥ sukha duḥkha anubhavaḥ tayoḥ adhiṣṭhānam svīkāraḥ tatra asvatantraḥ para vaśaḥ hi ātmā svabhāvaḥ nirātmā svabhāva paryāyotra ātma śabdaḥ kim punar kāraṇam evaṃbhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ nirātmā bhavati iti āha tat svātantrya ityādi tasmin kriyā bhoga adhiṣṭhāne yat svātantryam tat lakṣa tat sva bhāva tvāt eva ātmanaḥ paraiḥ kalpitasya atas tad vaidharmyeṇa asvatantra svabhāvaḥ nirātmā bhavati iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_548,3	 yatas evantat iti tasmāt rūpam svabhāvaḥ nairātmyam na ātma nivṛtti mātram anyathā āyadi nivṛtti mātram nairātmyam syāt tadā niḥsvabhāva tvāt nirupākhyam eva tat bhavet nirupākhye ca kṛtaka tva ādeḥ ādi śabdāt prayatna anantarīyaka tva ādeḥ vastu dharmasya hetoḥ ayogāt tatas kṛtaka tva ādeḥ hetossakāśān nairātmyam gatiḥ nairātmya siddhiḥ na iṣyate ca tasmāt na bauddhasya ātma viraha mātram nairātmyam na vyavaccheda mātram vivakṣyate kintvā ātma vyavacchedena nirātmanaḥ bhāvasya vastunaḥ nirātma śabdena parāmarśāt abhidhānāt kṛtaka tva ādeḥ sakāśāt nairātmya gatiḥ na prāpnoti iti ayama doṣaḥ iti ced evam api ātma paryudāsena vastu saṃsparśāt tat eva asmad uktam vastu rūpambhāva svabhāvat nairātmyam āyātam na ca bhāva vyavacchede bhāva antara anuṣaṅgaḥ tasmāt bauddhānām śaśa viṣāṇa ādau nairātmya vyavacchedepi na ātmanaḥ bhāva siddhiḥ tena yat ukta manitya nirātma tā vyavacchedepi tathā syādi ti tat parihṛtam 
PVVṬ_549,1	 yasya api nai yā yi kā de rna abha avarūpaḥ ātma avyatirekaḥ kintarhi svabhāva abhāvaḥ eva tasya naiyāyika ādeḥ bhāva rūpasya nairātmyasya vyavacchede na ātmanaḥ bhāva siddhiḥ syāt iti hetoḥ śaśaviṣāṇa ādau nairātmya vyavaccheda īpya ātmanaḥ na anvaya anuṣaṅgaḥ ātmanā anvayonugamaḥ na bhavati iti arthaḥ yathā ca śaśa viṣāṇa ādau nairātmya vyavaccheda īpya ātmanaḥ na anvaya anugamaḥ tathā jīvat śarīre anairātmya īpi nairātmya abhāvepina ātmanaḥ bhāva siddhiḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_549,2	 athavā anyathā vyākhyāyate mī mām sa kaḥ kta vyatireki nirākaraṇa prastāvena naiyāyika uktam api vyatirekiṇam nirākarttum āha yasya api ityādi yasya api naiyāyika ādeḥ na abhāva rūpaḥ ātmā vyatirekaḥ kintarhi nairātmyambhāva svabhāvaḥ eva tasya evam vādinaḥ naiyāyikasya bhāva rūpasya nairātmyasya vyavacchede na ātmanaḥ bhāva siddhiḥ syāt bhāva vyavacchede bhāva antara anuṣaṅga abhāvāt iti hetoḥ yatra prāṇa ādimatu antatra ātmā iti na anvaya anuṣaṅgaḥ yathā ca na anvaya anuṣaṅgaḥ tathā sādhya dharmiṇī anairātmya ipi nairātmya nivṛttau= api na ātmanaḥ bhāva siddhiḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_549,3	 etat eva prayoga pūrvakandarśayan= āha yathā ityādi idam jīvat śarīram na nirātmakam prāṇa ādima tvāt iti āśvāsaḥ prāṇaḥ ādi śabdāt praśvāsa ādi parigrahaḥ atra prayoge jīvat śarīrasya sa ātmaka tvam sādhyan na ca ubhaya siddhaḥ sa pakṣa bhūtaḥ ātmā asti iti na anvayaḥ cintyate kevalam sādhyasya ātmanaḥ hetoḥ ca prāṇa ādimattvasya yathākramam yau vipakṣau nairātmyam aprāṇa ādima tvam ca tayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva cintāyāṃkriyamāṇā yāma pramāṇa ādi matvaḥ eva nairātmyam dṛṣṭantad abhāve vyāpakasya aprāṇa ādimattvasya abhāve ca vyāpyam nairātmyam prāṇa ādimati na asti iti nyāyāt svayam na bhavat api nairātmyam prāṇa ādīnām hetu tvena abhimatānām ātmani sa pakṣa bhūte na siddhim upasthāpayati nairātmyasya bhāva rūpasya vyavaccheda ipi ana ātma lakṣaṇasya bhāva sya anākṣepāt tatas sati api vyatirekenvaya anuṣaṅga abhāvāt vyatirekya iva hetuḥ prāṇa ādiḥ iti na yā yi kaḥ syeṣṭa siddhiḥ eveya tā granthena darśitāḥ 
PVVṬ_550,1–550,2	 etasmin= abhyupagame doṣam āha tathā ityādi aprāṇa ādima tu a nivṛttyā prāṇa ādibhyaḥ nivarttyamānam api nairātmyam yathā prāṇa ādīnām ātmani sa pakṣa bhūte na siddhim upasthāpayati tathā sādhyepi jīvat śarīre prāṇa ādi hetubhiḥ nnairātmyam vyudasyamānam kevalam syāt na tu ātmanaḥ upasthāpakam etat eva grahaṇaka vākyam spaṣṭayan= āha nairātmye abhāvāt ityādi nairātmya īprāṇa ādīnām abhāvāt prāṇa ādayaḥ tad nirasanāḥ nairātmya mātra vyavacchedakāḥ na ātma upasthāpakāḥ kim kāraṇam tatra sātmake prāṇa ādeḥ bhāva asiddheḥ na ca jīvat śarīrena airātmyasya ātma viruddhasya nivṛtti a ātma siddhiḥ kim kāraṇam vipakṣān nairātmyāt prāṇa ādeḥ vyatireka darśanepi kriyamāṇe sa pakṣa īpya ātmani prāṇa ādīnām siddhi prasaṅgāt 
PVVṬ_550,3	 yatas evam tasmāt na viparyaya vyāptiḥ sa ātmaka tva prāṇa ādima tva vipakṣayoḥ nairātmyāt prāṇa ādimat tvayoḥ na vyāpti siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ kadā nairātmyāt prāṇa ādeḥ vyatireka asiddhau evam hi hetu vipakṣeṇa aprāṇa ādimattvena sādhya vipakṣasya nairātmyasya vyāpti siddhiḥ syāt yadi prāṇa ādibhyaḥ nairātmyam nivartteta sā ca nivṛttiḥ anvaye sati syāt tat āha tad siddhiḥ eva ca ityādi tasya vyatirekasya siddhiḥ eva anvaya siddhiḥ tat na antarīyaka tvāt tasya vyatireka siddhiḥ eva anvaya siddha ruktāḥ 
PVVṬ_550,4	 atha anvaya siddhiḥ na iṣyate tadā asiddhau ca anvayasya tad vyatireka vṛtti siddhau= api tasya ātmanaḥ vyatirekaḥ nairātmyantasya prāṇa ādeḥ sakāśāt nivṛtti siddhau= api tat asiddhiḥ tasya ātmanassapakṣa bhūtasya asiddhiḥ iti kṛtvā sādhyepi jīt śarīre nairātmya nivṛttau= api ātmanaḥ asiddhi prasaṃgaḥ tat iti tasmāt anvayā anvaya rahitā na vyatireka vyāptiḥ sādhya sādhana vipakṣayoḥ na vyāptiḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_551,1	 abhyupagamya api iti tu brūmaḥ bhavatu nāma ananvayā viparyaya vyāptiḥ jīvat śarīrāt ca nairātmya nivṛttau sa ātmaka tvam jīvat śarīrasya prakāra antara abhāvāt satya artha tā sā dhane tu akṛtake hetau= ayam prakāraḥ na sambhavati iti āha mithyā artha tāya aityādi mithyā artha tāyāḥ tu sādhya vipakṣa bhūtāyāḥ pauruṣeya tvena vyāptyā hetu bhūtayā śabdāt apauruṣeyān nivṛttau= api na satya artha tvam akṛtakasya sidhyet kim kāraṇam satya artha tva vyatirekeṇa anarthakyasya prakāra antarasya sambhavāt satya artha tva mithyā artha tve na dvairāśye tu śabdānām etat syāt mithyārtha tva nivṛttau satya artha tvam syāt kim kāraṇam eka nivṛttau mithyārtha tā nivṛttau satya artha tā vyatirekeṇa gati antara abhāvāt dvairāśyam eva tu na asti gati antara sambhavāt atas te śabdāḥ anarthāḥ api syuḥ iti na iṣṭa siddhiḥ na satya artha tā siddhiḥ 
PVVṬ_551,2–551,4	 śabdebhyortha pratīteḥ kāraṇāt na anarthakāḥ iti ced na ayam svābhāvikortha pratyayaḥ kintu eṣa puruṣa vyāpāraḥ syāt saṃketaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ tad phala tvāt puruṣa vyāpāraḥ iti abhedena uktaḥ puruṣa vyāpārāt syāt iti arthaḥ kim vat prasiddhāt arthāt artha antara vikalpa vat etat eva vyācaṣṭe yathā ityādi jai mi nī yai riṣṭena arthena bha ra tas rva śyā dicarita ādikasya ātad artha tvepi tad bharata caritam urvaśī caritam ādi śabdāt anyasya api pu ruḥ ra vaḥ ścarita ādeḥ grahaṇam dvitīyena ādi grahaṇe na bharata ādīnām caritāt anyat api avasthā viśeṣa ādikam artham anye mī mām sa kā loka prasiddhāt arthāt anyathā vyācakṣate bharataḥ yūpaḥ urvarśī pātrī araṇiḥ va ityādinā vyākhyātṛ vikalpitāt artha pratītiḥ na bhavati eva iti ced 
PVVṬ_551,5	 āha tad anusāreṇa ityādi vyākhyātṛbhiḥ vikalpita artha anusāreṇa keṣāṃcid śrotṝṇāṃ pratītirbhavati eva tathā iti bharata ādi śabda vyākhyāvat svabhāvāt anarthakeṣu api veda vākyeṣu artha vikalpaḥ puruṣa kṛtaḥ syāt na śabda svabhāva kṛtaḥ kim kāraṇam vaidikebhya urtha pratipattau puruṣasya jai mi ni prabhṛteḥ upadeśa apekṣaṇāt kim iva artha antara vat eva bharatoḥ vaśya ādi śabdānām artha antara vikalpa vat iti arthaḥ svabhāvatortha pratipādana īpi puruṣa upadeśam apekṣiṣyante iti api mithyā yatas na hi prakṛtyā svabhāvena artha prakāśanāḥ tam puruṣa upadeśam apekṣante vahni ādayaḥ puruṣaḥ tu svam ātmīyam samaya vyāpāra saṃketa sāmarthyena ācakṣāṇaḥ parasmai upadiśati yathā ayam śabdosmin= arthe mayā prayuktā eti nyāyyam na tu prakṛtyā artha prakāśane puruṣa upadeśaḥ nyāyyaḥ 
PVVṬ_552,1	 atha puruṣa samita arthavat nisarga siddha upi veda ūrtheṣu puruṣa upadeśam apekṣate tadā yaḥ ca puruṣeṇa samitaḥ saṃketitaḥ yaḥ ca nisargeṇa svabhāvena siddhorthaḥ tayoḥ dvayoḥ api puruṣa upadeśa apekṣaṇam pratyaviśeṣāt anyaḥ ca kaścid viśeṣaḥ na asti yena ayam puruṣa samitoyam nisarga siddhaḥ iti pratīyeta atas kāraṇāt ekaḥ vaidikorthe naisargikaḥ nisarge bhavaḥ iti ādhyātma ādi tva aṭṭhak anyaḥ laukika śabda urthe pauruṣeyaḥ iti duravasānam durbodham vibhāga sādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_552,2	 asti viśeṣaḥ nisarga siddhasya vaidikasya kopi pramāṇa samvādaḥ pramāṇa antara anugamanam yaḥ tu na evam sa pauruṣeyaḥ iti ced etat uttaratra niṣetsyāmaḥ yathānāsti anta parokṣerthe pramāṇa antara vṛttiḥ ityādinā granthena puruṣa upadeśa apekṣaṇa ādinā ca samāna dharmaṇoḥ laukika vaidikayoḥ pramāṇa samvāda mātra viśeṣāt ekatra vaidike apauruṣeya tvena kalpyamāne bahutaram idānīm laukikam eka vākyam pramāṇa samvādya pauruṣeyam kalpyam syāt yasmāt santi puruṣa kṛtāni api vākyāni kānicid anityāḥ vata saṃskārāḥ iti evamādīni evamvidhānī iti pramāṇa samvādīni iti kṛtvā āteṣu apauruṣeya tva prasaṃgaḥ 
PVVṬ_552,3–553,1	 atha pramāṇa samvādinā upi laukikasya pauruṣeya tvantadā tadvat eṣām api vaidikānāṃśabdānām abhipreta arthavattā pauruṣeyī ca syāt pramāṇa anurodhinī ca pramāṇāsamvādinī ca iti na viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ vaidikānām śabdānām laukikebhyaḥ vaidikānām śabdānām mantra tvāt eva apauruṣeya tvam iti darśayan= āha api ca ityādi vyāhatam paraspara viruddham tathā hi mantrāṇām kasyacid puruṣasya samaya tve pratijñā vyavasthāpita tve sati kārya sādhanam yuktam abhimata kārya siddhiḥ mantra prayogāt yuktā iti 
PVVṬ_553,2	 yadi ete ityādinā vyākhyānam ete mantrāḥ yadi kasyacid prabhāvavataḥ karttuḥ samayaḥ syāt iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ samaya vyavasthāpita tvāt samayaḥ iti ucyante katham punar asau samayaḥ kṛtaḥ iti āha parārtha ityādi para artha para tā para artha pradhāna tā kṛpālu tā iti yāvat tasyāḥ anurodhena anyatas vā kutaścid yaśaḥ prabhṛteḥ hetoḥkṛtaḥ syāt kīdṛśa ūsau samayaḥ iti āha yathā ityādi yathā mad praṇītam etat vākyam kim bhūtam abhimata artha upanibandhanam mantrasya karttuḥ abhimataḥ yorthaḥ vidhi viśeṣaḥ āvāhana visarjana ādi lakṣaṇaḥ sa nibandhanam pravṛtti aṅgam yasmin vākye tat tathā uktam evam iti anena anukrameṇa niyuṃjānam prayuṃjānam puruṣam anena arthena puruṣa abhimatena phalena yojayāmi iti samayaḥ syāt tadā mantra prayogāt kadācid vidhi samāptau abhimata artha niṣpattiḥ syāt kavi samayāt iva yathā kenacid kāvyam kṛtvā evam samayaḥ kṛtaḥ mad praṇītam kāvyam yaḥ paṭhati tasmai mayā idam dātavyam iti atas tad kṛta kāvya pāṭhakānām yathā pratijñāta artha niṣpattiḥ tadvat 
PVVṬ_553,3–553,4	 atha bhāva śaktiḥ śabda svabhāvasya eva sā tādṛśī śaktiḥ yena abhimatamphalam bhavati na yathā abhimatāt puruṣa samayāt tadā syāt anyatra api yathā kathaṃcid prayuktān mantrāt api kim kāraṇam varṇṇa ātmakasya mantrasya aviśeṣataḥ na ityādi vyākhyānam na vai puruṣa samayāt hetoḥ mantrebhyortha siddhiḥsya varṇṇa rūpasya mantrasya svabhāvaḥ eṣa yadi na mantrāḥ kasyacid vidhi pūrvat niyuktāḥ phala dāḥ 
PVVṬ_554,1–554,3	 tad tarhi ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī tat tarhi mantra ākhyānam varṇṇānām rūpam sarvatra iti vidhi rahite kāle viparīta ādi prayoge vā aviśiṣṭam iti yathā kathaṃcid pā ṭha anukramam vidhim ca ullaṃghya prayuktāt api mantrāt abhimatam phalam syāt yasmāt varṇṇāḥ eva hi mantraḥ na anyat kiñcid varṇṇa vyatiriktam tad kramaḥ varṇṇa kramaḥ na varṇṇāḥ eva iti ced tat asat yasmāt varṇṇebhyaḥ kramasya artha antara tvam ca varṇṇa ānupūrvī vākyam cediti atra antare pūrvam eva nirākṛtam 
PVVṬ_554,4	 na ityādi vyākhyānam varṇṇebhyaḥ kramasya avyatireke ca varṇṇāḥ eva mantrāḥ te ca varṇṇāḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ sarvatra pratiloma pāṭhā ādau= iti sarvathā yathā kathañcid prayuktāphala dāḥ syuḥ na ca phala dāḥ bhavanti na kevalam vidhi bhraṃśe na phala dāḥ pratyuta anartha kāriṇaḥ eva bhavanti iti āha upaplavaḥ ityādi upadravaḥ upaplavaḥ tu śabdotiśaye alpīyasā upi vidhi kramasya bhraṃśāt dṛṣṭaḥ sa ca puruṣa samaya tve mantrāṇām yujyate na apauruṣeya tve 
PVVṬ_554,5–554,7	 kasyacid samaya tvepi katham upaplavaḥ iti ced āha kasyacid ityādi mantrasya karttrā ye vidhayaḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ teṣām madhye kasyacid vidheḥ anuṣṭhānāt devatāyāḥ sannidhiḥ bhavati tatassannidheḥ anyasya vidhi viśeṣasya āsākalyena asampādanena devatāya avirādhanāt khedanāt ca upaplavaḥ syāt tatra avīta rāgāḥ devatāḥ virāgi tā svayam eva anartham karoti vīta rāgāḥ tu na svayam tad abhiprasannāḥ tu anye devatā ādayaḥ kurvanti iti draṣṭavyam yatra mantre na kaścid api vidhiḥ kriyate tatra katham iti āha sarva ityādi sarva vidhi bhraṃśe tu kasyacid eva samayasya mantra praṇetṛ kṛtasyavidheḥ anuṣṭhānāt devatāyāḥ asannidheḥ na artha anarthau 
PVVṬ_555,1^1	 kiṃca ityādinā doṣa antaram āha nivāritam kramasya artha antara tvam bhavatu vā varṇṇebhyaḥ kramasya artha antara tvam anartha antara tvam vā tatra anartha antara tve kramasya varṇṇa ātmā varṇṇa svabhāvaḥ eva mantraḥ artha antara tve tu tad krama ātmā varṇṇa krama ātmā tasya varṇa ātmanaḥ tad krama ātmanaḥ vā mantrasya kīdṛśasya artha hetoḥ puruṣa artha kāraṇasya hetubhiḥ akṛta tvāt nityasya nityam sannidhānam iti kṛtvā nityantad artha siddhiḥ syāt tebhyaḥ mantrebhyaḥ puruṣa arthasya niṣpattiḥ syāt kiṅkāraṇam 
PVVṬ_555,1^2	 yatas yasyāḥ hi bhāva śakteḥ mantra śakteḥ sakāśāt mantra sādhyasya phalasya utpattiḥ sā bhāva śaktiḥ avikalā iti na phala vaikalyam syāt yasmāt na hi kāraṇasya sākalye sati kāryasya vaikalyam asat tu aṃyuktam kim kāraṇam tasya avikalasya kāraṇasya kāryam akurvataḥ kāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt nitya tva ipi mantrāṇām na kevalān mantra prayogāt iti mantra sambandha ādiṣṭa siddhiḥ kiṅkāraṇam tasya mantrasya vidhāna apekṣa tvāt iti ced tat ayuktam yasmāt mantrasya vidhāna apekṣa tve abhyupagamyamāne tasya apekṣaṇīyasya vidhāna ādeḥ mantraṃpratyasāmarthyam anādheya atiśaya tvāt mantrasya 
PVVṬ_555,2–556,1	 tat vyācaṣṭe yadi hi ityādi vidhāna ādibhiḥ mantra vidhiḥ tasmāt anyatas vā iti kutaścid sahakāriṇaḥ sthāna viśeṣa ādessakāśāt kañcid svabhāva atiśayam āsādayeyuḥ labheran tadā sahakārī tatra utpādye mantrasya svabhāva atiśaye samartha upekṣyaḥ syāt na ca nityeṣu etat atiśaya utpādanam asti iti uktam prāk tat ki m ayam saha kāri atiśaya utpādanam pratyasamarthaḥ mantraiḥ apekṣyate iti kṛtvā anapekṣāḥ mantrāḥ sadā akāryam kuryuḥ yadi kāraka svabhāvā no ced na vā kadācid kāryam kuryuḥ anati svabhāsya sarvadā tulya tvāt kim ca sarvasya puṃsaḥ pātaka ādi yuktasya api sādhanam phala hetavaḥ te na mantrāḥsyuḥ samaya nirapekṣā yadīdṛśī mantrāṇāmbhāva śaktiḥ atha syāt yajamānena eva prayuktāḥ phala dāḥ iti 
PVVṬ_556,2	 atas āha prayoktuḥ bhedaḥ viśeṣaḥ yajamāna tu antad apekṣā ca na asaṃskāryasya mantrasya yujyate yadi bhāva śaktyā eva samaya anapekṣayā mantrāḥ phala dāḥ na te mantrāḥ phala dānam prati kañcid puruṣam parihareyuḥ anyam vā śūdra ādikam yasmāt na hi anyam ayajamānam prati svabhāvaḥ mantrāṇām kārya karaṇa svabhāvaḥ atat bhāvaḥ bhavati ajanaka svabhāvaḥ bhavati kim kāraṇam tasya janaka svabhāvasya tena abrāhmaṇena ca anapakarṣaṇāt akhaṇḍanāt anyena ca yajamāna ādinā anutkarṣaṇāt atas ca kāraṇāt kenadit puruṣeṇa saha mantrāṇām kārya kāraṇa bhāva yogaḥ tad ayogāt ca yathākramam brāhmaṇena anyena ca mantrāṇām pratyāsatti vipra karṣa abhāvāt sarvasya sādhanam syuḥ iti atas eva na nitya tvāt eva asya mantrasya asaṃskārya tvāt prayoktā kārye niyoktā kaścid brāhmaṇonyaḥ vā na asti yatas prayoktā mantra sādhyam phalam aśnuvīta labheta brāhmaṇaḥ eva na anyaḥ tathā hi yathā śūdra ādira pāṭhakaḥ na kiṃcid karoti iti na prayoktā tathā brāhmaṇopi tatas saṃskāra apratipatteḥ iti 
PVVṬ_556,3	 kiñca saṃskāryasya api ādheya atiśayasya api bhāvasya vastu bhedaḥ hi kāraṇa bhedaḥ hi bhedakaḥ na ca brāhmaṇa śūdra ādīnām svabhāva bhedaḥ paramārtha tosti kevalam loka vyavahāra kṛtaḥ vipra śūdra ādi bhedaḥ tena loka vyavahāra bhinnānām brāhmaṇa ādīnām prayoktaṇa ambhedān niyamaḥ mantra śaktau na sambhavati yena brāhmaṇaḥ eva phalam āsādayet na śūdraḥ 
PVVṬ_557,1–557,3	 kva tarhi ayat niyamaḥ syāt iti āha samaye bhavet yadā samayaḥ mantraḥ tadā samayasya karttā vastu svabhāva anapekṣaḥ samayam karoti yathā āloke ye brāhmaṇāḥ prasiddhāḥ tebhyaḥ eva prayoktṛbhyaḥ phalandāsyāmi na anyebhyaḥ iti syāt niyamaḥ ādheya ityādinā vyākhyānam ādheyaḥ janyaḥ viśeṣaḥ yeṣa ante bhāvāḥ tad hetoḥ viśeṣa hetoḥ svabhāva bhede sati tatas viśeṣa hetoḥ sakāśāt āsādita atiśaya tvāt ekatra anyathā bhūtaḥ punar anyatra kāraṇa antare anyathā syuḥ na tu abhede kāraṇasya anyathā bhāvaḥ kim kāraṇam kāraṇā viśeṣe sati kāryasya aviśeṣāt 
PVVṬ_557,4–557,5	 atha kāraṇā viśeṣe kāryasya viśeṣaḥ tadā viśeṣe kāryasya api abhyupagamyamāne tasya viśeṣasya ahetuka tva prasaṃgāt iti ukta prāyam tat iti tasmāt ime maṃtrāḥ kāryāḥ api anityāḥ api hetu kṛtāt svabhāva bhedāt phala dāyinaḥ api na śūdra ādi prayoga ipi anyathā syuḥ aphala dāḥ syuḥ kim kāraṇam śūdraḥ iti vipraḥ iti brāhmaṇaḥ iti abhidhānam saṃjñā yayoḥ puruṣayoḥ tayoḥ buddhīndriya deha iṣu svabhāva bheda abhāvāt prativyakti sva lakṣaṇa bheda uḥ ti iti ced na tasya brāhmaṇeṣu api prativyakti sambhavāt jāti kṛtaḥ tu bhedaḥ na asti iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_557,6–557,8	 nanu ayam brāhmaṇaḥ ayam śūdraḥ iti loke nāma bheda usti tathā sammāna ādi vyavahāra bhedaḥ ca tatas svabhāva bheda uvasīyate iti ced āha na hi ityādi puruṣa icchā anurodhinaḥ brāhmaṇa ādinām abhedāt satkāra ādi vyavahāra bhedāt ca svabhāva bheda anubandhinām yathā kāraṇam utpannena svabhāva bhedena anugatānām arthānām anyathātvam na hi svabhāva bheda usti iti sambandhaḥ tayoḥ brāhmaṇa śadrayoḥ puruṣayoḥ jāti bheda usti iti ced 
PVVṬ_558,1^1	 tat na evam yasmāt sa khalu ityādi sāmānya niṣedhāt niṣiddhā eva jātiḥ kevalam abhyupagamya ucyate sa khalu bhavan= api jāti bhedaḥ tridhā iṣṭaḥ ākṛti guṇa śakti bhede sati gavāśva vat gavāśvasyā iva gavāśva vat tatra ākṛti bhedaḥ saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ sa prativyakti bhedavatīṣu api goṣu anugāmī vidyate na aśva vyaktiṣu guṇa bhedaḥ kṣīra ādīnām rasa vīrya vipāka ādi bhedena sa ca samāna jātīyāsu vyaktiṣu anugāmī dṛṣṭaḥ na vijātīyāsu śakti bheda anurūpa kārya sāmarthya lakṣaṇaḥ yathā gavān doha ādi sāmarthyam na aśvānām tat evam samāna jātīya vyakti anugāminām ākṛtya ādi bhedānām upalambhāt kāmam gavāśu ādiṣvastu jāti bhedaḥ na evam brāhmaṇa ādiṣu pratiniyataḥ ākṛtya ādi bheda usti 
PVVṬ_558,1^2	 yena jāti bhedaḥ kalpyeta sakṛt ca gavā ādiṣu vyutpannaḥ deśa kāla ādi bhedepi anupadeśam iti upadeśam antareṇa enam jāti bhedam lokaḥ pratipadyate ayaṅgaurayam aśvaḥ iti na evam brāhmaṇa ādi bhedam anupadeśam pratipadyate tadvat iti gavāśva vat anayoḥ brāhmaṇa śūdrayoḥ kaṃcid api guṇam viniyatam samāna jātīyāsu eva vyaktiṣu sthitampaśyāmaḥ guṇa grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam evam ākṛti bhedam śakti bhedam ca viniyatam na paśyāmaḥ apaśyantaḥ ca ākṛtya ādi bhedam katham śūdra viprayoḥ jāti bhedaṃpratipadyemahi na eva iti yāvat tathā hi adhyayana śauca ācāra ādi viśeṣaḥ sarvaḥ vyabhicārī yaḥ ca gaura piṅgala keśa tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ ākāra bhedaḥ kalpyate sa brāhmaṇeṣu api keṣucid na asti śūdreṣu ca vidyate keṣucid 
PVVṬ_558,2–558,3	 yadi na jāti bhedaḥ vipra śūdrayoḥ kathantarhi ayam brāhmaṇa ādi śabda śravaṇāt bhinnā pratītiḥ bhavati iti āha yopī ityādi nāma bheda anvayaḥ brāhmaṇa ādi saṃjñā viśeṣa hetukaḥ yopyayam pratīti bhedaḥ buddhi bhedaḥ ayam brāhmaṇaḥ ayam śūdraḥ iti pratīti bheda usati api jātijjapa homa ādi kriyā viśeṣa anuṣṭhānāt syāt anvayāt ca iti tathābhūta vyāpāra anuṣṭhāyinaḥ kulāt utpatteḥ ca vaidya vaṇij vi apadeśa ādi vat yathā tulya jātīyeṣu śudreṣu tasya tasya vyāpāra viśeṣasya anuṣṭhānāt anvayāt ca vaidya ādi vyapadeśāḥ pravarttante na tāvatā jāti bhedaḥ tadvat brāhmaṇa ādiṣu api syāt
