PVVṬ_559,1	 tat iti tasmāt ime mantrāḥ aviśiṣṭena brāhmaṇa śūdra ādinā prayujyamānāḥ tatas brāhmaṇa ādeḥ aviśiṣṭam eva svabhāvam āsādayanti tena kāraṇena aviśeṣeṇa eva śūdra āt iṣu phala dāḥ syuḥ iti upasaṃhāraḥ tat evam mantrāṇāmbhāva śaktyā phala utpādanena ayam doṣoyadā tu yathā uktāt puruṣa samayāt ebhyaḥ vaidikebhyonyebhyaḥ vā mantrebhyaḥ phalam iṣyate tadā ayama viśeṣeṇa phala dāḥ syuḥ iti ayama doṣaḥ kim kāraṇam samaya kārasya mantra praṇetuḥ ruceḥ phala utpatti niyamāt samaya kārasya evam abhirucitam yaḥ īdṛśaḥ brāhmaṇa vyapadeśa bhāj ā ivamvidham niyamam anutiṣṭhati tasya eva aham phala yogena pratyupasthitaḥ na anyebhyaḥ iti evam ruceḥ phala niyāmakaḥ paryanuyogaḥ tathā hi svabhāva vṛttayaḥ bhāvāḥ puruṣa vyāpāra anapekṣāḥ vastu sthityā eva kārya kāriṇaḥ iti arthaḥ te tad mukhena svabhāva dvāreṇa prasaṃgam arhanti yathā svabhāva viśeṣāt iha api evam kinna bhavati iti na puruṣa icchā vṛttayaḥ bhāvāḥ prasaṃgam arhanti kiṅkāraṇam teṣām puruṣāṇām sva icchā anuvidhāyinām yathā kathaṃcid vṛtteḥ 
PVVṬ_559,2	 yat api viśiṣṭaḥ prayoktā mantra phala śmanutaḥ iti ucyate tatra api prayogam evam lakṣaṇam paśyāmaḥ yathā samīhite puruṣa arthe yogyaḥ yaḥ mantra svabhāvaḥ tasya utpādanam utpannasya api uttarottara viśeṣa utpādanena santāna pariṇāmanam anyathātvamvā tad ubhayam utpādanam vipariṇamanam vā viśeṣa janmani viśeṣa utpattau satyām syāt anyathā viśeṣa anutpattau= anādheya atiśayānām mantrāṇām kim kurvāṇaḥ prayojakaḥ na eva 
PVVṬ_559,3–560,1	 yena ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yena kāraṇena tatas mantra prayogāt kaścid prayoktā brāhmaṇaḥ phalam aśnute anyaḥ śūdra ādiḥ na aśnute na utpādanam mantrāṇām prayogaḥ kintu abhivyaktiḥ prayogaḥ yadi iṣyate sa abhivyaktiḥ pragā iva sā mā nyaḥ ci ntā yāṃnirākṛtāḥ tat vyācaṣṭe na hi nityānām padārthānām kācid abhivyaktiḥ iti uktam yatas kāraṇāda abhivyañjakaḥ śabdasya prayoktā syāt 
PVVṬ_560,2	 bhavatu vā abhivyaktiḥ sā ca tāvat yogyatā utpatti nitya tvāt kintu vyaktiḥ ca śabda viṣayā buddhi sā yasmāt puruṣāt prayoktuḥ sa puruṣaḥ mantra phalaiḥ yadi yujyate syāt śetuḥ api phala sambandhaḥ yonyena paṭhyamānam mantram śrṛṇoti kevalam tasya api mantra phalena yogaḥ syāt na tu vaktuḥ eva yasmāt vaktā hi vyakti kāraṇaṃjñāna kāraṇam atas ca phalena prayujyate tat ca mantra viṣaya jñāna kāraṇa tvam śrotuḥ api tulyam iti sā upi vaktā eva iti kasmāt na phalena yujyate 
PVVṬ_560,3^1	 na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na hi nityasya śabdasya anyatas kāraṇāt sva rūpa pariṇāmaḥ svarūpā anyathātvam vyaktiḥ na api āvaraṇa vigamanam vyaktiḥ nityasya āvaraṇa anupapatteḥ kintu tad viṣayā śabda viṣayā pratītiḥ buddhiḥ abhivyaktiḥ kim kāraṇam aśrūyamāṇe śabde avyakta vyapadeśāt na hi anupalabhyamānaḥ śabdaḥ bhivyaktaḥ iti ucyate tatra evam vyavasthite yadi śabda viṣaya buddhi hetuḥ vaktā syāt tadā tad śabda viṣaya buddhi hetu svabhāva vakttṛ lakṣaṇam śrotari api asti iti sā upi śrotā mantra prayoga sambhavam abhimatam phalam vaktṛ vat aśnu vīta 
PVVṬ_560,3^2	 na hi vaktuḥ kaścid anyaḥ tad bhāvaḥ vaktṛ tva bhāvoni atra tad buddhi hetu tvāt śabda buddhi hetu tvāt atas na asti vaktṛ śrotroḥ śabda jñāna hetu tve viśeṣaḥ iti tulyaḥ phala sambandhaḥ syāt paraḥ vaktā upādhiḥ hetuḥ yasyāḥ buddheḥ sā para upādhi buddhiḥ śrotuḥ na vaktuḥ para upādhiḥ buddhiḥ iti hetoḥ vaktṛ śrotroḥ viśeṣaḥ iti ced kaḥ punar upayogaḥ sāmarthyam vaktuḥ śrotari buddhi jananam prati yena upayogena upādhiḥ iṣyate vaktā tatas vaktuḥ sakāśāt śabda śrutiḥ śabda upalabdhiḥ śrotuḥ bhavati atosau vaktā upādhiḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_561,1	 nanu tat eva idam paryanuyujyate kathantataḥ vaktuḥ sakāśāt śabda śrutiḥ śrotuḥ bhavati katham ca tatas na bhavet sambandha abhāvāt upakārya upakāraka bhāva abhāvāt tad abhāvam eva darśayan= āha viṣaya upanayāt viṣaya sannidhāpana āt ayam vaktā asya śrotuḥ śrāvakaḥ syāt śrāvayitā bhavet tat ca pratyupasthāpanam na śakyantasya śabdasya nityasya kathaṃcid api apariṇāmāt anyathātva abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_561,2–561,3	 śrotuḥ indriya saṃskāraṅkurvan= āvaraṇa vigamanam vā śabdasya sampādayan brajet upayogam vaktā iti ced tat na yasmāt indriya saṃskāra ādayā upyuktāḥ pratikṣiptāḥ indriyasya syāt saṃkāraḥ śṛṇuyāt nikhilantad iti ādinā mām ayam vaktā śrāvayati iti śrotuḥ pratyayaḥ buddhiḥ aham enam śrotāram śrāvayāmi iti vaktuḥ saṃpratyayaḥ bhavati atas pratyaya dvayāt yathāyogamvaktṛ śrotroḥ bhedaḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_561,4^1	 anupakārya ityādinā pratiṣedhati mām śrāvayati aham śrāvayāmi iti bhrānti mātram etat kimbhūtam anupakārya upakārakam upakāryaḥ śrotā upakārakaḥ vaktā na bhavati yasmin bhrānti mātre tat tathā uktam nitye ca śabde buddhi janmani puṃsaḥ sarvathā vyāpāra abhāvāt anupakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ tasmāt evaṃbhūtāt bhrānti mātrāt tad bhāve vaktṛ śrotṛ bheda bhāve ati prasaṅgaḥ sarvasya āśrāvayituḥ aśṛṇvataḥ ca evam syāt kiṅkāraṇam anyatra api unmatta ādau vinā eva śabda śravaṇena bhrāntyā aham śṛṇomi ityādi pratyaya darśanāt 
PVVṬ_561,4^2–562,1	 tasmāt sarvathā upakāra abhāve ca tathā apratyayaḥ iti aham śrāvayāmi ityādi pratyayaḥ na yuktaḥ kim kāraṇam sarveṣām parasparam anupakārya upakārakāṇām evam aham atas śṛṇomi ityādi prasaṅgāt yathā tarhi unmatteṣu bhrāntyā pratyaya utpattiḥ tathā nityeṣu api bhavatu iti ced āha bhrāntiḥ ityādi bhrānti rapi yā puruṣasya unmattasya bhavati sā api svastha avasthāyām kutaścid puruṣāt upakāre sati tathā pratyaya utpattau tad āhita saṃskāra vaśena punar unmattā avasthāyām anyatra api avaktarī api kayācid pratyāsattyā kenacid sādṛśyena bhavati sā api bhrāntiḥ nityeṣu mantreṣu atyantam pāramparyeṇa api anupakārena syāt tasmāt ityādinā prakṛtam upasaṃharati yathā ukta vidhinā vaktṛ śrotroḥ vyakti hetu tve śabda jñāna hetu tve viśeṣa abhāvāt tulyaḥ mantra phalena sambandhaḥ syāt nityeṣu vyakti hetu tvam api na eva asti kevalam abhyupagamya evam ucyate 
PVVṬ_562,2	 api ca ityādinā dūṣaṇa antaram āha anabhivyaktaḥ na śrotra viṣayat nītaḥ śabdaḥ yaiḥ karaṇaiḥ tālu ādibhiḥ tāni anabhivyakta śabdāni teṣām karaṇānām prayojanam vyāpāraṇam vyartham syāt iti liṅga vipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ yatra oṣṭha ādi praspanda mātreṇa upāṃśu japaḥ kriyate sa vyarthaḥ syāt iti vākya arthaḥ yatra oṣṭha ādi praspanda upi na asti kevalam manasā mantra cintanam sa manojapaḥ vā śabdaḥ samuccaye manojapaḥ ca vyarthaḥ syāt yasmāt śabdaḥ hi śrotra gocaraḥ śrotra grāhyaḥ eva śabdaḥ śabda svabhāvaḥ ca mantraḥ upāṃśu mānasayoḥ ca japayoḥ śrotra grahaṇa abhāvāt aśabda tvam aśabda tvāt ca amantra tvam ca japan katham phalavān syāt gṛhyate iti grahaṇam śrotra grāhyā eti arthaḥ tat eva lakṣaṇam yasya śabdasya sa tathā uktaḥ tad atikrama iti prasaṃgāt śrotra grāhyam śabdam muktvā manojapa ādeḥ jñāna ātmakasya śabda tvaḥ iṣyamāṇe rasa ādīnām api śabda tvam syāt 
PVVṬ_562,3–562,4	 nanvem api śrotra gocarasya śabda svabhāva tve śabda tva sāmānye śabda svabhāvatā prasaṅgaḥ na iti si ddhā nta vā dī na brūmaḥ śrotra gocaraḥ śabdaḥ eva iti śabdaḥ tu avaśyan tat lakṣaṇaḥ śrotra grahaṇa lakṣaṇaḥ iti brūmaḥ kasmāt tasya śabdasya śrotra grāhya tvam muktvā lakṣaṇa antara abhāvāt tatra etasmin śabda sva lakṣaṇe yadi śabda ātmanām śabda svabhāvānām mantrāṇām abhivyakti hetuḥ śabda svarūpa grāhi jñāna hetuḥ puruṣaḥ prayoktā iṣyate yasya phalena sambandhaḥ tadā anabhivyakta śruti viṣayāṇām śruti viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ sonabhi vyaktaḥ yaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ iti vigrahaḥ teṣām kāraṇānām prayoktā oṣṭha ādi spanda mātreṇa vyāpārayitā upāṃśu jāpī na mantra phalena yujyate na api manasā japan mantra phalena yujyeta yasmāt na hi tadā upāṃśu mauna japa kāle śrotreṇa kaṃcid arthaṃśabda ākhyam vibhāvayāmaḥ gṛh ṇīmaḥ 
PVVṬ_563,1–563,2	 mānasopi japaḥ mantraḥ iti āha na ca mānasaḥ vikalpaḥ aśabda ātmā mantraḥ śabdasya śrotra grāhya tva apauruṣaya tva nitya tvena abhyupagamāt tad viparīta tvāt ca vikalpasya pāramparya ityādinā para abhiprāyam āśaṃkate yā api upāṃśu manojā apa kāle mantra ābhāsā matiḥ buddhi ḥ sā api tad vyaktiḥ tasya śabdasya vyakti jñānam kasmāt pāramparyeṇa tad ja tvāt śabda jāta tvāt tathā hi tasya prāk śabda jñānam utpannantena jñānena ca āhita saṃskārasya krameṇa manojape śabda pratibhāsa utpatteḥ 
PVVṬ_563,3	 na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na hi manasā dhyāyatopi japinaḥ yā mantra ābhāsā buddhiḥsā śravaṇāt ṛte śabda śravaṇam vinā tatas śabda prabhavāt śabdāt utpatteḥ sā api manojapa kāle matiḥ śabda vyaktiḥ eva śabda jñānam eva tatas ca mantra svabhāva tvāt manaḥ japa ādeḥ prayoktā phalavān syāt iti bhāvaḥ evam iti pāramparyeṇa mantra tve anavasthā syāt 
PVVṬ_563,4	 tam eva āha śabda ityādi mantra lakṣaṇāt śabdāt artha vikalpāḥ śabda artha vikalpāḥ tathā hi agnaye svāhā iti ukte agniḥ jvalat bhāsuḥ ādi rūpaḥ ityādi vikalpāḥ kadācid utpadyante teṣām api paramparayā śabda prasūtiḥ asti iti tepi vikalpāḥ tathā syuḥ mantra vyakti lakṣaṇāḥ prayogāḥ syuḥ śabda prabhavā api satī yā tad arthā śabdaḥ arthaḥ viṣayaḥ yasyāḥ iti vigrahaḥ sā eva ced matiḥ mantra vyaktiḥ na ca artha vikalpāḥ ye śabda viṣayāḥ asiddham iti si ddhā nta vā dī śabda vikalpasya asiddham śabda sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvam kim kāraṇam kalpanā anvayāt sajātīya vikalpa hetuka tvāt adhyāropita ākāra viṣayāḥ eva manaḥ vikalpāḥ 
PVVṬ_564,1–564,2	 na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na brūmaḥ sarvā śabda prabhavā buddhiḥ tad vyaktiḥ śabda vyaktiḥ iti kintu yā tad viṣayā śabda viṣayā vikalpa buddhiḥ sā tasya śabdasyavyaktiḥ iti tat etat asat yatas manaḥ vijñānasya tad viṣaya tvam śabda viṣaya tvam asiddham yasmāt na hi sva lakṣaṇa śabdānām vṛttiḥ iti nivedayiṣyāmaḥ yadi bāhyorthaḥ vikalpānām na hetuḥ kathantarhi utpadyante iti 
PVVṬ_564,3	 āha te hi ityādi te hi vikalpāḥ yathā svam iti yasya yaḥ vāsanā prabodhaḥ hetuḥ vijñāna pratiṣṭhita tvena antarāt vikalpa vāsanā prabodhāt bhavati anapekṣitaḥ bāhya artha upanidhiḥ sannidhānam yaiḥ iti vigrahaḥ kasmāt bāhya ityādi apāyaḥ nirodhaḥ anāgama unutpattiḥ bāhyasya nirodhe anutpattau ca vikalpānām bhāvāt yatas ca artham antareṇa bhavanti tasmāt na artha hetavaḥ kim kāraṇam na hi yaḥ yasya satta upadhānam sattā sannidhānam na apekṣate sonapekṣyamāṇaḥ tasya nirapekṣasya hetuḥ ahetuḥ ca vikalpānām katham viṣayaḥ na eva yatas evam na śabda viṣayaḥ vikalpaḥ tasmāt na manaḥ vikalpaḥ manaḥ japāḥ dilakṣaṇaḥ śabda vyaktiḥ yatas yena tadvān manojapavān puruṣaḥ mantrasya prayoktā syāt na eva syāt iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_564,4	 śabda abhivyaktim abhyupagamya api doṣam āha śabda prasūtā tad viṣayā ca buddhiḥ śabda vyaktiḥ tad āśrayaḥ tasyāḥ vyakteḥ āśrayaḥ yatas puruṣaḥ tasmāt prayoktā iti atra api pakṣe uktam kim uktam śro tra prayoktṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ iti śrotā api hi śabda prasūtāyāḥ tat viṣayāyāḥ buddheḥ sva santāna bhāvinyāḥ āśrayaḥ tathā ca tasya api mantra phalena yogaḥ syāt iti 
PVVṬ_565,1–565,2	 kim ca nityānām mantrāṇām na atiśaya utpādanam prayogaḥ kintu tad viṣayam jñānam prayogaḥ tasmin na jñāne ca prayogebhyupamyamāne śabdaḥ puruṣe vyāpriyate katham tasya puruṣasya jñāna jananāt na puruṣaḥ śabde vyāpriyate kasmāt tad ātmani nitye śabda ātmani kathaṃcid api puruṣeṇa anupakārāt kāraṇāt atha ca puruṣaḥ śabdānām prayoktā iti alauki koyam vyavahāraḥ loke hi yaḥ yatra vyāpriyate sa tasya prayoktā iti ucyate sarvathā iti ādinā upasaṃhāraḥ yadi sākṣāt śabda prasūtā buddhiḥ śabda buddhiḥ atha pāramparyeṇa sarvathā śabda svabhāvānām mantrāṇām prayogāt tad viṣaya jñāna jananāt phala avāpta aviṣyamāṇāyām vyarthaḥ manojapaḥ kiṅkāraṇam manojapa lakṣaṇasyavikalpasya śabda svarūpa asaṃsparśāt 
PVVṬ_565,3	 yasya api samayāt phalantasya api katham manojapaḥ na vyarthaḥ iti āha sva svabhāvaḥ śabda sva lakṣaṇam vikalpa pratibhāsi a ākāraḥ sāmānya svabhāvanteṣām sva sāmānya svabhāvānām eka bhāva vivakṣayā dṛśya vikalpayoḥ ekīkṛtya samaya kāraṇā mukteḥ mantra praṇayanāt manojapaḥ vyarthaḥ syāt iti ayam avirodhaḥ samaya kārasya abhiprāya sampādanena phala niṣpatteḥ na tu vastuni avirodhaḥ kintu virodhaḥ eva tathā hi śabda sva lakṣaṇāt vastunaḥ phala avāptau manojapaḥ vyarthaḥ tasya avastu saṃsparśāt 
PVVṬ_565,4	 samaya ityādinā vyācaṣṭe śabda sva lakṣaṇam śrotra indriya viṣayam sāmānya lakṣaṇañca vikalpa pratibhāsam yathāvyavahāram loka vyavahāra an atikrameṇa saṃvṛtyā saṃkalayya iti vikalpa buddhyā dṛśya vikalpayoḥ śabda sva lakṣaṇa sāmāni a ākārayoḥ ekīkṛtya samayam ārocayet yaḥ vācā manasā ca abhilapanam mad praṇītasya mantrasya anutiṣṭhati tasya ayam mantraḥ yathāsamayam arthat niṣpādayet iti tatas yaḥ enam mantram vācā manasā ca abhilapati tasya yathāsamayam ca artham niṣpādayet iti na manojapa ādau doṣaḥ ādi grahaṇāt upāṃśu prayoga ādi parigrahaḥ vastu svabhāvāt tu śabda svabhāvāt mantrāt phala utpattā viṣyamāṇāyāma tad svabhāva saṃsparśe sati manojapa ādau na phalam syāt 
PVVṬ_566,1–566,2	 yat uktam ityādinā para abhiprāyam āśaṃkate yat uktam varṇṇāḥ eva hi mantraḥ iti atra antare na varṇṇebhyonyā kācid ānupūrvī iti tatra ucyate ānupūrvyām asatyām saraḥ iti pratīti bheda lakṣaṇaḥ syāt iti ced yasmāt na hi saraḥ rasaḥ ityādi padeṣu kaścid varṇṇa bhedaḥ yaḥ eva hi varṇṇāḥ saraḥ iti atra pade te eva rasaḥ iti atra pade 
PVVṬ_566,3–566,4	 na ca vyatiriktam anyat padam asti yatas kārya bhedaḥ buddhi bheda lakṣaṇaḥ syāt asti ca kāryasya bhedaḥ yatas bhinnāñca tayossaraḥ rasaḥ iti padayoḥ pratibhām buddhimpaśyāmaḥ ānupūrvīm eva ca atulyām bhinna antayoḥ paśyāmaḥ varṇṇāḥ punar te eva na ca kāraṇasya varṇṇasya abhede kārya bhedaḥ buddhi bheda lakṣaṇaḥ yuktaḥ tasmāt varṇṇa abheda īpi asti bhedavatī pratipadambhinnāḥ sā iti ānupūrvī yatas pratipadam bhedavatyā ānupūrvyā ayam saraḥ ityādi padeṣu pratīti bhedaḥ buddhi bhedaḥ satyam iti si ddhā nta vā dī satyam pratipadam bhedavatī asti ānupūrvī kevalaṃsā ānupūrvī puruṣa āśrayā pauruṣeyī avyatiriktā eva varṇṇebhyaḥ varṇṇāḥ ca pratipadam anye ca anye ca utpadyante kāraṇa bhedāt kevalanteṣu sādṛśyāt eka tva adhyavasāyaḥ manda matīnām 
PVVṬ_567,1	 etat eva darśayan= āha tathā hi ityādi ayam atra samudāya arthaḥ vaktṛ sthena pūrva pūrva varṇṇa samutthāpaka cittena uttarottara varṇṇa samutthāpakam cittan janyate iti samutthāpaka citta kramāt tad samutthāpyānām varṇṇānām utpatti kramaḥ krama utpannaiḥ ca varṇṇaiḥ sva viṣayāṇi krama bhāvīni eva śrotra vijñānāni sākṣāt janyante krama bhāvinyaḥ eva varṇṇa ālambanāḥ smṛtayaḥ ca pāramparyeṇa tatas varṇṇānām samutthāpaka jñāna kramāt yā krame kārya tā sva viṣaya jñāneṣu ca yā krameṇa kāraṇa tā sā eva anupūrvī iti vyavasthāpyate iti 
PVVṬ_567,2^1	 samprati avapada arthaḥ vibhajyate yaḥ dhvaniḥ jāyate iti sambandhaḥ yathā saraḥ iti atra pade sakārāt paraḥ akāraḥ kutas jāyate yad varṇṇa samutthāna jñāna jāt jñānataḥ pūrva kāla bhāvī varṇṇaḥ sakāraḥ yaḥ ca asau varṇṇaḥ ca iti yat varṇṇaḥ yat varṇṇasya samutthānam kāraṇam samuttiṣṭhatena ina iti kṛtvā yat varṇṇa samutthānam yat varṇṇa samutthānañca tat jñānam ca iti karmadhārayaḥ tasmāt jātam yat jñānam tat yat varṇṇa samutthāna jñāna jam jñānam tasmāt jñānataḥ jāyate 
PVVṬ_567,2^2–567,4	 sakārasya samutthāpakam yat jñānantasmāt akāra samutthāpakam jñānam yat utpannantena ākāraḥ janyate iti arthaḥ evam anyopi pūrva pūrva varṇṇa samutthāna jñāna jāduttarotaraḥ varṇṇaḥ jāyate iti yojyam evantā vat vaktṛ santāna sthasya samutthāna jñānasya kramāt varṇṇānām krameṇa utpatteḥ kāryatvam uktam te ca krameṇa utpannāḥ śrotṛ santāna sthānām sva viṣaya jñānānām krameṇa hetavaḥ bhavantaḥ jñāyante iti darśayan= āha tad upādhiḥ ityādi pūrvaḥ varṇṇaḥ upādhi viśeṣaṇam yasya uttarasya varṇṇasya sa tathā uktaḥ saḥ iti uttaraḥ varṇṇaḥ śrutyā śrotra jñānena samavasīyate gṛhyate nanu ca pūrvaḥ varṇṇaḥ uttara varṇṇa kāle na eva asti tat kathantad upādhiḥ pūrvaḥ uttaraḥ varṇṇaḥ gṛhyate iti āha tad jñāna janita jñānaḥ iti tena pūrva varṇṇa aviṣayeṇa jñānena janitam sva viṣayam jñānam yasya iti vigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_568,1	 etat uktam bhavati sakāra ālambanam yadā śrotra vijñānam tasmin= eva kāle akāra samutthāpana cittena ākāraḥ janitaḥ tena ākāra ssakāra ālambanaḥ ca pratyayaḥ samāna kālaḥ tatra sa ākāra ālambanena śrotra vijñānena sahakāriṇā akāraḥ sva viṣayam jñānam janayan pūrva varṇṇa upādhiḥ pratīyate iti ucyate iti arthaḥ tat evam pūrva jñānena sahakāriṇā janita ātma jñānaḥ saḥ iti uttaraḥ varṇṇaḥ kīdṛśaḥ śravaṇa kāle apaṭu śrutiriti atvaritam śanais śanais uccāritaḥ yadā varṇṇaḥ bhavati tadā apaṭvī manda cāriṇī pravibhakta varṇṇa grāhiṇī śrutiḥ śrotra vijñānam yasya śabdasya iti apaṭu śrutiḥ yasyām avasthāyām vibhaktāḥ varṇṇāḥ avadhāryante iti yāvat ati tvari tantu uccāryamāṇe vibhakta varṇṇa aparicchedāt kutas krameṇa smṛti jananam iti asya san darśana artham apaṭu śruti grahaṇam saḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ varṇṇaḥ kiṃkārī iti 
PVVṬ_568,2–568,3	 āha apekṣya tad smṛtim pūrva varṇṇa smṛtim paścāt ādhatte janayati smṛtim ātmani sva viṣaye pāramparyeṇa iti draṣṭavyam etena ca sva viṣayāṇi jñānāni prati varṇṇānām krameṇa kāraṇa tā uktā iti uktena krameṇa eṣā kārya kāraṇa tā varṇṇeṣu iti varṇṇa ādhārā varṇṇānām iti yāvat pauruṣeyepi evam puruṣa kṛtā eva anuparvī iti loke kathyate 
PVVṬ_568,4	 kim apekṣayā varṇṇānām kārya tā kāraṇa tā ca iti āha tad hetu grāhi cetasām iti hetavaḥ ca grāhīṇi ca iti dvandvaḥ teṣām varṇṇānām hetu grāhīṇi iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ paścāt cetaḥ śabdena viśeṣaṇa samāsaḥ varṇṇa hetavaḥ krameṇa yadi cetāṃsi teṣām sambandhena varṇṇānām krameṇa kārya tā taiḥ cetobhiḥ varṇṇānān janya tvāt teṣām varṇṇānām grāhīṇi yāni cetāṃsi teṣām sambandhena varṇṇānām krameṇa kāraṇa tā varṇṇauḥ teṣām varṇṇa grāhiṇām cetasām janya tvāt 
PVVṬ_568,5	 citta ityādinā vyācaṣṭe cittam samutthānam kāraṇam yasyāḥ vāc vijñaptessā tathā uktā vāc eva vijñaptiḥ para vijñāpanāt sā ca tridhā lokaḥ iti āha varṇṇa ityādi varṇṇāḥ padam vākyam ca iti abhidhānam yasya iti vigrahaḥ tatra akṣarāṇi varṇṇāḥ artha avacchinnaḥ varṇṇa samudāyaḥ padam pada samudāyaḥ vākyam tatra ityādi saraḥ iti atrapade yañca varṇṇāḥ sakāraḥ tasmāt paraḥ akāraḥ tatas rephaḥ tasmāt akāraḥ tasmāt paraḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti tatra sakārasya samutthāpanam kāraṇam yat cetaḥ tena cetasā samanantara pratyayena samanantara grahaṇam ālambana pratyaya vyavaccheda artham akāra utthāpana cittam akāraḥ utthāpyate janyate yena cetasā tat utpādyate tathā iti uktena krameṇa rephākāḥ yaiḥ cittaiḥ tāni pūrva pūrva pratyayāni pūrvam pūrvam cittam pratyayaḥ kāraṇam yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ tatra ākāra samutthāpana cetasā rephaḥ utpadyate repha samutthāpana cetasā samanantara pratyayena ākāraḥ akāra samutthāpana cetasā visarjanīyaḥ utpādyate iti 
PVVṬ_569,1–569,2	 nanu cedampadam uccārayāmi iti vivakṣayā padam uccāryate tena ekayā eva vivakṣayā varṇṇa kramaḥ uccāryate na tu varṇṇānām pratyekam vivakṣā pūrvaka tvam apratīteḥ tat katham ucyate sakāra ādi samutthāpaka cittena ākāra ādi samutthāpakam cittam janyate iti evam manyate varṇṇa uccāraṇe tāvat ayam eva kramaḥ pada uccāraṇepi prathama mayam eva kramaḥ tathā hi sakāra vivakṣayā sakāram uccārayati evam uttarottara varṇṇa vivakṣayā uttarottaram varṇṇam uccārayati abhyāsāt tu pada uccāraṇe pada vivakṣā eva ekā kāraṇam iti eke 
PVVṬ_569,3–569,4	 anye tu anyathā pada uccāraṇe ekā eva vivakṣā kāraṇam iti satyam etat kevalam sakāra uccāraṇa kāle avaśyam cittam vidyate anyathā maraṇa prasaṅgāt tat eva ca cittam sakāra samutthāpakam ucyate tad anantaram sakārasya utpatteḥ evam uttarottara varṇṇeṣu citta samutthāpaka tvam draṣṭavyam iti atra ca sakāra samutthāpaka cetasā samanantara pratyayena ityāḥ dināḥ granthena eka karttṛka eva varṇṇa krama urtha pratīti hetuḥ na bhinna karttṛkaḥ iti uktam bhavati tena yat ucyate me ṇḍa ne na 
PVVṬ_569,5–569,7	 kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ced kramaḥ tad grāhi cetasām tad hetuḥ ātma bhedaḥ vā vakttṛ bhedepi dhīḥ bhavet iti sphoṭa siddhiḥ tad apāstam bhinna karttṛka varṇṇa grāhi cetasām ātma bhāvasya artha pratīti hetutva anabhyupagamāt yat ca api ukta mama ṇḍa ne na atha samutthāpaka citta krameṇa varṇṇa kramāt artha pratītiḥ tathā api sa ca kramaḥ jñāpaka tvāt jñānam apekṣate dṛśyate ca tirohita vyavahita vaktṛ prayuktāt śabdāt artha jñānam na ca tatra samutthāpaka citta kārya kāraṇa tām kaścana niścetum arhati cakṣuḥ eka tve hi sā niścīyeta antareṇa śabda jñānāt na ca tirohita vyavahitayoḥ vaktuḥ ekatve pramāṇam astī ti 
PVVṬ_570,1–570,2	 tat ayuktam yatas tirohita vyavahita avasthāyām vaktuḥ eka tvam kaiścid avadhāryate eva tathā hi devadattaḥ mām śabdayati na yajñadattaḥ iti loke pratīti pūrvikā eva pravṛttiḥ dṛśyate yatra na avadhāraṇam na tatra pravṛttiḥ iti iṣṭa siddhiḥ eva api ca sphaḥ ṭa vā dinopi tirohita avasthā ādau katham sphoṭa abhivyaktiḥ vyañjakānām varṇṇānām eka karttṛka tva anavadhāraṇāt avaśyam ca tatra sphoṭa abhivyaktireṣṭavyāḥ anyathārtha avagatiḥ na syāḥ diti kaiścid avadhāryate eva yat kiñcid etat 
PVVṬ_570,3–570,5	 tat iti tasmāt ime varṇṇāḥ anya ani ahetavaḥ iti anyat anyat samutthāpakam cittam hetuḥ yeṣām iti arthaḥ sva kāraṇāni samutthāpakāni eva jñānāni teṣām ānupūrvī kramaḥ tasyāḥ janma yeṣa ante tathā uktāḥ kāraṇa kramāt krama bhāvinaḥ varṇṇāḥ iti arthaḥ iyatā ca yaḥ yat varṇṇa samutthāna jñāna jāt jñātaḥ dhvaniḥ iti etat vyākhyātam sa śrutyā samavasīyate iti etat vivṛṇvan= āha śruti ityādi śrutika ālepi śravaṇa kālepi yadā manda cāriṇaḥ iti yadā na atidrutam uccāryante iti arthaḥ pūrva varṇṇa ālambanam jñānantadeva sahakāri pratyayaḥ tam apekṣante ye varṇṇāḥ te tathā uktāḥ 
PVVṬ_570,6	 te evaṃbhūtāḥ kim kurvanti sva jñānam sva viṣayam śrotra vijñānam janayanti tathā hi sakāra ālambanam śrotra vijñānam yasmin= eva kāle tathā eva ākāra upya kāra samutthāpana cetasā janitaḥ tena ākāraḥ sakāra ālambanam ca jñānam eka kālantasmāt akāraḥ sakāra ālambana jñānena sahakāriṇā sva viṣayam jñānam janayati evam anyeṣu api varṇṇeṣu ayam nyāyaḥ yojyaḥ 
PVVṬ_570,7	 tadā iti yadā sva viṣayam anubhava jñānam janitavantaḥ tadā pūrva varṇṇa viṣayam yat smaraṇantad apekṣāḥ eva smṛtim upalīyante smṛtau= ārohanti yena eva krameṇa anubhūtāḥ tena eva krameṇa smaryante iti arthaḥ saḥ eṣaḥ yuga pada bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ varṇṇānām svabhāvaḥ iti sambandhaḥ kīdṛśaḥ iti āha bhinna ityādi pūrva pūrva vijñāna janya tvāt bhinnaḥ kārya bhāvaḥ uttara uttara jñānasya hetu tvāt bhinnaḥ kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ca yeṣām sakāra ādi samutthāpaka jñānānāntāni bhinna kārya kāraṇa bhāvāni tāni eva pratyayāḥ hetavaḥ tebhyaḥ nirvṛttiḥ utpattiḥ sā eva dharmaḥ lakṣaṇam yasya svabhāvasya iti vigrahaḥ etena tad hetu cetāṃsi apekṣya varṇānām kāryatvam uktam 
PVVṬ_571,1–571,2	 tad grāhi cetāṃsi apekṣya kāraṇa tvam āha bhinnasya vijñāna kāryasya nirvarttanaṃjananam saḥ eva dharmaḥ lakṣaṇam yasya svabhāvasya iti vigrahaḥ saḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ varṇṇa svabhāvaḥ puruṣa saṃskāra bheda bhinnaḥ puruṣa prayatna bheda bhinnaḥ kramaḥ iti ucyate nanu kramaḥ varṇṇānām dharmaḥ tena katham saḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ varṇṇa svabhāvaḥ kramaḥ iti ucyate 
PVVṬ_571,3	 evam manyate na yugapad utpannānām krama ustya pratīteḥ tasmāt yugapad utpannānām eva varṇṇānām kramaḥ ayugapad utpannāḥ ced varṇṇāḥ iṣyante te eva loke kramaḥ na varṇṇebhyortha antara bhūta usau= apratīteḥ na api teṣām kramaḥ ekaḥ dharmaḥ asahabhāvāt na api pratyekam dharmaḥ krama upratīteḥ tasmāt ayugapad utpannāḥ eva varṇṇāḥ kramaḥ iti ucyate iti uktam kevalam eṣām kramaḥ iti kalpitoyam vyavahāraḥ na ca yaḥ eva saraḥ iti pade kramaḥ loke pratīyate saḥ eva rasaḥ iti pade na api krama vyatiriktam pūrva apara varṇṇānām svarūpam tasmāt pratipadam varṇṇānām anyat eva svarūpam lokaḥ ca saraḥ iti padāt rasa padasya anya tvam avadhārayati eva 
PVVṬ_571,4–571,7	 tena yat ucyate me ṇḍa ne na utpatti vādinaḥ varṇṇāḥ kāmante santu bhedinaḥ na tu asādhāraṇaḥ teṣa ambheda urtha jñāna kāraṇam sphoṭa siddhiḥ tasya anavadhāraṇāt saṃketa kāle ca adṛṣṭa tvāt iti tad apāstam yatassaraḥ iti varṇṇa kramāt rasaḥ iti varṇṇa kramaḥ bhinnaḥ eva avadhāryate na apikram avyatirekeṇa varṇṇāḥ pratibhāsante tasmāt krama bheda avadhāraṇam eva varṇṇa bheda avadhāraṇam kevalam rasa padāt rasa pada antarasya bhedaḥ sādṛśyāt na avadhāryate atas eva saṃketa kāle dṛṣṭa tvāt rasa padārtha pratipādakam yuktam evam anyasya api padasya iti yat kiñcid etat 
PVVṬ_571,8–572,2	 etat eva darśayan= āha anyat eva ityādi yatas varṇṇānām svabhāvaḥ yathā uktaḥ kramaḥ iti ucyate tatas kāraṇāt tat iti sādṛśyāt eka tvena adhyavasitam api rūpam varṇṇānām anyat eva padam padam pratipadam kim kāraṇam karttṛ saṃskārataḥ bhinnam yatas samutthāpaka cittam eva karttṛ tasya śakti bhedāt bhinnam sahitam iti pūrva uttara krameṇa uccāritam kārya bheda kṛt iti buddhi bhedam karoti na ca varṇṇāḥ nirartha kāssantaḥ iti pūrvam eva pratipāditam tad katham varṇṇa svarūpam sahitam kārya bheda kṛt iti ucyate atra eke manyante pratipadam varṇṇānām sva rūpam bhinnam pauruṣeyam vācaka na apauruṣā iyam iti yat āha satyam asti sā kintu puruṣa āśraya iti 
PVVṬ_572,3	 tat ayuktam varṇṇānām sahita asahitānām artha apratipādaka tvāt tasmāt ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi paramārthataḥ varṇṇa kramaḥ syāt tadā asau= eka pada ādi rūpa tayā kalpita urthasya pratipādakaḥ syāt yatas ca ekena vikalpena viṣayīkṛtāḥ kramiṇaḥ varṇṇāḥ pratipādakāḥ atas eva eka vikalpa avabhāsi tvāt kramiṇām varṇṇānām rūpam sahitam kārya bheda kṛt iti ucyate iti adoṣaḥ yatas ca samutthāpaka bhedāt bhedaḥ tasmāt na khalu ekaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ varṇṇānām saraḥ rasaḥ ityādi padeṣu kim kāraṇam karttṛ citta saṃskāra bhedena bhedāt karttṛ ca tad citta jñātasya saṃskāra bhedaḥ samanantara pratyaya bhedena śakti bhedaḥ tena varṇṇānām svabhāvasya bhedāt sa ca varṇṇānām pratipadam bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ krama rūpaḥ eka vikalpa ārūḍha tvāt paraspara sahitaḥ kārya bhevasya artha viṣaya buddhi bhedasya hetuḥ 
PVVṬ_572,4–572,5	 yā ca evam kārya kāraṇa tā lakṣaṇa ānupūrvī sā ca ānupūrvī varṇṇānām pravṛttā iti utpannāracanā kṛtaḥ puruṣāt racanām karoti iti racanā kṛt tasmāt kasmāt iti āha icchā ityādi puruṣa icchayā yeṣām varṇṇānām aviruddhā siddhiḥ teṣām sthitasya kramasya virodhataḥ kāryā ityādinā vyācaṣṭe kārya kāraṇa bhūtāḥ ca te pratyayāḥ ca iti vigrahaḥ varṇṇa samutthāpaka cittāni evam ucyante tāni hi pūrva vijñāna apekṣayā kārya bhūtāni uttara vijñāna apekṣayā kāraṇa bhūtāni tebhyaḥ utpannaḥ svabhāva viśeṣa ānupūrvī iti uktam sā ca ānupūrvī puruṣasya yau vitarka vicārau tad kṛtā iti kṛtvā anasthita kramāḥ varṇṇāḥ kim idam idam vā iti vimarśa ākāraḥ vikalpaḥ vitarkkaḥ idam eva iti niścaya ākāraḥ vicāraḥ kasmāt na sthita kramā icchā ityādi icchayā aviruddhā siddhiḥ yasya kramasya saḥ icchā aviruddha siddhiḥ icchā viruddha siddhiḥ kramaḥ yeṣa ante tathā uktāḥ tad bhāvaḥ tasmāt tathā hi yathā iccham varṇṇānām kramaḥ vyavasthāpyate kim iva karma viśeṣa anukrama vat yathā karma viśeṣāṇām ākuñcana ādīnām icchā vyavasthiteḥ kramaḥ tadvat 
PVVṬ_573,1	 na hi ityādinā vaidharmyam āha deśa kālayoḥ iti deśesthitaḥ maracanā śakyate karttum na hī ti sambandhaḥ na hi hi me va tsthāne vi ndhyaḥ bhavatu me la yaḥ sthāne vindhya ādi riti evam pūrvam aṅakuraḥ bhavatu paścāt bījāt tad janakam iti puruṣa icchayā śakyate viparyāsaḥ kartu varṇṇāḥ tu śakyante yatheccham viparyāsayitum tasmāt na vyavasthita kramāḥ varṇṇāḥ tatas e vaḥ rya kāraṇa bhūte vikalpa anukrame sati varṇṇa kramasya bhāvāt asati ca vikalpa anukrame varṇṇa kramasya abhāvāt laukika vākyeṣu puṃsām varṇa kramasya ca kārya kāraṇa tā siddhiḥ puruṣaḥ kāraṇam varṇṇa anukramaḥ kāryaḥ tatas kārya kāraṇa tā siddheḥ kāraṇāt anyopi vaidikaḥ sarvaḥ varṇṇaḥ ti sarvaḥ dahanaḥ indhana pūrvakaḥ eva iti yuktiḥ tadvat 
PVVṬ_573,2	 sati ityādinā vyācaṣṭe sati indhane dāha vṛtte dahyatenena iti dāhaḥ dahanaḥ eva uktaḥ asati indhane dahanasya abhāvāt kvacid dahana indhanayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddhau satyām adṛṣṭa indhanopi yasya api dahanasya indhanam na dṛṣṭam sā api t tadā tasya dahanasya ahetoḥ deśa niyamasya kāla niyamasya ayogāt sarvatra sarvadā bhāvaḥ syāt atha niyamena eva kvacid deśa ādau bhavati iti iṣyate tadā deśa ādi niyame ca dahanasya iṣyamāṇe tasya eva deśa ādeḥ indhana tvāt kim kāraṇam dahana ityādi dahanasya upādānam kaḥ napekṣa tve deśa kāla niyama ayogāḥ tathā ayam api varṇṇa kramaḥ hetu bhūtam puruṣa prayatnam yadi na apekṣeta tadā nirālambaḥ nirāśrayaḥ puruṣa prayatna anapekṣaḥ svayam prakāśeta varṇṇa kramam uccārayāmi iti evampuruṣasya prayatnepi na śakyeta varṇṇa kramaḥ prakāśayitum kasmāt atas tpra krame puruṣasya śaktiḥ tadā kvacid śakta aviṣyamāṇāyām sarvaḥ vaidikopi varṇṇa kramaḥ tathā syāt pauruṣeyaḥ syāt kasmāt laukika vaidika varṇṇa anukramayoḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt viṣa ādi apanayana ādi lakṣaṇasya viśeṣasya laukikeṣu api dṛṣṭeḥ 
PVVṬ_574,1	 kiñca tad bhāva bhāvinaḥ puruṣaḥ dyapanayana ādinā laukika varṇṇa kramāt aviśiṣṭasya ca vaidika varṇṇa kramasya ātad kṛtau prakarṣeṇa kṛtau sarvatra iti yatra api puruṣa kṛta tvam iṣṭantatra api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ca nirākṛtaḥ syāt kasmāt anvaya ityādi tad bhāve bhāva unvayaḥ tad abhāve abhāvaḥ vyaḥ ti re kaḥ tad lakṣaṇa tvāt tasya iti kāryaḥ kārya tā na iṣyate tadā tad bhāva bhāvi tva vyatiriktam kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya lakṣaṇa antaram vācyam yat virahāt vaidikānām puruṣa prayatnena saha kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na syāt na ca anyat lakṣaṇam kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya asti 
PVVṬ_574,2^1	 atha tulyem kārya kāraṇa bhāva lakṣaṇe laukikaḥ varṇṇa kramaḥ kṛtrimaḥ iṣṭaḥ the ḥ prasajanti kim kāraṇam tatra api ghaṭa ādiṣu evam kalpanāyāḥ vaidika śabda krama vat kalpanāyāḥ sambhavāt yathā puruṣa vyāpāreṇa saḥ eva vaidikaḥ kramaḥ vyajyate iti kalpanā tathā ghaṭādayopī iti viśeṣa abhāvāt ca na hi puruṣa vyāpāra anuvidhāyi tvena ghaṭa ādeḥ sakāśāḥ stasya viśeṣaḥ iti ced āha tān ityādi tān api ghaṭa ādīn paraiḥ pūrvakaiḥ kulāla ādibhiḥ ghaṭa ādīnām racanā tasya adarśanam pūrvam eva tān dṛṣṭavā eva iti yāvat anyaḥ pāścātyopi kulāla ādiḥ karoti na anupadeśam para upadeśa pūrvikā ca yeṣām pratipattiḥ teṣām apauruṣeya tve 
PVVṬ_574,2^2	 vai dikaḥ kramaḥ karttuḥ asmaraṇāt apauruṣeyaḥ iṣṭaḥ evantarhi ghaṭāt ayopya vidita karttāraḥ ca kecid bahutara kālāt channa deśe ghaṭa ādayaḥ dṛśyante na ca teṣām karttā smaryate tasmāt tulye puruṣa vyāpāra anuvidhāne yadi apauruṣeyaḥ vaidika kramaḥ tadā sarveṣām ghaṭa ādīnām akri yathā vā karttuḥ asmaraṇāt vaidika kramasya akriyā evam keṣāṃcid kadācid ghaṭa ādīnām asmaryamāṇa karttṛkāṇām akriyā abhiniveśoḥ tu na ca evam tasmāt na ca eva iyam laukikī vaidikīca varṇṇa ānupūrvī puruṣa kṛtā iti sambandhaḥ kasmāt iti āha prasiddhā ityādi prasiddhiḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ viśeṣaṇa samāsaḥ teṣām dharmaḥ sva kāraṇa anvaya vyatireka anuvidha anantasya anatikramāt 
PVVṬ_575,1	 yatas eva pauruṣeyāḥ mantrāḥ tatas eva prākṛtebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaḥ sādhāraṇa tā viśiṣṭa tā siddhāḥ keṣām mantra ākhya krama kāriṇām puṃsām maṃtra saṃjñitam varṇṇa kramam kurvanti ye teṣām kenā masya parijñānam samīhita artha sampādan śaktiḥ prabhāvaḥ kim kāraṇam anyebhyosādhāraṇa tā iti āha anyeṣām prākṛta ādīnām puruṣāṇa antayoḥ jñāna prabhāvayoḥ abhāvataḥ 
PVVṬ_575,2	 ayam ityādinā vyācaṣṭe varṇṇa anām ayam kramaḥ viṣa nirghāta ādi samarthaḥ na anyaḥ inyevaṃvibhāgena yadi anyā upi prākṛta puruṣaḥ jānīyāt tadā tam varṇṇa kraman tathā eva vibhāgena eva pratipādyeta anutiṣṭhet na ca evam pratipadyate tasmāt ayam mantra ākhyaḥ varṇṇa anukramaḥ svabhāvataḥ yadi nāma kārya kṛt abhyupagataḥ mī mām sa kai stathā api kaścid eva puruṣaiḥ atīndriya śakti bheda yuktaḥ vijñātaḥ iti kṛtvā asti parokṣa artha darśī puruṣaḥ yaḥ mantrantat sāmarthī antad anuṣṭhānañca vetti 
PVVṬ_576,1–576,2	 yadi api satya tapaḥ prabhāvavatām samīhita artha sādhanam vacanam mantraḥ iti uktam tathā api abhyupagamya ucyate svabhāvatopi kārya kṛt mantraḥ iti kārya kṛt mantra karaṇena vā mantra phala śakti jñānena vā puruṣa atiśayaḥ iti uktam bhavati anumānāt mantrā mantra parijñānāt parokṣa darśinaḥ abhāvaḥ iti atra āha na hi ityādi ayam arthaḥ varṇṇa anukrama lakṣaṇaḥ viṣa ādi apanayane samarthaḥ ayantu varṇṇa anukramaḥ na samarthaḥ iti evam na hi śakyam liṅgāt pratyetum kim kāraṇam mantrā mantra vibhāgena asaṃkīrṇṇasya liṅga viśeṣasya asiddheḥ nanu ca varṇṇa rūpayoḥ mantrāmantrayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe phala dāna śaṃktiḥ api tat avyatirekāt pratyakṣa gṛhītā eva iti 
PVVṬ_576,3	 atas āha pratyakṣayoḥ ityādi anupadiṣṭayoḥ iti ayam mantraḥ na ayam mantraḥ iti evam akathitayoḥ aparijñānāt ayamviṣa ādi apanayane śaktaḥ ayam aśaktaḥ iti evam aniścayāt upadeśepī iti yadi nāma kenacid upadiṣṭambhavati ayam mantraḥ evaṃkārya kārī iti tathā api kathaṃcid kenacid api ākāreṇa mantrasya yaḥ svabhāva vivekaḥ tasya apratīteḥ aniścayāt upadeśasya aprāmāṇyāt anyatra kārya samvādāt mantra sādhya kārya prāptyā tu ayam mantraḥ iti niścayaḥ syāt tasya ca mantrasya sādhyasya kāryasya karaṇāt prāk iti mantra anuṣṭhāt prāk draṣṭum aśakyatvāt tad ānīntasya satvāt iti bhāvaḥ na ca aniścitasya mantrasya anuṣṭhānam sambhavati tasmāt avaśyam mī mām sa kena ati indriya artha darśī puruṣa ubhyupagantavyaḥ yaḥ mantrāmantra svabhāvam vivecayati anyathā mantra anuṣṭhānam na syāt 
PVVṬ_576,4^1	 na ca ayam mantra ākhyaḥ varṇṇa kramaḥ svabhāvataḥ viṣa ādi apanayana ādeḥ kārakaḥ kintu puruṣa samayāt kim kāraṇam kasyacid mantra anuṣṭhāyinaḥ puruṣasya āśu mantra siddheḥanyasya tad tulya mantra kriyā anuṣṭhāyinaḥ cirāt siddheḥ svatas hi phala dāne ayam kāla bhedaḥ na yujyate mantrasya kenacid utkarṣānutkarṣa ākaraṇāt anyasya puruṣasya mantrāt phala niṣpattau vrata caryā ādi apekṣaṇāt na svabhāvataḥ mantraḥ kārakaḥ vratam mantra kalpa vihitaḥ niyamaḥ tasya caraṇam anuṣṭhānam api śabdāt homa ādi parigrahaḥ svabhāvataḥ hi phala dāne kim vrata caryā ādi anuṣṭhānena apekṣitena tatotiśaya anutpatteḥ tathā ekasmāt api mantra viṣayāt japa homa ādi karmmaṇaḥ sakāśāt kayoḥ cit puruṣayoḥ tulyam vidhim anutiṣṭhatoḥ api ekasya artha darśanāt anyasya anartha darśanāt na svabhāvataḥ phalam svabhāvataḥ tu phala dāne tulya ūrtha yogaḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_576,4^2	 vahatām api iti viṣa ādi apanayanam kurvatām api mantrāṇām punar kāla antare tena eva puruṣeṇa prayuktānām kasyacid kāryasya visamvādāt akaraṇāt na hi ayam prakāraḥ vastu svabhāve yuktaḥ kim kāraṇam svabhāvasya sarvatra puruṣa ādau tulya tvāt yaḥ hi yasya svabhāvaḥ na sa kañcid apekṣya svabhāvaḥ bhavati yadā tu puruṣa kṛtāt samayāt phalam iṣyate tadā ayama doṣaḥ tathā hi puruṣaḥ tu mantra samayasya karttā sva icchā vṛttiḥ iti kṛtvā kaṃcid puruṣam anugṛhṇāti na aparam iti yuktam kena kāraṇena sattva sabhā gatā viśeṣāt mantra kriyā anuṣṭhātuḥ sattvasya mantra praṇetrā saha sabhā gatā tulya śīla ācāra ādinā ādi śabdāt upapradāna ādi parigrahaḥ tad vaśāt tad anurāgāt sevā viśeṣāt vā japa homa ādinā devatā ārādhanam sevā viśeṣaḥ tasmāt vā kañcid anugṛhṇāti puruṣam na aparam sattva sabhā gata ādi rahitam 
PVVṬ_577,1	 vrata ityādinā paramāśaṃkate niyamasya anuṣṭhānam vrata caryā vrata caryā ca vrata caryā bhraṅaśaḥ ca iti virūpa eka śeṣaḥ ādi śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate vrata caryā ādinā vrata caryā bhraṃśa ādinā ca iti arthaḥ vrata caryā ādinā dharma upacaye sati siddhiḥ iti sambandhaḥ tathā prakṛtyā svabhāvena dharma ātmanaḥ vā puṃsaḥ siddhiḥ vrata caryā bhraṅśa ādinā tu adharma upacaye sati adharma ātmanaḥ vā prākṛtyā puruṣasya asiddhiḥ iti vākya arthaḥ yojyaḥ svabhāvatopi mantrāt phala niṣpattau yathā uktena prakāreṇa siddhi asiddhi bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iti paraḥ manyate 
PVVṬ_578,1	 na ityādinā pratiṣedhati na dharma apekṣāt mantrāt phala siddhiḥ kim kāraṇam dharma viruddhānam api mantra siddhi hetūnām vratānām ḍā ki nī bha gi nī tantra ādiṣu darśanāt ḍā ki nī tantre catur bhaginī tantre ādi śabdāt caurya hetuṣu kambuki nī tantra ādiṣu darśanāt kāni punar tāni dharma viruddhāni iti āha kraurya ityādi kraurya prāṇi badhaḥ steyam cauryam dvīṃdriya samāpattiḥ maithunam hīna karma mārjāra aśuci dhūma pradāna ādi ādi śabdāt anyasya api dharma viruddhasya grahaṇam tāni kraurya ādīni bahulāni bhūyāṃsi yeṣām bratāna antāni tathā uktāni taiḥ ca tathā uktaiḥ vrataiḥ mantra siddhi viśeṣāt tathā hi ḍā ki nī tantre samaya vyavasthā yadā prāṇinam hatvā khādati tadā mantra siddhim āsādayati tathā kambu ki nī tantre steyācara ṇāt siddhiḥ uktāḥ tathā maithuna ācaraṇāt siddhi pradā kācid devatā iti bhaginī tantra antare kvacid samayaḥ 
PVVṬ_578,2–578,4	 krauryādi eva dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced āha na ca ityādi evamvidhaḥ kraurya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ dharma svabhāvaḥ iti yathāvasaram paścāt nivedayiṣyāmaḥ evantā vat adharmāt api siddhiḥ dṛṣṭā dharmāt api siddhiḥ na dṛṣṭā iti āha maitrī ityādi satvānām hita sukha cintanam mai trī śau cam dvividham bāhyam āntarañca bāhyam snāna ādi āntaram steya ādi nivṛttiḥ dāna ādinā para anugrahaḥ dharmaḥ maitrī śauca dharmāḥ pare pradānāni yeṣa ante tathā uktāḥ tathābhūtānām puruṣāṇām tad nimittam eva maitrī ādikam eva nimittam kṛtvā akasyāścid siddheḥ iti maitrī viparyayeṇa yā labhyā tasyāḥ asiddheḥ viparyayeṇa cat veṣa ādinā punar siddheḥ na dharma upacaya apekṣāt mantrāt phala siddhiḥ iti dveṣa ādi samutthitopi kraurya ādiḥ mantra vidhānena anuṣṭhitaḥ san dharmaḥ eva iti 
PVVṬ_578,5–579,1	 atas āha na ca ityādi eka rūpāt hi sādi lakṣaṇāt karmaṇaḥ sakāśāt sa tad virodhi adharma virodhī dharmaḥ yuktaḥ adharmaḥ ca iti mantra vidhānāt anyatra tatas eva hiṃsā ādeḥ sakāśāt adharmaḥ ca na yuktaḥ na hi adharma hetoḥ dharmaḥ bhavati virodhāt tathā hi yena eva dveṣa ādi āśayena mantra vidhānāt anyatra hiṃsā ādi kurvataḥ adharmaḥ bhavati tena eva āśayena mantra vidhāna anuṣṭhānepi hiṃsā ādikam kriyate iti kathantasya dharmāṅga tvam iti yadi dveṣa ādi kṛta tvāt mantra vidhānena anuṣṭhitopi krauryādiḥ adharmaḥ eva katham idānīm adharma ātmanaḥ vrata ādeḥ iti pūrva uktāt kraurya ādi lakṣaṇāt vratān ādi śabdāt anyasmāt nihīnāt aśuci dhūpa dāna ādi lakṣaṇāt dharmasya phalam iṣṭa sambhoga ādi lakṣaṇaṃkatham aśnute bhajate jāpī 
PVVṬ_579,2	 na ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī na ca etasya adharma ātmanaḥ vrata ādeḥ tat iṣṭam phalam vipākaḥ karma phalam kintu pūrva kṛtasya śubhasya karmaṇaḥ vipākaḥ kim vat iti āha brahmahatyāyāḥ ādeśaḥ tasya anuṣṭhānāt sampādanāt grāma pratilambha vat yathā kaścid kañcid puruṣam niyuṃkte māraya imam brāhmaṇam ahante grāmandāsyāmi iti sa tasya ādeśasya anuṣṭhānāt grāmam pratilabhate na ca tat brahmahatyāyāḥ phalam kintu tat brahmahatyā caraṇena ārādhitam puruṣam sahakāriṇam prāpya pūrvakam śubham eva karma tathā phalati 
PVVṬ_579,3–579,5	 adharma ātmanaḥ tarhi tasya vratasya kiṃphalam iti āha tasya tu kraurya ādi lakṣaṇasya adharma ātmanaḥ vratasya āgāmi bhaviṣyat janbha bhāvi phalam iṣṭam naraka ādi yadi śubhasya karmaṇaḥ iṣṭam phalam kintena adharma ātmanā mantra ādi prayogeṇa apekṣitena iti ced āha sa tu adharma ātmā ḍā ki nī mantra ādi prayogaḥ ādi śabdāt kraurya ādi vrata prayogaḥ tasya iṣṭa phalasya śubhasya karmaṇaḥ iṣṭam phalam yasya karmaṇaḥ iti vigrahaḥ kathañcid kenacid prakāreṇa upakārāt pācakaḥ phalasya dāyakaḥ 
PVVṬ_579,6–579,7	 katham punar kuśalasya akuśalam upakāra kambhavati iti āha citra tvāt upakāra śakteḥ sahakāri bhāvaḥ hi citraḥ kadācid kuśalasya akuśalam sahakāri akuśalasya api kuśalam yathā atyartham udāra kuśala kāriṇaḥ na naraka ādi duḥkha phalam aśubham karma kuśalam sahakāri prāpya iha eva janmani vyādhi ādi duḥkha mātram datvā kṣīyate adharma ātmakaḥ mantra ādi prayogaḥ kathaṃcid iṣṭa phalasya karmaṇaḥ upakārakaḥ iti uktam 
PVVṬ_579,8	 yatra yena prakāreṇa upakāraḥ tandarśayan= āha puruṣa viśeṣaḥ mantrasya praṇetā saeva āśrayaḥ tena vipākaḥ phala dānam saḥ eva dharmaḥ svabhāvaḥ yasya sa puruṣa āśraya vipāka dharmāḥ dharmaḥ iti puṇya viśeṣaḥ tena iti puruṣeṇa kṛtaḥ pūrva janmani sa tathā tad ārādhanena iti sa dharmaḥ tathā kraurya ādi ācaraṇāt tad ārādhanena mantra praṇetṛ puruṣa ārādhanena phalati iti 
PVVṬ_580,1–580,2	 etat eva spaṣṭayan= āha tat ityādi tena mantra praṇetrā puruṣeṇa vihitā krorya yukta vrata ādi prayogaḥ tena upakāraḥ karmaṇaḥ paripoṣaḥ tena vipākaḥ phala dānam dharmaḥ svabhāvaḥ yasya tasya evaṃdharmaṇaḥ tad phalasya iti iṣṭa phalasya karmaṇaḥ kṛta tvāt kāraṇāt tad ārādhanena phalati iti vinā api mantra praṇetrā puruveṇa tad upakārāt tasya eva yantrasya kevalasya japa ādinā vyāpāreṇa upakārān mantrāt phalam iti cetaḥ tatas ca puruṣa ārādhanena phalati iti yat uktanta da yuktam iti paraḥ manyate 
PVVṬ_580,3	 na ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī na etat evam kiṅkāraṇam puruṣa ityādi mantra praṇetuḥ puruṣasya ākāraḥ varṇṇa saṃsthāna ādiḥ svabhāvaḥ śānta rodrā ādiḥ caryā kāya vāc vyāpāra lakṣaṇā ceṣṭā teṣām ākāra ādīnām adhimokṣaḥ adhimuktiḥ tasyāḥ vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt mantrasya adhiṣṭhātā puruṣaḥ ced na asti kimarthantasya ākāra ādīn adhimucyet atha iṣyate tasya api puruṣasya upakāraka tvantadā tasya api mantra praṇetuḥ puruṣasya mantrāt phala siddhim pratyupakāraka tve aṅgī kriyamāṇe siddhaḥ puruṣa viśeṣa usādhāraṇa guṇaḥ asādhāraṇā guṇāḥ asya iti vigrahaḥ kim kāraṇam tad adhimukteḥ eva puruṣa viśeṣa ākāra svabhāva caryā adhimukteḥ eva viṣa karma ādi karaṇāt tasmāt na mantrāḥ puruṣa praṇītāḥ api tad upayoga nirapekṣāḥ puruṣa viśeṣa upayoga nirapekṣāḥ svabhāvena prakṛtyā eva phala dāḥ kintu puruṣa viśeṣa upayoga sāpekṣāḥ eva 
PVVṬ_580,4–581,1	 yadi asā dhāraṇa guṇaḥ eva puruṣaḥ mantrasya praṇetā katham prabhāva ādi viśeṣa rahitāḥ api tantra vidaḥ mantrān bhāṣante iti atas āha yepi ityādi mantra pratibaddhāni śāstrāṇi tantrāṇi tānividanti iti te tantra vidaḥ kecid adyatvepi mantrān apūrvān kāṃścana kurvate tat na teṣāṃkevalānām asāmarthyam kintu yat tantram āśritāḥ te tasya tantrasya praṇetāḥ yaḥ puruṣa atiśayaḥ tasya prabhoḥ svāminaḥ sa prabhāvaḥ sāmarthyam kasmāt tad ukta nyāya vṛttitaḥ tasmāt prabhuṇā yaḥ tebhyassamaya ādikaḥ nyāya upadiṣṭaḥ tasya anuvarttanāt prabhuḥ tuṣṭaḥ tad praṇītān api mantrān adhitiṣṭhati iti bhāvaḥ 
PVVṬ_581,2	 rathyā puruṣa ityādinā pūrva pakṣa upanyāsa pūrvakam kārikā artham vyācaṣṭe rathyā puruṣāḥ api iti sāmānya puruṣāḥ api kecana gāruḍika prabhṛtayaḥ mantra lakṣaṇa tantra jñāḥ kiñcid viṣa ādi śamana lakṣaṇam karma kurvanti na ca te viśiṣṭāḥ surā pāna ādi anuṣṭhānāt tathā anyopī iti prabhāvavat tvena abhimataḥ mantrasya praṇetā anatiśayaḥ ca syāt rathyā puruṣa vat atiśaya rahitaḥ ca syāt mantrāṇām ca karttā iti tathā ca prabhāvavān puruṣaḥ na sidhyati iti manyate 
PVVṬ_581,3–581,4	 na ityādinā pariharati na prabhāva rahitānām mantra karaṇam ye tu rathyā puruṣāḥ api mantrān kurvanti teṣām puruṣāṇām prabhāvavatā eva tantrasya praṇetrā adhiṣṭhānāt mantra karaṇa sāmarthyam etat eva darśayan= āha tad kṛtam hi ityādi tena prabhāva atiśayavatā puruṣeṇa kṛta samayam anupālayantaḥ rakṣantaḥ tad upadeśena ca iti prabhāva yukta puruṣa upadeśena cavartamānāḥ mantra kriyā samarthāḥ kutas etat 
PVVṬ_581,5	 tat ityādi tasya prabhāvataḥ yassamayaḥ yaḥ ca upadeśaḥ tatra nirapekṣāṇām puṃsām mantra racana āyāmasāmarthyāt tatra samayaḥ yasya atikramāt punar maṇḍala praveśa ādiḥ karttavyaḥ jāyate tatonyadvidhānām upadeśaḥ iti anayoḥ bhedaḥ tatra api iti rathyā puruṣa kṛteṣu api mantreṣu tad ākāra dhyānāt eva prabhāvavataḥ puṃsaḥ ca ākāra dhyāna ādeḥ eva ādi śabdāt svabhāva caryā dhyānasya parigrahaḥ tena mantrasya prayogāt pravarttanāt yatas evantasmāt tad adhiṣṭhānam eva prabhāva vat puruṣa adhiṣṭhānam eva tat tādṛśam unneyam boddhavyam yat te svayaṃkṛtaiḥ mantraiḥ karma kurvanti iti 
PVVṬ_582,1	 api ca kecid tantra jñāḥ mantram kurvanti iti abhidadhatā puruṣa atiśayaḥ eva samarthitaḥ syāt yasmāt sa upi tādṛśaḥ tantra jñaḥ mantrasya karttā prabhāvavān eva tad anyaiḥ atantra jñaiḥ puruṣaiḥ asādhāraṇa śakti tvāt iti kṛtvā yatas ca puruṣa adhiṣṭhitānām eva mantrāṇām phalam tasmāt kṛtakāḥ pauruṣeyāḥ ca phala dāḥ iti evam mantrāḥ vācyāḥ phala īpsunā mantrāt phalam icchatāḥ na nityāḥ mantrāḥ kintu kṛtakāḥ kṛtaka tvepi na phala dāne puruṣa nirapekṣāḥ iti artha dvayam ādarśayitum kṛtakāḥ pauruṣeyāḥ ca iti dvaya upādānam 
PVVṬ_582,2–582,3	 na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na hi nityānām vaidikānām mantrāṇām prayogaḥ uccāraṇaṃsambhavati anādheya atiśaya tvāt na ca aprayuktebhyaḥ mantrebhyaḥ phalam iti kṛtvā prayogāt phalam icchatā kṛtakāḥ mantrāḥ vācyāḥ pauruṣeyāḥ ca puruṣa adhiṣṭhitāḥ ca phala dāḥ vācyāḥ kim kāraṇam puruṣa adhiṣṭhānam antareṇa vinā anyataḥ bhāva śakti ādeḥ a sambhavat phalānām mantrāṇām puruṣa adhiṣṭhānāt eva phala darśanāt yathā ca na bhāva śaktyā mantrebhyaḥ phala utpattiḥ tathā pratipāditam sarvasya sādhanante syuḥ bhāva śaktiḥ yat īdṛśī tyādinā 
PVVṬ_582,4	 nidarśanam ca āha yaḥ madīyam kāvya ādi evam paṭhiṣyati tasya mayā ayam arthaḥ sampādanīyaḥ iti evaṃkṛtaḥ samayaḥ yasmin kāvya ādau ādi śabdāt śilpa sthāna ādau sa kṛta samayaḥ kāvya ādiḥ tasmin= iva tadvat yathā tatra kāvya ādi pāṭhakānām puruṣa adhiṣṭhānāt phalanta dvat mantreṣu api iti arthaḥ puṃsām atīndriya artha darśanam prati śaktiḥ na asti iti evam aśakti sādha nam asāmarthyasya sādhanam yad nāma kiñcid mī mām sa kaiḥ rucyate tat sarvam anena eva mantra kāriṇām jñāna prabhāva atiśaya sādhanena nirākṛtam 
PVVṬ_582,5–582,6	 pratipāditā hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe pratipāditāḥ hi puruṣa kṛtāḥ mantrāḥ tad adhiṣṭhānāt ca phala dāḥ mantrāḥ iti etat api pratipāditam na ca sarve puruṣāḥ mantrān karttum adhiṣṭhātum vā śaktāḥ tat iti tasmāt asti kaścid atiśayavān puruṣaḥ mantrasya karttā iti tasya atiśayavataḥ puṃsaḥ pratikṣepa sādhanāni api pratikṣiptāni etena ca para uktasya atiśaya pratikṣepa sādhanasya na viruddha avyabhicāri tvam udbhāvyate kintarhi puruṣa atiśaya pratikṣepa sādhanāni vastu bala āyātāni na santi eva iti anena vyājena kathyate na hi vastu bala āyātam puruṣa atiśayam nirākarttṛ kiṃcid sādhanam asti 
PVVṬ_583,1–583,2	 nanu ca idam asti vivakṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ na atiśayavān buddhimat tvāt indriyava tvāt vacanāt puṃstvāt rathyā puruṣa vat iti atas āha buddhīndriyā ityādi buddhiḥ ca indriyam ca uktiḥ ca puṃstvam ca iti dvandvaḥ ādi śabdāt prāṇa ādi mattva ādi puruṣa atiśaya nirākaraṇa sādhanam yat tu varṇṇyate tat sarvam pramāṇa ābham pramāṇa ābhāsam anaikāntikam iti yāvat kim kāraṇam vipakṣa vṛtteḥ sandehena sarvasya śeṣavat tvāt na hi śeṣavataḥ iti anaikāntika tvāt yathārtha iti aviparītāḥ gatiḥ anumeya pratipattiḥ asti 
PVVṬ_583,3	 yat tu ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yat tu puruṣa atiśaya pratikṣepa sādhanan tattva gamakam eva iti sambandhaḥ tat punar sādhanam buddhīndriya yogāt ityādi kasmāt agamakam iti āha pratikṣepa ityādi pratikṣepaḥ ca sāmānyam ca pratikṣepa sāmānye tayoḥ sādhanetayoḥ ayogāt tathā hi buddhimat tva ādinā sādhanena na asti puruṣa atiśayaḥ iti pratikṣepaḥ vā sādhyeta yat vā yosau puruṣa atiśayaḥ sa rathyā puruṣaiḥ samānaḥ iti itara puruṣa sāmānyam sādhyeta 
PVVṬ_583,4–583,5	 tatra na hi ityādinā pratikṣepa sādhanasya abhāvam āha na hi atīndriyeṣu artheṣu atad darśinoti indriya artha adarśinaḥ pratikṣepaḥ sambhavati kim kāraṇam satām api eṣām atīndriyāṇām arthānām arvāc darśanasya ajñānāt tasmāt na adarśana mātrāt pratikṣepaḥ iti bhāvaḥ na api viruddha vidhānāt puruṣa atiśayasya pratikṣepaḥ yasmāt atas eva atīndriya tvāt eva puruṣa atiśayasya buddhi tva ādinā hetunā dvividhasya api virodhasya asiddheḥ avirodhinā ca vaktṛ tva ādinā puruṣa atiśayasya ekatra sambhava avirodhāt iti uktam prāk 
PVVṬ_584,1	 na api ityādinā sāmānya sādhanasya abhāvam āha na api itareṇa arvāk darśinā puruṣeṇa tasya atiśayavataḥ sāmānya siddhiḥ tulya tā siddhiḥ kim kāraṇam atīndriya darśana ādi lakṣaṇasya viśeṣasya yaḥ sambhavaḥ tasya jñātum aśakyatvāt īdṛśeṣu ca para santāna varttiṣu puruṣa mātrā pratyakṣeṣu atīndriya artha darśana ādiṣu yā kācid asambhava pramādhanī anupalabdhiḥ upādīyate tasyāḥ anupalabdheḥ prāk eva hetu tva pratikṣepāt 
PVVṬ_584,2–584,3	 kim ca puṃstva ādi sāmya īpi yathāsvam saṃskārāt kasyacid prajñām eva ādeḥ atiśaya darśanāt tathā anyasya api atiśayasya sambhāvya tvāt tasmāt sambhavat viśeṣāḥ purupāsambhavat viśeṣe ca itara puruṣa sāmānya asiddheḥ iti api uktam prāk tasmāt śeṣa vat anumānam etat vaktṛ tva ādyasamartha puruṣa atiśaya asambhava pratipādanāya vipakṣa vṛtteḥ adarśanepi 
PVVṬ_584,4	 yadi nāma vipakṣe puruṣa atiśaye vaktṛ tva ādeḥ vṛttinam dṛśyate tathā api vā adhaka abhāvena vyatirekasya sandehāt asamartha api ca evaṃvādinaḥ iti na asti atīndriya artha darśī puruṣaḥ iti evaṃvādinaḥ jai mi nī yāḥ svam eva vādam iti kathacid atiśayavataḥ jai mi nyādeḥ sakāśāt veda artha gatiḥ bhavati iti puruṣa atiśaya abhyupagama vādam punar na asti atīndriya artha jñaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścid iti anayā sva vācāḥ bidhurayanti bādhante atiśaya vat puruṣa pratikṣepeṇa veda artha gateḥ asambhavāt tathā hi ayam arthaḥ asmākannāyam arthaḥ iti svayam vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ na vadanti tena agnihotra śabdānām yobhimatorthaḥ sa kalpyaḥ bhavet puruṣaiḥ rmī mām sa kaiḥ tat ca na asti yatas te hi puruṣāḥ rāga ādi saṃyutāḥ rāga ādi yuktāḥ tatas na tat kalpitaḥ arthaḥ pramāṇam 
PVVṬ_584,5–585,1	 atha tasya veda arthasya kaści jjai mi nyā di reva vetā kalpyeta tatra eka puruṣobhimataḥ tatva vid veda artha tattva jñaḥ na anyaḥ puruṣaḥ iti kiṃkṛtaḥ na atra kiñcid kāraṇam asti mī mām sa kaḥ sya puruṣa tva aviśeṣāt sarvaḥ vā vetti na vā kaścid iti bhāvaḥ atha puruṣa tva ādi sāmya īpi asādhāraṇa śakti yuktaḥ vaidikānām śabdānām atīndriyaiḥ artheḥ saha sambandhasya vetā kaścid jai mi nyādiḥ kalpyate tadā tadvat jaiminya ādi vat puṃstve puruṣa tve tulya upi katham api iti nirnimittam anyopi kaścid jñānī jñāna atiśayavān kasmāt na vaḥ na yuṣmākam abhimataḥ jai mi nyā divadanyopi jñānavān prasajyate iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_585,2	 na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe ete āgacchata bhavantaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ayam asmākam arthaḥ bhavadbhiḥ grāhyaḥ na anya iti evaṃvaidikāḥ śabdāḥ na vikrośanti na kathayanti yena tebhya ūrtha gatiḥ syāt kevalam iti avadhāraṇe anabhivyakta artha viśeṣa saṃsargāḥ eva śrutim śrotra vijñānam abhipatanti ārohanti anabhivyakta ūrtha viśeṣeṇa saha saṃsargaḥ sambandhaḥ yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ tatra ajñāta artha sambandheṣu śabdeṣu śrutim abhipatatsu ekaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam kañcid artha sva icchā anurūpam kalpayati anyopi puruṣa uparam artham kalpayati iti anirṇṇayaḥ eva padārthasya 
PVVṬ_585,3	 svābhāvikaḥ śabdānām artha sambandhaḥ tena eka artha pratiniyamaḥ bhaviṣyati iti āha na iti āha na ca kaścid śabdānām svabhāva pratiniyamaḥ svabhāvena prakṛtyā arthaiḥ saha sambandhaḥ yena aneka artha kalpanāyām api kevalam samaya vaśāt tantam artham āviśantaḥ vācya tvena upādadānāḥ dṛśyante teṣām vaidikānām śabdānām kaścid tattvam ācaṣṭe na aparaḥ iti na nyāvyam iti sambandhaḥ kīdṛśānām avidita artha niyamānām avidita urtha niyamaḥ yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ kim kāraṇam atyakṣa āveśāt atīndriyasya svarga ādi sādhanasya arthasya viṣaya tvena ātmasātkaraṇāt na hi atīndriya arthasya śabdasya artha niyama marvāk diḥ śanaḥ śaktaḥ jñātu tatra avidvān eva rāga ādi doṣa upaplutaḥ kaścid jaimi niḥ śaḥ va ra svā mī vā teṣām śabdānān tattvam ācaṣṭe asya ayam eva arthaḥ itinā aparaḥ aparopi puruṣaḥ jai mi nyādya viśiṣṭaḥ na tattvam ācaṣṭaḥ iti bheda vyavasthānam na nyāyyam ayukti tvāt 
PVVṬ_586,1–586,2	 atha kutaścid anirdeśya rūpāt buddhīndriya ādīnām ādi śabdāt abhyāsasya atiśayāt kāraṇāt saḥ eva jai mi ni prabhṛtiḥ veda artham vetti na aparaḥ prākṛtaḥ puruṣaḥ iti iṣyate tadā tasya jai mi ni prabhṛteḥ ku toyam atīndriya jñāna atiśayaḥ atīndriyasya veda artha tattvasya jñāna atiśayonyaiḥ avidita tattvaiḥ aviśiṣṭasya bhavatu vā jai mi ni prabhṛtiḥ puruṣoti indriya arthasya vettā tathā jai mi nyādi vat anyopi puruṣa atiśayaḥ bau ddhā dya bhimataḥ deśa kāla svabhāva viprakṛṣṭānām arthānām draṣṭā kim asambhavī kasmāt avidyamānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yena pratikṣipyate sopyati indriya artha darśyaḥ tu iti iṣya tām na ca id abhimata upi jai mi nyādiḥ mā bhūt yatas na hi tad pratikṣepa sādhanāni bau ddhā dyabhimata puruṣa atiśaya pratikṣepa sādhanāni puruṣa tva ādīni kānicid santi yāni na enam veda artha viveka kāriṇam jai mi ni prabhṛtim na upalīyante na viṣayīkurvanti kintu upalīyante eva teṣām api puruṣa tva ādi yogāt 
PVVṬ_586,3	 atha puruṣa tva ādi sādhana sambhavepi jaiminī ādeḥ viśeṣaḥ iṣyate tadā yathā ayam atīndriya veda artha vivecana lakṣaṇe viśeṣaḥ sya jaimini prabhṛteḥ iṣṭaḥ tad sādhana sambhavepi iti tasya atīndriya artha darśi puruṣa pratikṣepa sādhanasya puruṣātvādeḥ sambhavepi tathā anyasya api puruṣasya atīndriya artha darśanam syāt iti anabhiniveśaḥ eva bhavatām mī mām sa kā na aṃyuktaḥ 
PVVṬ_586,4–586,6	 na atīndriya artha darśī iti kṛtvā jai mi ni prabhṛteḥ veda artha jñānam iṣṭam api tu yasya vākyam pramāṇa samvādi sa puruṣaḥ veda artha vid yat i iṣyate jai mi ni prabhṛteḥ eva ca veda artha vivecanam kurvataḥ vacanam pramāṇa samvādī iti paraḥ manyate na ityā dyā cā ryaḥ na idam uttaram yuktam yasmāt nahi atyanta parokṣeṣu veda artheṣu svarga ādi sādhana tveṣu pramāṇasya asti sambhavaḥ 
PVVṬ_587,1	 syāt etat ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na vayam puruṣa prāmāṇyāḥ kasyacid jaiminī ādeḥ veda vyākhyānam abhiniviṣṭāḥ kintarhi pramāṇa samvādāt vyākhyānam abhiniviṣṭāḥ etat eva vyanakti bahuṣu api veda vyākhyātṛṣu madhye yaḥ vedasya vyākhyātāḥ yathā vyākhyāterthe pramāṇam pratyakṣa ādikam saṃsyandayati yojayati satādṛśaḥ vyākhyāta anumanyateṅgīkriyate na anyaḥ iti 
PVVṬ_587,2	 tat na ityādinā pratiṣedhati dharma adharmauvadṛṣṭam ādi śabdāt svarga ādi sādhaka tveṣu atīndriyeṣu pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa antara āvṛtteḥ na veda arthe kasyacid pramāṇa samvādi vacanam yasmāt tad asambhavāt eva hi atyanta parokṣe pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇasya asambhavāt eva hi tat prati iti arthantasya atīndriyasya prati iti artham āgamaḥ upayācyate prārthyate anyathā iti yadi āgama gamya īpi arthe pramāṇa antara samvādāt eva artha niścayaḥ tadā sati api tasmin= āgame tad gamyerthe yadi pramāṇa antarasya āvṛttiḥ syāt tadā pramāṇa antara avṛttau= āgamāt kevalāt apratipatteḥ tatas ca iti pramāṇa antarāt kevala ādi tya āgama rahita artha pratipatteḥ asādhanam eva āgamaḥ syāt pramāṇa antara bhāva abhāvābhyām eva artha pratipatteḥ bhāva abhāvāt kevalāt āgama nirapekṣāt anyatopi pratyakṣa ādeḥ pramāṇāt atīndriya irthe pratipattiḥ kintvā āgama sahitāt pratyakṣa ādeḥ ati indriya artha pratipattiḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_587,3–587,4	 katham iti si ddhā nta vā dī katham atīndriyaḥ ca nāma svarga ādi siddhi upāyaḥ pratyakṣa ādi viṣayaḥ ca virodhāt syāt matam na eva atyanta parokṣerthe pratyakṣa ādīnām sādhaka tvam kiṃntu te punar pratyakṣa ādayaḥ sva viṣayepi ātmīye viṣayepi āgamam apekṣya eva sādhakāḥ ced tathā ca āgamasya eva prāmāṇyam iti paraḥ manyate 
PVVṬ_587,5–588,2	 anāgama ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī na asmin= āgama usti iti anāgamogni ādi pratyayaḥ dhūma ādeḥ liṅgāt na syāt na ityādi paraḥ na vai āgama iti indriyeṣu artheṣu pravṛtte pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇam āgama viṣayenu iṣyate yena āyan doṣaḥ syāt tatas ca kevalāt pratipatteḥ asādhanam eva āgamaḥ syāt iti kintu sā eva āgamasya atīndriyeṣu api pravṛttiḥ na jñāyate tena āgama pravṛttiḥ pratyakṣa ādikam apekṣate iti ced 
PVVṬ_588,3–588,4	 svayam ityādi prativacanantada asya pratyakṣa ādeḥ svayam atīndriya artha prasādhane samarthasya tad āgama upadhā anantasya āgamasya upadhānam sannidhānam pratyakṣa ādeḥ kam atiśayam puṣṇātiyena āgama pravṛttim ati indriyerthe jñāpayati atha atīndriye pratyakṣa ādyasamartham tatas samarthantu pratyakṣa ādi āgama pravṛttim api na eva sādhayiṣyati yatas yathā svarga ādi sādhakam atīndriyan tathā sā ca atīndriye pratyakṣa ādinā siddhāḥ na eva siddhāḥ yena tad artham pratyakṣādiḥ anviṣyate iti yat kiñcid etat 
PVVṬ_588,5	 bahuṣu api vyākhyātṛṣu yaḥ pramāṇam pratyakṣa ādikam saṃsyandayati tasya bhāṣitam gṛhyate iti bruvataḥ pauruṣeya tvāt āgama lakṣaṇāt anyaḥ ca evam āgama lakṣaṇam syāt etat eva āha tathā hi ityādi yasya puruṣasya vacanam pramāṇa samvādi tad kṛtantena puruṣeṇa saṃskṛtaṃvacaḥ āgamaḥ iti prāptam vacanasya ca saṃskāraḥ tad arthasya pramāṇa anugṛhīta tva khyāpanam idantat anyat āgama lakṣaṇam tathā ca nirarthāḥ vyarthā apauruṣeya tā āgama lakṣaṇa tvena iṣṭā 
PVVṬ_588,6	 tulya ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yaḥ ca pramāṇa samvādi vacanena puruṣeṇa arthaḥ kalpitaḥ yaḥ ca itareṇa tayoḥ arthayoḥ tulya īpya pauruṣeya tva āgama vāde sati pramāṇa balāt āgamasya apauruṣeyasya api kvacid arthe pramāṇa samvādinya āgama tva iṣyamāṇe agnihotra ādi vākyānāṃpramāṇa samvādaḥ āgama lakṣaṇam syāt na apuruṣa kriyā apauruṣeya tvam āgama lakṣaṇam na syāt kiṅkāraṇam tasyāḥ apuruṣa kriyāyāḥ abhimatā anabhimateṣu puruṣa upadiṣṭeṣu sarva artheṣu tulya tvepi pramāṇena ābādhanāt pratipatteḥ iṣṭa tvāt 
PVVṬ_589,1–589,2	 etat uktam bhavati pramāṇa samvādi tvena āgama artha pratipatteḥ iṣṭa tvāt iti arthaḥ tad bhāvepya pauruṣeya tva bhāvepi tulyeni atra apramāṇa samvādinī arthe pratipatteḥ aniṣṭha tvāt pramāṇa samvādaḥ vacanānām āgama lakṣaṇam syāt yadi ca atyanta parokṣerthe anāgama jñāna sambhavaḥ āgama nirapekṣasya jñānasya sambhavaḥ tadā atīndriya artha vid kaścid asti iti svam abhimatam bhavet 
PVVṬ_589,3–589,5	 yadi puruṣasya jai mi nyā derveda artham ākhyātuḥ parokṣerthe svarggādi sādhana upāye āgama anapekṣam jñāna yāthātathyam jñānasya avaiparītyam iṣyate tadā jai mi nyādi vat anyepi puruṣāḥ saṃtyati indriya artha dṛśaḥ iti iṣṭam syāt syāt etat na ati indriyam artham pratyakṣataḥ jānāti api tu anumānena jñātvā upadiśati iti tat na yatas pratyakṣa pūrvakāṇām anumāna ādīnām asambhavāt kadā atat darśan etena pratyakṣeṇa atīndriyasya adarśane pratyakṣa ityādina etat eva spaṣṭayati teṣu atīndriyeṣu artheṣu pratyakṣa āvṛtteḥ kāraṇāt pratyakṣa pūrvakāṇām pramāṇa antarāṇām asambhavāt 
PVVṬ_589,6	 atadālambanam pratīyate iti tasya pratyakṣa ādeḥ ālambanam viṣayaḥ na tad ālambanam atad ālambanam pratyakṣa ādi aviṣayantasya pratīyate niścaya artham āgamonviṣyate iti adhyāhāraḥ pramāṇa antarasya tu anumāna ādeḥ atīndriya irthe vṛttiḥ pratyakṣam atīndriya viṣayam anvākarṣati sādhayati pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt anumāna ādeḥ iti hetoḥ puruṣa atiśaya uti indriyāṇām arthānām draṣṭā mī mām sa kaiḥ rani vāryaḥ syāt nivāritaḥ ca tasmāt na asti atīndriya irthe pramāṇa antara vṛttiḥ 
PVVṬ_589,7	 atas eva iti pramāṇa antara āvṛtteḥ eva āgamasya vedasya atīndriye svarga ādi sādhana tva lakṣaṇertha viśeṣe yā vṛttiḥ tasyāḥ aniścayāt ayam jai mi ni ranyaḥ vā śa ba ra svāmi ādiḥ puruṣaḥ svayam iti para upadeśa nirapekṣaḥ vedasya artham na vetti rāgāt imānyatas rāga ādimat tvam aparijñāna kāraṇam anyatopi na vetti vedasya arthantasya api asya puruṣasya rāga ādimattvāt veda upi svayam artham na vedayati na prakāśayati tena veda arthasya kutas gatiḥ na eva gatiḥ asti yasmāt sarve eva hi puruṣaḥ natikrāntaḥ rāga ādi doṣa kṛtaḥ viplavaḥ bhrāntiḥ yasya iti vigrahaḥ tam iti vedasya atīndriya artha pratiniyama mayam eva asya arthaḥ na ayam iti evam na vetti svayam na api enam rāga ādi mantam puruṣam anyaḥpuruṣaḥ vedayati tasya api anyasya tulya prasaṃgataḥ rāga ādimattvena tasya api ajña tvāt iti arthaḥ yatas na hi andhena svayam amārga jñena ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ andhaḥ panthānam pratipadyate na api svayam upadeśa nirapekṣaḥ vedaḥ sva artham prakāśayati kutas upadeśa vaiyarthya prasaṃgāt jai minyā di vyākhyānasya niṣphala tva prasaṃgāt 
PVVṬ_590,1	 tat tasmāt ayam aparijñāta arthaḥ veda ākhyaḥ śabda gaḍuḥ ghāṭāmastakayoḥ madhye māṃsa piṇḍaḥ gaḍuḥ ucyate niṣphala tvāt tadvat vaidikopi śabdaḥ aparijñāta artha tvena niṣphala tvāt gaḍuḥ iva gaḍuḥ evam iti kim asya ayam arthotha vāyam iti saṃśayāt tad abhiprasannasya śalya bhūtaḥ duḥkha hetuḥ atas tam aṃgīkṛtavedampuruṣam duḥkham āsādayati sthāpayati kīdṛśaḥ asat darśanam eva snāyuḥ śirāḥ tena upanibaddhaḥ tatas eva kenacid kāruṇikena api apanetum icchatā duruddharaḥ iti upahasati 
PVVṬ_590,2–591,1	 tena iti aparijñāta artha tvena agni hotrañju huyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti śrutau veda vākye khādet śva māṃsam iti eṣa na arthaḥ kintu anyobhimatorthaḥ iti atra kā pramā na eva kiñcid pramāṇam kvacid ityādinā vyācaṣṭe agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ ityādi vākyasya kvacid api vācya tvena abhimaterthe pratyāsatti rahitasya anabhimaterthe viprakarṣa rahitasya vāstavasya sambandhasya nirākaraṇāt ubhaya abhāvaḥ bhūta viśeṣa ignau yathā abhimatam iti mantra ādi pūtam ghṛta ādi prakṣipet iti ayam arthaḥ na punar śva māṃsam khādet iti ayam arthaḥ iti na atiśayampa śyāmaḥ 
PVVṬ_591,2	 nanu ayam yathā uktaḥ sarvatra pauruṣeyepi āgame samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ tam eva darśayan= āha parokṣaḥ daiśikaḥ vaktā yeṣām vacanānām āgamāna antāni tathā uktāni teṣām arthaṃyatha abhiprāyam iti yathā daiśika abhimataḥ idānīntanāḥ adṛṣṭa daiśikāḥ puruṣāḥ samanuyanti avagacchantyā ahosvit viparyayan daiśika abhiprāya viparītam iti niyama abhāvāt sarvatra saṃśayaḥ iti manyate 
PVVṬ_591,3	 na ityādinā pariharati na ayam sarvatra prasaṃgaḥ upadeṣṭuḥ āgamasya praṇetuḥ abhiprāya prakāśanena iti prathamam prakāśa yata anena sva abhiprāyaḥ tad kāla sannihitebhyaḥ śrotṛbhyaḥ kathitosya vacanasya ayam arthaḥ iti tepi śrotāronyebhyaḥ prakāśayanti tepi anyebhyaḥ iti ācārya upadeśe pāramparyasya sambhavāt na hi ayam abhiprāya kathana lakṣaṇaḥ vaidikānāṃ śabdānāma daiśikānām iti apauruṣeyāṇām sambhavati daiśikasya abhāvāt 
PVVṬ_591,4	 itas ca pauruṣeyeṣu yathā prasiddha artha sambhavaḥ yasmāt āgamasya praṇetā lokaḥ mayā bodhanīyaḥ iti loka pratyāya na abhiprāyaḥ ca bruvāṇaḥ loke yasmin= arthe śabdasya saṃketaḥ tasya prasiddhim anupālayati rakṣati anyathā viphalantasya prakāśanam syāt tata upiloka prasiddha saṃketa anupālanāt api tad artha siddhiḥ syāt puruṣa praṇītasya āgamasya artha siddhiḥ syāt api śabdāt pūrva uktāt ca sampradāya sambhavāt na apauruṣeyāṇām śabdānām yathā uktena prakāreṇa artha siddhiḥ kim kāraṇam tatra vaidikeṣu śabdeṣu kasyacid puṃsaḥ samīha abhāvāt vacana hetoḥ vivakṣāyāḥ abhāvāt evantā vat saṃpradāya ādi sambhavena pauruṣeyasya āgamasya artha parijñāna sambhavāt tulya prasaṃgatā na asti iti uktam 
PVVṬ_592,1	 adhunā nyāya anusāreṇa eva pauruṣeyāṇām artha niścayaḥ bhavati iti āha api ca ityādi nyāyam eva yuktim eva anupālayantaḥ paṇḍitāḥ prekṣā pūrva kāriṇaḥ bau ddhā heya ādiṣu saṃghaṭante heyasya sa āśrayasya tyāgāya upādeyasya sa āśrayasya upādānāya pravarttante tatra heyam duḥkham upādeyaḥ mokṣaḥ tayoḥ āśrayaḥ yathāsaṃkhyam karma kleśāḥ tattva jñānañca 
PVVṬ_592,2–592,3	 etat uktam bhavati aneka artha tva sambhavepi śabdānām yukti yuktam puruṣa artha upayoginam eva āgama arthat niścinvanti sau ga tāḥ na para upadeśa mātreṇa tatas yam a doṣaḥ iti tat eva āha na pravāda mātreṇa iti na bṛddhānām pravāda mātreṇa iti na samānaḥ prasaṃgaḥ tat ca nyāya anupālana pūrvakam eva āgame pravarttanam yathā avasaram pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ paścāt 
PVVṬ_592,4–592,6	 yadi nyāya anupālanena āgama artha niścayaḥ atyanta parokṣe tarhi āgama arthe niścayaḥ na syāt iti āha nanu ityādi loka sanniveśa ādiḥ iti bhājana lokasya pṛthivī ādeḥ sanniveśa ādiḥ yathā uktam tatra bhājana lokasya sanniveśam uśanti adhas lakṣa ṣoḍaśaka udbedham asaṃkhyam vāyu maṇḍalam ityādi ādi śabdāt dāna hiṃsā ādi cetanānām iṣṭa aniṣṭa phala dāna ādi 
PVVṬ_592,7	 deśa svabhāva ādi viprakṛṣṭa tvāt ayukti viṣaya upyarthaḥ pratipadyate bhavadbhiḥ bauddhaiḥ kutas sambhavanīya puruṣa vacanāt yasya pratyakṣa anumāna gamyerthe vacanam avisamvādi tasya tṛtīya sthāne vacanam satya artha tvena sambhāvyate tasmāt sambhāvanīyāt puruṣa vacanāt arthaḥ pratipadyate tathā ca na nyāya anupālana pūrvikā agama arthe pravṛttiḥ iti samānaḥ eva prasaṃgaḥ iti manyate 
PVVṬ_592,8	 na ityādinā pariharati na atyanta parokṣa ūrthaḥ puruṣa vacanāt pratipadyate kim kāraṇam apratyayāt tad viṣaya pramāṇa abhāvena aniścayāt pratyakṣa ādi viṣaye samvāda antaparokṣepi samvādaḥ niścīyate iti api mithyā yatas na hi kvacid pratyakṣa ādi viṣaye pramāṇa samvādāt askhalitaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti kṛtvā sarvantat upadiṣṭam ayukti gamyam api tathā bhavati kim kāraṇam tad pravṛtteḥ ityādi tasya puruṣa atiśayasya vacana pravṛtteḥ avisamvādena vyāptyā siddheḥ viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt nanu bhavatā api 
PVVṬ_593,1–593,2	 pratyakṣeṇa anumānena dvividhena api abādhanam iti ādinā eka deśa avisamvādanam āgama lakṣaṇam iṣṭam iti atas āha agatyā ca ityādi pramāṇa gamya artha avisamvādena atyanta parokṣepya visamva ādi vacanam iti idam āgama lakṣaṇam agatya iṣṭam āgamāt pravṛttau varam evam pravṛttaḥ iti na atas yathā uktāt āgamāt atīndriya artha niścayaḥ tasya aprāmāṇyāt tat iti tasmāt na pramāṇam āgamaḥ iti uktam prāk 
PVVṬ_593,3	 tat evam apauruṣeyāṇām śabdānām artha jñānan= ācārya saṃpradāyāt daiśikasya abhāvāt na yukteḥ sakāśāt atyanta parokṣerthe pramāṇa apravṛtteḥ na api lokāt artha pratītiḥ loka pratyāyanāya prayoga abhāvena loka saṃketa anusaraṇa ayogāt iti tatra apauruṣeyeṣu śabdeṣu arthānām apratipattiḥ eva nyāyyāḥ tatra api vaidike śabde prasiddhaḥ loka vādaḥ yathā gni ādi śabdāt dāha pāka ādi samartherthe pravarttante ityādi 
PVVṬ_593,4–593,5	 yaḥ loka vyavahārassa ced veda artha pratipatti hetuḥ uttaram āha tatra ityādi tatra loke avidyā tve kaḥ puruṣoti indriya artha dṛś yena atīndriya artha dṛśā aneka artheṣu śabdeṣu eka artha pratiniyama abhāvāt āśaṃkyamāna artha viśeṣeṣu vaidikeṣu arthoyam ati indriyaḥ vivecitaḥ vibhaj toyam eva asya arthaḥ na ayam iti na eva tādṛśaḥ kaścid asti 
PVVṬ_593,6	 na hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na hi ayam loka vyavahāra upauruṣeyāt akṛtakāccha bhavati kintarhi abhiprāya kathana lakṣaṇāt samayāt kim iva sva śāstra kāra ityādi sva śāstra kārāṇām pā ṇi ni prabhṛtīnām samayāt saṃketāt tad samaya anusāriṇām pā ṇi nī yā dīnām vṛddhi guṇa saṃjñā ādi vya vahāra vat kim kāraṇam upadeśa apekṣaṇāt 
PVVṬ_594,1	 yadi hi laukikopi vyavahāraḥ nisarga siddhaḥ syāt tadā para upadeśat nāpekṣeta na ca yathā sāmayikāt sambandhāt upadeśa apekṣāt artha pratītiḥ tathā apauruṣeyāt api sambandhāt upadeśa apekṣāt eva veda artha pratītiḥ yatas na hi apauruṣeye tasmin vaidike śabda artha sambandhe para upadeśaḥ yuktaḥ kiṅkāraṇam tasya veda arthasya kenacid api puruṣeṇa ājñā nāt ajñānām ca veda arthasya atīndriya tvāt tat uktam 
PVVṬ_594,2–594,3	 śreyaḥ sādhana tā hi eṣān nityam vedāt pratīyate tādrūpyeṇa ca dharmatvantasmāt na indriya gocaraḥ ślaḥ caḥ śreyaḥ hi puruṣa prītiḥ sā dravya guṇa karmabhiḥ codanā lakṣaṇaiḥ sādhyā tasmāt teṣu eva dharma tā iti ślaḥ caḥ aindriyaka tve tu veda arthasya abhyupagamyamāne svayam upadeśam antareṇa veda arthasya prati iti yathā rūpa ādīnām aindriyaka tvāt upadeśam antareṇa pratītiḥ tadvat 
PVVṬ_594,4–594,5	 atha atīndriyepi veda arthe niścaya arthamu padeśaḥ abhyupagamyate tadā upadeśe ca veda artha upadeṣṭṝṇām puṃsām svatantrāṇām iti rāga ādi abhibhavena samyak jñāna abhāvāt yathā iccham pravṛttānām yathātattvam upadeśena avisamvādasya asiddheḥ anāśvāsaḥ na niścayaḥ veda arthe na hi ajñā yathātattvam upadeṣṭum samarthāḥ iti na puruṣāḥ sva icchayā upadiśanti kintu veda vat veda vyākhyānam api apauruṣeyam upadeśa paramparā āyāta lakṣaṇāt saṃpradāya āvicchedāt āgatam tatas yathā uktāt veda vyākhyānāt veda artha siddhiḥ iti ced 
PVVṬ_594,6	 uttaram āha tasya api ityādi tasya api veda vyākhyānasya śabda ātmaka tve śabda svabhāva tve vedena tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ katham asya apauruṣeyasya veda vyākhyānasya arthaḥ viditaḥ iti kutosmāt veda artha niścayaḥ pauruṣeye tu āgame na āyan doṣaḥ yatas puruṣaḥ hi saṃketitānām śabdānām artham śṛṅga grāhikāya api iti asya śabdasya ayam artha iti anena tāvat abudham ajñam puruṣam bodhayet iti asti pauruṣeyāṇām śabdānām artha gatau= artha jñāne upāyaḥ na apauruṣeyāṇām tathā hi apauruṣeyaḥ tu śabdaḥ na evam karoti yathā ayam mama arthaḥ rāga ādimatā grāhyaḥ iti na ca asya apauruṣeyasya śabdasya kaści jjai minyādiḥ rāga ādimān kvacid atīndriya irthe sambandha niyamam jñātum īśaḥ śaktaḥ iti apratipattiḥ eva tad arthasya veda arthasya 
PVVṬ_595,1	 api ca bhavatu nāma apauruṣeyaḥ vedaḥ tad vyākhyānañca tathā api rāga ādi matā puruṣeṇa puruṣāya upadiśyamānam anaṣṭa saṃpradāyam eva adya tva ipi anuvarttate iti pramāṇa abhāvāt samayaḥ śapatha ādiḥ śaraṇam āgama bhraṃśa kāriṇām ityādinā saṃpradāya vicchedena racanā antara sambhavam eva samarthayate āgama bhraṃśa kāriṇām puṃsām anyathā pūrva racanā vaiparītyena racanā darśanāt iti sambandhaḥ anyathā racanāyām kāraṇam āha āhopuruṣikayā ityādi āhopuruṣikayā iti ahaṃmāni tvena yathā sām khya nāśakamāḥ dha ve na sāṃkhya siddhāntasya anyathā racanam kṛtam tad darśana vidveṣeṇa vā anyathā racanā sambhavāt yathā me hā yā na vidviṣṭānām mahāyāna pratirūpaka sūtra antara racanam tad pratipanna khalīkaraṇāya iti tasmin darśane yaḥ pratipannaḥ puruṣaḥ tasya khalīkārāyāni athā racanā sambhavaḥ tad pratipanna khalīkāraḥ eva katham dhūrta vyasanena vyasanam idandhūrttānām yat paraḥ khalīkartavyaḥ iti anyatas vā kutaścid lābha ādikāt 
PVVṬ_595,2–595,3	 api ca atra veda artha nirṇṇaye bhavān ve da vā dī sva vāda anurāgāt kāraṇāt svam eva mukha varṇṇam mukham varṇṇayati śobhayati iti mukha varṇṇaḥ sva abhyupagamastam nūnam vismṛtavān yena rāga ādi malinebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaḥ veda artha nirṇṇayaḥ prārthyate puruṣaḥ ityādinā mukha varṇṇam ācaṣṭe yasmāt puruṣaḥ rāga ādibhiḥ upaplutaḥ viparyastaḥ anṛtam api brūyāt iti kṛtvā na asya puruṣasya vacanampramāṇam iti tad anṛta vādi tvam iha api veda artha sampradāya anukrame jai mi nyādinā puruṣeṇa kriyamāṇekin na pratyavekṣate sambhavati na vā iti yasmāt saḥ eva puruṣaḥ rāga ādimān jai mi niprabhṛtiḥ vedam veda artham vā upadiśan rāga ādi upaplavāt kāraṇāt anyathā api upadiśet iti mithyā artha āśaṃkā na eva nivāryate 
PVVṬ_596,1	 āśaṃkā kāraṇāni eva darśayan= āha śrūyante hi ityādi kaiścid puruṣaiḥ yāḥ jña vaḥ lkya prabhṛtibhiḥ utsanna uddhṛtāni utsannāni antaritāni santi vedasya śākhā antarāṇi uddhṛtāni smṛtvā smṛtvā punar āracitāni tāni ca yathātattvam smṛtvā uddhṛtāni iti kim atra pramāṇam idānīm api kānicid ā huḥ ra kaḥ prabhṛtīni śākhā antarāṇi virala adhyetṛkāṇi su alpa adhyetṛkāṇi dṛśyante te katipaya adhyetāraḥ na samāropya upadiśanti iti kim atra pramāṇam yathā virala adhyetṛkāṇi śākhā antarāṇi dṛśyante tadvat pracura adhyetṛkāṇām api bahutara adhyetṛkāṇām api śākhā antarāṇām kasmiṃścid iti atikrānte kāle saṃsāra sambhavāt alpa adhyetṛka tva sambhāvanā sambhavāt teṣām prāk api pracura adhyetṛka tve pramāṇa abhāvāt idānīntarhi katham pracura adhyetṛkāṇi tāni iti atas āha punar ityādi punar kāla antareṇa āpta tvena sambhāvitasya puruṣasya pratyayāt prāmāṇyāt tad anyā sambhāvita puruṣa adhyayana vaiparītyena saṃhṛtānām adhyetṝṇām pracuratā upagamanasya bāhulya upagamanasya yā sambhāvana ātasyāḥ sambhavāt aniścayaḥ 
PVVṬ_596,2	 kiñca ye te puruṣāḥ viralībhūtāḥ śākhā antarāṇām pratānayitāraḥ teṣām pratānayitṝṇām anyathā upadeśa sambhavāt iti sambandhaḥ tathā ca anāśvāsaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ kīdṛśānām pratānayitṝṇām kadācid adhīta vismṛta adhyayanānām adhītam sat vismṛtam adhyayanam yaiḥ te tathā uktāḥ yathā adhītam vismṛtāssantaḥ te anyathā api pratānayeyuḥ iti arthaḥ kena kāraṇena iti āha anyeṣa an tad abhiprasannānām adhyetṝṇān tasmin= adhyāpayitari yā mahatva sambhāvanāḥ tasyāḥ bhraṃśa bhayāt yadi aham anyathā api na upadiśeyam nūnam ete mayi āpta sambhāvanām jahati iti ādi śabdāt āhopuruṣa ādikāt anyathā upadeśa sambhavaḥ 
PVVṬ_597,1	 pratānayantu nāma te anyathā tathā api adhyetāraḥ na tathā pratipadyeran= ityāha tat ityādi tasya sambhāvitasya puruṣasya pratyayāt ca tad uktānām sambhāvita praṇetṛ puruṣa abhiprasannānām avicāreṇa veda adhyayana pratipatteḥ anyathā saṃpradāya sambhavaḥ puruṣa prāmāṇyāt pravṛttim eva sādhayan= āha bahuṣu api adhyetṛṣu madhye sambhāvitāt puruṣāt bahulam loke pravṛtti darśanāt 
PVVṬ_597,2–597,4	 nanu sambhāvitāt pratipattau samvādaḥ eva iti atas āha tata upi sambhāvitāt puruṣāt kathañcid kenacid kāraṇena sambhāvanā bhraṃśa bhaya ādinā vipralambhasya visamvādasya sambhavāt upacaya hetum āha kiṃca ityādi parimitāḥ ca te vyākhyātṛ puruṣāḥ ca teṣa aṃparamparām eva atra veda vyākhyāne bhavatām mī mām sa kā nām śrṛṇumaḥ tatra teṣu madhye kaścid vedasya vyākhyātāḥ dviṣṭa ādīnām anyatamaḥ syāt kaścid veda darśane vidviṣṭaḥ sonyathā api upadiśet tathā kaścid ajñaḥ dhūrttaḥ vā tathā ca veda vyākhyāyām anāśvāsaḥ yatas evantasmāt na apauruṣeyāt veda vyākhyānāt veda artha siddhiḥ na api sāmayikāt sāṃketikāt loka vyavahārāt veda artha siddhiḥ lokasya rāga ādi upapluta tvāt 
PVVṬ_597,5	 bhavantu vā nisarga siddhāḥ vaidikāḥ śabda āssamaya nirapekṣāḥ evam api asāmayika tvebhyupagamyamāne vyavahāre nānā arthānām gavā ādi śabdānān darśanāt sarvatra vaidikepi śabde na tadā aśaṃkā anivṛtteḥ iti sambandhaḥ nānā artha aśaṃkāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ iti arthaḥ laukikānām eva nānā artha tvat na vaidikānām iti ced āha kasyacid ityādi tasya api vaidikasya kasyacid a prasiddhārthasya iti yatra śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ na arthaḥ tasya aprasiddhasya vā svarūpeṇa śabdasya punar vyutpatti pradarśanena arthaḥ kalpanīyaḥ puruṣaiḥ tathā ca sati punar kim yathā sthitam eva artham puruṣaḥ vaidikānām śabdānām upadiśati kim vāviparītam iti sarvatra nānā arthā śaṅkāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ 
PVVṬ_597,6	 aniṣṭerthe prayuktāḥ api vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ na tatra pratītim janayanti iti api ayuktam yatas sarveṣām śabdānām laukikānām vaidikānām ca yathārthat niyoga īpi vīpsāyām avyayībhāvaḥ yasmin yasmin= arthe niyoga ssaṃketaḥ tasmin sati api avaiguṇyena tatra tatra arthe yathāsamayam yathā saṃketam pratīti jananāt na ca aniṣṭenyathā pratīti jananam yataiṣṭa aniṣṭayoḥ arthayoḥ pratyāsatti vipra karṣa abhāvena pratīta jananasya aviśeṣāt tatas ca aviśiṣṭānām sarva artheṣu vaidikānām śabdānām ekam artham kim viśiṣṭam atyakṣa saṃyogam śabdena saha sambandhaḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ anatyakṣa darśini arvāk darśini puruṣa sāmānye kaḥ vivecayet na eva kaścid vivecayet yatas lokāt pratītiḥ syāt 
PVVṬ_598,1	 api ca ayam mī mām sa kaḥ svayam api na sarvatra vede prasiddhim anusarati yena prasiddhāt loka pravādāt veda artha gatiḥ syāt kim kāraṇam yasmāt svarga uḥ vaśya ādi śabdaḥ ca svarga śabdaḥ urvarśī śabdaḥ ādi śabdāt na nda na va nā di śabdaḥ ca ārūḍha arthasya aprasiddhārthasya vācakaḥ anena veda vādinā nirvarṇṇyamānaḥ vyākhyāyamānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tathā hi prākṛta puruṣa atiśāyinaḥ ye puruṣam viśeṣāḥ teṣām niketaḥ sthānam mānuṣa atikrāntam sukham atimānuṣam tasya ati mānuṣasya sukhasya adhiṣṭhānam āśrayaḥ nānā prakārāṇi upakaraṇāni upabhoga vastūni yasmin sa nānā upakaraṇaḥ svargaḥ iti loka pravādaḥ tad nivāsinī svarga nivāsinī apsarā urvarśī nāma iti loka pravādaḥ tam loka pravādam anādṛtya manuṣyeṣu eva niratiśayā prītiḥ svargaḥ urvaśī ca araṇiḥ pātrī vā ityādinā loka prasiddhāt arthāt anyām eva aṃrtha kalpanāmayam jai mi nyādiḥ kurvāṇa ugnihotra ādi śabda antareṣu artha nirṇṇaye katham prasiddhim pramāṇayet na eva pramāṇayet iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_598,2–599,1	 tatra agnihotra ādi śabdeṣu loka prasiddha artha kalpanāyāḥ avirodhāt pratītasya eva arthasya abhyupagamaḥ iti ced svarga urvaśya ādi śabdeṣu tu prasiddha artha abhyupagame pramāṇa viraḥ dhādana bhyupagamaḥ iti paraḥ manyate na ityādinā si ddhā nta vā dī bhedam anantara uktam yujyate yasmāt atra api svarga urvaśya ādi śabdeṣu loka prasiddhā iti indriyā irthebhyupagamyamāne pramāṇena virodha asiddheḥna hi atra pratyakṣam anumānam vā bādhakam pramāṇam asti anyatra api iti agni hotra ādi śabdeṣu api loka prasiddha artha kalpanāyām avirodhasya duranvaya tvāt sādhaka pramāṇa abhāvena durbodha tvāt 
PVVṬ_599,2	 etat eva sādhayan= āha viruddhām api yathāprasiddhām agnihotrāt svarga avāpti māndyāt ayam jai mi nyā dirna lakṣayet api kadācid iti saṃśayaḥ kim ca virodha avirodhau ca na anyau= eva kintarhi bādhaka sādhaka pramāṇa vṛttī yathā uktasya anupalambha ākhyasya bādhakasya pramāṇasya vṛttiḥ virodhaḥ sādhakasya pratyaya anumānasya pramāṇasya vṛttiḥ avirodhaḥ te ca virodha virodha svabhāve bādhaka sādhaka pramāṇa vṛttī atyakṣe atīndriye vastuni na abhimate na hi deśa ādi viprakṛṣṭeṣu svarga ādi sādhaneṣu bādhakam sādhakam ca pramāṇam pravarttate yadā ca evantat katham na eva tadvaśāt iti virodha avirodha vaśāt virodha vaśāt svarga ādi śabdeṣu prasiddha artha pratītiḥ avirodha vaśāt ca agnihotra ādi śabdeṣu prasiddha artha pratītiḥ 
PVVṬ_599,3–599,4	 atha matam na sādhaka pramāṇa vṛttiḥ avirodha uti indriyerthe kim tu āgama saṃjñitasya agni hotra ādi vacanasya loka prasiddha artha vācaka tvena pravṛttiḥ eva avirodhaḥ iti atas āha na ca ityādi loka prasiddha artha vācaka tvena agnihotra ādi vacanasya pravṛttiḥ eva avirodhaḥ na ca kim kāraṇam anyatra api svarga urvaśya ādi śabdeṣu api svarga ādi vācaka tvena pravṛtteḥ avirodha prasaṅgāt tathā hi svarga urvaśya ādi śabdāḥ sthāna apsaraḥ viśeṣa ādiṣu eva pravṛttāḥ loke dṛśyante tatas ca aviśeṣāt ubhayatra prasiddha artha parigrahoḥ tu na ca ekatra api 
PVVṬ_599,5–599,6	 kim ca apauruṣeyaḥ veda ākhyaḥ āgamaḥ sa ca svam artham svayam na prakāśayati kintu tasya āgamasya loka pravādāt artha siddhiḥ abhyupagamyate tatra punar loka prasiddhi aṅagīkaraṇepi virodha cintāyām kriyamāṇāyām sarvatra āgame anāśvāsaḥ syāt atīndriye virodha avirodhayoḥ niścetum aśakyatvāt anāśvāsam eva sādhayan= āha sati api ityādi sati api tasmin= apauruṣeyaḥ āgame svarga ādi śabda vācyasya svarga ādi arthasya ātathā abhāvāt tathā abhāvaḥ tathā tvam yathā lokeprasiddha svarga artha grahaṇam atathā bhāvāt aprasiddha artha grahaṇāt anyasya api agni hotra ādi śabdasya śaṃkanīya tvāt kim asya loka prasiddhaḥ eva arthaḥ kim vā svarga ādi śabda vat anyaḥ eva iti etat eva kutas pramāṇa vṛtteḥ na hi atra loka prasiddha artha grahaṇe pramāṇam pravarttate iti 
PVVṬ_600,1–600,2	 yat uktam ityādi paraḥ yat uktam agnihotram juhuyāt iti atra vākyeśva māṃsa bhakṣaṇasya codana abhidhā anantasya vikalpaḥ kalpanā bhavatu iti sa doṣaḥ na bhavati kim kāraṇam vedasya eva pradeśa antare tathā iti bhūta viśeṣe ghṛta ādikam prakṣipet iti evam asya agnihotra ādi vākya asya artha carccanāt vyākhyānāt na ityādi si ddhā nta vā dī na idam uttaram yujyate tasya pradeśa antara sthasya vyākhyā bhūtasya vākyasya artha aparijñānāt tatas ca pradeśa antereṣu api vyākhyā bhūta iṣu tathā artha kalpanāyāḥ iti śva māṃsa bhakṣaṇa kalpanāyāḥ anivārya tvāt 
PVVṬ_600,3–600,4	 yadi iti ādyasya eva samarthanam yadi hi ayam apauruṣeyaḥ veda ākhyaḥ śabdarāśiḥ kvacid pradeśa antare vidita arthaḥ syāt tadā tatas vidita arthāt pradeśa antarāt pariśiṣṭasya artha pratītiḥ syāt yāvatā te tu vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ bāhulyepya parijñāna artha tvāt andhāeva sarve iti kṛtvā puruṣeṇa yatheṣṭam praṇīyante vyākhyāyante yatas evantasmāt śabda antareṣu tādṛkṣu iti agnihotram juhuyāt ityādi vākyānām vyākhyā bhūteṣu tādṛśyeva astu kalpanā kīdṛśī iti āha yādṛśi agni hotrañjuhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti asya kalpanā kṛtā pradeśa antarepi śva māṃsa bhakṣaṇa kalpanā aḥ tu iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_600,5	 api ca prasiddhiḥ ca na anyat eva kiṃcid kintarhi nṛṇām puruṣāṇām vādaḥ vādaḥ pramāṇan= eṣyate bhavatā sarva puruṣāṇām rāga ādi upapluta tvāt bhūya eti punar tatas ca loka pravādāt apramāṇa tvena pūrvam vyavasthāpitāt punar veda artha gatiḥ iti yugapad kim etat viṣṭa kāmitam yat eva vastu apramāṇa tvena dviṣṭam tat eva punar pratipatti hetu tvena kāmitam abhilaṣitam iti paraspara virodhaḥ 
PVVṬ_601,1	 na prasiddhiḥ nāma anyāḥ jana pravādāt kintu jana pravādaḥ eva prasiddhiḥ te ca sarve janāḥ asambhāvanīya yā athātathya vacanāḥ asambhāvanīyam yāthātathyam aviparīta tvam yasmin vacane tad asambhāvanīya yāthātathyam vacanam yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ kim kāraṇam rāga avidyā parīta tvāt rāga avidyābhyām vyāpta tvāt tat iti tasmāt eṣa aṃjanānām pravādaḥ na pramāṇam 
PVVṬ_601,2	 bāhulyāt janasya tad pravādaḥ pramāṇam iti api mithyā yatas na hi bahūnām janānām madhye kasyacid ekasya api puruṣasya samyak pratipatteḥ abhāve sati lokasya bāhulyam arthavat bhavati prayojana vat bhavati kim iva pā ra sī kā ityādi yathā bahubhiḥ pārasīkaiḥ mātari maithuna ācaraṇāt na tad nyāyī ambhavati evam bāhulyepi rāga ādimatām atīndriya irthe vacanam apramāṇam eva iti 
PVVṬ_601,3–601,4	 atha teṣām eva rāga ādimatām puruṣāṇām vacanāt punar parokṣasya agnihotra ādi śabda vācyasya arthasya pratipattiḥ iti kathantat eva yugapad ekasmin= eva kāle dveṣyam ca kāmyam ca yujyate agnihotra ādi śabdasya yasmin= arthe loka prasiddhiḥ tām ullaṃdhya tyaktvā tata ūrtha antarasya śva māṃsa bhakṣaṇa ādeḥ kalpane na nibandhanam kāraṇam iti tasmāt prasiddhiḥ eva gṛhyate iti etat api ayuktam yatas prasiddheḥ apramāṇa tvāt tad grahe prasiddhi grahekid nibandhanam na eva kiñcid iti prasiddheḥ api grahaḥ mābhūt iti 
PVVṬ_602,1	 prāptyā ityādinā pūrva arddhantā vat vyācaṣṭe prasiddhyā prāptasya arthasya pratilomanena tyāgena anyatra aprasiddherthepravṛttiḥ guṇa doṣa darśane sati yuktāḥ yadi prāpta irthe doṣa darśanam syāt aprāpte ca guṇa darśanam na ca agnihotra ādi śabdānām prasiddherthe doṣa darśanam asti aprasiddhe vā guṇa darśanantataḥ prasiddheḥ eva anvayonugamanam iti ced 
PVVṬ_602,2	 na ityādinā pratiṣedhati etat ca paśca arddhasya vivaraṇam na etat evam kiṃṅkāraṇam prāpteḥ pramāṇa vṛtti lakṣaṇa tvāt sādhakena hi pramāṇena arthasya prāptiḥ niścīyate iti prāpteḥ pramāṇa vṛtti lakṣaṇa tvam ucyate na ca prasiddhiḥ pramāṇam yena siddhorthaḥ nyāya prāptaḥ syāt tatas ca tām enām prasiddhim apramāṇayataḥ mī mām sa kaḥ syatad mukhena prasiddhi dvāreṇa agnihotra ādi śabda vācyasya arthasya yā pratītiḥ sā yat kiñcanaḥ grahaṇam apramāṇaka tvāt yathā kathañcid tat grahaṇam iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_602,3–602,4	 tatas ca agnihotra ādi śabdasya loka prasiddha ūrthaḥ nyāya prāptaḥ na bhavati iti evam nyāyāt loka prasiddhasya arthasya prāpti pratiṣedhāt kāraṇāt agnihotra ādi śabdānām icchayā arthaḥ parikalpanīyaḥ tatra mī mām sa kaiḥ agni hotra ādi śabdānām yorthaḥ parikalpyate dahana dravya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ yaḥ ca pareṇa śva māṃsa bhakṣaṇa lakṣaṇaḥ tayoḥ sva para vikalpayoḥ ubhayathā api iti yadi prasiddhi anupālanam atha na anupālanantathā api pramāṇa abhāvāt icchayā parigrahe tulyā vṛttiḥ iti kṛtvā kaḥ prasiddha anurodhaḥ yena prasiddheḥ artha kalpanā kriyate 
PVVṬ_602,5–602,6	 api ca prasiddhyā eva sarva śabdānām artha niścaye iyat nānā artha tvena śaṃkotpāditā kim kāraṇam yasmāt na avṛtti tvam agni ādi śabdān ān tatra prasiddha odṛśyate na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe na prasiddhessakāśāt eka artha niścayaḥ śabdānām vaidikānām kim kāraṇam tatas eva prasiddheḥ eva śaṃkotpatteḥ tathā hi nānā arthāḥ agni ādi śabdāḥ loke dṛśyante tat ca nānā artha darśanam lokavādaḥ loka pravādaḥ ca pratītirata eva loka vādāt nā kṛtvā tatas loka vādāt vaidikānām śabdānām ekārtha niyamaḥ
