PVVṬ_603,1	 aniyata artha tvam eva draḍhayan= āha anyathā ityādi svayam svabhāvataḥ nānā śakteḥ aneka artha pratipādana yogyasya dhvaneḥ śabdasya anyathā sambhava abhāvāt abhimatāt arthāt artha antare vṛttiḥ anyathā tasyāḥ artha antara vṛtteḥ asambhavonyathā asambhavaḥ tasya abhāvāt pratiṣedha dvayena vidheḥ abhyupagamāt anyathā api sambhavasya bhāvāt iti yāvat tatas ca atīndriya artha vṛttiṣu vaidikeṣu śabdeṣu avaśyam aneka artha vṛtti tvena śaṃkayā bhāvyam keṣām niyāmakam apaśyatām puṃsām pratiniyata viṣaya sādhakam pramāṇam apaśyatām 
PVVṬ_603,2	 yatas evantasmāt aviditaḥ artha vibhāgaḥ yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ teṣu avidita artha vibhāgeṣu śabdeṣu ekam artham abhimatam kim bhūtam atyakṣa saṃyogam atyakṣa uti indriya ssaṃyogaḥ śabdena saha sambandhaḥ yasya iti vigrahaḥ ālambanam pramāṇantada bhāvāt anālambanaḥ niḥpramāṇaka ssamāropaḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ tam evaṃbhūtam artham viniścatya vyācakṣāṇaḥ jai mi niḥ tad vyājena iti vedaḥ evam prāha iti veda upakṣepeṇa svam eva mata māha iti kṛtvā yaḥ tīrthakaraḥ nirvyājam evam āha aham eva svayam vadāmi iti tasmāt tīrthakara antarāt asya jai mi neḥ na viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ 
PVVṬ_603,3	 aviśeṣam eva sādhayan= āha tathā hi ityādi sa ca asau= arthaḥ ca iti tad arthaḥ tasya prakāśanam vacanam tatra vyāpārassāmarthyantena śūnyasya rahitasya vedasya tad samāropeṇa iti artha prakāśana vyāpāra samāropeṇa evam vaktī iti yat abhidhānanta sva vacanam eva tasya tat iti yāvat tad kāriṇā vacana vyāpāra śūnye veda irtha prakāśana vyāpāra samāropa kāriṇā jai mi ni nā kevalam mithyā vinīta tā eva ātmanaḥ samuddyotitā syāt na tu pauruṣeyāt vacanāt asya viśeṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_604,1	 etat eva sphuṭayan= āha tathā hi ityādi kaḥ panthā pā ṭa li pu tram gacchati iti pṛṣṭaḥ kaścana puruṣaḥ āha na jāne svayam aham kevalam eṣa sthāṇuḥ ayam mārgaḥ iti vakti iti evam ekaḥ mārga upadeśa sāmarthya śūnya sthāṇu vyājena mārgam ācaṣṭe anyaḥ tu āha na sthāṇoḥ vacana sāmarthyam asti aham eva svayam jñātvā ayam mārgaḥ iti bravīmi iti tayoḥ evam abhidadhatoḥ svayam vacana bhedaḥ parīkṣyatām yadi asti na eva asti iti abhiprāyaḥ 
PVVṬ_604,2	 nirabhiprāyaḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe abhiprāyaḥ idam ca idam ca kariṣyāmi iti cetanā tad pūrvakaḥ prayatnaḥ vyāpāraḥ abhiprāyaḥ ca vyāpāraḥ ca vacanam ca tāni na vidyante yasmin sa tathā uktaḥ tasmin= evambhūte sthāṇau mārga prakāśaka tvam samāropya upadiśata ekasya puṃsaḥ svatantrasya vā sthāṇu nirapekṣasya aparasya mārgam upadiśate iti sambandhaḥ etayoḥ dvayoḥ puruṣayoḥ svayam vacana upagame na kaścid viśeṣa unyatra jaḍasya pratipatti mān dyāt jaḍasya śrotuḥ pratipatti māndyam eva viśiṣyate yatobhi prāya ādi śūnyasya sthāṇoḥ vacanam pratipadyate sthāṇuḥ eva vakti iti evam jai mi neḥ veda vyājena sva matam bruvataḥ jaḍaḥ pratipatti mān dyāt vedaḥ evam brūtaḥ iti pratipadyate 
PVVṬ_604,3	 api ca vaidikasya śabdasya eka artha pratiniyame sati enam eka artha pratiniyamam jai mi nirjānīyāt yāvatā śabdasya vācakasya sarvatra arthe vācaka tvena yogyasya eka artha dyotane niyatiḥ kutas na eva na hi śabdasya kaścid arthaḥ svabhāvena nisarga siddhyā niyata usti kim kāraṇam sarvatra vācyerthe yogya tvāt śabdasya 
PVVṬ_604,4	 atha punar na yogya tā sarvatra arthe śabdasya tadā api ayogya tve ca tad apracyuteḥ ayogya tā su abhāvāt nityasya śabdasya apracyuteḥ kāraṇāt puruṣāṇām avidheyasya anāyattasya kvacid arthe upanayanam vācaka tvena niyojanam niyuktasya api apanayanam na idānīm ayam śabdaḥ vācakaḥ iti tasya asambhavāt bhavati ca tasmāt sarvatra śabdāḥ yogyāiti eka artha dyotanam na asti 
PVVṬ_605,1	 bhavatu vā vaidikānām ekārtha niyamaḥ tathā api atīndriyam artha niyamam puruṣaḥ jñātum aśaktaḥ tat eva āha jñātāḥ vā ati indriyāḥ arthāḥ kena puruṣeṇa na hi mī mām sa koti indriya artha darśinam kañcid icchati vivakṣā vacanāt ṛte vivakṣāyāḥ prakāśanam vacanam vivakṣa avacanantena vinā vaktuḥ abhiprāya kathanam antareṇa atīndriyāḥ na eva kenacid jñātāḥ iti arthaḥ 
PVVṬ_605,2	 puruṣa ityādinā vyācaṣṭe kayācid vivakṣayā puruṣeṇa praṇīte uccārite śabdesa puruṣaḥ tām vivakṣān kadācid kvacid śrotari nivedayet idam mayā vācya tvena vivakṣitam iti vivakṣā pūrvakāṇām śabdānām arthe niyamaḥ pratīyeta api apauruṣeye tu śabde vivakṣā pūrvam kenacid aprayukte vidyamāna upyartha niyamaḥ katham jñeyaḥ na eva kathaṃcid kim kāraṇam svabhāva bhedasya abhāvāt na hi vaidikasya śabdasya kaścid svabhāvaḥ bhinnosti saḥ ekatra abhimaterthe niyataḥ yad darśana āt iṣṭa artha pratītiḥ syāt sati api vā svabhāva bhede sa svabhāva bhedaḥ pratyakṣaḥ vā syāt apratyakṣaḥ vā na tāvat pratyakṣaḥ kiṅkāraṇam pratyakṣasya svabhāvasya upadeśa nirapekṣasya svayam pratīti prasaṃgāt atha apratyakṣaḥ apratyakṣa tvepi pramāṇa antarasya abhāvena kenacid api arvāk darśanena jñātum aśakyatvāt 
PVVṬ_605,3–605,4	 abhyupagamya etat uktam na ca asti kaścid viśeṣaḥ yaḥ eka artha pratiniyataḥ sarva śabdāḥ hi sarva artha pratyāsatti viprakarṣa rahitāḥ na hi kecid śabdāḥ kvacid arthe pratyāsannā viprakṛṣṭāḥ vā bhāvataḥ api tu teṣāṃśabdānām sarva artheṣu svabhāvataḥ tulyānām ekārtha niyame vaktuḥ vivakṣāḥ hetuḥ saṃketaḥ tad prakāśanaḥ iti tasyāḥ ca vivakṣāyāḥ prakāśanaḥ saṃketaḥ tathā hi ayam arthaḥ tena vivakṣitaḥ iti saṃketāt avagamyate sā ca vivakṣā pauruṣeye śabde na asti iti kṛtvā atasya apauruṣeyasya śabdasya sā yathā uktā ekārtha tā kutas na eva 
PVVṬ_606,1	 vivakṣā hi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe vivakṣayā hetu bhūtayā śabda urtheṣu niyamyate asya eva arthasya ayam vācakaḥ iti na tu svabhāvataḥ kim kāraṇam tasya śabdasya kvacid vastuni apratibandhena sambandha rahita tvena kāraṇena sarvatra artha tulya tvāt yatra api śabdasya pratibandhaḥ sthāna karaṇeṣu tatas śabdānām utpatteḥ abhivyakteḥ vā teṣām api karaṇānām sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ abhidhāna niyama bhāvāt na hi sarve śabdāḥ karaṇānām eva abhidhāyakāḥ karaṇa abhidhāyī punar śabdaḥ karaṇāni pratipādayet api iti sarva grahaṇam 
PVVṬ_606,2–606,4	 yatas evantasmāt vivakṣā prakāśanāya saṃketaḥ kriyate kīdṛśaḥ abhiprāya nivedana lakṣaṇaḥ vaktuḥ abhiprāya prakāśana lakṣaṇaḥ apauruṣeye tu śabde na vivakṣā niyāmikā na api saṃketaḥ tad prakāśanaḥ kim kāraṇam puruṣa nivṛtteḥ evakasyacid abhiprāyasya abhāvāt iti kṛtvā na eka artha niyamaḥ vaidikānām śabdānām niyame vā na tat jñānam na eka artha pratiniyama jñānam kasyacid arthe svabhāvataḥ eka artha niyatāḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ na vivakṣātaḥ tadā svabhāva niyamebhyupagamyamāne sa śabdonyatra arthe tayā vivakṣayā na viyujyate yadi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yadi saṃketa nirapekṣaḥ svabhāvataḥ eva śabda urtheṣu nilīnaḥ yuktaḥ syāt uktam atra uttaram kvacid vastuni apratibandhāt aniyate iti 
PVVṬ_606,5	 api ca svābhāvikena nisarga siddhe vācya vācaka bhāve abhyupagamyamāne na punar vivakṣayā yatheṣṭam śabdonyatra arthe niyujyate na hi rūpa prakāśane svabhāvataḥ niyatam cakṣuḥ śabda prakāśane niyoktum śakyate niyujyate ca yatheṣṭam śabdaḥ tasmāt na svabhāva niyataḥ hasta saṃjñā ādi vat svabhāvatortha pratiniyame śabdānām saṃketaḥ ca niṣphalaḥ syāt yatas na hi svabhāva bhedaḥ svabhāva viśeṣaḥ indriya gamyaḥ sva pratītau paribhāṣā ādikam paribhāṣā saṃketaḥ ādi śabdāt saṃketa smṛti ādi parigrahaḥ kim iva nīla ādi bheda vat yathā nīla ādi viśeṣāḥ sva pratītau saṃketa ādikam na apekṣante tadvat tad apekṣa pratītayaḥ tu saṃketa apekṣa pratītayaḥ tu ye te na vastu svabhāvāḥ na vastunaḥ nisarga siddhāḥ viśeṣāḥ kintarhi sāmayikāḥ saṃketa kṛtāḥ kim iva rāja cihna ādi vat yathā rājñā sva pratītaye samitāḥ dhvaja ādayaḥ cit ha bhedāḥ ādi śabdāt hasta saṃjñā ādi parigrahaḥ yaḥ ca sāmayikassa svabhāva niyataḥ yuktaḥ nisarga siddhaḥ na yuktaḥ kim kāraṇam tasya sāmayikasya puruṣasya puruṣa icchayā pravṛtteḥ 
PVVṬ_607,1–607,3	 vaidikasya śabdasya arthe nisargataḥ eva svabhāva viśeṣaḥ niyataḥ sa tu saṃketena vyajyate iti ced āha atas eva ityādi yasmāt icchā vṛtti ssaṅketaḥ atas eva kāraṇāt saṃketāt eka artha niyatasya svabhāva viśeṣasya vyaktau niyatiḥ kutas na eva tat vyācaṣṭe sva icchā vṛtti ssaṃketassaḥ iha eva abhimaterthe karttum śakyate na anyatra iti na uparodha usti na vācakam asti tatas ca sa saṃketaḥ puruṣaiḥ sva icchayā kriyamāṇaḥ tam eva eka artha niyatam svabhāvam vyanakti na anyam iti na niyamosti 
PVVṬ_607,4–608,1	 yatra saṃkete svātantryam icchāyāḥ niyamaḥ nāma tatra kaḥ na eva asti niyamaḥ iti arthaḥ tena aniyata tvena kāraṇena asya vaidikasya śabdasya iṣṭām eva abhimata artha viṣayām eva yogyatām saṃketaḥ na dyotayet iti tat evam apauruṣeya tvam na āgama lakṣaṇam iti pratipāditam idānīm eka deśa avisamvādanam āgama lakṣaṇam dūṣayitum upanyasyati yasmāt ityādi kila śabdaḥ nabhiprāya dyotakaḥ agniḥ śītanodanaḥ śītasya nivārakaḥ etena agniḥ himasya bheṣajam iti etat vākyam yathā satyam tathā anyat api vākyam agnihotra ādikam juhuyāt iti ādikam avitatham etat sādhyam veda eka deśa tvāt iti hetuḥ evam aparaḥ vṛ ddha mī mām sa kaḥ bravīt uktavān 
PVVṬ_608,2	 anyaḥ tu ityādinā vyācaṣṭe anyaḥ tu mīmāṃsakaḥ yathā ukta doṣa upahata tvāt apauruṣeyam āgama lakṣaṇam parityajya anyathā prāmāṇyam vedasya sādhayitu kāmaḥ prāha avitathāni ityādi yatra apratipattiḥ iti yeṣu veda vākyeṣu avitatha tvena bau ddha sya apratipattiḥ tāni avitathāni iti anena viśeṣasya pakṣīkaraṇāt vaida eka deśa tvāt iti sāmānyasya hetu tvena upādānāt na pratijñā artha eka deśa tā hetoḥ asti yathā agniḥ himasya bheṣajam pratipakṣaḥ ityādi vākya vat ādi śabdāt dvādaśa māsā samvatsaraḥ ityādi vākya parigrahaḥ 
PVVṬ_608,3	 uttaram āha tasya ityādi tasya vādinaḥ idam sādhanam śeṣavat kasmāt vyabhicāri tvāt īdṛśam anumānam nyāya vidā ācārya di gnāḥ ge na pra mā ṇa sa mu cca ye pratikṣiptam iti sambandhaḥ kim iva śeṣavat iti āha rasavat ityādi yathā svāditena phalena tulya rūpa tvāt anāsvāditam api phalam tulyam iti etat anumānam śeṣavat tadvat adṛṣṭāḥ api taṇḍulāḥ pakvāḥ eka bhāṇḍe pacanāt dṛṣṭa pakva taṇḍula vat iti evam eka bhāṇḍe ca pāka vat yathā eva tad anumānam śeṣavat tathā mī mām sa kaḥ kta miti 
PVVṬ_608,4–609,4	 svayam ityādinā vyākhyānam īdṛśam anumānam svayam ācāryeṇa asādhanam uktam iti sambandhaḥ kva nai yā yi kā nām śeṣavat anumānasya vyabhicāram udbhāvayatā apra mā ṇa sa mu cca ye kim iva yathā tulya rūpa tayā hetu bhūtayā anāsvāditānām api phalānām āsvādita phalena tulya rasa sādhana vat ekasthālī antargamāt iti cahetunā dṛṣṭa paripakva taṇḍula vat adṛṣṭa taṇḍulānām pāka sādhana vat tat asādhana tva nyāyaḥ ca iti tasya śeṣa vatā unumānasya asādhana tva nyāyaḥ ca yasmāt adarśana mātreṇa vyatirekaḥ pradarśyate ityādinā pūrvam eva uktaḥ nanu ca āpta vāda avisamvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tā pra vā ityādinā ācārya di gnāḥ ge na api eka deśa avisamvādanam āgama lakṣaṇam uktam eva iti āha uktam ca idam ityādi uktam ca idam eka deśa avisamvādi rūpam āgama lakṣaṇam asmābhiḥ na ayam puruṣaḥ na aśritya āgama prāmāṇyam āsitum samarthaḥ iti atra antare 
PVVṬ_609,5	 tatra eka deśa avisaṃvādanam āgama lakṣaṇam na atyanta prasiddha eka viṣaya satyatā āśrayam api tutattva āgama lakṣaṇam yaḥ arvāk darśanena pramāṇataḥ śakya paricchedaḥ aśeṣaḥ viṣayaḥ tasya sarvasya śakya vicārasya viṣayasya śakyaḥ vicārosya iti vigrahaḥ yathāsvam pramāṇena vidhi pratiṣedha svīkṛta siddhi vat viśuddhā śāstre pratyakṣa viṣaya tvena abhimatānām pratyakṣa tvam yathā bau ddha si ddhā nte buddhi ādīnām tathā vastu vala āyāta anumāna viṣaya abhimatānām vastu bala anumāna viṣaya tvam yathā duḥkha satya ādīnām āgama apekṣā anumāna viṣaya abhimatānām ca tathā abhāvaḥ trividhasya viṣayasya yathāsvam pramāṇena vidhi siddhiḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇāḥ viṣaya tāḥ nāma pratyakṣa ādi tvam yathāsvam pramāṇena pratiṣedha siddhiḥ evam vidhi pratiṣedha siddhau satya ampariśiṣṭeṣu atyanta parokṣeṣu artheṣu śabdānām na antaratīyaka tā bhāve sambandha abhāve sati api varam agati a asaṃśayitasya puruṣasya pravṛttiḥ tatra iti sarvasmin vastuni adṛṣṭa vyabhicāraḥ āgame kadācid avisamvāda sambhavāt 
PVVṬ_609,6–610,1	 nanu anyatra iti yatra āgame yathā ukta viṣayaśaḥ tapratyakṣa ādi viṣayepi dṛṣṭaḥ pramāṇena uparodhaḥ vā yena puruṣeṇa tasya puruṣasya pravṛttiḥ na yuktā iti evam āgama lakṣaṇam uktam asmābhiḥ yaḥ puna rmī mām sa kādiḥ prākṛta puruṣāṇām viṣayasya vahaneḥ yat śīta pratighāta sāmarthyantasya abhidhānam agniḥ himasya bheṣajam iti etat vākyam veda eka deśa bhūtam satya arthaḥ dṛṣṭānta tvena upadarśya sarvam satya artham veda lakṣaṇam śāstram iti āha kimbhūtam śāstraṃśakya paricchede pramāṇa gamya īpi viṣaye pramāṇa virodhāt bahutaram ayuktam api tat evaṃbhūtam śāstram pratijānānaḥ mīmāṃsaka ādiḥ jayet dhārṣṭyena bandhakīm iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_610,2	 bahutaram ayuktam api iti uktantat darśayan= āha nityasya ityādi vadat iti etat padam sarvatra sambandhanīyam nityaḥ karttā puruṣosti iti evat nityasya puṃsaḥ karttṛ tvam vadat śāstram tathā nityān bhāvān vadat atīndriyāna pratyakṣa anartha anaidriyān pratyakṣān vadat tathā viṣamam ayuktam hetum bhāvānām vadat tathā bhāvānām viṣamām sthitim nivṛttiñca bhāvānām viṣamāmvadat etat ca vṛttau spaṣṭayiṣyāmaḥ yathā uktāt anyat vā vastu vyasta gocaram vyastaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ gocaraḥ vakāśaḥ yasya tat tathā uktam kena vyasta gocaram iti āha pramāṇābhyām pratyakṣa anumānābhyām nirastam asambhavam iti yāvat tat evambhūtam vastu vadat tathā āgama apekṣeṇa anumānena viruddham vadat śāstram tat evam anekā yukta artha abhidhāyakam śāstram satya artham pratijānānaḥ vādī jayet dhārṣṭyena bandhakīm 
PVVṬ_610,3–610,4	 kim akṛtvā pratijānānaḥ iti āha virodham ityādi śakya vicāre vastuni śāstrasya virodham asamādhāya aparihṛtya puruṣa śāstra pravṛttau nimittam śāstra arthañca sambandha anuguṇa upāya puruṣa artha lakṣaṇam apradarśya pratijānānaḥ apracyuteḥ ityādinā vyācaṣṭe apracyutam pūrvam rūpam anutpannam ca aparam rūpaṃyasya iti vigrahaḥ īdṛśaḥ kila pumān sukṛta duṣkṛtānām karmaṇām krameṇa karttā karma phalānām ca bhoktā kena prakāreṇa bhoktā karttā ca iti āha pūrva karma janita sukha duḥkha ādi samvittim prati samavāyi kāraṇa bhāvena ātmā karma phalāna ambha uktāḥ tat uktam 
PVVṬ_611,1–611,5	 sukha duḥkha ādi samvitti samavāyaḥ tu bhoktṛtā iti śubha aśubha karma karaṇe jñāna prayatna ādikam prati adhiṣṭhāna bhāvena ātmā karmaṇā karttā tat uktam jñāna yatna abhisambandhaḥ karttṛ tvantasya bhaṇyate iti ādi grahaṇāt jaḍa rūpasya api ātmanaḥ cetanā yogena bhoktṛ tvam gṛhyate tat uktam bhoktā ca cetanā yogāt cetanam na svarūpataḥ iti 
PVVṬ_611,6	 tat evam samavāyi kāraṇa adhiṣṭhāna bhāva ādinā iti āha vedaḥ tat ca etat ayuktam iti āvedita prāyam svayam eva śāstra kāreṇa nityānām kārya kāraṇa bhāva asambhavan darśayatā nitya tvam ca ayuktam keṣāṃvedaḥ āha iti sambandhanīyam kasmāt ayuktam akṣaṇikasya krama yaugapadyābhyām artha kriyā virodhena vastu dharma atikramāt artha kriyā samartham hi vastu tat ca artha kriyā sāmarthya makṣaṇikasya na sambhavati iti asat eva tad kutas tasya vastu dharmaḥ apratyakṣāṇi eva sāmānya ādīni iti ādi śabdāt kriyā guṇa ādīni pratyakṣāṇi iti āha vedaḥ janma ca sthitiḥ ca ni tāḥ ca bhāvānām viṣamāḥ prāha vedaḥ janmanaḥ vaiṣamyeṇa viṣayaḥ hetuḥ bhāvānām uktaḥ sūtre 
PVVṬ_611,7–611,9	 tam eva viṣamam hetum āha anādheyasya ityādi nitya tvāt anādheya atiśayasya prāk iti artha kriyā kāla avasthāyāḥ pūrvam akarttuḥ paścāt para apekṣayā sahakāri apekṣayā janaka tvam āha vedaḥ tat ca etat ayuktam iti vistareṇa pratipāditam niṣpatteḥ ityādinā viṣama sthiti abhidhāyi tvam vedasi a āha sva hetutaḥ niṣpatteḥ niṣpanna tvāt akārya rūpasya bhāvasya āśraya vaśena sthānam āha vedaḥ tat ca etat ayuktam sarva niraśaṃsya na anya balena sthānam iti prāk pratipāditam viṣamām nivṛttin darśayan= āha kāraṇāt ca vināśa hetoḥ sakāśāt bhāvānām vināśaḥ iti āha vedaḥ tat ca ayuktama dvi nāśasya iti pratipāditam 
PVVṬ_612,1	 evam ādikam anyat api sat iti āha vedaḥ kiṃbhūtam prasiddha viparyayam asattvam hi sattva viparyayaḥ prasiddhaḥ viparyayaḥ yasya kena pratyakṣa anumānābhyām tasya sattvam āha vedaḥ iti arthaḥ agnihotra ādeḥ ādi śabdāt tīrtha snāna ādeḥ pāpaā āha vedaḥ atra api ādi śabdāt dharma upacaya ādi gama āśrayeṇa anumānena bādhitam tathā hi adharmaḥ rāga ādi rūpaḥ tad prabhavam ca karma iti āgama vyavasthā dvayam api etat agni hotra ādinā na bādhyate iti katham adharmasya tena viśuddhiḥ dharma vṛddhiḥ vā kathantataḥ dharmasya alobha ādi tad prabhava karma svabhāva tvāt tīrtha snāna ādīnām ca ātad svabhāva tvāt ādi śabdāt anyat api evaṃjātīyakam ayukta abhidhānam draṣṭavyam 
PVVṬ_612,2–612,5	 tasya eva vādinaḥ vedasya sarvatra pratyakṣa ādi viṣaye trividhepi śāstra śarīre śāstra pratipādye vastuni pramāṇa virodham asamādhāya aparihṛtya śāstrepravṛtti aṅga bhūtāḥ dharma āstān apradarśya ke punar te dharmāḥ iti āha sambandha ityādi parasparam padārthānām saṅgatā artha tā sambandhaḥ śakya sādhane upāyaḥ anuguṇa upāyaḥ yaḥ śāstre puruṣa artha sādhane uktaḥ dṛ ṣṭassa puruṣeṇa sādhayitum śakyate iti yāvat abhyudaya niḥśreyasam puruṣa arthaḥ sambandhaḥ ca anuguṇa upāyaḥ ca puruṣa arthaḥ ca iti dvandvaḥ teṣām abhidhānāni nanu virodha asamādhānāt eva śāstrasya agrāhya tvam uktantat kim śāstra dharma apradarśanena uktena evam manyate pratyakṣa anumāna viṣaye viśuddham upadarśya kadācid anyatra sambandha ādi rahite brū dartham śāstra dharma apradarśanam uktam 
PVVṬ_612,6^1	 evam sambandha ādi abhidhānāni ca śāstra dharmān apradarśya atyanta prasiddha viṣaya satya artha tā abhidhāna mātreṇa iti atyanta prasiddhaḥ viṣayaḥ vahneḥ śīta apanoda sāmarthyam tasya abhidhānam satyantena satya abhidhāna mātreṇa prajñā prakarṣeṇa api duḥkhena avagāhyate iti prajñā prakarṣa durava grāhaḥ tatas eva gahanantarsmin= tathābhūtepi viṣaye atyanta parokṣepī iti yāvat niratyaya tām satya artha tām sādhayitu kāmaḥ mī mām sa kaḥ bandhakīm api prāgalbhyena dhārṣṭyena vijayate yādṛśīñca bandhakīm vijayate tām kañcid ityādinā darśayati bandhakī duścāriṇī svayam svāminā vipratipatti sthāne dṛṣṭā iti vipratipatti avasthāyān dṛṣṭvā para puruṣeṇa saṅga tā tvam iti upālabdhā satī 
PVVṬ_612,6^2	 sā tam svāminaṃpratyuvāca pratyu tte katham pratyuvāca iti āha paśyata etyādi pārśva sthāḥ striyaḥ māte iti anena āmantryante mātar paśyata puruṣasyamadīyasya svāminaḥ vaiparītyam nanu paśyata iti loḍmadhyama puruṣa bahuvacana antam etat tatas ca mātṛ śabdāt api bahuvacanam eva yuktam mātaraḥ iti tatra eke pratipannā mātṛ śabdena āmantrita eka vacana antena samāna arthaḥ mātar śabda usti vi svara pratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ iti anena nyāyena sa ca avyaya tvāt sarveṣu vacaneṣu tulya rūpaḥ iti bahuvacanena api paśyata śabdena sambadhyamānaḥ mātar iti eva prayuktaḥ iti anye tu paśyata mātaraḥ puruṣasya iti paṭhanti 
PVVṬ_612,6^3	 dharmasya sādhana bhūtā patnī dharmapatnī iti madhya pada lopī samāsaḥ mayi dharmapatnyām pratyayam akṛtvā ātmīyayoḥ jala budbuda ddhān jala budbudyoḥ dvayoḥ netra abhidhānayoḥ karoti pratyayam iti prakṛtam netram iti abhidhānam yayoḥ iti vigrahaḥ para puruṣeṇa asaṃgateḥ kāraṇam āha tena ityādi jaran= ca asau kāṇaḥ ca iti jaratkāṇaḥ vṛddhakāṇena iti arthaḥ tatra jarat grahaṇena vayaḥ vaikalyam uktam param rūpa sthānam cakṣuḥ iti tad vaikalyāt kāṇa grahaṇena vairūpyam grāmya grahaṇena vaidagdhi ādi guṇa vaikalyam kāṣṭha hāraka grahaṇena kṛcchra jīvi tvāt dāridryam uktam tat evam vṛddha tva ādi guṇa yuktena puruṣeṇa saṅgati artham prārthitā api satī 
PVVṬ_612,6^4	 na āhantena saha saṅagatā prāk rūpa guṇa anurāgeṇa rūpam prāsādika tā guṇaḥ vaidagdhi ādikaḥ dharmaḥ rūpa guṇayoḥ anurāga ubhilāṣaḥ tena hetunā maṃtri mukhya dārakam mantri pradhāna dārakam yuvānam putram mantri mukhyaḥ ca asau dārakaḥ ca iti vigrahaḥ tam evaṃbhūtam dārakam kāmayeham iti katham idam sambhāvyate tatra vṛddha ādi doṣa catuṣṭaya vaiparītyena mantri mukhya dārake guṇa catuṣṭayam uktam rūpa grahaṇena prāsādika tvam guṇa grahaṇena vaidagdhi ādiḥ mantri mukhya grahaṇena aiśvaryam dāraka grahaṇena vayaḥ guṇaḥ etat ca bandhakyā dhārṣṭyāt preritam eva kevala svamvacanam na tu yukti yuktam rūpa ādīnām eva kāma hetu tvāt na tu vārddhakī ādīnām 
PVVṬ_614,1	 evaṃjātīyakam ityādinā dṛṣṭānta artham dārṣṭa antike yojayati evaṃjātīyakam iti bandhakī prativacana tulyam etat atyanta parokṣerthe vedasya avisamvāda anumānam kimbhūtasya vedasya śakya vicāre vastuni dṛṣṭa pramāṇa virodhasya dṛṣṭaḥ pramāṇa virodhosya iti vigrahaḥ vahni śītanodana dṛṣṭāntena anumānam vahneḥ śīta pratīkāra vacanena yathā agniḥ himasya bheṣajam iti vākyam avisamvādi tathā anyat api veda vākyam avisamvādī iti 
PVVṬ_614,2–614,3	 tatra dharma patnī sthānīyaḥ vedaḥ vipratipatti tulyat nityasya puṃsaḥ karttṛ tva ādi abhidhānam netra tulye pratyakṣa anumāne na ca dṛṣṭa vyabhicārāyāḥ patnyāḥ vacanam garīyaḥ tasya puruṣasya yena yam vi pratiparttim dṛṣṭvā api sva darśanam apramāṇīkṛtya tasyāḥ vacanam yathārtham kuryāt evam veda ukta artha bādhakayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ apramāṇyam kṛtvā na vedasya patnī sthānīyasya dṛṣṭa vyabhicārasya vacanāt atyanta parokṣam pratipadyemahi iti atra eva doṣa antaram āha sidhyet ityādi evam iti yathā dṛṣṭa eka satya abhidhāna mātreṇa yadi sarvaḥ vedaḥ māṇam sidhyet tadā sarvaḥ puruṣassarvatra atha pramāṇam syāt yasmāt na hi puruṣe bahu bhāṣiṇī ekam vacanam satya artham na asti kintu asti eva 
PVVṬ_614,4	 yathā ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yathā idam atyantam abhidhāyi tvam ekāntena satya vādi tvam ati duṣkaram atyanta duḥkhena kriyate iti kṛtvā tathā atyantam satya abhidhānam ati duṣkarantatra evaṃsthite nyāye ekasya vaca nasya kathaṃcid iti kā kaḥ tā lī yaḥ nyāyena api yassamvāda ssatya artha tvantena hetunā tasmāt avisamvādakāt vacanāt aviśiṣṭasya tad vacana rāśeḥ iti yasya tad eka mvacanam avisamvādi dṛṣṭantasya puruṣasya vacana rāśeḥ tathā abhāve avisamvādi tve abhyupagamyamāne na kaścid puruṣaḥ na āptaḥ syāt kintu sarve eva āptaḥ syāt na ca evam tasmāt na eka deśa avisamvādāt prāmā ṇyam iti 
PVVṬ_615,1	 api ca yaḥ nāma kaścid kasyacid gamakaḥ sa tad svabhāvaḥ tad janyaḥ vā san gamayet na anyathā na ca ayam dhvaniḥ vācya tvena abhimatānām vastūnām svabhāvaḥ kim kāraṇam yasmāt vaktari dhvaniḥ sthitaḥ na hi anya svabhāva unyatra varttate vastanām kārya vā na ayam dhvaniḥ kim kāraṇam yasmāt vaktari mati dhvaniḥ bhavati tena ayam arthaḥ yasmāt vaktuḥ icchā mātra pratibaddhaḥ na bāhya vaḥ tu iti arthaḥ na ca tad vyatiriktasya iti svabhāva kārya vyatiriktasya arthasya avyabhi cāritā vidyate 
PVVṬ_615,2	 na ityādinā vyācaṣṭe tāvat śabdaḥ krame etat vaktṛ stham vacanam na tāvat vācyānām arthānām svabhāvaḥ na api eṣām vācyānām kāryam kiṅ kāraṇam tad abhāvepi vastūnām abhāvepi vivakṣā mātreṇa bhāvāt utpatteḥ na ca kārya svabhāvābhyām anyaḥ kaścid kasyacid avyabhicārī hetuḥ asti vā vyabhicāreca sati śabdasya tatas nyathā api iti tasmāt bāhya arthāt anyathā api vāhya artha bhāvepi iti arthaḥ tad sambhavāt tasya śabdasya sambhavāt kāraṇāt tasya śabdasya bhāvāt tad pratītiḥ vāhya artha pratītiḥ ayuktāḥ 
PVVṬ_615,3	 syāt etat yadi api vācyāt vastunā urtha antaram vacanantathā api tasya vācyasi akāryam eva iti gamakam eva yasmāt vācakānām śabdānām yā pravṛttiḥ utpattiḥ abhivyaktiḥ vā sā vāci aṣṭi kṛtā vācyasya arthasya yat darśanantatkṛtā vācye hisati tad darśanantad darśanam tad darśanāt tad vivakṣā vivakṣātaḥ vacanam iti pāramparyeṇa vacanam artha kāryam iti pūrva pakṣaḥ 
PVVṬ_615,4–616,1	 syāt etat ityādinā vyācaṣṭe tasmāt vācakasya śabdasya vācya darśanena pravṛtteḥ evam ityādinā pratividhatte evam sati iti yadi artha vaśena eva vacana pravṛtteḥ sarvā vacana pravṛttiḥ satya arthāḥ daikatra abhidheye āgama bhedena parasparam viruddha arthā sāvacana vṛttiḥ katham bhavet na eva bhavet sarva pravādeṣu ekārthā eva bhavet iti yāvat 
PVVṬ_616,2–616,3	 yadi ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yadi eṣa niyamaḥ vācyam vastu antareṇa vācyena vastunā vinā śabdaḥ na pravarttate iti tadā paraspara viruddha artha abhidhānāt bhinneṣu pravāda iṣu siddhānteṣu ekatra vastuni nitya an ityāde viruddhasya svabhāvasya upasaṃhāreṇa samāropeṇa vacana vṛttiḥ na syāt yatas na hi asti ayam sambhavaḥ yat ekaḥ śabdaḥ niḥparyāyam iti prakāra antareṇa vinā iti arthaḥ nityaḥ ca syāt anityaḥ ca iti śabda grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham tena ghaṭa ādiḥ api niḥparyāyat nityaḥ ca nityaḥ ca na sambhavati eva bhavati ca kasyacid pravāde nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vaḥ tiranyasya anityaḥ iti evam sa ātmakaḥ nirātmakaḥ ityādi tasmāt na asti śabdānām bāhyaiḥ arthaiḥ saha sambandhaḥ 
PVVṬ_616,4	 yatas evantena kāraṇena pratipattuḥ puruṣasya vastubhiḥ saha āgamāḥ na āntarīyakāa vinābhāvinaḥ na kathaṃcid pratipattuḥ sidhyanti āgamebhyaḥ vastu anāntarīyakebhyaḥ rtha niścayaḥ na sarva unveṣate kintvajñaḥ janaḥ samanveṣate kim artham tad ādarśita artha pratipataye tena āgamena upadarśitasya arthasya pratipatti artham kiṅkāraṇam ajñaḥ eva samanveṣate na anyaḥ iti āha samadhi gataṃyāthātathyam padārthānām aviparītam rūpam yaiḥ teṣām adhigata parama arthānām para upadeśa anapekṣaṇāt yena api ajñena anveṣaṇīntasya ā tīndriyā guṇāḥ yasya puruṣasya sā uti indriya guṇaḥ paścāt puruṣa śabdena viśeṣaṇa samāsaḥ tasya puruṣasya vivecane ayam sarvajñaḥ na anyaḥ vā vitatha abhidhāyi iti evam vibhāga kriyā āyām asāmarthyāt tad kutas tathā bhūta puruṣa praṇītam vacanam āgama tvena niścitya pravartteta 
PVVṬ_617,1	 na ca sarvasya sarvāṇi vacanāni yathārtham pravarttamānāni paraḥ nām ca samīhita ubhīṣṭaḥ yorthaḥ tasya sattām antareṇa api vṛttimpaśyataḥ pratipattuḥ puruṣasya bhavitavyam eva vāci śaṃkayā kim iyam yathārthāḥ vāc na iti vā iti keṣām vāci adṛṣṭa vyabhicāra vacasām api śakya vicāre vastuni adṛṣṭa vyabhicāram vacaḥ yeṣānteṣām api vāci api śabdāt dṛṣṭa vyabhicāra vacasām api vāci sutarām śaṃkayā yena śaṃkā tena kāraṇena na yuktam anena ajñena pratipattrākasyacid puruṣasya vacanena kiñcid vastu niścetum yatas ca aniścayaḥ tasmāt asya pratipatteḥ tad nivṛtti āpi āgamni vṛttyā api pratiṣedhya abhimatasya bhāvasya abhāvaḥ na prasidhyati 
PVVṬ_617,2	 yat uktam ityādinā vyācaṣṭe yat uktam prāk sarva viṣaya tvāt āgamasya sati vastuni avisamvādenā karaṇāt tad nivṛtti lakṣaṇā iti āgama nivṛtti lakṣaṇa anupalabdhiḥ svabhāva ādi viprakarṣiṇa upyarthasya abhāvam sādhayiṣyati iti tat iti abhāva niścāyaka tvam asya iti āgamasya na eva asya āgamasya sarva viṣaya tvam asti puruṣa artha asambaddhānām arthānām aviṣayīkaraṇāt 
PVVṬ_617,3–618,1	 abhyupagamya api ucyate āgamasya sarva viṣaya tve pi yadi yadi avṛttiḥ syāt tadā vastu antareṇa āvṛttau satyām syāt āgama nivṛtti lakṣaṇasya anupalambhasya abhāva niścāyaka tvam tat ca na asti vastu antareṇa api āgamasya vṛtteḥ evam ca sati tatortha vyabhicāriṇaḥ āgamāt pratipattu kāmasya puṃsobhi mata artha asiddhiḥ iti uktam tena kāraṇena viprakṛṣṭeṣu asat niścaya phala iti asat vyavahāra viṣa na sidhyati 
PVVṬ_618,2–618,4	 tasmāt na pramāṇa traya nivṛttau= api pratyakṣa anumāna āgama saṃjñitasya pramāṇa trayasya nivṛttau= api deśa kāla svabhāva viprakṛṣṭeṣu artheṣu aniścayaḥ iti upasaṃhāraḥ ayukta abhidhāyi tve diś mātrantīrthikānān darśayan= āha vedaḥ ityādi iti śabdaḥ vāda śabdaḥ ca atra vakṣyamāṇaka ssambandhanīyaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ veda prāmāṇya jāḍye liṅgam 
PVVṬ_618,5–618,8	 nanu guṇena ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pratiṣedhāt vedasya prāmāṇyam iti bhavitavyam na ayam doṣaḥ loka prasiddhānām viśiṣṭānām eva guṇān āntatra grahaṇāt asya ca liṅgam adhikaraṇa etāvatvaḥ iti ādikaḥ nirdeśaḥ kasyacid nai yā yi kā derīśvaraḥ tattva ādīnām karttā iti ayam api vādaḥ jāḍye liṅgam tīrtha snāne dharma icchā jāḍya liṅgam apara moha ādiḥ tat janitam ca kāya vāc karmma dharmaḥ tad viparītañca jala saṃśleṣa mātra lakṣaṇam snānam iti kutas tatas dharma prāptiḥ vistareṇa nirākṛtaḥ ca ayantīrtha snāna vādaḥ ācārya va su ba ndhu prabhṛttibhiḥ iti na iha pratanyate 
PVVṬ_618,9	 śīla ādi guṇa vaikalya īpi brāhmaṇa ūham iti jāti vādena avalepaḥ darpaḥ jāḍya liṅgam ayukta tvāt tathā hi pra gṛ hītvā jāti vāda avalepaḥ syāt brāhmaṇena pitrā vrāhmaṇyāḥ garbhe yaḥ utpādaḥ tam vā samāśritya tatra vastu bhūta sāmānya niṣedhāt na pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ na api uttaraḥ brāhmaṇa brāhmaṇī śarīrayoḥ aśuci svabhāva tvena śarīra antarāt aviśeṣāt 
PVVṬ_619,1–619,2	 anaśana ādinā śarīra pīḍanam santāpaḥ tasya ārambhaḥ nuṣṭhānam pāpahānāya pāpasya jāḍye liṅgam tathā hi sarvasya pāpasya nidānam lobha dveṣa mohāḥ taiḥ ca aviruddhaḥ santāpa ārambhaḥ iti kutas tena pāpa śuddhiḥ etāni paṃca liṅgāni jāḍye kiṃviśiṣṭe jāḍye dhvasta prajñāne pramāṇau= alam vijñānam prajñā anantat dhvastam yasmin jāḍye tat tathā uktam nyāya anusāri jñāna rahitaḥ iti arthaḥ yathā sthalam upādānāt pañca iti uktama liṅgāni iti 
PVVṬ_619,3–619,4	 bhaṭṭodyota kara ādiṣu pravicayaḥ yeṣām mahān vidyatesa dvastu ākara dharma kīrti jaladheḥ antar nimagnam manaḥ paurvāparya vimarṣiṇī smṛtiḥ alam prajñā api ca utkarṣiṇīyat kiñcid gadintat atra nipuṇaiḥ taiḥ eva vijñāsyate artha utkhāta paramparāsu mahatī vācaḥ prasanna ātma tāyasyām anya su bhāṣitā a tiḥ darpa ādhmāta samasta tīrthika m ata dhvaṃsaḥ ca saṃvedya teṭīkā iyam su vilakṣaṇa udita dhiyām āvarjanīyā katham iti kaḥ ṇ rṇa kaḥ gaḥ miviracitāyāmpramāṇa vārttika vṛtti pramāṇaḥ
